40001001	Waha a magahenye aacchinye Yeesso Kiriistohi hiiy Dawuudhi karnate. Dawuud la a hiiy Aburaaham.
40001002	Aburaaham Isakh dele, Isakh la Yaakoobo dele, Yaakoobo la Yuuda ichoow walaalinyetiis ba dele.
40001003	Yuuda la Beeres ichoow Seerah dele. Abarticho la a Taamar. Beeres la 'Heesiron dele, 'Heesiron la Raam dele.
40001004	Raam la Aminaadab dele, Aminaadab la Nahachoon dele, Nahachoon la Saalmon dele.
40001005	Saalmon la Boowas dele. Abar Boowas la Raahab iche layadeeh. Boowas la Obeedhi abartiis Ruu'd eheet dele, Obeed la Yeesse dele.
40001006	Yeesse la, Dawuudhi karnat eheet dele. Dawuud la Soolomon dele. Abar Soolomon makhaabál Uuriya eheet.
40001007	Soolomon la Rehobowaam dele, Rehobowaam la Abiija dele, Abiija la Aassa dele.
40001008	Aassa la Ye'hoochafaat dele, Ye'hoochafaat la Yooram dele, Yooram la Uusiya dele.
40001009	Uusiya la Yoo'dam dele, Yoo'dam la Aahas dele, Aahas la Heessekiya dele.
40001010	Heessekiya la Manaasseh dele, Manaasseh la Aamon dele, Aamon la Yossaaya dele.
40001011	Yossaaya la Yekooniya ichoow walaalinyetiis dele. Waha la a maanti yaafohi Issiraayel gaasoo ili Baabiloon liibooliye.
40001012	Inkoo yaafohi Issiraayel gaasoo ili Baabiloon liibooliye Yekooniya Cheeltiyeel dele, Cheeltiyeel la Serubabeel dele.
40001013	Serubabeel la Abiwuud dele, Abiwuud la Eliyakiim dele, Eliyakiim la Aassor dele,
40001014	Aassor la Saadok dele, Saadok la Akiim dele, Akiim la Eliyuud dele,
40001015	Eliyuud la Eliyaasar dele, Eliyaasar la Maa'dan dele, Maa'dan la Yaakoobo dele,
40001016	Yaakoobo la Yuussuf dele, Yuussuf la a makhaábal Maariyati Yeessohi Ki Lasubhe layadeeh desse.
40001017	'Deerka kholo tomon ichoow affare Aburaaham ichoow Dawuud dahche kijirte. Dawuud ichoow maanti yaafohi Issiraayel Baabiloon ka labooliye la, kholo tomon ichoow affare dahcho kajirte. Maanti yaafohi Issiraayel Baabiloon ka labooliye ichoowka maanti Ki Lasubhe desse laka, kholo tomon ichoow affare dahcho kajirte.
40001018	Delmaat Yeesso Kiriisto i'dane eheet. Abartiisti magahiche Maariya layadeeh, etoo Yuussuf layadeehe alkume. I'daasenyi geeddi icho isidisan on saggi iche miigti Rubeyti Munyee ka uur itahe laarge.
40001019	Jeenteti Yuussufhi Maariya soodisti etoo fissan ieheet u, usuhi Maariya 'doo'd ortiis ka lakhaanyo kadowo ma 'doono, Maariya dagsi ka katabin gooche.
40001020	I'daasenyi inkoo us ayta kamasse, hertoo Kamur issillo goyaka isoobahte wihi iche itidah, “Yuussuf, ínam Dawuud, Maariya disan akaroorin. I'di tahe iche miigti Rubeyti Munyeenye kuurowte.
40001021	Iche la inankoo dessa, magahi at ibihisso la a Yeesso. A mehe us 'doo'diissa uskeelicho karibaa.”
40001022	Waha dakkhan a yitaaheene, 'dee wihi Kamur eti Waákh íyeyyeedo ka yidah labuuhicha,
40001023	“Inanti mejel igaran a uurowta, inankoo dessa. Magahiis la Emmaanuwel iche layadeeh.” I'da ka mehe leessa ya, “Waakh a inno leejira.”
40001024	Yuussuf inkoo us sooneybaate ka, amuri kootte herti Kamure keleye ibihisse raahe, Maariya diste.
40001025	I'daasenyi Yuussuf Maariya ma leeur'dine ichoowka inankoo desse. Ulla magah ibahche, Yeesso yidah.
40002001	Yeesso ilkerengeetti Be'deleheeme boroofenhi Ya'huudiya kijirto iche lakadele. Maantaas la, 'Heroode karnati ilaase. Inkoo Yeesso desse, makhaaballetoo bakkaalle walah kaabatti iloo beri katimiyye, ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem timiy.
40002002	Iche la wihi iche worsatte, “Weeli desse karnati Ya'huud yateeh mee? I'di tahe bakkaali delmaattiis tuso usuhi beri kasookore a agarre, nah la usu nimiyye wahannaa.”
40002003	Karnati 'Herood layadeeh uus yeedaas daage, weyti mal gele, 'doo'di ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem kijiro tuumman laka mal gele.
40002004	Inkoo us kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre tuumman tol iwahe ka, inti Ki Lasubhe lakadelo worsate.
40002005	Icho la wihi icho ilaabeen, “Ilkerengeetti Be'deleheeme boroofenhi Ya'huudiya kijirto iche lakadela. I'di tahe waha a wihi goorat etoo Waákh íyeyyeedo chiire.
40002006	“‘I'daasenyi atihi ilkerengeetti Be'deleheemenye boroofenhi Yuuda kijirto, ilkerengeetohi addane Yuuda ma karucchul. A mehe berri karnat intane lakadela, ki 'doo'deeyki Issiraayel yaakhicho.’”
40002007	'Herood 'deerka makhaaballeti bakkaalle yeyto dagsi ka wahe, ibeenki bakkaal soobahe kaabte.
40002008	Ilkerengeetti Be'deleheem ierge, toro la wihi us iyidah, “Nyaama, weel mujjum soohiisda. Maanti atin 'hesseen, amiita ani laka isoocheeka, 'dee an laka a irdi a wahdi.”
40002009	Inkoo icho yeedi karnat daageen ka, jit khabteene, bakkaali kootte beri kasokoore icho sooraaheen la orcho raahe, ichoowka meessi weel kijiro sartiis ka tolossate.
40002010	Chirri icho toro bakkaal argeen ka weyti hamaadeen.
40002011	Chirri icho min geleen ka, weel ichoow Maariyati abartiise argeene, jilbo il kagu'ddeene weel wahteen. Urgohicho fureene, gaalkahsihi weyti gato miigenye icho sookhaateen soobahcheene, siicheen. Gaalkahsiha la a 'dahab ichoow halalle ichoow miricchinye.
40002012	Inkoo Waakh issillo ka tootooche, 'Herood iinokhanna iyidah ka, jitoo addan tabeene, ilicho inokhteen.
40002013	Inkoo makhaaballeti bakkaalle yeyto nokhatte ka, hertoo Kamur Yuussuf issillo ka isoobahte. Wihi iche itidah, “Kahe weel ichoow abartiis ba khaate ili Miissiri ifirid. Intaas fiddiye ichoowka ani a kisoocheeko. A mehe 'Herood dowwanoha weel ogoose yowtaa.”
40002014	Yuussuf 'deerka ibeen on kahe, weel ichoow abartiis ba leefirde ili Miissiri leemiinsate.
40002015	Intaas on fiddiyeene ichoowka 'Heroodhi karnate yumuy. 'Deerka wihi goorat Kamur etoo Waákh íyeyyeedo ka cheeke labuuhiche, “Weeleey ili Miissiri kasoowahe.”
40002016	Inkoo 'Herood saggi makhaaballeti bakkaalle yeyto iekkeysatte kase ka, weyti hollowe. Amur bahche nyaakhuti lallabe gu'h lamma khabo ichoow ki gu'h lamma ieleelinne, ilkerengeetti Be'deleheem ichoow ilkerengeetohi isoodow kajiro tuumman a labakkicho yidah. Gu'hassa lammee ichoow maanti makhaaballeti bakkaalle yeyto karnat icheekte a israahaan.
40002017	'Deerka wihi eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Yeeremiya layadeeh ka lacheeke labuuhiche,
40002018	“Hooyoo ilkerengeetti Raamah ka a ladaage. Hooyi etoo ooyo, weyti uuwwicho. Raaccheel nyaakhuticheeda ooyta, ichehi uur lakhoboocho 'dii'dda. I'di tahe icho tuumman kola a tuumeen.”
40002019	Inkoo 'Herood yumuy ka, hertoo Kamur ili Miissiri ka Yuussuf issillo goyaka isoobahte,
40002020	wihi iche itidah, “Kahe, weel ichoow abartiis ba khaate, ili Issiraayel inokho. I'di tahe 'doo'di goorat weel ogoos yowti, a tuume.”
40002021	Yuussuf 'deerka kahe, weel ichoow abartiis ba khaate, ili Issiraayel inokhte.
40002022	I'daasenyi Yuussuf chirri us saggi inam 'Heroodhi Arkeelawus layadeeh boroofenhi Ya'huudiya ka karnat iyitahye meel aabbahiis igele daage ka, intaas iran karoore. Yuussuf issillo ka latootooche, 'deerka boroofenhi Gaalilaaya irte,
40002023	ilkerengeettoo Naasaret layadeeh furte. I'daas ka wihi goorat 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo ka lacheeke labuuhiche, “Usu berri eti Naasarete layadeeh.”
40003001	Inkoo gu'hassoo kuteen ka, Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo yimiyye, hidaaddi boroofenhi Ya'huudiya ka Yeedi Waakh cheeke.
40003002	Wihi us yidah, “Uskeeliin kasoonokhda, i'di tahe dakhi goobi Waakh a soodowwaatee.”
40003003	Yoohana a eti goorat eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Isaaya layadeeh ka lacheeke, “Etoo hidaad ka a rirriira, ‘Kamur jit imujjummoocha, jiti us leeyamiit ficcha,’” iche essa.
40003004	Yoohana la gaaddiis tinti gaale lakahaaggiche, saabi us dabar kakhabe la niibe lakahaaggiche, gololiis la a gubaal ichoow malab.
40003005	Enenyet ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ichoow boroofenhi Ya'huudiya tuumman ichoow ilkerengeetohi hawti Yoordane 'dusso idow tuumman kasoobahe, Yoohana iyimiyye, wihi us essi dagansate.
40003006	Eti tuummane uskeeliis Waakh icheekte la, Yoohana hawti Yoordane 'dusso ka baattissiye.
40003007	I'daasenyi Yoohana maanti us rabitti Farissaayo ichoow ti Sadukaayo ittaawenye iche laka baattissiyo timiy arge ka, wihi us iyidah, “Dessi toof! Ayyo atin tootooche 'dee holi Waakh dowwanoha ka keeno kafiriddaan?
40003008	Taba gurnaanki saggi rumanka atin uskeel ikasoonokhatteen tuso dela.
40003009	Taba la iisekkeysanna, ‘Aburaaham a aacchihaanya,’ eelanna. Wihi an atin icheeko, Waakh a geeddi us dagahta urgiyicho us nyaakhut nyaakhut Aburaaham kayeelo.
40003010	Toolla laka Waakh i'di eti uroti geeyo hiiyyay khabaani goosso dahan kakhabuu, geeyohi gurnaanki haaggan idelin tuumman a goocha 'dab goya iseya.”
40003011	Yoohana toro wihi us yidah, “Ani atinhi tuummane uskeeliin kasoonokhatteen, bicche atin kabaattissiya. I'daasenyi etoo 'dubeey ka yamiit weyti ikaweenyahe, ortiis ka walah an ahe mele, kobtiis laka sinnaan ma mu'dan. Us Rubeyti Munyee ka ichoow 'dab ka a atin baattissiya.
40003012	Birtiisti gurnaan lakahafaricho, dahane kakhaba. Inti gurnaan lakatumo hara, 'dargaayyetiis koondi kichiba, urfo la 'dabi jirtuu ijitin goya kichiba.”
40003013	Saahka Yeesso boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kayimiyye, hawti Yoordane 'dusso ka Yoohana iyimiy, 'dee Yoohana usu baattissiya.
40003014	I'daasenyi Yoohana usuhi Yeessó jeycho 'doona wihi us iyidah, “Ati kootte incheenka ani ibaattissita, a i'doh ani ikatamiit?”
40003015	I'daasenyi Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Toolla i'da on a titaahe. A mujjum chi'inno i'da yeello, 'dee mali fissane Waakh buuhinno.” Yoohana 'deerka wihi Yeesso iyidah ayyiche, baattissiye.
40003016	Yeesso uus labaattissiye, chirraas on bicche goya kasoobahe. Chirraas on sereye bakkaahte, ulla Rubeyti Waakhe i'di kutukuurrug u sooyegto sartiis koorrommatti arge.
40003017	Hooyoo la serey kasooyeede, wihi us yidah, “Waha a Weeleeyki an weyti 'doono, weyti ikahamaadicho.”
40004001	Rubeyti Munyee saahka Yeesso woyte, ichoowka hidaad geesse, 'dee Seytaan kajmeti uskeel kalugu'ddo ikeena.
40004002	Inkoo us ibeen tomon affar maalintiche khabto af hiite ka, weyti ankaye.
40004003	Seytaanki 'Dookkaje layadeeh la iyimiyye, iiyeyye, “Chirri at Weeli Waakh tahe, dagahta leeyeede makaate a titaahe.”
40004004	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Wihi chiiran, ‘Weeli enenyet golol kalday mee kanoolyahe, i'daasenyi yeedi tuummane afi Waakh kasoobaho kanoolyahe.’ ”
40004005	Seytaan toro Yeesso khaate, ilkerengeetti weene lagane Yeerusaleem ka minki Waakhe buure guutiis korche.
40004006	Wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Chirri at Weeli Waakh tahe, inta kanyaam. I'di tahe wihi chiiran, “ ‘Waakh hertiis amure ibahcha, iche la dahanohiche ka serey kiokkhissa, uus 'dee luhtaah dagah gu'ddine.’ ”
40004007	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chiirnaanneti Waakh toro mehe tadeeh ya, ‘Kamuri Waakkhaahe kajme agelin.’ ”
40004008	Seytaan toro Yeesso khaate, haloo weyti deer korche, yaafohi harra tuumman ichoow kamurroonkicho ba tuse.
40004009	Seytaan wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Chirri at jilbo il kagu'dubte at ani iwahatte, waha tuumman a kisiicha.”
40004010	Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “Seytaan, nyaam ikatab! A mehe wihi chiiran, ‘Kamuri Waakkhaahe waho toro la usu kalday on ihil.’ ”
40004011	Seytaan 'deerka Yeesso katabe, herti Waakh la timiyye Yeesso gargaarte.
40004012	Yeesso inkoo us saggi Yoohana jeela liigesse daage ka, boroofenhi Gaalilaaya inokhte.
40004013	Ilkerengeetti Naasaret katabe, ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hume beyti Gaalilaaya aficheenye ili yaaf Seebulon ichoow Naaftalee irte furte.
40004014	Waha la a yateehiine, 'dee wihi eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Isaaya layadeeh ka lacheeke, labuuhicha.
40004015	'Doo'di harrati yaaf Seebulon ichoow yaaf Naaftali toolla yaalle, jiti beyti Gaalilaaya liikasohti, hawti 'dusso Yoordan bahayhiise yaal, harrati Gaalilaaya 'doo'di Waakh igaran yaalliine yaal.
40004016	Atinhi mug'dihi uskeel goya fiddiiteen, banayhi Waakhe buure a agarteen. 'Doo'di ili oosinti omooteet fiddiye, banay a isookoreen.
40004017	Uus maantaas Yeesso Yeedi Waakh 'doo'd icheeke, wihi us iyidah, “Uskeeliin kasoonokhda, a mehe dakhi goobi Waakh a soodowwaatee.”
40004018	Yeesso Beyti Buurenye Gaalilaaya afiche kasohtaayi, reeroo lammeenye isleedesse arge. Waha a Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh ichoow Andereeya. Iche la oroohti bahag lakakhabti bey goya isaate, a mehe hiliche a ki bahag lakhabti.
40004019	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Kaaleya isooraaha abattiteey ateeha, hiloo husube enenyet Waakh liikeeno a atin korcho.”
40004020	Chirraas on oroohti kootte iche bahag kakhabatti 'diisse Yeesso raahte.
40004021	Toro orey isohte yeeletoo addane lammeenye isleedelatte too Sebedaayee arge. Iche la a Yaakoobo ichoow Yoohana. Lammache aabbahiche khabtaayi kooban goya fiddiita, oroohti bahag lakakhabti haagsatta. Yeesso yeele lammache wahe.
40004022	Iche la chirraas on kooban ichoow aabbahiche ba katabte Yeesso raahte.
40004023	Yeesso boroofenhi Gaalilaaya tuumman goya tabe, minassichoki weysiite Ya'huud ka Wori Haaggane dakhi Waakh miinsan cheeke, 'doo'di khakkhannane khannaattetiis fil dakkhan tahe laka samaache.
40004024	Woriis boroofenhi Siiriya tuumman kataa'he, 'doo'd la 'doo'di tuummane khakkhannane sugeerreti yeerare khabo ichoow ki bolokkhi uskul khabo ichoow ki ginnayyo dakhtaan ichoow ki sungaal khabo ichoow ki ma'dee ikeene, ulla icho tuumman samaache.
40004025	Ururreti buurenye boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ichoow Dekaabolis ichoow ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ichoow boroofenhi Ya'huudiya ichoow hawti 'dusso Yoordan berihichee kayimiy Yeesso raahe.
40005001	Yeesso inkoo us ururi buure arge ka, irte burroo kore, orronte. Abattitiis la isookhayte.
40005002	Yeesso 'doo'd walah abinnaan sookhabte.
40005003	“'Doo'di Waakh imaalo a ki wahanyeyyohi Waakh ka miskiine, a mehe dakhi goobi Waakh a kichooda.
40005004	'Doo'di Waakh imaalo, a ki toolla uskeeli weeli enenyet bolkhicho, Waakh icho uur a khoboochaa.
40005005	'Doo'di Waakh imaalo, a ki samacchaare, Waakh harrati husub icho a siichaa!
40005006	'Doo'di Waakh imaalo, a ki fissanoon iankayo toro isubgaati, Waakh icho a dargichaa.
40005007	'Doo'di Waakh imaalo, a ki uur nugul, Waakh icho uur a inugleestaa.
40005008	'Doo'di Waakh imaalo, a ki uurassicho ka eloo rucchul laka ikhabin, icho Waakh a argaanee.
40005009	'Doo'di Waakh imaalo, a ki enenyet isineybicho, a mehe nyaakhuti Waakhe layadeeh.
40005010	'Doo'di Waakh imaalo, a ki jeenteti icho ifissanyahiin u sina loomhicho, dakhi goobi Waakh a kichoodaa.
40005011	“Waakh a atin imaala maanti enenyet jeenteteey u atin abaaro, sina atin omhicho, been ka suujoonki nool atin kacheekti.
40005012	Gir'daama weyti hamaada gi'de. Waakh goobiis ka kala'ddi buurenye atin gutaa. A mehe 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo goorat saggaas on sina liiomhiche.
40005013	“Atin a magaa'ddi weeli enenyet tuumman. I'daasenyi magaa'de chi'iche gimbatiche waayte, saggoh toro liigimbaacha? Kola walah iche iroontahe mele, khubnaanki lakhubo enenyet yabti on menye.
40005014	“Atin i'di banay u, enenyeti harratane jiti Waakh tussaan, ilkerengeetti hal sartiis kadisan la ma ladabo.
40005015	Toro la et taa bolkhicho baakhuul kaankubo mele. Taa a labolkhicha kombor lakorcha, 'dee eti tuummane min goya kajiro il kaarga.
40005016	Taba gi'de atin laka i'daasu, haaggi atin yeessaan weeli enenyet tuumman a argo, 'dee enenyet tuumman Aabbahiinki serey jiro a inkaanyito.
40005017	“Kol an harra imiyye 'dee Amurre ommos wihi 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo enenyet abcho baabiicho akoogeynana. An baabiin ma imaatane, i'daasenyi a imiyye wihi icho enenyet abchaan buuhicha.
40005018	Rume atin icheeka, chirri sereyta daayan ichoow harra massataan laka, aytoo rucchul laka amurre Muusa goya ma lakabahcho, ichoowka wihi lachiire tuumman labuuhicha.
40005019	Eti tuummane amuri amurreti Waakh goyaka rucchul laka jebche, toro la 'doo'di addan laka i'daas yeela iyadeeh, dakhi goobi Waakh ka walah us yahe mele. I'daasenyi eti tuummane amurretaas raahe, 'doo'di addan i'di iche ichiirantahe abche la, dakhi goobi Waakh ka a weenyahe.
40005020	A mehe wihi an atin iadeeh, sammata fissanoonkiin ki tagaammeti amurre ichoow Farissaayo ikutin rumanka dakhi goobi Waakh ma gessaan.
40005021	“Saggi goorat Waakh aacchinyeteen, ‘Weeli enenyet dubunuunu iigaasan, eti tuummane enenyet yigis la a lahukkuma,’ iyidah a daagteen.
40005022	I'daasenyi wihi an atin iadeeh, eti tuummane etoo keeye ihollowe, a lahukkuma. Toro la eti tuummane etoo keeye abaare Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huude liikeena, hukkunta. I'daasenyi eti tuummane etoo addan, ‘'Dalanki marah,’ iyidah, a geeddi meessi 'dabi armaanjireen lakalug'do.
40005023	“Maantaka chirri at soorriyotaah chalagti Waakh soorriyo liikabahcho keente, at intaas ka saggi etoo keeye wohoo ikaakhabo kasoo'hesse,
40005024	soorriyotaas chalag orche katab. Koloo iro, eteeykaas isineyba, 'dee amiite soorriyotaah Waakh ibihi.
40005025	“Chirri etoo kootiin kigeecho wohoo kaacheekti, etaas dowwa isineyba. Geeddi atin kootiin isohattaan isineyba. Chirri at i'daas iyeelin, etaas eti 'doo'd hukkumo kicheekta, eti 'doo'd hukkumo la dahanti iskareet kigessa, iche la jeela kigelissa.
40005026	Rume atin icheeka, jeelataas goya ma kasoobahto ichoowka mogtiis tuumman hiyyaayta.
40005027	“Saggi Waakh Chiirnaanne ka, ‘Makhaabassi taah ieheynan aleeur'din,’ iyidah a daagteen.
40005028	I'daasenyi wihi an atin iadeeh, eti tuummane makhaabassi tiis ieheynan yeye, maanjeerte uuriis ka uskeeli us makhaabassi tiis ieheynan leeur'do iche gele.
40005029	Maantaka chirri issaahti miigeet uskeel kaalugu'ddo, issaas bihiche, rog! Atihi sartaah tuumman khabtaayi meessi 'dabi armaanjireen lakaalug'do ka, atihi miilaahkoo waayto deefta.
40005030	Chi' dahantaahti miigeet uskeel kaalugu'ddo la, dahantaas gooche, rog! Atihi sartaah tuumman khabtaayi meessi 'dabi armaanjireen lakaalug'do ka, atihi miilaahkoo waayto deefta.
40005031	“Chiirnaanneti Waakh wihi kachiiran, ‘Chi' etoo arantiis tuum riho, khadaabi saggi us iriho tuso a siicho.’
40005032	I'daasenyi wihi an atin iadeeh, eti tuummane makhaabassiis tuum rihe chi'iche mejeloo addan leeu'durte on menye, makhaabalaas makhaabassaas uskeeli iche mejeloo kiche ieheynan leeu'durto iche kalug'da. Eti makhaabassi tuum larihe disti la, uskeeli us makhaabassi tiis ieheynan leeur'do iche gela.
40005033	“Amuroo addane aacchinyeteen liicheeke a daagteene, wihi us yidah, ‘Wihi at ayyisse yeele, wihi at Kamur idaatatte la yeel.’
40005034	I'daasenyi wihi an atin iadeeh, adaatanna ba. Goobi Waakh akadaatanna, i'di tahe goobi Waakh a komborti buurenye antoote Waakh.
40005035	Ommos harra laka akadaatanna, i'di tahe harra a komborti rucchule Waakh luhlohiis korcho ommos ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem laka akadaatanna, i'di tahe a ilkerengeetti Waakkhi karnatenye weene.
40005036	Matakkaah laka akadaatan, i'di tahe at tintaahtoo kalday laka ma dakhnaasso ommolla ma daayisso.
40005037	Chirri at, ‘Aa,’ tidah, i'daas on a eheetti. Chirri at, ‘Mele,’ tidah la, i'daas on a eheetti. Wihi addane at kakhayto, ki uskeel lehe kayamiitiin.
40005038	“Amuri, ‘Eti il kibahche at laka il bihi. Eti ilah kibahche la at laka ilah bihi,’ yidah a daagteen.
40005039	I'daasenyi wihi an atin iadeeh, eti suuje aleetirrimin. Chirri etoo fodoori miigeet kigu'dde, fodoori addan laka siiche a kigu'ddo.
40005040	Chirri etoo kootiin kigeen 'doono 'dee us ubbaaraahki deer kaakhaato, kabuu'daah laka iduumi.
40005041	Chirri etoo iskareet meehiis kihosse, ‘Kiilomittatoo kalday si'd,’ kiyidah, at la kiilomittatoo kalday menye, kiilomitta lamma isi'd.
40005042	Eti walah kidaahe siiche, toro la eti wohoo amah ka kidaahe, wihi us kidaahe atiran.
40005043	“Saggi goorat 'hor amur, ‘Ollokkaah 'doone, chiiytaah la 'dii'd,’ iyidah a daagteen.
40005044	I'daasenyi wihi an atin iadeeh, chiiytiin 'doona, 'doo'di sina atin omhicho la iweesda.
40005045	I'daakka nyaakhuti Aabbahiinki serey jiro tateehiin. Us 'doo'di sussuuje ichoow ki hahhaaggan ba orrah a isookorcha, 'doo'di fiffissan ichoow ki khokkhollokkhan ba hir siicha.
40005046	Chirri atin 'doo'di atin 'doono kalday on 'doontaan, kala'd atin sugtaan mele. A mehe 'doo'di kooddi goocho laka i'daas on yeela.
40005047	Chirri atin 'doo'diinna on bariitissaan la walah addane atin 'doo'di addan 'dirihiis yeesseen mele. 'Doo'di Waakh igaran laka i'daas a yeela on.
40005048	Maantaka saggi Aabbahaahki serey jiro 'doo'diis tuum isikasoobahchuu, at laka tuum issoobihiche, 'dee wihi Waakh kaa'doono yeel.”
40006001	Yeesso toro wihi us 'doo'd iyidah, “Chirri atin 'doo'd haag iyeessaan, wahaas saggoo 'dee enenyet atin ikoolicho iiyeelina. Chirri atin i'daas yeessaan Aabbahiinki serey jiro kala'd us atin guto mele.
40006002	“Maantaka kolbaaw at etoo miskiine wohoo siisso, enenyet iistuttusin i'di orran 'doo'di iskaayyeelo minassi weysiite Ya'huud ichoow jitat ka yeelo 'dee 'doo'd iinkaanyituu. Rume atin icheeka, icho kala'ddicho tuum a 'heleen.
40006003	I'daasenyi geedda at etoo miskiine wohoo siisso, uus etoo kalday laka saggi at isiisse garanne,
40006004	'dee wihi at siisso dagsi on a eheetti. 'Deerka Aabbahaahki wihi dagsi ka layeelo argo, kala'd a kiguta.
40006005	“Kolbaaw atin weysattaan, i'di 'doo'di iskaayyeelo iitaahana. I'di tahe icho wihi icho 'doonaan, a ichohi minassi weysiite Ya'huud ichoow inti enenyet tuumman kaargo ka tolossati weestaane, 'dee 'doo'd tuumman saa'do. Rume atin icheeka, icho kala'ddicho tuum a 'heleen.
40006006	I'daasenyi kolbaaw at weysatti, meessi liikaargin gele, Aabbahaahki indo ka liiargin waho, 'dee Aabbahaahki wihi at dagsi ka yeesso argo kala'd a kiguto.
40006007	Kolbaaw atin weysattaan la i'di 'doo'di Waakh igaran yeeluu, yeedassi ittaawenye indigir laa eelanna. Wihi tahe icho kol waakkhassicho jeenteti yeedassaas ittaawe u weysihicho daagaane koogyahiin.
40006008	Saggi icho iweestaan iiweysanna, wihi tahe, Aabbahaah wihi at 'doonto geeddi at isooidaahan laka a garta.
40006009	“Cha'atin weysattaan, sagga iweesda, “‘Aabbaheenyoki serey jiro, magahaahki munyee a liinkaanyito.
40006010	At ba enenyet tuumman dakhatta. Saggi goobaah ka in at 'doonto liiyeeluu, harrata ka laka in at 'doonto a layeelo.
40006011	Gololeenyoki maan dakkhan nah sii.
40006012	Uskeeli nah yeelle nah ikakut, saggi nah laka 'doo'di uskeel nah iyeele uskeel ikakunnuu.
40006013	Kajmeti uskeel nah kalugu'ddo nah kajeyiche, i'daasenyi Seytaanki uskeel leh nah karib!’
40006014	A mehe cha'atin 'doo'di uskeel atin iyeele uskeel ikakuttaan, Aabbahiinki serey jiro laka uskeeliin a atin ikakuta.
40006015	I'daasenyi chirri atin 'doo'di uskeel atin iyeele uskeelaas ikakutin, Aabbahiin uskeeliin ma atin ikakuto.
40006016	“Kolbaaw at af hidatti, i'di 'doo'di iskaayyeeluu fool ariboon. A mehe icho fool a dakhnaata, 'dee saggi icho af ihiiteen tusaan. Rume atin icheeka, icho kala'ddicho tuum a 'heleen.
40006017	I'daasenyi geedda at af hidatti subakki geeyi oolif matah kasubho, foolaah dikho,
40006018	'dee 'doo'di addan menye, Aabbahaahki indo ka liiargin kalday on saggi at af ihidatte a abti, 'dee Aabbahaahki wihi dagsi ka layeelo argo, kala'd a kiguto.
40006019	“Kamurroonkiin harrata ka meel iisigelinna. A mehe inta ka gubaal ichoow kuuttu a suujaachaane 'doo'di walah hato la min a jebcha hata.
40006020	I'daasenyi goobi Waakh ka kamurroonkiin meel isigessa. Intaas ka gubaal ichoow kuuttu ma suujaachaane, toro la 'doo'di walah hato min ma jebchaane ma hataan.
40006021	A mehe inti kamurroonkaah kajiro, iche uuraah laka kajira.
40006022	“Ile i'di taa u sar banaye ikeenta. Chirri indohaah haagganyahiin sartaah tuumman banaye buuha.
40006023	I'daasenyi chirri indohaah suujyahiin sartaah mug'di buuha. 'Deerka chirri banayhi at khabto lajicche at mug'dihi reebenye goya kijirta.
40006024	“Et kamur lamma ifalo mele. A mehe koo a 'dii'dda ki addan la 'doonta, toro la koo inkaanyitta ki addan la 'darraawta. Waakh ichoow chilimme ba koloo kalday ma ifasso.
40006025	“Maantaka wihi an atin iadeeh, jirotiin akawa'dwaa'dina, wihi atin tamhiin ommos wihi atin dantaan, ommos sartiin ka wihi atin gessattaan. Jiro golol ma kussan a? Sare la gaad ma kussan a?
40006026	Chimbirohi saraat kamalda bal. Ilmo icho gos kachibaan mele, gurnaan bissaate icho meel gessataan la mele. I'daasenyi Aabbahiinki serey jiro on goollicha! Atin icho weyti kussantahiin gon.
40006027	Etiinkoo maanta wa'dwaa'di us wa'dwaa'do ka jirotiis saha'ddoo kalday kakhayaayi?
40006028	“A i'doh jeenteti gaadeet u wa'dwaa'd ikhabtaan? Bal fiikhti bahto yeya. Hil iche haaggisso gaad isikayowatti mele.
40006029	I'daasenyi wihi an atin iadeeh, karnati goorat Soolomon layadeeh laka, kamurroonkiis tuumman khabaayi, gaaddiis geeddi fiikhta ma haaggan.
40006030	Chirri Waakh hoosi keley baho, toolla jiro saahta 'dab lakalug'do gaado, atin geeddaas 'dirihiis weyti ma atin gaado? Atin eenna geeddoo rucchul on Waakh kakhuuftaane!
40006031	'Deerka awa'dwaa'dina, ‘Mehe numhe?’ eelanna, ommos, ‘Mehe nubhaabe?’ eelanna, ommos ‘Mehe gessanni?’ eelanna.
40006032	I'di tahe 'doo'di Waakh igaranne wahanyeyyohaas kaalloo'da. Aabbahiinki serey jiro saggi atin waha dakkhan i'doontaan a garta.
40006033	I'daasenyi koloo dakhi Waakh ichoow fissanoonki Waakh 'don'doon, ulla wahanyeyyoha dakkhan a ikaasookhayaa.
40006034	Maantaka wihi at saahta 'doonto akawa'dwaa'din. I'di tahe maane ba wihicheki lakawa'dwaa'do a khabta. Walah at sinati ibeen ba keeno sinatoo addan ikakhayto mele.
40007001	“Taba uurassiin goyaka enenyet ahukkumina, ommos atin laka Waakh a atin hukkumaa.
40007002	A mehe saggaas atin enenyet ihukkuntaan saggaase atin laka Waakh atin ihukkuma. Geeddi atin 'doo'di addan iyeessaan, geeddaase atin liiyeela.
40007003	“A i'doh urufti il walaalaah kijirto iagarta, gurtunki issaah goya kijiro la iargin?
40007004	At saggoh walaalaah, ‘Alley uruftaas il kaajirto a kaabahcho,’ ikatadeeh, alla kol tuumman gurtume issaah goya kaajiraa?
40007005	Iskaayyeessooy! Koloo gurtunki issaah goya kajiro bihiche, 'dee urufti il walaalaah goya kajirto mujjum agare, bihi.
40007006	“Wihi munyee 'doo'di Waakh 'dii'ddan asiinna. 'Doo'da a i'di kararreti yibaate kisoonokhatti, kitaham. Wihi weyti haaggan la, 'doo'di haaggicho 'dii'ddan asiinna. 'Doo'da i'di golchuu wahaas haaggan a yabta.
40007007	“Waakh wihi at 'doonto daddaahe, a kisiicho. Wihi at 'doonto Waakh kayoyyowo, a ka'hessaa. Waakh, arit ifah idahe, ulla a kifaho.
40007008	I'di tahe eti tuummane walah daahe, Waakh wihi us daahe a siicha, ki walah yowti la, Waakh a ka'hela, ki ifaha yidah la, Waakh arit a ifaha.
40007009	“Atinhi ooyenyee, etiinkoh chirri weeliis golol daahe dagah siicha?
40007010	Ommos chirri weeliis bahag daahe toof siicha?
40007011	Chirri atinhi uskeel leh ba nyaakhutiin siinti haaggan siissaan, Aabbahiinki serey jiro la geeddoo meheenye 'doo'di usu walah daahe siinti haaggan siicha!
40007012	Walah tuumman ka, wihi kootte incheenka atinhi atin liiyeelo 'doontaan, 'doo'di addan iyeela. Wihi tahe, waha a wihi Chiirnaanneti Amurre ichoow Chiirnaanneti 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo enenyet abchaan.
40007013	“Aritti juukhe kagel, a mehe aritti 'dabi armaanjireen lakagelo, a ballaaddantahe, jiti baabaa isohti la a 'dabakhe, 'doo'di tabo la a buur.
40007014	I'daasenyi aritti jiroti armaanjireen lakagelo a juukhe, jiti jiroti jirtuu imassan isohti la a miige, toro la 'doo'di jita 'helo a koo rucchul.
40007015	“Taba 'doo'di 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo iskaayyeelo yuubsada, i'di tahe icho uummanki iiyyaate atin ikayamiitiine, ugoka uurassicho ka a yaayti weyti sussuuje.
40007016	Gurnaanki icho delaane kaabattaan. Geeyi bilhil medeer ma kaguratti, toro la geeyi khasah dommog ma kaguratti gon.
40007017	Saggaas on u geeyi haaggan tuumman gurnaanki haaggane dela, i'daasenyi geeyi suuje gurnaanki suuje on dela.
40007018	Geeyi haaggan gurnaanki suuje delin ma yabuu'de, geeyi suuje la gurnaanki haaggan delin ma yabuu'd.
40007019	Geeyi tuummane gurnaanki haaggan idelin, a lagoocha 'dab lakalug'da.
40007020	I'daakka 'doo'di 'doo'di Waákh iyeyyeedo iskaayyeelo, gurnaanki icho delaane kaabaattaan.
40007021	“Eti tuummane af ka, ‘Kamuraayaaw,’ idowo mee dakhi goobi Waakh gelo. I'daasenyi eti gelo a ki wihi Aabbaheeyki serey kajiro 'doono yeelo kalday on.
40007022	Maanti Waakh enenyet hukkumo, 'doo'di buure mehe ani iyadeeh ya, ‘Kamur, Kamur, magahaah ka a kiyeyyeene, toro magahaah ka ginnayyo 'doo'd a kabihinne, wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan laka yeelle.’
40007023	Anna 'dow ka mehe icheeka ya, ‘An injire ma atin garan. Atinha hugun'darri kaassohattaan nyaama ikataba.’
40007024	“Maantaka eti tuummane wihi an idowo daago toro la raaho, a i'di eti khareenye minkiis inti ng'aajjee kadise.
40007025	Saahka hir 'deye, 'duley il khaate, hafari buure laka sookahe min gu'dde. I'daasenyi minkaas ma reyin. I'di tahe mujjume il katoolla.
40007026	I'daasenyi eti tuummane yeedeeyka daago toro iraahin, a i'di eti 'dalamenye minkiis yooh goya kadise.
40007027	Saahka hir 'deye, 'duley il khaate, hafari buure laka sookahe min gu'dde, min tuumman iskareye iskaambase.”
40007028	Inkoo Yeesso waha tuumman cheeke ka, urur saggi us 'doo'd walah iabcho kagirmeeste.
40007029	Yeesso i'di tagaammetichoti amurre mee, us saggi etoo anto khabo iche enenyet walah iabcha.
40008001	Chirri Yeesso hal tahariis kasookhubte ka, ururoo buure usu sooraahe.
40008002	Etoo bu'datoo uskul sar kasoofoofte la Yeesso iyimiy. Ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dde, wihi us yidah, “Kamuraaw, chirri at 'doonto, at bi'dir ibihin a tabuu'd.”
40008003	Yeesso dahan ooge, et 'daare, wihi us iyidah, “A 'doona, bi'dir bah!” Chirraas on bu'dati kootte et sar kasoofoofte baabaate, et samaate.
40008004	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us iyidah, “Etoo kalday laka jit ka aleeyeedine, i'daasenyi kuhaani iiro, saggi at isamaatte istus. Sadakhati amurre Muusa kachiirane eti bu'da lakabahche bahcho bihiche, 'dee garti saggi lakisamaache a titaahe.”
40008005	Chirra Yeesso ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hum gele ka, etoo ili Rooma koobbintoo iskareet itoollo, iyimiyye hawwaaste,
40008006	wihi us iyidah, “Kamur, ilbooyeey goobe jiifa, sare a hanjaawte, weyti bolkha.”
40008007	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “A amiite samaacha?”
40008008	Etaas koobbintoo iskareet itoollo la wihi us Yeesso ilaabe, “Kamur, at minkeeyki at tamiit ma mu'dane i'daasenyi intaas on ka sooyeed, ilbooyeey la a samaataa.
40008009	I'di tahe ani rubeyteey laka a etoo iskarti addane ikawewween antohicho raaho, toro la iskarti addane an andi laka a jirta. Chirri an koo, ‘Kaale,’ iidah a yamiit. Chirri an koo, ‘Nyaam iro,’ iidah la a irta. Chirri an ilbooyeey, ‘Waha yeel,’ iidah la a yeela.”
40008010	Chirri Yeesso waha daage ka weyti girmeeste, wihi us ururi sooraaho iyidah, “Rume atin icheeka, an injire yaafohi Issiraayel goyaka, eti geedda weyti Waakh kakhuufo ma 'helin.
40008011	Wihi an atin iadeeh, maanti harrata 'dubiche yitah, 'doo'di ittaawe beri ichoow bahaye kayamiite, Aburaaham ichoow Isakh ichoow Yaakoobo khabaani meelassicho khaattaane, dakhi goobi Waakh ka sukuuku isleegelaan.
40008012	I'daasenyi 'doo'di yaafohi Issiraayelenye kootte dakhaas miinsanyahe Waakh icho khar ka mug'di goya iseya. Intaas ka la a ooyaane bolokh ka ilko iskarobaan.”
40008013	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us etaas koobbintoo iskareet itoollo iyidah, “Nyaam goob iro. Saggi Waakh ilbooyaah isamaacho a rummeysatte gone, Waakh usu a samaacha.” Ilbooyi etaas iskareete ween la chirraas on samaate.
40008014	Chirri Yeesso min Beetero gele ka, seyyoh Beetero ichehi sare kululaatti siriir kajiifto arge.
40008015	Yeesso la dahan sookhabte, lakabukkhe iche la sookahte, usu goollisse.
40008016	Chirri il gelebnowe ka, 'doo'di ittaawenye ginnayyo dakhtaan usu liikeene, ulla yeedi afoot on ka ginnayyo kabahche, toro la 'doo'di khakkhannan tuumman samaache.
40008017	Ulla wahaas a yeele 'dee wihi eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Isaaya layadeeh ka lacheeke, labuuhicha. “Usu rubeytiis khannaatteteen a inno kabahche, sugeerreteen laka inno kakhaate.”
40008018	Chirri Yeesso ururi khaariche arge ka abattitiis amur ibahche, beyti Gaalilaaya aficheki 'diri a imaaheen.
40008019	'Deerka etoo tagaanki amurree yimiyye, wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Eti Weenoow, meelbaaw at iratti ka, an a kiraaha.”
40008020	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Dowwohoyyo lumame khabaane, chimbirohi saraat la minchimbiroote khabaan. I'daasenyi Ínam Aadam inti us matah gesso laka ma khabo.”
40008021	Etoo addane abattee wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Kamur, alley koloo a irdi aabbaheey a laabo.”
40008022	I'daasenyi Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “Isooraah. 'Doo'di tuume lamaa'do a hili 'doo'di tuume.”
40008023	Yeesso 'deerka koobanhoo kadihe, abattitiis la raahte.
40008024	Koloo kalday on hafaroo buure yimiyye bey gu'dde, bicche irtoo uskul bahcheene, kooban goya isootabeen. I'daasenyi Yeesso a ur'da.
40008025	Abatti Yeesso iiratte, kihisse wihi iche itidah, “Kamur, inno rib, bicche a inno khaataanee.”
40008026	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Eenna i'daaru marah on ikakhuuftaane, a i'doh i'duu ibur'dowteen?” 'Deerka kahe, hafar ichoow ir ba leejaakhe, chirraakka beye rukkuy goosse.
40008027	Abatti girmeysatte, wihi iche worsatte, “Icho eta a ayyo, hafar ichoow ire laka yeediis daagaan?”
40008028	Chirri us bey aficheki 'diri imaahe, us ili 'doo'di Gadaara eleele ka, reeroo lammeenye ginnayyo dakhtaan go'ddassi enenyet lakahawwaalo kasoobahe usu 'heleen. Icho weyti enenyet sina igoocheene, 'deerka et jitaas tabo mele.
40008029	Chirraas on riireene, “Weeli Waakh, at mehe nah ka'doonta? Geeddi ibeenki Waakh nah ichiire iitaahan on tamiite bolokh nah tussa?” yidaaheen.
40008030	Woyhoo buurenye golcha la intaas hagga yaakha.
40008031	Ginnayyo la Yeesso hawwaasteene, “Chirri at nah bihisso, woyha golcha goya nah i'dii,” iyidaaheen.
40008032	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Nyaama irda!” Ginnayyo 'deerka baheene, golcha goya itabeen. Woyhi golcha kootte bur tahariis yaakho, bey goya itabe, woy tuummamba bicche khaateen.
40008033	'Doo'di golcha yaakhicho orye ilkerengeet irte, waha tuumman ichoow wihi 'doo'di ginnayyo dakhtaan kayitah cheeke.
40008034	'Doo'd tuumman 'deerka ilkerengeet kabahe Yeesso iirte. Chirri icho Yeesso argeen ka usu hawwaasteene ilicho a katabo.
40009001	Yeesso koobanhoo kore, beyti Gaalilaaya maahe nokhte ilkerengeetti us fiddiyo irte.
40009002	'Doo'doo etoo khannane sar tuumman hanjaawte ilaal kasoosi'de, ikeene. Chirri Yeesso saggi 'doo'daas usu ikakhuufo arge ka, wihi us etaas sare hanjaawte iyidah, “Inankaaw, abur'dowin! Uskeelaah a liikaakutee!”
40009003	Tagaammetoo amurre uus iche waha daagte ka wihi icho uurassicho ka esseen, “Eta a gafe.”
40009004	Yeesso malassicho garte, wihi us worsate, “Mehede mala suuje uurassiin ka idowattaan?
40009005	Mehe maanta ki addan ka'dabakhe, chirri an, ‘Uskeelaah a liikaakute,’ iadeeh a ommos an, ‘Kahe soho’ iadeeh?
40009006	I'daasenyi saggi Ínam Aadam antohi us harrata ka enenyet uskeel ikakuto ikhabo a abattaan.” 'Deerka wihi us eti sare hanjaawte iyidah, “Tolosso ilaalaah okkhiche, goob iro!”
40009007	Et la tolossate, goob irte.
40009008	Urur uus waha arge weyti roorro gesse, Waakkhi enenyet antohaas geeddee siiche koolicheen.
40009009	Yeesso intaas ka orey isohtaayi, etoo Mattaayo layadeeh usuhi meessi kooddi lakagoocho goya fiddiyo arge. Yeesso la, “Isooraahe abattiteey ateeh,” iyidahye, Mattaayo la kahe usu raahe.
40009010	Yeesso min Mattaayo kagolossataayi, 'doo'doo kooddi goocho ittaawe ichoow 'doo'doo 'doo'di uskeel leh liiekkaacho ittaawe yimiyye Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba leegolossate.
40009011	Farissaayo chirri iche waha agarte ka, wihi iche abattitiis worsatte, “Eti atin iween a i'doh 'doo'di kooddi goocho ichoow ki uskeel leh ileegolossata?”
40009012	Yeesso la wihi icho essaan daage, wihi us ilaabe, “'Doo'di ilkitárri yowti ki feffeyyan menye a ki khakkhannan.
40009013	I'daasenyi taba wihi yeeda essi wihiis abda, ‘An soorriyoti at ibihisso menye, atihi 'doo'di addan uur inugleysatti iche 'doona.’ A mehe 'doo'di an iimiyye an waho, ki 'doo'di fiffissan isiekkaacho menye, i'daasenyi a ki uskeel leh.”
40009014	'Deerka abatti Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo Yeesso itimiyye wihi iche worsatte, “A i'dohe nah ichoow Farissaayo af ihidanna, i'daasenyi abattitaah af ihidan?”
40009015	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Doo'di mindischo yimiy ma ooyo geeddi eti min disti intaas kijiro menya? Maane a tamiit ti 'doo'd eti min disti lakakhaato, 'deerka 'doo'd af hiiti.”
40009016	Yeesso la yeed orey iwoye wihi us yidah, “Et goonankoo dafareete husub gaaddiisti raagane kharradde kadaddabo mele. A mehe goonankaas husub a isinyaama kharradiche la orey isohta.
40009017	Ommolla et farsoti sabiibe husub, urgohi uktoote raagan kachibo mele. Chi'icho i'da yeeleen, urgo a dowaane, farso khubatta, urgo laka lawaaya. I'daasenyi farsoti sabiibe husub urgohi uktoote husub on lakachiba. I'daas ka farso ma khubatti, urgo laka ma dowaan.”
40009018	Yeesso urur leeyyeedaayi, etoo minki weysiite Ya'huud iween yimiyye, ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dde wahte wihi us yidah, “Inanteey toolla dow on bujje, i'daasenyi kaale dahantaah ka'daare, 'dee jiro a 'hesso.”
40009019	Yeesso tolossate, abattitiis khabaayi makhaabal raahe.
40009020	Chirraas on makhaabassoo khannane geeddi gu'h tomon ichoow lamma ba diigte Yeesso 'dubiis leetimiyye, laddi kabuu'diis 'daarte.
40009021	Uuriche goyaka mehe tidah ya, “Chirri an kabuu'diis on 'daare, a samaada.”
40009022	Yeesso la urgiye makhaabál arge, wihi us iyidah, “Inantaay, abur'dowin! Kakhuufnaanki at ikakhuufte a kisamaache.” Makhaabale chirraas on samaatte.
40009023	Chirri Yeesso minki eti minki weysiit iween gele ka, 'doo'di indulle afuufo ichoow ururi kowdooti ba arge.
40009024	Wihi us iyidah, “Khar ibaha, iname ma umaatane, i'daasenyi a u'durta.” Icho tuumman la usu kareyteen.
40009025	Chirri urur bahe ka, Yeesso minki iname jiifto gele, inám dahan sookhabte, iche la sookahte.
40009026	Wahaas us yeele ilaas tuumman ka taa'heen.
40009027	Chirra Yeesso intaas kabaho ka, et lamma indo laa usu raahte. Lammache ba riirte, “Ínam Dawuud, uur nah isoonugleyso,” tidah.
40009028	Chirri Yeesso minki us fiddiyo gele ka, reeri kootte lammeenye indo laa laka min leegele. Yeesso chirraakka wihi us worsate, “Atin anihi atin samaacho a rummeysattaan?” Iche la wihi iche ilaabte, “Aa Kamur.”
40009029	Yeesso 'deerka indohicho 'daare, “Saggi an atin isamaacho a kakhuufteen gone, a atin samaacha,” iyidah.
40009030	Chirraas on indo bahcheen. Yeesso icho weyti tootooche wihi us iyidah, “Etoo kalday laka uus waha aban!”
40009031	I'daasenyi iche la iratte, wor Yeesso ilaas tuumman ka cheekte.
40009032	Chirra reeri kootte lammee baho ka, 'doo'doo etoo ginna dakhatti yeyyeedin iubaa'dan Yeesso ikeene.
40009033	Chirri Yeesso et ginna kabahche ka, eti kootte yeyyeedin iubaa'dan yeyyeede, 'doo'd la weyti girmeeste, “Nah injire wihi i'dee ili Issiraayel goyaka ma argin,” yidah.
40009034	I'daasenyi Farissaayo wihi iche tidah, “Miigti karnati ginnayyoote enenyet ginna kabahcha.”
40009035	Yeesso ilkerengeeto ichoow goobab tuumman goya tabe minassichoki weysiite Ya'huud ka 'doo'd wori Waakh abche. Wori Haaggane dakhi Waakh miinsan icheeke, sugeerre ichoow khannaatte tuumman 'doo'd kabahche.
40009036	Chirri us urur arge ka, weyti uur inugleeste, a mehe i'di iiyti ersim ikhabin u, a wa'dwaa'daane, toro la et gargaaro mele.
40009037	'Deerka wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Gurnaan a buure, i'daasenyi 'doo'di hil haaggicho a koo rucchul.
40009038	Maantaka Kamuri gurnaan leh daaha, 'dee 'doo'di ittaawenye gurnaan soogoocho a sooergo.”
40010001	Yeesso abattitiisti tomon ichoow lammee isiwahe, antohi icho ginnayyo enenyet goya kabahchaan ichoow ti icho sugeerre ichoow khannaatteti fil ittaawe tuumman kasamaachaan siiche.
40010002	Ergaanoti tomon ichoow lammee magahenyeticho talla, ki oraat a Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh ichoow walaaliiski Andereeya layadeeh, Yaakoobohi inam Sebedaayee ichoow walaaliiski Yoohana layadeeh,
40010003	Fiilif, Bar'dolomaayo, Toomas, Mattaayohi kooddi goocho, inam Alfaayo ki Yaakoobo layadeeh, 'Da'daayo,
40010004	Siimonhi magahiis Yaaftiis'doone layadeeh ichoow Yuuda Iskaariyoot, ki yomboka Yeessó 'dub gooche.
40010005	Yeesso reera tomon ichoow lammee ili kharaat ierge, wihi us leefarme la a mehe ya, “Ili 'doo'di yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan iiranna ommos ilkerengeettoo kaldaye Saamariya laka agelina.
40010006	Nyaama 'doo'di Issiraayele i'di iiyti baabaatee iirda.
40010007	Geedda atin 'dussaan la wora cheeka, wihi atin tadeehiin la, ‘Dakhi goobi Waakh kola a soodowwaate.’
40010008	'Doo'di khakkhannan samaacha, ki tuume omoot kasookahcha, ki bu'da sar kakhabo samaacha, ki ginnayyo dakhtaan la, ginnayyo kabahcha. An miigta i'daanu atin siiche, taba waha yeela 'doo'd la walah akagutanna.
40010009	Wihi chilimenye 'dahabe ommos lahaageete ommos birtoo addane akhaatanna,
40010010	ommos urgo akhaatanna. Ubbaari deere atin sar kakhabtaan on menye, koo addan akhaatanna. Kobohoo addan akhaatanna. Wul laka akhaatanna. A mehe eti hil haaggicho golol a wihi usu mu'dan.
40010011	“Ilkerengeetbaaw atin geesseen ommos goobbaaw atin gesseen ka, etoo lakakhuufo yowda, minkiissa on fiddiya ichoowka intaas kabaha.
40010012	Chirra atin min gessaan, ‘Waakh ba nebey atin kakaala,’ idaha.
40010013	Minki atin gesseene atin martiiste, weysihaas ikataba, minki atin imartiisan la, Waakh nebey ma kakaalo.
40010014	Chirri etoo atin imartiisanne, ommos yeediin idagansan, cha'atin goobaas ommos ilkerengeettaas kabahtaan, ebeeri luhlo atin fuulo sahda, saggi Waakh icho ihukkumo tusa.
40010015	Rume atin icheeka, ibeenki Waakh 'doo'd hukkumo, sinati Waakh 'doo'di ilkerengeetti Soodom yiil ichoow ki ilkerengeetti Goomorah yiil tuse iche deefta sinati Waakh ilkerengeettaas tuso ka.
40010016	“An i'di iiyti yaay goya liifahe iche atin ierga. Maantaka i'di toof u yuubsada, toro la i'di kutukuurrug u i'di 'doo'di eloo rucchul laka ikhabin ateeha.
40010017	'Doo'da yuubsada, jaldaabohi Ya'huude atin igeechaane, minassichoki weysiit ka atin jahaan.
40010018	Jeenteteey u gaafanayyo ichoow karnato atin liigeecha, atin la garti Wori Haaggan icho ichoow yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan itateehiin.
40010019	I'daasenyi chirri icho atin khabteen, wihi atin tadeehiin ommos saggi atin itadeehiin akawa'dwaa'dina. Chirraas wihi atin tadeehiin a atin lasiicha.
40010020	A mehe atin mee yeyyeeddaan, i'daasenyi Rubeyti Waakkhi Aabbahiinenye goytiin kasooyyeedda.
40010021	“Etoo walaaliissa 'dub goocha, dahanohi nahab gessa 'dee layagiis. Ooyo laka weeliis i'daas yeela. Nyaakhut 'doo'di dele yeedicho 'dii'da, dahanohi 'doo'doo addan gessaane 'dee layagiis.
40010022	Enenyet tuumman a atin 'dii'da jeenteti atin abattiteey itahiin u. I'daasenyi, eti garrahsate ichoowka sinata 'dubiche eleele a lariba.
40010023	Chirri ilkerengeettoo ka sina atin loomhicho, ilkerengeettoo addan ifirda. Rume atin icheeka, geeddi atin hiliin ilkerengeetohi ili Issiraayel tuumman ka imassin, iche Ínam Aadam soonokhta.”
40010024	Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Iyookkoka, abatti etiiski walah abcho ma kaweene, ilbooy la kamuriis ma kaween.
40010025	Abatti etiiski walah abcho ibaha, ilbooy la kamuriissa ibaha. Chirri ooyohi min leh ba, Beelsebuul lakawaho, 'doo'di minkiis la geeddoo meheenye magahenyeti 'da'ddaran kawahaan?
40010026	“'Deerka 'doo'di atin tirrimo akaroorina. Walah oboobsane liisoonyiikhin mala, ommos walah dagsane enenyet liiabin mala.
40010027	Wihi an mug'di ka atin iadeeh, maalim cheeka, wihi nabah ka atin liicheeke atin daagteen minan sarcho ka cheeka.
40010028	'Doo'di sar on yagiise i'daasenyi rubey i'doo iidaahan akaroorina. Waakkhi sar ichoow rubey ba baabiicho, meessi 'dabi armaanjireen kalug'do karoora.
40010029	Chimbir lamma chilimmetoo rucchul ma lagato? I'daasenyi chimbirtoo kaldaye Aabbahaah igaranne tamuut ma jirto.
40010030	At laka, tinti matah kaajirto tuumman Waakh geeddi iche tahe a garta.
40010031	'Deerka roorro akhabina, atin Waakh ortiis ka chimbirohi ittaawe a kakhummantahiinee.
40010032	“Eti tuummane 'doo'd ortiis ka saggi us keey iyahe cheeko, ani laka usu Aabbaheeyki goobi Waakh kijiro ortiis ka saggi us keey iyahe a cheeka.
40010033	I'daasenyi eti tuummane enenyet ortiis ka saggi us keey iyahe 'dii'do, an laka usu Aabbaheeyki goobi Waakh kijiro ortiis ka a 'dii'da.
40010034	“Kol an harra imiyye an nebey keene akoogeynana. An nebey ma keenine, i'daasenyi seleyhi an birlab ka atin fido iimiy.
40010035	A mehe an a imiyye, “ínam ichoow ooyo ba isichiiyoocha, inám ichoow abarche ba isichiiyoocha, inám ichoow seyyohtiche ba isichiiyoocha.
40010036	Toro la eti uuraahe on chiiy kiyateeh.
40010037	“Eti tuummane ooyohiis ichoow abartiis 'diriheey 'doono, abattiteey ma imaline, toro la eti tuummane yeeletiis ommos albehiis 'diriheey 'doono, abattiteey ma imalin.
40010038	Eti tuummane massalaabatiis ikhaatine sina iumhane ani isooraahin, abattiteey ma imalin.
40010039	Eti tuummane jirotiis khuccho jiroti rummaat a waaya. Eti tuummane harrata ka jirotiis ani iwaayo la, jiroti rummaat a 'hela.
40010040	“Eti tuummane atin khaatti, ani ikhaatta. Eti ani ikhaatti la, Waakkhi ani isooerge iche khaatta.
40010041	Eti tuummane eti Waákh íyeyyeedo jeenteeti us eti Waákh íyeyyeedo iyahuu martiiste, Waakh kala'ddi us eti Waákh íyeyyeedo guto, iche etaas addan laka guta. Toro la, eti etoo fissan jeenteti us ifissanyahuu martiiste, Waakh kala'ddi us etaas fissan guto, iche etaas addan laka guta.
40010042	Chi' etoo kooboo biccheete khobee laka 'doo'daar kichokoo siiche jeenteti us abattiteey iyahuu, rume atin icheeka, etaas koloo kalday laka kala'ddiis ma waayo.”
40011001	Inkoo Yeesso abattiisti tomon ichoow lammee wihi iche yeesso icheeke ka, intaas katabe, ilkerengeetohi addan irte enenyet wori Waakh abche, toro la Yeedi Waakh icheeke.
40011002	Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo jeela kajiraayi, wihi Kiriisto yeelo daage, abattiistoo Yeesso iergate.
40011003	Wihi icho Yeesso sooworsateen, “At a Ki Lasubhe lasugo bal etoo addane sugna?”
40011004	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Nyaama nokhda Yoohana waha atin daagtaan ichoow waha atin agartaan icheeka.
40011005	'Doo'di indo laa kola indo a bahcha, ki luhlo ikhabin luhlo a bahcha. 'Doo'di bu'dayyo sar kakhabe a lasamaacha, ki dogo laa la dogo a bahcha. 'Doo'di tuume la omoot a lakasookahcha. 'Doo'di wahanyeyyohi Waakh miinsan ka miskiine la Wori Haaggan a liicheeka.
40011006	Eti Waakh imaalo a ki jeenteteey u kakhuufnaanki us ikakhuufo i'diin.”
40011007	Chirra abatti Yoohana nokhatti ka, Yeesso Yoohana woriis urur kaleeyyeede wihi us yidah, “Bal wihi atin hidaad ka iratteene sooagarteen kamalda. Etoo 'dabakhenye i'di hoosi hafar sesseehicho mee iratteene agarteen.
40011008	Bal wihi atin iratteene sooagarteen kamalda. A etoo gaaddi haaggan khabo? Mele! 'Doo'di gaaddi weyti hahhaaggan khabo a 'doo'di minassi karnatoot fiddiyo.
40011009	'Deerka mehe iratteene agarteen? Eti Waákh íyeyyeedo agarteen? Aa, rumanka eti atin agarteen, eti Waákh íyeyyeedo laka a kussanyahe.
40011010	Eti woriis lachiire a kan. “ ‘Yeya, ergattiteey ortaahha erga, iche rubeyohi enenyete tannabissa.’ ”
40011011	Rume atin icheeka, weeli enenyet goyaka, eti Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo kaween ma jiro. I'daasenyi eti dakhi goobi Waakh ka 'daran laka, us Yoohana a kaweenyahe.
40011012	Uus ibeenneti Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo jire kasookhabatti ichoowka toolla, dakhi goobi Waakh sina a kawaarte. 'Doo'di sussuuje la usuhi goobi Waakh khabti marma.
40011013	I'di tahe Chiirnaanneti 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo ichoow ti Amurre ba, wori dakhi goobi Waakhe kaayyeedeene ichoowka Yoohana yimiy.
40011014	Chirri atin wihi icho yidaaheen khaatattaan la, Yoohana a Eliiyahi dowwanoha yamiit.
40011015	Eti dogo khabo a daago gi'de!
40011016	“Kamalda bal, 'doo'di wey'da mehe iokkanaacho? Icho a i'di nyaakhuti sokkoyyo goyaka nyaakhutoo addan kariiro,
40011017	“ ‘Nah a gurroonne, atin la gurro ma nah leeokkhin. Nah geeyi maanti enenyet buje ladowo atin isoodowne, atin la ma ooyin,’ isidowo.
40011018	A mehe maanti Yoohana yimiy, us afe hiite toro la farsotoo rucchule sabiib laka ma ubhaabane, 'doo'd la toro mehe yidah ya, ‘Usu alah ginna dakhatta.’
40011019	Ínam Aadam a yimiyye, golossate, farsoti sabiib laka dame icho la mehe essaan ya, ‘'Damaanki toro meleefeenye 'doo'di kooddi goocho ichoow ki uskeel leh aal kabahsati kalla.’ I'daasenyi kharati Waakh runtiche wihi iche yeesso lakaarga.”
40011020	'Doo'di ilkerengeetohi us wihi weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan buurche kayeele uskeelicho ma kasoonokhan. 'Deerka Yeesso icho uskeel kacheekan sookhabte.
40011021	“Atinhi ilkerengeetti Choorasin taalliin sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! Atinhi ilkerengeetti Bessaayda taalliin sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! I'di tahe chirri wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane goytiin ka layeele goorat ilkerengeetti Tiiro ichoow ti Siidon ka layeele, 'doo'daas arraagane uskeelicho kasoonokhte, 'deerka inga'daa'diyyo gessate, bombey kadowte.
40011022	I'daasenyi wihi an atin icheeko, ibeenki Waakh 'doo'd hukkumo, sinati Waakh 'doo'di ilkerengeetti Tiiro yiil ichoow 'doo'di ilkerengeetti Siidon yiil tuse iche deefta sinati Waakh atin tuso ka.
40011023	Atinhi ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hum taalliin la kol serey atin liiokkhicho koogtahiin? Mele, meessi 'doo'di tuume kijiro iche ikhubattaan. Chirri wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane an goytiin ka yeele ilkerengeetohi Soodom lakayeele, ilkerengeettaas kootte uliba laka a jirta on.
40011024	I'daasenyi wihi an atin icheeko, ibeenki Waakh 'doo'd hukkumo, sinati Waakh 'doo'di ilkerengeetti Soodom yiil tuse iche deefta sinati Waakh atin tuso ka.”
40011025	Yeesso chirraakka weeste wihi us yidah, “Aabbahaaw, Kamuri serey ichoow harra ba iween, a kikoolicha. I'di tahe at wahanyeyyoha 'doo'di kharayyeenye toro la weyti soome a kadagisse, 'doo'di i'di nyaakhutenye wohoo igaran la tusse.
40011026	Aa! Aabbahaaw wihi kaahamaadicho gon wahaase.”
40011027	Yeesso toro wihi us 'doo'd iyidah, “Aabbaheey walah dakkhan dahantaaya soogesse. Aabbahaaya on menye et Weeliis garti mele. Toro la Weeliis ichoow 'doo'di Weeliis ibabbakkaahin 'doono on menye, et rumanka eti Aabbaheey yahe garti mele.
40011028	Kaaleya ani iamiita, atinhi tuummane geeddi atin huleesi nool si'ddaan on kuranteen. An a atin naschaa.
40011029	Kaaleya, hil ileesoogela, walah ikaabda. I'di tahe ani uureey ka a etoo samacchaarenye, toro isnuglaacho, ani la a atin naschaa.
40011030	I'di tahe hili an atin korcho a 'dabakhe, huleeseey la a 'dabakh.”
40012001	Maantoo Seeri Lanaso ka, Yeesso abattitiis khabaayi, gosase goya raaha. Abattitiis la a ankaaate, ilmohoo 'dargaayye guratte, tuhum.
40012002	Farissaayo uus iche waha agarte ka, wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Yey! Wihi abattitaah Seeri Lanaso ka yeesso ichoow amurre ma israahaan!”
40012003	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Atin wihi Dawuud yeele maanti usu ichoow 'doo'di us khabe ba raarahteen Yeedi Waakh ka ma soomin a?
40012004	Dawuud uranti minki Waakhe gele, usu ichoow 'doo'di leejire makaateti Waakh liibahche yumheen. Amurreti laraaho ka kuhaaniyyo kaldaye makaatetaas yahame, icho ma kakhabaan.
40012005	Atin injire Amurre ka saggi kuhaaniyyo chi'icho minki Waakhe buure ka Seeri Lanaso hil haaggichaan, seera ibi'dirroochaane, i'daasenyi icho uskeel iyeelin ma soomin a?
40012006	Wihi an atin icheeko, etoo inta kajiro, minki Waakhe buure laka a kussanyahe.
40012007	Chiirnaanneti Yeedi Waakh wahane kachiiran, ‘An soorriyoti at ibihisso menye, atihi 'doo'di addan uur inugleysatti iche 'doona.’ Chirri atin rumanka wihi yeeda essi garatteen, 'doo'di uskeel iyeelin, uskeel ma igoossaan.
40012008	A mehe Ínam Aadam, a Kamuri Seeri Lanaso.”
40012009	Yeesso intaas katabe, minkichoki weysiite Ya'huud gele.
40012010	Etoo dahane hanjaawte la intaas a kijire. Farissaayotoo la intaas goya kijirta, wohoo icho Yeesso kacheektaane yowtaane, 'deerka wihi icho Yeesso worsateen, “Amurre ichoow eti Seeri Lanaso ka lasamaacho a israahaan?”
40012011	Ulla wihi us icho iyidah, “Chirri etiinkoo naffoo iiyyaat khabo, naf la Seeri Lanaso ka ankhar kadihe ma sookhabatti ma soobihisso?
40012012	Weeli enenyet geeddoo meheenye naffi iiyyaat kussanyahe? Maantaka wihi haaggane Seeri Lanaso ka layeelo ichoow amurreteen a israahaan.”
40012013	'Deerka wihi us et iyidah, “Dahantaah fiti.” Et dahan ficche, dahane toro tuum haagsatte, i'di ti addan titah.
40012014	I'daasenyi Farissaayo bahte, tossatte, jiti icho Yeesso kayagiisiin kamasseen.
40012015	Yeesso saggi Farissaayo ogoos iyowatti garta, intaas katabe. Ururoo buure la raahe, Yeesso la 'doo'dichoki khakkhannan tuumman samaache.
40012016	Ulla 'doo'd tootooche, uus icho eti us yahe cheekin.
40012017	Ulla wahaas a yeele 'dee wihi eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Isaaya layadeeh ka lacheeke labuuhicha.
40012018	“Falfateeyti an soobahsade talla. A eti an weyti 'doono, toro la an kahamaado. Anihi Waakhe la Rubeyti Munyee rubeytiis goya a buuhicha, ulla saggi us yaafo jiti fissan ka ihukkumo icheeka.
40012019	Us ma jaakho ommos ma rirriiro, et jitat ka hooyiis daago mele.
40012020	Us koloo kalday laka balakki khollokhte ma jebcho, toro la 'dabi taahi uum bahcho ma jiccho. I'daas ka eti 'dabakhenye 'daran jiti samacchaarenye kawoya, ma 'diicho ichoowka ebba saggi jiti fissan ka liihukkumo iyeela.
40012021	Magahiis ka yaafo tuumman khajjeel a khabaan.”
40012022	Saahka 'doo'doo etoo ginna dakhatti indo laaye af laa Yeesso ikeene. Yeesso la et samaache, 'dee et a yeyyeedo toro il a argo.
40012023	Enenyet tuumman girmeeste wihi us yidah, “Eta sarka a weel Dawuud a?”
40012024	I'daasenyi Farissaayo chirri iche wahaas daagte ka, wihi iche tidah, “Miigti Beelsebuulhi karnati ginnayyoote kaldach on eta enenyet ginna kabahcha.”
40012025	Yeesso wihi icho kamassaan garte, wihi us icho iyidah, “Yaafti tuummane seley goote isdihto a baabaata. Toro la ilkerengeet ommos minki seley gowe isdiho geed us fiddiyo mele.
40012026	Chirri Seytaan on Seytaan bahcho, us seley a goggowe. Dakhiis saggoh orey ikasohta?
40012027	Chirri an miig Beelsebuul ka ginnayyo enenyet kabahcho la, 'doo'diin miig eyya ginnayyo kabahcha? Icho 'deerka atin hukkuma.
40012028	I'daasenyi chirri an Rubeyti Waakh ka ginnayyo bahcho, waha saggi dakhi goobi Waakh goytiin iyimiyye tusaan.”
40012029	“Ommos etoo saggoh minki etoo miige igela, meehiis ihata sammata us koloo etaas miige ihidhidin? 'Deerka minkiis gela hata.
40012030	“Eti tuummane ani ileejirin, a itirrima. Eti igargaarine walah ileesooholin a ileefida.
40012031	Toollaka wihi an atin icheeko, uskeel tuumman ichoow gaf tuumman a geeddi enenyet liikakuto. I'daasenyi eti Rubeyti Munyee igafe, uskeeliis ma liikakuto.
40012032	Eti Ínam Aadam igafe a geeddi uskeeliis liikakuto. I'daasenyi eti Rubeyti Munyee igafe, uskeeliis harrata ka ichoow harrati soosohatti ka ma liikakuto.
40012033	“Geey haaggiche ulla gurnaanki haaggane delaa, ommos geey suujaache 'dee gurnaanki suuje a delo. A mehe geey ba gurnaanki us delo lakaabta.
40012034	Dessi toof! Saggoh wihi haaggan itadeehiin chirri atin uskeel kajirtaan? I'di tahe wihi uuraah goya buuho iche afaah leeyamiit.
40012035	Eti haaggan uuriis laka a haagganyahe gone, haaggaas on dela. Eti suuje la uuriis a suuj gone suujoonkaas on dela.”
40012036	“I'daasenyi wihi an atin icheeko, ibeenki Waakh 'doo'd hukkumo, enenyet yeedi indigir laaye aficho kasoobahe iche cheekta.
40012037	A mehe yeedi afaah ka a lakifura, toro yeedi afaahha uskeel liikaagoocha.”
40012038	Farissaayotoo ichoow tagaammeti amurre wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Eti ween, atihi wohoo miigti Waakh tuso nah tusso 'doonna.”
40012039	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Doo'di i'deenye uskeel lehe waakkhassi addan wahti on wohoo miigti Waakh tuso daaha. I'daasenyi wihi goorat Waakh eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Yoona layadeeh ka enenyet tuse on menye, walah addane lasiicho mele.
40012040	A mehe Yoona maan seyyah ibeenkiche khabto uuri bahaggoo buurenye goya kajire. Ínam Aadam laka saggaase maan seyyah hawwaal ikabarya.
40012041	Ibeenki Waakh 'doo'd hukkumo, 'doo'di ili Ninaawi a tolossata 'doo'di i'dee cheekta. I'di tahe icho maanti Yoona Yeedi Waakh icheeke, uskeelicho a kasoonokhteene, toro la etoo Yoona kaween kalla atin leejira.
40012042	Ibeenki Waakh 'doo'd hukkumo la makhaabassi karnatenye ili Cheeba a kahta 'doo'di i'dee uskeel igoossa. A mehe iche goorat harra gin'dohicheeda katimiyye kharati karnati Soolomon layadeeh khabe dagansatte, toolla la etoo Soolomon laka kaween kallaay.
40012043	“Maanti ginna etoo goya kabahte, ginnata a iratta, ili daarenye bicche laa dah kagoossa. Fur yowatta, i'daasenyi fur ma 'hesso.
40012044	'Deerka wihi iche tadeeh, ‘Fureeyki an kasootabe inokhda.’ Maanti iche tamiit, furi marahe, harane lamujjummooche 'hessa.
40012045	Ginnataas 'deerka iratta, ginna teeba addane iche laka kasuuje sookhaatatta etaas goya gelaane, fur yeessaan. Etaas la jirotiis, ti goorat oraat a ka'darsatta. 'Doo'da i'deenye uskeel leh i'da on itateeh.”
40012046	Yeesso urur leeyyeedaayi, abartiis ichoow walaalinyetiis ba usu leeyeedin 'doonaane, khar tolossateen.
40012047	Etoo wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Abartaah ichoow walaalinyetaah khare toollaane, ati kileeyeedin 'doonaan.”
40012048	Wihi us ilaabe, “Kamalda bal, abarteey ichoow walaalinyeteey a ayyo illeh?”
40012049	Yeesso abattitiis dahan iooge, wihi us yidah “Abarteey ichoow walaalinyeteey kallaayo.
40012050	A mehe eti tuummane wihi Aabbaheeyki serey jiro 'doono yeelo, a walaalaaya, a walaassaaya, a abartaaya.”
40013001	Maalinkaas goya, Yeesso minki us kajire kabahe, irte beyti Gaalilaaya afiche orronte.
40013002	Ururi Yeesso khaariche weyti buuraate, 'deerka koobanhoo kore goya koorronte, enenyet la bey afiche tolossate dagansate.
40013003	Ulla mammaho ka wihi buure abche, wihi us yidah, “Etoo gos khabo, a irte ilmo harra kachibaa.
40013004	Ilmoha us taa'hicho gaasoo jit goya kadiheene, chimbiro la yimaateene, yumheen.
40013005	Gaasoo la ilassi ng'aajjeenye harrati rucchul khabto kadiheen. Wahaas dowwa on soobaheen, a mehe harra rucchulee.
40013006	I'daasenyi chi' orrahe soobahte ka, orrahe geeyohaas soobahe gubte. Hiiyyaye laa yihiin gone angageen.
40013007	Gaasoo laka inti geeyohi rurrucchule kudah khabo kadiheen. Geeyohaas la geeyohi soobahe afcheen.
40013008	Gaasoo la inti harrati haaggan khabto kadiheene, gurnaan deleen. Gaasoo kol kudoo deleene, gaasoo kol tomon lih deleene, gaasoo la kol tomon seyyah deleen.
40013009	Eti dogo khabo a daago gi'de!”
40013010	Abatti Yeesso itimiyye, wihi iche usu worsatte, “At a i'doh chirri at 'doo'd walah abisso mammaho ikaayyeedda?”
40013011	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Waakh garanti wihi dagsane dakhi goobi Waakh miinsan lagarti a atin siiche. I'daasenyi 'doo'di addan i'daas mee.
40013012	Eti tuummane wihi dahan lagesse mujjum woywoye a liikakhaya ichoowka wihi us khabo buuraataan. I'daasenyi eti wihi dahan lagesse mujjum iwoywoyin, wihi us khabo laka a lakakhaata.
40013013	Jeentetane icho mammah ka walah ikacheeka. “Walah a yeyaane eheet a ma argaan, wihi an eldi a daagaane eheet a ma abtaan.
40013014	Wori eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Isaaya layadeeh cheeke icho ka a labuuhiche. “‘Atin walah a dagansattaane, dagansattaane, i'daasenyi jirtuu ma abattaan. Walah a yeytaane, yeytaane, i'daasenyi jirtuu ma atin gelaan.
40013015	A mehe 'doo'da uurassicho a ga'daale, dogohicho la a 'duu'deene, toro la indohicho laka a 'duu'deen. Chi'iche i'daas ieheynan, indohicho a geeddi icho il argaane, dogo la khabaane, uurassicho la a geeddi icho walah abtaane, a geeddi icho ani isoourgiyaane anna samaacho.’
40013016	I'daasenyi Waakh indohiin a imaale a mehe il a argaane, dogohiin la walah a daagaan.
40013017	Rume atin icheeka, 'doo'di ittaawenye Waákh íyeyyeedo ichoow 'doo'di ittaawenye Waakhe fiffissan, wihi toolla atin agartaan argin a imooneene, i'daasenyi ma argin. Wihi atin toolla daagtaan daagin a imooneene, i'daasenyi ma daagin.”
40013018	“Mammahti eti ilmo harra kachibo wihi iche miinsantahe dagansada gi'de.
40013019	Chi' etoo wori dakhi Waakh miinsan daago toro la wihiis iaban, Seytaanki uskeel leh a yamiite, woraas icho daageen uurassicho kabahcha. Waha a ilmohi jit lakachibo.
40013020	'Doo'd gaasoo a i'di ilassi ng'aajjeenye harrati rucchul khabo. Ilmohi harrata kadihe a i'di eti uus Yeedi Waakh daago hamaadi buure ka khaatti.
40013021	I'daasenyi hiiyyay us khabo mele, mujjum ma tolossati. Maanti jeenteti Yeedi Waakh u sinatoo isoobahte ommos sina loomhiche dowwa on soodiha.
40013022	'Doo'd gaasoo a i'di inti geeyohi rurrucchule kudah khabto. Ilmohi harrata kadiho a i'di eti Yeedi Waakh daago, raaho, i'daasenyi wa'dwaa'di harrata ichoow 'damaanki kamurroon ba afchaane, gurnaan icho delaan mele.
40013023	'Doo'd gaasoo a i'di inti harrati haaggan khabto. Ilmohi harrata kadiho a i'di eti Yeedi Waakh daago toro abti. Ulla gurnaan kol kudoo ommos kol tomon lih ommos kol tomon seyyah geeddi il lakachibe 'dirihiissa dela.”
40013024	Yeesso mammahtoo addan 'doo'd ibahche, wihi us iyidah, “Dakhi goobi Waakh a i'di etoo gos khabo irte gosiis 'dargaayyeti haaggan kachibe.
40013025	I'daasenyi ibeenkoo ka geeddi enenyet tuumman ur'do, chiiytaankiiskoo yimiyye ilmohi haraameet, gosaas 'dargaayye goya kachibe, katabe.
40013026	Chirri 'dargaayye soobahte gurnaan bissaate ka, haraame laka soobahte.
40013027	“Ilbooyyeti eti gos leh timiyye, wihi iche tidah, ‘Kamur, at goorat ilmohi hahhaaggan gosaah goya ma kachibina? Haraanta gos goya kasoobahte la a tohe?’
40013028	“Eti gos leh la wihi us ilaabe, ‘Chiiytaankoo i'daas yeele.’ “Ilbooyye la wihi iche worsatte, ‘A iranna haraantaas gos goya kasoobahte soobbukkhinna?’
40013029	“Ulla wihi us ilaabe, ‘Mele, chirri atin haraam soobukkhissaan a geeddi atin 'dargaayye laka leesoobukkhissaan.
40013030	Lammacho ba 'diicha a isleebaheene ichoowka ibeenki gurnaan lagoocho. Anna ibeenkaas ka 'doo'di gurnaan goocho wihi icho yeelaan a icheeka. Koloo haraam soobbukkhicha, koobbino ka iskaahhida, 'dee a lagubo. 'Dargaayye la soogoocha koondiheey kichiba.’ ”
40013031	Yeesso toro icho mammahtoo addan icheeke, “Dakhi goobi Waakh a i'di ilinti weyti rucchule, etoo khaate gosiis goyaka il gesse.
40013032	Ilinta a ilinti ilmo tuumman goyaka weyti rucchul. Eheetteey laka maanti iche soobahte, gos goyaka geeyi geeyo tuumman kabuurenye tateehe, 'dee chimbirohi saraat yamiitiine liikhimohiis kafiddiyaan.”
40013033	Yeesso toro mammahtoo addan ibahche, “Dakhi goobi Waakh a i'di booddati makaate fuurisso makhaabassoo wohoor khaatte, ingangaanoti buure kakhayte ichoowka ingangaano tuumman fuurte.”
40013034	Yeesso urur waha tuumman mammaho ikacheeke. Enenyet mammah on menye, wohoo addan walah ma kaabin.
40013035	'Deerka wihi goorat eti Waákh íyeyyeedo ka lacheeke labuuhiche. “Chirri an icho leeyeyyeedo, a imammahda, wahanyeyyohi uus an harra soouume dagsaneet icheeka.”
40013036	Yeesso 'deerka urur katabe min gele, abattitiis la itimiyye wihi iche itidah, “Wihi mammahti haraameet miinsantahe nah isoocheek.”
40013037	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Eti ilmohi haaggane 'dargaayye gos kachibe a Ínam Aadam.
40013038	Gos la harra itoolla, ilinti haaggan la 'doo'di dakhi Waakhe itolossa, haraame la a nyaakhuti ki uskeel leh.
40013039	Chiiytanki haraam gos kachibe la a Seytaan. Gurnaanki lagoocho la ibeenki yomboote tusa, 'doo'di gurnaan goocho la a herti Waakh.
40013040	“Saggaas haraam liibukkhicho 'dab ka liigubo, ibeenki yomboot laka i'daas on yateeh.
40013041	Ínam Aadam hertiis a sooerga, iche la 'doo'di tuummane enenyet uskeel kalug'do ichoow ki hugun'darri kaassohti tuumman dakhiis goya kabahchaan.
40013042	Herta Waakh la 'dab goya kalugu'dda. Intaas ka la ooyaane ilko iskarobaan.
40013043	'Deerka 'doo'di fiffissan la goob Aabbahicho goyaka i'di banayhi orraheet u a ababa. Eti dogo khabo, a daago gi'de.”
40013044	“Dakhi goobi Waakh a i'di wohoo weyti gato miigenye gos goya lakadagche. Etoo chu'us soosuune ka, toro dagche. Eta hamaad ka irte wihi us khabo tuumman ororiche gosaas gatte.
40013045	“Toro dakhi goobi Waakh a i'di daakki weyti gato miigenye eti bacchaarti yowti.
40013046	Chirri us daakkoo weyti gato miige 'hele ka irti wihi us khabo tuumman ororicho daakkaas soogatti.
40013047	“Toro dakhi goobi Waakh a i'di oroohti bahag lakakhabti bey liiseye, bahaggi fil ittaawe sookhabatti.
40013048	Chirri oroohtaas buuhsante ka 'doo'di bahag khabti bey afiche isoobahcho. 'Deerka orronti, bahaggi hahhaaggan enjelle kachibo, i'daasenyi ki sussuuje rogo.
40013049	Ibeenki yomboote Waakh enenyet tuumman hukkumo laka i'daas on tateeh. Herti Waakh a tamiite 'doo'di uskeel yeele ichoow ki fiffissan ba seley saahta.
40013050	Ki uskeel yeele 'dab goya kachibta, intaas ka la weyti ooyaane ilko iskarobaan.”
40013051	Yeesso la wihi us abattitiis worsate, “Atin waha tuumman a abatteen on a?” Icho la wihi icho ilaabeen, “Aa.”
40013052	Wihi us iyidah, “Maantaka eti tuummane tagaanki amurreenye wihi dakhi goobi Waakh miinsan laabche a i'di eti minki us walah gessati ka wihi husub ichoow wihi raagan soobahcho.”
40013053	Yeesso inkoo us mammahtaas massiche ka intaas katabe.
40013054	Chirra us ilkerengeetti goobicheenye Naasaret yimiy ka, minki weysiite Ya'huud ka enenyet Yeedi Waakh abin sookhabte, icho la girmeesteene, “Us eta kharata ichoow miigta us waha weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan kayeelo intoh ka'hele?” worsateen.
40013055	“Us eta aabbahiis eti tagaanki kho'doommee menya? Magah abartiis Maariya menya? Yaakoobo ichoow Yuussuf ichoow Siimon ichoow Yuuda la walaalinyetiis menya?
40013056	Albehi leedesse tuumman goyteen ma kijiro? Eta 'deerka waha tuumman intoh ka'hele?”
40013057	Icho la usu 'dii'deen. I'daasenyi Yeesso wihi us icho iyidah, “Eti Waákh íyeyyeedo, 'doo'di goobicho ichoow 'doo'di yaaftiise kalday on iinkaanyitin.”
40013058	Ulla jeenteti icho usu ikakhuufin u, intaas ka wihi weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan wohoo rucchul on yeele.
40014001	Saahka 'Heroodhi boroofenhi Gaalilaaya iween wihi Yeesso yeelo daage.
40014002	Ulla wihi us 'doo'diiski hil haaggicho iyidah, “Waha a Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo. Omoote kasookahe, jeentetaase miigti us wihi weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan kahaaggicho ikhaba.”
40014003	'Heroode goorat Yoohana sookhabte, jeela ka hide. Waha la a jeente 'Heroodiyati makhaabál walaaliiski Fiilif layadeeh.
40014004	A mehe Yoohana mehe 'Herood idowe ya, “Amurre ichoow khaatannaanki at iche khaatatti ma israahaan.”
40014005	'Herood Yoohana ogoos a 'doone, i'daasenyi 'doo'd karoore, jeenteti 'doo'd Yoohana eti Waákh íyeyyeedo iekkaachuu.
40014006	Maanti seeri goorat 'Herood desse soomare ka, inám 'Heroodiya 'doo'd tuumman ortiis ka 'durte, 'Herood weyti hamaadisse.
40014007	'Herood 'deerka daato ka inám 'Heroodiya walahbaaw iche daahte siin iayyiche.
40014008	Abarche la wihi iche tadeeh icheekte, “Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo matakkiis karam sookoriche inta ka isii,” itidah.
40014009	Karnat uur suujowe, i'daasenyi jeenteti wihi us idaatte ichoow jeenteti martitiis u, amur bahche 'dee wihi iche daahte a lasiicho.
40014010	'Deerka etoo iskareet ergate jeela ka Yoohana matah lasoogooche.
40014011	Matakkiis karam lasookorche inám lasiiche, iche la abarche igeesse.
40014012	Abatti Yoohana timiyye, sartiis khaatte hawwaasse. 'Deerka iratte Yeesso wihi yitah icheekte.
40014013	Inkoo Yeesso wihi yitah daage ka, koobanhoo gele, intaas katabe, intoo khaawwan irte. Chirri urur waha daage ka, ilkerengeeto kasoobahe, luhlo ka Yeesso raahe.
40014014	Chirri beyti Gaalilaaya afiche ka Yeesso kooban kasooyage ka, urura buure arge, weyti uur inugleeste, toro 'doo'dichoki khakkhannan laka samaache.
40014015	Chirri il gelebnowe ka, abattitiis itimiyye, “Il kola a ibeennowe, inta la a yibe, ururre laabe 'dee goobab a iratti gololoo a soogatteen,” itidah.
40014016	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Walah icho kanokhtaan mele. Atin rubeytiin wohoo icho yamhiin siicha!”
40014017	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Wihi nah inta ka khabno a makaate chan ichoow bahag lamma kalday on.”
40014018	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Sookhaata ikeena.”
40014019	Ulla urur amur ibahche hoos koorromiche. Makaateyyohi chane ichoow bahaggi lammee khaate, serey yeye, Waakh kala'd ilaabe, makaateyyo jejjebche. 'Deerka abatti idiibe, abatti la enenyet siisse.
40014020	Enenyet tuumman golossate, darge. Abatti la enjel tomon ichoow lamma gololi laajjebche lasoowaache buuhaan soosuunte.
40014021	Mejeli golossate tiriis, deyyeho ichoow nyaakhut la liiekkaan, a geeddi alif chan.
40014022	Yeesso chirraas on abattitiis kooban gesse, 'dee ortiis bey aficheki 'diri a iratti geeddi us urur kahcho.
40014023	Inkoo us urur kahche ka, burroo sartiis ikore Waakh wahte. Intaas keley kajiraayi, il ibeennowe.
40014024	I'daasenyi kooban bey goyaka geeddoo a sohteen, ire la kooban kolba ankoo igu'dubta. A mehe hafare icho jeychaa.
40014025	Geedda baryo kasoodowwaatte ka, Yeesso bey sarche kasohte abattitiis iirte.
40014026	Chirri abatti usuhi bey sartiis kasohti agarte ka, weyti nahte, “Wooy, waha a meleyka!” tidahye, jeenteti roorruu la, riirte.
40014027	I'daasenyi Yeesso chirraas on, “Anahina, a ani roorro akhabina!” iyidah.
40014028	Beetero la wihi us ilaabe, “Kamur, chirri rumanka ati tahe, amur ibihiche bicche sarcho a kasoosohdi, a kiimaate.”
40014029	Yeesso la, “Kaale,” iyidah. Beetero 'deerka kooban goya kasooyage, bicche sarcho kasohte, Yeesso iirte.
40014030	I'daasenyi chirri us hafari iir kahcho arge ka roorro gesse, bicche goya kadihe riire, “Kamur irib,” iyidah.
40014031	Yeesso chirraas on dahan sooge khabte, wihi us iyidah, “Ati i'daaru marah on ikakhuufta! A i'doh ikamalassa?”
40014032	Chirri icho kooban kidiheen ka, hafar tolossate.
40014033	Abattiti kooban goya kijirte la jilbo il kagu'dubte, Yeesso wahatte, “Rumanka ati Weeli Waakhe,” tidah.
40014034	Chirri icho beyti Gaalilaaya afichekuus imaaheen ka, intoo Gennaasaret layadeeh yimaateen.
40014035	Chirri 'doo'di ilaas Yeesso kase ka, farniin ilaas tuumman iergeene, 'doo'd 'doo'dichoki khakkhannan tuumman sookhaate, Yeesso ikeene.
40014036	Hawwaasteene, 'dee 'doo'di khakkhannan laddi kabuu'diis kalday laka a 'daaro. Eti tuummane 'daare la samaate.
40015001	Saahka Farissaayotoo ichoow tagaammetoo amurre ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem katimiyye, Yeesso itimiyye wihi iche worsatte,
40015002	“Abattitaah a i'doh hugumme aacchinyeteen iraahine, geeddi icho igolossan dahano idikhan?” worsatte.
40015003	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Atin la a i'doh jeenteti hugunkiin u, amurreti Waakh ijebissaan?
40015004	A mehe Waakh mehe yidah ya, ‘Aabbahaah ichoow abartaah inkaanyit,’ ichoow ‘Eti tuummane aabbahiis ommos abartiis falo, a layigaase!’
40015005	I'daasenyi mehe elattaan ya, etoo a geeddi us aabbahiis ommos abartiis, ‘Gargaari atin ikasugtaan a siinti an Waakh ibahche,’ iyadeeh one,
40015006	us gargaaraas ka aabbahiis iinkaanyitin. I'daas ka jeenteti hugunkiin u, antohi Yeedi Waakh a 'dii'ddaan.
40015007	Iskaayyeessooy! Isaaya maanti us wori Waakhe atin miinsan kaayyeede a eysiiche.
40015008	“ ‘'Doo'da af on ka ikoolicha i'daasenyi uuricho goyaka foga ileejiraan.
40015009	Immarah on iwahtaan. Hugummeti enenyet soouume i'di amurreti Waakh u enenyet abchaan.’ ”
40015010	Yeesso urur isiwahe, wihi us iyidah, “Dagansada, waha la abda.
40015011	Walah enenyet af tabo enenyet bi'dirroocho mele. I'daasenyi yeedi enenyet af leeyamiit iche enenyet bi'dirroocha.”
40015012	Abatti 'deerka itimiyye, wihi iche worsatte, “At saggi Farissaayo uus iche waha daagte ikaahollowte a garatta on a?”
40015013	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Icho a i'di geeyi Aabbaheeyki serey jiro rubeytiis il ikatoollinne, Aabbaheey bukkhicho.
40015014	Woricho 'diicha! Icho a i'di 'doo'di indo laaye, toro enenyeti indo laa angaamicho. Etoo indo laa chu'us koo indo laa angaamicho, lammache ankhar a iskaleedihta.”
40015015	Beetero la wihi us iyidah, “Mammahti kootte oraat wihiche nah isoocheek.”
40015016	Yeesso wihi us icho worsate, “Atin laka uliba walah atin gelo mele?
40015017	Ma abattaan a walahbaaw enenyet af tabo holoolo on gelaane, sar kabahaan.
40015018	I'daasenyi wahanyeyyohi enenyet af kasoobaho uure kasoobahaane, waha la enenyet a bi'dirroochaan.
40015019	A mehe enenyet uuriis goya iche mali suuje kayamiit i'di maanta ogoossi dubunuunu lagelo, mejeli makhaabassi tiis ieheynan leeur'do ichoow soho'ddarri ichoow hatto ichoow garti beenaat ichoow ham.
40015020	Wahanyeyyohane enenyet bi'dirroocha, i'daasenyi dahanohi liidikhanne lakagolossati enenyet ma bi'dirroochaan.”
40015021	Yeesso ili Gaalilaaya kakahe, ili ilkerengeetohi Tiiro ichoow Siidon isoodow irte.
40015022	Makhaabassoo Ya'huud ieheynane ilaas taal, timiyye riirte, “Kamur, Inam Dawuud, uur isoonugleyso! Inanteey ginnati dakhatti ka weyti sina taham,” itidah.
40015023	Yeesso la wohoo rucchul laka ma iidaahan. Abattitiis la itimiyye, hawwaassatte, “'Dubeenna kasoorirriirta laab,” itidah.
40015024	Wihi us makhaabál ilaabe, “Ani Waakh a isooerge 'dee 'doo'di Issiraayele i'di iiyti baabaatee kalday yowda.”
40015025	Makhaabale la timiyye ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dubte, hawwaassatte, “Kamuraaw, igargaar!” tidah.
40015026	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Gololi nyaakhute lakhaato kararre liikhubo ma haaggan.”
40015027	Iche la iitatte, “Aa, Kamuraaw! I'daasenyi kararre laka gololi eti kararre leh kasoodiddihe, a suunatta on.”
40015028	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us ilaabe, “Makhaabassa, at weyti ani ikakhuufta, nyaam, wihi at daahte a kiyeelaa.” Chirraas on inantiche samaatte.
40015029	Yeesso intaas katabe, Beyti Buurenye Gaalilaaya afiche tabe, irte burroo kore, orronte.
40015030	Ururoo buure iyimiyye, 'doo'di luhlo laa ichoow ki indo laa ichoow ki ma'dayyee ichoow ki af laa ichoow 'doo'di addane khakkhannan sookhaate Yeesso ortiis keene, ulla icho tuumman samaache.
40015031	'Doo'd chu'us 'doo'di af laaye yeyyeedo ichoow ki elyeenye sohti ichoow ki ma'dayyeenye samaate ichoow ki indo laaye il argo arge ka weyti girmeeste Waakkhi Issiraayel saa'deen.
40015032	Yeesso abattitiis wahe, wihi us iyidah, “An 'doo'da weyti uur isoonugleesda. Maan seyyah dakkhan ani on ileejire, wihi icho yamhiin la ma khabaan. Anihi ankaa khabaani laabo ma 'doono. A mehe a geeddi icho jit ka sussuuhaan.”
40015033	Abattitiis wihi iche ilaabte, “Yiba ka, gololi geeddaasenye urura yaakho intoh ka'hella?”
40015034	Yeesso la, “Makaate geeddoh khabtaan?” worsate. Iche la wihi iche ilaabte, “Makaate teeba ichoow bahaggoor rurrucchul laka a khabna.”
40015035	Ulla urur amur ibahche orrommiche.
40015036	'Deerka makaateyyohi teebee ichoow bahag khaate, Waakh kala'd ilaabe, jejjebche, abattitiis ididdiibe, abatti la ba'h gisse.
40015037	Icho tuumman golossateene ichoowka dargeen. 'Da'ddaboka abatti enjel teeba gololi jejjebane lasoowaache buuho soosuunte.
40015038	Mejeli golossate deyyeho ichoow nyaakhut la liikekkaan, a elif affar.
40015039	Yeesso inkoo us urur kahche ka, kooban gele, ili Magadaan irte.
40016001	Farissaayotoo ichoow Sadukaayotoo Yeesso itimiy usu angey gelin 'doontaa. 'Deerka wohoo goobi Waakh kayimiyye miigti Waakh tuso daahte.
40016002	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirra il gelebnowo, sereye la gu'duu'dantahe, ‘Saahta hir ma 'deyo,’ tadeehiin.
40016003	Chirdeer la, chirri sereye gu'duu'dantahe toro il sooankubsame, ‘Hiri hafari buure khabo a soo'deya,’ tadeehiin! Atin serey a yeytaane, wihi 'deeka sooyateeh kaabattaan. I'daasenyi saggi wey'da il ijiro a yeytaane toro la walah atin kaabattaan mele.
40016004	'Doo'di i'deenye uskeel lehe waakkhassi addan wahti on wohoo miigti Waakh tuso yowta. I'daasenyi wihi goorat Waakh Yoona ka enenyet tuse on menye, walah addane lasiicho mele.” Yeesso 'deerka icho katabe irte.
40016005	Inkoo abatti beyti Gaalilaaya aficheki 'diri imaahte ka, saggi iche makaate idabte kasse.
40016006	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Yeedad Farissaayo ichoow yeedad Sadukaayo ki i'di booddati makaate fuurissee yuubsada.”
40016007	Icho la iskaleehawwoocheene wihi icho yidaaheen, “Jeenteti inno makaate isookhaatanne i'daas iessa.”
40016008	Yeesso la wihi iche kahawwoosso a garta, wihi us worsate, “Enenna i'daaru marah on ikakhuuftaanee, a i'doh goytiin ka makaatewaayyo ikayeyyeeddaan?
40016009	Atin uliba walah ma abanna? Atin makaate chanti an mejeli alif chane kagoolliche ma kasoo'hessaan a? Atin la enjel geeddoh bubbuuhto soolaabteen?
40016010	Makaate teebati an mejeli elif affare kagoolliche la? Enjel geeddoh buuhto soolaabteen?
40016011	A i'doh saggi an wori golol atin ikaleeyyeedin iabanna? I'daasenyi isyaakhicha yeedad Farissaayo ichoow yeedad Sadukaayo ki i'di booddati makaate fuurissee yuubsada.”
40016012	'Deerka abatti saggi us wori booddataas ikaayyeedine i'daasenyi us wihi Farissaayo ichoow Sadukaayo 'doo'd abchaan yuubsada iessi abatte.
40016013	Chirri Yeesso ili ilkerengeetti Kaaysareya Fiiliffi yimiy ka, wihi us abattitiis worsate, “'Doo'd Ínam Aadam a ayyo essa?”
40016014	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Gaasoo ati a Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo iche essa, gaasoo a Eliiya essa, gaasoo laka a Yeeremiya ommos 'doo'di goorat Waákh íyeyyeedo a kichekoo iche essa.”
40016015	“I'daasenyi atin la? An a ayyo tadeehiin?” worsate.
40016016	Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh wihi us ilaabe, “At a Ki Lasubhe, a Weeli Waakkhi jirtuu tuumman jiro.”
40016017	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Siimon inam Yoohana, ati Waakh a kimaale. I'di tahe runtaas at cheekte ti weeli enenyet katimiy menye, i'daasenyi Aabbaheeyki serey jiro iche kisoobabbakkaahiche.
40016018	Wihi an kiadeeh la at a Beetero, i'di minki daddaab sartiis lakadisuu, daddaabta sarcheeda urureey tuumman kadisa. Miigti omooteet la ma kahataatto.
40016019	Fureyyohi dakhi goobi Waakh a kisiicha. Walahbaaw at harra ka hiddo, Waakh laka goobiis ka a hide. Wihi at harrata ka furto la, Waakh laka goobi Waakh ka a fure.”
40016020	Yeesso 'deerka abattitiis tootooche, uus iche saggi us Ki Lasubhe iyahe etoo kalday laka icheekine.
40016021	Uu' maalinkaas, Yeesso abattitiis saggi Waakh igooche us ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme iirti, ewweenki Ya'huud ichoow kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre dahanohicho ka sinati buure liituso, liiyagiise, ibeenki seyyahnaatteet ka omoot liikasookahcho ibabbakkaahiche.
40016022	Beetero la Yeesso 'dol geeche leejaakhe, “Waakh meesseen bujiiy! Kamur waha koloo kalday laka ma kiyateehiin,” iyidah.
40016023	Yeesso la urgiye wihi us Beetero iyidah, “Seytaankaane fooleey buj! At a daakki itarraantarricho, at wahanyeyyohi Waakh menye, i'daasenyi wahanyeyyohi weeli enenyete kamalatta.”
40016024	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Chi' etoo isooraahin 'doono, awtiis a 'dii'do toro la massalaabatiis barbar a sookorsati a isooraaho.
40016025	Eti tuummane jirotiis ribin 'doono, jiroti rummaat a waaya. I'daasenyi eti tuummane jirotiis ani iwaayo, jirotiisti rummaat a 'hela.
40016026	Etoo maanta, a chirri us wohoo 'hele, chirri us wihi harrata tuumman 'hele, jiroti awtiissa Waakh siiche la waaye? Ommos weeli enenyet maanta mehe diibin yabuu'de jirotiis kadooricha?
40016027	I'di tahe Ínam Aadam dowwanoha ka herti Waakh khabaayi anto Aabbahiissa leeyamiite, 'dee ebba wihi us yeele ka sina ommos kala'd laguta.
40016028	Rume atin icheeka, gaasiinkoo maanta inta kijiro, omoot ma argo geeddi icho Ínam Aadamhi dakhiis khabaayi yamiit iargin.”
40017001	Inkoo ibeen lihe kutte ka, Yeesso Beetero ichoow Yaakoobo ichoow Yoohanahi walaal Yaakoobee khaatte, woye, haloo deer koreen ichohaas on.
40017002	'Dey'doossaayi, Yeesso luurgiyiche, fooliis urgiye i'di orraheet u ababe, gaaddiis la i'di banay u dakhnaatte.
40017003	Chirraas on Muusa ichoow Eliiya orcho ka soobaheene Yeesso leeyyeedeen.
40017004	Beetero wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Kamur, a haaggantahe gon chi' nah inta kijirro! Chirri at 'doonto, gaayim seyyah inta ka a disa, too a taahha, too la a too Muusa, too la a too Eliiya.”
40017005	Yeyyeedaayi, mirisoo dakhane torrogoot icho ankube, hooyoo la miris goyaka sooyeede, “Waha a Weeleeyki an weyti 'doono, an weyti kahamaado. Usu nabah isuda!” yidah.
40017006	Abatti uus iche hooy daagte ka, weyti nahte il gu'dubte fool il kakhabatte.
40017007	I'daasenyi Yeesso yimiyye, icho 'daare, “Sookaha, roorro akhabina,” iyidah.
40017008	Chi'iche serey yeyto, Yeesso on menye et addane iche agarto mele.
40017009	Chirra icho hal kasookhubtaan ka, Yeesso icho amur ibahche wihi us iyidah, “Etoo kalday laka waha atin agarteen iicheekina, ichoowka Ínam Aadam omoot a lakasookahcho.”
40017010	Abatti wihi iche usu worsatte, “A i'dohe 'deerka tagaammeti amurre geeddi 'Doorribe iimaatan Eliiya soonokhta ielatta?”
40017011	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rumanka, Eliiya koloo yamiite, walah tuumman i'di icho eheneet toro kayeela.
40017012	I'daasenyi, wihi an atin icheeko, Eliiya orey on yimiyye, 'doo'd la eti us yahe ma kasine, i'daasenyi suujoonki noole icho 'doonaan usu tuseen. Ínam Aadam laka, saggaas on dahanohicho ka dowwanoha ka sina ikawaarta.”
40017013	Abatti 'deerka saggi us wor Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo ikaayyeedo, kasse.
40017014	Chi'icho urur iyamiitiin, etoo Yeesso iyimiyye ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dde.
40017015	“Kamur, inankeey uur isoonugleyso, a sirgowe, sina weyti kawaarta, a mehe kol dakhan 'dab ommos bicche goya kadiha.
40017016	Abattitaah la a ikeene, i'daasenyi iche inam a samaawwaayte,” iyidah.
