40017017	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Doo'di wey'dane uskeel lehe Waakh ikakhuufin! Geeddoh atin leefiddiyo? Geeddoh atin igarrahsadi? Ínam inta ka ikeena!”
40017018	Yeesso ginna leejaakhe, ginna la inam kabahte, inam la chirraas on samaate.
40017019	Abatti 'deerka dagsi ka Yeesso itimiyye, “Nah a i'doh ginna bihit iagaafanne?” worsatte.
40017020	Wihi us ilaabe, “A jeenteeti atin Waakh weyti ikakhuufin. Rume atin icheeka, chi' kakhuufnaanki atin Waakh kakhuuftaan buur ka geeddi ilinti geeyi dahar yahe a geeddi atin hala, ‘Inta kaguure intuus iro,’ itadeehiine, ulla irti. Walah atin iubaa'dan la mala.”
40017022	Chi' abatti tuumman boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ka isitimiy ka, wihi us iyidah, “Ínam Aadam dowwanoha ka 'dube lagoocha, dahanohi enenyet lagessa,
40017023	yagiisiine, ibeenki seyyahnaatteet ka omoot lakasookahcha.” Abatti tuumman la fool ribowe.
40017024	Inkoo Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hum eleeleen ka, 'doo'di kooddihi minki Waakhe buure goocho, Beetero iyimiyye, “Eti atin iween kooddihi minki Waakhe buure a guta?” worsateen.
40017025	Beetero la wihi us ilaabe, “Aa a guta.” Beetero la min gele, Yeesso wahaas worsataa. Yeesso geeddi Beetero isooyeedin yeede, “Siimon at mehe tadeeh? Karnatohi harrata ayyo kooddi kaguttaan, 'doo'dichooda bal 'doo'di ilaas kicho ieheynane ilaas fiddiyo?” worsate.
40017026	Beetero wihi us ilaabe, “'Doo'di ki ilaas ieheynane kaguttaan.” Yeesso iiyeyye, “'Deerka 'doo'dicho kooddi ma guto gon.
40017027	I'daasenyi uus inno kakhuufnaanki icho Waakh kakhuufaan tirine, nyaam beyti Gaalilaaya iro, oroohti bahag lakakhabti bey goya isey. Bahaggi oraate at sookhabatte, cha'at af bakkaahisse chilim a agarta, chilinkaas khaate 'doo'di kooddi goocho igeeche, kooddiheey ichoow kaah ba kagut.”
40018001	Chirraakka abatti Yeesso itimiyye, “Dakhi goobi Waakh ka ayyo 'doo'di addan tuumman iween?” worsatte.
40018002	Weeloo rucchul wahe, goycho toolliche.
40018003	Wihi us yidah, “Rume atin icheeka, sammata atin iurgiyine, i'di nyaakhuti rurrucchul iitaahan, koloo kalday laka dakhi goobi Waakh ma gessaan.
40018004	Maantaka eti tuummane i'di weeluu isnuglaache, dakhi goobi Waakh ka weyti weenyahe.
40018005	“Eti tuummane weeloo i'dee jeenteti us abattiteey iyahuu martiiste, ani imartiiste.
40018006	“I'daasenyi chi' etoo 'doo'daar irummeesti kichokoo tarraantarricho wihi ideefo a usuhi daddaabti buurenye gurnaan lakatumo lukhum lakahido, beyti buurenye hoge ka bicche khaataan.
40018007	Jeenteti wahanyeyyohi enenyet uskeel kalug'duu, 'doo'di harrata sinati sugto eenna a buure! Wahanyeyyoha a yamiitiine, i'daasenyi eti icho leeyamiitiin sinati sugto eenna a buure!
40018008	Chi' dahantaah ommos luhtaah uskeel kaalugu'ddo gooche rog. Atihi dahan laaye ommos luh laaye jiroti jirtuu imassan 'hesso deefta, atihi dahano lammacho ommos luhlo lammacho khabto 'dabi armaanjireen lakalug'do ka.
40018009	Chi' issaah uskeel kaalugu'ddo la, bihiche rog. Atihi issoo laaye jiroti jirtuu imassan 'hesso deefta, atihi indo lammacho khabto, meessi 'dabi armaanjireen lakaalug'do ka.
40018010	Taba nyaakhuti rurrucchul a'darraawina. I'di tahe wihi an atin iadeeh, herti Waakhe goobi Waakh ka icho yuubisso kol dakkhan goobi Waakh ka fool Aabbaheey a agarta.
40018012	“Bal waha kamalda. Ersinki iiyti kudoowe khabo, naffoo kabaabe, mehe yeela? Ersinkaas iiyti tomon saagaal ichoow saagaale hal yaakhtaayi a kataba, irta naffi kaldache baabe yowta menya?
40018013	Chirri us 'hele la, naffaas kalday weyti kahamaada iiyti kootte tomon saagaal ichoow saagaalenye ibaabin ka laka.
40018014	Aabbaheeyki serey jiro laka saggaas u, nyaakhuta rurrucchul ichehi koo kalday laka baabo ma 'doono.
40018015	“Chirri etaahkoo koo Kiriistee uskeeloo kiyeele, iiro saggi us uskeel kiyeele icheeke, lammatiin on la a eheetti. Chirri us kidaage, etaas a sooholisse.
40018016	I'daasenyi chirri us kidaagiwwaaye, etoo ommos et lammatoo addane Kiriisto rummeysatte khaato, leeyyeeda, 'dee et lammataas ommos et seyyahtaas gar a laabto.
40018017	Chirri us 'doo'daas sookute, urur Kiriisto icheek. Chirri us urur Kiriisto laka sookute, i'di eti Waakh igaran ommos i'di eti suujenye kooddi goocho iekkaacha.
40018018	“Rume atin icheeka, walahbaaw at harra ka hiddo, Waakh laka goobiis ka a hide. Wihi at harrata ka furto la, Waakh laka goobi Waakh ka a fure.”
40018019	“Toro wihi an atin iadeeh, chirri harrata ka et lammatoo wihi iche Waakh daahto iskadaagte, Aabbaheeyki serey jiro wahaas iche daahte a siicha.
40018020	Wihi tahe inti et lamma ommos et seyyahe jeenteti icho abattiteey iyahiin u kakulmeen, an goycho a kijira.”
40018021	Yomboka Beetero Yeesso iyimiyye wihi us worsate, “Kamur, chirri walaaleeykoo uskeeloo iyeele, kol geeddoh uskeel ikakuto? Kol teeba ikakuta?”
40018022	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Wihi an kiadeeh, kol teeba menye, i'daasenyi kol tomon teeba ichoow teeba ikakut.
40018023	“Iyookkoka dakhi goobi Waakh a i'di karnati ilbooyyetiis ebba mogti us kakhabe ichehi soogutto 'doono.
40018024	Chirra us worsan sookhabte ka, koo mogti weyti buurenye, jirtuu dakkhan igunnamin khabo liikeene.
40018025	Mog gunnaan ma yabuu'd gone, kamuriis amuri usu ichoow makhaabassiis ichoow nyaakhutiis ichoow wihi us khabo tuumman lakoororicho, 'dee mog lakaguto bahche.
40018026	“Ilbooy kamuriis ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dde, hawwaaste, ‘Kamuraaw, isug on, amba mogtaah tuumman kisoogutaa,’ iyidah.
40018027	Kamuri ilbooyaas la uur isoonugleeste, mog lee'diiche, toro la 'diiche irte.
40018028	“I'daasenyi ilbooyaas uus bahe, ilbooyoo addane wahalhiisenye mogti chilimmeti eti orrah kudoo hil haaggiche laguto kakhabo 'hele, kur khabte, hude, ‘Toolla kofche mogteey soogut,’ iyidah.
40018029	“Ilbooyaas wahalhiise luhlo khabte, hawwaaste, ‘Isug on, amba mogtaah kisoogutaa,’ iyidah.
40018030	“I'daasenyi ilbooyaas us mogtiis khabo sugnaan lee'dii'de, khaate jeela gesse, ichoowka maanti us mog sooguto.
40018031	Chirri ilbooyyeti addan wihi yitah agarte ka, weyti bolkheene, irteene, kamuricho wihi yitah tuumman icheekeen.
40018032	“Kamuricho 'deerka ilbooyi mogtiis khabo wahe, wihi us iyidah, ‘Atiha ilbooyi suuje, an jeenteti at ihawwaassatte u, mogteeyti ati khabto tuumman a kilee'diiche.
40018033	Saggaas maanta an uur kisoonugleesde u, at laka ilbooyaas wahalhaahe uur ma inugleysatti?’
40018034	Kamuriis hol ka, dahanohi 'doo'di usu jeela ka sina kawaaricho gesse ichoowka maanti us mog tuumman sooguto.
40018035	“Sammata at walaalaah uuraah ka tuum uskeel ikakutin, Aabbaheeyki serey jiro laka, etiimba i'daas on yeela.”
40019001	Inkoo Yeesso yeedaas massiche ka, boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kakahe, anki beri ili Ya'huude hawti Yoordane 'dusso 'dirihiise irte.
40019002	Ururoo buure la raahe, ulla intaas ka 'doo'di khakkhannan samaache.
40019003	Farissaayotoo la timiy, Yeesso angey gelin 'doontaa. Wihi iche worsatte, “Eti makhaabassiis walahbaaw us 'doono ka tuum riho ichoow amurreteen a israahaan?”
40019004	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Atin saggi uumaccho ka Waakkhi walah tuumman soouume ‘labo ichoow deyyeho isoouume’ ma soomin a?
40019005	Wihi chiiran, ‘Jeentetuu mejel aabbahiis ichoow abartiis a kataba, usu ichoow makhaabassiis la wohoo kalday yateehiine, lammacho ba sartoo kalday yateehiin.’
40019006	'Deerka kola et lamma menye, a sartoo kalday. Maantaka wihi Waakh isikeene uus weeli enenyet seley bihin.”
40019007	Iche la wihi iche worsatte, “A i'doh Muusa amurreti us inno siiche ka, ‘Eti makhaabassiis tuum riho khadaabi saggi us iriho tuso a siicho,’ iyidah?”
40019008	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Jeenteti matahmiigtiinna Muusa amuri atin oboorrihiin tuum karihtaan atin isiiche. I'daasenyi uumaccho ka i'da ma eheynan.
40019009	Wihi an atin icheeko, eti tuummane makhaabassiis tuum rihe makhaabassoo addan diste, chi'iche mejeloo addan leeu'durte on menye, makhaabalaas uskeeli us makhaabassi tiis ieheynan leeur'do, iche gele.”
40019010	Abatti wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Chirri makhaabal jeenteti makhaabassiis etoo addan ileeu'durto kalday on seley ibahaan, eti min idisan gon deefa.”
40019011	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Eti Waakh gargaaro on menye, enenyet tuumman mee yeeda raaho.
40019012	I'di tahe 'doo'doo usuhi sang'eenye ladele, gaasoo laka enenyete sang'a kayeele, gaasoo laka wihi icho minan kadisawwaayaan, a jeenteti icho dakhi goobi Waakh igelaane icho wihi Waakh 'doono iyeelaan. Eti yeeda khaannaan yabuu'd a khaatti.”
40019013	'Deerka nyaakhuti rurrucchul Yeesso liikeene, 'dee ulla dahano korcha iweesta. I'daasenyi abatti 'doo'di nyaakhut sookhaate leejaakhte.
40019014	Yeesso la wihi us abatti iyidah, “Nyaakhuti rurrucchul ajeyinna 'diicha ani a iyimaatee, a mehe dakhi goobi Waakh a ki 'doo'di i'dee.”
40019015	Inkoo us dahanohiis korche iweeste ka, intaas katabe.
40019016	Etoo Yeesso iyimiyye wihi us worsate, “Eti ween mehe haaggane yeela 'dee jiroti jirtuu imassan 'hela?”
40019017	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “A i'doh wihi haaggan iworsatta? Waakh kalday on haaggan. Chirri at jiro 'helin 'doonto, amurreti Waakh raah.”
40019018	Ulla, “Amurretoh?” worsate. Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “ ‘Weeli enenyet dubunuunu iigaasan, makhaabali kaah ieheynan ommos makhaabassi taah ieheynan aleeur'din, hatto iiran, garti beenaat ayeedin,
40019019	aabbahaah ichoow abartaah inkaanyit, ollokkaah geeddi at is'doonto 'doon.’ ”
40019020	Et la wihi us yidah, “Wahaas tuumman koo an iraahin mala. Mehe uliba ikaankhan?”
40019021	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Cha'at tuum jiroti el ikhabin jirin 'doonto, nyaame, wihi at khabto tuumman ororiche, chilimme miskiin siiche, 'dee kamurroonki goobi Waakh 'hele, 'dee kaale isooraah.”
40019022	Etaas nugul chu'us waha daage ka, usuhi fool ribowe nokhte, a mehe hoolahi buurenye khabe.
40019023	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Rume atin icheeka, weyti 'hooltahe chi' eti kamure dakhi goobi Waakh gelo.
40019024	Toro wihi an atin iadeeh, naffi gaale issi irbi kakhaduutti weyti 'hooltahe. Eheet a, 'hoossi eti kamurenye dakhi Waakh gelo iche weyti kutta.”
40019025	Chirri abatti waha daagte ka, weyti girmeysatte, “Ayyo 'deerka lariba?” worsatte.
40019026	Yeesso icho yeye, wihi us iyidah, “Weeli enenyet ka waha a wihi koloo kalday laka iitaahan. I'daasenyi Waakh ka walah tuumman a geeddi icho yateehiin.”
40019027	Beetero wihi us ilaabe, “Nah weheenyo tuumman a kasootabne 'dee ati kiraahna. Waakh berri mehe nah siicha?”
40019028	Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Rume atin icheeka, maanti Waakh walah tuumman husubnaacho, Ínam Aadam kombortiisti antoote ababto koorronti, atinhi isooraahteen laka komborohi antoote tomon ichoow lammeenye koorrommattaane, yaafoheenki Issiraayele tomon ichoow lammee anattaan.
40019029	Eti tuummane minan ommos walaalinyetiis ommos albehi leedesse ommos aabbahiis ommos abartiis ommos nyaakhutiis ommos gosiis jeenteti us abattiteey iyahuu kasootabe la, kol kude wahaas us kasootabe 'dirihiis 'hela, toro la jiroti jirtuu imassan laka a 'hela.
40019030	I'daasenyi 'doo'di ittaawenye oraate ki 'duboot yateehe, ki 'duboot la ki oraat yateeh.”
40020001	“A mehe dakhi goobi Waakh a i'di etoo gosi sabiib khabo. Maantoo baryo ka, irte 'doo'di us kireesti gosiis hil kahaaggicho yowte.
40020002	Inkoo icho chilimmeti eti orrahtoo hil haaggiche laguto iskadaageen ka, gos iergate.
40020003	“Geeddi saha'd seyyahti chirdeereet ka toro bahe, reeroo inti sokko ka i'daanu toollo 'hele.
40020004	Wihi us reera iyidah, ‘Atin laka nyaama goseeyki sabiib hil kahaaggicha amba wihi mujjume atin gutaa.’
40020005	'Deerka reer irte. “Saha'd lihti maalimeet ichoow saha'd saagaal laka toro irte reeroo leeyeede, icho laka irteene gos hil kahaaggicheen.
40020006	Saha'd tomon ichoow koow toro irte reeroo toollo 'hele, ‘A i'doh maalinki nool i'daanu itolossaan?’ worsate.
40020007	“Wihi icho ilaabeen, ‘Et nah kireeste mele.’ “Wihi us icho iyidah, ‘Atin laka nyaama goseey hil kahaaggicha, amba mujjum atin gutaa.’
40020008	“Chirri il gelebnowe ka, eti gos leh falfatiisti ween wahe wihi us iyidah, ‘Nyaame 'doo'di hil haaggiche wahe, gut. Koloo la reeri an yomboka kireesde kasookhabo ichoowka ki an orey kireesde eleeli.’
40020009	'Doo'di hil haaggicho saha'd tomon ichoow koow lakireeste ebba chilimmeti eti orrahti nool hil haaggiche laguto, lagute.
40020010	'Deerka chirri 'doo'di orey lakireeste yamiit, kol us buur 'helo koogyahe. I'daasenyi ebba geeddi eti orrahtoo hil haaggicho laguto on icho laka lagute.
40020011	Chirri icho chilimme khaatteen ka, eti gos leh leejaakheen.
40020012	Wihi icho iyidaaheen, ‘Reera yomboka lakireeste saha'ddoo kalday hil haaggiche, ichoow nahi hol downe orrahe nah tuhum ekka nah gutte.’
40020013	“I'daasenyi eti gos leh wihi us eti yeyyeedo ilaabe, ‘Ey'do, daganso, an ma atin ey'darin. Inno kootte chilimmeti eti orrahtoo hil haaggiche laguto ma iskadaagin a?
40020014	Wihi wihiine khaadda irda. Wihi an 'doono, ani on eti yomboka lasookireeste geeddi an atin siiche, icho laka siiche.
40020015	Ma imu'dan a cha'an chilimmeteey i'di an 'doono adeeh? Ommos jeenteti an uur 'dabakh iahe kal'darri ikhabtaan?’
40020016	“'Deerka 'doo'di 'duboote ki oraat yateehe, ki oraat la ki 'duboot yateeh.”
40020017	Yeesso ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ikoraayi, abattitiisti tomon ichoow lammee 'dol iwahe, wihi us iyidah,
40020018	“Inno ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme i'dulla, Ínam Aadam la 'dube lagoocha kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre dahanohicho lagessa, icho la omoot igoochaan.
40020019	Icho la dahanohi 'doo'di Waakh igaran gessaane, lakachaarta, laajja ka doochaane, massalaaba kakaahaan. Ibeenki seyyahnaatteet ka omoot lakasookahcha.”
40020020	'Deerka abar yeele Sebedaayo yeeletiche khabtaayi Yeesso itimiyye, ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dubte ichehi wohoo liiyeelo 'doontaa.
40020021	Yeesso la wihi us worsate, “Mehe 'doonta?” Iche la iitatte, “Wihi an 'doono, berri goobaah ka, yeeleteeyta lammee koo ankaahki miigeet siiche a orronti, koo la ankaahki gurro siiche a orronti.”
40020022	Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Atin wihi atin daahtaan wihiche ma garattaan. Atin maanta kokkoobi sinayyoote an dowwanoha ka soodamo damin a tabuu'diin?” Wihi iche ilaabte, “A nabuu'd.”
40020023	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Rumanka, kokkoobeey a kadaantaane, i'daasenyi eti ankeeyki miigeet ommos ankeeyki gurro orronti ani mee goocho. Meelassa a ti 'doo'di Aabbaheey iyeele.”
40020024	Abattiti addane tomone, chi'iche wahaas daagte ka, yeeletaas lammeenye isleedelatte kahollowte.
40020025	Yeesso isiwahe, wihi us iyidah, “Saggi atin igarattaan u, weynaanti 'doo'di Waakh igaran saggi suujenye 'doo'd idakhtaane toro ewweenkicho la wihi 'doo'd yeelo icheeka.
40020026	Atin ka i'daas mee. Eti tuummane goytiin ka weynaan 'doono, falfatiin a yitaahe.
40020027	Eti tuummane orey 'doono la, bow'datiin a yitaahe.
40020028	Saggaas on u, Ínam Aadam ma imaatane 'dee enenyet usu ma ifalo, i'daasenyi a yimiyye 'dee us 'doo'd ifala, rubeytiis diiba, 'dee enenyeti ittaawe mogti uskeelicho iguta.”
40020029	Chirra icho ilkerengeetti Yeeriko kabahaan ka, ururoo buure usu raahe.
40020030	Reeroo lammeenye indo laa jit afiissa fiddiya, chirri us Yeessohi intaas leeyamiit daage ka, riire, “Kamur, Ínam Dawuud, uur nah isoonugleyso,” yidah.
40020031	Urur la leejaakhe, “Gammadicha,” iyidah. I'daasenyi geeddi kootteet laka 'dirihiis riireene, “Kamur, Ínam Dawuud, uur nah isoonugleyso,” yidaaheen.
40020032	Yeesso tolossate icho wahe, “Mehe atin iyeelo 'doontaan?” worsate.
40020033	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Kamur, nahi il agarro 'doonna.”
40020034	Yeesso la uur isoonugleeste, indohicho 'daare. Chirraas on il argeene usu raaheen.
40021001	Chirra icho ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem isoodowwaateene, ilkerengeetti Be'difaage Hali Geeyohi Oolif haggee yimaateen ka, Yeesso abattitoo lammee ergate.
40021002	Wihi us icho iyidah, “Ilkerengeetti ortiin jirto irda, chirraas on eheli hidane, inkuraarruhiis hagga tololo 'hessaan. Lammacho soofura ani ikeena.
40021003	Chirri etoo wohoo atin iidah, wihi atin itadeehiin, Kamure 'doona toolla kofcheeda on sooerga.”
40021004	Waha la a yitaaheene 'dee wihi eti Waákh íyeyyeedo ka lacheeke labuuhicha.
40021005	“'Doo'di ilkerengeetti Saayon yaal mehe itadeeh ya, ‘Yeya, karnatiin a yamiite, ulla a etoo samacchaare, inkuraarru sookora, weeli ehele sookora.’ ”
40021006	Abattiti iratte, wihi kootte Yeesso yeela iyidah yeesse.
40021007	Ehel ichoow inkuraarruhiche ba sookhaateene, kabuu'ddeticho inkuraarru kagaadeene, Yeesso koorronte.
40021008	Ururi buure kabuu'ddeticho jit kagolge, gaasoo la seytohi geeyoot soogooche jit kagolge.
40021009	Ururreti ortiis raahto ichoow ti 'dubiis raahto ba riirte wihi iche tidah, “Inam Dawuud a lakoolicho!” “Waakh ki magahi Kamur kayamiit a imaale!” “Waakkheenki inti weyti saraat kijiro koolinno!”
40021010	Chirri Yeesso ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem gele ka, ilkerengeet tuumman kowdo kalday titahye, enenyet, “Kan a ayyo?” esse.
40021011	Urur la wihi us laabe, “Kan a eti Waákh íyeyyeedo, Yeesso layadeehe, ilkerengeetti Naasarete boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kajirto kayimiy.”
40021012	Yeesso uranti minki Waakhe buure gele, 'doo'di intaas ka walah gatti ichoow ki walah ororicho tuumman rihe. Komborohi balballaaddane 'doo'di chilimmeti ilassi addan iskadooricho leeyahe ichoow komborohi 'doo'di kutukuurrug ororsati ba rerreeche,
40021013	wihi us iyidah, “Wihi chiiran, ‘Minkeey minki weysiite layadeeh,’ i'daasenyi, ‘inti 'doo'di hatto leh kadagti,’ iche kayeesseen.”
40021014	'Doo'di indo laa ichoow 'doo'di luhlo laa Yeesso uranti minki Waakhe buure ka liikeene, ulla icho samaache.
40021015	I'daasenyi chirri kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre girmohi us yeele argeene, toro nyaakhuti uranti minki Waakhe buure ka riiro, “Ínam Dawuud a lakoolicho,” essi daageen ka, weyti holloween.
40021016	Wihi icho Yeesso worsateen, “Wihi nyaakhuta essi ma daagto?” Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Aa, a daaga. Atin waha injire ma soomin a? “ ‘Afassi 'daa'hum ichoow nyaakhuti rurrucchul ba koolohi icho mujjum kikoolichaan a abisse.’ ”
40021017	Yeesso la kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre katabe, ilkerengeet kabahe, ilkerengeetti Be'daaniya irte, ibeenkoo intaas barye.
40021018	Baryo ka geedda us ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem inokhti Yeesso ankaye.
40021019	Chu'us geeyoo fiige jit 'dossiis katoollo arge ka ibuje. I'daasenyi walah us ka'hele mele, seeb on menye. 'Deerka geey fale, wihi us iyidah, “At ba toro jirtuu tuumman gurnaan deliwwaayta.” Geey chirraas on angage.
40021020	Abatti chirri iche wahaas agarte ka, weyti girmeysatte, “Geeyi fiig saggoh dowwa on iangage?” worsatte.
40021021	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rume atin icheeka, chirri atin Waakh kakhuuftaane, uurlammaal la ikhabin, wihi geeyi fiig layeele kalday ma yeessaane, i'daasenyi a geeddi atin hala laka, ‘Nyaam beyti buure goya iskalugu'd,’ itadeehiine, i'daas la tateeh.
40021022	Chirri atin Waakh rummeysattaan, walahbaaw atin weysi ka daahteen, a 'hessaan.”
40021023	Yeesso uranti minki Waakhe buure gele, geedda us ayti Waakh enenyet abcho, kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud ba Yeesso iyimaateen. Wihi icho worsateen, “Antohi at wahanyeyyoha kahaaggisso a weheeyya? Antoha la ayyo kisiiche?”
40021024	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “An laka wohoo kaldaye atin worsada. Chirri atin isoolaabteen, ani antohi an khabo, an wahanyeyyoha dakkhan kahaaggicho, a weheeyya a atin isoocheeka.
40021025	Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo, antohi us enenyet kabaattissiyo, intoh kayimaateen? Waakhe kayimaateen, bal enenyet?” Iskaleehawwoocheene wihi icho isiyidaaheen, “Chi'inno, ‘Waakhe kayimaateen,’ nadeeh, mehe inno iyadeeh ya, ‘A i'doh 'deerka irummeysanna?’
40021026	I'daasenyi chi'inno, ‘Enenyete kayimaateen,’ nadeeh, 'doo'de karoorra, a mehe icho tuumman Yoohana eti Waákh íyeyyeedo ikhaataan.”
40021027	'Deerka wihi icho Yeesso ilaabeen, “Nah ma garanni.” Ulla 'deerka iiyeyye, “Ani laka antohi an wahanyeyyoha kahaaggicho ma atin isoocheeko gon.”
40021028	Yeesso wihi us 'doo'daas iyidah, “Hawweesa kamalda bal. Makhaabaloo ínam lamma khabe, inanki weene iirte, ‘Inankaaw, maalinka iro goseenki sabiib khut,’ iyidah.
40021029	“Wihi us ilaabe, ‘Ma irdi,’ toro i'daasenyi yomboka maliis urgiyiche, gos goya irte.
40021030	“Makhaabal toro inankiiski addan iirte, wihi us iyidah, ‘Inankaaw, bal iro, goseenki sabiib khut.’ Ínam la wihi us ilaabe, ‘Ayye, aabba, amba irda,’ i'daasenyi gos ma iran.
40021031	“Yeelataas lammache, koh wihi aabbahicho yeela iyidah yeele?” Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Ki ween.” Yeesso chirraakka wihi us iyidah, “Rume atin icheeka, 'doo'di inno 'doo'di uskeel leh nadeehe, i'di maanta 'doo'di kooddi goocho ichoow malaayeyyee, icho ortiin dakhi Waakh gela.
40021032	I'di tahe Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo a atin iyimiyye 'dee jiti fissan atin tusa, atin la usu ma rummeysanne, i'daasenyi 'doo'di kooddi goocho ichoow malaayeyyo, iche usú rummeesté. Inkoo atin wahaas tuumman agarteen laka, yomboka uskeeliin ma 'diinne, usu ma rummeysan.
40021033	“Mammahtoo addan dagansada. Etoo gos lehe geeyohi sabiib gosiis goyaka il gesse a jire. Gos la oot kamarche inti gurnaanki sabiib lakayabti khute. Koondihi deere eti gos yaakhicho fiddiyo laka dise. 'Deerka gosiis lakireeste, ulla iloo deer sulhaal kiirte.
40021034	Maanti ibeenki gurnaan lagurti yitah ka, eti gos leh falfayyohiis 'doo'di gos kireeste iergate, gisi gurnaankiis yowte.
40021035	“'Doo'di gos kireeste ilbooyye khabte, koo jaheene, koo la yigaaseene, ki seyyahnaatteet la dagah kachibeen.
40021036	'Deerka ilbooyyetoo addane wihi oraat kiittaawe icho iergate. 'Doo'di gos kireeste la wihi us ilbooyyeti oraat yeele on taas laka yeele.
40021037	'Da'ddaboka inankiis icho iergate, ‘Rumanka inankeey 'dee a inkaanyitta on,’ yidah.
40021038	“I'daasenyi 'doo'di gos kireeste uus icho ínam argeen, mehe isiyidaaheen ya, ‘Ki dahal leh kalla. Kaaleya a nigaase, 'dee dahalhiis a khaatanni.’
40021039	'Deerka khabteene gosi sabiib khariis iseyeene, yigaaseen.
40021040	“Maantaka chi' eti gosi leh yimiy, 'doo'daas gos kireeste i'doh yadeeh?”
40021041	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “'Doo'daas sussuuje jiti suuje ka a bakkicha, 'dee 'doo'doo addane mujjumenye maanti gurnaan lagurti gisi gurnaankiis siicho gos siicha kireesta.”
40021042	Yeesso wihi us icho iyidah, “Atin Chiirnaanneti Waakh ka waha a soonteen menya? “ ‘Daakki 'doo'di minan diso 'dii'de, iche tirrinki dagaheete min tiiro yitah. Kamure waha yeele, indoheen ka la weyti haagganyahiin.’
40021043	“Maantaka wihi an atin icheeko, dakhi Waakh a atin lakakhaata yaafti gurnaanki Waakh 'doono desso lasiicha.
40021044	Eti tuummane daakka sartiis kakufe, a jejjeba, i'daasenyi chirri daakkaas etoo kasoodihe, etaas a urkaha.”
40021045	Chirri kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Farissaayo mammaho Yeesso daageen ka, saggi us woricho ikaayyeede garteen.
40021046	Jiti iche Yeesso kakhabatti yowatte. I'daasenyi urure karooraan. A mehe enenyet Yeesso eti Waákh íyeyyeedo ikhaate.
40022001	Yeesso toro ewweenki Ya'huud imammahte, wihi us iyidah,
40022002	“Dakhi goobi Waakh iyookkoka, a i'di karnati inankiis min disti ulla oroosi buure ibahcho.
40022003	Ilbooyyetiis ergate, 'doo'di tuummane oroos liiwahe, a lasoowaho, i'daasenyi icho tuumman emeet 'dii'deen.
40022004	“Toro ilbooyyetiistoo addan ergate, wihi us iyidah, ‘Nyaama, 'doo'di mindischota liiwahe tuumman toro leeyyeeda, “Kaaleya golol a bissaate, heerasseey ichoow maaroheeyki rurruusan a khale, walah a lahaaggiche, kaaleya mindischo amiita,” idaha.’
40022005	“I'daasenyi icho wahaas nabah ma isudine, ebba hiliissa on gele. Koo gosiis goya irte, koo la meessi us koororsati irte.
40022006	Gaasoo laka ilbooyyeti lasooergate khabteene, jaheene, sina kawaaricheene, yigaaseen.
40022007	Karnat weyti hollowe, iskartiis erge, iskare la 'doo'di kootte ilbooyyetiis yigis 'dabbaasse, toro ilkerengeetticho tuumman laka gubte.
40022008	“Ulla 'deerka wihi us ilbooyyetiis iyidah, ‘Mindischo kola a titah, i'daasenyi 'doo'di goorat lawahe koo kalday laka ma imalin.
40022009	Toollaka nyaama, ilkerengeet irda, 'doo'di atin 'hessaan tuumman mindischo isoowaha.’
40022010	Ilbooyye 'deerka ilkerengeet goya itabte, 'doo'di icho argeen tuumman soowaheen. 'Doo'di hahhaaggan ichoow ki sussuuje ba wahte, minki daawti mindischo lakahaaggicho marti buuhisse.
40022011	“I'daasenyi chirra karnat yamiite marti sooyeyo, etoo darfohi mindischo ikhabin arge.
40022012	Karnat la, ‘Eta, at saggoh inta darfohi mindischo laan isoogesse?’ worsate. Ulla walah us ilaabe mele.
40022013	“Karnat 'deerka wihi us ilbooyyetiis iyidah, ‘Dahano ichoow luhlo ba hida, mug'dihi kharaat iseya. Intaas ka la enenyet a ooya, toro la bolokh ka ilko iskaroba.’
40022014	A mehe 'doo'di Waakh waho a ittaawe, i'daasenyi ki Waakh soobahsati a koo rucchul.”
40022015	Yomboka Farissaayotoo iratte, tossatte, jiti iche Yeesso yeediis on ka angey igelisso yowatte.
40022016	Abattitiche ichoow 'doo'd 'Herood koo Yeesso iergateen. Iche la wihi iche tidah, “Eti ween, nah saggi at rum ikanokhan a garanna. Jiti Waakhe at enenyet abisso ichoow runti Waakh a israahaan. At et at ibaasso mele, weyneetteey ichoow kuus ka ba.
40022017	Bal nah isoocheek, malaah a mehe? Kaaysarhi weene kooddi liiguto a mujjum a bal mujjum mee?”
40022018	I'daasenyi Yeesso malichoki suuje garte, wihi us iyidah, “Iskaayyeessooy! A i'doh ani angey igelin i'doontaan?
40022019	Bal chilinkoo Rooma atin kooddi kaguttaan itusa.” Iche la chilinkoo Rooma ikeente.
40022020	Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Foola ichoow magaha kachiiran a keyya?”
40022021	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “A koo Kaaysar.” 'Deerka wihi us iyidah, “Kaaysar wihi wihiise iguta, Waakh la wihi wihiise iguta.”
40022022	Chirri iche waha daagte ka, weyti girmeysatte, 'deerka usu katabte iratte.
40022023	Maalinkaas goya 'doo'doo Sadukaayo 'doo'di tuume berri ma sookaho essi Yeesso iyimiy.
40022024	Wihi icho yidaaheen, “Eti ween, amurre Muusa wihi iche inno abisso, chi' etoo nyaakhut laan yumuy, walaaliis muunkhotaas a disti, walaaliis nyaakhut a idelo.
40022025	Reeroo teebeenye isleedesse goyteenyo kijire. Ki ween min diste, nyaakhut ma 'heline, buje. Nyaakhut us khabe mele gone, makhaabassiis walaaliis ikatabe.
40022026	Ki lammaatteet ichoow ki seyyahnaatteet ichoowka ki teebanaatteet laka i'daas on eheet.
40022027	'Da'ddaboka makhaabale laka tumuy.
40022028	'Deerka maanti 'doo'di tuume lasookahcho, reeri teebee goyaka, etichokoh makhaabassiis tateeh, icho tuumman la a disteenee?”
40022029	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Atin jeenteti atin wihi Chiirnaanneti Waakh enenyet abisso ichoow miigti Waakh igaran u, jiti baabulenye kijirtaan.
40022030	Maanti 'doo'di tuume omoot kasookaho, min ma distaane ommos mindischo ka ma ladiibo. Icho tuumman i'di herti Waakhe goobi Waakh kijirto yateehiin.
40022031	I'daasenyi wori 'doo'di tuume omoot lakasookahcho miinsane Chiirnaanneti Waakh buuggiis goyaka atin liidowo, a soonteen menya?
40022032	Waakh mehe yidah ya, ‘Ani a Waakh Aburaaham, a Waakh Isakh, a Waakh Yaakoobo.’ Usu Waakkhi 'doo'di tuume menye, i'daasenyi a Waakkhi 'doo'di jiro.”
40022033	Urur la chirri us waha daage ka, saggi us walah mujjum 'doo'd iabcho weyti kagirmeeste.
40022034	Farissaayo la chirri iche saggi Yeesso Sadukaayo yeedi us ilaabe ka itoolliche daagte ka, iswahte, aytoo iche Yeesso worsatti kamalatte.
40022035	Kichekoo a tagaanki amurree, waha us worsati ka Yeesso kaje.
40022036	“Eti ween, amurre Muusa goyaka, koh weyti ween?”
40022037	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “ ‘Kamuri Waakkhaahe uuraah tuumman ka ichoow rubeytaah tuumman ka ichoow malaah tuumman ka 'doon.’
40022038	Amuri oraate toro amurre tuumman kussan a kan.
40022039	Ki lammaatteet la a i'diissa, ‘Ollokkaah geeddi at is'doonto 'doon.’
40022040	Chiirnaanneti Amurre tuumman ichoow ti 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo tuumman, amurreta lammacheeda kadisanyahiin.”
40022041	Farissaayo isifiddiittaayi, Yeesso wihi us icho worsate,
40022042	“Ki Lasubhe mehe ikhaattaan? A ínam eyya?” Iche la wihi iche ilaabte, “A hiiy Dawuud.”
40022043	Wihi us icho iyidah, “'Deerka saggoh Dawuud Rubeyti Munyee ka yeyyeedaayi, usu ‘Kamur,’ ikawaha? A mehe us mehe essa ya,
40022044	“‘Waakkhi Kamure wihi us Kamureey iyidah, “Dabankeeyki miigeete antoot orrommo, ichoowka chiiytaah tuum dahanohaah a soogesso.” ’
40022045	Chirri Dawuud rubeytiis ba usú, ‘Kamur,’ kawaho, saggoh toro Ki Lasubhe hiiy Dawuud iyahe?”
40022046	Eticho yeedoo kalday laka ilaabo mele, uus maalinkaas la et usu wohoo addan worsan iggo mele.
40023001	Yeesso saahka wihi us urur ichoow abattitiis ba iyidah,
40023002	“Tagaammeti amurre ichoow Farissaayo ba antohi icho amurre Muusa enenyet kaabchaan a khabaan.
40023003	Maantaka wihi icho atin idowaan nabah isuda, toro la yeela, i'daasenyi wihi icho yeelaan ayeelina, i'di tahe icho wihi icho cheekaan ma raahaan.
40023004	Icho huleesi buurenye atin kararaane adah atin korchaane, i'daasenyi icho rubeycho far ma okkhichaane enenyet ma leekhabtaan.
40023005	“Wihi iche yeesso tuumman a yeessa, 'dee enenyet arga. Saabohi balballaaddane miinan ichoow keymo kahiitaan. Saabassaas la Chiirnaanneti Waakhe goya kakhabaan.
40023006	Sukuukuyyo ka ichohi inti weyti lakiinkaanyito koorronti 'doonaane, minassi weysiite Ya'huud ka la komborohi weynaaneete 'doonaan.
40023007	Sokkoyyo ka la ichehi weyti inkaanyit ka labariiticho, enenyet tuumman, ‘Eti weenoow,’ idowo iche 'doonaan.
40023008	“I'daasenyi uus, ‘Eti ween,’ atin liidowin. A mehe Kamuriin a koo kaldach one, atin la a 'doo'di yaaftoo kaldach.
40023009	Harrata ka la etoo kalday laka, ‘Aabba!’ iidaahana. I'di tahe Aabbahoo kaldache serey jiro on khabtaan.
40023010	Toro la uus, ‘Eti ween,’ atin liidowin, i'di tahe atin wohoo kaldache titaaheene, eti atin iween la a koo one, ulla a Ki Lasubhe.
40023011	Eti goytiin ka weyti ween, a falfatiinna.
40023012	A mehe eti tuummane isweynaacho a lanuglaacha, eti tuummane isnuglaacho la a laweynaacha.”
40023013	“Atinhi tagaammeti amurree ichoow Farissaayo ba, iskaayyeessooy, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! Atin aritti dakhi goobi Waakhe 'doo'd kahiddaane, atin rubeytiin la goobi Waakh ma gessaane, toro la 'doo'di gelin 'doono kajeyissaan.
40023015	“Atinhi tagaammeti amurree ichoow Farissaayo ba, iskaayyeessooy, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! Atin harra tuumman ichoow beyohi burbuurenye tabtaane, 'dee etoo kalday wihi 'doo'di Ya'huud wahti iurgiyissaane, chu'us atin sooraahe ka, weyti 'dirihiin baabiissaan. Saggi atin meessi 'dabi armaanjireen iirattaan u, etaas laka 'dirihiinna baabiissaane meessi 'dabi armaanjireen irta.
40023016	“Atinha indolaaye 'doo'd angaamissaan, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! Atin, ‘Chirri etoo daatte, minki Waakhe buure wahe laka a walahba on,’ iche elattaan. I'daasenyi ‘Chirri etoo 'dahabi minki Waakhe buure kadaatte, wihi us kadaatte a buuhicho,’ iche elattaan.
40023017	'Dalammeti indo laa! Mehe khumman, 'dahab a, bal minki Waakhe buurenye 'dahabaas munyaacho?
40023018	Toro wihi addane atin 'doo'd abissaan a mehe ya, ‘Chirri etoo chalagti hoola lakasoorriyoocho kadaatte, daatotiis a geeddi lajebcho, i'daasenyi chirri etoo wihi us Waakh siicho kadaatte, wihi us kadaatte a buuhicho.’
40023019	Indomeleyyo! Mehe khumman, wihi us Waakh siicho bal chalagti wihi us Waakh siicho munyaasso? Chalag on khumman!
40023020	Toollaka eti tuummane chalag kadaatti, chalag ichoow wihi tuummane sarche fuulo iche kadaatta.
40023021	Eti minki Waakhe buure kadaatti la minki Waakhe buure ichoow Waakkhi goya fiddiyo iche kadaatta.
40023022	Eti goobi Waakh kadaatti la, komborti Waakhe antoot ichoow Waakkhi kafiddiyo kadaatta.
40023023	“Atinhi tagaammeti amurree ichoow Farissaayo ba, iskaayyeessooy, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! I'di tahe atin wihi ikhummaneynane i'di geeyohi golol haaggicho i'di maanta nyaaykee ichoow bisaaree ka, Kamur gisi tomonnaatteet a ibihissaan. I'daasenyi wihi amurre ka wihi weyti khumman liiekkaacho a 'diisseen. Waha a i'di maanta 'doo'di jiti fissan ka lahukkumo ichoow uurnugleel ichoow atinhi 'doo'di lakakhuufo tateehiin a 'diisseen. Kamur gisi tomonnaatteet ibahcha i'daasenyi wahanyeyyohi weyti khumman a'diinna.
40023024	Atinha indo laaye toro 'doo'd angaamissaan, atin dahassihi bicchehi atin tabhuubiin goya kajiro taartaane i'daasenyi naffi gaal khorkhissaan!
40023025	“Atinhi tagaammeti amurree ichoow Farissaayo ba, iskaayyeessooy, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! Atin kokkoob ichoow baakhuul khariissa dikhtaane, i'daasenyi gololi goytiin kijiro a wihi atin 'damaam ka 'doo'd sarteen.
40023026	Atinha Farissaayo indo laa, koloo uurassiin goya dikha, 'dee wahanyeyyoha kharaat laka bi'dir a bahaanee.
40023027	“Atinhi tagaammeti amurree ichoow Farissaayo ba, iskaayyeessooy, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! Atin a i'di hawwaalohi sarcho riingihi dakhan lakadowe, kharicho haagganyahe, i'daasenyi goya lafohi 'doo'di tuume ichoow wahanyeyyohi bi'direnye buuha.
40023028	Atin laka i'daasu, cha'atin laargo 'doo'doo fiffissane iyoogtahiine, ugoka uuriin goyaka, atin a 'doo'di iskaayyeelo toro hugun'darri kaassohti.
40023029	“Atinhi tagaammeti amurree ichoow Farissaayo ba, iskaayyeessooy, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! Atine go'ddassi enenyet lakahawwaalo 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo idissaane, toro hawwaalohi 'doo'di fiffissan eykoddaan.
40023030	Atin mehe elattaan ya, ‘Kootte maanti goorat aacchinyeteen jirte jirre ka, diiggi 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo icho khubeen ma leegello.’
40023031	Atin 'deerka 'doo'da goorat 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo bakkiche a aacchinyetaanya elattaane, i'daas ka la saggi atin rubeytiin uskeel iyeessaane cheektaan.
40023032	Maantaka taba atin laka i'di aacchinyetiin u, uskeelaas inti icho dabarroocheen buuhicha.
40023033	“Atinha i'di toofafe! Dessi toof! Saggoh meessi 'dabi armaanjireene Waakh atin igooche ikabahsattaan?
40023034	Maantaka, 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo a atin isooerga, 'doo'di kharayyee ichoow 'doo'di jiti Waakh enenyet abcho a atin isooerga. Atin la gaasichekoo a tagiisiine, gaasoo laka massalaaba kakaahtaane, gaasoo laka minassiinki weysiite Ya'huud ka jahtaane, gaasoo laka kolba ilkerengeettoo ka sina omhissaan.
40023035	Jeentetaas u la, diiggi 'doo'di fiffissane harra kakhubte tuumman berri atine atin fuula, uus diig Aabelhi fissan lakasookhabti ichoowka ínam Barachiiyahi magahiis Sakkariiya layadeeh. Ulla minki Waakhe buure ichoow chalagti hoola lakasoorriyoocho dahchooda dubunuunu kayigaaseen. Atin laka uskeelaas a leegesseen gon.
40023036	Rume atin icheeka, waha tuumman 'doo'di i'dee iche lakahukkuma.
40023037	“Yeerusaleemoow, ilkerengeetti weenoow, atin 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo a tagiisiine, 'doo'di Waakh atin isooerge la dagah kachibtaan. Saggi orran lukki weylassiis barbarre goya igessatuu, an geeddi buurenye anihi dahanoheey atin koogoogo 'doone, i'daasenyi atin ma 'doonin.
40023038	Yeya, Waakh rubeytiis minki Waakhe buurenye kiine a kaguure, minki marah kalday atin ikatabe.
40023039	A mehe wihi an atin icheeko, yombuu toro ma iargartaane ichoowka, ‘Waakh ki magahi Kamur kayamiit a imaale,’ tadeehiin.”
40024001	Yeesso minki Waakhe buure kabahe, orey isohtaayi, abattitiis minassi minki Waakhe buure kaaddagsan tusse.
40024002	Ulla wihi us iyidah, “Wahanyeyyoha tuumman yeya! Rume atin icheeka, berri daddaabtoo kaldaye ti addan fuusso lakatabo mele, icho tuumman a lasookhuba.”
40024003	Geedda Yeesso Hali Geeyohi Oolif ka fiddiyo, abattitiis dagsi ka itimiyye wihi iche itidah “Waha maantoh yateehiin? Toro la mehe yateehe emeettaah ichoow ibeenki 'da'ddaboot tusa?”
40024004	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Yuubsada, uus etoo kalday laka atin ekkeysan!
40024005	A mehe 'doo'di ittaawenye ani iskaayyeelo yamiite, ‘Ani a Ki Lasubhe,’ essi, a agartaane, 'doo'di ittaawenye ekkeestaan la.
40024006	Yaafohi isdiho ichoow worassi ibuuhine dihoyyoot a daagtaan, i'daasenyi taba iicho atin kanahin. Wahanyeyyoha a sooyateehiine, i'daasenyi ibeenki yomboot uliba a ankhanyahe on.
40024007	Sirgaalle a isdihta, karnato laka isdihaane, ilassi ittaawe ka nabhayye tamiite, harra laka sesseehta.
40024008	Wahaas tuumman a chiis birriissa on.
40024009	“Maantaas a atin ladiiba, 'dee sina atin loomhicha, toro atin layagiis. 'Doo'di harra tuumman la a atin 'dii'da jeenteti atin abattiteey itahiin u.
40024010	Maantaas 'doo'di buure kakhuufnaanki icho ani ikakhuufaan a kanokhta, dahanohi chiiyeet isgessa, toro la is'dii'daan.
40024011	'Doo'di ittaawenye 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo iskaayyeelo a buuraata, 'doo'di ittaawe ekkeesta.
40024012	Toro la jeenteti hugun'darri ibuuraattuu, 'doo'di ittaawe 'dooninti us Waakh 'doono a nuglaatta.
40024013	I'daasenyi eti garrahsate ichoowka sinata 'dubiche eleele a lariba.
40024014	Wora Haaggane dakhi Waakh miinsan la harra tuumman ka a lacheeka, garti 'doo'di harra tuumman yateehe, 'dee 'deerka ibeenki yomboot yateeh.
40024015	“'Deerka maanti atin iyookkoti ‘weyti bi'direnye, 'doo'd keehisso,’ meessi lagan katolosso Daaniyelhi goorat Waákh íyeyyeedo cheeke agarteen,
40024016	'deerka 'doo'di ili Ya'huudiya fiddiyo tuumman halal a ifirdo. Atihi yeeda soonto yeeda a kigelo.
40024017	Eti minkiis sartiis fuulo uus min geline wohoo rucchul laka khaatin.
40024018	Eti gos goya kijiro, uus nokhanne kabuu'diis sookhaatan.
40024019	Ibeennetaas sinati deyyehoti nuugsatti ichoow ti huleesenye nyaamitto iubaa'dan sugto enenna a buure.
40024020	Waakh waho uus maantaas lafirdo maanti il weyti roffo yahe hir 'deyo ommos Seeri Lanaso eheynan.
40024021	A mehe sinati buurenye maantaas jirto, ti geeddaase uus uumacchoti harra ka ma laargine ichoow uliba. Toro wihi i'dicheenye lasooargo ba ma jiraan, jirtuu tuumman.
40024022	“Chi' ibeennetaas liigaabin, etoo kalday laka ma soo'hado. I'daasenyi iroonoti 'doo'diiski us soobahsatuu, ibeennetaas a lagaabicha.
40024023	Maantaas chi' etoo, ‘Yeya, Ki Lasubhe kalla,’ ommos, ‘Kuulla!’ kiyidah, arummeysan.
40024024	A mehe 'doo'doo Ki Lasubhe iskaayyeelo ichoow 'doo'di 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo iskaayyeelo a soobaha. Icho la wahanyeyyohi ittaawenye nane miigti Waakh tuso ichoow girmo yeelaane, 'dee chi'iche tateeh 'doo'di Waakh soobahsate laka ekkeestaan.
40024025	Yeya, geeddi il ankhayyahe waha a atin isoocheekee.
40024026	“'Deerka chirri 'doo'doo, ‘Kaaleya Ki Lasubhe kuulla hidaad kajiraa,’ atin iidah iiranna, ommos chi'icho, ‘Inta yeya, usu kalla min goyaka meelassi goyaatteet kijira,’ atin iyidaaheen arummeysanna.
40024027	I'di tahe saggi ankhadhi beri kaankhado bahay ka liiarguu, Ínam Aadam laka emeettiis i'daase tateeh.
40024028	Inti golfof jiifo, intaase ra'd kawara.
40024029	“Uus sinayyohi maanassaas kutaan, “ ‘Orrahe a daayatta, yeyyah la banayhiis ma soobahcho, yiyyihimo serey a kasookhubtaane, miigti saraat la lakorkokicha.’
40024030	“Maantaas wihi emeetti Ínam Aadam tuso serey ka a soobahaane, yaafohi harra tuumman la ooyaan. Ínam Aadam usuhi mirsohi saraat fuulo miig ichoow weynaanti buure khabaayi yamiit argaan.
40024031	Ulla Herti Waakhe arabi fallee afuufto harra ierga, iche la 'doo'di Waakh soobahsate harra 'dollohiche affarcho ichoow sereyta daayan 'dollohiche tuumman kasoobaayissa.
40024032	“Taba geeyi fiig yeeda kaabda. Uu' liikhimohiis ulhawtaane seeb bahchaan, saggi 'daato isoodowwaatte a garattaan.
40024033	Saggaas on u maanti atin wahanyeyyoha tuummane ibeenki 'da'ddaboot tuso agarteen, saggi soonokhantiis isoodowwaatte kola ititah a garattaan!
40024034	Rume atin icheeka, 'doo'di i'dee ma tuumo ichoowka wahanyeyyoha tuumman yateehiin.
40024035	Sereyta daayan ichoow harra a kutaane, i'daasenyi yeedasseey jirtuu tuumman ma kutaan.
40024036	“Aabbaheey on menye, et maantaas ommos saha'ddaas garti mele. Herti Waakhe goobi Waakh fiddiito ommos Ínam Aadam laka ma gartaan.
40024037	I'di goorat ibeenne Noowa eheet, iche ibeenki Ínam Aadam yamiit laka yateeh.
40024038	I'di tahe geeddi goorat 'duley harra ikhaatin, enenyet i'di orrankateet u a golossate one, minan laka laaddiste ichoowka Noowa koobanhi buure goya gele.
40024039	Wihi sooyateeh ma abanne ichoowka icho tuumman 'duley khaate. Emeet Ínam Aadam ka laka i'daas on tateeh.
40024040	Et lamma gose kijirta, koo lakhaata ki addan la lakataba.
40024041	Deyyehotoo lammeenye golol isleetunto, too lakhaata ti addan la lakataba.
40024042	“Maantaka toorribda, a mehe ibeenki Kamuriin yamiit ma garattaanee.
40024043	I'daasenyi waha abda. Chirri ooyohi min leh saha'ddi ibeen eti hatto leh yamiit garti, ma ur'do miinkiis ma 'diicho ma lajebcho.
40024044	'Deerka atin laka toorribda gi'de i'di tahe Ínam Aadam saha'ddi liikamurine yamiite.
40024045	“Kamalda bal, ilbooyi lakakhuufo toro kharee a ayyo? A ki kamuriis goobiis iweynaache, toro la geeddi mujjume ka ilbooyye kamuriis gololicho.
40024046	Ilbooyi liimaalo a ki kamuriis usuhi hiliis mujjum haaggicho sooeleelo.
40024047	Rume atin icheeka, kamuriis wihi us khabo tuummane dahantiis gessa, iweynaacha.
40024048	I'daasenyi eemba ilbooya a suuje, ‘Kamureey geeddi deere foga kijira,’ isiyidahye,
40024049	'deerka ilbooyyeti wahalhiise sina kawaariyye, meleefuyyo leegolossayye, toro la farso leeyubhub.
40024050	Kamuri ilbooyaas, maanti us ikamurine soonokhta toro saha'ddi us igaranne soonokhta.
40024051	Usu seleye goggoocha, toro 'doo'di iskaayyeelo goya gata. Intaas ka ooya, bolokh ka ilko iskaroba.”
40025001	Yeesso toro wihi us yidah, “Maanti Inam Aadam soonokhti, dakhi goobi Waakh a i'di albehoo tomonenye taassicho khaatte, eti min disti or kadowo.
40025002	Albeha chane a 'dalame, chane la a khara.
40025003	Chanti 'dalammee taassicho a khaatteene, i'daasenyi subakki geeyi oolife taa lakachibo ma si'dan.
40025004	I'daasenyi chanti kharayyee, khulaammeti subakki geeyi oolif kijiro ichoow taassicho si'datte.
40025005	Eti min disti soomalmale, albe tuumman yuufe, ur'dumme khaatte.
40025006	“Naanokhoka, etoo riire wihi us yidah, ‘Eti min disti kallaaye, kaha or a kadowno.’
40025007	“Albe 'deerka kahe, tooba taahiche sookorisse.
40025008	Chanti 'dalame, wihi icho chanti kharayyee iyidaaheen, ‘Taasseenyo a jitaane, subakkiinkoo geeyi oolif nah siicha.’
40025009	“Icho la wihi icho ilaabeen, ‘Mele! Subah ma inno yaakho, nyaama 'doo'di subah ororicho iirda, subah kasoogadda.’
40025010	“I'daasenyi chirra icho irteene subah soogattaan, eti min disti yimiyye, albehi kharayyeenye kootte subakkoo yeere soositte la min leegele, daawti mindischo leegele. Afaf la lasoohide.
40025011	“Yomboka albehi addan laka yimiyye, ‘Kamuroow! Nah fura,’ yidaaheen.
40025012	“I'daasenyi wihi us ilaabe, ‘Rume atin icheeka, an ma atin gardi.’
40025013	“Maantaka toorribda, a mehe maan ichoow saha'd ma garattaanee.
40025014	“Toro dakhi Waakh a i'di etoo sulhaal irti. Bow'dayyohiis wahe, kooba wihiiskoo dahan gesse.
40025015	Koo ugar chan chilimme buuhto siiche, koo la ugar lamma chilimme buuhto siiche, koo la ugartoo kaldaye chilimme buuhto siiche. Ugare ba la chilim alif chan 'dahabe khabta. Ebba la geeddi us yabuu'de dahan gesse, 'deerka sulhaassiis irte.
40025016	Ki ugar chan chilimme dahan lagesse, chilimmetaas khaate hil kahaagsate, ugar chan addan ka'hele.
40025017	Ki ugar lamma chilimme khabe laka lamma addan ka'hele.
40025018	I'daasenyi ki ugartoo kalday 'hele, a khaate one, lum khute, chilimmeti kamuriis dahan gesse kalug'de dagche.
40025019	“Inkoo geeddi deer labarye ka, kamuri ilbooyyetaas soonokhte, ebba wihi us chilimmetaas kahaagsate worsate.
40025020	Ki ugar chan chilimme 'hele, wihi addane chane sookhaate, wihi us yidah, ‘Kamur, at ugar chan chilimme dahan isoogelisse. Yey, chan addane 'hele.’
40025021	“Kamuriis wihi us ilaabe, ‘At weyti haaggisse! At rumanka a ilbooyi haaggane toro lakakhuufo! At wihi rucchule dahan lakisoogesse ka laka a lakaakhuufa gone, wihi ittaawenye kiweynaacha. Kaale kamuraah hamaadiis leegisam!’
40025022	“Ki ugar lamma chilimme khabe laka yimiyye, wihi us yidah, ‘Kamur at ugar lamma chilimme dahanteey soogelisse. Yey, lamma addane 'hele.’
40025023	“Kamuriis wihi us ilaabe, ‘At weyti haaggisse! At rumanka a ilbooyi haaggane toro lakakhuufo! At wihi rucchule dahan lakisoogesse ka laka a lakaakhuufa gone, wihi ittaawenye kiweynaacha. Kaale kamuraah hamaadiis leegisam.’
40025024	“Yomboka ki ugartoo kaldaye chilimme khabe yimiyye, wihi us yidah, ‘Kamur, an saggi at bacchaara ka uur idaayantahe a garda. Inti at ilmo il ikagelinne gurnaan kayowatta, inti at ilmo il ikataa'hin la golol kayowatta.
40025025	Jeenteti an ikaarooruu, ugarti kaldaye chilimme at dahanteey soogelisse, a khaate harra goya kadagche. Yey, wihi wahaahe kallaayo.’
40025026	“Kamuriis wihi us ilaabe, ‘At a ilbooyi suujenye toro sey'ho leh. At saggi an wihi weheey ieheynan ikhaato, toro la gosi an ikhutin ka gurnaan iyowdi a garatta menya?
40025027	Incheenka kootte chilimmeteey baangi gelissa, 'dee cha'an soonokhde ka chilimmeteey ichoow wihi iche desse 'hela.
40025028	“ ‘Ugartaas kaldaye chilimme ilbooyaas kakhaata, ilbooyi ugar tomon chilimme khabo siicha.
40025029	A mehe eti wihi dahan lagesse mujjum woywoye a liikakhaya ichoowka wihi us khabo buuraataan. I'daasenyi eti wihi dahan lagesse mujjum iwoywoyin, wihi us khabo laka a lakakhaata.
40025030	Maantaka ilbooya marahe indigir laa mug'dihi ginnayyo yaalliin iseya. Intaas ka enenyet a ooya, toro la bolokh ka ilko iskaroba.’
40025031	“Maanti Ínam Aadam herti Waakh khabaayi miigtiis leesoonokhti, kombortiisti antoote karnatoote koorronta.
40025032	Ulla 'doo'di harra tuumman ortiis ka a kulmicha enenyet seley saaha saggi ersim iiy ichoow riiyyo seley isaahuu.
40025033	'Doo'di fiffissan ankiiski miigeete gessa, ki addan la ankiiski gurro gessa.
40025034	“Karnat 'deerka wihi us 'doo'di ankiiski miigeet toollo iyadeeh, ‘Kaaleya, atinhi Aabbaheey atin imaale, goobi Waakhe atin liiabbire, uus harra lasoouume atin mu'dantahiin gela.
40025035	I'di tahe an ankaa a khabe atin la igoollisseen. Sugub a khabe, atin la sugub ibihisseen. An i'di eti yeelane eheete atin la a imartiisatteen.
40025036	Murukhe eheete, atin la gaad ikoorisseen. A khannaneete, atin la mujjum iwoywoyteen, jeela a kijire atin la a isooyeyteen.’
40025037	“'Deerka 'doo'di fiffissan wihi us soolaabo, ‘Kamur, maantoh atihi ankaa khabto kiagarre kigoollinne, ommos maantoh atihi sugub khabto kiagarre sugub kibihinne?
40025038	Maantoh atihi i'di eti yeelane kiagarre, kimartisanne? Ommos maantoh atihi murukhe kiagarre gaad kikorinne?
40025039	Toro la maantoh atihi khannan kiagarre kisooyeyne? Ommos maantoh atihi jeela kijirto kiagarre kisooyeyne?’
40025040	“Karnat la wihi us ilaabo, ‘Rume atin icheeka, wihi atin 'doo'da irummeeste wohoo liikoogeynan iyeesseen, a i'doo atin ani iyeesseen.’
40025041	“'Deerka wihi us 'doo'di ankiiski gurro kijiro iyadeeh, ‘Nyaama ikataba, atinha falan, 'dabaas armaanjireene Waakh Seytaan ichoow herti Seytaan ba iyeele kachimmama.
40025042	I'di tahe an ankaa a khabe atin la ma igoollin, sugub a khabe atin la sugub ma ibahin.
40025043	An i'di eti yeelane eheete, atin la ma imartiisan, murukh a eheete atin la gaad ma ikorin, a khannaneete jeela kijire, atin la ma isooyeyin.’
40025044	“Icho la wihi icho ilaabaan, ‘Kamur maantoh atihi ankaa khabto ommos sugub khabto ommos i'di eti yeelane eheete ommos murukh eheete ommos khannaneete jeela kijirte kiagarre, kigargaariwwaayne?’
40025045	“Ulla 'deerka wihi us ilaabo, ‘Rume atin icheeka, chirri atin 'doo'deeykaar wohoo liikoogeynan gargaariwwaayteen, a i'doo atin ani igargaariwwaayteen.’
40025046	“'Deerka 'dabi armaanjireene goya irtaane, i'daasenyi ki fiffissan jiroti jirtuu imassanne 'hela.”
40026001	Inkoo Yeesso yeedaas tuummane saggi us isoonokhti miinsan massiche ka, abattitiis mehe iyidah ya,
40026002	“Saggi atin igarattaan u, ibeen lamma on ankhane 'dee daawti Baasakka lagela, Ínam Aadam la ladiiba massalaaba lakakaaha.”
40026003	Maanassaas on kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud ba uranti kuhaanihi weyti weene magahiis Kayaafa layadeeh ka kulmeen.
40026004	Icho la saggi icho ekkeysi ka Yeesso ikhabtaane 'dee iyagiisiin, iche rerreegaan.
40026005	Wihi icho isiyidaaheen, “I'daasenyi uus inno daawta goyaka khaban, enenyet a geeddi us hol ka il baabiicho.”
40026006	Yeesso ilkerengeetti Be'daaniya ka minki etoo Siimonhi Ki Bu'da Khabe layadeeh kijiraayi,
40026007	makhaabassoo kurunkoo daakki alabaasta lakahaaggiche miricchihoo weyti gato miige kijiro leetimiyye, Yeessohi komborti ballaaddane lakagolossati ka dikkil kajiifo golossati matakkiis kakhubte.
40026008	Abatti chi'iche waha agarte ka weyti hollowte, “Miricchiha a i'doh immarah labaabiicho?” worsatte.
40026009	“Miricchiha kootte chilimmeti buurenye lakoororicha, chilimme la miskiin lasiicha!”
40026010	Yeesso la wihi icho essaan a garta, wihi us iyidah, “A i'doh makhaabassa imalalissaan? Wihi iche iyeesse a haaggi weyti buure.
40026011	Miskiin kol dakkhan goytiinna kakhabtaane, i'daasenyi ani kol dakkhan ma ikhabtaan.
40026012	Miricchiha iche sarteey kakhubte ka, ani hawwaal itannabissa.
40026013	Rume atin icheeka, meelbaaw Wora Haaggan harra tuumman ka lacheeko ka, wihi iche yeesse laka a lacheeka, iche la lakasoo'hela.”
40026014	Yomboka abatti Yeessoti tomon ichoow lammee kichekoo, ki Yuuda Iskaariyoot layadeeh, kuhaaniyyohi wewween iirte,
40026015	wihi us worsate, “Chirri an Yeesso dahantiin soogesse, mehe isiissaan?” Iche la chilimmeti lahaageete tomon seyyahe iekkaasse.
40026016	Uus chirraas, Yuuda inti leemujjumenye us Yeesso dahanohicho kagesso yowte.
40026017	Ibeenki oraate Daawti Makaateti Liikhasin, abatti Yeesso itimiyye wihi iche worsatte, “Intoh 'doonta iranna katannabanna, 'dee gololi daawti Baasakka kataham?”
40026018	Wihi us ilaabe, “Nyaama, ilkerengeet gela, etoo iirda wihi atin itadeehiin, ‘Eti Ween mehe essa ya, ibeenki ani liigooche a soodowwaate. Abattiteey khabaayi, minkaahha daawti Baasakka kagella.’ ”
40026019	Abatti 'deerka i'di kootte Yeesso iyidah on yeesse, gololi daawti Baasakka haaggisse.
40026020	Chirri il gelebnowe ka, Yeesso ichoow abattitiisti tomon ichoow lammee komborti ballaaddane lakagolossati ka dikkille kajiifaan.
40026021	Golossataani, Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Rume atin icheeka, etiinkoo 'dub igoocha.”
40026022	Icho tuumman fool ribowe, kooba ki addan 'dubiis ka, “Kamur rumanka ani mee menya?” yidah.
40026023	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Eti toolla karam dahan ikaleelug'de, iche 'dub igoocha.
40026024	Ínam Aadam i'di usu miinsane lachiiruu, a yamuut. I'daasenyi eti Ínam Aadam 'dub goocho, sinati sugto eenna a buure! Usuhi goorat idelanne deefta.”
40026025	Yuudahi 'dee Yeessó 'dub soogoocho la, “Eti ween, rumanka ani mee menya?” iyidah. Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Aa a ati.”
40026026	Golossataani Yeesso makaate khaate Waakh kala'd ilaabe, jejjebche abattitiis ididdiibe, wihi us yidah, “Khaata, amha waha a sartaayaa.”
40026027	Toro kokkoob khaate, Waakh kala'd ilaabe, abatti idiibe, wihi us yidah, “Atin tuumman isleeanguunda.
40026028	Waha a diiggeeyki ayyinti husube Waakh enenyet igoocho, a diiggi iroonoti enenyeti buure liikhubo, 'dee uskeelicho liikakuto.
40026029	Wihi an atin icheeko, uus toolla kakhabatti, an farsoti sabiib toro ma damo, ichoowka ibeenkaas an wihi husub goob Aabbaheey ka atin leedamo yateeh.”
40026030	Inkoo icho geeyoo Waakh dowteen ka, Hali Geeyohi Oolif ibaheen.
40026031	Yeesso wihi us abatti iyidah, “Ibeenka goya rubeytiis, atin tuumman jeenteti wihi liiyeeluu, a ikafiriddaan, a mehe wihi chiiran, “ ‘An ersime gu'dda, woyhi iiyyaat la seley baaba.’
40026032	I'daasenyi inkoo an omoot kasookahe, boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ortiin a irda.”
40026033	Beetero wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri iche tuumman jeenteti wihi lakiyeeluu kaafiridde laka, an jirtuu ma kaafirdo.”
40026034	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rume kisoocheeka, ibeenka goya rubeytiis, geeddi lukki iriirin at kol seyyahe ma igaratti tadeeh.”
40026035	I'daasenyi Beetero wihi us yidah, “Cha'an kileeamuut laka, jirtuu ma kigardi ma adeeh!” Abattiti addan tuumman laka i'daas tidah.
40026036	Yeesso 'deerka abattitiis khabaayi, meessi Gesseemane layadeeh irte, wihi us icho iyidah, “Inta orronda, geeddi an intuus irdi Waakh wahdi.”
40026037	Beetero ichoow yeele Sebedaayoti lammee khaatte. Yeesso weyti bolkhe toro mali uskul gele.
40026038	'Deerka wihi us seyyahche iyidah, “Huleesi rubeyteey kijiro, huleesi omooteet laka a ikeena. Inta fiddiya, ileetoorribda la.”
40026039	I'daaru orey isohte, il isi'diiche, fool harra ka'daare, Waakh wahte wihi us yidah, “Aabbahaaw, chi'iche tateeh kokkooba sinayyoot a liikakhaato! I'daasenyi in an 'doono menye, in at 'doonto on a titaahe.”
40026040	'Deerka abattitiis inokhte, ichehi u'durto 'hele, Beetero leeyeede, “Atin geeddi saha'ddoo kalday laka ma ileetoorribattaan a?” iyidah.
40026041	“Toorribda Waakh wahda, 'dee kajmeti uskeel atin kalugu'ddo akidihina. Rubeyohiin wihi mujjumenye 'doonaane, i'daasenyi sartiinna 'dabakhe.”
40026042	Toro koli lammaatteet nokhte, irte Waakh wahte, “Aabbahaaw, kokkooba sinayyoot chirri sammata an idamin liikakhaatin, in at 'doonto on a titaahe,” yidah.
40026043	Chu'us soonokhti, ichehi u'durto, indo hulees kore toro 'hele.
40026044	Toro koli seyyahnaatteet katabe, irte Waakh wahte. Wihi kootte us yidah on inokhte yidah.
40026045	'Deerka abatti inokhte wihi us iyidah, “Atin uliba a u'durtaane nassaan? Yeya, saha'ddi Ínam Aadam 'dub lagoocho, dahanohi 'doo'di uskeel leh lagesso a soodowwaatte.
40026046	Sookaha a iranni! Eti 'dub igoocho kalla soosohtaa!”
40026047	Yeesso yeyyeedaayi, Yuudahi ullaka abattiti tomon ichoow lammee kichekoowe yimiy. 'Doo'di sooraahe, a ururoo buurenye birlabbe ichoow khokkhoomme khabo, kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud sooergate.
40026048	Eta Yeesso 'dub goocho la mehe urur iskakhabeen ya, “Eti 'dee an dongade, a usu, khabda.”
40026049	Yuuda chirraas on Yeesso iirte, bariitiche, “Eti weenoow!” iyidahye dongate.
40026050	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Aalaaw, wihi at itimiy yeel.” 'Doo'd la orey isookute, Yeesso khabte hide.
40026051	Geeddaas on ka, etoo ullaka wahal Yeessee, birlabiis sootogte, soo'hiire falfati kuhaanihi weyti ween gu'dde, nabah ng'ure.
40026052	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Birlabaah min ilaab, i'di tahe eti tuummane birlab ka enenyet yagiis, ullaka birlabe lakayagiis.
40026053	At saggi chirri an Aabbaheey gargaar idaahe, us herti Waakhe aliffe goosso koloo kalday isooergo ma garatti?
40026054	I'daasenyi chirri an i'daas yeele, saggoh 'dee wihi Chiirnaanneti Waakh kachiirane sooyateeh liibuuhicha?”
40026055	Yeesso chirraakka wihi us urur iyidah, “Cha'atin khokkhoomme ichoow birlabbe leetimaateene ikhabattaan, an a etoo enenyet walah saro? Maan tuumman ani uranti minki Waakhe buure a fiddiye Yeedi Waakh atin abche, atin la ma ikhaban.
40026056	I'daasenyi wahanyeyyoha a yitaaheene 'dee wihi 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo chiire labuuhicha.” 'Deerka abatti tuumman usu katabte firidde.
40026057	'Doo'di Yeesso khabte Yeesso khaate min Kayaafahi kuhaanihi weyti weene geeche. Tagaammeti amurre ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud la intaase kakulme.
40026058	I'daasenyi Beetero fogaka Yeesso 'dubiis sooraahe, ichoowka uranti kuhaanihi weyti ween goya gele. Uus uram goya gele ka, irte, iskarti meel yaakhisso leeorronte, wihi Yeesso layeelo suge.
40026059	Kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud tuumman, garti beenaate iche yeeddo, 'dee icho Yeesso omoot ikagoochaan, yowteen.
40026060	I'daasenyi walah icho 'heleen mele, chi' 'doo'di ittaawenye garti beenaat cheeko soobahe laka. 'Da'ddaboka 'doo'doo lammee sookahe,
40026061	wihi icho yidaaheen, “Reenka mehe yidah ya, ‘An minki Waakhe buurenye an jejjebcho, toro maan seyyah goyaka diso a abuu'd.’ ”
40026062	Chirraakka kuhaanihi weyti ween kahe, wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Walah at soolaabto mele? Yeeda enenyet kaacheekti, mehe jira?”
40026063	I'daasenyi Yeesso gammadiche. Kuhaanihi weyti ween la wihi us iyidah, “Magahi Waakkhi jiro ka daato, usu at Ki Lasubhe toro Weeli Waakh tahe, nah isoocheek”
40026064	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Aa! A i'daas maanta at tidah on. I'daasenyi wihi an atin tuumman atin iadeeh, 'dee berri Ínam Aadam usuhi Waakkhi Miig Leh anki dahantiisti miigeet fiddiyo toro mirsohi saraat fuulaayi yamiit a agartaan.”
40026065	'Deerka kuhaanihi weyti ween hol on ka gaaddiis kharradiche wihi us yidah, “Wihi us yidah ka a gafe! A i'doh 'doo'doo addane gar laabo iyowanna? Yeya, toolla saggi us igafe a daagteen.
40026066	Mehe goosseen?” enenyet worsate. Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Omoote imasse.”
40026067	'Deerka Yeesso fool hanjuf katufeene, khomhoyyo ka gu'ddeen. Gaasoo fodoorre jahte,
40026068	“Ki Lasubheey, Waakh iyeyyeed. Ayyo kigu'dde?” idoween.
40026069	Beetero la geeddaka uram goya fiddiya. Inantoo falfee la itimiyye, wihi iche itidah, “At laka Yeessohi boroofenhi Gaalilaaya a leejirte.”
40026070	I'daasenyi 'doo'd tuumman ortiis ka 'dii'de, “An wihi at elatti ma gardi,” iyidah.
40026071	Chirraakka bahe aritti uram lakagelo irte. Inantoo addan agarte, 'doo'di intaas kajiro wihi iche itidah, “Reenka Yeessohi Naasaret a leejire.”
40026072	Ulla toro 'dii'de, daatte, “An et ma gardi!” yidah.
40026073	Inkoo geeddoor lafiddiye ka 'doo'doo intaas toollo Beetero iirte, wihi us iyidah, “Rumanka at a kichekoo. A mehe saggi at iyeyyeeddo a tussa.”
40026074	'Deerka Beetero isabaare, Waakh dowe, wihi us yidah, “An et ma gardi!” Chirraas on lukki riire.
40026075	'Deerka Beetero yeedi Yeesso iyidah kasoo'hele. “Geeddi lukki iriirin, at kol seyyah, ‘Ma kigardi!’ tadeeh.” Ulla khar ibahe, bolokh ka ooye.
40027001	Baryo ka kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud tuumman Yeessohi layagiis goocheen.
40027002	Hidhideene, khaateene, Bilaatohi gaafanee dahan gesseen.
40027003	Chirri Yuudahi Yeesso 'dub gooche saggi Yeesso liihukkumo omoot liikagooche arge ka, weyti ejer istowe. Chilimmeti goorat lahaageete tomon seyyahe sookhaate, kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud ikeene.
40027004	“An ha'daabe gele, a mehe an eta wohoo iyeeline atin ikeene, diiggiis gele,” yidah. Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Wahaas walah icho nah iyahiin mele! Ati on i'di at tadeeh dah.”
40027005	Yuuda 'deerka chilimme minki Waakhe buure goyaka khube, 'deerka irte, geeyoo iskasooloo'diche, isyigis.
40027006	Kuhaaniyyohi wewween la chilimme khaateene wihi icho yidaaheen, “Amurre ichoow chilimmetane ugarti minki Waakhe buure lakalug'do ma israahaan, i'di tahe a chilimmeti diig.”
40027007	'Deerka saggi iche chilimme ikhaatto gosoo etoo 'diryo haaggicho leeyahe kasoogatto goosse, 'dee gos eti yeelane yumuy lakahawwaala.
40027008	Jeentetaase intaas ichoowka uliba laka, magahiche Gosi Diig liiyadeeh.
40027009	'Deerka wihi eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Yeeremiya layadeeh ka lacheeke labuuhiche. “Chilimmeti lahaageete tomon seyyahe khaateen, a gatoti 'doo'di Issiraayel igoochee,
40027010	i'di Kamur ani iyidah u, chilimmetaas khaateene, gosi eti 'diryo haaggicho kasoogatteen.”
40027011	Yeesso geeddaas ba Bilaatohi gaafanee ortiis tolossate, gaafana la wihi us worsate, “Karnati Ya'huud a ati?” Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “A rum, a i'daas at elatti on.”
40027012	Chirra kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud Yeesso cheektaan, us walah us ilaabe mele.
40027013	Bilaato 'deerka wihi us worsate, “Waha icho kaacheektaan ma daagto?”
40027014	I'daasenyi Yeesso walah us laabe mele, yeedoo kalday laka ma ilaabine, ichoowka gaafana weyti girmeeste.
40027015	Hugunki gaafana ka, daawti Baasakka ka etoo hidane urur usuhi lasoofuro soobahsate iche soofura.
40027016	Maantaas la etoo weyti jeenteti suujoonkiis u lagarti Barraba layadeehe hidan, a jira.
40027017	Inkoo 'deerka icho urureen ka, Bilaato wihi us icho worsate, “Ayyo atin isoofura 'doontaan, Barraba bal Yeessohi Ki Lasubhe layadeeh?”
40027018	A mehe Bilaato saggi icho jeenteeti kal'darri on u Yeesso dahanohiis igesseen a garta.
40027019	Bilaato komborti enenyet lakahukkumo kafiddiyaayi, makhaabassiis farniin isooeregte, “Etaas uskeeloo iyeelin wohoo rucchul laka ayeeline, diiggiis agelin. I'di tahe ibeenkate issilloteey ka jeentetiis u weyti sina a ikawaartee,” itidah.
40027020	I'daasenyi kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud ba urur malicho urgiyicheene 'dee Barrabahi lasoofuro Yeesso la layagiis a daaheen.
40027021	Gaafana wihi us urur worsate, “Reera lammatiis, koh atin isoofuro 'doontaan?” Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Barraba.”
40027022	Bilaato wihi us worsate, “'Deerka Yeessohi Ki Lasubhe layadeeh i'doh idaahe?” Icho tuumman la wihi icho ilaabeen, “Massalaaba kakaah.”
40027023	Bilaato wihi us worsate, “A i'doh? Mehe suujenye yeele?” I'daasenyi geeddi kootteet 'dirihiis riireene, “Massalaaba kakaah!” yidaaheen.
40027024	Chirri Bilaato saggi us wohoo iyeeline i'daasenyi urur weyti iuskulaate il ibaabiicho arge ka, bicche on khaate, urur ortiis ka dahano dikhte. Wihi us yidah, “An eta wohoo rucchul laka iyeelin diiggiis ma gelo, khaata i'di atin tadeehiin daha.”
40027025	Enenyet tuumman wihi us ilaabe, “Diiggiis nah ichoow nyaakhuteenyo a nah fuulo!”
40027026	Bilaato 'deerka Barraba icho isoofure. I'daasenyi amuri Yeesso lakadoocho toro massalaaba lakakaaho bahche.
40027027	'Deerka iskar gaafana Yeesso khaatte, minki buurenye gaafana igelo geesse, rabittoo iskareet tuumman la Yeesso khaarisse.
40027028	Darfohiis kabihisse, kabuu'doo muggee i'di karnat u korisse.
40027029	'Duuboo kudaheet iskayuubte matah korisse, wussoo dahantiisti miigeet gelisse, ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dubte kachaaratte, “Karnati Ya'huudoow, jiroti deer 'hel!” idowte.
40027030	Hanjuf kaattufte, wussaas kakhaatte matah kaajjahte.
40027031	Inkoo icho kachaarteen ka, kabuu'd kabahcheene gaaddiis gesseen. 'Deerka leebaheene woyeen massalaaba kakaahaanee.
40027032	Chirra icho bahaan ka, etoo ilkerengeetti Kureene magahiis Siimon layadeeh 'heleene, massalaaba Yeesso sinnaan ihosseen.
40027033	Meessoo Golgoo'da layadeeh yimaateen. Golgoo'da la a mehe ya, Meessi Lafohi Matahe Enenyet.
40027034	Intaas ka Yeesso farsoti sabiibe reenkoo hadaade lakawarse siisse. I'daasenyi inkoo us chanchame ka 'dii'de.
40027035	Inkoo iche massalaaba kakaahte ka, kura gu'ddateene gaaddiis gisante.
40027036	Yeesso massalaaba kakaahanyahaayi, iskare orrommatte yuubisse.
40027037	Matakkiis sartiis la, wihi lakayigisye lakachiire lagesse a mehe ya,
40027038	Reeroo lammeenye hatto lehe laleekaahe. Koo ankiiski miigeet lakakaahe, koo la ankiiski gurro lakakaahe.
40027039	'Doo'di intaas tabo a leeabaarrama, 'darraaw ka matah moroogicha.
40027040	“Atihi minki Waakhe buure jejjebisso, toro orrah seyyah on ka disso, bal isribe, massalaaba kasooyag cha'at Weeli Waakh tahe!” iche idowaan.
40027041	Saggaas on u kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud laka a kachaartaane,
40027042	“'Doo'di addan a ribe, i'daasenyi isribin ma yabuu'd. Usu a karnati Issiraayel a? 'Diicha toolla massalaaba a kasooyago, 'dee usu a rummeysanni,” esseen.
40027043	“Usu Waakhe kakhuufa, ‘Aní Weeli Waakhe,’ iche essa menya? 'Diicha gi'de Waakh usu a ribo chi' Waakh usu 'doono,” yidaaheen.
40027044	Saggaas on u 'doo'di hatto lehe laleekaahe laka weyti usu leeabaarrame.
40027045	Uus saha'd lihti maalimeet ka il tuumman mug'di yitahye, ichoowka saha'd saagaale eleesse.
40027046	Geeddi saha'd saagaal ka, Yeesso hooyi buure ka riire, “Elooy! Elooy! Laama sabakhtani?” yidah. Wahaas la a mehe ya, “Waakkhaayaaw, Waakkhaayaaw, a i'doh ikatabte?”
40027047	'Doo'doo intaas toollo la baabule daage wihi icho yidaaheen, “Usu eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Eliiya layadeeh iche waha.”
40027048	Chirraas on kichekoo nyaame, haaruggoo sookhaate, farsoti sabiibe birrakhe buuhiche. Kho'doonkoo deer kahide Yeesso iyooge, 'dee a yubhaabe.
40027049	'Doo'di addan la, “'Diicha, usu Eliiya yamiite ribo a agarro,” yidah.
40027050	Yeesso inkoo us toro hooyi buure ka riire ka rubey gooche.
40027051	Chirraakka dafarti weyti yobbeenye minki Waakhe buure seley goosso meel lamma seley igoote, sereye kasookharradde ichoowka iliche kabahte. Harra sesseehte, daddaabo laka khakkharradeen.
40027052	Hawwaalo furnameene, 'doo'di Waakhe ittaawenye munyeenye goorat tuume omoot lakasookahche.
40027053	Icho la hawwaalo goya kasoobaheen. Inkoo Yeesso omoot kasookahe ka ilkerengeetti weene lagane Yeerusaleem irteene, 'doo'di ittaawe la arge.
40027054	Chirri eti koobbintoo iskareet itoollo ichoow iskarti leejirte Yeesso yuubisso harrati sesseehto ichoow wihi tuummane yitah agarte ka, weyti nahte, “Rumanka usu Weeli Waakhe eheet,” tidah.
40027055	Deyyehoti ittaawe intaas a kijirte, fogaka a 'dey'doossa. Icho Yeesso boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kasooraaheene 'dee gargaaraan.
40027056	Goycho ka a Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala, ichoow Maariyati Yaakoobo ichoow Yuussuf desse ichoow abar yeele Sebedaayo.
40027057	Geleb ka makhaabaloo kamurenye ilkerengeetti Arima'daaya magahiis Yuussuf layadeehe, ullaka abatti Yeesso yitah yimiy.
40027058	Yuussuf Bilaato iirte, sar Yeesso daahe. Bilaato amur bahche a lasiicho, yidah.
40027059	Yuussuf sar Yeesso khaate, dafartoo husub kaayyuube.
40027060	Go'ddoo daddaabeete husube us isikhute goya kareeche. Daddaabtoo buure la go'd afiche i'dembeleeliye, katabe.
40027061	Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala ichoow Maariyati addan ba intaase fiddiyaane, go'ddaas 'dey'doochaan.
40027062	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho, Ibeenki Latannabti 'dubiise ka, kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Farissaayo ba Bilaato iirteen.
40027063	Wihi icho yidaaheen, “Eti weenoow, wihi etaas ekkeysi leh geeddi us noolyahe yidah a kasoo'hella. Us mehe yidah ya, ‘Chirri maan seyyahe kutte, omoot a kasookaha.’
40027064	'Deerka amur bihiche, go'ddi lakahawwaale a layaakhicho, ichoowka ibeenki seyyahnaatteet a yitaahe. Uus abattitiis iranne sartiis hatine, 'dee 'doo'd ‘Yeesso omoot a kasookahe,’ idowinee. Chi'che i'daas yeesse, ekkeysihicheki toolla, koo Yeesso laka a kuta.”
40027065	Bilaato wihi us ilaabe, “Iskarti yaakhisso khaata. Irda go'd geeddi atin tabuu'diin yaakhicha.”
40027066	'Deerka irteene daddaabti go'd lakoote wohoo usu lafure lakaabti kadagcheene, iskarti yaakhisso la ibahcheen.
40028001	Inkoo Seeri Lanaso kute, baryoti ibeenki oraate teebataas ka, Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala ichoow Maariyati addan irteene, go'ddi Yeesso lakahawwaale sooyeyeen.
40028002	Harra weyti sesseehte, a mehe hertoo Kamur goobi Waakhe katimiyye go'd iratte, daddaab 'dembeleeliite, daddaab sarche koorrommatte.
40028003	Herta fooliche i'di ankhad u a ababa, darfohiche la a waha dakhane i'di yooleete.
40028004	Iskarti meel yuubisso Herta Waakh karoorte nahtim ka hamarte sussuuhte.
40028005	Herti Waakh wihi iche deyyeho itidah, “Roorro akhabina! A mehe saggi atin Yeessohi goorat massalaaba lakakaahe iyowattaan a gardaa.
40028006	Inta ma kijiro, i'di goorat us yidah u, omoot a kasookahe. Kaaleya, inti goorat us jiife yeya.
40028007	'Deerka dowwa irda, abattitiis mehe itadeehiin ya, ‘Us omoot a kasookahe, ortiin ili Gaalilaaya a irta. Intaas ka la a agartaan.’ Toolla an a atin isoocheeke.”
40028008	'Deerka oboorri usuhi roorro khabo i'daasenyi hamaado go'd kabahe, oryeen abattitiissa icheekaanee.
40028009	Chirraas on Yeesso icho 'hele, “Waakh ba nebey atin kakaala,” iyidah. Icho la soonyaameene, luhlohiis khabteene, usu wahteen.
40028010	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us icho iyidah, “Roorro akhabina! Nyaama 'doo'di irummeeste wihi atin itadeehiin, ‘Gaalilaaya irda, intaas ka 'dee a iagartaan.’ ”
40028011	Oboorri 'dulaayi, iskarti kootte hawwaal yaakhisso ilkerengeet goya iratte, kuhaaniyyohi wewween wihi yitah tuumman icheekte.
40028012	Kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud ba tossateene, iskar chasteene, chilimmeti buure siicheen.
40028013	Wihi icho iyidaaheen, “'Doo'd mehe itadeehiin ya, ‘Abatti Yeesso ibeen u'durraayi timiyye sartiis hatte!’
40028014	Chirri gaafana waha daage la, uus 'dee sina atin kawaarinne, nahe yeed tuumman haagginna, atin ribna.”
40028015	Iskare 'deerka chilimme khaatte, wihi kootte yeela liiyidah yeesse. Yeedaas beenaate sartiisti lahate miinsan la ichoow uliba laka, yaafohi Ya'huud goyaka a sohta.
40028016	Abattiti tomon ichoow koowe iratte hali goorat Yeesso boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ka idowdowe iratte.
40028017	Chirri icho usu argeen ka, usu wahteene, i'daasenyi gaasichokoo usu kamalaleen.
40028018	Yeesso la icho iyimiyye wihi us iyidah, “Serey ichoow harra ka anto tuumman a liisiiche.
40028019	Maantaka nyaama 'doo'di harra tuumman abattiteey kayeela. Magah Aabba ka ichoow ki Weel ka ichoow ki Rubeyti Munyee ka baattissiya.
40028020	Toro la amuri tuummane an atin ibahche abcha a raaheen. Rumanka la an a atin leejira ichoowka ibeenki 'da'ddaboot yateeh.”
41001001	Waha a uumacchoti Wori Haaggane, Yeesso Kiriistohi Weeli Waakhe miinsan.
41001002	Wihi Isaayahi Waákh íyeyyeedo chiire kallaayo, “Yeya, ergattiteey ortaahha erga iche rubeyohi enenyete tannabissa.
41001003	Ergattita la hidaade karirriirta, ‘Kamur jit imujjummoocha, jiti us leeyamiit ficcha,’ iche elatta.”
41001004	'Deerka Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo hidaad yimiyye wori baattissiyo cheeke. Us enenyete baattissiye uskeelicho kasoonokhtaane, 'dee Waakh uskeelicho ikakuta.
41001005	Enenyet boroofenhi Ya'huudiya tuumman ichoow ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem tuumman ka soobahe, Yoohana iyimiy. Eti tuummane uskeeliis Waakh icheekte la, Yoohana hawti Yoordane 'dusso ka baattissiye.
41001006	Yoohana gaaddi us khabe tinti gaale lakahaaggiche. Saabi us dabar kakhabe la niibe lakahaaggiche. Gololi us yuhum la a gubaal ichoow malab.
41001007	Wori us orey on cheeke a kan, “Etoo ani weyti ikaween 'dubeey ka a yamiit. An walah an ahe mele, gulguubsanaanki an gulguubsadi an falfihi kobtiis laka jalkhicho ma mu'dan.
41001008	Ani toolla bicche atin kabaattissiya, i'daasenyi us berri Rubeyti Munyee ka a atin baattissiya.”
41001009	Saahka Yeesso ilkerengeetti Naasaret layadeehe, boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kijirto kayimiyye, Yoohana la hawti Yoordane 'dusso ka usu baattissiye.
41001010	Chirra Yeesso bicche goya kasoobaho, sereyti kharradde Rubeyti Munyee la i'di kutukuurrug u isooyagto arge.
41001011	Hooyoo serey kasooyeede, wihi us yidah, “Ati a Weeleeyki an weyti 'doono, weyti ikahamaadicho.”
41001012	Chirraas on Rubeyti Munyee Yeesso hidaad ieregte.
41001013	Ibeen tomon affar Yeesso hidaaddaas on kijire, Seytaan la kajmeti uskeel kalugu'ddo ikeene. Hidaaddaas ka binahi yibaat on leejire, herti Waakh la Yeesso ihisse.
41001014	Inkoo Yoohana jeela lagesse ka, Yeesso boroofenhi Gaalilaaya irte. Intaas ka, Wori Haaggane Waakh kayimiy on cheeka.
41001015	Wihi us yidah, “Il kola a yitah! Dakhi Waakh kola a soodowwaate! Uskeeliin kasoonokhda, Wora Haaggane ani atin idowo rummeesda!”
41001016	Yeesso Beyti Buurenye Gaalilaaya afiche kasohtaayi, eti Siimon layadeeh ichoow walaaliiski Andereeya layadeeh, arge. Oroohti bahag lakakhabti, iche bey goya isaate, a mehe iche hiliche a ki bahag lakhabti.
41001017	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Kaaleya, isooraaha abattiteey ateeha, hiloo husube enenyet Waakh liikeeno a atin korcho.”
41001018	Chirraas on oroohti kootte iche bahag kakhabatti 'diisse, Yeesso raahte.
41001019	Yeesso i'daaru marah on orey isohte, Yaakoobohi inam Sebedaayee ichoow walaaliiski Yoohana layadeeh ichehi kooban goya fiddiito, oroohti bahag lakakhabti haagsatti arge.
41001020	Chirraas on lammache wahe, iche la aabbahiche ichoow 'doo'di lakireeste kooban goya katabte Yeesso raahte.
41001021	Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hum irteen. Saahka Seeri Lanaso ka, Yeesso minki weysiite Ya'huud gele, enenyet wori Waakh abin sookhabte.
41001022	Enenyet tuummamba saggi usu 'doo'd walah iabcho, kagirmeeste, a mehe i'di tagaammeti amurre menye, i'di etoo anto khabo, iche 'doo'd walah iabche.
41001023	Chirraas on etoo ginnatoo dakhatti minkichoki weysiit kijire riire,
41001024	“Wooy! Yeessohi Naasaret, ati mehe nah ka'doonta?” yidah. “Nahe nah massin timiy? Ani alah eti at tahe a garda, at a Ki Munyeenye Waakh kayimiy!”
41001025	Yeesso ginna leejaakhe, “Gammadiche, etaas goya kasoobah!” iyidah.
41001026	Ginnataas chirraakka etaas kafadisse, riirte, et kasoobahte.
41001027	Enenyet tuumman girmeeste. “Waha i'dee a mehe?” isworsate. “A yeedi husube, toro anto khabo! Ginnayyo laka amur on ibahcha, icho la yeediis raahaan.”
41001028	Wori usu miinsan dowwa on boroofenhi Gaalilaaya tuumman kataa'he.
41001029	Uun icho minki weysiit kabaheen, Yaakoobo ichoow Yoohana khabaayi, irteene ichoowka min is Andereeya ichoow Siimon geleen.
41001030	Seyyoh Siimon la sare kululaatta, siriire kajiifta. Chirraas on Yeesso saggi araarri ikhannanyahe liicheeke.
41001031	Ulla irte, dahan sookhabte, sootoolliche. Lakabukkhe iche la icho goollin sookhabatte.
41001032	Gelebtaas, inkoo orrahe dihte ka, enenyet 'doo'di khakkhannan ichoow ki ginna dakhatti tuumman ba Yeesso ikeene.
41001033	Ilkerengeet tuumman soobahte, min afiis buuhisse.
41001034	Yeesso la 'doo'di ittaawenye sugeerreti yeerare khabo samaache. 'Doo'di ittaawenye ginnayyo dakhtaan laka, ginnayyo kabahche. I'daasenyi ginnayyo amuri icho kasooyeedaan tirte, a mehe eti usu yahe a garteenee.
41001035	Yeesso baryoti booran ka kahe, min kabahe, inti enenyet ikijirin irte, weeste.
41001036	Siimon ichoow wahalhiis ba irteene, usu yowteen.
41001037	Chirri icho 'heleen ka, wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Enenyet tuumman ati kiyowta.”
41001038	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Kaaleya, intoo addan a iranni, i'di maanta ilkerengeetohi soodow a iranni, 'dee Yeedi Waakh a cheeko. An alah wahaase iimiy.”
41001039	'Deerka boroofenhi Gaalilaaya tuumman goya kasohte, Yeedi Waakh minassichoki weysiite Ya'huud ka cheeke, 'doo'di ginnayyo dakhtaan la ginnayyo kabahche.
41001040	Saahka etoo bu'datoo uskul sar kasoofoofte Yeesso iyimiy. Ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dde, hawwaaste, wihi us yidah, “Chirri at 'doonto, at bi'dir ibihin a tabuu'd.”
41001041	Yeesso etaas weyti uur isoonugleeste, dahan ooge et 'daare, wihi us iyidah, “A 'doona, bi'dir bah!”
41001042	Chirraas on bu'dati kootte etaas sar kasoofoofte baabaate, et samaate.
41001043	Yeesso chirraas on et erge, weyti tootooche wihi us iyidah,
41001044	“Etoo kalday laka jit ka aleeyeedine, i'daasenyi kuhaani iiro saggi at isamaatte istus. Sadakhati amurre Muusa kachiirane eti bu'da lakabahche bahcho bihiche, 'dee garti saggi lakisamaache a titaahe.”
41001045	I'daasenyi etaas irte, enenyet tuumman yeedaas icheeke, woraas taa'hiche. Yeesso saahka jeentetaas u chi' laargo ilkerengeet gelin ma yabuu'd, i'daasenyi hidaad on fiddiya. Eheetteey laka, enenyet Yeesso ma 'diicho, 'dollo tuumman ka a iyamiit on.
41002001	Inkoo ibeennetoo kutte, Yeesso ilkerengeetohi Kafarnaa'hum isoonokhte. 'Doo'd saggi us goob iyimiy daage.
41002002	'Doo'di buure kulme, min goya inti lagelo lawaaye, min afafhiis ka laka meel lawaaye. Yeesso la Yeedi Waakhe 'doo'd icheeke.
41002003	'Doo'doo affare la, etoo khannane sar tuumman hanjaawte iche Yeesso ikeene.
41002004	Jeenteti urur buur iyahuu saggi iche Yeesso ikageesso waayte. Min sartiis korte, inti Yeesso toollo sartiis alohoo doobbo kabihisse. Ilaali et kajiifo il iwoyte, ichoowka Yeesso ortiis tissil.
41002005	Chirri Yeesso saggi 'doo'daas usu ikakhuufo arge ka, wihi us etaas sare hanjaawte iyidah, “Inankaaw, uskeelaah a liikaakute.”
41002006	Tagaammetoo amurre la intaase fiddiita. Wihi icho uuricho ka essaan,
41002007	“Eta mehe i'daas kayadeeh? Wahaas gaf menya? Ayyo addane enenyet uskeeliis ikakuta, Waakh on menye?”
41002008	Chirraas on Yeesso uuriis ka wihi icho uuricho goyaka dowtaan garte, wihi us makhaaballetaas iyidah, “Mehede malassi i'daase idowattaan?
41002009	Mehe maanta ki addan ka'dabakhe, chirri an eta sare hanjaawte, ‘Uskeelaah a liikaakute,’ iadeeh a ommos usuhi an, ‘Kah ilaalaah okhso, soho,’ iadeeh?
41002010	I'daasenyi saggi Ínam Aadam antohi us harrata ka enenyet uskeel ikakuto ikhabo a abattaan.” Wihi us eti sare hanjaawte iyidah,
41002011	“Tolosso, ilaalaah okkhiche, goob iro!”
41002012	Et tolossate, ilaal okhsate enenyet tuumman 'dey'doochaayi bahe. Icho tuumman la girmeesteene, Waakh koolicheene wihi icho yidaaheen, “Inno injire wihi i'dee ma argin.”
41002013	Yeesso toro beyti Gaalilaaya afiche irte, ururoo buure la intaas ka iyimiyye, ulla wori Waakh abche.
41002014	Toro orey isohte, etoo Laawi layadeehe koo Alfaayee arge. Laawi meessi kooddi lakagoocho goya fiddiya. Yeesso, “Isooraahe, abattiteey ateeh,” Laawi iyidahye, Laawi la kahe usu raahe.
41002015	Saahka Yeesso min Laawi kagolossataayi, 'doo'doo kooddi goocho ittaawe ichoow 'doo'doo 'doo'di uskeel leh liiekkaacho ittaawe yimiyye, Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba leegolossate. A mehe 'doo'di buurenye usu sooraahe.
41002016	Tagaammeti amurre iche laka Farissaayee la, Yeessohi 'doo'di i'daase leegolossati agarte. Wihi iche abatti Yeesso worsatte, “Yeesso a i'doh 'doo'di kooddi goocho ichoow ki uskeel leh ileegolossata?”
41002017	Yeesso la chirri us wihi icho essaan daage ka wihi us iyidah, “'Doo'di ilkitárri yowti ki feffeyyan menye, i'daasenyi a ki khakkhannan. 'Doo'di an iimiyye an waho, ki 'doo'di fiffissan isiekkaacho menye, i'daasenyi a ki uskeel leh.”
41002018	Maantoo abatti Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo ichoow Farissaayo af hiitaane jirte. 'Doo'doo la yimiyye, wihi us Yeesso worsate, “A i'doh abatti Yoohana ichoow too Farissaayo af ihiitaane, abattitaah la af ihidan?”
41002019	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Doo'di mindischo yimiy af ma hiiti geeddi eti min disti intaas kijiro, menya? Geeddi eti min disti on leejiro af ma hiitaan.
41002020	I'daasenyi maane a tamiit, ti 'doo'd eti min disti lakakhaato. Maantaase 'dee 'doo'd af hiita.”
41002021	Yeesso la yeed orey iwoye, wihi us yidah, “Et goonankoo dafareete husub gaaddiisti raagane kharradde kadaddabo mele. Chirri us i'da yeele, goonankaas husub a isinyaama gaaddi raagan la kharradiche orey isohta geeddi oraat laka kuta.
41002022	Ommolla et farsoti sabiibe husub urgohi uktoote raagan kachibo mele. Chirri i'da layeele farso urgo a fuurissa doossa, farso lawaaya urgo laka lawaaya. I'daasenyi farsoti sabiibe husub urgohi uktoote husub on lakachiba.”
41002023	Maalinkoo Seeri Lanasee Yeesso abattitiis khabaayi gosase goya raaha. Geedda icho 'dulaan, abattitiis ilmohoo 'dargaayye guratte.
41002024	Farissaayo wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Yey, abattitaah a i'doh Seeri Lanaso ka wihi amurre 'dii'ddantahe iyeessa?”
41002025	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Atin injire wihi Dawuud yeele maanti usu ichoow 'doo'di us khabe ba raarahteen Yeedi Waakh ka ma soomin a?
41002026	Maanti Abiyaa'dar kuhaanihi weyti ween eheet, Dawuud uranti minki Waakhe gele, makaateti Waakh liibahche yuhuyye, toro reeri leejire laka wohoo siiche. Amurreti laraaho ka la kuhaaniyyo kaldaye makaatetaas yaham.”
41002027	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us ilaabe, “Seeri Lanaso iroonoti enenyete liiyeele, enenyet mee Seeri Lanaso liiyeele.
41002028	'Deerka Ínam Aadam a Kamuri Seeri Lanaso laka.”
41003001	Yeesso toro minki weysiite Ya'huud gele. Etoo dahane hanjaawte la intaas a kijire.
41003002	Chiiy Yeesso too intaas goya kijirta, wohoo icho Yeesso kacheektaane yowtaane, 'deerka usu Yeesso Seeri Lanaso ka etaas samaacho 'dey'doocheen.
41003003	Yeesso wihi us eti dahane hanjaawte iyidah, “Enenyet tuumman ortiis tolosso!”
41003004	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us icho worsate, “Seeri Lanaso ka, wihi haaggane layeelo ichoow suujoonki layeelo koh amurreteen israahaan? Jiroti enenyete laribo israahaan bal enenyeti layagiis?” I'daasenyi gammadicheen.
41003005	Yeesso hol ka indo leeraahe toro weyti uur suujowe, matahmiigticho ka. Et, “Dahantaah fiti!” iyidahye, et dahan ficche, dahane toro tuum haagsatte.
41003006	'Deerka Farissaayo bahte, 'doo'd 'Herood iiratte, chirraas on jiti icho Yeesso kayagiisiin kamasseen.
41003007	Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba intaas katabeene, beyti Gaalilaaya afiche irteene, 'doo'di ittaawenye boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kayimiy la raahe.
41003008	Wihi us yeelo ladaage, enenyeti ittaawe ili Ya'huudiya ichoow ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ichoow ili Idumeeya ichoow ili Yoordan berihiise ichoow ilassi ilkerengeetohi Tiiro ichoow Siidon tuumman kayimiy.
41003009	Jeenteti urur ibuuraatuu, abattitiis koobanhoo us koro, 'dee goya katolossati, urur iskalaabo daahe.
41003010	A mehe enenyeti buurenye samaache, 'deerka 'doo'di khakkhannan tuumman a issootakha, Yeesso 'daarin 'doonaa.
41003011	'Doo'di ginnayyo dakhtaan chirbaaw ginnayyohaas Yeesso argeen, inkaanyit ka ortiis ka il a gu'ddaane riiraane, “Ati Weeli Waakhe!” yadeehiin.
41003012	I'daasenyi amur ibahche uus icho eti us yahe cheekin.
41003013	Yeesso irte burroo kore, 'doo'di us 'doono isiwahe, icho la usu iyimaateen.
41003014	Et tomon ichoow lamma soobahsate, ergaanotiis kayeesse 'dee usu leejirta, toro leergata Yeedi Waakh cheekta.
41003015	Toro la antohi iche ginnayyo laka enenyet kabihisso siiche.
41003016	Reeri tomon ichoow lammeenye us soobahsate a kan, Siimon magahi us ibahche a Beetero,
41003017	Yaakoobohi inam Sebedaayee ichoow walaaliiski Yoohana layadeeh. Icho la magahi us ibahche a Bowwanerge. I'daakka la mehe leessa ya, “Yeeleti Karkaraho.”
41003018	Reeri addan la a Andereeya, Fiilif, Bar'dolomaayo, Mattaayo, Toomas, inam Alfaayo ki Yaakoobo layadeeh, 'Da'daayo, Siimonhi magahiis Yaaftiis'doone layadeeh,
41003019	ichoow Yuuda Iskaariyoot, ki yomboka Yeessó 'dub gooche.
