41003020	Yomboka Yeesso minki us fiddiyo isoonokhte, urur la buuraate, ichoowka usu ichoow abattitiis saggi icho igolossataan laka waayeen.
41003021	Chirri abartiis ichoow walaalinyetiis daageen ka yimaateen, goobe geechaanee. I'di tahe mehe essaan ya, “Us a sirgowe.”
41003022	Tagaammeti amurre la ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme katimiyye, mehe elatta ya, “Beelsebuule dakhta alah! Miigti karnati ginnayyoote enenyet ginna kabahcha.”
41003023	Yeesso 'deerka 'doo'd wahe, mammaho ka leeyyeede, “Seytaan saggoh Seytaan ibahcha?
41003024	Yaafe chirri iche seley goote, geed iche fiddiito mele.
41003025	Minki seley gowe, isdiho geed us fiddiyo mele.
41003026	Seytaan laka, chirri usu on isikahe seley goggowe, geed us fiddiyo mele, a baaba.
41003027	Rumanka et minki etoo miige gelo meehiis hato mele sammata us koloo etaas miige ihidhidin. 'Deerka chirraase minkiis hata.
41003028	Runti an atin icheeko, enenyet uskeeliis tuumman ichoow gaf tuumman laka a liikakuta on.
41003029	I'daasenyi eti Rubeyti Munyee igafe, jirtuu uskeeliis ma liikakuto. Uskeeli u' gele, a ki jirtuu laka imassan.”
41003030	Wihi us 'doo'daas i'daas ikayidah, a jeenteti icho “Usu ginna dakhatta!” iessaan.
41003031	Abartiis ichoow walaalinyetiis 'deerka yimaateene, khar tolossateen. Farniin ergeene 'dee Yeesso a liisoowaho.
41003032	Ururi kootte Yeesso khaariche fiddiyo la, wihi icho Yeesso iyidaaheen, “Abartaah ichoow walaalinyetaah a kiyowtaane, kallaayo khar ka.”
41003033	Wihi us worsate, “Kamalda bal, abarteey ichoow walaalinyeteey a ayyo illeh?”
41003034	'Doo'da fiddiyo khaariche yeye, “Yeya, abarteey ichoow walaalinyeteey kallaayo.
41003035	A mehe eti tuummane wihi Waakh 'doono yeelo, a walaalaaya, a walaassaaya, a abartaaya,” iyidah.
41004001	Yeesso toro beyti Gaalilaaya afiche ka, Wori Haaggan enenyet abche. Jeenteti ururi weyti buure iyimiy u, Yeesso koobanhoo goya koorronte, enenyet la bey afiche khaariche, dagansate.
41004002	Enenyet mammaho ka wihi buure abche, wihi us yidah,
41004003	“Dagansada bal! Etoo gos khabo a irte ilmo harra kachibaa.
41004004	Ilmoha us taa'hicho, gaasoo jit goya kadiheene, chimbiro la yimaateene, yumheen.
41004005	Gaasoo ilassi ng'aajjeenye harrati rucchul khabto kadiheen. Wahaas dowwa on soobaheen, a mehe harra rucchulee.
41004006	I'daasenyi chi' orrahe soobahte ka, orrahe geeyohaas soobahe gubte. Hiiyyaye laa yihiin gone, angageen.
41004007	Gaasoo laka inti geeyohi rurrucchule kudah khabo kadiheen. Geeyohaas la geeyohi soobahe afcheene 'deerka gurnaan icho deleen mele.
41004008	Gaasoo la inti harrati haaggan khabto kadiheene, mujjum baheene, weynaateene, gurnaan deleen. Gaasoo kol tomon seyyah deleene, gaasoo kol tomon lih deleene, gaasoo laka kol kudoo deleen.”
41004009	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us yidah, “Eti dogo khabo, a daago gi'de!”
41004010	Yeesso inkoo us keley yitah, ergaanotiisti tomon ichoow lammee ichoow 'doo'doo usu sooraahe iyimiyye, wihi mammahohaas yihiin worsateen.
41004011	“Waakh atine wihi dagsane dakhi Waakh miinsan atin siiche. I'daasenyi 'doo'di kharaat walah tuumman ka a liimammahta,
41004012	'deerka, “ ‘Walah a yeyaane, yeyaane, i'daasenyi jirtuu ma gelaan. Toro la a dagansataane, dagansataane, i'daasenyi jirtuu ma abtaan. Chi'iche i'daas ieheynan, uskeelicho a kasoonokhanne, Waakh la uskeelicho ikakuta.’”
41004013	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us icho iyidah, “Chirri atin mammahta wihi iche tahe igaran, sag 'deerka atin mammahohi addan wihicho iabattaan mele gon.
41004014	Etaas gos khabo, a eti Yeedi Waakh taa'hicho.
41004015	'Doo'd gaasoo a i'di ilmohi jit lakachibe. Waha a inti Yeedi Waakh lakataa'hicho. Uus icho Yeedi Waakh daagaan, Seytaan chirraas on yamiite, yeedaas icho daageen kakhaata.
41004016	'Doo'd gaasoo la, a i'di ilmohi ilassi ng'aajjeenye harrati rucchul khabto lakachibe. Yeedi Waakh uun icho daagaan, hamaadi buure ka khaattaan.
41004017	I'daasenyi hiiyyay icho khabaan mele, mujjum ma tolossataan. Maanti jeenteti Yeedi Waakh u sinatoo isoobahte ommos sina loomhiche, dowwa on soodihaan.
41004018	'Doo'd gaasoo a i'di ilmohi inti geeyohi kudah khabto lakachibe. Icho Yeedi Waakh a daagaane,
41004019	i'daasenyi dowwa on wa'dwaa'di harrata ichoow 'damaanki kamurroon ichoow wahanyeyyohi addane liimoono ba Yeeda afchaane, gurnaan icho delaan mele.
41004020	'Doo'd gaasoo a i'di ilmohi harrati haaggan lakachibe. Icho Yeedi Waakh a daagaane toro khaattaane, gurnaanki buure delaan. Gaasoo kol tomon seyyah delaane, gaasoo la kol tomon lih delaane, gaasoo la kol kudoo delaan.”
41004021	Toro wihi Yeesso iyidah, “Etoo taa a bolkhicha, 'dee baakhuul kaankuba ommos siriir iliche gessa? Taa wohoo menya korcho?
41004022	A mehe wihi dagsan a lasoobahcha, wihi oboobsan la 'dowe liisoobahcha.
41004023	Chi' etoo dogo khabo, a daago gi'de!”
41004024	Toro wihi us iyidah, “Waha atin daagtaan la, weyti dagansada. Geeddi atin 'doo'di addan iyeessaan geeddaase atin liiyeela, toro la 'dirihiis atin liiyeela.
41004025	Eti tuummane wihi dahan lagesse mujjum woywoye a liikakhaya. I'daasenyi eti wihi dahan lagesse mujjum iwoywoyin, wihi us khabo laka a lakakhaata.”
41004026	Yeesso toro imammahte, wihi us iyidah, “Mammahtoo addane dakhi Waakh cheekto talla. Etoo ilmohi golole il gessa, kataba.
41004027	Maalim ichoow ibeen us u'duryeey ommos neybaayyeey ka ba, ilime a bahta one weynaatta, chu'us saggi iche ibahto igaran laka.
41004028	Harra on gurnaan bihissa, kolooraat la geeye bihissa, geeyaas 'deerka ilim dela.
41004029	Uu' gurnaan bissaati on yamiite warhanti gurnaan lakagoocho ka goocha, a mehe a maanti gurnaanee.”
41004030	Toro mehe iyidah ya, “Kamalda bal, dakhi Waakh a koo meheenye nadeeh? Toro la mammahtoh i'di u' yahe dowdowta?
41004031	Dakhi Waakh a i'di ilinti geeyi dahare, iche la ilmo goyaka a ilinti weyti rucchule il lagesso.
41004032	Maanti il lagesse iche soobahte la, gos goyaka geeyi geeyo tuumman kabuurenye liikhimohi burbuure khabo tateeh. Chimbirohi saraat la oosintiis kafiddiyaan.”
41004033	Yeesso mammahohi ittaawenye tan iyoog ka, wori Waakh geeddi icho aban yabuu'diin icheeke.
41004034	Enenyet mammah on menye, wohoo addan walah ma kaabin. I'daasenyi maanti icho keley yahiin, abattitiis mammahohaas wihi icho yahiin a icheeke.
41004035	Maalinkaas geleb ka, Yeesso abattitiis, “Beyta Gaalilaaya maahno, aficheki 'diri a iranni,” iyidah.
41004036	Abatti Yeesso i'diis yahaayi khaatte kooban kaleedihte, dowte, urur bey afichekaas katabte. Koobanohoo addan laka kicho a leejireen.
41004037	Hafaroo buure la yimiyye bicche irtoo uskul bahcheene, kooban 'dollo jaheene, ichoowka bicche kooban goya isootabeene, buuhin leheet.
41004038	Yeesso la kootte reentoo 'da'ddabakhenye matah gessate, kooban 'dubichekuus ka a ur'da. Abatti Yeesso kihisse wihi iche itidah, “Eti weenoow, innoha bicche inno khaataan laka aw ma inno ikhabto ba?”
41004039	Ulla sookahe, hafar leejaakhe, ir “Gammadicha! Yaasa!” iyidah. Hafari kootte ir kahcho, baabe beye rukkuy goosse.
41004040	Wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “A i'doh i'duu ibur'dowteen? Atin uliba Waakh ma kakhuuftaan a?”
41004041	Iche tuumman weyti nahte, wihi iche isworsatte, “Icho eta a ayyo? Hafar ichoow ire laka yeediis daagaan?”
41005001	Beyti Gaalilaaya aficheki 'diri eleeleen. Wahaas a ili ilkerengeetohi Geraasa layadeeh kijiro.
41005002	Chirri Yeesso kooban kasooyage ka, etoo ginna dakhatti, go'ddassi enenyet lakahawwaalo kasoobahe, usu 'hele.
41005003	Eta fiddihiis a go'ddassaas hawwaaloot on. Ét biingoyyo ka laka jeyin yabuu'd mele.
41005004	A mehe biingoyyo luhlo ichoow dahano geeddi buure lakahidhida, i'daasenyi kol dakkhan biingoyyohaas goggooche, ga'daarreti luhlo lakahide laka bar tire. Et miigti jeyisso khabo mele.
41005005	Maalim ichoow ibeen ba go'ddassaas hawwaaloot ka, ichoow kuro ka riirit a tuma, dagah laka sar iskagoggoocha.
41005006	Chirri us Yeesso foga kaarge ka, soonyaame, ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dde wahte.
41005007	Deeddi us yabuu'd dakkhan riire, “Yeesso, weeli Waakkhi weynaan tuumman tiis tahe, at mehe ika'doonta? Magahi Waakh ka daato, bolokh iitusin!”
41005008	A mehe Yeesso chirraas mehe idowa ya, “Ginnata, eta goya kabah!”
41005009	Yeesso 'deerka, “Magahaah a ayyo?” worsate. Wihi us ilaabe, “Magaheey a Ururi Iskareet, a mehe nah a ittaawee.”
41005010	Yeessó hahhawwaaste, uus icho ilaas kaguurin.
41005011	Woyhoo buurenye golcha la, burroo intaas idow, iche tahariis yaakha.
41005012	Ginnayyo Yeesso hawwaasteene, “Golcha goya nah i'dii! Alley goyche a gello!” iyidaaheen.
41005013	Yeesso amur siiche, ginnayyo golcha goya itabeen. Woyhi golcha geeddi elif lammee, orye bur kakhubte, beyti Gaalilaaya goya itabe, usu tuumman ba bicche khaateen.
41005014	'Doo'di golcha yaakhicho orye, ilkerengeet ichoow ilaas tuumman ka wihi yitah cheeke. Enenyet la soobahe wihi yitahye yeyaa.
41005015	Chirri 'doo'd Yeesso iyamiit, eti ginnayyohi ittaawe dakhteen usuhi samacchaar fiddiyo, darfo mujjum gessate matah la haagsate argeen. Enenyet roorro gesse.
41005016	'Doo'di kootte wihi yitah arge la, wihi eti ginnayyo dakhteen ichoow golcha kayitah 'doo'di addan icheeke.
41005017	'Doo'd 'deerka Yeesso hawwaaste, 'dee ilicho a katabo.
41005018	Chirri Yeesso kooban goya kidiho, etaas kootte ginnayyo dakhteen Yeesso hawwaaste, usuhi raaho daahe.
41005019	I'daasenyi Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “Mele, nyaam goobaah iro, geeddi Kamuraah kiyeele, ichoow saggi us uur ikaasoonugleeste, 'doo'daah icheek.”
41005020	Et 'deerka irte, Dekaabolis goya tabe, geeddi Yeesso iyeele cheeke. Eti daage tuumman weyti girmeeste.
41005021	Inkoo Yeesso kooban ka toro bey afichekuus imaahe ka, bey hagga kijiraayi ururi buure kasoourure.
41005022	'Deerka etoo 'doo'di minassi weysiite Ya'huud itoollo kichokoowenye Yaayiro layadeeh intaas yimiy. Yeesso arge, luhlohiis kakufe,
41005023	hawwaaste, “Inanteeyti rucchul a omoot. A kihawwaasde, kaale dahan ka'daare, 'dee a samaatti jiro a 'hesso,” iyidah.
41005024	Yeesso 'deerka makhaábal raahe. Enenyeti buure laka raahe, 'dollohiis tuumman ka enenyet a ishude.
41005025	Ururaas goyaka la makhaabassoo khannane gu'h tomon ichoow lamma ba hugunkiche tolossawwaaye, diig on 'dulo a jirta.
41005026	Chirri iche ilkitarrinyeti ittaawe iiratte sina tuhum laka, a samaawwaayte. Wihi iche khabte tuumman massisse toro ma deefsanne, a ka'darsatte on.
41005027	Chirri iche Yeesso woriis daagte ka, 'dubiis leetimiyye urur goyaka kabuu'diis 'daarte.
41005028	Uuriche goyaka, “Chirri an gaaddiissa on 'daare, a samaada,” iche tidah.
41005029	Chirraas on diiggi 'dulo tolossate, sartiche ka saggi sinatiche liikabukkhiche agarte.
41005030	Chirraas on Yeesso saggi miige sar ikabahte abte, urur goyaka urgiye, “Ayyo gaaddeey 'daare?” worsate.
41005031	Abattitiis la wihi iche ilaabte “At saggi 'doo'd isisootakho a agarta, i'daasenyi ‘Ayyo i'daare?’ worsatta.”
41005032	I'daasenyi Yeesso enenyet indo leeraahe, eti 'daare yowte.
41005033	Makhaabale 'deerka wihi kayitah agarte, ichehi roorro ka hamarto timiyye, ortiis ka il gu'dubte, rum tuumman icheekte.
41005034	Ulla wihi us iyidah, “Inantaay, kakhuufnaanki at ikakhuufte a kisamaache gone, tab gi'de nebey leeiro, sinati sugeer kikeene a lakasamaachee.”
41005035	Yeesso yeedaas af kakhabaayi, 'doo'doo goob Yaayirohi minki weysiit itoollo kayimiyye wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Weel a massate. A i'doh uliba eti ween immarah sina ikawaarissa?”
41005036	Yeesso la wahaas icho essaan nabah laka ma isudine, eti minki weysiite Ya'huud itoollo wihi us iyidah, “Roorro akhabine, ani on irummeyso.”
41005037	Beetero ichoow Yaakoobo ichoow walaal Yaakoobohi Yoohana layadeehe us khaatte on menye, 'doo'di addan tuumman et us khaatte mele.
41005038	Chirri icho minki eti minki weysiit itoollo yimaateen ka, Yeesso saggi enenyet iriiro, iooyo, iuwwicho arge.
41005039	Min goya gele, enenyet mehe worsate ya, “A i'doh iriirtaane iuwwissaan? Weel ma umaatane, i'daasenyi a ur'da!”
41005040	I'daasenyi Yeesso kareyteen. Enenyet tuumman khar ibahche, weel abarche ichoow aabbahiche ichoow abattitiisti seyyahe khaatte, meessi weel jiifo geleen.
41005041	Inám dahan sookhabte, “Talii'da kuum!” iyidah. I'da ka mehe leessa ya, “Inantaay sookahe kidowa!”
41005042	Chirraas on sootolossatte sohatte. Iname la gu'h tomon ichoow lamma khabte. Enenyet uu' wahaas yitah arge, weyti girmeeste.
41005043	Yeesso la weyti katirriinsate amur ibahche, uus etoo kalday laka yeeda garan. Weel wohoo us yaham a lasiicho yidah.
41006001	Yeesso intaas katabe, ilkerengeetti goobicheenye Naasaret layadeeh irte, abattitiis khabaayi.
41006002	Seeri Lanaso ka, minki weysiite Ya'huud ka enenyet Yeedi Waakh abin sookhabte, enenyeti buurenye usu daage weyti girmeeste. Wihi icho worsateen, “Us eta waha tuumman inta us kaabte a intoh? Kharata deeddeenye lasiiche a toh? Saggoh waha weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan iyabuu'd?
41006003	Eta tagaanki kho'doomme diso menya? Maariya abartiis menya? Yaakoobo ichoow Yuuda, ichoow Yoosse, ichoow Siimon menya leedesse? Waha la albehi leedesse menya inno leejiro?” 'Doo'd la usu kahollowe.
41006004	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us icho iyidah, “Eti Waákh íyeyyeedo goobicho ka 'doo'di uuriise ichoow yaaftiis kalday on iinkaanyitin.”
41006005	'Doo'doo rucchule khakkhannane us dahan korche samaache on menye, wihi weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan intaakka yeelin ma ubaa'dan.
41006006	Ulla girmeeste icho ikakhuufinee. Yeesso 'deerka goobassi intaas kamarsan marche, Yeedi Waakh abche.
41006007	Abattitiis tomon ichoow lammacho ba isiwahe, lallamma ka ili kharaat ierge, antohi icho ginnayyo enenyet goya kabahchaan laka siiche.
41006008	Wihi us leefarme la a i'da, “Wul on menye, wohoo addan asi'danna. Golol ommos ugar ommos chilimme asi'danna.
41006009	Kobo gessada, ubbaari deere atin khabtaan on menye, koo addan agessanna.
41006010	Meelbaaw atin gessaan ka, minkaas on fiddiya ichoowka maanti atin ilkerengeettaas kabahtaan.
41006011	Meelbaaw atin liikamartiisanne ommos atin liidagansan, ebeeri luhlo atin fuulo sahda geedda atin bahtaan. Waha a garti ichó cheekatti.”
41006012	Abatti bahte, Yeedi Waakh cheekte, enenyet tuumman la, “Uskeeliin kasoonokhda,” itidah.
41006013	Ginnayyohi ittaawe enenyet goya kabihisse, 'doo'di ittaawenye khakkhannan laka subakki geeyi oolif ka matah subahte, samaasse.
41006014	Karnati 'Herood layadeeh la waha tuumman daage, a mehe magah Yeesso weyti ballaaste. Enenyet gaasoo mehe essa ya, “Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo iche omoot lakasookahche! Miigta i'deenye goytiis ka hil haaggisso, wihi enenyet iubaa'dan us yabuu'd, a jeentetaas on.”
41006015	'Doo'd gaasoo laka mehe essa ya, “Eta a Eliiya.” Gaasoo la mehe essa ya, “Eta a eti Waákh íyeyyeedo, a i'di makhaaballeti goorat Waakh iyeyyeeddo kichekoo.”
41006016	I'daasenyi 'Herood maanti us waha leessi daage ka, mehe yidah ya, “Yoohanahi goorat an matah gooche iche omoot lakasookahche!”
41006017	'Herood rubeytiissa 'doo'd erge, Yoohana lasookhabte, jeela ka lahide. A mehe 'Herood 'Heroodiyati makhaabál walaaliiski Fiilif layadeehe diste.
41006018	A mehe Yoohana mehe 'Herood idowe ya, “Amurre ichoow khaatannaanki at makhaabál walaalaah khaatatti ma israahaan.”
41006019	'Heroodiya 'deerka mogtaas Yoohana isi'datte, ogoos 'doonte. I'daasenyi ogoos ma tabuu'd,
41006020	a mehe 'Herood Yoohana karoora, saggi us etoo fissane toro munyee iyahe iche garta. A toorriba laka. Kolbaaw us Yoohana dagansate, mal la gela. I'daasenyi toro, weyti dagansan 'doona.
41006021	Saahka maane soomarte, ti 'Heroodiya 'doonte, a maalinki goorat 'Herood dessee. 'Herood 'doo'di sirgaaliis ka ichoow kiyatiis ka wewween, ichoow kamurreti Gaalilaaya magah khabto soowahe, sukuuku bahche.
41006022	Inám 'Heroodiya soogesse, 'durte karnat ichoow martitiis ba hamaadisse. Karnat wihi us inám iyidah, “Walahbaaw at 'doonto soodah amballa kisiichaa.”
41006023	Daarte, wihi us iyidah, “Walahbaaw at daahto a kisiicha, ichoowka nyuusi ili an andi laka.”
41006024	Iname khar ibahte, abarche mehe worsatte ya “Mehe maanta idaahe?” Abarche mehe ilaabte ya, “‘Matah Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo 'doona,’ dah.”
41006025	Iname chirraas on tiriyye, karnat iiratte wihi iche itidah, “Atihi matah Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo karam isookorisso, toolla kofche isiisso, iche 'doona.”
41006026	Karnat weyti uur suujowe. I'daasenyi jeenteti wihi us idaatte ichoow jeenteti martitiis u, wihi iname daahte usuhi tirti ma 'doonin.
41006027	Chirraas on 'deerka eti iskareete 'doo'di hidan yagiis erge, yeed kagu'dde matah Yoohana sookhaat iyidah. Eti iskareet la jeela irte Yoohana matah soogooche,
41006028	matah karam sookorche. Inám karam ikeene, iche la abarche siisse.
41006029	Chirri abatti Yoohana wihi yitah daagte ka, timiyye sartiis khaatte go'ddoo ka hawwaasse.
41006030	Maanti ergaano soonokhatte, iche ichoow Yeesso kulmeen ka, wihi iche yeesse ichoow wihi iche enenyet abisse tuumman icheekte.
41006031	'Deerka abattitiis wihi us iyidah, “Kaaleya, intoo khaawwan a iranni, 'dee atin laka i'daaru nasa.” Jeenteti 'doo'di yamiit ichoow ki nokhti ibuuraatuu, Yeesso ichoow ergaano ba sag icho igolossataan mele.
41006032	'Deerka keley kooban goya kidiheene, intoo khaawwan irteen.
41006033	I'daasenyi enenyeti buure maanti iche kahto arge, toro la eti icho yahiin garte. 'Doo'd la ilkerengeeto tuumman kasoobahe, luhlo on ka inti Yeesso illeh isohtaan ioryeene, geeddi kooban yomboochaan meel eleeleen.
41006034	Chirri beyti Gaalilaaya afiche ka Yeesso kooban kasooyage ka, urura buure arge. Weyti uur inugleeste, a mehe 'doo'daas a i'di iiyti ersim laa. 'Deerka wihi ittaawenye Waakh miinsan abinnaan sookhabte.
41006035	Geedda ka il a ibeennowe, abattitiis itimiyye, mehe itidah ya, “Il kola a ibeennowe, inta la a yib alah.
41006036	'Doo'd laabe, a irti gosasha ka, ichoow goobassi soodow ka, wohoo icho yamhiin a soogatteen.”
41006037	I'daasenyi wihi us ilaabe, “Atin rubeytiin wohoo icho yamhiin siicha.” Icho la wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Rumanka wahaas chilimmeti eti hay siyyeet hil haaggiche laguto khaataan! Nahi chilimmeti geeddaase golol ganno wihi icho yamhiin siinno 'doonta?
41006038	“Makaate geeddoh khabtaan?” worsate, “Nyaama bal yeya,” iyidah. Chirri iche abatte ka, “Makaate chan ichoow bahag lamma jirta,” tidah.
41006039	Yeesso 'deerka abattitiis amur ibahche, enenyet seley a goggoosso, koobbino ka hoosi ulhaw a koorronti.
41006040	Enenyet 'deerka kukkud ka ichoow tomon chacchan ka orronte.
41006041	Makaateyyohi chane ichoow bahaggi lammee khaate, serey yeye, Waakh kala'd ilaabe, makaateyyo la jejjebche. 'Deerka abattitiis idiibe, 'dee enenyet a gisso. Bahaggi lammee laka jejjebche icho tuumman gise.
41006042	Enenyet tuumman golossate, darge.
41006043	Abatti la enjel tomon ichoow lamma makaate ichoow bahaggi laajjebche lasoowaache buuhaan soosuunte.
41006044	Mejeli golossate, tiriis a geeddi alif chan.
41006045	Yeesso chirraas on abattitiis kooban gesse, geeddi us urur kahcho, iche la ortiis inti beyti Gaalilaaya afichekuusenye Bessaayda layadeehe iratta.
41006046	Inkoo us icho bariitiche ka, Yeesso burroo kore, Waakh wahte.
41006047	Chirri il gelebnowe ka, kooban bey ukkuricheeda raahaane, Yeesso la keley on meessi kootteet kijira.
41006048	Saggi abattitiis kho'doommeti kooban lakawoyo ka kooban downaan ileefaddo arge, a mehe hafare icho jeychaa. Geedda baryo kasoodowwaatte ka, Yeesso bey sarche kasohte, iirte, kakutin leheet.
41006049	I'daasenyi chirri iche usuhi bey sarche kasohti agarte ka, meleyka koogtahe, riirte.
41006050	A mehe iche tuumman a agarte, nahte rubey kabahte. Yeesso chirraas on, “Anahina, a ani roorro akhabina,” iyidah.
41006051	'Deerka kooban kaleedihe, hafar tolossate. Abatti tuumman weyti girmeysatte,
41006052	a mehe girmohi makaateyyohi ittaawe walah iche kaabatte mele. I'di tahe uurassicho a ladagahnooche.
41006053	Chirri icho beyti Gaalilaaya afichekuus imaaheen ka, intoo Gennaasaret layadeeh yimaateene, kooban hideen.
41006054	Uun iche kooban kasooyagte, enenyet Yeesso kase.
41006055	Ilaas tuumman goya kooryeene, 'doo'di khakkhannan siriiro kasoosi'deene, inti Yeesso kijiro icho daageen ka igeecheen.
41006056	Meelbaaw Yeesso irte ka, ilkerengeeto eheetteey, goobab eheetteey ommos gosas eheetteey ka ba, 'doo'dichoki khakkhannan siriiro kasoosi'daane, sokkoti 'dee us yamiit, geecheen. Hawwaasteene, “Alley bal laddi kabuu'daah kalday laka a 'daareen,” iyidaaheen. Eti tuummane 'daare la samaate.
41007001	Farissaayotoo ichoow tagaammetoo amurre ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem katimiyye, Yeesso khaarisse.
41007002	Abattitiistoo dahanohi bi'dire kagolossatti, geeddi icho igolossan dahano idikhan argeen.
41007003	A mehe Farissaayo ichoow yaafohi Ya'huud tuumman, hugumme aacchinyetichooda raahaane, ma golossataan geeddi icho koloo dahano idikhan.
41007004	Toro la chi'iche sokko katimiy, ma golossataan sammata icho koloo dahano idikhan. Saggaas on u hugummeti noole raahta i'di maanta ti kokkoobbe ichoow karmohi ga'daarre ichoow ibiriikkhe ladikho.
41007005	'Deerka Farissaayotaas ichoow tagaammetaas amurre wihi icho Yeesso worsateen, “Abattitaah a i'doh hugumme aacchinyeteen iraahine, dahanohi bi'dire ikagolossatta?”
41007006	Wihi us ilaabe, “Iskaayyeessooy, Isaaya maanti us wori Waakhe atin miinsan kaayyeede a eysiiche. Wihi chiiran, “ ‘'Doo'da af on ka ikoolicha, i'daasenyi uuricho goyaka foga ileejiraan.’
41007007	Immarah on iwahtaan. Hugummeti enenyet soouume i'di amurreti Waakh u enenyet abchaan.
41007008	Amurreti Waakh a 'diissaane, hugunki enenyet jurkhissaan.”
41007009	Yeesso toro mehe iyidah ya, “Atin jita ekkeysi atin amurreti Waakh 'dol ilaabtaane 'dee hugummetiin raahtaan ka enenna a tagaammee.
41007010	A mehe Muusa amurane cheeke, ‘Aabbahaah ichoow abartaah inkaanyit’ ichoow ‘Eti aabbahiis ommos abartiis falo a layigaase.’
41007011	I'daasenyi mehe elattaan ya, etoo a geeddi us aabbahiis ommos abartiis, ‘Gargaari atin ikasugtaan a siinti an Waakh ibahche,’ iyadeeh on. Gargaara Korban iche layadeeh.
41007012	Etaas 'deerka gargaari us aabbahiis ommos abartiis gargaaro a tiratteen gon.
41007013	I'daas ka antohi Yeedi Waakh a 'dii'ddaane, hugunkiin enenyet abissaan. Atin wahanyeyyohi i'daasenye ittaawenye yeessaan.”
41007014	Yeesso toro urur tuumman isiwahe wihi us iyidah, “Idagansada, waha la abda.
41007015	Walah enenyet khar ka gelo usu bi'dirroocho mele, wihi enenyet uuriis kasoobaho on enenyet bi'dirroocha.”
41007017	Inkoo Yeesso urur katabe ka minkoo gele. Intaas ka abattitiis mammahti kootte us yidah, wihiis a mehe worsatte.
41007018	“Atin laka walah atin gelo mele?” worsate. “Ma abattaan a, walah enenyet khar ka gelo bi'dirroocho mele.
41007019	A mehe rubeytiis ma gelaane, i'daasenyi holoolo on gelaane sartiis kabahaan.” Yeesso la wahaas us yidah ka, saggi golol tuumman bi'dir ieheynane tuse.
41007020	Yeed orey iwoye, “Enenyet wihi goytiis kasoobaho iche bi'dirroocha.
41007021	A mehe enenyet uuriis goya iche mali suuje kayamiit i'di maanta, 'doo'di isidisanne isleeur'do, hatto ichoow ogoossi dubunuunu lagelo.
41007022	Wihi addan a mejeli makhaabassi tiis ieheynan leeur'do, 'damaam, uskeeli layeelo, ekkeysi, soho'ddarri, kal'darri, ham, rannyaat ichoow 'dalammoon.
41007023	Uskeelaas tuumman a ki enenyet goytiis kasoobaho bi'dirroocho.”
41007024	Yeesso ili Gaalilaaya kakahe, ilassi ilkerengeetti Tiiro idow irte. Minkoo gele usuhi enenyet saggi us intaas ikijiro abti ma 'doono. I'daasenyi emeettiis ma dagsanto.
41007025	Makhaabassoo inanticheti rucchul ginna dakhatti uus iche emeettiis daagte on timiyye luhlohiis ka il gu'dubte.
41007026	Makhaabassa la a yaaftoo Ya'huud ieheynane ili Siiriya ka intoo Foniikiya layadeehe kadelatte. Yeesso hawwaassatte, wihi iche itidah, “Ginna inanteey goya kabihi!”
41007027	I'daasenyi arám iiyeyye, “Alley, koloo nyaakhut a golossati, a mehe gololi nyaakhute lakhaato kararre liikhubo ma haaggan.”
41007028	Wihi iche ilaabte, “Aa, Kamuraaw! I'daasenyi kararre laka, kombor iliche ka wihi nyaakhut kididdihe a suunatta on gon.”
41007029	'Deerka wihi us iyidah, “Jeenteti wihi at tidah u, tab ginna weel a kabahtee.”
41007030	Goob iratte inantiche ichehi siriir kajiifto 'hesse, ginna la a kabahte.
41007031	Yeesso saahka ilassi Tiiro idow kabahe, ilassi Siidon goya tabe, ilassi Ilkerengeetohi Tomone leeyimiyye Beyti Buurenye Gaalilaaya yimiy.
41007032	Etoo dogo laaye yeyyeed lee'hoolyahe liikeene, enenyet tuumman Yeesso hawwaaste, 'dee dahan a korcho a samaacho.
41007033	Ét 'dol geeche, nabho farro gesse, farro iskatufe, hanjuf harrab ka'daare.
41007034	Serey yeye, “E'h!” yidahye, toro, “Effaa'da” yidah. I'daakka la “Furam!” iche leessa.
41007035	Chirraas on et dogo bakkaaheene, harrabiis furname, mujjum yeyyeede!
41007036	Yeesso urur amur ibahche uus icho wahaas cheekin. I'daasenyi urur geedda us amur ibahcho, geeddaas 'dirihiissa yeed taa'hiche.
41007037	'Doo'd weyti girmeeste, mehe essaan ya, “Wihi us yeele tuumman weyti haagganyihiin. Dogowaayyo ichoow afwaayyo laka a haaggicha!”
41008001	Ibeennetaas on ururoo buure toro kulme, golol la ma khabin. Yeesso abattitiis wahe wihi us iyidah,
41008002	“An 'doo'da weyti uur isoonugleesda. Maan seyyah dakkhan ani on ileejire wihi icho yamhiin la ma khabaan.
41008003	Chirri an ankaa khabaani goobassicho ilaabo jit ka a sussuuhaan. A mehe gaasichokoo foga kayimaateen.”
41008004	Abattitiis wihi iche ilaabte, “Yiba ka la, gololi geeddaasenye enenyeta tuumman yaakho intoh ka'hella?”
41008005	Yeesso la, “Makaate geeddoh khabtaan?” worsate. Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Makaate teeba.”
41008006	Ulla urur amur ibahche orrommiche. Makaateyyohi teebee khaate, Waakh kala'd ilaabe jejjebche, abattitiis ididdiibe, “Ba'h gisa,” iyidah. Iche la ba'h gisse.
41008007	Bahaggi rurrucchul laka wohoor a khabte. Yeesso wahaas laka iweeste, “Waha laka gisa,” iyidah.
41008008	'Doo'd golossate ichoowka darge. Abatti enjel teeba gololi jejjebane lasoowaache buuho soosuunte.
41008009	Mejeli golossate a geeddi elif affar. Inkoo us enenyet laabe ka,
41008010	chirraas on kooban goya gele, abattitiis khabaayi anki distiriighi 'Dalmanuu'da tabe.
41008011	Farissaayotoo timiyye Yeesso leeiriirte usu angey gelin 'doontaa, wahanyeyyohoo miigti Waakh tuso goobi Waakh kayimiy daahte.
41008012	Yeesso uur suujowe, “'Doo'da i'dee a i'doh wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso idaaha?” yidah. “Rume atin icheeka, wohoo kaldaye miigti Waakh tuso laka ma lasiicho!”
41008013	'Deerka Yeesso Farissaayo katabe, kooban goya inokhte, beyti Gaalilaaya aficheki 'diri irte.
41008014	Abatti makaate a kadabte, too kaldaye iche kooban goya kakhabto on menye.
41008015	Yeesso icho tootooche, “Yeedad Farissaayo ichoow yeedad 'Heroode i'di booddati makaate fuurissee yuubsada!” iyidah.
41008016	Icho la iskaleehawwoocheene, wihi icho yidaaheen, “Jeenteti inno makaate ikhabine i'daas iessa.”
41008017	Yeesso la, wihi iche kahawwoosso a garta, mehe icho worsate ya, “A i'doh makaatewaayyo ikayeyyeeddaan? Atin uliba walah ma abanna? Uurassiinna ladagahnooche?
41008018	Indo a khabtaane, i'daasenyi walah atin agartaan mele! Nabho la a khabtaane, i'daasenyi walah atin daagtaan mele! Toro ma kasoo'hessaan a?
41008019	Maanti an makaate chan mejeli elif chane ijejjebche enjel geeddoh makaateti soo'hadde kijirto soosuunteen?” Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Tomon ichoow lamma.”
41008020	“Maanti an makaate teeba mejeli alif affare ijejjebche enjel geeddoh buuhto makaateti soo'hadde kijirto soosuunteen?” toro worsate. Wihi iche ilaabte, “Enjel teeba.”
41008021	“Toro la uliba walah atin abatteen mele?” iyidah.
41008022	Ilkerengeetti Bessaayda yimaateene, 'doo'doo la etoo indo laa Yeesso ikeene, hawwaasteene, 'dee dahan a ka'daaro.
41008023	Yeesso et dahan khabte, ilkerengeet khariche geeche. Et indo katufe, dahan korche, “Wohoo a agarta?” worsate.
41008024	Et la serey yeye wihi us yidah, “Enenyet a arga, i'di geeyohi sohti iyoogyahiin.”
41008025	Toro et dahano indo korche. Kolaakka et indo furnameene, indo toro haagsateene, walah tuumman mujjum arge.
41008026	Yeesso et minkiis ierge, wihi us iyidah, “Ilkerengeet goya iiran.”
41008027	Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba ilkerengeetohi ilkerengeetti weene Kaaysareya Fiiliffi kamarsan ikaheen. Jit raahaani, Yeesso abattitiis wihi us worsate, “'Doo'd an a ayyo essa?”
41008028	Wihi iche ilaabte, “Gaasoo ati a Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo iche essa, gaasoo a Eliiya essa, gaasoo laka 'doo'di goorat Waákh íyeyyeedo a kichekoo, iche essa.”
41008029	“I'daasenyi atin la? An a ayyo tadeehiin?” worsate. Beetero wihi us ilaabe, “At a Ki Lasubhe lasugo.”
41008030	Yeesso icho tootooche, uus icho eti us yahe etoo kalday laka icheekine.
41008031	Yeesso 'deerka abattitiis wihi Waakh gooche abinnaan sookhabte. Waha la a saggi Ínam Aadam sinati buure liituso, ewweenki Ya'huud ichoow kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre usu i'dii'daane, liiyagiise, chirri maan seyyahe kutte us omoot ikasookaho.
41008032	Yeeda weyti ibabbakkaahiche, Beetero la usu 'dol geeche leejaakhe.
41008033	I'daasenyi Yeesso urgiye abattitiis yeye, Beetero leejaakhe wihi us iyidah, “Seytaankaane fooleey buj! At wahanyeyyohi Waakh menye, i'daasenyi wahanyeyyohi weeli enenyete kamalatta.”
41008034	Yomboka urur ichoow abattitiis wahe wihi us iyidah, “Chi' etoo isooraahin 'doono, awtiis a 'dii'do toro la massalaabatiis barbar a sookorsati a isooraaho.
41008035	A mehe eti tuummane jirotiis ribin 'doono jiroti rummaat a waaya. I'daasenyi ki ani ichoow Wori Haaggan jirotiis iwaayo, jirotiisti rummaat a riba.
41008036	Etoo maanta a chirri us wohoo 'hele chirri us wihi harrata tuumman 'hele, jiroti awtiissa Waakh siiche la waaye?
41008037	Ommos weeli enenyet maanta mehe diibin yabuu'de jirotiis kadooricha?
41008038	Chirri etoo 'doo'da wey'dane waakkhassi addan wahti uskeel leh goyaka ani ikuuryaawo toro yeedeey kuuryaawo, Ínam Aadam laka maanti us miig Aabbahiis ichoow ti herti Waakhe munyee leesoonokhti, usu a kuuryaawa.”
41009001	Toro wihi us iyidah, “Rume atin icheeka, gaasiinkoo maanta inta kijiro omoot ma argo, ichoowka dakhi Waakh miig khabaayi yamiit.”
41009002	Inkoo ibeen lihe kutte ka, Yeesso Beetero ichoow Yaakoobo ichoow Yoohana khaatte, woye, haloo deer koreen, ichohaas on. 'Dey'doossaayi Yeesso luurgiyiche.
41009003	Gaaddiis la weyti dakhnaatte, waha maanta torrogoote, dikhaassi harrata kootte ikayeelin yitaaheen.
41009004	Eliiya ichoow Muusa ba orcho ka soobaheene, Yeesso leeyyeedeen.
41009005	Beetero wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Eti weenoow, a haaggantahe gon, chi' nah inta kijirro. Alley gaayim seyyah a disno, too a taahha, too a too Muusa too la a too Eliiya.”
41009006	A mehe abattiti seyyahe weyti nahte, Beetero wihi us laabo ma garti.
41009007	Mirisoo soobahe icho tuumman ankube. Hooyoo la mirisaas goyaka sooyeede, “Waha a Weeleeyki an weyti 'doono. Usu nabah isuda!” yidah.
41009008	Chirraas on jilakh rorrogatte, et addane icho leejiro icho argeen mele Yeesso on menye.
41009009	Chirra icho hal kasookhubtaan ka, Yeesso icho amur ibahche, iicho wihi icho argeen 'doo'di addan iicheekine ichoowka Ínam Aadam omoot a kasookaho.
41009010	Wihi us iyidah raahte, i'daasenyi ayta omoot lakasookaho wihiche kahawwoocheen.
41009011	Wihi icho Yeesso worsateen, “A i'doh tagaammeti amurre, ‘Eliiya koloo yamiit,’ ielatta?”
41009012	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rumanka, Eliiya koloo yamiite, walah tuumman i'di icho eheneet toro kayeela. Kamalda bal a i'doh Chiirnaanneti Waakh goya Ínam Aadam bolokkhi buurenye latusa, weyti la'dii'da liikachiire?
41009013	I'daasenyi wihi an atin icheeko, Eliiya a yimiyye, 'doo'd la suujoonki noole icho 'doonaan usu tuse i'di wihi usu miinsane lachiiruu.”
41009014	Chi'iche abattiti addan itamiit, ururi buurenye icho khaariche argeen. Tagaammeti amurre ichehi abatti leeiriirto 'heleen.
41009015	Enenyet uun us Yeesso arge weyti girmeeste, iorye bariitiche.
41009016	Yeesso wihi us abattitiis worsate, “Atin mehe 'doo'daas isleeiriirtaan?”
41009017	Etoo la urur goyaka wihi us ilaabe, “Eti ween, inankaaya kikeene, ginna dakhatta, yeyyeed tiratta.
41009018	Kolbaaw iche khabatte, ile irogta, af dakkhan 'dombeestaane, ilko iskaroba cho'ha. Abattitaah, ‘Ginna inam kabahcha,’ iidahye, i'daasenyi iche a agaafatte.”
41009019	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Doo'di wey'dane Waakh ikakhuufin, geeddoh atin leefiddiyo? Geeddoh atin igarrahsadi? Ínam ikeena!”
41009020	Ínam Yeesso ikeeneen. Ginna uun iche Yeesso agarte, chirraas on inam korkokisse. Inam il gu'dde, fade, afa dakkhan 'domboyyo leekeene.
41009021	“Uu' maantoh i'da eheneet?” Yeesso aabbahi inam worsate. Wihi us ilaabe, “Uus weel eheet.
41009022	Geeddi buure 'dab ommos bicche goya kalugu'dda, ichehi tagiise 'doontaa. I'daasenyi cha'at wohoo nah iyeelin tabuu'd, uur nah isoonugleyso, nah gargaar!”
41009023	“Cha'at wohoo tabuu'd a?” Yeesso yidah, “Eti Waakh on rummeesti walah us iubaa'dan mala.”
41009024	Aabbahi inam chirraas on sooriire, wihi us yidah, “An a kirummeesda, i'daasenyi igargaare uurlammaal a baho.”
41009025	Yeesso chu'us ururi intaas isooryo arge ka, ginna leejaakhe, “Ginnata ínam yeed ichoow dogo tirto, amure kibahchaa, toolla kofche inankaas goya kabahe, jirtuu la iinokhan!” iyidah.
41009026	Ginna riirit gu'dubte, ínam korkokisse kabahte, inam i'di eti yumuy yitahye, 'doo'di buure, “A yumuy,” yidah.
41009027	I'daasenyi Yeesso inam dahan khabte, sootoolliche, inam la tolossate.
41009028	Inkoo Yeesso min gele ka, abattitiis dagsi ka mehe worsatte ya, “Nah a i'doh ginna bihit iagaafanne?”
41009029	Wihi us ilaabe, “Ginnati i'dee, wihi bahcho tuumman a weysi kalday.”
41009030	Intaas kakaheene, ili Gaalilaaya dah kagoocheen. Yeesso usuhi enenyet inti us kijiro abti ma 'doono,
41009031	a mehe abattitiissa wohoo abchaa. Wihi us iyidah, “Ínam Aadam dowwanoha ka 'dube lagoocha, dahanohi enenyet lagessa yagiisiine, chirri maan seyyahe kutte ka omoot kasookaha.”
41009032	I'daasenyi wihi us idowo ma abanne, toro usu worsan karooreen.
41009033	Ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hum soogeleen. Chi'icho min geleen ka, Yeesso wihi us abatti worsate, “Atin kootte jit ka mehe isleeiriirtaan?”
41009034	I'daasenyi gammadisse a mehe kootte jit ka eti 'doo'di addan tuumman iweene isleeiriireen.
41009035	Yeesso orronte, abattiisti tomon ichoow lammee isiwahe wihi us iyidah, “Chi' etiinkoo orey 'doono, eti weyti 'duboot a yitaahe, falfati enenyet tuumman a yitaahe.”
41009036	Weeloo rucchul khaate, goycho toolliche. Dahano kakhabte wihi us abatti iyidah,
41009037	“Eti tuummane jeenteti us abattiteey iyahuu, nyaakhuta rurrucchul kichekoo martiisti, ani imartiista. Eti ani imartiisti la, ani menye eti isooergate martiista.”
41009038	Saahka Yoohana wihi us iyidah, “Eti ween, nah etoo antohi magahaah ka ginnayyo enenyet goya kabahcho a agarre. Jeenteti us keen ieheynan u wahaas toolli inidah.”
41009039	“Ajeyinna,” Yeesso yidah, “Eti antohi magaheey ka wihi weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan yeelo, 'deeka toro ma ihayhayo,
41009040	a mehe eti inno i'dii'din, a aaleenna.
41009041	Rume atin icheeka, eti tuummane jeenteti us abatti Kiriisto iyahuu kooboo biccheet kisiiche, etaas koloo kalday laka kala'ddiis ma waayo.”
41009042	“Chi' etoo 'doo'daar irummeesti kichokoo tarraantarricho la, etaas wihi ideefo a usuhi daddaabti buurenye gurnaan lakatumo lukhum lakahido beyti buure lakalug'do.
41009043	Chi' dahantaah uskeel kaalugu'ddo, dahantaas gooy! Atihi dahan laaye jiroti jirtuu imassan 'hesso deefta, atihi dahano lammacho khabto, meessi 'dabi armaanjireene 'dabiche ijitin iratti ka.
41009045	Chi' luhtaah uskeel kaalugu'ddo, luhtaas gooy! A mehe atihi elyeenye jiroti jirtuu imassan 'hesso deefta, atihi luhlo lammacho khabto, meessi 'dabi armaanjireen lakaalug'do ka.
41009047	Chi' issaah uskeel kaalugu'ddo la, issaas bihi! Atihi issoo laaye dakhi Waakh gesso deefta, atihi indo lammacho khabto, meessi 'dabi armaanjireen lakaalug'do ka.
41009048	Intaas ka, “ ‘'doo'daas akhsihiis ma yamuute, 'dabiche la jirtuu ma jito.’
41009049	Saggi orran golol tuumman magaa'd liikachibuu, saggaas on enenyet tuumman 'dabi sinayyoot itaba.
41009050	“Magaa'de a haaggantahe. I'daasenyi chi'iche gimbatiche waayte saggoh toro liigimbaacha? Magaa'ddi haaggane gimbatiche khabto ateeha! Nebey iskaleefiddiya.”
41010001	Yeesso 'deerka intaas kakahe, anki boroofenhi Ya'huudiya ichoow hawti Yoordane 'dusso berihiche irte. Urur toro isootabe, ulla i'diiski orrankateet u wahanyeyyohi Waakh abche.
41010002	Farissaayotoo la timiy, usu angey gelin 'doonta, wihi iche worsatte, “Eti makhaabassiis tuum riho ichoow amurreteen a israahaan?”
41010003	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Muusa amuri us atin siiche mehe yadeeh?”
41010004	Iche la wihi iche itidah, “Muusa ka a geeddi makhaabal khadaabi seley lakabaho chiiro, toro la a geeddi us makhaabassiis tuum riho.”
41010005	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Muusa jeenteti matahmiigtiinna amuraas atin ikasoochiire.
41010006	I'daasenyi uumaccho ka, maanti Waakh walah dakkhan soouume, ‘labo ichoow deyyeho soouume.’
41010007	‘Jeentetuu, mejel aabbahiis ichoow abartiis a kataba, usu ichoow makhaabassiis la wohoo kalday yateehiine,
41010008	lammacho ba sartoo kalday yateehiin.’ 'Deerka kola et lamma menye, a sartoo kalday.
41010009	Maantaka wihi Waakh isikeene, uus weeli enenyet seley bihin.”
41010010	Inkoo icho min inokhteen ka, abattitiis wihi kootte us essi, a mehe worsatte.
41010011	Wihi us ilaabe, “Eti tuummane makhaabassiis tuum rihe makhaabassoo addan diste, uskeeli us makhaabassi tiis ieheynan leeur'do, iche gele.
41010012	Makhaabassi makhaabaliche tuum katabte, makhaabaloo addan khaatatte diste, uskeeli iche makhaabaloo kiche ieheynan leeu'durto, iche gesse.”
41010013	'Doo'd la nyaakhuti rurrucchule sookhaata, Yeesso ikeena, 'dee ulla dahano korcha iweesta. I'daasenyi abatti 'doo'daas leejaakhte.
41010014	Chi' Yeesso waha arge ka hollowe wihi us abatti iyidah, “Nyaakhuti rurrucchul ajeyinna 'diicha ani a iyimaatee, a mehe dakhi Waakh a ki 'doo'di i'dee.
41010015	Rume atin icheeka, eti dakhi Waakh saggi weeli rucchul ikakhaatan, koloo kalday laka goobi Waakh ma gelo.”
41010016	Ulla nyaakhut khabte, dahanohiis korche iweeste.
41010017	Chirra Yeesso abattitiis khabaayi bahe ka, etoo sooyiriyye, ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dde, wihi us worsate, “Eti weene haaggan, mehe yeelo 'dee jiroti jirtuu imassan 'hela?”
41010018	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “At a i'doh ani, ‘Eti haaggan,’ ikawahta? Etoo kaldaye haaggan laka ma jiro Waakh on menye.
41010019	Amurreti Muusa enenyet siiche a garatta, ‘Weeli enenyet dubunuunu iigaasan, makhaabali kaah ieheynan ommos makhaabassi taah ieheynan aleeur'din, walah ahatin, garti beenaat ayeedin, enenyet akakharaawin, aabbahaah ichoow abartaah inkaanyit.’ ”
41010020	“Eti ween, wahaas tuumman, koo an iraahin mala, uu' goorat an weel eheet,” et yidah.
41010021	Yeesso et yeye, 'doonine buuhisse. Ét iiyeyye, “Wohoo kaldaye kaankhan. Nyaame wihi at khabto tuumman ororiche, chilimme miskiin siiche, 'dee kamurroonki goobi Waakh 'hele, 'dee kaale isooraah.”
41010022	Chu'us yeedaas daage ka hamaad waaye. Usuhi fool ribowe nokhte, a mehe hoolahi buurenye khabe.
41010023	Yeesso jilakh rogte, wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “A 'hoossoo geeddohe chi' kamurre dakhi Waakh gesso!”
41010024	Abattitiis weyti girmeysatte. I'daasenyi Yeesso wihi us yidah, “'Doo'daaw, a 'hoossoo geeddohe chi' dakhi Waakh lagelo!
41010025	Naffi gaale issi irbi kakhaduutti weyti 'hooltahe. Eheet a, 'hoossi eti kamurenye dakhi Waakh gelo iche weyti kutta.”
41010026	Abatti geeddaas 'dirihiis girmeysatte, wihi iche isworsatte, “Ayyo 'deerka lariba?”
41010027	Yeesso icho yeye, wihi us iyidah, “Weeli enenyet ka waha a wihi koloo kalday laka iitaahan. I'daasenyi Waakh ka i'daas mee. Waakh ka walah tuumman a geeddi icho yateehiin.”
41010028	Beetero wihi us iyidah, “Bal yey, nah weheenyo tuumman a kasootabne, 'dee ati kiraahna.”
41010029	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rume atin icheeka, eti jeenteteey u ichoow jeenteti Wori Haaggan u goobiis ommos walaalinyetiis ichoow albehi leedesse kasootabe, aabbahiissa, abartiissa, nyaakhut, ommos gosiis kasootabe,
41010030	jiroti toolla us jiro ka kol kud, iche wahaas us kasootabe 'dirihiis 'hela. Goob ichoow walaalinyetiis ichoow albehi leedesse, arbo, nyaakhut, ichoow gosas 'hela, toro la geedda tuumman sina laka loomhicha. Jiroti yomboot ka la, jiroti jirtuu imassanne 'hela.
41010031	I'daasenyi 'doo'di ittaawenye oraate ki 'duboot yateehe, ki 'duboot la ki oraat yateeh.”
41010032	Yeesso oreye kasohta, abatti la 'dubiis sooraahta, ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme ikoraan. Abatti girmeysatte, 'doo'di sooraaho la roorro khaba. Yeesso abattitiisti tomon ichoow lammee 'dol iwahe, wihi usu dowwanoha ka layeelo icheeke.
41010033	Wihi us iyidah, “Ilkerengeetti Yeerusaleeme iranna, Ínam Aadam la 'dube lagoocha kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre dahanohicho lagessa. Iche la omoot igoossa, 'doo'di Waakh igaran dahanohicho gelissa,
41010034	icho la usu kachaartaane, fool hanjuf katufaane, laajja ka doochaane, 'da'ddaboka yagiisiin. Chirri ibeen seyyahe kutte ka omoot kasookaha.”
41010035	Chirraakka yeele Sebedaayoti Yaakoobo ichoow Yoohana layadeeh, Yeesso itimiyye, “Eti ween! Atihi walahbaaw nah kidaahne ka nah iyeesso 'doonna,” itidah.
41010036	“Mehe atin iyeelo 'doontaan?” Yeesso worsate.
41010037	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Maanti at ababtaayi kombortaahti antoot koorrommatti, alley eteenyokoo ankaahki miigeet a orronti, koo la ankaahki gurro a orronti.”
41010038	Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Atin wihi atin daahtaan wihiche ma garattaan. Atin maanta kokkoobi sinayyoote an damo damin a tabuu'diin? Ommos baattissiyoti omooteete ani liibaattissiyo a tabuu'diin?”
41010039	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Aa, a nabuu'd.” Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Kokkoobi an damo a dantaane toro la baattissiyoti liibaattissiyo ka laka atin labaattissiya.
41010040	I'daasenyi eti ankeeyki miigeet ommos ankeeyki gurro orronti ani mee goocho. Meelassa a ti 'doo'di liiyeele.”
41010041	Abattiti addane tomone, chi'iche wahaas daagte ka, Yaakoobo ichoow Yoohana kahollowte.
41010042	Yeesso isiwahe, wihi us iyidah, “Saggi atin igarattaan u, 'doo'di weynaanti 'doo'di Waakh igaran liiekkaacho, saggi suujenye 'doo'd idakhtaane toro ewweenkicho la wihi 'doo'd yeelo icheeka.
41010043	Atin ka i'daas mee. Eti tuummane goytiin ka weynaan 'doono, falfatiin a yitaahe.
41010044	Eti tuummane orey 'doono la, bow'dati enenyet tuumman a yitaahe.
41010045	A mehe Ínam Aadam laka, ma imaatane 'dee enenyet usu ma ifalo, i'daasenyi a yimiyye 'dee us 'doo'd ifala, rubeytiis diiba, 'dee enenyeti ittaawe mogti uskeelicho iguta.”
41010046	'Deerka ilkerengeetti Yeeriko sooeleeleen ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme isohtaanee. Chirra Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ichoow ururoo buure Yeeriko kabahaan, etoo indo laaye Bartimaayo layadeehe koo Timaayee, jite fiddiya, walah daddaaha.
41010047	Chirri us saggi us Yeessohi Naasaret iyahe daage ka riire, “Yeesso, Inam Dawuud, uur isoonugleyso!” yidah.
41010048	'Doo'di buure usu leejaakhe, gammadi iyidah. I'daasenyi geeddi kootteet laka 'dirihiis riire, “Ínam Dawuud, uur isoonugleyso!” yidah.
41010049	Yeesso tolossate, “Soowaha,” yidah. 'Deerka eti indo laa waheene, “Hamaad! Sookah, Yeesso a kiwahaa,” iyidaaheen.
41010050	Kabuu'diis seye, serey isoonyaame, Yeessó iyimiy.
41010051	“Mehe kiyeelo 'doonta?” Yeesso usu worsate. Eti indo laa wihi us yidah, “Eti ween, anihi toro il argo 'doona.”
41010052	“Nyaam gi'de kakhuufnaanki at ikakhuufte a kisamaachee,” Yeesso iyidah. Chirraas on indo bahche, jit kadihe Yeesso raahe.
41011001	Chirra icho ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem isoodowwaateene, ilkerengeetti Be'difaage ichoow Be'daaniya Hali Geeyohi Oolif haggee yimaateen ka, Yeesso abattitiistoo lammee ergate,
41011002	wihi usu icho iyidah, “Ilkerengeetti ortiin kijirto irda, uus atin gessaan la inkuraarruhoo injire liirarine hidan a 'hessaan. Soofura inta keena.
41011003	Chirri etoo, ‘A i'doh i'da iyeessaan?’ atin worsate la, mehe itadeehiin ya, ‘Kamure 'doona, inkoo dow on la inta isoolaaba.’ ”
41011004	Iratte, inkuraarruhi afafhi min kahidan 'hesse. Geedda iche furto,
41011005	'doo'doo intaas toollo, “Inkuraarruhaas atin furtaan, a i'doh?” worsate.
41011006	Iche la wihi kootte Yeesso iyidah tidahye, 'doo'd la soo'diiche.
41011007	Chirri icho inkuraarru Yeesso ikeeneene, kabuu'ddeticho kagaadeen ka, Yeesso koorronte.
41011008	'Doo'di ittaawe kabuu'ddeticho jit kagolge, gaasoo la seytohi icho gosas goya kasoogoocheen, jit kagolge.
41011009	'Doo'di Yeesso ortiis raaho ichoow ki 'dubiis raaho riire wihi us yidah, “Waakh koolinno!” “Waakh ki magahi Kamur kayamiit a imaale.”
41011010	“Waakh dakhi aacchiheenki Dawuud layadeehe yamiit a imaale!” “Waakkheenki inti weyti saraat kijiro koolinno!”
41011011	Yeesso ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem gele. Minki Waakhe buure gele, walah tuumman yeye. Il a sooibeennowe, abattitiisti tomon ichoow lammee khabaayi, ilkerengeetti Be'daaniya irte.
41011012	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho chirri icho ilkerengeetti Be'daaniya kasoobaheen ka, Yeesso ankaye.
41011013	Foga ka geeyoo fiig layadeehe seeb khabo arge, ibuje, usu gurnaan khabo yeyaa. Chu'us geey sooeleele ka, seeb on menye walah us ka'hele mele. A mehe maanti geey gurnaan bahcho mee gon.
41011014	'Deerka geey fale wihi us iyidah, “Yombuu tuumman etoo kalday laka gurnaan ma kaayaham!” Abattitiis la a daagte.
41011015	Chirri icho ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem yimaateen ka, Yeesso uranti minki Waakhe buure gele, 'doo'di intaas ka walah gatti ichoow ki walah ororicho ba rihnaan sookhabte. Komborohi balballaaddane 'doo'di chilimmeti ilassi addan iskadooricho leeyahe ichoow komborohi 'doo'di kutukuurrug ororsati ba rerreeche.
41011016	Yeesso la eti tuummane meeh si'do, uranti minki Waakhe buure dah kaleegoocho tirte.
41011017	Enenyet ayti Waakh abche, wihi us iyidah, “Wihi chiiran, “ ‘Minkeey mehe layadeeh ya, minki weysiite, 'doo'di harra tuumman,’ I'daasenyi, ‘inti 'doo'di hatto leh kadagti,’ kayeesseen.”
41011018	Kuhaaniyyohi wewween, ichoow tagaammeti amurre ba, yeedaas daagte. Jiti iche Yeesso katagiis yowatte. Jeenteti urur tuumman wihi us enenyet abcho ka weyti igirmeestuu, usu weyti karoorte.
41011019	Chirri il gelebnowe ka, Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba ilkerengeet kabaheen.
41011020	Chirdeer geeddi icho 'dulaan, geeyi cheletteete fiig usuhi hiiyyay kasookhabte tuum angage argeen.
41011021	Beetero wihi chele eheet kasoo'hele wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Eti ween bal yey! Geeyi fiige chele at fasse, a angage!”
41011022	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Waakh kakhuufa!
41011023	Rume atin icheeka, chi' etoo hala, ‘Nyaam beyti buure goya iskalugu'd!’ iyidahye toro la uurlammaal ikhabine, wihi us yidah saggi icho iyateehiin rummeesti, etaas wahaas a liiyeela.
41011024	Maantaka wihi an atin isoocheeko, walahbaaw atin weysi ka Waakh daahteen, saggi atin i'hesseen rummeesda, wahaas la a atin lasiichaa.
41011025	Chirra atin tolossattaane weysattaane, etoo la wohoo ikhabtaan etaas wahaas ikakuta 'dee Aabbahiinki serey jiro uskeeliin a atin ikakuto.”
41011027	Toro ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem yimaateen. Geedda Yeesso uranti minki Waakhe buure goya raaho kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud la Yeesso iyimaateen.
41011028	Wihi icho worsateen, “Antohi at wahanyeyyoha kahaaggisso, a weheeyya? Antohi at wahanyeyyoha kahaaggisso ayyo kisiiche?”
41011029	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Wohoo kaldaye atin worsada. Isoolaaba, ani la antohi an khabo, an wahanyeyyoha dakkhan kahaaggicho, a weheeyya a atin isoocheeko.
41011030	Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo, antohi us enenyet kabaattissiyo, Waakhe kayimaateen, bal enenyet? Isoocheeka!”
41011031	Iskaleehawwoocheene wihi icho isiyidaaheen, “Chi'inno, ‘Waakhe kayimaateen,’ nadeeh, mehe inno iyadeeh ya, ‘A i'doh 'deerka irummeysanna?’
41011032	I'daasenyi chi'inno, ‘Enenyete kayimaateen,’ nadeeh mehe soobaha?” A mehe 'doo'de karooraan jeenteti enenyet tuumman saggi Yoohana rumanka eti Waákh íyeyyeedo iekkaachuu.
41011033	'Deerka wihi icho Yeesso ilaabeen, “Nah ma garanni.” Yeesso la iiyeyye, “Ani laka antohi an wahanyeyyoha kahaaggicho ma atin isoocheeko gon.”
41012001	Yeesso 'deerka makhaaballetaas mammah ka wihi us iyidah, “Etoo geeyohi sabiibe gosiis goyaka il gesse. Gos ootti dagaheet kamarche, lunki gurnaanki sabiib lakayabti khute. Koondihi deere eti gos yaakhicho fiddiyo, laka dise. 'Deerka gosiis lakireeste, ulla iloo deer sulhaal kiirte.
41012002	Maanti gurnaan lagurti ka, eti gos leh ilbooyiiskoo 'doo'di gos kireeste iergate, gisi gurnaankiiski sabiib yowte.
41012003	I'daasenyi 'doo'di gos kireeste, ilbooy a khabte one, jahe, dahano marah soo'diiche.
41012004	Toro ilbooyoo addan icho iergate. Kan matah gu'ddeene, lakhaanyo kadoween.
41012005	Koo addan ergate, kaas yigaaseen. Too addane ittaawe laka ergate, icho la gaasoo jaheene, gaasoo laka yigaaseen.
41012006	“Etoo kaldaye us ergati 'hade, a inankoo, ki us weyti 'doone. 'Da'ddaboka inankiis ergate. ‘'Dee inankeey a inkaanyitta one,’ iche essa.
41012007	“I'daasenyi 'doo'di gos kireeste mehe isiyidah ya, ‘Ki dahal leh kalla. Kaaleya a nigaase 'dee dahalhiis weheen a yitaaheen.’
41012008	'Deerka khabteene, yigaaseene, gosi sabiib khariis iseyeen.
41012009	“Kamalda bal, eti gosi sabiib leh 'deerka mehe yeela? A yamiite 'doo'daas yagiise, 'dee gos 'doo'doo addan gessa.
41012010	Atin injire waha Chiirnaanneti Waakh ka ma soomin a? “ ‘Daakki 'doo'di minan diso 'dii'de, iche tirrinki dagaheete min tiiro yitah.
41012011	Kamure waha yeele, indoheen ka la weyti haagganyahiin!’ ”
41012012	'Deerka weynaanti Ya'huud jiti iche Yeesso kakhabatti yowatte, a mehe saggi us mammahtaas ka woricho ikaayyeede iche garteen. I'daasenyi urure karooraane, 'deerka katabte iratte.
41012013	Farissaayotoo ichoow 'doo'd 'Herood koo Yeesso iergateen angeye gelin 'doonta yeediis ka.
41012014	'Doo'd Yeesso iyimiyye, wihi us iyidah, “Eti ween, nah saggi at rum ikanokhan a garanna. At et at ibaasso mele, weyneetteey ichoow kuus ka ba. I'daasenyi jiti Waakhe at enenyet abisso ichoow runti Waakh a israahaan. Kaaysarhi weene kooddi liiguto a mujjum a bal mujjum mee?
41012015	A igunna bal ma igunno?” I'daasenyi Yeesso saggi icho isikaayyeelaan garte, wihi us worsate, “Atin a i'doh ani angey igelin i'doontaan? Bal chilinkoo Rooma ikeena, a argo.”
41012016	Chilinkoo liikeene. Chirraakka wihi u' worsate, “Foola ichoow magaha kachiiran, a keyya?” Wihi icho ilaabeen, “A koo Kaaysar.”
41012017	Yeesso chirraakka iiyeyye, “Kaaysar, wihi wihiise iguta, Waakh la wihi wihiise iguta.” 'Doo'd usu weyti kagirmeeste.
41012018	'Deerka 'doo'doo Sadukaayo Yeesso iyimiyye wohoo worsate. 'Doo'da la 'doo'di tuume berri ma sookaho iche essa.
41012019	“Eti ween, Muusa goorat mehe inno ichiire ya, ‘Chi' etoo walaaliis yumuyye, makhaabál katabe i'daasenyi nyaakhut ikhabin, etaas makhaabassaas a disti, walaaliis nyaakhut a idelo.’
41012020	Reeroo teebeenye isleedesse a jire. Ki ween min diste nyaakhut ma 'heline, buje.
41012021	Ki lammaatteet muunkhotaas diste, i'daasenyi nyaakhut ma 'heline, buje. Ki seyyahnaatteet laka i'daas on eheneet.
41012022	Teebaccho ba, koo nyaakhut katabe mele. 'Da'ddaboka makhaabale laka tumuy.
41012023	Maanti 'doo'di tuume lasookahcho, etichekoh makhaabassiis tateeh teebaccho la a disteenee?”
41012024	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Atin wihi Chiirnaanneti Waakh enenyet abisso ichoow miigti Waakh ma garattaan. Jeenteta menya jiti baabule ikijirtaan?
41012025	Maanti 'doo'di tuume sookaho, min ma distaane ommos mindischo ka ma ladiibo. Icho tuumman i'di herti Waakhe goobi Waakh kijirto yateehiin.
41012026	Atin wori 'doo'di tuume omoot lakasookahcho miinsan ma soomin a? Rumanka buuggi Muusa chiire ka wori geeyi hidaad goyaka bolkho a agarteen. Wihi Waakh iyidah, ‘Ani a Waakh Aburaaham, a Waakh Isakh, a Waakh Yaakoobo.’
41012027	Usu Waakkhi 'doo'di tuume mee, i'daasenyi a Waakkhi 'doo'di jiro. Atin weyti khufteen, atinhi 'doo'di tuume kol us toro isookahin koogtihiin.”
41012028	Etoo la a tagaanki amurre yimiyye wihi icho kahawwoochaan daage. Saggi Yeesso yeed ieysiiche arge, wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Amurreti Waakh tuumman goyaka, koh weyti khumman?”
41012029	“Ki wihi addan tuumman kuto a kan,” Yeesso iyidah, “ ‘Daaga, yaafohi Issiraayeloow! Kamureenki Waakhe a Kamuroo kalday on.
41012030	Kamuri Waakkhaahe uuraah tuumman ka ichoow rubeytaah tuumman ka ichoow malaah tuumman ka ichoow miigtaah tuumman ka 'doon.’
41012031	Ki lammaatteet la a kan, ‘Ollokkaah geeddi at is'doonto 'doon.’ Amuri amurreta kussan, ma jiro.”
41012032	Et wihi us soolaabe, “Eti weenoow a eysiisse. Wihi at tidah ka at a eysiisse, Waakkheen a koo kalday one, koo addan ma jiro, usu on menye.
41012033	Kamuri Waakkhaahe uuraah tuumman ka ichoow garanti at walah garatti tuumman ka ichoow miigtaah tuumman ka 'doon. Ichoow ollokkaah geeddi at is'doonto, 'doon. 'Dooninta naffi tuum Waakh liigubo ichoow soorriyo tuumman a kutta.”
41012034	Yeesso saggi makhaabal yeedi khara isoolaabe arge, wihi us iyidah, “At dakhi Waakh kadeeraan mele.” Uus maantaas la et usu wohoo addan worsan iggo mele.
41012035	Geedda Yeesso uranti minki Waakhe buure ka Yeedi Waakh enenyet abcho, wihi us worsate, “A i'doh tagaammeti amurre, Ki Lasubhe a hiiy Dawuud ielatta?
41012036	Dawuud rubeytiis Rubeyti Munyee ka yeyyeedaayi mehe yidah ya, “ ‘Waakkhi Kamure wihi us Kamureey iyidah, Dabankeeyki miigeete antoot orrommo, ichoowka chiiytaah tuum dahanohaah a soogesso.’
41012037	Dawuud rubeytiis usu Kamure kawaha, saggoh 'deerka Ki Lasubhe hiiy Dawuud iyahe?” Urur tuumman hamaadi buure ka dagansate.
41012038	Yeesso urur walah abchaayi wihi us iyidah, “Tagaammeti amurre yuubsada! Wihi icho weyti 'doonaan a ichohi darfohi hahhaaggane derdeer leesohti, toro la sokkoyyo ka weyti inkaanyit ka labariiticho.
41012039	Toro la chi' minki weysiite Ya'huud ommos sukuukuyyo lagele, wihi icho weyti 'doonaan a ichohi meessi weyti lakiinkaanyito orronti.
41012040	'Doo'da muunkhoyyo ekkeesta, hoolahicho kakhaataan. Chi'iche weysatti la, enenyeti haaggane iskaayyeessa, weysi derdeeraassa. 'Doo'da Waakh sinati weyti kutto igoocha.”
41012041	Yeesso minki Waakhe buure ka inti sadakha lakachibo hagga orronte, enenyeti chilimme saanduukhi chilimme lakalug'do kichibo 'dey'dooche. 'Doo'di ittaawenye kamurree, chilimmeti buure meel kichibe.
41012042	I'daasenyi makhaabassoo muunkheenye miskiine timiyye, chilim lamma wohoo rucchul laka ibihin meel kalugu'dde.
41012043	Yeesso abattitiis isiwahe, wihi us iyidah, “Rume atin icheeka, muunkhota miskiine, iche saanduukhi chilimme lakachibo, 'doo'di addan 'dirihiis wihi buure kalugu'dde.
41012044	Kamurre tuumman kamurroonkiche ka sadakhatoore bihisse, i'daasenyi iche miskiinkiche ka wihi iche kanoossahe tuummane bihisse.”
41013001	Chirra us minki Waakhe buure kabaho, abattitiis koo wihi us yidah, “Eti ween, haaggi minassa ichoow daddaabohi burbuurenye lakadise, yey!”
41013002	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Minassa tuummane burbuure yeya! Berri daddaabtoo kaldaye ti addan fuusso lakatabo mele. Icho tuumman a lasookhuba.”
41013003	Chirra Yeesso Hali Geeyohi Oolife minki Waakhe buure yeyo koorronte ka Beetero ichoow Yaakoobo ichoow Yoohana ichoow Andereeya la iyimaateene dagsi ka usu wohoo worsateen,
41013004	“Nah isoocheek wahanyeyyoha maantoh yateehiin? Toro mehe yateehe 'dee saggi dowwanoha ka waha tuumman liisoobuuhicho tusa?”
41013005	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Yuubsada, uus etoo kalday laka atin ekkeysan!
41013006	'Doo'di ittaawenye ani iskaayyeelo yamiite, ‘An a Ki Lasubhe’ essi, a agartaane, 'doo'di ittaawenye ekkeestaan la.
41013007	Maanti atin yaafohi isdiho ichoow worassi ibuuhine dihoyyoot daagteen, anahina. Wahanyeyyoha a sooyateehiine, i'daasenyi ibeenki yomboot uliba a ankhanyahe on.
41013008	Sirgaalle a isdihta, karnato laka isdihaan. Ilassi ittaawe ka harra sesseehta, nabhayye laka tamiit. Wahaas a chiis birriissa on.
41013009	“Atin rubeytiin laka yuubsada. Jaldaabohi Ya'huude atin liidiiba, minassi weysiite Ya'huud ka atin lajaha. Jeenteteey u, gaafanayyo ichoow karnatte atin liigeecha atin liicheekta, atin la garti Wori Haaggan tateehiin.
41013010	Wihi Waakh gooche, koloo Wori Haaggane 'doo'di harra tuumman liicheeka.
41013011	Maambaaw atin lakhabte dahanohicho atin lagesse, orey on wihi atin sootadeehiin akawa'dwaa'dina. Wihi chirraas atin lasiiche on daha. A mehe atin mee yeyyeeddaan, i'daasenyi Rubeyti Munyeenye yeyyeedda.
41013012	“Etoo walaaliissa 'dub goocha dahanohi nahab gessa 'dee layagiis. Ooyo laka weeliis i'daas yeela. Nyaakhut 'doo'di dele yeedicho 'dii'da, dahanohi 'doo'doo addan gessaane 'dee layagiis.
41013013	Enenyet tuumman a atin 'dii'da jeenteti atin abattiteey itahiin u. I'daasenyi, eti garrahsate ichoowka sinata 'dubiche eleele a lariba.
41013014	“Maanti atin ‘iyookkoti weyti bi'direnye 'doo'd keehisso’ inti ikamalin katolosso agarteen, 'doo'di ili Ya'huudiya fiddiyo tuumman halal a ifirdo. Atihi yeeda soonto yeeda a kigelo.
41013015	Eti minkiis sartiis fuulo uus min geline wohoo rucchul laka khaatin.
41013016	Eti gos goya kijiro, uus nokhanne kabuu'diis sookhaatan.
41013017	Ibeennetaas sinati deyyehoti nuugsatti ichoow ti huleesenye nyaamitto iubaa'dan sugto enenna a buure.
41013018	Waakh waho, uus maanassaas sinayyoot, maanti il weyti roffo yahe hir 'deyo eheynan.
41013019	A mehe sinati maantaas jirto, ti geeddaase uus uumaccho ka Waakh harra soouume ma laargine, ichoow uliba. Toro wihi i'dicheenye lasooargo ba ma jiraan, jirtuu tuumman.
41013020	Chi' Kamur ibeennetaas igaabin, etoo kalday laka ma soo'hado. I'daasenyi iroonoti 'doo'diiski us soobahsatuu, ibeennetaas a gaabiche.
41013021	Maantaas chi' etoo, ‘Yeya, Ki Lasubhe kalla,’ ommos, ‘Yeya Kuulla!’ kiyidah, arummeysan.
41013022	A mehe 'doo'doo Ki Lasubhe iskaayyeelo ichoow 'doo'di 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo iskaayyeelo a soobaha. Icho la wahanyeyyohi ittaawenye nane miigti Waakh tuso ichoow girmo yeelaane, 'dee chi'iche tateeh 'doo'di Waakh soobahsate ekkeestaan.
41013023	Isyaakhicha gi'de! Walah dakkhan geeddi il ankhayyahe a atin isoocheekee.
41013024	“I'daasenyi maanassaas sinayyohaas buure kuteen, “ ‘orrahe a daayatta, yeyyah la banayhiis ma soobahcho,
41013025	yiyyihimo serey a kasookhubtaane, miigti saraat la lakorkokicha.’
41013026	“Maantaas Ínam Aadam usuhi mirso goyaka yamiite, miig ichoow antohi buure khabo weeli enenyet tuumman a arga.
41013027	Herti Waakh harra 'dollohiche affarcho ierga, 'doo'di Waakh soobahsate harra 'dubiche ichoow sereyta daayan 'dubiche kasoobaayissa.
41013028	“Taba geeyi fiig yeeda kaabda. Uu' liikhimohiis ulhawtaane seeb bahchaan, saggi 'daato isoodowwaatte a garattaan.
41013029	Saggaas on u maanti atin wahanyeyyoha ibeenki 'da'ddaboot tuso agarteen, saggi soonokhantiis isoodowwaatte kola ititah a garattaan!
41013030	Rume atin icheeka, 'doo'di i'dee ma tuumo ichoowka wahanyeyyoha tuumman yateehiin.
41013031	Sereyta daayan ichoow harra a kutaane, i'daasenyi yeedasseey jirtuu tuumman ma kutaan.
41013032	“Aabbaheey on menye, et maantaas ommos saha'ddaas garti mele. Herti Waakhe goobi Waakh fiddiito ommos Ínam Aadam laka ma gartaan.
41013033	Taba isyaakhicha! Toorribda! Ibeenki saha'ddaas tateeh ma garattaanee.
41013034	Waha iyookkoka, a i'di etoo sulhaal irti. Minkiis katabo, bow'dayyohiis anto siicho, kooba hili us haaggicho ikatabo, eti arit fiddiyo la amuri us meel yaakhicho ibahcho.
41013035	“Maantaka toorribda, a mehe saha'ddi ooyohi goob leh soonokhti ma garattaanee. Usu geleb ommos naanokho ommos geeddi lukki kariiro ommos baryo yamiit ma garattaan.
41013036	Chu'us dog laan yamiit, uus atinhi u'durtaan atin 'helin.
41013037	Wihi ani atin iadeeh an enenyet tuummane iadeehe, ‘Taba isyaakhicha!’”
41014001	Ibeen lamma ankhane 'dee daawti Baasakka ichoow Daawti Makaateti Liikhasin lagela. Kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre la ekkeysi ka saggi iche Yeesso ikhabatti 'dee itagiise yowatta.
41014002	A mehe wihi icho essaan, “Uus inno daawta goyaka khaban. Kolossoo enenyet hol ka il a baabiichaa.”
41014003	Yeesso ilkerengeetti Be'daaniya ka minki etoo Siimonhi Ki Bu'da Khabe layadeeh ka, komborti ballaaddane lakagolossati ka dikkile kajiifa golossata. Makhaabassoo kurunkoo daakki alabaasta lakahaaggiche miricchihoo weyti gato miige kijiro geeyoo naad layadeeh lakahaaggiche leetimiy. Kurum lukhum jebisse, Yeesso miricchi matah kakhubte.
41014004	'Doo'di intaas kijire gaasoo, “Miricchiha a i'doh immarah labaabiicho?” iche hol ka isidowa.
41014005	“Kootte chilimmeti eti gu'hoo hil haaggiche laguto 'dirihiissa lakoororicha, chilimme miskiin lasiicha,” iche essaan. Icho la makhaabál weyti leejaakheen.
41014006	Yeesso wihi us yidah, “A i'doh iche imalalissaan? 'Diicha! Wihi iche iyeesse a haaggi weyti buure.
41014007	Miskiin kol dakkhan goytiinna kakhabtaane, kolbaaw atin 'doontaan la a gargaartaan. I'daasenyi ani kol dakkhan ma ikhabtaan.
41014008	Makhaabassa wihi iche tabuu'd tuummane yeesse. Sarteey miricchi ka subahte, orey on geeddi liihawwaalin tannabisse.
41014009	Rume atin icheeka, meelbaaw Wori Haaggan harra tuumman ka lacheeko ka, wihi iche yeesse laka a lacheeka, iche la lakasoo'hela.”
41014010	'Deerka Yuuda Iskaariyoothi ullaka abatti Yeessoti tomon ichoow lammee kichekoowe, kuhaaniyyohi wewween iirte, Yeessó 'dub goocha dahanohicho gessaa.
41014011	Inkoo icho wahaas daageen ka weyti hamaadeene toro chilimme iayyicheen. Yuuda 'deerka inti leemujjumenye us Yeesso dahanohicho kagesso yowte.
41014012	Ibeenki oraate Daawti Makaateti Liikhasin maanti heleenki daawti Baasakka lasoorriyoocho eheet. Ibeenkaas goya abatti Yeesso wihi iche Yeesso worsatte, “Intoh 'doonta iranna katannabanna, 'dee gololi daawti Baasakka kataham?”
41014013	'Deerka abattitiistoo lammee erge wihi us iyidah, “Nyaama ilkerengeet gela, etoo 'dirihoo biccheet si'do afiin a kayamiite raaha.
41014014	Minki us gelo wihi atin ooyo itadeehiin, ‘Eti Ween mehe worsata ya, min goyaka meessi marti ani ichoow abattiteey gololi daawti Baasakka kanaham meeke?’
41014015	Meessoo buurenye minkiis sartiisenye meeh tuumman khabto lahaaggiche iche atin tusa. Intaas ka golol inno ihaaggicha.”
41014016	Abatti bahte ilkerengeet gesse, walah dakkhan ba i'di kootte usu iyidah on i'heleen. 'Deerka gololi daawti Baasakka haaggisse.
41014017	Chirri il gelebnowe ka, Yeesso abattitiisti tomon ichoow lammee khabaayi yimiy.
41014018	Chirra icho komborti lakagolossati ka dikkille kajiifaane golossataan ka, Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Rume atin icheeka, etiinkoo 'dub igoocha, a etiinkoo ileegolossati.”
41014019	Iche tuumman fool ribowe kooba, “Rumanka ani mee menya?” worsate.
41014020	Wihi us ilaabe, “Atinha tomon ichoow lammee, a etiinkoo. A etiinki makaate karanta ikaleelug'do.
41014021	Ínam Aadam i'di usu miinsane lachiiruu, a yamuut. I'daasenyi eti Ínam Aadam 'dub goocho, sinati sugto eenna a buure! Usuhi goorat idelanne deefta.”
41014022	Golossataani Yeesso makaate khaate Waakh kala'd ilaabe, jejjebche abattitiis ididdiibe, wihi us yidah, “Khaata, waha a sartaayaa.”
41014023	Toro kokkoob khaate, Waakh kala'd ilaabe, abatti idiibe, iche tuumman la isleeanguumatte.
41014024	“Waha a diiggeeyki ayyinti husube Waakh enenyet igoocho, a diiggi iroonoti enenyeti buure liikhubo.
41014025	Rume atin icheeka, an farsoti sabiib toro ma damo, ichoowka ibeenkaas an wihi husub dakhi Waakh ka damo yateeh.”
41014026	Inkoo icho geeyoo Waakh dowteen ka, Hali Geeyohi Oolif ibaheen.
41014027	Yeesso wihi us abatti iyidah, “Atin tuumman a ikafiriddaan, a mehe wihi chiiran, “ ‘An ersime gu'dda, iiye la seley baabaata.’
41014028	I'daasenyi inkoo an omoot kasookahe, boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ortiin a irda.”
41014029	Beetero la, wihi us yidah, “Chirri iche tuumman kaafiridde laka, ani ma kaafirdo!”
41014030	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rume atin icheeka, maanta ibeenka goya laka, geeddi lukki kol lamma iriirin, ati rubeytaah kol seyyahe, ma igaratti tadeeh!”
41014031	I'daasenyi Beetero weyti yeediis katirriinsate wihi us yidah, “Cha'an kileeamuut laka, jirtuu ma kigardi ma adeeh!” Ti addan tuumman laka i'daas tidah.
41014032	Intoo Gesseemane layadeeh irteene, Yeesso wihi us abatti iyidah, “Inta orronda, geeddi an Waakh wahdi.”
41014033	Beetero ichoow Yaakoobo ichoow Yoohana khaatte. Sohtaayi, uur goya iooye, mali uskul gele.
41014034	“Huleesi rubeyteey kijiro, huleesi omooteet laka a ikeena. Inta fiddiya, toorribda la,” iyidah.
41014035	I'daaru orey isohte, il isi'diiche, Waakh wahte, chi'iche tateeh saha'dda sinayyoot usu a kakutto.
41014036	Wihi us yidah, “Aabba, Aabbahaaw, ati ka walah tuumman a geeddi icho yateehiin. Kokkooba sinayyoot ikakhaat. I'daasenyi in an 'doono menye, in at 'doonto a titaahe.”
41014037	'Deerka abattitiis inokhte, ichehi u'durto 'hele. Beetero leeyeede, wihi us iyidah, “Siimon, a u'durte? At saha'ddoo kalday laka toorribnaan a agaafatte?
41014038	Toorribda Waakh wahda, 'dee kajmeti uskeel atin kalugu'ddo akidihina. Rubeyohiin wihi mujjumenye 'doonaane, i'daasenyi sartiinna 'dabakhe.”
41014039	Toro irte Waakh wahte, wihi kootte us yidah on inokhte.
41014040	Chu'us soonokhti, ichehi u'durto, indo hulees kore toro 'hele. Wihi iche usu itadeeh ma garatti.
41014041	Koli seyyahnaatteet soonokhte, wihi us iyidah, “Atin uliba a u'durtaane, nassaan? A geeddaas on! Saha'de a titah. Yeya, Ínam Aadam 'dube lagoocha, dahanohi 'doo'di uskeel leh lagessa!
41014042	Sookaha a iranni! Eti 'dub igoocho kalla soosohtaa!”
41014043	Yeesso yeyyeedaayi, Yuudahi ullaka abattiti tomon ichoow lammee kichekoowe yimiy. 'Doo'di sooraahe a ururoo birlabbe ichoow khokkhoomme khabo, kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud sooergate.
41014044	Eta Yeesso 'dub goocho la mehe urur iskakhabeen ya, “Eti 'dee an dongade, a usu, khabda khaata iskar a toorribto.”
41014045	Yuuda chirraas on Yeesso iirte, “Eti weenoow!” iyidahye dongate.
41014046	'Doo'd la Yeesso khabte hide.
41014047	'Deerka etoo ullaka intaas toollo, birlab on soo'hiire falfati kuhaanihi weyti ween gu'dde nabah ng'ure.
41014048	Yeesso la wihi us yidah, “Cha'atin khokkhoomme ichoow birlabbe leetimaateene ikhabattaan, an a etoo enenyet walah saro?
41014049	Maan tuumman ani a atin leejire one, uranti minki Waakhe buure ka Yeedi Waakh atin abche, ma ikhaban la. I'daasenyi wahanyeyyoha a yitaaheene 'dee wihi Chiirnaanneti Waakh kachiiran labuuhicha.”
41014050	'Deerka 'doo'd tuumman usu katabe kafirde.
41014051	Etoo nugule dafartoor sookorsate la Yeesso 'dubiissa sooraaha. 'Doo'di kootte Yeesso woyo la, etaas khabte.
41014052	Ulla dafar intaas on katabe, murukhenyi firde.
41014053	Yeesso minki kuhaanihi weyti ween geecheen. Kuhaaniyyohi wewween tuumman ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud ichoow tagaammeti amurre kulmeen.
41014054	Beetero la fogaka Yeesso sooraahe ichoowka uranti kuhaanihi weyti ween fiddiyo goya gele. Intaakka iskarti meel yaakhisso koorronte 'dab dahammoote.
41014055	Kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud tuumman, garti iche yeeddo, 'dee icho Yeesso omoot ikagoochaan yowteene, i'daasenyi walah icho 'heleen mele.
41014056	A mehe 'doo'di buurenye Yeesso garti beenaat kacheekte, i'daasenyi yeedicho ma israahin.
41014057	'Deerka 'doo'doo kahe, garta beenaat yeede, wihi icho yidaaheen,
41014058	“‘Minka Waakhe buurenye dahanohi enenyet diseen a jejjebcha koo addane enenyet idisin ibeen seyyah goyaka disa,’ usuhi essi a daagne.”
41014059	I'daasenyi garti icho laabeen laka ma israahin.
41014060	Chirraakka kuhaanihi weyti ween 'doo'd tuumman ortiis ka kahe, wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Walah at soolaabto mele? Yeeda enenyet kaacheekti, mehe jira?”
41014061	I'daasenyi Yeesso gammadiche, walah us soolaabe mele. Kuhaanihi weyti ween toro wihi us worsate, “At a Ki Lasubhe, a Weeli Waakkhi Lakoolicho?”
41014062	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Aa, a ani. Ínam Aadam la usuhi Waakkhi Miig Leh anki dahantiisti miigeet fiddiyo toro mirsohi saraat fuulaayi yamiit a agartaan.”
41014063	Kuhaanihi weyti ween hol on ka ubbaariiski deer kharradiche, wihi us worsate, “Inno a i'doh 'doo'doo addane gar laabo iyowanna?
41014064	Atin saggi us igafe a daagteen gon! Mehe goosseen?” enenyet worsate. Icho tuumman omoote imasse ayyicheene, omoot igoocheen.
41014065	Gaasichekoo hanjuf katufin sookhabteene, indo hideene khomhoyyo kajaheene, “Eti Waákh íyeyyeedoow, eti kigu'dde nah isoocheek,” idoween, a kachaartaanee. Iskarti meel yaakhisso khaatte, jahte.
41014066	Beetero uranti minkaas khariise iliche fiddiyaayi, inantoo falfati kuhaanihi weyti weene timiy.
41014067	Chirri iche Beeterohi 'dab dahammooti agarte ka fiirisse, “At laka etaas Naasarete Yeesso layadeeh a leejirte,” tidah.
41014068	I'daasenyi 'dii'de, “An waha at elatti ma gardi, foolicho ma khabo ba,” yidahye, kahe, anki ariteet tabe. Chirraas on lukkihoo riire.
41014069	Chirri inanti falfee intaas ka agarte ka, 'doo'di intaas toollo wihi iche toro itidah, “Reenka alah a kichekoo.”
41014070	Beetero toro 'dii'de. I'daaru on fiddiyeene, 'doo'di intaas hagga toollo wihi us Beetero iyidah, “At rumanka a kichekoo, i'di tahe at laka a 'doo'di Gaalilaaya!”
41014071	Beetero isabaare toro Waakh dowe, “An eta atin kaayyeeddaan ma gardi!” yidah.
41014072	Chirraas on lukki koli lammaatteet riire. 'Deerka Beetero yeedi Yeesso iyidah kasoo'hele, “Geeddi lukki kol lamma iriirin, at kol seyyah, ‘Ma kigardi!’ tadeeh.” Chirraas on ilmo sookhube, ooye.
41015001	Uun il barye, kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud ichoow tagaammeti amurre ichoow Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud tuumman wihi icho Yeesso yeelaan goocheen. Yeesso hidhideene, khaateene, dahan Bilaato gesseen.
41015002	Bilaato wihi us worsate, “Karnati Ya'huud a ati?” Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “A rum, a i'daas at elatti on.”
41015003	Kuhaaniyyohi wewween wihi ittaawenye Yeesso kacheekteen.
41015004	Bilaato 'deerka toro Yeesso wihi us worsate, “At wahanyeyyoha ma soolaabto? Bal waha ittaawenye icho kaacheektaan yey!”
41015005	I'daasenyi Yeesso walah uliba us laabe mele, Bilaato la girmeeste.
41015006	Hugum ka Bilaato daawti Baasakka ka etoo hidane enenyet usuhi lasoofuro daahe a soofura.
41015007	Etoo Barraba layadeeh ichoow 'doo'doo sirgaal 'dii'do diho ka enenyet dubunuunu bakkiche jeela kijiraan.
41015008	Urur yimiyye Bilaato usuhi i'di orrankateet u etoo hidan isoofuro daahe.
41015009	Bilaato la, “Anihi Karnati Ya'huud atin isoofuro a 'doontaan?” urur worsate.
41015010	A mehe us saggi kuhaaniyyohi wewween jeenteti kal'darri on u Yeesso dahanohiis igesseen a garta.
41015011	I'daasenyi kuhaaniyyohi wewween urur leeyeedeene, 'dee Bilaatohi Yeesso menye, Barraba soofuro a daaheen.
41015012	Bilaato wihi us urur worsate, “'Deerka ki atin Karnati Ya'huud tadeehiin i'doh idaahe?”
41015013	Riireene, “Massalaaba kakaah!” yidaaheen.
41015014	Bilaato wihi us worsate, “A i'doh? Mehe suujenye yeele?” I'daasenyi geeddi kootteet 'dirihiis riireene, “Massalaaba kakaah!” yidaaheen.
41015015	Jeenteti us icho ihamaadin 'doonuu, Bilaato Barraba icho isoofure, amuri Yeesso lakadoocho toro massalaaba lakakaaho bahche.
41015016	Iskare Yeesso uranti minki buurenye gaafana igelo geesse, rabittoo iskareet tuumman isiwahte.
41015017	Dafartoo muggee i'di karnat u korisse, 'duuboo kudaheet iskayuubte matah korisse.
41015018	Icho la usu, “Karnati Ya'huudoow jiroti deer 'hel!” idowte.
41015019	Wussoo ka matah jajjahte, hanjuf kaattufte, a kachaaratta dubunuunu ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dubte i'doo iche inkaanyit tussuu.
41015020	Inkoo icho kachaarteen ka, kabuu'di muggee kabahcheene gaaddiis gesseen. 'Deerka leebaheene woyeen massalaaba kakaahaanee.
41015021	Etoo ilkerengeetti Kureene Siimon layadeehe gosiis kayimiyye intaas leeyimiy massalaaba Yeesso sinnaan ihosseen. Siimonha la a aabba Alekisaanda ichoow Ruufo.
41015022	Yeesso meessoo Golgoo'da layadeeh keeneen. Golgoo'da la a mehe ya, Meessi Lafohi Matahe Enenyet.
41015023	Farsoti sabiibe hanjati halalle lakawarse Yeesso siisse, i'daasenyi ma khaatan.
41015024	Icho la Yeesso massalaaba kakaaheen. Goycho ka gaaddiis gisante, kura gu'ddateene ebba wihi us 'helo yeyeen.
41015025	Chirra iche massalaaba kakaahto, il a geeddi saha'd seyyahti chirdeereet.
41015026	Wihi lakayigisye, massalaaba sarche lakachiire la a mehe ya,
41015027	Reeroo lammeenye hatto leh leekaaheen. Koo ankiiski miigeet lakakaahe, ki addan la ankiiski gurro lakakaahe.
41015029	'Doo'di intaas tabo a leeabaarrama, 'darraaw ka matah moroogicha. “Aa'heey! Atihi minki Waakhe buure jejjebisso, toro orrah seyyah on ka disso,
41015030	bal isribe, massalaaba kasooyag gi'de!” iche idowaan.
41015031	Saggaas on u kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre laka a kachaartaane, wihi icho goycho ka esseen, “Us 'doo'di addan a ribe, i'daasenyi isribin ma yabuu'd!
41015032	Kan Lasubhe, Karnata yaafohi Issiraayele bal toolla massalaaba a kasooyago, 'dee a agarro, a rummeysanni gi'de!” 'Doo'di laleekaahe laka weyti usu leeabaarrame.
41015033	Saha'd lihti maalimeet ka, il tuumman mug'di yitahye, ichoowka saha'd saagaale eleesse.
41015034	Saha'd saagaal ka Yeesso hooyi buure ka riire, “Elooy, Elooy, laama sabakhtani?” yidah. Wahaas la a mehe ya, “Waakkhaayaaw, Waakkhaayaaw, a i'doh ikatabte?”
41015035	'Doo'doo intaas hagga toollo la, baabule daage, wihi icho yidaaheen, “Daaga, usu eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Eliiya layadeeh iche waha.”
41015036	Koo la nyaame, haaruggoo khaate, farsoti sabiibe birrakhe buuhiche. Kho'doonkoo deer kahide, Yeesso iyooge, 'dee a yubhaabe. “'Diicha, usu Eliiya yamiite, sooyagcho, a agarro,” yidah.
41015037	Yeesso weyti riire, rubey gooche.
41015038	Dafarti weyti yobbeenye minki Waakhe buure seley goosso meel lamma seley igoote, sereye kasookharradde ichoowka iliche kabahte.
41015039	Chirri eti koobbintoo iskareet itoollo Yeesso ortiis toollo riiritiis daage saggi us imassate arge ka mehe yidah ya, “Rumanka eta Weeli Waakhe eheet.”
41015040	Deyyehotoo fogaka a 'dey'doossa. Goycho ka a Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala ichoow Maariyati Yaakoobohi nugul ichoow Yoosse desse ichoow Saloome.
41015041	Maanti Yeesso boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kijire, deyyehotane usu raahte, gargaarte. Deyyehoti addane ittaawenye ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem kaleetimiy laka intaase tolossa.
41015042	Maantaas a Ibeenki Latannabti. Waha la a maanti Seeri Lanaso ortiise. Chirri il gelebnowe ka,
41015043	Yuussufhi ilkerengeetti Arima'daaya Bilaato roorro laan iirte sar Yeesso daahe. Yuussufha la a etoo Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud goyaka magah khabo toro la dakhi Waakh laka sugo.
41015044	Bilaato Yeessohi geeddaas ka yumuy kagirmeeste, eti koobbintoo iskareet itoollo wahe usu Yeesso 'hor yumuy worsate.
41015045	Chirri us eti koobbintoo iskareet itoollo woraas kaabte ka, sar Yeesso Yuussuf siiche.
41015046	Yuussuf dafartoo soogate, sar Yeesso massalaaba kasooyagche, dafartaas kaayyuube. Go'ddoo daddaab ka lakhute hawwaal lakayeele goya kareeche, daddaabtoo buure 'dembeleeliye hawwaal afiche gesse.
41015047	Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala ichoow Maariyati abar Yoossee, go'ddaas sar Yeesso lakareeche a argeen.
41016001	Inkoo Seeri Lanaso kute ka Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala ichoow Maariyati abar Yaakoobee ichoow Saloome miricchihoo weyti uyuuge soogateen, sar Yeesso kasubhaanee.
41016002	Ibeenki oraate teebataas ka, uus orrahe sookorte kaheene, go'ddi Yeesso lakahawwaale ibaheen.
41016003	“Ayyo 'dee daddaabti go'd af lakorche inno i'dembeleeliya?” iche isworsateen.
41016004	I'daasenyi chi'icho serey yeyeen ka, daddaabti la'dembeleeliye argeen chi'iche buurtahe laka.
41016005	Chi'icho go'd geleen ka, eti nugule anki miigeet fiddiyo darfohi daddakhan khabo argeene, naheen.
41016006	Ulla wihi us iyidah, “Anahina! Yeessohi Naasarete goorat massalaaba lakakaahe iche yowattaan. Omoot a kasookahe, inta ma kijiro! Meessi icho kareecheen yeya.
41016007	I'daasenyi nyaama, abattitiis ichoow Beetero mehe itadeehiin ya, ‘Yeesso ortiinna ili Gaalilaaya irta. I'di goorat us atin iyidah u, intaakka a agartaan.’ ”
41016008	Oboorri hamar kayimiyye girmeeste, go'd kabahe, firde. Etoo kalday laka ma icheekin, a mehe roorro khabeen.
41016009	Ibeenki oraate teebataase us omoot kasookahe ka, kolooraat Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala goorat us ginna teeba kabahche isoobahe.
41016010	Iche la iratte, 'doo'di goorat Yeesso leejire icheekte. Icho la a wihi uuwwicho ooyo.
41016011	Chirri icho saggi Yeesso inoolyahe ichoow saggi iche iagarte daageen ka, rummeysawwaayeen.
41016012	Waha 'dubicho ka, Yeesso uummankoo yeere ka 'doo'doo lammeenye ilkerengeet khariis raaho isoobahe.
41016013	Chi'iche eti us yahe kasse ka, nokhatte, ti addan icheekte, i'daasenyi iche laka ma rummeysan.
41016014	Yomboka golossataani Yeesso ichehi tomon ichoow koowe isoobahe. Jeenteti icho kakhuufnaanki icho usu kakhuufaan ikhabin ichoow matahmiigti icho wori 'doo'di inkoo us omoot kasookahe arge irummeysan u, leejaakhe.
41016015	Wihi us icho iyidah, “Nyaama harra tuumman taba, Wori Haaggan la 'doo'di Waakh soouume tuumman icheeka.
41016016	Eti rummeesti toro labaattissiyo, a lariba. I'daasenyi eti irummeysan Waakh uskeel a igoocha.
41016017	'Doo'di rummeesti wahanyeyyoha miigti Waakh tuso a yeela. Antohi magaheey ka ginna enenyet a kabahcha, afi us idaagin laka kayeyyeeda.
41016018	Toof laka dahan a kakhabta, toro chu'us hadaadohi uskul yabhuub laka ma gaameeraan i'daaru laka. 'Doo'di khakkhannan dahano on korcha, 'doo'd samaata.”
41016019	Inkoo Yeessohi Kamure icho leeyeede ka goobi Waakh liikorche, Waakh anki dahantiisti miigeet orronte.
41016020	Abatti 'deerka bahte Wori Haaggan meel tuumman ka cheekte. Kamur la icho hil leehaaggiche, yeedicho ichoow wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso sooraahe ka, yeedi icho cheekeen rummaache.
42001001	'Deyoofiloow, 'doo'di buure a tirriinsate, wihi goyteen ka yitah chiire.
42001002	Wihi icho chiireen a wihi 'doo'di uu' maanti kolooraate waha yitaaheen arge nah isoocheeke. Icho la hili Waakhe icho haaggicheen, a ki wori Waakh 'doo'd liicheeko.
42001003	Toollaka ani rubeyteey walah tuumman uu' maanti waha yitaaheen mujjum goya a yeye, ichoowka mali an waha saggi icho iyitaaheen ikaasoochiiro gooche.
42001004	An i'da a yeele 'dee runti wihi liiabche ubta.
42001005	Maanti 'Herood karnati ili Ya'huudiya eheet, etoo kuhaaneenye Sakkariiya layadeeh a jire. Sakkariiya la a ki rabittoo kuhaaniyyoote Abiija layadeeh. Arantiis la Eliissabeet iche layadeehe, iche laka a ti gooboo ullaka kuhaaneenye Haruun layadeeh.
42001006	Lammacho ba la 'doo'di Waakh ortiis ka fiffissane eheete, raahnaanki amurreti Kamur ichoow wihi Kamur enenyet ka'doono laraaho ka wohoo rucchul laka ma lakacheekan.
42001007	I'daasenyi nyaakhut icho khabeen mele, i'di tahe Eliissabeet a mahane, lammacho la toro a araarroween.
42001008	Maantoo Sakkariiya hiliiski kuhaani iche minki Waakhe buure ka haaggicha, a mehe koli rabitti kuhaaniyyohichooda.
42001009	Kura gu'ddeene, hugunki kuhaaniyyoot ka Sakkariiya lasoobahche, eti minki Waakhe buure gelo Kamur uyuugge igubo yitah.
42001010	Chirri saha'ddi uyuugge lagubo titah ka, 'doo'di Waakh wahti tuumman khar ka kulme Waakhe wahtaa.
42001011	Hertoo Kamur Sakkariiya isoobahte, ga'daari uyuugge lakagubo miigtiis tolossatte.
42001012	Sakkariiya uus arge ka nahe, weyti roorro gesse.
42001013	I'daasenyi herta Waakh wihi iche itidah, “Sakkariiya roorro akhabin. Waakh weysihaah a daage, makhaabassaah la inankoo dessa. Maanti us desse la magahiis Yoohana daha.
42001014	Maanti us desse la, ati weyti hamaadda 'doo'di buure la delmaattiis ka a kileehamaada!
42001015	I'di tahe us Waakh ortiis ka eti weene yateeh. Ulla uus farsotoo rucchule sabiib laka af ka'daarin. U' dessi la Rubeyti Munyee usu a buuhissa.
42001016	Ulla 'doo'di buurenye Issiraayele anki Kamuri Waakkhichee isoolaaba.
42001017	Ulla miig ichoow rubeyti eti goorat Waákh íyeyyeedo Eliiya layadeeh khabe iche khaba, Kamúr ortiis sohta. Ulla ooyenye ichoow nyaakhutichooda isineybicha, 'doo'di yeed idaagin kharati 'doo'di fiffissan ilaaba, 'dee 'doo'd emeetti Kamur itannabicha.”
42001018	Sakkariiya wihi us herti Waakh worsate, “Ani ichoow makhaabasseey ba a araarrowne, mehe tusa 'dee waha runticho igardi?”
42001019	Herti Waakh wihi iche ilaabte, “Ani a Gaabiriyel. An Waakh ortiissa toolla, Waakkhane isooergate 'dee wora haaggane an kikeene kicheeka.
42001020	Jeenteti at yeedeey irummeysan u, at a gammadissa toro yeyyeed ma tabuu'de ichoowka maanti mujjumenye yeedeey larummaacho.”
42001021	Geeddaaas tuumman la 'doo'd Sakkariiya khar ka a suga. Icho la Sakkariiyahi geeddi deer minki Waakhe buure goya kamalmale kamasseen.
42001022	Chirri us minki Waakhe buure goya kasoobaho, icho leeyyeedin ma yabuu'd. 'Doo'd saggi us minki Waakhe buure goyaka fooltabcho iarge kase. A mehe enenyet dahano kaleeyyeede, i'daasenyi yeedin ma yabuu'd.
42001023	Chirri koliiski hili minki Waakh massate ka goobiis irte.
42001024	Saahka makhaabassiisti Eliissabeet layadeeh uurowte, hay chan la min goya ma kabihin.
42001025	Iche la wihi iche tidah, “Kamure ani waha iyeele. Ibeenneta a igargaare, heebti an ba'h goya kakhabo a ikabahche.”
