42001026	Inkoo Eliissabeet uuriche hay lih eleele ka, Waakh hertoo Waakhe Gaabiriyel layadeeh ilkerengeettoo Naasaret layadeehe boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kajirto iergate.
42001027	Herta Waakh la farniinki weeloo Maariya layadeehe etoo Yuussuf layadeeh alkume iche khabta. Yuussuf la hiiy karnati Dawuud layadeehe kayimiy.
42001028	Herta Waakh Maariya isoobahte wihi iche itidah, “Nebeytaah ma furatti, atihi Kamur weyti kijilhaate. Kamur a kileejira!”
42001029	Yeedassa herta Waakh elatti weyti Maariya malalicheene, wihi liidowo aficho waayte.
42001030	I'daasenyi herti Waakh wihi iche itidah, “Maariya roorro akhabin i'di tahe Waakh a kijilhaatee.
42001031	At a uurowta, inankoo dessa, magahi at ibihisso la a Yeesso.
42001032	Ulla eti weene yateehe, toro la Weeli Waakkhi Weyti Ween iche layadeeh. Kamuri Waakhe komborti antoote too aacchihiiski Dawuud layadeehe siicha.
42001033	Ulla nyaakhut nyaakhut Yaakoobo jirtuu tuummamba dakhta, dakhiis la yombuu ma massati!”
42001034	Maariya la wihi iche herti Waakh worsatte, “An mejel ma gardi gone, waha saggoh iyateehiin?”
42001035	Herti Waakh wihi iche ilaabte, “Rubeyti Munyee a kisooyagta, miigti Waakkhi Weyti Ween i'di oosimeet u koogoogta. 'Deerka weela munyeenye dessi Weeli Waakhe layadeeh.
42001036	Eliissabeetti uuraahe laka araarri goyaka weel a 'hessa. Ichehi goorat a mahan liidah toolla uuri hay lihe khabta.
42001037	I'di tahe wohoo rucchule Waakh kamiigenye us iubaa'dan ma jiraan.”
42001038	Maariya la wihi iche ilaabte, “An a falfati Kamure, wihi at tidah a yitaaheen gi'de.” Herti Waakh Maariya katabte.
42001039	Saahka Maariya tannabatte dowwa ilkerengeettoo ili Yuuda kuro sarche kajirto iratte.
42001040	Min Sakkariiya gesse Eliissabeet bariitisse.
42001041	Chirri iche bariito Maariya daagte ka, weeli Eliissabeet uur kakhabto yuutte, Rubeyti Munyee Eliissabeet buuhisse.
42001042	Eliissabeet riirte wihi iche tidah, “At rumanka deyyeho tuumman goycheka a lakimaale, toro la weeli at soodesso laka a liimaale!
42001043	An a ayyo waha liiyeela ichoowka abar Kamureey laka ani itamiit?
42001044	Uus an bariitotaah daage, weeli uureey goya kajiro laka weyti hamaade, birgi'de.
42001045	Waakh ba atihi wihi Kamur kiyidahye sooyateeh rummeysatte kimaala!”
42001046	Maariya la wihi iche tidah, “An weyti Kamur saa'da
42001047	Rubeyteey la weyti Waakkheeyki 'Doorribee kahamaadda.
42001048	I'di tahe anihi falfatiisenye nugul a ikasoo'hele! Uu' maalinka kholoyyo tuumman ani eti Waakh imaale iyadeehiin.
42001049	I'di tahe Waakkhi Miig Leh wihi buurenye iyeele, magahiis la a munya.
42001050	Kamur la kholoyyohi soomaro tuumman ka, 'doo'di usu karooro uure inugleesta.
42001051	Dahantiisti miig leh ka wihi noole yeele. 'Doo'di uuricho goyaka eylajo seleye fide.
42001052	Kamur karnatohi wewween komborohichoki antoot a kasookhube, i'daasenyi 'doo'di isnuglaacho a okkhiche.
42001053	'Doo'di raarahte wihi hahhaaggan ka dargiche, i'daasenyi kamurre dahano marah rihe.
42001054	Waakh Falfatiisti yaafohi Issiraayel a gargaare, uur inugleeste.
42001055	Aburaaham ichoow nyaakhut nyaakhutiis i'di us aacchinyeteen iyidah u ma kadabine, uur isoonugleeste.”
42001056	Maariya geeddi hay seyyah Eliissabeet leefiddiite, saahka goob inokhatte.
42001057	Maanti Eliissabeet hayohiche massateen ka, inankoo desse.
42001058	Ollokkiche ichoow 'doo'di uurichee saggi Kamur weyti uur ikasoonugleeste daage, leehamaade.
42001059	Inkoo weel teebatoo barye ka, 'doo'd khandihi weel yimiy. Icho la goorat magah aabbahiiski Sakkariiya layadeehe ibihin 'doonaane,
42001060	i'daasenyi abartiis, “Mele, magahiis Yoohana layadeeh” tidah.
42001061	Icho la wihi icho Eliissabeet iyidaaheen, “Etoo kaldaye kiinenye magahaas khabo mele!”
42001062	'Deerka aabbahiis dahano ka leeyyeedeene, magahi us weel ibahcho worsateen.
42001063	Sakkariiya la reenkoo lakachiirti daahe, wihi us chiire, “Magahiis a Yoohana.” 'Doo'd tuumman la girmeeste!
42001064	Chirraas on Sakkariiya toro afi goorat us waaye bahche, yeyyeede Waakh saa'de.
42001065	'Doo'di intaas kijiro tuumman roorro gesse, ili Ya'huudiya kuro khabo tuumman ka, enenyet wahanyeyyohane kaayyeeda.
42001066	Eti tuummane yeeda daage la mal gele, wihi islaworsate, “Weela 'deerka berri mehe yateeh?” Wihi tahe, saggi miigti Kamur weela ileejirto iche laarga.
42001067	Sakkariiyahi aabba Yoohanee Rubeyti Munyee buuhisse wori Waakh kaayyeede wihi us yidah,
42001068	“Kamuri Waakkhi Issiraayele a lasaa'do! I'di tahe us 'doo'diis a soofure.
42001069	Kamur 'Doorribehi miig khabo a inno siiche, ulla hiiy falfatiisti Dawuud layadeeh kayimiy.
42001070	I'di goorat us 'doo'diiski munyayyeenye Waákh íyeyyeedo ka cheekuu,
42001071	us chiiyteen a inno kajeycha, 'doo'di inno 'dii'do tuumman la ma inno kamiigowo.
42001072	Toro Kamur ayyintiisti munyeenye us gooche, us aacchinyeteen uur isoonugleesti ma kadabo.
42001073	Ayyintaas la a ayyinti Kamur aacchiheenki Aburaaham layadeeh igooche,
42001074	saggi us chiiyteen inno ikaribo icheeke. Toro la a inno gargaara roorro laan hiliis haagginna,
42001075	'dee geeddi inno jirro tuumman 'doo'di munyeenye toro fiffissan ortiis ka nateeh.
42001076	Inankaaw, at la eti Waákkhi Weyti Ween íyeyyeedo lakiyadeeh. At la Kamur ortiissa sohatta jit iharta,
42001077	uskeelichoki liikakuto ka, 'doo'diis saggi Waakh iribo abissa.
42001078	A mehe, Waakkheen uure nugulyahe toro a haagganyahe. Kamureen 'doo'diis a riba, banayhiis la i'di orrahti baryo sookortuu inno siicha,
42001079	'dee 'doo'di mug'dihi omooteet goya kajiro serey ka banay sootusa, inno yaakhicha, jiti nebeyeet inno gata.”
42001080	Yoohana la weynaate, Rubeyti Munyee ka miigowe. Ulla hidaad on fiddiye ichoowka ibeenki us 'doo'di Issiraayel isoobaho yitah.
42002001	Goorat maantaas Kaaysarhi Agaasta layadeeh amuri 'doo'di ili Rooma tuummane us anti lakeekkaacho iche bahche.
42002002	Waha a maanti oraate 'doo'd leekkaache geeddi Kiriiniyas gaafanahi Siiriya eheet.
42002003	Ebba la ilkerengeetti goorat aacchinyetiis fiddiite irte 'dee sirgaal magahiis a chiiro.
42002004	Yuussuf 'deerka ilkerengeetti Naasarete boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kajirto kakahe, boroofenhi Ya'huudiya ka, ilkerengeetti Be'deleheem layadeehe goorat karnati Dawuud layadeeh kadesse irte. Yuussuf la jeenteti us hiiy Dawuud iyahe, iche ilkerengeettaas iirte.
42002005	Yuussuf la Maariyati goorat us alkume leeirte, 'dee sirgaal magahenyeticho a chiiro. Maariya la chirraas a hulees.
42002006	Ilkerengeetti Be'deleheem kajiraani, Maariya hayohiche massateene, chiisse.
42002007	Maariya la huuratiche ka inankoo desse, darfo kaayyuubte, 'dari haanki hoolaat lakachibo goya kareeyisse. I'di tahe looj ka meel a waayeen.
42002008	Ilaas ka la ersimohoo adihicho fooricho ibeen toorribti a jiraan.
42002009	Hertoo Kamur la icho isoobahte, ababnaanki Kamur la il isooyage, intaas iifche. Ersimo dakkhan la weyti naheen.
42002010	I'daasenyi herti Waakh wihi iche ersimo itidah, “Roorro akhabina. I'di tahe ani Wori Haaggane 'doo'd tuumman kahamaadicho atin ikeene.
42002011	Ibeenka goya, ilkerengeet Dawuud ka 'Doorribe a atin liidele, ulla a Ki Lasubhe Kamure!
42002012	Wihi eti us yahe atin tuso a waha, weeli rucchule darfo lakaayyuube 'dar goya jiifo a agartaan.”
42002013	Chirraas on herti Waakhe ittaawenye serey kijirto geeyo dowto Waakh saa'ddaayi soobahte, herta Waakh isookhayte, wihi iche tidah,
42002014	“Waakkhi saraat a lasaa'do. 'Doo'di harrata ka Waakh kahamaado la nebey a lakakaalo!”
42002015	Inkoo herti Waakh nokhatte serey ikorte ka, ersimo wihi icho isiyidaaheen, “Kaha bal ilkerengeetti Be'deleheem a iranni waha yitahye Kamur inno isoocheeke a sooagarro.”
42002016	Ersimo 'deerka dowwa on irteene, Maariya ichoow Yuussuf 'heleene, weeli 'dar goya jiifo la argeen.
42002017	Inkoo ersimo weel argeen ka, wori kootte weel miinsane icho daageen 'doo'd icheekeen.
42002018	'Doo'di tuummane wihi ersimo yidaaheen daage la, weyti girmeeste.
42002019	I'daasenyi Maariya waha tuumman kasoo'hesse, weyti kamalatte.
42002020	Ersimo ichohi wihi icho daageen ichoow wihi icho argeen ka Waakh weynaacho toro saa'do nokhteen. Wihi icho argeen la a i'di kootte herti Waakh itidah on.
42002021	Inkoo teebatoo kutte ibeenki weel lakhandiyo yitah ka, weel magah liibahche, Yeesso layidah. Magaha la a ki goorat geeddi us uur laka igelin, herti Waakh ibihisse.
42002022	I'di Amurre Muusa liikachiiruu, maanti abarti weel desse daawti isladikho massisse ka, Yuussuf ichoow Maariya ba weel khaateene ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem geecheen, Yeesso Kamur ibahchaanee.
42002023	I'di Amurreti Kamur liikachiiruu, “Inanki huraate tuumman Kamure liibahcha.”
42002024	Soorriyoti Amurreti Kamur kachiiran bahcheen, waha la a “kutukuurrug lamma burbuure ommos kutukuurrug lamma rurrucchul.”
42002025	Maantaas la makhaabaloo Siimiyon layadeeh ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem a kijira. Ulla a eti fissane Waakh karooro. Ulla yaafohi Issiraayele uur lakhoboocho iche suga. Rubeyti Munyee la usu a leejirte.
42002026	Rubeyti Munyee la goorat wihi iche usu ibabbakkaahisse a mehe ya, geeddi us Ki Lasubhe koo Kamure iargin ma yamuut.
42002027	Siimiyon Rubeyti Munyee soowoyte uranti minki Waakhe buure gele. Chirri Yuussuf ichoow Maariya ba Yeesso minki Waakhe buure goya leesoogeleene icho wihi Amurre 'doonto yeelaan ka,
42002028	Siimiyon weel okhsate, Waakh kooliche wihi us yidah,
42002029	“Kamuri Miig Tuumman Leh, saggi at iayyissuu, anihi falfataahe toolla an nebey khabo ikhaat.
42002030	A mehe eti 'doorribo indoheey ka a arge.
42002031	At la usu a tannabissa enenyet tuumman arga.
42002032	Usu yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynane banay ibabbakkaahicha, 'doo'daahki Issiraayel la inkaanyit ikeena.”
42002033	Ooyo ichoow abarti weel ba wihi Siimiyon yidahye weel miinsan weyti kagirmeesteen.
42002034	Siimiyon 'deerka icho iweeste, Maariyati abarti weele la wihi us iyidah, “Weela Waakhe soobahsate, 'dee 'doo'di Issiraayel gaasoo riba gaasoo la bar tira. Ulla miigti Waakhe enenyet tusa, i'daasenyi 'doo'di buure usu a tirrima.
42002035	Waha a yitaaheene 'dee Waakh wihi icho uurassicho goyaka dowtaan soobabbakkaahicha. Ati la bolokkhi rubeytaah 'huno a i'di bolokkhi birlabi af leh.”
42002036	Maantaas la toro makhaabassoo Waákh íyeyyeeddo magahiche Aanna layadeeh laka a jirta. Iche la a inanti makhaabaloo Faanuwel layadeehe yaafticho la Aacha layadeeh. Iche la weyti araarrowte. Aanna la inkoo ladise, gu'h teeba on makhaabal leejirte,
42002037	makhaabaliche buje. 'Deerka muunkho eheete ichoowka gu'h tomon siyyeet ichoow gu'h affar eleesse. Iche la injire minki Waakhe buure ma kabahine, i'daasenyi ibeen ichoow maalim ba Waakh on wahatta, af hidatta toro weysatta.
42002038	Iche laka chirraas on timiyye jeenteti Yeessohi dessuu Waakh kala'd ilaabte, toro la 'doo'di Waakkhi 'doo'di ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem furo sugo laka weel woriis icheekte.
42002039	Chirri Yuussuf ichoow Maariya ba wihi Amurreti Kamur 'doonto massicheen ka, goobichoki Naasarete boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kajiro inokhteen.
42002040	Yeesso la weynaate toro miigowe, weyti kharaawe, haaggi Waakhe buure la usu a leejire.
42002041	Gu'hi soomaro tuumman Yuussuf ichoow Maariya ba ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme irtaane daawti Baasakka gelaan.
42002042	Maanti Yeesso gu'h tomon ichoow lamma eleele ka, i'di orrangateet u irteene daawti Baasakka geleen.
42002043	Inkoo daawe massatte ka, anki goob miinsateene Yeessohi inankichee la ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka'hade. I'daasenyi Yuussuf ichoow Maariya saggi us i'hade ma kasin.
42002044	Kol us 'doo'di addan goya sooraaho on koogyahiine maalinki nool sohteen. Yomboka Yeesso 'doo'dicho ichoow aalassicho goya kayowteen.
42002045	Chirri icho waayeen ka ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem inokhteene intaas ka yowteen.
42002046	Ibeenki seyyahnaatteet inkoo icho Yeerusaleem kakaheen ka, Yeessohi uranti minki Waakhe buure ka 'doo'di Yeedi Waakh 'doo'd abcho goycho fiddiyo, wihi icho essaan dagansati toro walah wowworsati 'heleen.
42002047	'Doo'di wihi laworsate us soolaabe daage tuumman la kharatiis weyti kagirmeeste.
42002048	Aabbahiis ichoow abartiis la chirri icho argeen ka weyti girmeesteene, abartiis la wihi iche itidah, “Inankaaw a i'doh i'da nah iyeessa? Ani ichoow aabbahaah ba weyti nahne geeddi nah kiyowanni on.”
42002049	Yeesso la wihi us worsate, “A i'doh iyowattaan? Saggi an min Aabbaheey ifiddiyo ma garattaan a?”
42002050	I'daasenyi icho wihi us idowo wihi icho miinsanyahiin ma aban.
42002051	Yeesso 'deerka aabbahiis ichoow abartiis raahe ilkerengeetti Naasaret ikhubteene, wihi icho iyidaaheen la weyti raahe. I'daasenyi abartiis wihi us essi tuumman uur on ilaabatte.
42002052	Yeesso la weynaate toro weyti kharaawe, Waakh ichoow weeli enenyet ba jilhaateen.
42003001	Waakh saahka ínam Sakkariiyaki Yoohana layadeeh hidaad ka wori us 'doo'd icheeko siiche. Maantaas la Kaaysarhi Tibeeriyas layadeehe gu'h tomon ichoow chan karnati ili Rooma tuumman eheet. Boontiyo Bilaato la gaafanahi boroofenhi Ya'huudiya eheete, 'Herood Antiiba la boroofenhi Gaalilaaya itoolla, walaaliiski Fiilif layadeeh la boroofenhi Itureeya ichoow Tirakoniiti itoolla, Laysaniyas la usú boroofenhi Abileen itoolla.
42003002	Aanas ichoow Kayaafas la kuhaaniyyohi wewweene eheneet.
42003003	Yoohana la hawti 'dusso Yoordan tuumman kaassohte. Ayti Waakhe us cheeke la a ki 'doo'd uskeelicho kasoonokhti, ulla baattissiyo, 'dee Waakh uskeelicho ikakuto.
42003004	Saggi buuggi eti goorat Waákh íyeyyeedo Isaaya layadeeh liikachiiruu, “Etoo hidaad ka a rirriira, ‘Kamur jit imujjummoocha, jiti us leeyamiit ficcha.
42003005	Inti ankhare tuumman buuhicha, halal tuumman ichoow kuro iskeekkaacha, jitassi khokkhollokkhan tuumman la ficcha, jitassi sussuuje la mujjum haaggicha.
42003006	Weeli enenyet tuumman la 'dee saggi Waakh 'doo'd iribo a arga!’ ”
42003007	'Doo'di ittaawenye baattissiyoti labaattissiyo 'doono la Yoohana iyimiyye, Yoohana la wihi us iyidah, “Dessi Toof! Ayyo atin tootooche 'dee holi Waakh dowwanoha ka keeno kafiriddaan?
42003008	Taba gurnaanki saggi rumanka atin uskeel ikasoonokhatteen tuso dela. Taba la iisekkeysanna, ‘Aburaaham a aacchihaanya,’ eelanna. A mehe wihi an atin isoocheeko, Waakh a geeddi us dagahta urgiyicho us nyaakhut nyaakhut Aburaaham kayeelo!
42003009	Waakh i'di eti uroti geeyo hiiyyay khabaani goosso dahan kakhabuu kola 'dee a atin goocha. Geeyi gurnaanki haaggan idelin tuumman la a lagoocha 'dab goya lakalug'da.”
42003010	Urur wihi us Yoohana worsate, “Mehe 'deerka yeello?”
42003011	Yoohana wihi us ilaabe, “Eti ubbaar lamma derdeer khabo, eti ikhabin koo a siicho, eti golol khabo la ki ikhabin a leegismo.”
42003012	'Doo'doo kooddi goocho baattissiyo yimiy laka wihi us Yoohana worsate “Eti ween nah la mehe yeello?”
42003013	Yoohana la wihi us ilaabe, “Taba chilimme geeddi la'doono on 'doo'd kagudda, wohoo rucchul laka akorsanna.”
42003014	Iskartoo laka wihi iche Yoohana worsatte, “Nah la mehe yeello?” Wihi us ilaabe, “Taba enenyet miig ka chilimme asarina ommos enenyet wihi beenaat akacheekina. Macchaara geeddi atin 'hessaan oollo'dina.”
42003015	'Doo'd wohoo khummane suge. Uurassicho ka kol Yoohana Ki Lasubhe lasugo yahe kamasseen.
42003016	Yoohana la wihi us icho dakkhan ilaabe “An toolla bicche atin kabaattissiya, i'daasenyi etoo ani ikaween a yamiit. Anna falfihi kobtiissa an jalkhicho ma mu'dan. Ulla Rubeyti Munyee ka ichoow 'dab ka a atin baattissiya.
42003017	Birtiisti gurnaan lakahafaricho, dahane kakhaba. Inti gurnaan lakatumo hara, 'dargaayye koondi kichiba, i'daasenyi urfo 'dabi jirtuu ijitin goya kichiba.”
42003018	Yoohana la yeedassoo ittaawe ka enenyet uur miigooche Wori Haaggan icheeke.
42003019	I'daasenyi maanti Yoohana 'Heroodhi gaafanee jeente 'Heroodiyati makhaabál walaaliisenye us diste ichoow suujoonki noole 'Herood 'hor yeele leejaakhuu,
42003020	'Herood suujoon kakhaye Yoohana jeela gesse.
42003021	Geedda enenyet tuumman labaattissiyo, Yeesso laka yimiyye labaattissiye. Yeesso Waakh wahtaayi, sereye bakkaahte,
42003022	Rubeyti Munyee la i'di kutukuurrug u serey ka isooyagte. Hooyoo la serey kasooyeede wihi us yidah, “Ati a Weeleeyki an weyti 'doono, weyti ikahamaadicho.”
42003023	Maanti Yeesso hili us Yeedi Waakh cheeko sookhabte, Yeesso geeddi gu'h tomon seyyahe khabe. 'Doo'd tuumman la goorat kol Yeesso ínam Yuussuf yahe koogyahe. Yuussuf la a hiiy 'Heeli.
42003024	'Heeli la a ínam Maa'da'd, Maa'da'd la a ínam Laawi, Laawi la a ínam Meelchi, Meelchi a ínam Yaanay, Yaanay la a ínam Yuussuf.
42003025	Yuussuf la a ínam Mataatiya, Mataatiya la a ínam Aamos, Aamos la a ínam Naa'hum, Naa'hum la a ínam Eesili, Eesili la a ínam Naagay,
42003026	Naagay la a ínam Maa'd, Maa'd la a ínam Mataatiya, Mataatiya la a inam Seemeyin, Seemeyin la a ínam Yoosech, Yoosech la a ínam Yooda,
42003027	Yooda la a ínam Yoowanan, Yoowanan la a ínam Reesa, Reesa la a ínam Serubabeel, Serubabeel la a ínam Cheeltiyeel, Cheeltiyel la a ínam Neeri, Neeri la a ínam Meelchi,
42003028	Meelchi la a ínam Aadi, Aadi la a ínam Koosam, Koosam la a ínam Elmaadam, Elmaadam la a ínam Eer, Eer la a ínam Yoochuwa,
42003029	Yoochuwa la a ínam Eliyeesar, Eliyeesar la a ínam Yoorim, Yoorim la a ínam Maa'da'd, Maa'da'd la a ínam Laawi, Laawi la a ínam Siimiyon,
42003030	Siimiyon la a ínam Yuuda, Yuuda la a ínam Yuussuf, Yuussuf la a ínam Yoonam, Yoonam la a ínam Eliyakiim, Eliyakiim la a ínam Meleeya,
42003031	Meleeya la a ínam Meena, Meena la a ínam Mataa'da, Mataa'da la a ínam Naa'dan, Naa'dan la a ínam Dawuud,
42003032	Dawuud la a ínam Yeesse, Yeesse la a ínam Obeed, Obeed la a ínam Boowas, Boowas la a ínam Saalmon, Saalmon la a ínam Nahachoon, Nahachoon la a ínam Aminaadab,
42003033	Aminaadab la a ínam Raam, Raam la a ínam 'Heesiron, 'Heesiron la a ínam Beeres, Beeres la a ínam Yuuda.
42003034	Yuuda la a ínam Yaakoobo, Yaakoobo la a ínam Isakh, Isakh la a ínam Aburaaham, Aburaaham la a ínam Teerah, Teerah la a ínam Naahor, Naahor la a ínam Seerug,
42003035	Seerug la a ínam Reewu, Reewu la a ínam Beeleg, Beeleg la a ínam Eeber, Eeber la a ínam Cheelah, Cheelah la a ínam Kaaynan,
42003036	Kaaynan la a ínam Aarfakisad, Aarfakisad la a ínam Cheem, Cheem la a ínam Noowa, Noowa la a ínam Lameeg, Lameeg la a ínam Me'duseelah,
42003037	Me'duseelah la a ínam Eenog, Eenog la a ínam Yaared, Yaared la a ínam Ma'halaleel, Ma'halaleel la a ínam Kaaynan, Kaaynan la a ínam Eenoch,
42003038	Eenoch la a ínam See'd, See'd la a ínam Aadam, Aadam la ooyohiis Waakhe eheet.
42004001	Yeesso usuhi Rubeyti Munyee buuhisse hawti Yoordane 'dusso kasoonokhte, Rubeyti Munyee la woyte hidaad geesse.
42004002	Seytaan la hidaad ka ibeen tomon affar Yeesso kajmeti uskeel kalugu'ddo ikeene, ulla ibeennetaas tuumman ma golossanne, 'da'ddaboka ankaye.
42004003	Seytaan la wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Chirri at Weeli Waakh tahe, daakka leeyeede makaate a yitaahe.”
42004004	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chiirnaanneti Waakh wihi kachiiran, ‘Weeli enenyet golol kalday mee kanoolyahe!’ ”
42004005	Seytaan toro Yeesso intoo deer iwoye, koloo kalday on yaafohi harra tuumman tuse.
42004006	Seytaan la wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Anto ichoow kamurroonki yaafoha tuumman a kisiicha. I'di tahe ani liisiiche, eti an siin 'doono la ani on siicha.
42004007	'Deerka chirri at iwahatte waha tuumman wahaahha yateehiin.”
42004008	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe “Wihi chiiran, ‘Kamuri Waakkhaahe waho, toro la usu kalday on ihil!’ ”
42004009	Seytaan toro Yeesso ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem iwoye, minki Waakhe buure guutiis korche, wihi us iyidah, “Chirri at Weeli Waakh tahe, inta kanyaam.
42004010	I'di tahe Chiirnaanneti Waakh wihi kachiiran, “ ‘Waakh hertiis amure ibahcha, iche la mujjum kiyaakhissa.
42004011	Iche la dahanohiche ka serey kiokkhissa, uus 'dee luhtaah dagah gu'ddine.’ ”
42004012	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chiirnaanneti Waakh mehe tadeeh ya, ‘Kamuri Waakkhaahe kajme agelin.’ ”
42004013	Inkoo Seytaan Yeesso kajmeta uskeel kalugu'ddo tuumman kakaje ka, katabe ibeenki leemujjume leesuge.
42004014	Yeesso miigti Rubeyti Munyee siisse khabaayi, boroofenhi Gaalilaaya inokhte. Wor Yeesso la harrataas tuumman kataa'he.
42004015	Ulla minassi weysiite Ya'huud ka 'doo'd wori Waakh abche, 'doo'di daage tuumman la Yeesso saa'de.
42004016	Yeesso ilkerengeetti Naasarete lakasooweynaache inokhte. Seeri Lanaso ka i'di orrangateet u minki weysiite Ya'huud irte. Ulla tolossate Yeedi Waakhe 'doo'd isoomaa.
42004017	Khadaaboo yuubane etoo Waákh íyeyyeedo Isaaya layadeeh chiire liidiibe. Ulla khadaab furfure, inti waha kachiiranyahiin 'hele.
42004018	“Rubeyti Kamur a ileejirta, i'di tahe usu a isubhe 'dee Wori Haaggan miskiino icheeka. Kamur a isooergate, 'dee 'doo'di uskeel hide saggi Kamur isoofuro icheeka, 'doo'di indo laa la Kamur indo a fura, 'doo'di sina lakawaaricho la Kamur sina a kabahcha.
42004019	A isooergate 'dee gu'hi Kamur haaggiis 'doo'd tuso icheeka.”
42004020	Yeesso 'deerka inkoo us waha soome ka, khadaab yuube, ilbooyi minki weysiit idiibe, orronte. 'Doo'di minki weysiit goya kajire tuumman la Yeesso indo katoolliche.
42004021	Yeesso la wihi us 'doo'd iyidah, “Chiirnaanneta Waakhe toolla an soome atin daagteen maalinka a labuuhiche.”
42004022	'Doo'd tuumman haaggiis kaayyeede toro yeeda haaggane afiis kasoobahe kagirmeeste, wihi icho isworsateen, “Waha inam Yuussuf menya?”
42004023	Yeesso la wihi us 'doo'd ilaabe, “Rumanka mammahta a isoocheektaan, ‘Ilkitarri issamaay! Wihi weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane nah daagne at ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hum ka yeesse, ilkerengeettiin ka yeel.’ ”
42004024	Wihi addane us yidah “Rume atin icheeka, et Waákh íyeyyeedo goobicho ka lakhaatti mele.
42004025	Rumanka maanti eti Waakh íyeyyeedo Eliiya layadeeh jire, muunkhoyyohi ittaawe ili Issiraayel a kijireen. Maanassaas gu'h seyyah ichoow nyuus tuumman hir ili Issiraayel ma 'deyine, abaarti uskul harra tuumman gesse.
42004026	Waakh Eliiya icho ma iergine, i'daasenyi makhaabassoo muunkheenye ilkerengeetti Sarefaate boroofenhi Siidon kijirto taal iche ierge.
42004027	Maanti goorat eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Eliicha layadeeh jire laka, 'doo'di ittaawenye ili Issiraayel ka bu'dá sar kakhabo a jire. I'daasenyi Waakh kichekoo kaldach laka ma samaanne, eti kaldache us samaache, a etoo ili Siiriya kayimiyye magahiis Naaman layadeeh.”
42004028	'Doo'di kootte minki weysiit goya kajiro tuumman chirri us waha daage ka, weyti hollowe.
42004029	Kaheene, Yeesso jiiteene, hali ilkerengeete kadisantahe tahariis geecheen, usu ankhar gaataanee.
42004030	I'daasenyi urur goya iskagu'dde katabe.
42004031	Yeesso 'deerka ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hume boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kajirto ikhubte, Seeri Lanaso ka enenyet Yeedi Waakh abin sookhabte.
42004032	Icho la saggi us 'doo'd walah iabcho kagirmeesteen. A mehe woriis anto khaba.
42004033	Etoo ginnatoo uskul dakhatti la chirraas minki weysiite Ya'huude goya kijira. Ulla weyti riire,
42004034	“Wooy! Yeessohi Naasaret, nah katab!” yidah. “Nahe nah massin timiy? Ani alah eti at tahe a garda, at a Ki Munyeenye Waakh kayimiy,” yidah.
42004035	Yeesso ginna leejaakhe, “Gammadiche etaas goya kasoobah!” iyidah. Ginna 'deerka 'doo'd tuumman ortiis ka et laga'dde, i'd addane iche tidah mele, et kasoobahte.
42004036	'Doo'd tuumman girmeeste wihi us isiyidah, “Ayta weyti a girma. A yeedi anto ichoow miig khabo, a mehe ginnayyo amur on ibahcha, icho la soobahaan.”
42004037	Wori usu miinsan la ilassaas soodow tuumman kataa'he.
42004038	Yeesso minki weysiit kabahe min Siimon irte. Seyyoh Siimon la sare weyti kululaatta, Yeesso gargaar daaheen.
42004039	Ulla kagulguubsate, sarti kululaatti leejaakhe lakabukkhe. Chirraas on sookahte, icho goollin sookhabatte.
42004040	Chirra orrahe dihto, 'doo'di khakkhannane sugeerreti yeerare khabo tuumman Yeesso liikeene. Yeesso la kooba dahano korche samaache.
42004041	Ginnayyo 'doo'di ittaawe goya kabaheen ichohi riiro, “Ati Weeli Waakhe” essi. I'daasenyi Yeesso ginnayyo leejaakhe, amuri icho kaayyeedaan la tirte. I'di tahe saggi us Ki Lasubhe iyahe a gartaan.
42004042	Baryo ka Yeesso inti enenyet ikajirin irte. 'Doo'd la usu yowta, chirri icho inti us kijiro yimaateen ka, usuhi icho katabo tirteen.
42004043	I'daasenyi wihi us 'doo'd iyidah, “Wihi Waakh gooche, an a irda ilkerengeetohi addan ka laka Wori Haaggane dakhi Waakh miinsan 'doo'd icheeka. I'di tahe wahaase ani liisooergate.”
42004044	Ulla ili Ya'huud ka minassi weysiite Ya'huud ka Yeedi Waakh cheeke.
42005001	Yeesso maantoo beyti Gennaasarete toolla, enenyet la usu kuurure Yeedi Waakhe dagansataa.
42005002	Ulla koobanhoo lammeenye beytaas afiche lakatabe arge. 'Doo'di kooban leh la oroohti bahag lakakhabti iche dikha.
42005003	Yeesso koobanhoo kore. Koobanha la eti leh a etoo Siimon layadeeh. Yeesso la leeyeede 'dee kooban a leetakho bey afiche i'daaru a kaseehicho. Yeesso 'deerka kooban goya orronte, Yeedi Waakh 'doo'd abche.
42005004	Inkoo us yeediis massiche ka, wihi us Siimon iyidah, “Bal kooban inti bicche kahogyahiin iwoye, 'dee oroohtiin bicche goya iseya, bahag khabda.”
42005005	Siimon wihi us Yeesso ilaabe “Eti ween, nah ibeenki noole hol downe, bahag nah khabanne la mele. I'daasenyi jeenteti at i'daas itidah u, oroohti bahag lakakhabti bey goya a kalug'da on gon.”
42005006	Orooh bicche goya kalug'deene, bahaggi weyti ittaawe khabteene ichoowka oroohe soogoote.
42005007	'Deerka wahalhichoki koobanhi addan fuulo dahan ka waheene, 'dee a gargaareen. Icho la yimaateene, kooban lammacho bahag labuuhiche ichoowka kooban bicche goya kabaabiin leheet.
42005008	Chirri Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh wihi yitah arge ka, inkaanyit ka Yeesso ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dde wihi us iyidah, “Kamur an a eti uskeel leh, nyaam ikatab.”
42005009	A mehe Siimon ichoow wahalhiis tuumman ba bahaggi ittaawenye icho khabteen ka weyti girmeesteen.
42005010	Yeele Sebedaayoti iche laka Siimon walhisse, Yaakoobo ichoow Yoohana leh laka weyti girmeysatte. Yeesso la wihi us Siimon iyidah, “Roorro akhabin. Uus toolla kakhabatti, enenyete Waakh ikeenta.”
42005011	'Deerka koobanohicho jiiteene bey afiche geesse, walah tuumman katabte, Yeesso raahte.
42005012	Yeesso ilkerengeettoo kajiraayi, etoo bu'datoo uskul sar tuumman kasoofoofte yimiy. Chirri us Yeesso arge ka fool il kakhabte hawwaaste wihi us iyidah, “Kamur, chirri at 'doonto at bi'dir ibihin a tabuu'd.”
42005013	Yeesso dahan ooge, et 'daare, wihi us iyidah, “A 'doona, bi'dir bah!” Chirraas on et bu'da kabahte.
42005014	Yeesso la amur ibahche wihi us iyidah, “Etoo kalday laka jit ka aleeyeedine, i'daasenyi kuhaani iiro saggi at isamaatte istus. Sadakhati amurre Muusa kachiirane eti bu'da lakabahche bahcho bihiche, 'dee garti saggi lakisamaache a titaahe.”
42005015	I'daasenyi wori Yeesso miinsan weyti ilaas tuumman kataa'he, 'deerka 'doo'di buure yimiyye wihi us 'doo'd abcho dagansate, 'doo'di khakkhannan laka yimiyye lasamaache.
42005016	I'daasenyi Yeesso kolassi ittaawe intoo us keley kayahe irte Waakh wahte.
42005017	Maantooka Yeesso Yeedi Waakhe 'doo'd abcha, Farissaayotoo ichoow tagaammeti amurre la intaase fiddiyaan. 'Doo'da la goobassi Gaalilaaya ichoow Ya'huudiya ichoow ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme kayimaateen. Kamur la Yeesso miigti us 'doo'di khakkhannan kasamaacho a siiche.
42005018	'Doo'doo la etoo sar tuumman hanjaawte ilaal kasoosi'de, ichehi min goyaka Yeesso ortiis tassille 'doontaa.
42005019	Chi'iche jeenteti urur buur iyahuu, inti iche gatto waayte ka, min sartiis korte. 'Dohtoo yeesse, et ilaaliis khabaayi 'dohtaas ka il isoowoyte ichoowka urur ukkuriis ka Yeesso ortiis tissil.
42005020	Chirri Yeesso saggi 'doo'daas ikakhuufo arge ka, wihi us etaas iyidah, “Aalaaw, uskeelaah a liikaakute.”
42005021	Farissaayo ichoow tagaammeti amurre wihi icho uurassicho goyaka esseen, “Eta gafo a ayyo? Ayyo enenyet uskeeliis ikakuta, Waakh on menye?”
42005022	Yeesso la wihi icho kamassaan garte, wihi us worsate, “Mehede malassi i'daase uurassiin ka idowattaan?
42005023	Mehe maanta ki addan ka'dabakhe, chirri an, ‘Uskeelaah a liikaakute,’ iadeeh a ommos an, ‘Kahe soho’ iadeeh?
42005024	I'daasenyi saggi Ínam Aadam antohi us harrata ka enenyet uskeel ikakuto ikhabo a abattaan.” Wihi us eti sare hanjaawte iyidah, “Wihi an kisoocheeko, tolosso ilaalaah okkhiche, goob iro!”
42005025	Et chirraas on 'doo'd tuumman ortiis ka tolossate, wihi us kajiife okhsate, usuhi Waakh saa'do goob irte.
42005026	'Doo'd tuumman girmeeste, Waakh saa'de. Icho tuumman roorro gesse, wihi icho yidaaheen, “Maalinka girmo a agarre!”
42005027	Waha 'dubicho ka Yeesso bahe, sohtaayi etoo kooddi goocho magahiis Laawi layadeeh, usuhi meessi kooddi lakagoocho goya fiddiyo wihi us iyidah, “Isooraahe, abattiteey ateeh!”
42005028	Laawi la kahe, walah tuumman katabe usu raahe.
42005029	Laawi saahka goobiis ka sukuukuhi buure Yeesso ibahche, ururi buurenye 'doo'doo kooddi goocho illeh kijiraan ichoow 'doo'doo addan icho a leegolossata.
42005030	I'daasenyi Farissaayo ichoow tagaammeti amurre iche laka Farissaayee nyunnyuute wihi iche abatti Yeesso itidah, “Atin a i'doh 'doo'di kooddi goocho ichoow ki uskeel leh ileegolossattaan?”
42005031	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Doo'di ilkitárri yowti ki feffeyyan menye, i'daasenyi a ki khakkhannan.
42005032	'Doo'di an iimiyye an waho, ki 'doo'di fiffissan isiekkaacho menye, i'daasenyi a ki uskeel lehe, 'dee uskeelicho a kasoonokhti.”
42005033	Icho la wihi icho Yeesso iyidaaheen, “Abatti Yoohana ichoow too Farissaayo kolassi ittaawe af a hidatta, weysatta, i'daasenyi taah a golossatta one walah danta.”
42005034	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Doo'di mindischo yimiy geeddi us eti min disti leejiro af a hiita?
42005035	I'daasenyi maane a tamiit, ti 'doo'd eti min disti lakakhaato. Maanassaase 'dee 'doo'd af hiita.”
42005036	Yeesso 'doo'd imammahte wihi us iyidah, “Et goonankoo dafareete husub soogoocho, too raagan kadaddabo mele. Chirri us i'da yeele, dafarti husub a khakkharradiche, goonanki dafarti husub ichoow dafarti raagan la ma isgelaan.
42005037	Ommolla et farsoti sabiibe husub urgohi uktoote raagan kachibo mele. Chirri i'da layeele, farsoti husub urgo a fuurissa doossa, farsotaas khubatta, urgo laka lawaaya.
42005038	Farsoti sabiibe husub, urgohi uktoote husub on lakachiba.
42005039	Et inkoo us farsoti raagan dame toro farsoti husub 'doono mele. I'di tahe mehe yadeeh ya ‘Farsoti raagane deefta.’ ”
42006001	Maalinkoo Seeri Lanasee Yeesso abattitiis khabaayi gosase goya raaha. Abattitiis la ilmohoo 'dargaayye guratte, dahanohicho ka butatte tuhum.
42006002	Farissaayotoo la wihi iche worsatte, “Atin a i'doh Seeri Lanaso ka wihi amurre 'dii'ddantahe iyeessaan?”
42006003	Yeesso wihi us icho ilaabe “Atin injire wihi Dawuud yeele maanti usu ichoow 'doo'di us khabe ba raarahteen Yeedi Waakh ka ma soomin a?
42006004	Dawuud uranti minki Waakhe gele, makaateti Waakh liibahche khaate, yuhuyye, toro reeri leejire laka wohoo siiche. Amurreti laraaho ka la kuhaaniyyo kaldaye makaatetaas yaham.”
42006005	Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Ínam Aadam a Kamuri Seeri Lanaso.”
42006006	Maantoo addane Seeri Lanasee ka, Yeesso toro minki weysiite Ya'huud gele, 'doo'd wori Waakh abche. Etoo dahanti miigeet hanjaawte la intaas a kijire.
42006007	Farissaayo ichoow tagaammeti amurre wohoo icho Yeesso kacheektaane yowtaane, 'deerka usu Yeesso Seeri Lanaso ka etaas samaacho mujjum fiiricheen.
42006008	I'daasenyi Yeesso malicho a garta wihi us eti dahan laa iyidah, “Kah enenyet tuumman ortiis tolosso.” Et 'deerka kahe intaas tolossate.
42006009	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us icho iyidah, “Wihi an atin worsadi, wihi haaggane layeelo ichoow suujoonki layeelo koh amurreteen israahaan? Jiroti enenyete laribo israahaan bal jiroti enenyete labaabiicho?”
42006010	Yeesso icho tuumman indo leeraahe 'deerka wihi us et iyidah, “Dahantaah fiti!” Et i'daas yeele, dahane toro tuum haagsatte.
42006011	I'daasenyi sirgoweene, i'di icho Yeesso yadeehiin isworsan sookhabteen.
42006012	Ibeennetaas kichekoo Yeesso bahe burroo kore, ibeenki nool Waakh wahte.
42006013	Chirri il soobaryo ka abattitiis isiwahe, goyche ka et tomon ichoow lamma soobahche, ergaanotiis kayeesse.
42006014	'Doo'daas us soobahsate a Siimonhi us magahoo addan ibahche Beetero yidah, walaaliiski Andereeya layadeeh, Yaakoobo, Yoohana, Fiilif, Bar'dolomaayo,
42006015	Mattaayo, Toomas, Yaakoobohi inam Alfaayee, Siimonhi magahiis Yaaftiis'doone layadeeh ichoow,
42006016	Yuuda inam Yaakoobo ichoow Yuuda Iskaariyoot ki yomboka Yeessó 'dub gooche.
42006017	Ulla ergaanotiis khabaayi bur kasookhubte 'dowhoo tolossate. Ururi buurenye abattitiise ichoow 'doo'di ittaawenye boroofenhi Ya'huudiya ichoow ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ichoow ilkerengeetohi rurrucchule beyti buure afiche yaalle i'di maanta Tiiro ichoow Siidon illehe laka, intaas a kijire.
42006018	'Doo'daas tuumman la a yimiyye 'dee wihi Yeesso essi dagansata, toro sugeerreticho lakasamaacha. 'Doo'di ginnayyo dakhtaan laka lasamaache.
42006019	'Doo'd tuumman ebba Yeesso 'daarin 'doona, i'di tahe miige usu kasoobahta icho tuumman samaassa.
42006020	Yeesso la abattitiis yeye, wihi us yidah, “'Doo'di Waakh imaalo, a atinhi toolla miskiine, a mehe dakhi Waakh a kiinna.
42006021	'Doo'di Waakh imaalo, a atinhi toolla raarah khabtaan, i'di tahe a atin ladargichaa! 'Doo'di Waakh imaalo, a atinhi toolla ooytaan, i'di tahe a atin lahamaadichaa.
42006022	Waakh a atin imaala maanti enenyet jeente Ínam Aadam u atin 'dii'do, atin riho, ommos atin abaaro, magahiin uskeeli nool kawaho.
42006023	“Taba gi'de chirri sina atin lakawaariche laka, weyti hamaada, gir'daama, i'di tahe Waakh goobiis ka kala'ddi buurenye atin gutaa. A mehe ooyenyetiche saggaas on 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo sina ikawaaarisse.
42006024	“I'daasenyi atinhi toolla kamurree sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! I'di tahe haaggi harrata orey on uur atin khobooche.
42006025	Atinhi toolla dargan, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! I'di tahe a raarahattaan. Atinhi toolla hamaaddaan sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! I'di tahe a uuwwissaane ooytaan.
42006026	Atinhi toolla 'doo'd tuumman atin koolicho, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure. I'di tahe aacchinyetiin laka goorat saggaas on 'doo'di 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo iskaayyeelo ikoolisse.
42006027	“Atinhi idagansattaan wihi an atin iadeeh, chiiytiin 'doona, 'doo'di atin 'dii'do la haag on tusa,
42006028	'doo'di atin falo imaala, ki atin leeabaarramo la Waakh iwaha.
42006029	Chirri etoo fodooroo kigu'dde, fodoori addan laka siiche a kigu'ddo. Chirri etoo kabuu'daah kaakhaate, ubbaaraahki deere us khaato laka atiran.
42006030	Eti tuummane walah kidaahe siiche, chi' etoo wohoo wahaahe khaate la, aleemarmine a kasookhaatin.
42006031	Wihi kootte incheenka atinhi atin liiyeelo 'doontaan, 'doo'di addan iyeela.
42006032	“Chirri atin 'doo'di atin 'doono kalday on 'doontaan, walah iche atin ibahto mele. 'Doo'di uskeel leh laka, 'doo'di icho 'doono a 'doonaan!
42006033	Chirri atin 'doo'di haag atin iyeelo kalday on atin laka haag iyeessaan la walah iche atin ibahto mele. 'Doo'di uskeel leh laka i'daas a yeela on.
42006034	Chirri atin 'doo'di mog atin kagele 'dee atin mogtaas kasugtaan kaldach on mog siissaan la mehe atin ibahta? 'Doo'di uskeel leh laka, 'doo'di addane uskeel lehe 'dee mog sooguto mog a siicha on!
42006035	I'daasenyi taba chiiytiin 'doona, haag iyeela, mog siicha ichohi atin isooguto asugina. 'Deerka kala'ddiin la a buuraatta, toro nyaakhuti Waakkhi Weyti Weene tateehiin. A mehe us 'doo'di kala'd ikhabin ichoow ki sussuuje uur a i'dabakhyahe.
42006036	Saggi Aabbahiin uur inugulyahe u, atin laka 'doo'di addan uur inugleesda.
42006037	“Taba uurassiin goyaka enenyet ahukkumina uus Waakh atin hukkumine. Taba enenyet uskeele yeesseen iidowina, uus atin laka uskeele yeesseen atin liidaahane. Taba enenyet uskeel ikakuta, 'dee uskeeliin a atin liikakuto.
42006038	Enenyet walah siicha, atin la walah a atin lasiichaa. Wihi buurenye, meel liijahe, laruhe ichoowka khubti iche sabho lakaachiba. A mehe geeddi atin 'doo'di addan iyeessaan, geeddaase atin liiyeela.”
42006039	Mammahta laka 'doo'd ibahche. “Etoo indo laa, koo indo laa a angaamicha? Lammache ankhar ma iskaleedihto?
42006040	Eti walah laabcho, eti walah abcho ma kaween. I'daasenyi eti tuummane walah mujjum laabche, i'di eti walah abche yateeh.
42006041	“A i'doh urufti il walaalaah kijirto iagarta, gurtunki issaah goya kijiro la iargin?
42006042	At saggoh walaalaah, ‘Walaalaaw, alley uruftaas il kaajirto a kaabahcho,’ ikatadeeh ati rubeytaah la gurtunki issaah goya kijiro ma agarto? Iskaayyeessooy koloo gurtunki issaah goya kajiro bihiche, 'dee urufti il walaalaah goya kajirto mujjum agare, bihi.
42006043	“Geey haaggane gurnaanki suuje bahcho mele, geey suujenye gurnaanki haaggan bahcho mele.
42006044	Geeyba gurnaanki us bahcho lakaabta. Iyookkoka geeyi bilhil dommog ma kaguratti ommos geeyi khasah medeer ma kaguratti.
42006045	Eti haaggan uuriis laka a haagganyahe gone, haaggaas on dela. Eti suuje la uuriis a suuj gone suujoonkaas on dela. A mehe wihi afiis kasoobaho, a wihi uuriis goya buuho.
42006046	“A i'doh ani, ‘Kamur, Kamur,’ ikadowtaane wihi an atin idowo la iyeelina?
42006047	Eti ani iyamiite wihi an idowo daago toro la raaho, wihi us iyoogyahe a atin tusa.
42006048	Etaas a i'di eti min diso, weyti il khute, inti ng'aajjee ka daddaabohi ilaat dise. 'Duley yimiyye, bicchehi buure minkaas gu'ddeene, i'daasenyi ma sesseehin, i'di tahe mujjume disanyahee.
42006049	I'daasenyi eti yeedeey daago toro iraahin a i'di eti min dise min la daddaabohi ilaat ikhabin. Uus hafari miige sookahe minkaas gu'dde, min tuumman reye, bar waaye.”
42007001	Chirri Yeesso waha dakkhan 'doo'd iyidahye us massiche ka, ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hum gele.
42007002	Etoo koobbintoo iskareet itoollo la ilbooyiiskoo us weyti 'doono weyti khannanyahe, a omoottanyahe.
42007003	Eta iskar itoollo chirri us Yeesso woriis daage ka, ewweenkoo Ya'huud ergate, Yeesso a lasoowaho, a yimaate ilbooyiis a samaacho.
42007004	Chi'icho Yeesso iyimaateen ka hawwaasteene, wihi icho iyidaaheen, “A imasse cha'at eta waha iyeesso,
42007005	a mehe yaafteen a 'doona, toro minkeenki weysiite Ya'huud laka a inno idise.”
42007006	Yeesso 'deerka ewween raahe. Chirri us minki eti koobbinti iskareet itoollo idowwaate ka, etaas aalassiiskoo Yeesso or kasoodowche, wihi us iyidah, “Kamur, sina iiskawaarin, a mehe minkeeyki at tamiit ma mu'dan.
42007007	Jeentetaas u anihi kiamiit ma mu'dane, i'daasenyi sooyeed ilbooyeey la a samaataa.
42007008	I'di tahe ani rubeyteey laka a etoo iskarti addane ikawewween antohicho raaho, toro la iskarti addane an andi laka a jirta. Chirri an koo, ‘Kaale,’ iidah a yamiit. Chirri an koo, ‘Nyaam iro,’ iidah la a irta. Chirri an ilbooyeey, ‘Waha yeel,’ iidah la a yeela.”
42007009	Chirri Yeesso waha daage ka weyti girmeeste. Ururi usu sooraaho iurgiye, wihi us iyidah, “Wihi an atin iadeeh, an injire yaafohi Issiraayel goyaka laka eti geedda weyti Waakh kakhuufo ma 'helin!”
42007010	'Doo'di kootte lasooergate 'deerka min inokhte, ilbooyi khannan usuhi samaate 'heleen.
42007011	Yomboka Yeesso abattitiis ichoow ururi buure khabaayi ilkerengeetti Naayin irte.
42007012	Chirri us aritti ilkerengeeteet sooeleele ka, inanki kaldaye makhaabassoo muunkhee leetehe usuhi buje hawwaal liisi'do kasooyegeen. Ururi buurenye ilkerengeet kayimiy la iche a leejire.
42007013	Kamur chu'us makhaabál arge ka, uur isoonugleeste wihi us iyidah, “Ooyine chubbah!”
42007014	Ulla 'deerka irte, lallaabohi inanki buje lakasi'do 'daare. 'Doo'di si'do la tolossate. Yeesso la wihi us yidah, “Irka sookahe kidowa!”
42007015	Inanki buje soorronte, yeyyeede. Yeesso la inam abarti desse dahan gesse.
42007016	Icho tuumman roorro gesse, Waakh saa'deene, “Etoo weene Waákh íyeyyeedo goyteen a yimiy. Waakh a yimiyye 'doo'diis gargaara,” yidaaheen.
42007017	Yeessó woriis ili Ya'huud ichoow ilassi addane isoodow tuumman kataa'he, ladaage.
42007018	Abatti Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo wor Yeesso tuumman Yoohana siisse. Ulla chirraakka et lamma wahe,
42007019	Kamur iergate wihi us worsate, “At a Ki Lasubhe lasugo, bal etoo addane sugna?”
42007020	Reeraas lammee chirri us Yeesso iirte, wihi us iyidah, “Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo nah sooergate, mehe worsata ya, Ki Lasubhe lasugo a ati, bal etoo addane sugna?”
42007021	Yeesso la chirraakka 'doo'di ittaawenye khakkhannan ichoow ki bolokh khabo ichoow ki ginnayyo dakhtaan samaache. 'Doo'di ittaawenye indo laa la indo fure.
42007022	'Deerka wihi us reeri lasooergate ilaabe, “Nyaama nokhda, Yoohana waha atin agarteen ichoow waha atin daagteen icheeka. 'Doo'di indo laa indo a bahcha, ki goorat luhlo ikhabin la luhlo a bahcha. 'Doo'di bu'dayyo sar kakhabe a lasamaacha, ki dogo laa la dogo a bahcha. 'Doo'di tuume omoot a lakasookahcha, 'doo'di wahanyeyyohi Waakh miinsan ka miskiine la Wori Haaggan a liicheeka.
42007023	Eti Waakh imaalo a ki jeenteteey u kakhuufnaanki us ikakhuufo i'diin.”
42007024	Inkoo reeri kootte Yoohana sooergate nokhte ka, Yeesso Yoohana woriis urur kaleeyyeede, wihi us yidah, “Bal wihi atin hidaad ka iratteene sooagarteen kamalda. Etoo 'dabakhenye i'di hoosi hafar sesseehicho mee iratteene agarteen.
42007025	Bal wihi atin iratteene sooagarteen kamalda. A etoo gaaddi haaggan khabo? Mele! 'Doo'di gaaddi gato miige khabo jiroti wohoo liiwaayin jiro, a 'doo'di minassi karnatoot fiddiyo.
42007026	I'daasenyi mehe iratteene agarteen? Eti Waákh iyeyyeedo agarteen? Rumanka eti atin agarteen, eti Waákh íyeyyeedo laka a kussanyahe.
42007027	Eti woriis Chiirnaanneti Waakh ka lachiire a kan. “ ‘Yeya, ergattiteey ortaahha erga, iche rubeyohi enenyete tannabissa.’
42007028	Wihi an atin iadeeh weeli enenyet goyaka, eti Yoohana kaween ma jiro. I'daasenyi eti dakhi Waakh ka 'daran laka, us Yoohana a kaweenyahe.”
42007029	Enenyet tuumman, 'doo'di kooddi goocho laka, chi'icho wihi Yeesso yidah daageen ka, saggi jiti Waakh ifissanyahe khaatteen, a mehe Yoohaná icho baattissiye.
42007030	I'daasenyi Farissaayo ichoow tagaammeti amurre jeenteti Yoohana icho ibaattissiyin u, mali Waakh icho ikhabe a 'dii'deen.
42007031	“Kamalda bal, 'doo'di wey'da 'deerka mehe iokkanaacho? Icho mehe iyoogyahiin?
42007032	Icho a i'di nyaakhuti sokko goyaka nyaakhutoo addan kariiro, “ ‘Nah a gurroonne, atin la gurro ma nah leeokkhin, nah geeyi maanti enenyet buje ladowo atin a isoodowne, atin la ma ooyin,’ isidowo.
42007033	A mehe Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo maanti us yimiy farsotoo rucchule sabiib laka ma ubhaabane, toro la geeddi buure af hiite, atin la jeentetaas u wihi atin tidaaheen, ‘Usu alah ginna dakhatta!’
42007034	Ínam Aadam la a yimiyye golossate, farsoti sabiib laka dame, atin la mehe tidaaheen ya, ‘'Damaanki toro meleefeenye 'doo'di kooddi goocho ichoow ki uskeel leh aal kabahsati kalla.’
42007035	I'daasenyi kharati Waakh runtiche jiroti 'doo'di raaho tuummane lakaarga.”
42007036	Etoo Farissaayee maantoo Yeesso golol iwahe, Yeesso la 'deerka minki etaas irte, komborti ballaaddane lakagolossati garabiche ka dikkil kareeye.
42007037	Makhaabassoo ilkerengeettaas ka uskeel kaassohatte chi'iche saggi Yeesso minki etaas Farissaayee ikagolossati daagte ka, kurunkoo daakki alabaasta lakahaaggiche, miricchi kijiro sookhaatte.
42007038	Yeessohi dikkil kajiifo adahtiis tolossatte ooyte, ilmohiche ka luhlohiis khuyyaamisse. 'Deerka tinticheti matah ka hiyyaayte, luhlohiis doddongatte, miricchi ka subahte.
42007039	Eti Farissaayo Yeesso golol iwahe chirri us waha arge ka, wihi us uuriis goyaka yidah, “Chirri kootte rumanka eta eti Waákh íyeyyeedo yahe, makhaabassa 'da'ddaarto eti iche tahe a garta, saggi iche uskeel ikaassohatte a garta!”
42007040	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Siimon an wohoo an kisoocheeko a khaba.” Ulla wihi us yidah, “Eti ween isoocheek.”
42007041	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Reeroo lammee etoo kamurenye mog kakhabe. Etoo chilimmeti eti orrah kud chan hil haaggiche laguto iche kakhabe, ki addan la chilimmeti eti orrah tomon chan hil haaggiche laguto iche kakhabe.
42007042	Inkoo reera lammatiis ba mog gunnaan agaafte ka, eti goorat chilimme leh, lammache ba mog lee'diiche. Kichokoh 'deerka eti mog leh weyti 'doona?”
42007043	Siimon wihi us ilaabe, “Ani ka, ki chilimmeti buure lalee'diiche.” Yeesso la “Mujjume goosse,” iyidah.
42007044	Yeesso 'deerka makhaabál iurgiye wihi us Siimon iyidah, “Siimon bal makhaabassa yey! At uus an kootte minkaah imiy bicchehi an luhlo kadikhdi laka ma isiinne, i'daasenyi iche ilmohiche ka luhlo a ikhuyyaamisse, tintiche ka la a ihiyyaayte.
42007045	At dongo ka ma isoodowwaanne, i'daasenyi makhaabassa uus kootte an imiy luhloheey dongo ma kagoon.
42007046	At subakki geeyi oolif ka matah ma isubhine, i'daasenyi iche luhloheey miricchi ka a subahte.
42007047	Maantaka wihi an kiadeeh, makhaabassa uskeelicheki ittaawe a liikakute. A mehe 'dooninti buurenye itusatte. I'daasenyi eti uskeeloo rucchul liikakute 'doonintoo rucchul on Waákh tusta.”
42007048	Yeesso la wihi us makhaabál iyidah, “Uskeelaah a liikaakute.”
42007049	Martiti kootte golossatti wihi iche isitidah, “Eta uskeel laka 'doo'd ikakuto a ayyo?”
42007050	Yeesso wihi us makhaabál iyidah, “Kakhuufnaanki at ikakhuufte a kiribe, tab nebey leeiro!”
42008001	Waha 'dubicho ka, Yeesso goobab ichoow ilkerengeeto dah kagooche, Wori Haaggane dakhi Waakh miinsan icheeke. Abattitiisti tomon ichoow lammee laka usu a leejirte.
42008002	Deyyehotoo goorat ginnayyo ichoow sugeerretoo addan ka lasamaache Yeesso a leejirte. Deyyehota, too a Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala goorat Yeesso ginna teeba kabahche.
42008003	Too la a Yoowana makhaabál Chuusa. Chuusa la min 'Herood ka ilbooyye iweenyahe. Too la a Sussanna ichoow deyyehotoo addane ittaawe. Deyyehota hoolahichooda Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba kagargaarte.
42008004	Geedda ururi buure kuymo 'doo'd la goobassi ittaawe kayamiite usu dagansati, Yeesso mammahtane ibahche.
42008005	“Etoo gos khabo a irte, ilmo harra kachibaa. Ilmoha us taa'hicho, gaasoo jit goya kadiheene, layabte, chimbirohi saraat la yumheen.
42008006	Gaasoo harrati daddaab fuusso kadiheene, chi'icho soobaheen ka orrahe geeyohaas soobahe gubte, khuyyaame laayahiinee.
42008007	Gaasoo laka inti geeyohi rurrucchule kudah khabo kadiheen. Isleesoobaheene geeyohi soobahe afcheen.
42008008	Gaasoo la inti harrati haaggan khabto kadiheen. Soobaheene gurnaan deleen. Geey ba kol kudoo geeddi il lakachibe 'dirihiis dele.” Chirri us yeediis massiche ka, riire wihi us yidah, “Eti dogo khabo, a daago gi'de!”
42008009	Abattitiis wihi mammahta tahe usu worsatte.
42008010	Wihi us iyidah, “Waakh garanti wihi dagsane dakhi Waakh miinsan lagarti a atin siiche. I'daasenyi 'doo'di addan a imammahda, “ ‘'dee walah yeyaane, eheet a ma argaan, wihi an eldi daagaane, eheet a ma abtaan.’
42008011	“Wihi mammahe miinsantahe kallaayo. Ilmo a Yeedi Waakh.
42008012	Ilmohi jit lakachibe a 'doo'di Yeedi Waakh daago, Seytaan la yamiite yeedaas uuricho kabahcho, saggoo 'dee icho yeedaas irummeysanne, Waakh iribin yeelo.
42008013	Ilmohi daddaab sarche kadihe a 'doo'di chu'us Yeedi Waakh daage hamaadi buure ka khaatti. I'daasenyi hiiyyay icho khabaan mele. Geeddoo rucchul on yeeda rummeestaane i'daasenyi chirri kajmeti uskeel kalugu'ddo timiy dowwa on soodihaan.
42008014	Ilmohi inti geeyohi kudah khabto goya kadihe mehe itoollaan ya, 'doo'di Yeedi Waakh daago. I'daasenyi geedda icho orey isohtaan, wa'dwaa'd ichoow kamurroon ichoow haaggi wihi harrata afchaane ma weynaataan.
42008015	I'daasenyi ilmohi harrati haaggan lakachibe a 'doo'di hahhaaggane, uuri haaggan khabo Yeedi Waakh daago uuricho gessati, jeenteti us igarrahsatuu gurnaan delo.
42008016	“Et taa bolkhicho baakhuul kaankubo ommos siriir iliche gesso mele. Taa a labolkhicha kombor lakorcha, 'dee 'doo'di min soogelo il kaarga.
42008017	A mehe walah dagsane liisoobihin mala, ommos walah oboobsane enenyet liiabinne ommos 'dow liikasoobihin mala.
42008018	Maantaka wihi atin liidowo mujjum daaga gi'de. Eti tuummane wihi dahan lagesse mujjum woywoye a liikakhaya. I'daasenyi eti wihi dahan lagesse mujjum iwoywoyin, wihi us kol us khabo koogyahe laka a lakakhaata.”
42008019	Maantoo abar Yeesso ichoow walaalinyetiis ba Yeesso argin yimaateen. I'daasenyi jeenteti urur buur iyahuu, saggi icho ileeyeedaan waayeen.
42008020	Etoo wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Abartaah ichoow walaalinyetaah ba khare toollaane, ichohi kaargo 'doonaan.”
42008021	Wihi us ilaabe, “Abarteey ichoow walaalinyeteey a 'doo'di Yeedi Waakh kayimiy daago toro la raaho.”
42008022	Maantoo Yeesso abattitiis wihi us iyidah, “Beyta Gaalilaaya maahno aficheki 'diri a iranni.” 'Deerka koobanhoo koreene irteen.
42008023	Kooban sohtaani Yeesso ur'dumme khaatte. Hafaroo buure la yimiyye bey gu'dde, ichoowka bicche kooban goya isootabeene buuhin leheet.
42008024	Abatti Yeesso iiratte, kihisse, wihi iche itidah, “Eti ween, eti ween, bicche a inno khaataan!” Ulla sookahe, hafar ichoow bicchehaas uskul ba leejaakhe, ire tolossatte, bicche laka haagsateen.
42008025	Yeesso la wihi us abattitiis worsate, “Atin uliba ma ikakhuuftaan a?” Abatti roorro gesse toro girmeysatte, wihi iche isworsatte, “Eta a ayyo? Hafar ichoow bicche laka amur on ibahcha, icho la yeediis daagaan.”
42008026	Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba kooban orey iwoyeen beyti Gaalilaaya aficheki 'diri imaahaanee. Ilkerengeetti Geraasa isoodowwaateen.
42008027	Chirri Yeesso kooban kasooyage ka, etoo ilkerengeettaase ginnayyo dakhtaan usu 'hele. Eta la geeddi deer gaad laan on sossohta, goob goya la ma fiddiyo, i'daasenyi go'ddassi enenyet lakahawwaalo fiddiya.
42008028	Eta uus Yeesso arge ka uuwwiche, Yeesso ortiis ka il iskagu'dde, weyti riire wihi us yidah, “Yeesso, weeli Waakkhi weynaan tuumman tiis tahe, at mehe ika'doonta? A kihawwaasde, bolokh iitusin!”
42008029	A mehe Yeesso ginna amuri iche etaas kabahto ibahche. Geeddi buure la ginna et a khabatte. Chirri dahano ichoow luhlo lahide, layaakhiche laka, us biingoyyohi lakahide a jejjebche, ginna la khaatta hidaad geessa.
42008030	Yeesso la, “Magahaah a ayyo?” worsate. Wihi us ilaabe, “Magaheey a Ururi Iskareet.” Waha a jeenteti ginnayyohi ittaawe goytiis igeleen.
42008031	Ginnayyo la inonnokhteene Yeesso hawwaasteen, uus ankhari dahane ieleelin iergine.
42008032	Woyhoo buurenye golcha la intaas ka burroo tahariissa yaakha. Ginnayyo la Yeesso hawwaasteene, ichohi golchataas goya gelo daaheen. Yeesso la, amur siiche.
42008033	Chi' ginnayyo et kabaheen ka, golcha goya itabeene, woy tuumman bur kakhubte bey goya itabe, bicche khaateen.
42008034	Chirri 'doo'di golcha yaakhicho wihi yitah arge ka, orye woraas ilkerengeet ichoow ilaas dakkhan kataa'hiche.
42008035	'Doo'd la bahe wihi yitahye sooyeyaa. Chirri icho Yeesso iyamiitiin, eti ginna goytiis kabahte usuhi sammacchaar Yeesso ortiis fiddiyo darfo mujjum gessate matah la haagsate 'heleen. Enenyet roorro gesse.
42008036	'Doo'di kootte wihi yitah arge la, saggi eti ginnayyo dakhteen liisamaache 'doo'di addan icheeke.
42008037	'Doo'di ilkerengeetti Geraasa isoodow tuumman Yeesso daahe, icho a katabo, a mehe weyti roorro gesse. Ulla 'deerka kooban kore irte.
42008038	Eti kootte ginnayyo lakabahche Yeesso hawwaaste, usuhi raaho daahe, i'daasenyi Yeesso et laabe wihi us iyidah,
42008039	“Goob inokho geeddi Waakh kiyeele cheek.” Et 'deerka irte ilkerengeet tuumman dah kagooche, geeddi Yeesso iyeele cheeke.
42008040	Inkoo Yeesso nokhte ka, ururoo usu martiiste. I'di tahe 'doo'd kootte usu a suga.
42008041	Chirraakka etoo Yaayiro layadeehe ilkerengeettaas ka minki weysiite Ya'huud iween yimiyye, Yeesso luhlohiis kakufe hawwaaste, usuhi Yeesso goobiis yamiite 'doonaa.
42008042	I'di tahe inanti kaldaye us khabo, gu'h tomon ichoow lamma khabto, iche omoottan. Geeddi Yeesso sohti la 'doo'd 'dollohiis tuumman ka a ishude.
42008043	Ururaas goyaka la makhaabassoo gu'h tomon ichoow lamma hugunkiche tolossawwaaye diig on 'dulo la a jirta. I'daasenyi et samaan yabuu'd mele.
42008044	Yeesso 'dubiis leetimiyye, laddi kabuu'diis 'daarte, chirraas on diiggi 'dulo tolossate.
42008045	Yeesso wihi us worsate, “Ayyo i'daare?” Chi'icho tuumman 'dii'deen ka, Beetero wihi us yidah, “Eti ween, 'doo'd 'dollohaah tuumman ka a issootakha, ishude.”
42008046	I'daasenyi Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “Etoo a i'daare, saggi miige ani ikabahte a garda.”
42008047	Makhaabale 'deerka saggi liikase agarte, ichehi hamarto timiyye, Yeesso ortiis ka il gu'dubte. 'Doo'd ortiis ka jeenteti iche Yeesso i'daarte ichoow saggi iche chirraas on isamaatte cheekte.
42008048	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Inantaay, kakhuufnaanki at ikakhuufte a kisamaache gone, tab gi'de nebey leeiro.”
42008049	Yeesso yeedaas af kakhabaayi, etoo goob Yaayirohi minki weysiite Ya'huud itoollo kayimiyye wihi us yidah, “Weel a massate, eti ween immarah sina akawaarin.”
42008050	Yeesso la chirri us waha daage ka, wihi us Yaayiro iyidah, “Roorro akhabine, ani on irummeyso, iche la a samaattaa.”
42008051	Chirri us min Yaayiro sooeleele ka Beetero ichoow Yaakoobo ichoow Yoohana ichoow aabbahi weel leh ichoow abarti weel leh kalday on menye, eti tuummane min leegelo tirte.
42008052	Geeddaas la enenyet tuumman jeentetichuu a uuwwicha ooya. Yeesso la wihi us yidah, “Uuwwinna! Weel ma umaatane i'daasenyi a ur'da!”
42008053	Icho la saggi weel iyumuyye gartaan gone, usu kareyteen.
42008054	I'daasenyi inám dahan sookhabte, “Inantaay sookah” iyidah.
42008055	Weel rubeye isoonokhatte, chirraas on sootolossatte. Yeesso 'deerka weel wohoo us yaham a lasiicho yidah.
42008056	'Doo'di weel dele girmeeste, i'daasenyi Yeesso amur ibahche, iicho wihi yitah etoo kalday laka icheekine.
42009001	Yeesso chirri us ergaanotiisti tomon ichoow lammee isiwahe ka, miig ichoow antohi icho ginnayyo tuumman kabahchaane toro icho sugeerre kasamaachaan siiche.
42009002	Ulla ergaano ili kharaat ierge, 'dee wori dakhi Waakh miinsan cheekta, 'doo'di khakkhannan laka samaassa.
42009003	Wihi us iyidah, “Chirri atin irattaan la, wohoo rucchul laka asi'danna. Wul ommos urgo ommos golol ommos chilimme ommos ubbaaroo deere addan laka asi'danna.
42009004	Mimbaaw atin gesseen on fiddiya ichoowka ilkerengeettaas kabaha.
42009005	Chirri enenyet atin imartiisan, ebeeri luhlo atin fuulo sahda geedda atin ilkerengeetticho kabahtaan. Waha a garti icho cheekatti.”
42009006	Ergaano 'deerka kolba gooboo iratte Wori Haaggan cheekte, 'doo'di khakkhannan laka meelal tuumman ka samaasse.
42009007	Chirri 'Heroodhi boroofenhi Gaalilaaya iween wihi yitah tuumman daage ka, mal waaye. I'di tahe 'doo'd gaasoo Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo iche omoot lakasookahche, iche essa.
42009008	Gaasoo la Eliiya soobahe essaane, gaasoo la, etoo goorat Waákh íyeyyeedo iche sookahe iche essaan.
42009009	I'daasenyi 'Herood wihi us yidah, “Ani goorat Yoohana matah gooche. Eta toro wahanyeyyoha i'dee yeelo an daago a ayyo?” 'Herood la jiti us Yeesso kaargo yowte.
42009010	Chirri ergaano soonokhatte ka, wihi iche yeesse Yeesso icheekte. Yeesso 'deerka ergaano khaatte ilkerengeettoo Bessaayda layadeeh ka intoo khaawwan irteen.
42009011	I'daasenyi ururre kasse, 'dubiis leetimiy. Ulla soodowweeste toro wori dakhi Waakh miinsan icheeke, 'doo'di khakkhannan laka samaache.
42009012	Chirri orrahe soodihto ka, ergaanoti tomon ichoow lammee itimiyye wihi iche itidah, “Urur laabe 'dee goobassi soodow ichoow gosasha soodow ka golol ichoow bari a yowti. A mehe inta a yibe.”
42009013	Wihi us ilaabe, “Atin rubeytiin wohoo icho yamhiin siicha.” Wihi iche ilaabte, “Wihi nah khabno a makaate chan ichoow bahag lamma kalday on. Chi' nah iranni nah 'doo'da tuumman golol isooganno on menye.”
42009014	Mejeli intaas kajire a geeddi alif chan. I'daasenyi wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Bal koobbinohi geeddi tomon chacchane koorromicha.”
42009015	Abatti i'daas yeesse, enenyet tuumman la orronte.
42009016	Makaateyyohi chane ichoow bahaggi lammee khaate, serey yeye, Waakh kala'd ilaabe, jejjebche. 'Deerka abatti idiibe 'dee 'doo'd a gisso.
42009017	Enenyet tuumman golossate, darge. Abatti la enjel tomon ichoow lamma gololi laajjebche lasoowaache buuhaan soosuunte.
42009018	Maantoo chirra Yeesso keley Waakh wahti abattitiis la a leejirta, wihi us icho worsate, “Ururre an a ayyo elatta?”
42009019	Wihi iche ilaabte, “Gaasoo ati a Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo essa, gaasoo a Eliiya essa, gaasoo laka at a etoo goorat Waákh íyeyyeedo omoot ka sookahe essa.”
42009020	“I'daasenyi atin la? An a ayyo tadeehiin?” worsate. Beetero wihi us ilaabe, “At a Ki Lasubhe, a ki Waakh.”
42009021	Yeesso la weyti abatti tootooche, uus iche waha etoo kalday laka icheekine.
42009022	Toro wihi us iyidah, “Ínam Aadam sinati buurenye latusa, ewweenki Ya'huud ichoow kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre usu 'dii'daane, layagiise ibeenki seyyahnaatteet ka omoot lakasookahcha.”
42009023	'Deerka wihi us icho tuumman iyidah, “Chirri etoo isooraahin 'doono awtiis a 'dii'do toro la kol dakkhan massalaabatiis barbar a sookorsati a isooraaho.
42009024	A mehe eti tuummane jirotiis ribin 'doono, jiroti rummaat a waaya. I'daasenyi eti tuummane harrata ka jirotiis ani iwaayo jirotiisti rummaat a riba.
42009025	Etoo maanta a chirri us wohoo 'hele, chirri us wihi harrata tuumman 'hele, i'daasenyi awtiis waaye ommos baabe?
42009026	Chirri etoo ani ikuuryaawo toro yeedeey kuuryaawo, Ínam Aadam maanti us ababnaankiis ichoow ababnaan Aabbahiis ichoow ki herti Waakhe munyee leesoonokhti usu a kuuryaawa.
42009027	Rume atin icheeka, gaasiinkoo maanta inta kijiro, omoot ma argo geeddi icho dakhi Waakh iargin.”
42009028	Inkoo us yeeda yidahye geeddi ibeen siyyeete kutte ka, Yeesso Beetero ichoow Yoohana ichoow Yaakoobo khaatte, haloo leekore weeste.
42009029	Weestaayi, fooliis urgiye, gaaddiis la urgiite weyti dakhnaatte.
42009030	Reeroo lammee, a Muusa ichoow Eliiya,
42009031	ichohi weyti ababo soobaheene, Yeesso leeyyeedeen. Wihi icho Yeesso kaleehawwoocheen a omoottiisti us 'dee kola ibeenneta ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka yamuut. Waha la a wihi goorat Waakh Yeesso igooche us dowwanoha ka soobuuhicho.
42009032	Beetero ichoow wahalhiis ba weyti yuufeen. I'daasenyi chirri icho sooneybaateen ka Yeessohi ullaka ababo argeene reeri lammeenye Yeesso leetoollo laka argeen.
42009033	Chirra reer Yeesso katabo ka, Beetero wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Kamur, a haaggantahe gon chi' nah inta kijirro. Alley gaayim seyyah a disno, too a taahha, too a too Muusa, too la a too Eliiya.” Beetero la wihi us essi ma garti ba.
42009034	Yeyyeedaayi, mirisoo soobahe icho tuumman ankube, abatti la chirri miris sarcho kore ka roorro gesse.
42009035	Hooyoo la mirisaas goyaka sooyeede wihi us yidah, “Waha a Weeleeyki an soobahsade, usu nabah isuda!”
42009036	Chirri hooy gammadiche ka, saggi Yeesso keley iyahe kaseen. Abatti waha leegammadisse, et iche wihi iche chirraas agarte icheekte mele.
42009037	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho, chirri icho hal kasookhubteen ka, ururi buure or kasoodowe.
42009038	Etoo la urur goya kasooriire, wihi us yidah, “Eti ween a kihawwaasde, inankeey uur isoonugleyso. A mehe a inanki kaldaye an khabo.
42009039	Ginna a khabatta, chirraas on riira, harmissa 'dombo af leekeena. Geeddi deer ma 'diisso, weyti sina kawaarissa.
42009040	Abattitaah a hawwaasde, 'dee ginna weel kibihissa, i'daasenyi a agaafatte.”
42009041	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Doo'di wey'dane uskeel lehe Waakh ikakhuufin! Geeddoh atin leefiddiyo? Geeddoh atin igarrahsadi? Inankaah inta keen!”
42009042	Inam soosohtaayi ginna toro il kagu'dubte weyti kaharmisse. I'daasenyi Yeesso ginna leejaakhe, inam samaache, ooyohi dele dahan gesse.
42009043	Icho tuumman la miigti Waakh kagirmeesteen. 'Doo'd tuumman wihi Yeesso yeele kagirmeestaayi, Yeesso wihi us abattitiis iyidah,
42009044	“Taba waha an atin isooadeeh mujjum nabah isuda! Ínam Aadam dowwanoha ka 'dube lagoocha, dahanohi enenyet lagessa.”
42009045	I'daasenyi waha wihicho ma aban. I'di tahe icho waha a lakadagche, uus 'dee icho wihi icho yahiin garanne. Icho la usu worsan karooreen.
42009046	Abatti goyaka iriirtoo soobahte, eti berri 'doo'd tuumman iween isleeiriirte.
42009047	Yeesso la malicho a garta gone, weeloo rucchul khaate garabiis toolliche.
42009048	Wihi us icho iyidah, “Eti tuummane jeenteti us abattiteey iyahuu weela rucchul martiisti, ani imartiista. Eti tuummane ani imartiisti la eti isooergate martiista. A mehe eti goytiin ka weyti rucchul usu weyti ween.”
42009049	Yoohana la wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Kamur, nah etoo antohi magahaah ka ginnayyo enenyet kabahcho a agarre, nah la usu toollin leheet, jeenteti us keen ieheynan u.”
42009050	“Ajeyinna,” Yeesso yidah. “A mehe eti atin i'dii'din, a aaliinna.”
42009051	Inkoo ibeenki Yeesso goobi Waakh lageecho soodowwaate ka, Yeesso saggi us ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem iirti gooche, kahe irte.
42009052	Ulla ergattitoo orey iergate. Icho la a irtaane geeddi us ankhanyahe ilkerengeettoo ili Saamariya ka inti us baryo yowtaan.
42009053	I'daasenyi 'doo'di ilkerengeettaas Yeesso martiisan 'dii'de jeenteti us ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ikasohti u.
42009054	Chirri abattiti koo Yaakoobo yahe koo la Yoohana yahe saggi Yeesso lii'dii'de argeen ka wihi icho Yeesso worsateen, “Kamur at nahi Waakh, ‘Serey ka 'dab keene, 'doo'da gub!’ inadeeh a 'doonta?”
42009055	I'daasenyi Yeesso abattitiis iurgiye, leejaakhe.
42009056	Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba ilkerengeettoo addan irteen.
42009057	Ildah raahaani, etoo wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Meelbaaw at iratti ka an a kiraaha.”
42009058	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Dowwohoyyo lumame khabaane, chimbirohi saraat la minchimbiroote khabaan. I'daasenyi Ínam Aadam inti us matah gesso laka ma khabo.”
42009059	Etoo addan wihi us iyidah, “Kaale toolla isooraahe, abattiteey ateeh.” I'daasenyi et wihi us soolaabe, “Kamur, alley koloo a irdi, aabbaheey a laabo.”
42009060	Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “'Doo'di tuume lamaa'do a hili 'doo'di tuume. I'daasenyi at iro wori dakhi Waakh miinsan 'doo'd icheek.”
42009061	Etoo addan toro wihi us yidah, “Kamur, an kiraaha, i'daasenyi alley koloo a irdi 'doo'deey a ‘Waakh atin bariisti,’ iidaahe.”
42009062	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Eti tuummane ani isooraaho, toro jirotiisti oraat ijiitti, indigir us hili dakhi Waakh ikhabo mele.”
42010001	Saahka toro Kamur reeroo addane tomon teeba ichoow lammee soobahche, et lallamma ka iska'dare, ilkerengeeto ichoow meessi tuummane us dowwanoha ka sooirti iergate.
42010002	Wihi us iyidah, “Gurnaan a buure, i'daasenyi 'doo'di hil haaggicho a koo rucchul. Maantaka Kamuri gurnaan leh daaha, 'dee 'doo'di ittaawenye gurnaan soogoocho a sooergo.
42010003	Nyaama! An saggi makhassi iiyyaate yaay goya liifahe, iche atin ierga.
42010004	Chilimme ommos urgo ommos kobohoo addan akhaatanna. Eti atin jit ka'hesseen tuumman la abariitinna.
42010005	“Chirra atin minkoo gessaan, koloo weesda, wihi atin tadeehiin, ‘Waakh ba minka nebey kakaala.’
42010006	Chirri etoo nebey 'doono intaas kajiro, Waakh minkaas a imaala. Chirri iche i'daas ieheynan la, Waakh minkaas nebey ma kakaalo.
42010007	Minkaas on fiddiya, walahbaaw icho atin siichaan amha toro dama. I'di tahe eti hil haaggicho hili us haaggicho ka a laguta. Kolba la minkoo akabahina koo agelina.
42010008	“Chirri atin ilkerengeettoo gesseene 'doo'di ilkerengeettaas atin martiiste la, wihi atin lasiiche on amha.
42010009	'Doo'di khakkhannane ilkerengeettaas kajiro samaacha, wihi atin itadeehiin, ‘Dakhi Waakh kola a atin isoodowwaate.’
42010010	I'daasenyi chirra atin ilkerengeettoo gesseene atin liimartiisan, jitassi ilkerengeeteet ibaha, wihi atin tadeehiin,
42010011	‘Ebeeri ilkerengeettiinna luhlo nah kaangago laka atin on atin isahna, waha la saggi Waakh sina atin ituso iche tusaan. I'daasenyi waha abda, dakhi Waakh a soodowwaate.’
42010012	Wihi an atin icheeko, ibeenki Waakh 'doo'd hukkumo, sinati Waakh 'doo'di ilkerengeetti Soodom yiil tuse deefta sinati Waakh ilkerengeettaas tuso ka.
42010013	“Atinhi ilkerengeetti Choorasin taalliin sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! Atinhi ilkerengeetti Bessaayda taalliin sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! I'di tahe chirri wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane goytiin ka layeele goorat ilkerengeetti Tiiro ichoow ti Siidon ka layeele, 'doo'daas uskeelicho a kasoonokhte, 'deerka inga'daa'diyyo gessate, bombey koorronte.
42010014	I'daasenyi ibeenki Waakh 'doo'd hukkumo, sinati Waakh 'doo'di ilkerengeetti Tiiro yiil ichoow 'doo'di ilkerengeetti Siidon yiil tuse iche deefta sinati Waakh atin tuso ka.
42010015	Atinhi ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hum taalliin la, kol serey atin liiokkhicho koogtahiin? Mele, meessi 'doo'di tuume kijiro iche ikhubattaan!”
42010016	“Eti nabah atin isudo, ani nabah isuda. Eti atin 'dii'do la ani i'dii'da. I'daasenyi eti ani i'dii'do, eti isooergate 'dii'da.”
42010017	Reeri tomon teeba ichoow et lammee usuhi hamaado soonokhte, wihi us yidah, “Kamur, ginnayyo laka chirri nah magahaah on wahne, yeedeenyo a raahaan!”
42010018	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Aa, a rum! Ani Seytaanki i'di bakkaal u serey kasoodihe a arge.
42010019	An antohi atin toofaf ichoow arraaro kayabattaan a atin siiche, toro la miigti atin miigti chiiytan kasoorissaan a atin siiche. Walah atin gaameero mele.
42010020	I'daasenyi ginnayyohi afiin ikutin iihamaadina, i'daasenyi jeenteti magahenyetiin buuggi goobi Waakh goya liikachiire ihamaada.”
42010021	Yeesso chirraakka usuhi Rubeyti Munyee hamaadi buure ka rubeytiis buuhisse, wihi us yidah, “Aabbahaaw, Kamuri serey ichoow harra ba iween, a kikoolicha. I'di tahe at wahanyeyyoha 'doo'di kharayyeenye toro la weyti soome a kadagisse, 'doo'di i'di nyaakhutenye wohoo igaran la tusse. Aa! Aabbahaaw, wihi kaahamaadicho gon wahaase.
42010022	“Aabbaheey walah dakkhan dahantaaya soogesse. Aabbahaaya on menye et rumanka eti Weeliis yahe garti mele. Toro la Weeliis ichoow 'doo'di Weeliis ibabbakkaahin 'doono on menye, et rumanka eti Aabbaheey yahe garti mele.”
42010023	'Deerka abattitiis iurgiye, dagsi ka wihi us iyidah, “Waakh indohi waha atin agartaan argo a imaale.
42010024	A mehe wihi an atin isoocheeko, 'doo'di ittaawenye Waákh íyeyyeedo ichoow karnato ba ichohi waha toolla atin agartaan argo a 'dooneene i'daasenyi ma argin. Wihi atin toolla daagtaan daagin a 'dooneene, i'daasenyi ma daagin.”
42010025	Maantoo etoo tagaanki amurree, usuhi Yeesso kajo 'doona, tolossate, wihi us worsate, “Eti ween, mehe yeelo 'dee jiroti jirtuu imassan 'helo?”
42010026	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Amurre Muusa mehe kachiiran? At saggoh yeedaas ikhaatta?”
42010027	Wihi us ilaabe, “ ‘Kamuri Waakkhaahe uuraah tuumman ka ichoow rubeytaah tuumman ka ichoow miigtaah tuumman ka ichoow malaah tuumman ka 'doon.’ Ichoow, ‘Ollokkaah geeddi at is'doonto 'doon.’ ”
42010028	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “At a eysiisse, tab gi'de wahaas yeele, 'dee jiroti imassan 'hel.”
42010029	I'daasenyi et saggi wihi us kootte worsate mujjum iyahiine tusa, wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Ollokkeey la a ayyo?”
42010030	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Etoo ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme kabahe, ilkerengeetti Yeeriko ikhubte. Ildah raahaayi, chiftatoo isoobahte, jahte gaad kabihisse, usuhi rubeytoo rucchul khabo katabte.
42010031	Yomboka etoo kuhaanee baabul on jitaas leeyimiyye, chirri us eti lajahe arge ka, jit 'dossiis tabe, eti lajahé kakute.
42010032	I'daasu laka etoo goob Laaweenye kuhaaniyyo gargaaro chirri us meel yimiyye us et arge ka jit 'dossiis tabe kute.
42010033	I'daasenyi etoo ili Saamariyeenye yeelan sulhaal kijiraayi, inti et kijiro yimiy. Chu'us eti lajahe arge ka, uur isoonugleeste.
42010034	Et idowwaate, subakki geeyi oolif ichoow farsoti sabiib kadeye, toro jiissiis darfo kayuube, et eheliis korche, looj geeche, intaas ka gargaare.
42010035	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka chilimmeti eti orrah lamma hil haaggiche laguto soobahche, eti looj iween idiibe toro wihi us iyidah, ‘Eta mujjum yaakhiche, maanti an soonokhde wihi us kagolossate ichoow wihiiski addan tuumman ani a kisooguto.’
42010036	“Ati ka 'doo'da seyyahe goyaka, koh eti chifta jahte i'di ollokkiiski sam iyitah?”
42010037	Eta tagaanki amurree la wihi us ilaabe, “A eti eta uur isoonugleeste on gon.” Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Tab gi'de, at laka i'daas yeel.”
42010038	Yeesso ichoow abattitiis la 'dulaani gooboo makhaabassoo Maarta layadeeh kajirto yimaateene, iche la martiisatte.
42010039	Maarta la walaassichetoo Maariya layadeeh a jirta. Maariya la luhlo Kamur hagga fiddiita, yeed Yeesso dagansatta.
42010040	I'daasenyi Maarta hili iche haaggisso weyti leebuuraate, wa'dwaa'd gele, timiyye wihi iche Yeesso worsatte, “Kamur, ati ka maanta a haaggantahe chirri walaasseey hil tuumman ani on ilee'diisso? Kaale igargaar idah!”
42010041	Kamur wihi us ilaabe, “Maarta, Maarta! At wa'dwaa'di holi at dowto matah kiyaham.
42010042	I'daasenyi wohoo kalday on la'doona. Maariya la a eysiisse, wihi haaggane etoo kalday laka ikakhaatin yeesse.”
42011001	Maantoo Yeesso intoo ka a weesta. Inkoo us weysi massiche ka etoo abattitiise wihi us iyidah, “Kamur saggi liiweesti nah abi i'di goorat Yoohana laka abattitiis iabchuu.”
42011002	Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Geedda atin weysattaan waha daha, “ ‘Aabbahaanyaaw, magahaahki munyee a liinkaanyito, at ba enenyet tuumman dakhatta.
42011003	Gololeenyoki maan dakkhan nah sii.
42011004	Uskeeleenyo nah ikakut, i'di nah laka 'doo'di uskeel nah iyeele uskeel ikakunnuu. Toro la kajmeti uskeel nah kalugu'ddo nah kajeyi.’ ”
42011005	Wihi us icho iyidah, “Eemba etiinkoo maanta minki aaliiskoo naanokho irayye, ‘Aalaaw, etoo aaleeyenye sulhaal isohti toolla minkeey yimiyye,
42011006	gololi an siicho la ma khabo, makaate seyyahtoo an siicho isii,’ iyidah?
42011007	“Eemba eti min goya kijiro, ‘Nyaam, sina iikawaarinne, afaf a hidayyihiine, ani ichoow nyaakhuteey ba a u'durra, sag an isookaho an walah kisiicho mele,’ kiyidah.
42011008	Wihi an atin icheeko, chirri eta isookahine jeenteti us aaliis iyahuu golol isiin laka, jeenteti us kansi isiinne us daah ika'harin u, a geeddi us sookaho wihi us 'doono siicho.
42011009	“'Deerka wihi an atin iadeeh, Waakh wihi at 'doonto daddaahe, a kisiicho. Wihi at 'doonto Waakh kayoyyowo, a ka'hessaa. Waakh arit ifah idahe, ulla a kifaho.
42011010	I'di tahe eti tuummane walah daahe, Waakh wihi us daahe a siicha, ki walah yowti la, Waakh a ka'hela, ki ifaha yidah la, Waakh arit a ifaha.
42011011	“Atinhi ooyenyee, etiinkoh chirri weeliis bahag daahe toof siicha?
42011012	Ommos chirri weeliis ukkah daahe arraar siicha?
42011013	Chirri atinhi uskeel leh ba nyaakhutiin siinti haaggan siissaan, Aabbahiinki serey jiro la geeddoo meheenye 'doo'di usu Rubeyti Munyee daahe siicha!”
42011014	Yeesso maantoo etoo ginnatoo af tirto, iche kabahche. Chirri ginna et kabahte ka, et yeyyeede urur la girmeeste.
42011015	I'daasenyi gaasichokoo mehe yidaaheen ya, “Miigti Beelsebuulhi karnati ginnayyootenye enenyet ginna kabahcha.”
42011016	Gaasoo wohoo miigti Waakh tuso goobi Waakh kayimiyye icho daaheen ka ichohi Yeesso angey geesso 'doonaan.
42011017	Yeesso wihi icho kamassaan garte wihi us icho iyidah, “Yaafbaaw seley goote isdihto, a baabaata, minki seley gowe isdiho a baaba.
42011018	Chirri Seytaan seley goggowe isinokhte dakhiis saggoh orey ikasohta? Jeenteti an i'da iadeeh, a jeenteti atin an miig Beelsebuule ginnayyo kabahcha ielattaan.
42011019	Chirri maanta an miig Beelsebuul ka ginnayyo enenyet kabahcho, 'doo'di atin raaho la miig eyya ginnayyo kabahcha? Icho 'deerka atin hukkuma.
42011020	I'daasenyi chirri an farri Waakh ka ginnayyo bahcho, waha saggi dakhi Waakh goytiin iyimiyye tusaan.”
42011021	“Chirri etoo miige birtiis dakkhan khaatte minkiis toorribo, meehiis et 'daaro mele.
42011022	I'daasenyi chirri etoo usú kamiige usu dihe usu kahataate la, etaas usú kamiige birti eti min leh kakhuufo ichoow meehiis a khaata, 'doo'd gisa.
42011023	“Eti tuummane ani ileejirin, a itirrima. Eti igargaarine walah ileesooholin a ileefida.
42011024	“Maanti ginna etoo goya kabahte, ginnata a iratta, ili daarenye bicche laa dah kagoossa. Fur yowatta, i'daasenyi fur ma 'hesso. 'Deerka wihi iche tadeeh, ‘Fureeyki an kasootabe inokhda.’
42011025	Maanti iche tamiit furi harane lamujjummooche 'hessa.
42011026	Ginnataas 'deerka a iratta, ginna teeba addane iche laka kasuuje sookhaatta etaas goya gelaane, fur yeessaan. Etaas la jirotiis, ti goorat oraat a ka'darsatta.”
42011027	Yeesso yeyyeedaayi, makhaabassoo urur goyaka sooyeedde wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Waakh rumanka abarti kidesse toro kinuugsatte a imaale!”
42011028	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Doo'di rumanka Waakh imaalo, a ki Yeedi Waakh daago toro la raaho.”
42011029	Geedda urur buuraati Yeesso wihi us yidah, “'Doo'di i'dee a 'doo'di uskeel leh! Icho wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso daahaan. I'daasenyi wihi goorat Waakh Yoona ka enenyet tuse on menye, walah addane lasiicho mele.
42011030	A mehe Yoona goorat ilkerengeetti Ninaawi ka saggi Waakh isooergate iche 'doo'd tuse. I'daasu la Ínam Aadam laka wihi isoobaho saggi Waakh usu isooerge iche 'doo'di i'dee tusaan.
42011031	Ibeenki Waakh 'doo'd hukkumo la makhaabassi karnatenye ili Cheeba a kahta 'doo'di i'dee uskeel igoossa. A mehe iche goorat harra gin'dohicheeda katimiyye kharati karnati Soolomon layadeeh khabe dagansatte, toolla la etoo Soolomon laka kaween kallaay.
42011032	Ibeenki Waakh 'doo'd hukkumo, 'doo'di ili Ninaawi a tolossata 'doo'di i'dee cheekta. I'di tahe icho maanti Yoona Yeedi Waakh icheeke, uskeelicho a kasoonokhteene, toro la etoo Yoona kaween kalla atin leejira.
42011033	“Et taa bolkhicho inti lakadagcho ommos baakhuul iliis gesso mele. Taa a labolkhicha kombor lakorcha, 'dee 'doo'di min soogelo il kaarga.
42011034	Issaah i'di taa u sartaah banaye ikeenta. Chirri indohaah haagganyahiin, sartaah tuumman laka banaye buuha. I'daasenyi chirri indohaah suujyahiin, sartaah tuumman a mug'di.
42011035	Tab gi'de banayhi at khabto uus icho mug'di itaahan.
42011036	Maantaka chirri sartaah tuumman banay buuhaane intoo rucchul laka mug'di ikajirin, sartaah dakkhan a bildiikhta gon, i'di chirra banayhi taa kabolkhaan u.”
42011037	Chirri Yeesso yeed massiche ka etoo Farissaayee minkiis ka golol iwahe. Yeesso 'deerka min gele komborti ballaaddane lakagolossati garabiche ka dikkil kareeye.
42011038	I'daasenyi eti Farissaayo chirri us Yeessohi geeddi us igolossan dahano idikhan arge ka weyti girmeeste.
42011039	Kamur 'deerka wihi us iyidah, “Atinha Farissaayo, kokkoob ichoow baakhuul khariissa dikhtaane, i'daasenyi uuriin goya 'damaam ichoow suujoone buuha.
42011040	'Dalammeey! Waakkhi sartiinti addan haaggiche on menya goya laka haaggiche?
42011041	I'daasenyi gololi baakhuul goya kijiro miskiin siicha 'dee walah tuumman ka bi'dir a bahtaanee.
42011042	“Atinhi Farissaayee sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! A mehe atin geeyohi golol haaggicho i'di maanta nyaayka ichoow imboogayyohi fil ittaawe ka Kamur gisi tomonnaatteet a ibihissaan. I'daasenyi 'doo'di jiti fissan ka lahukkumo ichoow 'dooninti Waakh a 'diisseen. Wihi atin laka'doono a atinhi Kamur gisi tomonnaatteet ibihissaan, i'daasenyi wahanyeyyohi weyti khumman a'diinna.
42011043	“Atinhi Farissaayee, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure. A mehe minassi weysiite Ya'huud ka komborohi weynaaneete 'doontaane, toro la atinhi sokkoyyo ka inkaanyit ka atin labariiticho 'doontaan.
42011044	“Sinati atin sugto eenna a buure. A mehe atin a i'di hawwaalohi dagah ikhabine, enenyet igaranne sarchooda on yabti.”
42011045	Tagaankoo amurree wihi us Yeesso ilaabe, “Eti ween, chirri at waha elatti at nah laka a nah leeabaarranta alah!”
42011046	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Atinhi tagaammeti amurree, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! Atin huleesi enenyet iubaa'dane enenyet karartaane, atin rubeytiin la far ma okkhissaane enenyet ma leekhabattaan.
42011047	“Sinati atin sugto eenna a buure, a mehe atine go'ddassi enenyet lakahawwaalo 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo idissaan, aacchinyetiinna la 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo bakkisse.
42011048	Atin 'deerka aacchinyetiin wihi iche yeesse a ayyissaane gar a laabtaan. Icho 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo a bakkicheene, atin la hawwaalohicho disseen.
42011049	Jeentetaas u wihi Waakh kharatiis ka essi kallaayo, ‘'Doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo ichoow ergaano a ierga, icho la gaasoo a yagiisiin, gaasoo laka sina omhichaan.’
42011050	Maantaka Waakh 'doo'di i'dee a hukkuma jeenteti diiggi 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo u' goorat Waakh harra soouume lakhubuu.
42011051	Uus ogoos Aabel kasookhabatti ichoowka ogoos Sakkariiyahi chalagti hoola lakasoorriyoocho ichoow minki Waakhe buure dahcho lakayigis eleessa. 'Doo'di i'dee la wahaas tuummane lakahukkuma.
42011052	“Atinhi tagaammeti amurree, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! Atin 'doo'd jiti us Waakh kaabti a kadagisseen. Atin rubeytiin jitaas ma raahtaane, 'doo'di addan la usuhi jitaas tabo a jeyisseen.”
42011053	Inkoo Yeesso intaas katabe ka tagaammeti amurre ichoow Farissaayo ba Yeesso weyti tirrimeene toro bolokh ka Yeesso wihi buure worsateen.
42011054	Icho la saggoo icho Yeesso yeed ka i'helaane icho ikhabtaane 'holaan.
42012001	Geeddaka urur buuraate, aliffe laka kute ichoowka 'doo'd iskhar'dabte. Yeesso koloo abattitiis leeyeede wihi us iyidah, “Yeedad Farissaayo ki i'di booddati makaate fuurissee yuubsada. Wihi icho essaan tuumman ka a iskaayyeelaane suujoon taa'hichaan.
42012002	Walah oboobsane liisoonyiikhin mala, ommos walah dagsane enenyet liiabin mala.
42012003	Wihi atin mug'di ka tidaaheen, maalime ladaaga, wihi atin minan goyaka nabah ka isicheekteen la minan sarchooda hooyi saraat lakacheeka.
42012004	“Aalassaay wihi an atin icheeko, 'doo'di sar on yagiise wahaas 'dubicho ka wohoo addan iyeelin akaroorina.
42012005	I'daasenyi eti atin karoortaan a atin tusa. Ki inkoo us sar yigis antohi us meessi 'dabi armaanjireen kalug'do khabo karoora. Aa a atin iadeehe, taba usu karoora.
42012006	Chimbir chan chilimmetoo rucchul ma lagato? I'daasenyi chimbirtoo kaldaye Waakh kadabo laka ma jirto.
42012007	Rumanka, tinti matah kaajirto tuumman laka Waakh geeddi iche tahe a garta. Roorro akhabina, atin Waakh ortiis ka chimbirohi ittaawe a kussantihiinee.
42012008	“Wihi an atin iadeeh, eti tuummane 'doo'd ortiis ka saggi us keey iyahe cheeko, Ínam Aadam laka herti Waakh ortiche ka, saggi us kiis iyahe a cheeka.
42012009	I'daasenyi eti 'doo'd ortiis ka saggi us keey iyahe 'dii'do, herti Waakh ortiche ka a la'dii'da.
42012010	Eti tuummane Ínam Aadam igafe a geeddi uskeeliis liikakuto. I'daasenyi eti Rubeyti Munyee igafe, uskeelaas ma liikakuto.
42012011	“Chirri minassi weysiite Ya'huud ommos weynaan ichoow 'doo'di anto leh ortiis atin lakeeno 'dee atin lahukkumo, saggi atin isikaayyeeddaan ommos wihi atin sootadeehiin akawa'dwaa'dina.
42012012	A mehe Rubeyti Munyee chirraas wihi atin tadeehiin a atin abissa.”
42012013	Etoo urur goyaka wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “Eti ween, walaaleey leeyeede dahal ileegisam idah.”
42012014	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Eta, ayyo ani eti 'doo'd hukkumo ommos hili dahal atin lagiso isiiche?”
42012015	Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Yuubsada! 'Damaanki atin wihi atin ikhabin 'doontaan ka isyaakhicha. I'di tahe jiroti mujjume hoolahi at khabto mee katamiit.”
42012016	Yeesso la toro mammahta 'doo'd icheeke, “Gosi etoo kamure gurnaanki buurenye bahche.
42012017	Eta gos leh masse wihi us uuriis goyaka yidah, ‘Mehe yeelo? Inti an gurnaankeey kachibo ma khabo.’
42012018	“'Deerka wihi us yidah, ‘I'dane yeela. Koondinyetaaya jejjebcha 'dee ti burbuure disa. Intaas gololeey tuumman ichoow meeheey ba kachiba.
42012019	Ani la wihi an isiadeeh, “Wihi buurenye toro haaggane at gu'hassi buure meel isigelisse a khabta. Sina at khabto mele, samacchaar on golosso, hamaad.” ’
42012020	“I'daasenyi Waakh wihi us etaas iyidah, ‘'Dalamoow! Ibeenka goya rubeytaah a lakakhaata. Ayyo 'deerka waha at isitannabisse 'hela?’
42012021	“Waha a wihi eti tuummane wihi harrata ka kamurenye, i'daasenyi wihi Waakh 'doono ka miskiine iyateeh.”
42012022	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Maantaka wihi an atin iadeeh, jirotiin akawa'dwaa'dina, wihi atin tamhiin, ommos sartiin ka wihi atin gessattaan.
42012023	Jiro golol a kussantahe, sare la gaad a kussantahe.
42012024	Bal khaalkhe yeya, ilmo icho gos kichibaan mele, koondi icho khabaane icho golol kachibaan la mele. I'daasenyi Waakh on goollicha. Atin la geeddoo meheenye weyti chimbiro kussantahiin.
42012025	Etiinkoo maanta wa'dwaa'di us wa'dwaa'do ka jirotiis saha'ddoo kalday kakhayaayi?
42012026	Chirri at waha rucchul laka iubaa'dan, a i'doh wihi addane buure wa'dwaa'd ikakhabta?
42012027	“Bal fiikh saggi iche ibahto yeya. Hil icho haaggichaane icho gaad isikahaaggichaan mele. I'daasenyi karnati goorat Soolomon layadeeh laka kamurroonkiis tuumman khabaayi gaaddiis geeddi fiikhta ma haaggan.
42012028	Chirri Waakh hoosi keley baho, toolla jiro saahta 'dab lakalug'do gaado, geeddoo meheenye atin weyti atin gaada? Atin eenna geeddoo rucchul on Waakh kakhuuftaane!
42012029	Kol dakkhan la wihi atin tamhiin ommos wihi atin dantaan akaloo'dina. Wahanyeyyohaas akawa'dwaa'dina.
