42012030	I'di tahe 'doo'di Waakh igaranne harratane wahanyeyyohaas kaalloo'da. Aabbahiin saggi atin waha dakkhan i'doontaan a garta.
42012031	I'daasenyi dakhi Waakh 'don'doon, ulla wahanyeyyoha dakkhan a ikaasookhayaa.
42012032	“Cha'atin i'di woyhoo adi rucchul tahiin laka, roorro akhabina. I'di tahe wihi Aabbahiin gooche, us hamaad ka dakhiis a atin siicha.
42012033	Wihi atin khabtaan ororicha, 'dee chilimme miskiin siicha. Urgohi chilimme jirtuu imassan isiyeela, kamurroonkiin goobi Waakh gessa, inti icho i'daaru laka ikanuglaanne, liihatine, riirintoo rucchul laka ika'daarin gessa.
42012034	A mehe inti kamurroonkaah kajiro, iche uuraah laka kajira.
42012035	“Taba tannabda, gaaddiin mujjum marda, taassiin la iiche jitine, 'dee Waakh ihila.
42012036	I'di ilbooyyeti kamurichoki oroos kasoonokhti sugto ateeha. Icho la uus kamuricho sootolossati chirraas on afaf ifuraan.
42012037	Chirri kamuricho ichohi iur'dine fiddiyo on sooeleele, hamaadi buurenye khabaan. Rume atin icheeka, eta kamure gaaddi ilbooyye gessata, ilbooyye komborti ballaaddane lakagolossati garabiche ka dikkille kareecha ulla yamiite icho goollicha.
42012038	Ilbooyyeta hamaadoo geeddohenye khabta chirri kamuricho naanokho ommos baryo afiche laka yimiyye, us ichohi iur'dine fiddiyo on sooeleele!
42012039	I'daasenyi waha abda, chirri ooyohi min leh saha'ddi eti minkiis hato kayamiit garti, minkiis ma 'diicho ma lajebcho.
42012040	Atin laka toorribda gi'de i'di tahe Ínam Aadam saha'ddi liikamurine yamiite.”
42012041	Beetero wihi us worsate, “Kamur, mammahta nah kalday on nah miinsantahe bal 'doo'd tuumman on?”
42012042	Kamur wihi us ilaabe, “Kamalda bal, ilbooyi weene lakakhuufo toro kharee a ayyo? A ki kamuriis ilbooyyetiis dahantiis gesso 'dee saha'ddi mujjume ka ilbooyye goollicho.
42012043	Ilbooyi liimaalo a ki maanti kamuriis soonokhti usuhi hiliis mujjum haaggicho sooeleelo.
42012044	Rume atin icheeka, kamuriis wihi us khabo tuummane dahantiis gessa, iweynaacha.
42012045	I'daasenyi eemba ilbooya uuriis ka ‘Kamureey geeddi deere khaata soonokhta,’ yidahye kahye, ilbooyyeti mejele ichoow ti deddeyyah jahye, toro la sukuuku bihiyye farso damye ichoowka meleefu yitah.
42012046	Kamuri ilbooyaas, maanti us ikamurine soonokhta toro saha'ddi us igaranne soonokhta. Usu seleye goggoocha, toro 'doo'di Waakh irummeysan goya gata.
42012047	“Ilbooyi wihi kamuriis usuhi yeelo 'doono garti toro la iyeelin, kolassi ittaawenye lajaha.
42012048	I'daasenyi ilbooyi wihi kamuriis usuhi yeelo 'doono igaranne khufe, kolassoo rucchule lajaha. Eti tuummane wihi buure lasiiche la, wihi buurenye lakasuga, eti wihi weyti buure dahan lagesse la wihi weyti buurenye lakasuga.
42012049	“Ani a imiyye harra 'dab kabolkhicha. Incheenka la kootte 'dab a lakabolkhiche.
42012050	I'daasenyi koloo sina liikawaaricha, amuut. Anna jeenteti wahaas u a bolkha ichoowka wahaas kutaan.
42012051	Atin maanta kol ani harra nebey keene koogtahiin? Mele! I'daasenyi seleyhi an 'doo'd fido iimiy.
42012052	Uu' toolla kakhabatti, minki et chan khabo afafe iswaaya. Et seyyahe isigessa, lammati addan dihta, lamma la ti seyyahe dihta.
42012053	Seleye lagowa, ooyo ínam ichiiyowa, inam la ooyo ichiiyowa, abare inám ichiiyowta, iname la abár ichiiyowta, abare inanti lasoodise ichiiyowta, inanti lasoodise la seyyohtiche ichiiyowta.”
42012054	Wihi us urur iyidah, “Chirra atin baali bahay kasookoro agarteen, chirraas on mehe tadeehiin ya, ‘Hir a soo'deya.’ I'daas on la tateeh.
42012055	Chirra hafar anki gurro kayamiit la mehe tadeehiin ya, ‘Il a sookululaata.’ Rumanka la i'daas on tateeh.
42012056	Iskaayyeessooy! Atin harra a yeytaane, serey yeytaane walah kaabattaan. A i'doh wihi an yeelo iagartaane, toro wohoo rucchul laka ikaabanna?”
42012057	“A i'doh goytiin ka wihi mujjume igoonna?
42012058	Chirri etoo wohoo kaacheekti ulla kootiin kigeen 'doono, geeddi atin jit raahtaan, weyti hol dowe isineyba. Cha'at i'daas iyeelin, eta eti 'doo'd hukkumo kigeecha, ki 'doo'd hukkumo la dahanti iskareet kigessa, eti iskareet la jeela kigessa.
42012059	Wihi an kiadeeh, jeelataas goya ma kasoobahto ichoowka mogtiis tuumman hiyyaayta.”
42013001	Geeddaakka la 'doo'doo intaas kijire saggi Bilaato 'hor amuri 'doo'doo boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ichohi Waakh soorriyo ibahcho lakayagiis ibahche Yeesso icheeke.
42013002	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Atin ka maanta, 'doo'da Gaalilaaya jeenteti icho bolokkhi i'dee liitusuu kol us 'doo'di Gaalilaaya tuumman ka 'doo'di weyti uskeel leh yahe koogtahiin?
42013003	I'daas mee. I'daasenyi atin laka chirri atin uskeeliin ikasoonokhan, atin tuumman laka a tuuntaan.
42013004	Ommos 'doo'di tomon ichoow siyyeetenye maanti koondihi deere dagaheet Silowaam kasooreye tuume, kol icho weyti 'doo'di Yeerusaleem yaal tuumman goyaka uskeeli buure yeele koogtahiin?
42013005	Mele! Wihi an atin icheeko, atin laka chirri atin uskeeliin ikasoonokhan, atin tuumman laka a tuuntaan.”
42013006	Yeesso 'deerka mammahta 'doo'd ibahche, “Etoo goorat geeyi fiige gosiis goya katoolliche. Ulla irte geeyaas yeyyeye, gurnaan kayowte. I'daasenyi, gurnaan us geey ka'hele mele.
42013007	Ulla 'deerka ilbooyi gos khuto wihi us iyidah, ‘Gu'h seyyah dakkhan an geeya fiig gurnaan on kayowda, ulla gurnaan us delo mele. Gooy uus immarah harra katoolline.’ ”
42013008	Et wihi us ilaabe, “ ‘Eti ween, 'dii toro gu'ha laka a fiddiyo, amba 'dollohiis khuta, laag laka kachiba 'dee bal a agarro.
42013009	Chirri us berri gurnaan dele, a haaggantahe. Chirri us idelin la goocha.’ ”
42013010	Yeesso maantoo Seeri Lanaso ka minkoo weysiite Ya'huude 'doo'd wori Waakh kaabcha.
42013011	Makhaabassoo ginna gu'h tomon ichoow siyyeet luhlo tirte la minkaas goya kajirta. Iche la goorat a khonnokhte, fit ma sohatti.
42013012	Chirri Yeesso iche arge ka, iche enenyet ortiis iwahe toro wihi us iyidah, “Makhaabassa, sugeeraah a lakaabahche!”
42013013	Ulla dahantiis makhaabassaas korche, iche la chirraas on fit tolossatte, Waakh koolisse.
42013014	Jeenteti Yeesso makhaabassa Seeri Lanaso isamaachuu, eti minki weysiite Ya'huud itoollo weyti hollowe. Ulla wihi us 'doo'd iyidah, “Ibeen lih enenyet hiliis haagsati a jirta. Eti khannan 'deerka ibeenneta lihe goyaka a yimaate a lasamaacho, Seeri Lanaso mee.”
42013015	Kamur wihi us ilaabe, “Iskaayyeessooy! Etiimba Seeri Lanaso ka heeriis ommos eheliis inti lakahide ka ma furo ma yegcho?
42013016	'Deerka makhaabassa rumanka hiiy Aburaahamenye Seytaan gu'h tomon ichoow siyyeet tuumman hide, Seeri Lanaso wihi hide ma lakafuro?”
42013017	Chirri us i'daas yidah ka 'doo'di kootte Yeesso tirrimo lakhaanyo khaatatte, i'daasenyi 'doo'di addan haaggi noole us yeelo kahamaade.
42013018	Yeesso toro wihi us 'doo'd worsate, “Kamalda bal, dakhi Waakh a koo mehe? Mehe iokkanaacho maanta?
42013019	A i'di ilinti weyti rucchule etoo khaate gosiis goyaka il gesse. Ilime bahte geey titahye, chimbirohi saraat la liikhimohiis kafiddiyaan.”
42013020	Toro wihi us worsate, “Dakhi Waakh mehe iokkanaacho?
42013021	Dakhi Waakh a i'di makhaabassi booddati makaate fuurisso wohoor khaatte, ingangaanoti buure kakhayte ichoowka ingangaano tuumman fuurte.”
42013022	Yeesso orey isohte anki ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem tabe. Geedda us sohti la ilkerengeet ichoow goobab dah kagooche, 'doo'd wori Waakh abche.
42013023	Etoo la wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Kamur 'doo'di uskeel lakaribo a koo rucchul on a?” Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe,
42013024	“Hol dowe afafhi juukhe kagel. I'di tahe wihi an atin iadeeh, 'doo'di buure afafhaase kagelin 'doona, i'daasenyi ma yabuu'diin.
42013025	Chirri eti min leh sookahe afaf hide, min khariissa tolossattaane, afaf jahtaane, eti min leh hawwaassattaane, ‘Eti weenoow, afaf nah ifur,’ idowtaan. “I'daasenyi wihi us atin isoolaabo, ‘An ma atin gardi, ommos inti atin katimaateen ma gardi.’
42013026	“Atin la wihi atin tadeehiin, ‘Nah goorat a kileegolossanne, at la ilkerengeetoheenyo ka 'doo'd wori Waakh abisse.’
42013027	“I'daasenyi wihi us ilaabo, ‘An ma atin gardi, ommos inti atin katimaateen ma gardi. Nyaama ikataba atinhi tuummane uskeel yeessaan!’
42013028	Atin la maanti atin Aburaaham ichoow Isakh ichoow Yaakoobo ichoow 'doo'di goorat Waákh íyeyyeedo goobi Waakh ka agartaane, i'daasenyi atin atin lariho, a ooytaane bolokh ka ilko iskarobtaan.
42013029	'Doo'd beri ichoow bahay ichoow miig ichoow gurro kayamiite, meelassicho khaattaane, dakhi Waakh ka sukuuku isleegelaan.
42013030	Rumanka 'doo'doo 'duboote ki oraat yateehe, koo oraat la ki 'duboot yateeh.”
42013031	Chirraas on Farissaayotoo timiyye wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Karnati 'Herood Antiiba layadeeh usuhi kiyagiise 'doona, inta katab.”
42013032	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Nyaama 'dowwohotaas wihi atin itadeehiin, ‘Ani maalinka ichoow saahta ba 'doo'd ginnayyo kabahcha, 'doo'd samaacha, ibeenki seyyahnaatteet ka la hili goorat an iimiy massicha.’
42013033	I'daasenyi maalinka ichoow saahta ichoow saahti yomboot ba a sohda on. Rumanka la et Waákh íyeyyeedo ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem khariis kayamuut mele.
42013034	“Yeerusaleemoow, ilkerengeetti weenoow, atin 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo a tagiisiine, 'doo'di Waakh atin isooerge la dagah kachibtaan. Saggi orran lukki weylassiis barbarre goya igessatuu, an geeddi buurenye anihi dahanoheey atin koogoogo 'doone, i'daasenyi atin ma 'doonin!
42013035	Yeya, Waakh rubeytiis minki Waakhe buurenye kiine a kaguure minki marah kalday atin ikatabe. Wihi an atin icheeko, yombuu toro ma iagartaane ichoowka, ‘Waakh ki magahi Kamur kayamiit a imaale,’ tadeehiin.”
42014001	Maantoo Yeesso a irte Seeri Lanaso ka minki etoo weene Farissaayee kagolossate, mujjume lafiiriche.
42014002	Etoo luhlo ichoow dahano dakkhan yombobeen laka intaas a kijire.
42014003	Yeesso la wihi us Farissaayo ichoow tagaammeti amurre worsate, “Amurre ichoow eti Seeri Lanaso ka lasamaacho a israahaan bal ma israahaan?”
42014004	I'daasenyi gammadicheen. Ulla chirraakka et khabte, samaache, laabe.
42014005	Ulla 'deerka wihi us icho worsate, “Etiinkoh maanta chirri inankiis ommos heeriiskoo Seeri Lanaso ka wor kadihe, chirraas on isobihin?”
42014006	Icho la toro walah icho soolaabeen mele gammadicheen.
42014007	Chirri us 'doo'di marteenye min goyaka inti 'doo'di weyti liinkaanyito orronti yowti arge ka, mammahta toro ibahche wihi us 'doo'd iyidah,
42014008	“Chirri sukuukuhoo ka lakiwahe inti 'doo'di weyti liinkaanyito orronti a isikhaban, i'di tahe kolossoo etoo ati kaaween laka sukuukuhaas ka a lawahe.
42014009	Chirri i'daas tahe la, eti sukuuku lehe lammatiin atin wahe wihi us kiyadeeh, ‘Eta kombortaah sii.’ At la 'deerka lakhaanyo kikhaatatta harra koorromatta.
42014010	I'daasenyi chirra lakiwahe, harra koorrommo, 'dee eti sukuuku leh la a yamiite wihi us kiyadeeh, ‘Aalaaw, kaale inta deefto orrommo.’ At la 'dee 'doo'di addan goyaka a lakiinkaanyita.
42014011	I'di tahe eti tuummane isweynaacho a lanuglaacha, eti isnuglaacho la a laweynaacha.”
42014012	Yeesso la wihi us eti min leh iyidah, “Chirri at sukuukuhoo bihisso, aalassaah ichoow walaalinyetaah ichoow 'doo'diin ichoow ollokkaahki kamure awahin, chirri ati icho wahte, icho laka maantoo a kiwahaane wihi goorat at iyeesse ka kigutaan.
42014013	I'daasenyi chirri at sukuuku bihisso, 'doo'di miskiine ichoow ki ma'dee, i'di maanta ki luhlo laa ichoow ki indo laa wah.
42014014	At la 'dee Waakh a kimaala. 'Doo'da walah us khabo us kisoolaabo mele. Eheetteey laka maanti 'doo'di fiffissan omoot lakasookahcho, Waakh kala'de kisoolaaba wihi at yeesse ka.”
42014015	Chirri etoo kootte Yeesso leefiddiyo waha daage ka wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “'Doo'di berri sukuukuhi goobi Waakh kagolossati hamaadoo geeddohenye khaba!”
42014016	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Etoo sukuukuhoo buurenye bahche, 'doo'di buure wahe.
42014017	Chirri saha'ddi lagolossati titah ka, ilbooyiis ergate 'doo'di lawahe mehe iyadeeh ya, ‘Kaaleya, a mehe walah dakkhan kola a latannabichee.’
42014018	“I'daasenyi icho tuumman geeyo dowteene, ki oraat wihi us yidah, ‘Ibeennetane gosoo soogadde, gosaase irda sooyeya. I'diicha on.’
42014019	“Koo la wihi us yidah, ‘Heerassoo tomonenye soogadde, heerassane kaja il kakhuta, sukuuku emeet ma 'helo i'diicha on.’
42014020	“Koo addan la wihi us yidah, ‘Ibeennetane min disde, sag an iamiit mele.’
42014021	“Ilbooy soonokhte kamuriis wihi liiyidah icheeke. Eti min leh hollowe ilbooyiis amur ibahche wihi us iyidah, ‘Nyaam dowwa, jitassi juukhe ichoow wihi babballaaddane ilkerengeeteet kasossoho, miskiino ichoow 'doo'di luhlo laa ichoow ki indo laa ichoow ki sohot iubaa'dan soowah.’
42014022	“Ilbooy wihi us ilaabe, ‘Eti ween wihi at tidah a yeele, i'daasenyi min uliba ma buuhsamin.’
42014023	“Eti kamure wihi us ilbooyiis iyidah, ‘Nyaam jitassi babballaaddan ichoow jitassi juukhe iro, 'doo'd hawwaasso 'dee minkeey a buuhsamo.
42014024	Wihi an atin iadeeh, eti dakkhane goorat lawahe emeet 'dii'de golola af ma ka'daaro!’ ”
42014025	Maantoo ururoo buure Yeesso sooraahe ulla urur iurgiye wihi us iyidah,
42014026	“Chirri etoo isooraaho ulla toro aabbahiis ichoow abartiis ichoow makhaabassiis ichoow nyaakhutiis ichoow walaalinyetiis ichoow albehi leedesse i'dii'dine, jirotiis laka i'dii'din, etaas abattiteey itaahan ma yabuu'd.
42014027	Eti tuummane massalaabatiis isi'dine, sina iumhane ani isooraahin, abattiteey itaahan ma yabuu'd.
42014028	“Eemba etiinkoo minkoo buurenye disin 'doona. Etaas koloo a orronta, chilimmeti minkaas tuumman disso rerreega, usu khabo ichoow usuhuus yeya menya?
42014029	I'di tahe chirri us daddaabohi ilaat dise, us minkaas massin waaye, 'doo'di argo la weyti usu kachaarta.
42014030	Wihi icho yadeehiin, ‘Eta goorat minka a dise toro massin agaafte.’
42014031	“Ommos eemba karnatoo koo addane dowwanoha ka diho kiirta. Koloo ma orronti iskarti eluf tomone ka usú karnati isoosohti iskarti eluf tomon lammee khabo dihin yabuu'd ma yeyo?
42014032	Chirri us ituddubin, geeddi ki addan foga jiro iche saamo ergata karnati addan iirta nebey daaha.
42014033	Saggaas on u etiinki tuummane wihi us khabo tuumman i'diin, abattiteey itaahan ma yabuu'd.
42014034	“Magaa'de a haaggantahe. I'daasenyi chi'iche gimbatiche waayte, saggoh toro liigimbaacha?
42014035	Harra ommos laag laka ma iroon gone, a lakhuba on. “Eti dogo khabo, a daago gi'de.”
42015001	Maantoo makhaaballeti kooddi goosso ichoow 'doo'doo 'doo'di uskeel khabo liiekkaacho a yimiyye wihi Yeesso 'doo'd abcho dagansate.
42015002	I'daasenyi Farissaayo ichoow tagaammeti amurre ba nyunnyuweene wihi icho yidaaheen, “Eta 'doo'di uskeel lehe soodowweesta toro leegolossata!”
42015003	Yeesso la 'deerka mammahta ibahche,
42015004	“Eemba etiinkoo iiyti kudoowenye khaba, koo la baabaa. Etaas, iiyti tomon saagaal ichoow saagaale inti iche yaakhto kataba, ki kaldaye baabe yowta ichoowka 'hela menya?
42015005	Chirri us 'hele ka weyti hamaada, naf adah sookorsata
42015006	goob keena. Ulla 'deerka ollokkiis ichoow aalassiis dakkhamba waha wihi us iyadeeh, ‘Kaaleya a isleehamaano, i'di tahe naffeeyki iiyyaate kootte baabe a 'hele.’
42015007	Wihi an atin iadeeh, saggaas on u, goobi Waakh ka hamaadi buurenye jira jeenteti etoo kaldaye uskeeliis kasoonokhtuu. Hamaadi eta khabo hamaadi et tomon saagaal ichoow et saagaal fiffissane uskeelicho ikasoonokhan weyti kussanyahe.
42015008	“Ommolla eemba makhaabassoo chilim tomon khabto, koo kalday a kabaabe. Makhaabassa taahiche a bolkhissa min harta chilinkiche mujjum yowatta ichoowka 'hessa menya?
42015009	Chirri iche 'hesse la deyyehoti aalassichee ichoow ti ollokkichee tuumman wahta wihi iche itadeeh, ‘Kaaleya a isleehamaano, i'di tahe an chilinkeeyki baabe a 'hele!’
42015010	Wihi an atin icheeko, saggaase herti Waakh ihamaadda chirri etoo kalday uskeeliis kasoonokhte.”
42015011	Yeesso yeed orey iwoye, “Makhaabaloo yeeletoo lammee khabo a jire.
42015012	Inanki nugul kahe wihi us aabbahiis iyidah, ‘Aabba, dahalheeyki ani imiinsan isii!’ Makhaabal 'deerka hoola yeele lammache gise.
42015013	“Inkoo geeddoo labarye ka, inanki nugul wihi lasiiche dakkhan ororiche, iloo fogaat irte, ilaas ka hoolahiis kagir'daame.
42015014	Wihi goorat us khabe tuumman massiche. Saahka abaartoo uskul ilaas gesse raarahe ititah.
42015015	Ulla irte hili etoo ilaas gele, et la gosas ierge, 'dee golcha a yaakhicho.
42015016	Ulla gololi golcha taham ohom 'doone. I'daasenyi et wihi us yaham siicho mele.
42015017	“Maanti matah soonokhte, masse wihi us uuriis goyaka yidah, ‘'Doo'di aabbaheey kireeste gololi yaakho us yahame ichoowka us soowaacho a khaba, ani la kalla inta ka raarahe ikhaatta!
42015018	A kaha aabbaheey inokhda wihi an iadeeh, “Aabba an Waakh ortiis ka ichoow ortaah ka uskeel a yeele.
42015019	Kola ma imalin chirri weelaahha liiyadeeh, i'di etoo at kireysatte ikayeelo.” ’
42015020	'Deerka kahe anki aabbahiis jiro fool siiche. “I'daasenyi geeddi us goobicho isooeleelin on fogaka aabbahiis usu arge, uur isoonugleeste inyaame sorboobte dongate.
42015021	“Inam la wihi us yidah, ‘Aabba an Waakh ortiis ka ichoow ortaah ka uskeel a yeele. Ma imalin chirri kola weelaahha liiyadeeh!’
42015022	“I'daasenyi aabbahiis ilbooyyetiis wahe wihi us iyidah, ‘Nyaama dafarti weyti haaggan sookhaata inam gessa. Lahaagti far sookhaata far gessa. Kobo laka sookhaata gessa.
42015023	'Dee irda maari weyti ruusan sookhaata khala sukuuku a gello, a hamaano!
42015024	I'di tahe inankeeyka a i'doo goorat us yumuyye toolla la a sookahe, goorat a baabe toollaka a soonokhte!’ Sukuuku 'deerka labahche.
42015025	“Geeddaas dakkhan la inanki teyyane gose khuta. Chirri us goob yimiyye us min isoodowwaate ka, kowdoti 'doo'di gir'daamo daage.
42015026	Ilbooyoo wahe wihi us worsate, ‘Mehe jira?’
42015027	Wihi us ilaabe, ‘Walaalaahki goorat baabe iche soonokhte, aabbahaah la heeri ruusan ikhale. I'di tahe usuhi nebey khabo toro la haaggane yimiy.’
42015028	“Inanki ween hollowe min gelin 'dii'de. Aabbahiis 'deerka bahe hawwaaste, mine soogessaa.
42015029	I'daasenyi wihi us aabbahiis ilaabe, ‘Aabba an gu'hassi ittaawenye i'di bow'dataah u hil kihaaggiche. Anna injire amurretaah ma kutin. At mehe injire isiisse? Weeli makhaleete an aalasseey lee'dubdi laka ma siin!
42015030	I'daasenyi inankaahka hoolahaah tuumman malaayayyo on kamassiche. Maanti us soonokhte ka, at la kahte heeri weyti ruusan ikhasse!’
42015031	“ Aabbahiis la wihi us iyidah, ‘Inankaaw at orran dakkhan a ileejirta, wihi an khabo tuumman la a wahaahha.
42015032	I'daasenyi a imasse chi'inno sukuuku bihinno hamaano, a mehe walaalaahka goorat a i'di eti yumuyye toolla la a jira, goorat a baabe toolla la a soonokhte.’ ”
42016001	Yeesso abattitiis imammahte wihi us iyidah, “Etoo kamurenye saggi ilbooyiiski ween hoolahiis ikagir'daamo liicheeke a jira.
42016002	Ulla 'deerka ilbooyaas wahe wihi us worsate, ‘Waha an daddaago lakaacheekti a mehe? Saggi orran at hoolaheey idakhatti khadaaboo ka isoochiire isii. I'di tahe at kola ilbooyeeyki ween mee.’
42016003	“Ilbooyi ween la wihi us uuriis goyaka yidah, ‘Kamureey kola hili an kijiro a ikabahcha. Mehe yeelo? Ani la miigti gosas lakakhuto ma khabo, daah la a kuuryaawa.
42016004	Wihi an yeelo 'dee chirri hil liikabahche laka an aalassi ittaawenye igargaaro khabo a garda.’
42016005	“Ulla 'deerka kahe, 'doo'di mogti kamuriis khabo tuumman wahe. Eti oraat wihi us worsate, ‘At kamureey mogti at kakhabto a geeddoh?’
42016006	“Wihi us ilaabe, ‘A ga'daar kudoo subakki geeyi oolif.’ “Ilbooyi ween la wihi us iyidah, ‘Dowwa orrommo buuggaahki mogeet ka tomon chan on chiire 'dee geeddaas on soogut.’
42016007	“Ki lammaatteet toro worsate wihi us worsate, ‘At la mogti at khabto a geeddoh?’ “Et la wihi us ilaabe, ‘A ugar kudoo 'dargaayye.’ “Wihi us iyidah, ‘Buuggaahki mogeet ka tomon siyyeet on kayeel.’
42016008	“Eta kamure ilbooyiiska weene khollokkhan jeenteti ekkeysihiis u kooliche. A mehe 'doo'di harrata wihi icho isiyeelaan ka, 'doo'di banayhi Waakh kijiro khara ka a kussanyahiin.
42016009	Wihi an atin isoocheeko, hoolahiinki harrata aalal kabahsada 'dee maanti kamurroonkiin massate ka goobi Waakhe jirtuu imassan ka a atin lamartiisti.
42016010	“Eti tuummane wihi rucchul ka lakakhuufo, wihi buure ka laka a lakakhuufa, eti tuummane wihi rucchul ka liikakhuufin la, wihi buure ka laka ma lakakhuufo.
42016011	Chirri 'deerka goorat kamurroonki harrata ka atin liikaakhuufin, ayyo kamurroonki rummaat ka atin kakhuufa?
42016012	Chirri goorat hoolahi etoo ka atin liikakhuufin la, ayyo hoolahi wihiine atin siicha?
42016013	“Falfa kamur lamma ifasso mele. Koo a 'dii'dda ki addan la 'doonta, ommos koo inkaanyitta ki addan la 'darraawta. Waakh ichoow chilimme ba koloo kalday ma ifasso.”
42016014	Farissaayo chi'iche ayta daagte ka tekkele ka Yeesso kareyatte. A mehe icho a 'doo'di weyti chilimme 'doono.
42016015	Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Atin 'doo'd ortiis ka a ismujjummoossaane, i'daasenyi Waakh uuriin a garta. Wihi weeli enenyet ortiis ka weyti khumman, Waakh weyti 'dii'ddanyahe.
42016016	“Chiirnaanneti Amurre ichoow ti 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo tuumman 'doo'd a liicheeke ichoowka Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo yimiy. Uus maantaas, Wori Haaggane dakhi Waakh miinsan enenyet a liicheeka. Ebba la usuhi miigtiis ka dakhaas gelo marma.
42016017	Chirri sereyta daayan ichoow harra massataan laka, aytoo kaldaye amurre Muusa goya kajirto labahcho ma jirto.
42016018	“Eti tuummane makhaabassiis tuum rihe makhaabassoo addan diste, uskeeli us makhaabassi tiis ieheynan leeur'do iche gele, toro la makhaabali makhaabassi tuum larihe diste, ullaka uskeeli us makhaabassi tiis ieheynan leeur'do iche gele.
42016019	“Etoo kamurenye gaaddi weyti gato miige khabo toro la kol dakkhan gololi haaggan yahame jire.
42016020	Arittiis la etoo miskiinenye Laassaro layadeehe jiissoo suuje sar tuumman kasoobahte lakeene,
42016021	ulla weyti gololi eta kamure kombortiisti ballaaddan kasoodihe yaham imoone. Kararre laka a tamiite jiissiis laajja.
42016022	“Saahka eti miskiine yumuyye, herti Waakh la khaatte inti 'doo'di fiffissane tuume lagesso ka, Aburaaham garabiis orrommisse. Eti kamure laka yumuyye lahawwaale.
42016023	Ulla meessi 'doo'di tuume kijiro goya kijire, bolokkhi uskul latuse. Chirraakka serey yeye fogaka Aburaahamhi Laassaro garabiis fiddiyo arge.
42016024	'Deerka kariire wihi us yidah, ‘Aabba Aburaaham, uur isoonugleyso. Laassaro ergo farriiskoo bicche a kalug'do a sookhaato harrab a ikhoboocho. I'di tahe 'daba goyaka bolokkhi uskule khaba.’
42016025	“I'daasenyi Aburaaham wihi us ilaabe, ‘Inankaaaw saggi goorat at jirotaah ka wahaahki haaggan i'hesse Laassaro la wihi sussuuje i'hele kasoo'hel. I'daasenyi us toolla inta ka uure lakhoboocha, ati la bolokkhi uskule khabta.
42016026	Wihi addan la Waakh ankharoo buurenye dahteen gesse, 'dee et inta kabaho atin iyamiit mele, toro la et intaas kasoomaaho nah iyamiit mele.’
42016027	“Wihi us ilaabe, ‘Aabbahaaw Aburaaham an 'deerka a kihawwaasdee, Laassaro goob aabbaheey iergo.
42016028	A mehe an walaal chane khaba. Icho a tootoocho uus 'dee icho laka maanti icho tuumeen inta bolokkhi uskul 'doo'd kayaham imaatane.’
42016029	“Aburaaham wihi us ilaabe, ‘'Doo'diin, a geeddi us amurre Muusa ichoow wihi 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo chiire soomo, icho la wihi liidowo on a daageen.’
42016030	“Eti kamure la wihi us yidah, ‘Aabba Aburaaham geeddaas kalday ma yaakhto! I'daasenyi chirri etoo omoot kasookahe icho iirte uskeelicho a kasoonokhtaan.’
42016031	“Aburaaham la wihi us ilaabe, ‘Chirri icho amurre Muusa ichoow wihi 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo chiire daagiwwaayeen, chirri etoo omoot kasookahe laka uskeelicho ma 'diichaan.’ ”
42017001	Yeesso wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Wahanyeyyohi enenyet uskeel kalug'do a yamiitiine, i'daasenyi eti icho leeyamiitiin sinati sugto eenna a buure!
42017002	Wihi deefo a usuhi daddaabti buurenye gurnaan lakatumo lukhum lakahido beyti buure goya lakalug'do usuhi 'doo'daar tarraantarricho ka.
42017003	Taba gi'de isyaakhicha! “Chirri walaalaah uskeeloo kajiro, leejaakh. Chirri us uskeel kasoonokhte la ikakut.
42017004	Chirri us orrahtoo goyaka laka kol teeba uskeel kiyeele, kolal teebaccho ba la uskeelaas kisoocheekte, ‘Uskeeleey a kasoonokhda, iileeraahin,’ kiyidah, uskeelaas ikakut.”
42017005	Maantoo ergaano wihi iche Kamur itidah, “Kamur, nah gargaare 'dee weyti Waakh a kakhuufno.”
42017006	Wihi us ilaabe, “Chi' kakhuufnaanki atin Waakh kakhuuftaan rucchuleel ka geeddi ilinti geeyi dahar yahe, a geeddi atin geeya inta katoollo, ‘Hiiyyay khabtaayi inta kabukkhe beyti buure goya kasoobah,’ itadeehiine, geey la wihi atin itidaaheen yeelo.”
42017007	“Ayyo goytiin ka ilbooy khaba, chirra ilbooy gos khunnaan kayimiyye ommos adi goya kayimiy, ‘Kaale orrommo golosso’ iyadeeh?
42017008	Wihi us ilbooyaas iyadeeh, ‘Gololeeyki gelebeet kariche, gaaddi hil gesso, igoolli. Inkoo an golossade golosso.’
42017009	Ilbooyaas wihi us yeele ka kala'd liilaabo mele, i'di tahe us hiliissa on buuhiche.
42017010	I'daasu atin laka chirra atin wihi yeela atin liidah yeesseen, wihi atin tadeehiin, ‘Nah a ilbooyyeti wihi iche yeesse ka kala'd isugin. A mehe nah hilaanya on buuhinne.’ ”
42017011	Yeesso anki ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem fool siiche, sohtaayi boroofenhi Saamariya ichoow boroofenhi Gaalilaaya dahcho eleele.
42017012	Chu'us gooboo hagga eleele ka, reeroo tomonenye bu'datoo sar kasoobahte or kasoodowe. 'Doo'da la foga tolossate,
42017013	riire, “Yeesso! Eti ween! Uur nah isoonugleyso!” yidaaheen.
42017014	Inkoo us icho arge ka, wihi us iyidah, “Nyaama kuhaaniyyo iirda istusa.” Sohtaani icho dakkhamba samaateen.
42017015	Kichokoo chu'us saggi us isamaate arge ka, usuhi hooyi buure ka Waakh saa'do soonokhte.
42017016	Yeesso hagga ka jilbo il kagu'dde kala'd ilaabe. Eta la ili Saamariya kayimiy.
42017017	Yeesso wihi us worsate, “'Doo'di kootte an samaache et tomon menya? Et saagaassi addan meete?
42017018	Eta yeelan kalday on menye et addane soonokhte Waakh kooliche mele?”
42017019	Yeesso la wihi us etaas iyidah, “Kah iro, kakhuufnaanki at ikakhuufte a kiribee.”
42017020	Maantoo Farissaayo maanti dakhi Waakh yamiite Yeesso worsatte. Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Emeetti dakhi Waakh ti indo lakaargo mee.
42017021	Et keley argo, ‘Yeya kalla soosohta,’ ommos, ‘Kuulla soosohta’ yadeeh mele. I'di tahe dakhi Waakh goytiinna kajira.”
42017022	Wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Ibeen a yamiit ki atin Ínam Aadamhi soonokhti harra dakhti imoontaan argin 'doontaan, i'daasenyi argin ma tabuu'diin.
42017023	'Doo'd mehe atin iyadeeh ya, ‘Ínam Aadam kuulla,’ ommos ‘Ínam Aadam kalla.’ Icho akaalloo'dina.
42017024	I'di tahe Ínam Aadam maanti us soonokhti i'di ankhadhi ankhado sereyta daayan gu'ddo ichoowka anki 'diri ikabaho yateeh.
42017025	I'daasenyi koloo Ínam Aadam sinati buurenye kawaarta, 'doo'di wey'da la usu 'dii'da.
42017026	“I'di goorat ibeenne Noowa eheet, iche ibeenki Ínam Aadam yamiit laka yateeh.
42017027	Maantaas la 'doo'd saggi orrankateet on sukuuku igele, minan laka laaddiste ichoowka Noowa koobanhi buure goya gele. Chirraas on 'duley ichohi addan tuumman baabiiche.
42017028	“Harra toro i'di maanti goorat Loot jire tateeh. 'Doo'd saggi orrankateet on sukuuku igele, walah ororsata, walah gatta, gaasoo ilmo il kachiba, gaasoo laka minassicho dista.
42017029	I'daasenyi maanti Loot ilkerengeetti Soodom kabahe Waakh serey ka 'dab ichoow dagahti bolokhto serey kakeene 'doo'd tuumman bakkiche.
42017030	“Maanti Ínam Aadam enenyet liisoobabbakkaahicho laka i'da on tateeh.
42017031	Maantaas et min sartiis fuulo, meehiis la min goya kijiro yego meehiis soobahsati mele. Saggaas on u, et gos goya kijiro nokhti wohoo sookhaatti mele.
42017032	Bal wihi makhaabál Loot kayitah kasoo'hela!
42017033	Eti tuummane jirotiis khucchin 'doono, jirotiisti rummaat a waaya, eti tuummane jirotiis waayo la jirotiisti rummaat a riba.
42017034	Wihi an atin icheeko, ibeenkaas et lamma siriirtoo kalday iskaleeu'durta, koo lakhaata, ki addan la lakataba.
42017035	Deyyehotoo lammee la inchaba isleetunta, too lakhaata ti addan la lakataba.”
42017037	Abatti la wihi iche worsatte, “Kamur waha intoh kayateehiin?” Wihi us ilaabe, “Inti wohoo kayumaateen, intaase ra'd kawara.”
42018001	Yeesso toro abattitiis mammahtoo saggi icho kol dakkhan iweestaane toro icho weysi ka igarrahsataan tusso ibahche,
42018002	wihi us iyidah, “Goorat ilkerengeettoo ka, etoo 'doo'd hukkumo Waakh ikaroorine toro etoo kalday laka ikabaalin a jire.
42018003	Ilkerengeettaas ka la makhaabassoo muunkhee a jirte. Iche la kol dakkhan eta a itamiite hawwaassatta, ‘Igargaare ayta chiiytankeey miinsan jiti fissan ka ani igooy,’ idowta.
42018004	“Geeddoo dakkhan lee'dii'de. I'daasenyi saahka wihi us uuriis goyaka yidah, ‘Chirri an Waakh ikaroorine an weeli enenyet ikabaalin laka,
42018005	jeenteti makhaabassa geeddi deer sina ikawaarissuu, aytiche jiti fissane igoocha uus iche kol dakkhan isoononnokhanne sina ikawaarinne kansi itiranne!’ ”
42018006	Kamur toro wihi us yidah, “Bal etaas khollokkhane 'doo'd hukkumo wohoo kaabda.
42018007	Maantaka Waakh 'doo'diiski us soobahsate ibeen ichoow maalim ba usu iooyo wihi fissan ma igoocho? Wihi icho 'doonaan dowwa ma iyeelo?
42018008	Wihi an atin icheeko, Waakh 'doo'diis wihi fissane igoocha, toro la ma malmalo. I'daasenyi maanti Ínam Aadam soonokhti 'doo'di harrata usuhi usu kakhuufo a sooeleela?”
42018009	Yeesso toro 'doo'doo saggi us ififfissanyahe iskakhuufo wihi us yeelo ka 'doo'di addan 'darraawo mammahta ibahche wihi us yidah,
42018010	“'Doo'doo lammee minki Waakhe buurenye weysi kiirte. Koo a Farissaayo, ki addan la a etoo kooddi goocho.
42018011	Ki Farissaayee tolossate, awtiissa on Waakh wahte wihi us yidah, ‘Okkhoow weyti kala'd kisoolaaba ani i'di 'doo'di addane hatto lehe ommos i'di 'doo'di uskeel kajiro ommos eti makhaabassi tiis ieheynan leeur'do ommos laka i'di eta kooddi goocho menye.
42018012	Ani teebatoo goyaka maan lamma af hiida toro la wihi an 'helo tuumman goyaka miili Kamur kisoobahcha.’
42018013	“I'daasenyi eti kooddi goocho foga tolossate. Ulla serey laka ma yeyine, i'daasenyi kach isgu'dde, 'dee saggi us uskeeliis ka suujoon iargo tuse, wihi us yidah, ‘Okkhoow aniha uskeel leh uur isoonugleyso.’
42018014	“Wihi an atin icheeko, inkoo icho goob inokhteen, eti addan menye, etane Waakh ortiis ka eti fissan liiekkaache. A mehe eti tuummane isweynaacho a lanuglaacha, eti isnuglaacho la a laweynaacha.”
42018015	'Doo'd la nyaakhuti nahaso nuugo laka a sookhaata, Yeesso ikeena 'dee ulla dahano korcha iweesta. Chirri abatti waha agarte ka 'doo'daas leejaakhte.
42018016	I'daasenyi Yeesso nyaakhut isiwahe wihi us yidah, “Nyaakhuti rurrucchul ajeyinna 'diicha ani a iyimaatee, a mehe dakhi Waakh a ki 'doo'di i'dee.
42018017	Rume atin icheeka, eti dakhi Waakh saggi weeli rucchul ikakhaatan, koloo kalday laka goobi Waakh ma gelo.”
42018018	Etoo Ya'huude ween wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Eti weene haaggan, mehe yeelo 'dee jiroti jirtuu imassan 'helo?”
42018019	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “At a i'doh ani, ‘Eti haaggan,’ ikawahta? Etoo kaldaye haaggan laka ma jiro Waakh on menye.
42018020	Amurre Muusa a garatta, ‘Makhaabali kaah ieheynan ommos makhaabassi taah ieheynan aleeur'din, weeli enenyet dubunuunu iigaasan, walah ahatin, garti beenaat ayeedin, aabbahaah ichoow abartaah inkaanyit.’ ”
42018021	Et la wihi us yidah, “Wahaas tuumman koo an iraahin mala uu' goorat an weel eheet.”
42018022	Chirri Yeesso waha daage ka wihi us et iyidah, “At uliba wohoo kaldaye kaankhan. Nyaame wihi at khabto tuumman ororiche, chilimme la miskiin siiche, kamurroonki goobi Waakh 'hele, 'dee kaale isooraah.”
42018023	Chu'us waha daage ka, weyti fool ribowe, a mehe eti hoolahi buure khabe eheet.
42018024	Yeesso la et yeye wihi us yidah, “A 'hoossoo geeddohe chi' kamurre dakhi Waakh gesso!
42018025	Rumanka naffi gaale issi irbi kakhaduutti weyti 'hooltahe. Eheet a, 'hoossi eti kamurenye dakhi Waakh gelo iche weyti kutta.”
42018026	'Doo'di waha daage la wihi us worsate, “Ayyo 'deerka lariba?”
42018027	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Wihi weeli enenyet ka koloo kalday laka iitaahan, Waakh ka a geeddi icho yateehiin.”
42018028	Beetero wihi us yidah, “Nah wihi nah khabne tuumman a kasootabne, 'dee ati kiraahna.”
42018029	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Rume atin icheeka, eti tuummane jeenteti dakhi Waakh u goobiis ichoow makhaabassiis ichoow walaalinyetiis ichoow aabbahiis ichoow abartiis ichoow nyaakhutiis ba kasootabe,
42018030	jiroti toolla us jiro ka wihi ittaawenye wihi us kasootabe kussane 'hela, toro la jiroti yomboot ka, jiroti jirtuu imassanne 'hela.”
42018031	Yeesso abattitiisti tomon ichoow lammee 'dol iwahe wihi us iyidah, “Ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme ikorra 'dee wihi goorat 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo chiire Ínam Aadam miinsan tuumman labuuhicha.
42018032	Usu dahanohi 'doo'di Waakh igaranne lagessa. Icho la usu a kachaartaane, leeabaarramaane, hanjuf laka katufaane,
42018033	laajja ka doochaane, 'da'ddaboka yagiisiin. Ibeenki seyyahnaatteet ka toro omoot kasookaha.”
42018034	Abatti la waha dakkhan kichokoo kalday laka ma garan. I'di tahe wihi yeeda miinsanyahe icho a lakadagche, icho la wihi us kaayyeedo tuumman foolicho ma khabaan.
42018035	Chirra Yeesso ilkerengeetti Yeeriko isoodowwaate ka, etoo indo laa jit afiissa fiddiya walah daddaaha.
42018036	Chirri us kowdoti ururi 'dulo daage ka wihi yitah enenyet worsate.
42018037	Wihi icho usu iyidaaheen, “Yeessohi ilkerengeetti Naasarete kuta.”
42018038	Et la riire, “Yeesso, Inam Dawuud, uur isoonugleyso,” yidah.
42018039	'Doo'di orey raaho usu leejaakhe gammadi iyidah. I'daasenyi geeddi kootteet laka 'dirihiis riire, “Ínam Dawuud, uur isoonugleyso” yidah.
42018040	Yeesso la tolossate, amur bahche et a liikeeno. Chirri us soodowwaate ka Yeesso wihi us worsate,
42018041	“Mehe kiyeelo 'doonta?” Wihi us ilaabe, “Kamur anihi toro il argo 'doona.”
42018042	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Indo bihi. Kakhuufnaanki at ikakhuufte a kisamaachee.”
42018043	Et chirraas on indo 'hele, Yeesso raahe usuhi Waakh saa'do. Chirri enenyet tuumman waha arge ka, icho laka Waakh saa'deen.
42019001	Yeesso ilkerengeetti Yeeriko eleele, dah kagooche.
42019002	Etoo Sakkaayo layadeeh laka intaas a kijira. Ulla 'doo'di kooddi goocho iweenyahe, toro la kamure eheet.
42019003	Ulla usuhi Yeesso argo 'doona. I'daasenyi sag us Yeesso iargo mele i'di tahe us weyti konkoommanyahe, urur la weyti buur eheneet.
42019004	'Deerka 'doo'd ortiis nyaame, geeyoo deer kore, Yeesso argin 'doonaa. Yeesso la intaase leeyamiit.
42019005	Chirri Yeesso geey isoodowwaate ka, serey yeye wihi us yidah, “Sakkaayo, toolla kofche sooyeg. I'di tahe wihi massan, an maalinka minkaahha fiddiya.”
42019006	Sakkaayo la chirraakka dowwa geey kasooyage, Yeesso hamaad ka khaate goobiis ka martiiste.
42019007	'Doo'd dakkhan la chirri us waha arge ka, nyunnyuwe wihi us yidah, “Eta goobi eti uskeel lehe irta.”
42019008	I'daasenyi Sakkaayo tolossate wihi us Kamur iyidah, “Kamur, yey! Wihi an khabo tuumman seleye goocha nyuusicho miskiin siicha. Chirri goorat an etoo ekkeesde wohoo kakhaate la, wihi goorat an kakhaate kol affartichooda ilaaba.”
42019009	Yeesso la wihi us Sakkaayo ilaabe, “Gooba maalinka Waakh a ribe. I'di tahe eta laka rumanka a hiiy Aburaaham.
42019010	A mehe Ínam Aadam a yimiyye 'doo'di baabe yowta, riba.”
42019011	Geeddi 'doo'd waha dagansati, Yeesso toro orey isohte, mammahtoo 'doo'd icheeke. A mehe us kola ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem a isoodowwaate. 'Doo'd la kol dakhi Waakh dowwanoha ka yamiite koogyahe.
42019012	Wihi us yidah, “Etoo gooboo magah khabo iloo fogaate irte, 'dee antohi us ilaas kadakhti 'hela toro soonokhta.
42019013	'Deerka bow'dayyohiiskoo tomone wahe, hiinaan tomon chilimme dahan gesse. Hiinaan ba chilim kudoo 'dahabe kijira. Wihi us iyidah, ‘Ebba hiinaankiis a kabacchaarti ichoowka a soonokhdi.’
42019014	“I'daasenyi 'doo'di ilaas weyti eta 'dii'de. Inkoo us irte ka 'doo'doo ergeene, ‘Eta usuhi karnateenyo lakayeelo ma 'doonno’ yidaaheen.
42019015	“I'daasenyi karnat lakayeele, saahka soonokhte. Maanti us yimiy ka bow'dayyohiis wahe. Ulla wihi icho hiinaanneti us idiibe ka'heleen, iche aban 'doona.
42019016	“Ki oraat yimiyye wihi us yidah, ‘Eti ween, hiinaanki at isiisse, hiinaan tomon addane dele.’
42019017	“Kamuriis la wihi us ilaabe, ‘At weyti haaggisse! At rumanka a bow'dati haaggan! At wihi rucchule dahan lakigesse ka laka a lakakhuufa gone, ilkerengeet tomone anatta.’
42019018	“Ki lammaatteet laka yimiyye wihi us yidah, ‘Eti ween hiinaanki at isiisse, hiinaan chan addane dele.’
42019019	“Kamuriis wihi us ilaabe, ‘At a haaggisse gone ilkerengeet chane anatta.’
42019020	“Bow'datoo addan la timiyye wihi iche tidah, ‘Eti ween hiinaanki at isoodiibte kalla. An a khaate dafartoo kahide dagche.
42019021	An weyti kaaroora, a mehe at a eti weyti uur daayan. Ati wihi wahaah ieheynane khaatatta, gosi at ikhutin ka la golol yowatta.’
42019022	“Kamuriche wihi us ilaabe, ‘At a bow'dati suuje, an yeedaahha on kaahukkuma! At saggi an uur idaayanahe an wihi weheey ieheynan ikhaaddi toro gosi an ikhutin ka gurnaan iyowdi a garatta menya?
42019023	A i'doh 'deerka hiinaankeey baangi igelinne 'dee maanti an soonokhde ichehi desse isookhaatin?’
42019024	“'Doo'di intaas toollo wihi us iyidah, ‘Hiinaankiis kakhaata, ilbooyi hiinaan tomon khabo siicha.’
42019025	“'Doo'd la wihi us yidah, ‘Eti ween, us hiinaan tomone orey laka khaba!’
42019026	“Ulla wihi us ilaabe, ‘Wihi an atin icheeko, eti tuummane wihi dahan lagesse mujjum woywoye a liikakhaya, i'daasenyi eti wihi dahan lagesse mujjum iwoywoyin, wihi us khabo laka a lakakhaata.
42019027	I'daasenyi chiiyteeyti goorat anihi karnat liikayeelo 'dii'ddo tuumman sookhaata orteey ka bakkicha.’ ”
42019028	Inkoo Yeesso waha yidah ka orey isohte ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ikore.
42019029	Chirra us ilkerengeetti Be'difaage ichoow ti Be'daaniya Hali Geeyohi Oolif haggee sooeleele ka, Yeesso abattitiistoo lammee orey ierge, wihi us iyidah,
42019030	“Ilkerengeetti ortiin kijirto irda, uus atin gessaan la inkuraarruhoo injire liirarine hidan a 'hessaan. Soofura inta keena.
42019031	Chirri etoo ‘A i'doh inkuraarru ifurtaan,’ atin worsate la, ‘Kamure 'doona,’ idaha.”
42019032	Abattiti kootte leergate iratte, saggi kootte us iidah on i'hesse.
42019033	Geedda icho inkuraarru furaan, 'doo'di inkuraarru leh, “Inkuraarruhaas atin furtaan a i'doh?” worsate.
42019034	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Kamure 'doona.”
42019035	Inkuraarru Yeesso ikeeneene, kabuu'ddeticho kagaadeene Yeesso korcheen.
42019036	Geedda us sohti, kabuu'ddeticho jit kagolgeen.
42019037	Chirri us inti jit Hali Geeyohi Oolif kakhubti sooeleele ka, ururi buurenye abattitiis kajirto hooyi buure ka ichoow hamaadi buure ka Waakh saa'de. Wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane icho argeen ka Waakh saa'deen.
42019038	“Waakh karnati magahi Kamur kayamiit a imaale! Goobi Waakh nebey a lakakaala, Waakkheenki inti weyti saraat kijiro a lakoolicho.”
42019039	Farissaayotoo urur goya kajirte wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Eti ween, abattitaah leejaakh!”
42019040	Wihi us ilaabe, “Wihi an atin icheeko, chirri icho gammadicheen, dagahe a riirta.”
42019041	Chirri us ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem isoodowwaate ilkerengeet arge ka, kooye,
42019042	wihi us yidah, “'Doo'di ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem, incheenka kootte maalinka jiti nebey laka'helo a abattaan. I'daasenyi toolla a atin lakadagche!
42019043	Ibeenne a tamiit ti chiiytiin ilkerengeettiin khaarisso. Chiiytiin harra chalagta 'dee saggoo iche atin idihto 'hossa. Iche la 'dollo tuummane atin kayaakhissa.
42019044	Chiiye la atin ichoow nyaakhutiin dakkhamba a atin bakkissa, toro la dagahti ilkerengeet kamarsan tuumman jejjebissa. Daakkoo kaldaye meessiis fuulo laka ma katabto. I'di tahe atin maanti Waakh ribnaan atin yimiy ma kasin!”
42019045	Yeesso 'deerka uranti minki Waakhe buure gele, 'doo'di walah ororicho rihnaan sookhabte.
42019046	Wihi us icho iyidah, “Wihi chiiran, ‘Minkeey minki weysiite yateeh,’ i'daasenyi, ‘inti 'doo'di hatto leh kadagti,’ iche kayeesseen.”
42019047	Yeesso kol dakkhan minki Waakhe buure ka 'doo'de ayti Waakh abcha. I'daasenyi kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre ichoow weynaane ba usu ogoos 'doonta.
42019048	I'daasenyi sag icho iyagiisin mele. I'di tahe 'doo'd tuumman weyti yeed Yeesso nabah isude. Et usuhi aytoo kaldaye Yeesso yidah laka kanyaanto 'doono mele.
42020001	Maantoo geeddi Yeesso uranti minki Waakhe buure ka 'doo'd ayti Waakh abcho, Wori Haaggan la cheeko, kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud ba Yeesso iyimaateen.
42020002	Wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Bal nah isoocheek, antohi at wahanyeyyoha kahaaggisso a weheeyya? Antoha ayyo kisiiche?”
42020003	Wihi us ilaabe, “An laka wohoo atin worsada, bal isoolaaba.
42020004	Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo, antohi us enenyet kabaattissiyo, Waakhe kayimaateen, bal enenyet?”
42020005	Iskaleehawwoocheene wihi icho isiyidaaheen, “Chi'inno, ‘Waakhe kayimaateen,’ nadeeh, mehe inno iyadeeh ya, ‘A i'doh irummeysanna?’
42020006	I'daasenyi chi'inno, ‘Enenyete kayimaateen,’ nadeeh, 'doo'd tuumman dagahe inno kachiba, i'di tahe icho tuumman Yoohana eti Waákh íyeyyeedo iche ikhaataan.”
42020007	'Deerka wihi icho ilaabeen, “Inti icho kayimaateen ma garanni.”
42020008	Yeesso la iiyeyye, “Ani laka antohi an wahanyeyyoha kahaaggicho ma atin isoocheeko gon.”
42020009	Yeesso toro mammahta 'doo'd ibahche wihi us iyidah, “Etoo geeyohi sabiibe gosiis goyaka il gesse, gosiis lakireeste, ulla geeddi deer sulhaassoo irte.
42020010	Maanti gurnaan lagurti ka, eti gos leh ilbooyiiskoo 'doo'di gos kireeste iergate, 'dee gisi gurnaankiiski sabiib wohoo a siicheen. I'daasenyi 'doo'di gos kireeste ilbooy jahe dahano marah soo'diiche.
42020011	Ilbooyoo addan ergate, i'daasenyi kaas laka jaheene, lakhaanyo kadoweene, dahano marah soo'diicheen.
42020012	Ki seyyahnaatteet toro ergate, kaas la gaameereene, gos khariis isayeen.
42020013	“Eti gosi sabiib leh 'deerka wihi us yidah, ‘Mehe yeelo? Inankaaya erga, ki an weyti 'doono. Kolossoo usu a inkaanyitta.’
42020014	“I'daasenyi chirri 'doo'di gos kireeste usu arge ka, ayta iskaleehawwooche, mehe isiyidaaheen ya, ‘Ki dahal leh kalla. Nigaase 'dee dahalhiis weheen a yitaaheen.’
42020015	'Deerka gosi sabiib khariis ijiiteene, yigaaseen. “Kamalda bal, eti gosi sabiib leh 'deerka icho mehe yeela?
42020016	A yamiite, 'doo'daas gos kireeste bakkicha 'dee gos 'doo'doo addan gessa.” Chirri 'doo'd ayta daage ka wihi us yidah, “Waakh meesseen bujiiy!”
42020017	Yeesso 'doo'd indo katoolliche, wihi us worsate, “Cha'atin i'daas elattaan, Chiirnaanka bal kamalda. “‘Daakki 'doo'di minan diso 'dii'de, iche tirrinki dagaheete min tiiro yitah.’
42020018	Eti tuummane daakkaas sartiis kakufe a jejjeba, i'daasenyi chirri daakkaas etoo kasoodihe etaas a urkaha.”
42020019	Tagaammeti amurre ichoow kuhaaniyyohi wewween la jiti iche Yeesso chirraas on kakhabatti yowteen. A mehe saggi us mammahtaas ka woricho ikaayyeedo iche garteen. I'daasenyi 'doo'de karooraan.
42020020	Weynaanti Ya'huud weyti Yeesso fiirisse. 'Doo'doo 'degeyenye 'doo'di fiffissan iskaayyeelo ergateen, ichohi Yeesso yeediis ka angey gessaane 'doonaane, 'dee miig ichoow antohi gaafana idiibaan.
42020021	'Doo'da 'degeye wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Eti ween! Saggi at wihi rummaat ikaayyeeddo toro enenyet iabisso a garanna. Toro la enenyet seley ma sassaahto, i'daasenyi jiti Waakhe at enenyet abisso ichoow runti Waakh a israahaan.
42020022	Kaaysarhi weene inno kooddi igunno a mujjum a bal mujjum mee?”
42020023	Yeesso la dowwa on luhticho kase wihi us iyidah,
42020024	“Bal chilinkoo Rooma itusa. Foola ichoow magaha kachiiran a keyya?”
42020025	Wihi icho ilaabeen “A koo Kaaysar.” Wihi us iyidah, “'Deerka Kaaysar wihi wihiise iguta, Waakh la wihi wihiise iguta.”
42020026	Saggi icho 'doo'd ortiis ka wihi us yidah ka angey igessaan waayeen. Wihi us soolaabe kagirmeesteene, gammadicheen.
42020027	'Doo'doo Sadukaayo Yeesso iyimiyye wohoo worsate. 'Doo'da la 'doo'di tuume berri ma sookaho iche essa.
42020028	“Eti ween, Muusa goorat mehe inno ichiire ya, ‘Chi' etoo walaaliis yumuyye, makhaabál katabe i'daasenyi nyaakhut ikhabin, etaas makhaabassaas a disti, walaaliis nyaakhut a idelo.’
42020029	Reeroo teebeenye isleedesse a jire. Ki ween min diste, nyaakhut laan buje.
42020030	Ki lammaatteet ichoow,
42020031	ki seyyahnaatteet makhaabassaas disteene, saggaas on u teebaccho ba disteene, yumaateen, nyaakhut icho katabeen mele.
42020032	'Da'ddaboka makhaabale laka bujje.
42020033	'Deerka maanti 'doo'di tuume lasookahcho, etichekoh makhaabassiis tateeh teebaccho la a disteenee?”
42020034	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Doo'di harrata min a dista toro mindischo ka laka ladiiba.
42020035	I'daasenyi 'doo'di Waakh 'doo'di fiffissan iekkaacho omoot lakasookahcho goobi Waakh furti, min ma disti ommos mindischo ka ma ladiibo.
42020036	'Doo'da omootti us yamuut ma yabuu'd, a mehe icho a i'di herti Waakh. Omoote lakasookahche gone, icho a nyaakhuti Waakh.
42020037	I'daasenyi chiirnaanki geeyi hidaad kagubti ka, Muusa laka saggi 'doo'di tuume omoot ikasookaho a tuse. A mehe us Kamur mehe kawahe ya, ‘Waakh Aburaaham, Waakh Isakh, Waakh Yaakoobo.’
42020038	Usu Waakkhi 'doo'di tuume mee, i'daasenyi a Waakkhi 'doo'di jiro. A mehe usu ka enenyet tuumman a noolyahe.”
42020039	Tagaammetoo amurre wihi icho yidaaheen, “Eti ween rumanka wahaas a ayti haaggan.”
42020040	Et usu wohoo addan worsan iggo la mele.
42020041	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us icho iyidah, “A i'doh tagaammeti amurre Ki Lasubhe a hiiy Dawuud ielatta?
42020042	Dawuud rubeytiis Buuggi Sabuur ka mehe cheeka ya, “ ‘Waakkhi Kamure wihi us Kamureey iyidah, “Dabankeeyki miigeete antoot orrommo,
42020043	ichoowka chiiytaah tuum dahanohaah a soogesso.” ’
42020044	Dawuud rubeytiis usu Kamure kawaha, saggoh 'deerka Ki Lasubhe hiiy Dawuud iyahe?”
42020045	Geeddi urur dagansati Yeesso wihi us abattitiis iyidah,
42020046	“Tagaammeti amurre yuubsada! Wihi icho weyti 'doonaan a ichohi darfohi hahhaaggane derdeer leesohti, toro la sokkoyyo ka weyti inkaanyit ka labariiticho. Toro la chi' minki weysiite Ya'huud ommos sukuukuyyo lagele, wihi icho weyti 'doonaan a ichohi meessi weyti lakiinkaanyito orronti.
42020047	'Doo'da muunkhoyyo ekkeesta, hoolahicho kakhaataan. Chi'iche weysatti la, enenyeti haaggane iskaayyeessa, weysi derdeeraassa. 'Doo'da Waakh sinati weyti kutto igoocha.”
42021001	Chirra Yeesso minki Waakhe buure ka serey yeyo, 'doo'di kamurreenye sadakhaticho saanduukhi chilimme lakalug'do kichibo arge.
42021002	Toro la makhaabassoo muunkheenye miskiinenye chilim lamma meel kalugu'dde arge.
42021003	Ulla wihi us yidah, “Rume atin icheeka, muunkhota miskiine iche 'doo'di addan 'dirihiis wihi buure meel kalugu'dde.
42021004	'Doo'da tuumman kamurroonkicho ka sadakhatoore bahche, i'daasenyi iche, miskiinkiche ka wihi iche kanoossahe tuummane bihisse.”
42021005	Abattitiis gaasoo minki Waakhe buurenye woriis kahawwoossa. Daddaabohi hahhaaggane lakadise ichoow wihi noole 'doo'd Waakh ibahche minkaas lakeeykode woricho kaayyeedeen. I'daasenyi Yeesso wihi us yidah,
42021006	“Waha atin inta ka agartaan la, berri daddaabtoo kaldaye ti addan fuusso lakatabo ma jirto, icho tuumman a lasookhuba.”
42021007	Icho la wihi icho worsateen, “Eti ween, wahanyeyyoha maantoh yateehiin? Mehe yateehe 'dee saggi waha dowwanoha ka isooyateehiin tusa?”
42021008	Wihi us ilaabe, “Yuubsada, uus atin leekkeysan. A mehe 'doo'di ittaawenye ani iskaayyeelo yamiite, ‘Ani a Ki Lasubhe,’ essi toro ‘Ibeen a soodowwaate,’ essi a agartaan. Icho araahina.
42021009	Maanti atin yaafohi isdiho ichoow 'doo'di il baabiicho daagteen anahina. Wahanyeyyohane koloo yateehe, i'daasenyi ibeenki yomboot chirraas on ma yateeh.”
42021010	Yeesso toro wihi us icho iyidah, “Sirgaalle a isdihta, karnato laka isdihaan.
42021011	Ilassoo ka harra weyti sesseehta, ilassoo ka laka nabhayye ichoow sugeerreti ittaawe tamiit. Wahanyeyyohi buurenye enenyet kanahcho ichoow wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso serey ka a soobahaan.
42021012	“I'daasenyi geeddi waha tuumman iitaahan a atin khabtaane, sina atin omhichaan. Minassi weysiite Ya'huud ka atin lahukkuma toro jeelayyo atin lageecha. Karnatte ichoow gaafanayyo atin liigeecha, waha tuumman la a jeenteti atin abattiteey itahiin.
42021013	Waha ka la garti Wori Haaggan iche tateehiin.
42021014	I'daasenyi uurassiin goyaka goocha, orey on saggi atin isikaayyeeddaan ka awa'dwaa'dina.
42021015	A mehe an yeedi atin tadeehiin ichoow khara a atin siicha, 'dee chiiytiin tuumman goyaka koo atin tirrimin yabuu'd mele ommos et runti atin cheekteen 'dii'do mele.
42021016	'Doo'di atin dele ichoow walaalinyetiin ichoow goobiin ichoow aalassiin laka 'dube atin goochaane, gaasiinkoo laka yagiisiin.
42021017	Enenyet tuumman a atin 'dii'da jeenteti atin abattiteey itahiin u.
42021018	I'daasenyi tintiintoo kaldaye matahe baabaato laka ma jirto.
42021019	Inkoo atin garrahsatteen ka jiroti rummaat 'hessaan.”
42021020	“Chirri atin ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme iskare marisse agarteen la, saggi ilkerengeettaas inkoo dow liibaabiicho a abattaan.
42021021	'Deerka 'doo'di ili Ya'huudiya fiddiyo tuumman halal a ifirdo, 'doo'di ilkerengeetti ween goya kajiro a baho, 'doo'di ilkerengeetti ween khariche kajiro la uus ilkerengeet goya gelin.
42021022	I'di tahe wahaas a ibeenneti Waakh enenyet jeenteti uskeeli us yeeluu sina tuso, wihi goorat Chiirnaanneti Waakh kachiiran labuuhicho.
42021023	Ibeennetaas sinati deyyehoti nuugsatti ichoow ti huleesenye nyaamitto iubaa'dan sugto enenna a buure. Wihi sussuujenye buurenye soobaha, holi Waakh la 'doo'da isoobaha.
42021024	'Doo'd gaasoo birlabbe lakabakkicha, gaasoo laka lakhabta harra tuumman liibooliya. Ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem la 'doo'di Waakh igaran yabta, uskulaacha ichoowka ibeenneti 'doo'di Waakh igaran labuuhicha.
42021025	“Orrah ichoow yeyyah ichoow yiyyihimo ba wihi ittaawenye saggi ibeenki 'da'ddaboot iyitah tuso kasoobahaan. Harra ka, 'doo'di harra tuumman bicchehi yeedo ichoow irti biccheete kanaha.
42021026	'Doo'd la wihi harrata isoosohti icho roorro ka sugaan ka a suuha. A mehe miigti saraat a lakorkokicha.
42021027	Geeddaakka Ínam Aadam usuhi miris goyaka yamiite, miig ichoow antohi buure khabo argaan.
42021028	Maanti wahanyeyyoha yateehiin tolossada, matahenyetiin kahcha, i'di tahe ibeenki Waakh ribnaanki 'da'ddaboot atin ribo a soodowwaatee.”
42021029	'Doo'd mammahta ibahche, “Bal geeyi fiig ichoow geeyohi addan yeya.
42021030	Maanti icho seeb bahcheen, a isiagartaane, saggi 'daato isoodowwaatte a garattaan.
42021031	Saggaas on u maanti atin wahanyeyyoha ibeenki 'da'ddaboot tuso agarteen, saggi dakhi Waakh isoodowwaate a garattaan.
42021032	“Rume atin icheeka, 'doo'di i'dee ma tuumo ichoowka wahanyeyyoha tuumman yateehiin.
42021033	Sereyta daayan ichoow harra a kutaane, i'daasenyi yeedasseey jirtuu tuumman ma kutaan.
42021034	“Weyti isyuubsada uus meleefu ichoow wahanyeyyohi sussuujenye 'doo'di meleefee yeelo ichoow wa'dwaa'di jirota uurassiin miigoonne 'dee ibeenkaas i'di angey u doglaan atin geline.
42021035	I'di tahe ibeenkaas 'doo'di harra tuumman maalinkoo kalday on isleearga.
42021036	Kol dakkhan isyaakhicha. Weesda la 'dee Waakh waha tuummane dowwanoha ka sooyateeh a atin kakhaduudicho, miigti atin Ínam Aadam ortiis katolossattaan a atin siicho.”
42021037	Yeesso maalim dakkhan minki Waakhe buure ka 'doo'd wori Waakh abche, geleb dakkhan la irte Hali Geeyohi Oolif barye.
42021038	Chirdeer tuumman la 'doo'd minki Waakhe buurenye irta, wihi Yeesso essi dagansata.
42022001	Daawti Makaateti Liikhasine daawti Baasakka layadeeh a soodowwaatte.
42022002	Kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre jitoo iche Yeesso katagiise yowatta, a mehe enenyete karooraan.
42022003	Seytaan la Yuudahi Iskaariyoot layadeehe abatti Yeessoti tomon ichoow lammee kichekoowe gele.
42022004	Yuuda la kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow 'doo'di iskarti minki Waakhe buure yaakhisso itoollo iirte, saggi us Yeesso 'dub igoocho kaleehawwooche.
42022005	Icho la weyti hamaadeene chilimmeti icho siichaan goocheen.
42022006	Yuuda la ayye yidahye, inti leemujjumenye us Yeesso inti urur ikajirin ka dahanohicho kagesso yowte.
42022007	Ibeenki Daawti Makaateti Liikhasine heleenki daawti Baasakka lasoorriyoocho yitah.
42022008	Yeesso Beetero ichoow Yoohana ergate wihi us iyidah, “Nyaama inti inno gololi daawti Baasakka kanaham inno ihaaggicha.”
42022009	Icho la wihi icho worsateen, “Intoh 'doonta, katannabanna?”
42022010	Wihi us ilaabe, “Chirra atin ilkerengeet gessaan, etoo 'dirihi biccheet si'do afiin a kayamiit. Raaha minki us gelo leegela.
42022011	Wihi atin ooyohi min leh itadeehiin, ‘Eti Ween mehe kiyidah ya, min goyaka meessi marti ani ichoow abattiteey gololi daawti Baasakka kanaham meeke?’
42022012	Meessoo buurenye minkiis sartiisenye meeh tuumman khabto iche atin tusa. Intaas ka golol haaggicha.”
42022013	Abatti bahte, walah dakkhan ba i'di kootte us iyidah on i'heleen. 'Deerka gololi daawti Baasakka haaggisse.
42022014	Chirri saha'de titah ka, Yeesso ichoow ergaanotiis komborti ballaaddane lakagolossati garabiche ka dikkille kareeyeen.
42022015	Ulla wihi us iyidah, “Ani weyti anihi golola Baasakka geeddi sina liikawaarin atin leeaham imoone.
42022016	I'di tahe wihi an atin isoocheeko, toro ma atin leeahame ichoowka wihi goorat liidah goobi Waakh ka labuuhicha.”
42022017	Chirraakka kokkooboo farsoti sabiib kajirto okkhiche Waakh kala'd ilaabe wihi us abatti iyidah, “Waha khaata ebba a anguunti.
42022018	A mehe wihi an atin isoocheeko, an farsoti sabiib toro ma damo, ichoowka dakhi Waakh yamiit.”
42022019	Makaate khaate Waakh kala'd ilaabe, jejjebche abatti ididdiibe wihi us yidah, “Waha a sarteeyti atin liisoobahche, amha 'dee ikasoo'hela.”
42022020	Saggaas on u, inkoo icho gololi gelebeet yumheen ka, kokkoob khaate wihi us yidah, “Kooba a ayyinti husube Waakh enenyet diiggeey ka igoocho, a diiggi iroonotiin liikhubo.
42022021	I'daasenyi dahanti eti 'dub isoogoocho dahantaaya komborta ballaaddan kaleejirta.
42022022	Ínam Aadam i'di goorat Chiirnaanneti Waakh lakachiiruu, a yamuute, i'daasenyi eti usu 'dub goocho sinati sugto eenna a buure.”
42022023	Abatti eti waha sooyeelo isworsatte.
42022024	Iche la toro eti goycho ka eti weyti ween liiekkaacho isleeiriirte.
42022025	Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Karnatohi 'doo'di Waakh igaran saggi suujenye 'doo'd idakhtaane, icho la 'doo'd, ‘Nah a aalassiinna,’ idowaan.
42022026	I'daasenyi atin i'daas iitaahana. Eti goytiin ka weyti ween, i'di eti weyti rucchul a yitaahe, eti enenyet dakhti la i'di falfa a yitaahe.
42022027	A mehe, ayyo maanta ween, eti orronti golol karam liikachibo yaham a, bal eti karantaas golol kasoochibo? Rumanka eti ween a ki golol karam liikasoochibo yaham on menya? I'daasenyi an goytiin ka a i'di eti golol karam atin ikachibo.
42022028	Atin a ki maanti an sinayyohi ikajo 'hele ileejire.
42022029	Saggi Aabbaheey dakh dahanteey isoogessuu, ani laka dakhaas dahantiinna gessa.
42022030	Atin la 'dee goobeey ka ileegolossattaane, komborohi antoot koorromattaane, yaafoheenki Issiraayele tomon ichoow lammee anattaan.”
42022031	Yeesso toro wihi us yidah, “Siimon, Siimon, daganso! Seytaan saggi enenyet 'dargaayye ichoow chaafo seley ibahchuu, antohi us atin kakajo a daahe.
42022032	I'daasenyi Siimon, an a kisooweesde 'dee mujjum orey isohatta ani ikakhuufta. Chirri at isoonokhatte la 'doo'di irummeeste uure miigoossa.”
42022033	I'daasenyi wihi us ilaabe, “Kamur, an a geeddi an jeela kileegelo, toro kileeamuut laka.”
42022034	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Beetero wihi an kisoocheeko, ibeenka goya geeddi lukki iriirin, at kol seyyahe 'dii'dda, ma igaratti tadeeh.”
42022035	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us abattitiis worsate, “Maanti goorat chilimme ichoow ugar ichoow kobo laan an atin ergade atin wohoo a waayteen?” Wihi iche ilaabte, “Walahba.”
42022036	Yeesso la wihi us toro iyidah, “Maantaka, eti chilimme khabo a khaatti, ki ugar khabo ugar a khaatti, ki birlab ikhabin la kabuu'diis a ororicho birlab a gatti.
42022037	A mehe wihi chiiran, ‘Usu 'doo'di Waakh daagiwwaaye goya lagate.’ Wihi an atin iadeeh la, waha ani liikabuuhicha. Aa, wihi ani imiinsane chiiran inti lakabuuhicho a eleelaan.”
42022038	Abatti la wihi iche tidah, “Kamur inta yey, birlab lamma a khabna!” Wihi us ilaabe, “Geeddaas a atin yaakhta.”
42022039	Yeesso bahe, i'di orrankateet u Hali Geeyohi Oolif irte, abattitiis la raahte.
42022040	Chirri icho meel eleeleen ka, Yeesso wihi us abatti iyidah, “Waakh wahda 'dee kajmeti uskeel atin kalugu'ddo akidihina.”
42022041	Abattitiis kelee kaseehe, geeddoor daakki laseyo eleelo ileeirte, jilbo il kagu'dde Waakh wahte, wihi us yidah,
42022042	“Aabbahaaw, cha'at 'doonto kokkooba sinayyoot ikakhaat. I'daasenyi in an 'doono menye, in at 'doonto a titaahe.”
42022043	Hertoo Waakh la goobi Waakh ka timiyye, isoobahte, miig siisse.
42022044	Bolokkhi buure goyaka geeddi kootteet laka 'dirihiis Waakh wahte, i'di'di us 'hooricho harra kaaddibho la i'di diiggi diddibho yitah.
42022045	Chirri us weysi kasookahe us abatti inokhte ka, ichehi bolokh kurmiche u'durto 'hele.
42022046	Wihi us icho worsate, “A i'doh iu'durtaan? Kaha Waakh wahda 'dee kajmeti uskeel atin kalugu'ddo akidihina.”
42022047	Yeesso yeyyeedaayi, ururoo yimiy. Eti Yuuda layadeehe abattiti tomon ichoow lammee kichekoowe iche soowoya. Ulla Yeesso iyimiy a dongataa.
42022048	I'daasenyi Yeesso wihi us worsate, “Yuuda, at Ínam Aadame dongo ka 'dub goossa?”
42022049	Chirri abattiti addane kootte Yeesso leejirte wihi sooyateeh kasse ka wihi iche tidah, “Kamur birlabbeteen ka icho ma dihno?”
42022050	Kichokoo la falfati kuhaanihi weyti ween gu'dde, nabahti miigeet ng'ure.
42022051	I'daasenyi Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Dii a geeddaas one.” Yeesso la et nabah 'daare, samaache.
42022052	Yeesso kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow 'doo'di 'doo'di minki Waakhe buure yaakhicho itoollo ichoow ewweenki Ya'huude usu iyimiy wihi us iyidah, “Cha'atin khokkhoomme ichoow birlabbe leetimaateene, ikhabattaan, an a etoo enenyet walah saro?
42022053	Maan tuumman ani uranti minki Waakhe buure ka a atin leejire, atin la ma ikhaban. I'daasenyi waha a saha'ddiinna, a saha'ddi Seytaanki karnati mug'dee atin anti.”
42022054	Icho la 'deerka Yeesso khabteene, khaateene minki kuhaanihi weyti ween geecheen. Beetero fogaka 'doo'd 'dubiis sooraahe.
42022055	I'daasenyi inkoo icho uram dahche ka 'daboo bolkhicheene icho isleeorronteen ka, Beetero laka leeorronte.
42022056	Inantoo falfee, banayhi 'dab ka usuhi intaas fiddiyo agarte, fiirisse wihi iche tidah, “Eta usu a leejire.”
42022057	I'daasenyi lee'dii'de wihi us iyidah, “Irta an usu ma gardi.”
42022058	Inkoo geeddoo lafiddiye ka etoo addan usú arge, wihi us iyidah, “At laka a kichekoo.” Beetero wihi us ilaabe, “Eta, ani kichokoo mee!”
42022059	Inkoo geeddi saha'ddoo lafiddiye ka etoo addan Beetero arge toro wihi us yidah, “Rumanka reenka laka usú a leejire a mehe ullaka a 'doo'di Gaalilaaya.”
42022060	Beetero wihi us ilaabe, “Eta, an wihi at kaayyeeddo ma gardi!” Beetero yeyyeedaayi lukki riire.
42022061	Kamur la urgiye Beetero indo kakhabte. Beetero 'deerka yeedi Kamur iyidah kasoo'hele, “Maalinka geeddi lukki iriirin, at kol seyyah, ‘Ma kigardi!’ tadeeh.”
42022062	Ulla khar ibahe, bolokh ka ooye.
42022063	Reeri kootte Yeesso yuubicho Yeesso kachaarnaan ichoow jahnaan sookhabte.
42022064	Indo hideene, “Eti Waákh íyeyyeedoow, eti kigu'dde nah isoocheek,” idoween.
42022065	Usu leeabaarrameene, wahanyeyyohoo addane ittaawenye sussuuje laka idoween.
42022066	Uun il barye ka, Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huude kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre kijiraan ba kulmeene, Yeesso la orcho lakeene.
42022067	Icho tuumman la wihi icho worsateen, “Nah isoocheek cha'at Ki Lasubhe tahe.” Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Cha'an atin isoocheeke, ma irummeysattaan.
42022068	Cha'an wohoo atin worsade la, ma isoolaabtaan.
42022069	I'daasenyi uus toolla kakhabatti, Ínam Aadam Waakkhi miig leh anki dahantiisti miigeete orronta.”
42022070	Icho dakkhan la wihi icho worsateen, “Ati 'deerka Weeli Waakhe?” Wihi us ilaabe, “Atine i'daas tidaaheen.”
42022071	Icho la wihi icho yidaaheen, “A i'doh 'doo'doo addane gar laabo iyowanna? Afiis ka wihi us yidah a daagne.”
42023001	Jaldaabti Ween tuumman 'deerka kahte Yeesso woyte Bilaato igeesse.
42023002	Chirraas on usu cheekteene wihi icho yidaaheen, “Eta usuhi yaafteen baabiicho khabanne. Karnati ili Rooma kooddihi liiguto 'dii'da, Ki Lasubhe karnatenye iskawaha.”
42023003	Bilaato la wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Karnati Ya'huud a ati?” Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “A rum, a i'daas at elatti on.”
42023004	Bilaato la wihi us kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow urur ba iyidah, “An eta walah lakacheekti an argo mele.”
42023005	I'daasenyi weyti tirriinsateene wihi icho yidaaheen, “Ili Ya'huudiya tuumman ka 'doo'de walah abcha, ichoowka enenyet seley fida. Wihi us 'doo'd abcho la boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kasookhabte ichoowka toolla inta yimiy.”
42023006	Chirri Bilaato waha daage ka usu eta 'doo'di Gaalilaaya yahe worsate.
42023007	Chirri us saggi Yeesso ili 'Herood itoollo ikayimiy kase ka, Yeesso 'Herood ierge. 'Herood rubeytiis la geedda ka ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme kajira.
42023008	'Herood la chirri us Yeesso arge ka hamaade, i'di tahe geeddi deere yeed Yeesso daage, ulla geeddi deere usuhi Yeesso argo 'doone. Ulla Yeessohi wihi weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan yeelo khajjeela.
42023009	Ulla Yeesso wihi buure worsate, i'daasenyi Yeesso walah us ilaabe mele.
42023010	Kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow tagaammeti amurre intaase toollaane, weyti riireene Yeesso cheekteen.
42023011	'Herood ichoow iskartiis ba Yeesso lakhaanyo kadoweene kachaarteen. Darfohi karnat gesseene, khaateene Bilaato ilaabeen.
42023012	Maalinkaas goya, 'Herood ichoow Bilaato ba aal yitaaheen, goorat 'hor la a isichiiy.
42023013	Bilaato kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow 'doo'di wewween ichoow 'doo'di addan ba isiwahe,
42023014	wihi us iyidah, “Atin eta ani ikeenteene, 'doo'de baabiicha sirgaal 'dii'da idowa tidaaheen. Ani la ortiin ka wihi nool worsade wohoo kaldaye atin kacheekatteen la an ma kaargin.
42023015	'Herood laka walah suujenye eta yeele us arge mele, jeentetaase toro inno ikasoolaabe. Eta walah us yeele omoot liigoocho mele.
42023016	Maantaka laajja on ka a ladoocho 'dee a la'diicho a irti.”
42023018	Urur dakkhamba hooyoo kalday ka riire, “Eta agiise, Barraba nah isoofur!”
42023019	Barraba la goorat wihi jeela lakagesse, ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka, 'doo'doo sirgaal 'dii'do goya kijire, toro la enenyet laka yigis.
42023020	Bilaato usuhi Yeesso 'diicho 'doona, toro urur inokhte.
42023021	I'daasenyi urur riire “Massalaaba kakaah! Massalaaba kakaah!” esse.
42023022	Bilaato toro koli seyyahnaatteet icho leeyeede, “A i'doh? Eta suujoonkoh yeele? An wihi eta yeele omoot liikagoocho ma argo. Maantaka a lajaha one 'dee la'diicha.”
42023023	I'daasenyi weyti riireene katirriinsateene, usu massalaaba a lakakaaho, ichoowka Bilaato jeenteti riirit u 'doo'd agaafte.
42023024	Bilaato 'deerka wihi icho daaheen siin gooche.
42023025	Eti icho daahenee goorat sirgaal 'dii'do toro la enenyet yigisye jeela kijire soofure. Yeesso la dahanticho gesse 'dee wihi icho 'doonaan a yeeleen.
42023026	Chirra icho woyaan ka, etoo ilkerengeetti Kureene Siimon layadeehe gosiis kayimiy khabteene, massalaaba korcheene ihosseene ulla Yeesso 'dubiis leeraahe.
42023027	Ururi buure la Yeesso 'dubiis leeyimiy. Urur goyaka la deyyehotoo jeente Yeessuu ooyto uuwwisso a jirta.
42023028	Yeesso la wihi us deyyehota iyidah, “Deyyehoti ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem, ani iooyina, atin on isooya, toro la nyaakhutiin ooya.
42023029	I'di tahe ibeen a yamiit ki ‘Deyyehoti Waakh imaale, a ti mahanenye injire ideline, weel inuugsan,’ layadeeh.
42023030	'Deerka, “ ‘Halal mehe iyadeehiin ya, “Nah kasooreya!” Kuro la mehe iyadeehiin ya, “Nah dagcha!” ’
42023031	A mehe chirri 'doo'd anihi fissan sinati geeddee ituso, 'doo'di suujoon yeele sinati weyti buurenye kawaarichaan.”
42023032	Reeroo addane lammeenye chiftee laka usu a laleekhaate, 'dee layagiis.
42023033	Chirri icho meessi Lafohi Matahe Enenyet layadeeh sooeleeleen ka, Yeesso intaas ka massalaaba kakaaheen. Chiftati lammee laka leekaahte. Koo ankiiski miigeet kakaaheene, ki addan la ankiiski gurro kakaaheen.
42023034	Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Aabba, 'doo'da uskeelicho ikakut! I'di tahe wihi icho haaggichaan ma gartaanee.” Kura gu'ddateene gaaddiis gisante.
42023035	Urur a toolla 'dey'doocha, ewweenki Ya'huud la Yeesso kachaarta. Wihi icho yidaaheen, “'Doo'di addan a ribe, chirri us rumanka Ki Lasubhe Koo Waakhenye Ki Lasoobahsate yahe, bal a isribo!”
42023036	Iskare laka timiyye usu kachaaratte, farsoti sabiibe birrakhe siisse.
42023037	Wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Chirri at karnati Ya'huud tahe isrib.”
42023038	Matakkiis sartiis la wihi lakachiire a mehe ya,
42023039	Chiftataas Yeesso laleekaahe koo Yeesso leeabaarrame wihi us iyidah, “At a Ki Lasubhe gone, isribe nah laka nah rib!”
42023040	I'daasenyi ki addan leejaakhe wihi us iyidah, “At Waakh ma karoorto? At laka i'diis u omoote lakigooche.
42023041	Lammateen jeenteti uskeeli inno yeelle on inno liiyagiis, i'daasenyi us walah suujenye us yeele mele.”
42023042	'Deerka wihi us yidah, “Yeesso maanti at karnati dakhaah titah ikasoo'hel.”
42023043	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rume kicheeka, at maalinka goobi Waakh ka a ileejirta.”
42023044	Geedda ka il a geeddi saha'd lihti maalimeet, il tuumman la mug'di yitahye, ichoowka saha'd saagaale eleesse,
42023045	a mehe orrahe banay soobihin a 'diisse. Dafarti weyti yobbeenye minki Waakhe buure seley goosso meel lamma seley igoote.
42023046	Yeesso la hooyi buure ka riire, wihi us yidah, “Aabba, rubeyteey dahantaahha soogessa!” Chu'us yeeda massiche ka massate.
42023047	Chirri eti koobbintoo iskareet itoollo wihi yitah arge ka, Waakh saa'de wihi us yidah, “Rumanka eta eti fissane eheet!”
42023048	Chirri 'doo'di tuummane kootte sookulme wihi yitah 'dey'dooche wihi yitah arge ka, bolokh ka kacchach isgu'ddeene irteen.
42023049	I'daasenyi 'doo'di usu garti tuumman deyyehoti goorat boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kasooraahte khabaani foga tolossateene wahanyeyyoha 'dey'doocheen.
42023050	Etoo Yuussuf layadeehe ilkerengeetti Arima'daaya ili Ya'huudiya kajirto yaal la a jira. Ulla a etoo haaggane toro fissane toro dakhi Waakhe suga.
42023051	Ulla a etoo Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud goya kijiro, i'daasenyi wihi icho goocheen ichoow wihi icho yeeleen ma leegoon.
42023052	Ulla Bilaato iirte sar Yeesso daahe.
42023053	'Deerka massalaaba kasooyagche, dafartoo kaayyuube go'ddoo daddaab ka lakhute, injire enenyet liikahawwaalin goya kareeche.
42023054	Waha la a Ibeenki Latannabti, Seeri Lanaso la a soodeylanta.
42023055	Deyyehoti Yeesso ilkerengeetti Gaalilaaya ka sooraahte la Yuussuf raahte go'ddi Yeesso lakahawwaale ichoow saggi sartiis go'ddaas ka liireeche argeen.
42023056	'Deerka goob inokhteene miricchi ichoow geeyohi uyuuggee tuumman tannabicheen. Waha la a wihi icho sar Yeesso kadowaan. I'daasenyi Seeri Lanaso ka naseen i'di amur i'doonuu.
42024001	Baryoti ibeenki oraate teebataas ka, deyyeho uyuuggeti iche haaggisse khaatte go'ddi Yeesso lakahawwaale iratte.
42024002	Daddaabti go'd afiche lagesse ichehi la'dembeleeliye 'heleen.
42024003	I'daasenyi chi'icho go'd goya geleen ka, sar Yeessohi Kamure goya kawaayeen.
42024004	Waha ka ng'aayaani chirraas on et lamma darfohi i'di ankhad u ababo khabto garabicho tolossateen.
42024005	Deyyeho nahtim ka foolassicho ka il yeyte. I'daasenyi reeri kootte lammee wihi us iyidah, “A i'doh eti jiro 'doo'di tuume goya ikayowattaan?
42024006	Inta ma kijiro, omoot a kasookahe. Wihi goorat maanti us Gaalilaaya kajiro us atin iidah kasoo'hela.
42024007	‘Wihi massan Ínam Aadam dahanohi 'doo'di uskeel lehe lagessa, massalaaba lakakaaha, ibeenki seyyahnaatteet ka omoot lakasookahcha.’ ”
42024008	Deyyeho 'deerka yeediis kasoo'hesse.
42024009	Inkoo icho go'd kasoonokhteen ka, waha tuumman abattiti tomon ichoow koowe ichoow 'doo'di addan tuumman ba icheekte.
42024010	Deyyehoti waha ergaano icheekte la a Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala ichoow Yoowana ichoow Maariyati abar Yaakoobee ichoow deyyehoti addane leejirte.
42024011	I'daasenyi abatti deyyeho rummeysawwaayte, a mehe icho ka yeedi liidowo a wihi ilmarhaatteet on.
42024012	I'daasenyi Beetero kahe anki go'ddi Yeesso lakahawwaale inyaame. Go'd kagulguubsate, goya yeye, darfohi goorat Yeesso lakaayyuube kalday hawwaal goya kaarge. Ulla usuhi wihi yitah kagirmeesti irte.
42024013	Maalinkaas goya abatti Yeessotoo lammee ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem kabahte, ilkerengeettoo rucchule Emaawus layadeehe geeddi kiilomitta tomon ichoow koow jirto, iche isohatta.
42024014	Geedda icho 'dulaaan, wori wihi yitahye kahawwoochaan.
42024015	Geedda icho hawwoochaan, Yeesso rubeytiis garabicho gele, leesohte.
42024016	I'daasenyi Waakh icho indo a hide, eti us yahe ma kasin.
42024017	Yeesso wihi us icho worsate, “Atin geedda atin 'dussaan mehe kahawwoossaan?” Icho la tolossateene fool ribowe.
42024018	Kichokoo Kiiliyooba layadeeh wihi us worsate, “Ati kaldaye marteenye ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka wihi ibeenneta kutte yitah igaran?”
42024019	Wihi us worsate “Mehe yitah?” Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Wihi Yeessohi Naasaret layeele. Us eti Waákh íyeyyeedo eheet. Yeediis ichoow wahanyeyyohi us Waakh ichoow enenyet tuumman ortiis ka yeele miige khabeen.
42024020	Kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow ewweenkeen ba dahanohi 'doo'di omoot igoocho gesseene, icho la usu massalaaba kakaaheen.
42024021	I'daasenyi nah usuhi 'doo'di Issiraayel dowwanoha ka soofuro khajjeelle. Wihi addan la, uus waha tuumman yitaaheen, waha toolla a ibeenki seyyahnaatteet.
42024022	Deyyehotoo nah leejirto la maanta nah eyng'assaasse, kootte baryo on inti goorat eta lakahawwaale iratte.
42024023	I'daasenyi hawwaassi marahe sare goya ikajirin iirteen. Yimaateene saggi icho herti Waakh iargeen nah isoocheekeen. Herta la saggi eta ijiro nah isoocheekte.
42024024	Chirraakka wahalheenyokoo hawwaal irteene icho laka wihi kootte deyyeho tidah on argeene, i'daasenyi eti goorat yumuy ma argin.”
42024025	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Atin eenna a 'dalamme, toro eenna kakhuufnaanki atin wihi tuummane 'doo'di goorat Waákh íyeyyeedo cheeke kakhuuftaan ka uurassiin a ga'daale!
42024026	Wihi massane 'doo'daas Waákh íyeyyeedo cheeke, Ki Lasubhe sinayyoha tuummane 'hela 'dee inti weyti us kaababo irta menya?”
42024027	Yeesso la wihi goorat usu miinsane Chiirnaanneti Waakh goya kachiiran ibabbakkaahiche. Uus buuggag Muusa lakasookhabti ichoowka buuggassi 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo chiireen tuumman icheeke.
42024028	Chirri icho goobi kootte icho isohtaan sooeleeleen ka, Yeesso etoo orey isohti iskayeele.
42024029	I'daasenyi soojeycheene wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Kaale a isleebariino orrahe kola a dihtee.” Ulla 'deerka irte icho leefiddiye.
42024030	Chirra us komborti ballaaddane lakagolossati ka meessiis koorronte ka, makaate khaate Waakh kala'd ilaabe, jejjebche, icho gisin sookhabte.
42024031	Chirraakka reera indo lafure saggi eta Yeesso iyahe abteen. Toro chirraas on argiwwaayeen.
42024032	Wihi icho isworsateen, “Eta chirri kootte us jit ka inno leeyyeedo us Chiirnaanneti Waakh wihi kachiiran us inno isoobabbakkaahicho, rubeyoheen atte ka i'di wohoo 'dab kabolkho menya?”
42024033	Chirraas on kaheene, anki ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem inokhteen. Intaas ka abattiti tomon ichoow koowe ichoow 'doo'di addane icho leejiro kulme 'heleene,
42024034	wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Kamur rumanka omoot ka a sookahe! Ulla Siimon a isoobahe!”
42024035	'Doo'di kootte lammee laka wihi kootte geeddi icho jit ka'dulaan yitah cheeke. Toro la saggi icho chirri Yeesso makaate jebche eti u yahe iabteen 'doo'd icheekeen.
42024036	Geeddi 'doo'da kootte lammee 'doo'di addan wor siicho, Kamur goycho tolossate, wihi us iyidah, “Nebeytiin ma furatti.”
42024037	Icho dakkhamba naheen kol icho meleyka argeene koogyihiine.
42024038	Ulla wihi us iyidah, “A i'doh mal atin igele? A i'doh geeyoha dakkhane atin ikamalin idowattaan?
42024039	Bal dahanoheey ichoow luhloheey yeya, a ani rubeytaaya. I'daara 'dee mujjum eti an ahe kasa. Meleyka jid ichoow lafo ma khabto, saggi atin ani iagarteene an ikhabuu.”
42024040	Inkoo us waha yidah ka, dahanohiis ichoow luhlohiis tuse.
42024041	Jeenteti icho ihamaadaane toro igirmeestaan u, icho uliba saggi waha Yeesso iyahe ma rummeysanne, ulla wihi us worsate, “Wohoo golole a khabtaan?”
42024042	Icho la bahaggoo lakarche idiibeen.
42024043	Ulla khaate orcho ka yuhum.
42024044	Ulla wihi us iyidah, “Waha dakkhan a wihi maanti goorat an atin leejiro an atin icheeke, wihi tuummane ani imiinsane Chiirnaanneti Amurre ichoow ti 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo ichoow ti buuggi Sabuur lakachiire a labuuhicha.”
42024045	Ulla 'deerka malicho fure 'dee wihi Chiirnaanneti Waakh goya kachiiran a abteen.
42024046	Ulla wihi us iyidah, “Wihi chiiran a waha. Ki Lasubhe sina loomhicha, ibeenki seyyahnaatteet ka omoot kasookaha.
42024047	Ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme lakasookhabta, antohiis ka wori uskeeli lakasoonokhti ichoow uskeeli Waakh enenyet ikakuto miinsan 'doo'di harra tuumman liicheeka.
42024048	Atin a garti wahanyeyyoha.
42024049	Ani wihi goorat Aabbaheey atin iayyiche a atin isooerga. I'daasenyi koloo ilkerengeet goya akabahina ichoowka miigti serey katamiit a atin ogoogto.”
42024050	Chirri us abatti khaate ilkerengeetti Be'daaniya idowwaache ka, dahanohiis serey iooge, abatti iweeste.
42024051	Abatti iweestaayi, abatti katabe goobi Waakh liikorche.
42024052	Icho la usu wahteene, ichohi hamaadi buure khabo ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem inokhteen.
42024053	Kol dakkhan minki Waakhe buure fiddiyeene, Waakh saa'deen.
43001001	Uumaccho ka ki magahiis Yeed layadeeh a jire one, Yeed Waakhe leejire, Yeed la a Waakh ekkatiissa.
43001002	Ulla uumaccho ka Waakhe leejire.
43001003	Waakh usu ka, walah tuumman a soouume. Walah lasoouume laantiis lasoouume mala.
43001004	Usu jiroti rummaat lakeela. Jirota la weeli enenyete banay ikeenta.
43001005	Banayhaas la mug'di goya kabolkhaane, i'daasenyi mug'di jirtuu ma khaato.
43001006	Etoo Waakh leesoofarme a yimiyye, magahiis la a Yoohana.
43001007	Ulla a yimiyye garti banayhaas 'doo'd icheeke, 'dee usu ka 'doo'd tuumman woraas rummeesta.
43001008	Yoohana rubeytiis banayhaas menye, us eti garti banayhaas 'doo'd icheeko on eheet.
43001009	Eti banayhi rummaatenye weeli enenyet tuumman banay tuso la yomboka harra a yamiit.
43001010	Us harratane kijire. Chi' usu ka walah tuumman lasoouume laka, 'doo'di harrata eti us yahe ma aban.
43001011	Us 'doo'diissa iyimiyye, i'daasenyi 'doo'diis usu ma khaatan.
43001012	I'daasenyi 'doo'di tuummane usu khaatte, magahiis rummeeste, nyaakhuti Waakhe icho yateehiin a mu'danyahiin.
43001013	Nyaakhuta delmaatti sarti weeli enenyet ma kasoouummamine ommos wihi weeli enenyet gooche menye, ommos 'dooninti mejel mee. I'daasenyi Waakh rubeytiissa nyaakhutiis kayeesse.
43001014	Ki magahiis Yeed layadeeh weeli enenyet yitahye, harrata ka goyteen furte. Inno la weynaantiisti weyti haaggan a agarre, weynaanti weeli keleyenye Waakh. Ulla usuhi haaggi Waakhe buure ichoow rume buuhaane Aabbaheen kayimiy.
43001015	Yoohana la runti usu miinsan enenyet a icheeke, riire wihi us urur iyidah, “Kan a eti an, ‘Etoo ani ikaween 'dubeey ka a yamiit, i'di tahe us geeddi an idelan laka a jire on,’ eldi.”
43001016	Yeesso Kiriisto tuunki haaggiiski buure ka, buuhiis a inno ikasookhakkhaye.
43001017	A mehe Waakh amurretiis Muusa ka a inno siiche. Haaggi Waakhe buure ichoow runtiis la Yeesso Kiriisto ka a inno tuste.
43001018	Et injire Waákh arge mele. I'daasenyi Weeliiski kaldaye ullaka Waakhenye Aabbaheen garabiis kijiro, eti Waakh yahe a inno isoobabbakkaahiche.
43001019	Maanti weynaanti yaafohi Ya'huude ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem taal, kuhaaniyyo ichoow 'doo'doo goob Laaweenye kuhaaniyyo gargaaro Yoohana ieregte, eti us yahe iche worsatte.
43001020	Ulla eti us yahe ma daginne, 'doo'd ortiis ka cheeke, wihi us iyidah, “An Ki Lasubhe lasugo mee.”
43001021	Iche la wihi iche worsatte, “At 'deerka a ayyo? At a Eliiya?” Ulla, “Mele,” yidah. “At a eti Waákh íyeyyeedo inno sugno?” worsateen. Wihi us ilaabe, “Mele.”
43001022	'Da'ddaboka wihi icho yidaaheen, “At a ayyo? Wihi nah 'doo'di nah sooergate ilaabno nah sii. At a ayyo istadeeh?”
43001023	Yoohana yeedi eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Isaaya layadeeh ka ilaabe, “Etoo hidaad ka a rirriira. ‘Jiti Kamur ficcha,’ iche essa. Eta la a ani.”
43001024	Farissaayotoo lasooergate,
43001025	wihi iche worsatte, “Chirri at Ki Lasubhe ieheynane ommos at eti meel Eliiya gele ieheynane ommos at eti Waákh íyeyyeedo inno sugno ieheynan, a i'dohe 'doo'd ibaattissita?”
43001026	Yoohana wihi us ilaabe, “An bicche enenyet kabaattissiya, i'daasenyi etoo goytiin kijiro atin igaran, a jira.
43001027	Usu a kiiyye dubeey ka yamiite, anna falfihi kobtiissa an jalkhicho ma mu'dan.”
43001028	Waha tuumman la ilkerengeetti Be'daaniya hawti Yoordane 'dusso berihicheenye Yoohana enenyet kabaattissiyo, iche kayitaaheen.
43001029	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka, Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo Yeessohi soosohti arge. Yoohana la wihi us yidah, “Yeya, Heleenki Waakhe uskeeli 'doo'di harrata bahcho kalla.
43001030	Kan a eti an woriis kaayyeede, ‘Etoo 'dubeey ka a yamiite, ulla a ikaweenyahe i'di tahe us geeddi an idelan laka a jire,’ an atin idowe.
43001031	Ani rubeyteey eti us yahe ma garan. I'daasenyi wihi ikeene an bicche 'doo'd kabaattissiyo, a jitoo 'dee usu 'doo'di Issiraayel liikababbakkaahicho.”
43001032	Yoohana 'deerka runta cheeke, wihi us yidah, “An Rubeyti Munyeenye i'di kutukuurrug u, goobi Waakh katimiyye usu kafiddiite a arge.
43001033	Sag an eti us yahe igardi mele sammata Waakkhi isooergate, 'dee 'doo'd bicche kabaattis iyidah waha ani ikiidaahan, ‘Eti at agarto Rubeyti Munyee goobi Waakh ka isooyagte kafiddiite, usu Rubeyti Munyee ka 'doo'd baattissiya.’
43001034	An waha a arge, saggi rumanka us Weeli Waakh iyahe, a cheeka.”
43001035	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho, Yoohana abattitiistoo lammee khabaayi toro intaase toolla.
43001036	Chirri us Yeessohi kuto arge ka, wihi us yidah, “Yeya, Heleenki Waakh kuulla.”
43001037	Chirri abattita lammee usuhi waha essi daagte ka, Yeesso raahte.
43001038	Yeesso urgiye, ichehi usu sooraahto arge, “Mehe 'doontaan?” worsate. Iche la, “Eti weenoow, at intoh fiddiita?” worsatte.
43001039	Wihi us ilaabe, “Kaaleya 'dee arga.” 'Deerka iratte, meessi us fiddiyo agarte. Wahaas la a geeddi saha'd affarti chirdeereet. Maantaas tuumman usu on lee'hadde.
43001040	Reera lammeenye wihi Yoohana essi daage Yeesso raahe, kichokoo a Andereeyahi walaal Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh.
43001041	Wihi kolooraate Andereeya yeele, Siimonhi walaaliisenye yowte, “Ki Lasubhe a 'helle,” iyidah. Ulla a Kiriistohi lasugo.
43001042	Ulla Siimon Yeessó ikeene. Yeesso la yeye wihi us iyidah, “At a Siimonhi ínam Yoohanee menya? Magahaah kola Keefas iche layadeeh.” Ayta chirri lalaabe a Beetero ommos Daddaab.
43001043	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka, Yeesso usuhi boroofenhi Gaalilaaya irti gooche. Fiilif 'hele wihi us iyidah, “Kaale abattiteey ateeh.”
43001044	Fiilif i'di Andereeya ichoow Beeteruu, ullaka ilkerengeetti Bessaayda kayimiy.
43001045	Fiilif Na'daanayel 'hele wihi us iyidah, “Nah eti goorat Muusa Chiirnaanneti Amurre ka chiire, 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo laka woriis chiireen a 'helle. Ulla a Yeessohi ilkerengeetti Naasarete, a ínam Yuussuf.”
43001046	“Ilkerengeetti Naasaret a! Rumanka wohoo rucchule haaggan intaas a kasoobahaan on a?” Na'daanayel worsate. Fiilif la wihi us iyidah, “Kaale, isiagar.”
43001047	Chirri Yeesso Na'daanayelhi isoosohti arge ka, wihi usu miinsane us yidah, “Eti rumanka Issiraayelenye wihi beenaat liika'helin kalla.”
43001048	Na'daanayel la wihi us worsate, “At saggoh ani igaratta?” Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Geeddi Fiilif kiwahin, atihi geeyi fiig iliis fiddiito iche kiarge.”
43001049	Na'daanayel wihi us yidah, “Eti weenoow! Ati Weeli Waakhe. Ati a karnati Issiraayel.”
43001050	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “At jeenteti an atihi geeyi fiig iliis fiddiito kiarge kiidahye ani irummeysatta? Wihi wahaas kussan a agarta.”
43001051	Wihi us kakhaye, “Rume atin icheeka, goobi Waakh usuhi furane herti Waakh ínam Aadam isookhubatti toro korto a agarta.”
43002001	Ibeenki seyyahnaatteet ka, oroosoo ilkerengeetti Kaana boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kajirto ka lagele. Abar Yeesso la intaas a kajirte.
43002002	Yeesso ichoow abattitiis laka oroosaas a liiwahe.
43002003	Inkoo farsoti sabiib 'doo'd kaguute ka, abar Yeesso usu itimiyye, “Farsoti sabiib a guute,” itidah.
43002004	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Abartaay, ati mee wihi an yeelo isoocheekto. Ibeenki Waakh isoogooche a ankhanyahe.”
43002005	Abartiis wihi iche ilbooyye itidah, “Walahbaaw us yeela atin iidah, yeela.”
