43002006	'Diraammetoo lihenye burbuurenye dagaheete bicche lakachibo yaafohi Ya'huud hugumme ka kadikhatti intaas a kajireen. Kooba la bicchehi geeddi litta tomon siyyeet ichoowka litta kudoo ichoow tomon lamma iche khaata.
43002007	Yeesso wihi us ilbooyye iyidah, “'Diraamme bicche buuhicha.” Ilbooyye 'diraamme buuhisse af keente.
43002008	'Deerka wihi us ilbooyye iyidah, “Bal wohoor soogessa, 'dee khaata, ilbooyi oroos ka golol itoollo igeecha.” Ilbooyye la i'daas yeesse.
43002009	Ilbooyi golol itoollo la bicchehi luurgiyiche farsoti sabiib lakayeele chanchame. Ulla inti lakakeene ma garanne, ilbooyyeti bicche soogelisse la a garatta. Ilbooyi golol itoollo eti min diste 'dol iwahe,
43002010	wihi us iyidah, “Ebba farsoti sabiibe weyti haaggane orey leekeena, inkoo marti farsoti buure dante ka, farsoti gato 'dabakhe lasookhaata. At la farsoti weyti haaggane laabte ichoowka toolla.”
43002011	Waha a wahanyeyyohi oraate miigti Waakh tuso Yeesso ilkerengeetti Kaana boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kajirto ka haaggiche. 'Deerka weynaantiis 'doo'd isoobabbakkaahiche, abattitiis la usu kakhuufte.
43002012	'Da'ddaboka Yeesso abartiis ichoow walaalinyetiis ichoow abattitiis khabaayi ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hum ikhubte, intaas ibeennetoo fiddiye.
43002013	Maanti Daawti yaafohi Ya'huude Baasakka layadeeh soodowwaatte, Yeesso ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ikore.
43002014	Uranti minki Waakhe buure ka, 'doo'di looyyo ichoow iiy ichoow kutukuurrug ba ororicho ichoow 'doo'doo addane komborohi balballaaddan koorronte chilimme iskadooricho 'hele.
43002015	'Deerka yabarretoo laajja kayeesse, icho tuumman ichoow iiy ichoow looyyo ba uranti minki Waakhe buure karihe. Komborohi balballaaddane 'doo'd chilimme iskadooricho rerreeche, chilimme la seley turraa'hiche.
43002016	Wihi us 'doo'di kutukuurrug ororicho iyidah, “Kutukurrugtaas inta kabahcha. Min Aabbaheey uurgiyinna sokko akayeelina!”
43002017	Abattitiis waha chiiran kasoo'hesse, “Kamuraaw, 'dooninti an minkaah 'doono, weyti buurtahe ichoowka a ikhaatta laka.”
43002018	'Deerka ewweenki yaafohi Ya'huud wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso at nah tusso 'dee saggi rumanka Waakh antohi at waha kayeesse kisiiche iagarro a mehe?”
43002019	Yeesso wihi us icho ilaabe, “Minka Waakhe buure jejjebcha, anna ibeen seyyah goyaka toro a disaa.”
43002020	Iche la wihi iche ilaabte, “Minka Waakhe buure, gu'h tomon affar ichoow lihe khaate ladise. Alla maan seyyah goya on ka dissa?”
43002021	I'daasenyi minka Waakhe buurenye Yeesso woriis kayeyyeedo a sartiissa.
43002022	Inkoo Waakh usu omoot kasookahche ka, abattitiis wihi us 'hor kayeyyeede kasoo'hesse. Abatti 'deerka Chiirnaanneti Waakh ichoow wihi Yeesso yidah ba rummeysatte.
43002023	Geedda Yeesso ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka daawti Baasakka kajiro, 'doo'di buure wahanyeyyohi noole miigti Waakh tuso us yeelo arge, usu rummeeste.
43002024	I'daasenyi Yeesso icho ma kakhuufin, a mehe us enenyet tuumman i'diis a garta.
43002025	Walah etoo miinsane usu liicheeko mele, i'di tahe usu rubeytiis uuri weeli enenyet a garta.
43003001	Etoo Farissaayeenye Nikodeemo layadeehe Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud kichokoowe a jire.
43003002	Ulla ibeen Yeesso iyimiyye wihi us iyidah, “Eti ween, saggi at etoo Waakh sooergate enenyet walah abcho itahe a garanna. A mehe wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso at yeesso, et addane yeelo mele, eti Waakh leejiro on menye.”
43003003	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Rume kisoocheeka, et dakhi Waakh argo mele sammata koli lammaatteet liidelin.”
43003004	Nikodeemo la wihi us worsate, “Saggoh eti ween toro liidela? Rumanka koli lammaatteet uur abartiis ma inokhti ma dessi!”
43003005	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rume atin icheeka, et dakhi Waakh gelo mele, sammata bicche ichoow Rubeyti Munyee ka liidelin.
43003006	Weeli enenyet sartiis aabbahiis ichoow abartiissa ka'hela, toro la rubeyti weeli enenyet, Rubeyti Munyeenye jiro ka'hessa.
43003007	Yeedeeyki an, ‘Atin toro koli lammaatteet a atin laaddelo,’ idah akagirmeysan.
43003008	Hafar anki us 'doono isohta. Yeenaanki us yeedo la ladaaga, i'daasenyi et inti us kayimiy ichoow inti us isohti garti mele. Eti Rubeyti Munyee jiroti husub siisse laka a i'daas on.”
43003009	Nikodeemo la wihi us worsate, “Waha saggoh iyateehiin?”
43003010	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “At a etoo 'doo'di Issiraayel Yeedi Waakh abcho, toro la wahanyeyyoha ma abanna?
43003011	Rume kisoocheeka, wihi nah garanni a atin isoocheekna, wihi nah indo kaagarre laka a atin isoocheekna. I'daasenyi, atin wihi nah atin idowno ma rummeysattaan.
43003012	An wahanyeyyohi harratane atin isoocheeke atin la ma rummeysattaan. Sag 'deerka atin wahanyeyyohi goobi Waakh miinsane an atin idowo irummeysattaan mele gon.
43003013	Ínam Aadamhi goobi Waakh kasookhubte on menye, et addane injire goobi Waakh ikore mele.
43003014	Saggi goorat Muusa hidaad ka toof iokkhichuu, saggaase Ínam Aadam laka liiokhicha,
43003015	'dee eti tuummane ani irummeeste, jiroti jirtuu imassan 'hela.”
43003016	I'di tahe Waakh weeli enenyet tuumman weyti 'doone, 'deerka weeliiski kalday soodiibe, 'dee eti tuummane Weeli Waakh rummeeste ma yamuute, i'daasenyi jiroti jirtuu imassan 'hela.
43003017	A mehe Waakh Weeliis weeli enenyete us hukkumo ma isooergin. I'daasenyi a sooerge, 'dee weeliis ka weeli enenyet tuumman uskeeliis kariba.
43003018	Eti tuummane Weeli Waakh rummeeste ma lahukkumo. I'daasenyi eti tuummane irummeysan orey on lahukkume, a mehe Weeli Waakhe keleye ma rummeysan.
43003019	“Wihi Waakh gooche kallaayo. Runti Waakhe i'di banayeete harra a soogesse, i'daasenyi enenyet banayhi Waakh menye, mug'di on 'doona. A mehe wihi icho yeelaan a wihi uskeel kaldach on.
43003020	Eti tuummane suujoon yeelo, banayhi runti Waakh a 'dii'da, toro la banay goya ma soogelo. I'di tahe usuhi uskeeli us yeelo laargo ma 'doono.
43003021	I'daasenyi eti tuummane wihi rummaat yeelo banay goya soogela, 'dee banay la saggi wihi us yeele wihi Waakh 'doono iyahiin tusaan.”
43003022	'Da'ddaboka, Yeesso abattitiis khabaayi boroofenhi Ya'huudiya ankiiskoo irte, geeddoor leefiddiye, toro la enenyet laka baattissiye.
43003023	Yoohana laka iloo Aynoone layadeehe ilkerengeetti Saalim haggee, iche 'doo'd kabaattissiya. I'di tahe bicchehi buurenye intaas kajira. 'Doo'd la geeddi nool usu iirta, ulla baattissiya.
43003024	Waha la a geeddi Yoohana jeela liigelin.
43003025	Abatti Yoohanatoo ichoow etoo Ya'huude ba yeedoo daawti saggi isliidikho bi'dir islabahcho miinsan isleeiriireen.
43003026	Yoohana iyimaateene, wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Eti weenoow, eti goorat hawti Yoordane 'dusso 'dirihiche ka kileejire, at woriis kayeyyeedde kalla. Yey, enenyet tuumman la usu iirta, ulla baattissiya.”
43003027	Yoohana waha ka wihi us ilaabe, “Wihi Waakh soomure on menye, walah eti i'dee kayateeh mele.
43003028	Atin tuumman a cheektaane, wihi goorat an idah a mehe ya, ‘An Ki Lasubhe mee, i'daasenyi a eti Waakh ortiis sooerge.’
43003029	Mindischo ka, eti min disti iche iname makhaabassiis tahe. Aali eti min disti la, chirra us hooyi eti min disti daago, iche hamaada. Annaka jeentetaase weyti ihamaada.
43003030	Usu gon magah 'diriheey 'hela, anna magah waaya.”
43003031	“Weeli Waakhe goobi Waakhe saraat kayamiit, usu 'doo'd tuumman kaween. Ani a ki harratane, wihi harratane kayeyyeeda. Ki goobi Waakh kayamiit la, usú 'doo'd tuumman kaween.
43003032	Us wihi us arge ichoow wihi us daage 'doo'd icheeka, i'daasenyi et wihi us cheeke rummeesti mele.
43003033	Chi' etoo yeediis kakhuufe, etaas saggi wihi Waakh yidah rum iyahiin, iche tusa.
43003034	A mehe eti Waakh sooerge farniinki Waakhe kaayyeeda. I'di tahe Waakh etaas Rubeytiisti Munyee iche buuh ka rubeytiis goya gessa.
43003035	Aabbaheen weeliis a 'doona, walah tuumman la dahantiissa gesse.
43003036	Eti tuummane Weeli Waakh rummeeste, jiroti jirtuu imassan a khaba. I'daasenyi eti tuummane Weeli Waakh 'dii'do jiro ma khabo. A mehe holi Waakh usu a fuula.”
43004001	Farissaayo saggi Yeesso abattiti too Yoohana kiittaawe ibahsate toro la ibaattissiyo daagte.
43004002	Rumanka la Yeesso rubeytiis enenyet ma baattissiyine, i'daasenyi abattitiissa enenyet baattissite.
43004003	Kamur chirri us waha daage ka, boroofenhi Ya'huudiya katabe, toro abattitiis khabaayi boroofenhi Gaalilaaya inokhte.
43004004	Wihi massan, chirri us boroofenha Gaalilaaya irti, boroofenhi Saamariya dah kagoocha.
43004005	Chirri us boroofenhi Saamariya gele ka, ilkerengeettoo Siikar layadeehe, gosi goorat archiiy Yaakoobo inankiiski Yuussuf layadeeh siiche idow irte.
43004006	Wor Yaakoobo la intaase kajirta. Yeesso la wor afiche orronte. A mehe geeddi deere soosohte, a kurme. Waha la a geeddi saha'd tomon ichoow lammati gelebeet.
43004007	Chi' makhaabassoo yaafohi Saamariyee bicche waraaban timiy ka, Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “Bicchehoo an abhuub isii.”
43004008	Abattitiis la ilkerengeete iratte golole soogattaa.
43004009	Makhaabassi Saamariya la wihi iche Yeesso ilaabte, “Ya! Atiha Ya'huude saggoh anihi yaafohi Saamariyee bicchehi at tabhuub idaahta?” A mehe yaafohi Ya'huud ichoow yaafohi Saamariya walah icho iskakhabaan mele.
43004010	Yeesso wihi us iche ilaabe, “Wihi Waakh enenyet siin 'doono garatte ka, ommos anihi bicche kidaaho eti an ahe garatte ka, kootte ati ani bicche idaahta, ani la bicchehi enenyet jiro keelo kisiicha.”
43004011	Makhaabale la wihi iche itidah, “Eti ween, wore a hoge, at la wihi bicche lakasoogesso ma khabto. Biccheha jiro lakeelo intoh ka'hessa?
43004012	Toro la, at aacchiheenyoki Yaakoobo layadeehe nah worta ka'helle a kaweentahe? Usu rubeytiis ichoow yeeletiis ichoow hoolahiis tuummamba worta on yubhaabeen.”
43004013	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Eti tuummane biccheha yabhuub toro a subgaata.
43004014	I'daasenyi eti tuummane bicchehi an siicho yabhuub, jirtuu tuumman ma subgaati. Bicchehi an siicho la, goytiis ka i'di issi bicchehi jiro lakeelo yateehiine, jiroti rummaate jirtuu imassanne 'hela.”
43004015	Makhaabale la wihi iche itidah, “Eti ween, bicchehaas isiiche, 'dee uus an jirtuu subgaanne, ommos worta isoonokhanne bicche waraaban.”
43004016	Yeesso la wihi iyidah, “Nyaame, makhaabalaah soowahe, 'dee soonokho.”
43004017	Wihi iche ilaabte, “An makhaábal ma khabo.” Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Rume cheekte, cha'at, ‘Makhaábal ma khabo,’ tidah.
43004018	Wihi at tidah a rum! At áram chane kidisatte, ki toolla at leefiddiito la makhaabalaah mee.”
43004019	Makhaabale wihi iche itidah, “Eti ween, saggi at eti Waákh íyeyyeedo itahe a arga.
43004020	Aacchinyeteenti yaafteeyti Saamariyee, goorat halane Waakh kawahatte. I'daasenyi atinhi yaafohi Ya'huude, ‘Inti enenyet Waakh kawahti a ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem,’ iche elattaan.”
43004021	Yeesso wihi us makhaabál iyidah, “Makhaabassa, wihi an kidowo rummeyso. Ibeen a yamiit ki enenyet hala ommos ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem Aabbaheey ikawahanne, meelbaaw us kijiro on ka wahti.
43004022	Atinhi yaafohi Saamariya chirri atin Waakh wahattaan laka, atin usu rubeytiis ma garattaan. Nahi yaafohi Ya'huude la, Waakkhi nah wahanni a garanna. A mehe eti 'doorribo yaafohi Ya'huude kayamiit.
43004023	Ibeen a yamiite toro la kola a yitah. Ibeenki Rubeyti Waakh 'doo'd woyto, 'dee 'doo'd Waakh saggi rumanka us iyahe iwahti. Aabbaheey la 'doo'di usú saggaas iwahti iche yowta.
43004024	A mehe Waakh a rubey kalday on. Weeli enenyet la, sammata Rubeyti Waakh igargaarin, koloo kalday laka Waakh saggi us rumanka iyahe ma iwahti.”
43004025	Makhaabale la wihi iche itidah, “Saggi Ki Lasubhe Kiriistohi lasugo layadeeh iyamiit a garda. Ulla maanti us yamiit, walah tuumman a inno ibabbakkaahicha.”
43004026	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe “Aniha kileeyeyyeedo a usu rubeytiissa.”
43004027	Geeddaas on ka abatti Yeesso soonokhatte. Abatti la chirri iche Yeessohi makhaabál leeyyeedo agarte ka, weyti girmeysatte. I'daasenyi eticho, “At mehe 'doonta?” worsate mele. Ommos eticho Yeesso, “A i'doh makhaabál ileeyyeedda?” iyidah mele.
43004028	Makhaabale 'dirihicheki biccheet katabte, ilkerengeet inokhatte, wihi iche 'doo'd itidah,
43004029	“Kaaleya eti wihi tuummane goorat an yeele isoocheeke arga. Eta a geeddi us Ki Lasubhe yahe?”
43004030	'Doo'd ilkerengeet kasoobahe, Yeesso iyimiy.
43004031	Geeddaas tuumman la abatti Yeesso hawwaassatta, “Eti ween, bal wohoo aham,” idowta.
43004032	I'daasenyi wihi us ilaabe, “An gololi atin wihiiskoo rucchul laka igaran a khaba.”
43004033	Abatti 'deerka wihi iche isitidah, “Etoo sarka golol ikeene?”
43004034	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Wihi uur i'doono i'di gololeeye a mehe ya, a anihi wihi Waakkhi isooerge 'doono yeelo, toro la hili goorat us dahanteey soogesse massicho.
43004035	Atin orran, ‘Hay affare yomboossa, 'dee gurnaan lagoocha,’ ma elattaan a? I'daasenyi wihi an atin iadeeh, bal indo ooga gos yeya, gurnaan kola a bissaate, a geeddi lakagoocho.
43004036	Waakh la 'doo'di gos goocho mujjume guta. Gurnaanka icho soogoochaan la, a 'doo'di jiroti jirtuu imassan 'helo. 'Deerka 'dee eti gurnaan il kachibe, ichoow ki gurnaan goocho ba isleehamaadaan.
43004037	Jeentetaase mammahti, ‘Koo ilmo il geessa, koo la gurnaane soogoocha,’ tadeeh rum itahe.
43004038	Ani a atin erge, gosi atin ilmo il ikachibin ka, gurnaan soogoossaan, gosaas la 'doo'doo addane hol kadowe, atin la gurnaanki bissaate on soogoossaan.”
43004039	Jeenteti kootte makhaabale, “Eta wihi goorat an yeele tuumman a isoocheeke,” itidah u, 'doo'di Saamariya ilkerengeettaas yaal ki ittaawe Yeesso rummeeste.
43004040	'Deerka chirri 'doo'di Saamariya Yeesso iyimiy ka, hawwaasteene, “Kaale nah leefiddiy,” iyidaaheen. Yeesso la ibeen lamma intaas barye.
43004041	'Doo'di weyti ittaawe la, jeenteti wihi Yeesso yidah u, Yeesso rummeeste.
43004042	Wihi icho makhaabál iyidaaheen, “Toolla yeedaah kalday on ma rummeysanni, i'di tahe nah laka awteenyuu usu a daagne, toolla la saggi rumanka eta 'Doorribehi enenyeti harra tuumman iyahe a garanna.”
43004043	Inkoo Yeesso intaas ibeen lamma barye ka, anki boroofenhi Gaalilaaya tabe.
43004044	Yeesso rubeytiis 'hor mehe yidah ya, “Eti Waákh íyeyyeedo, ilicho ka ma liinkaanyito.”
43004045	I'daasenyi, chirri us boroofenhi Gaalilaaya yimiy ka, 'doo'di Gaalilaaya martiiste. I'di tahe wihi us daawti Baasakka ka us ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka yeele tuumman a argeen. Icho laka goorat daawtaas a kijireen.
43004046	Yeesso toro ilkerengeetti Kaana boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kajirto us bicche kuurgiyiche farsoti sabiib kayeele inokhte. Ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hum ka la, etoo sirgaal ka weene inankiis weyti khannanyahe a jira.
43004047	Eta chirri us saggi Yeesso boroofenhi Ya'huudiya ikayimiyye, boroofenhi Gaalilaaya isoogele daage ka, iirte hawwaaste, 'dee a yimaate inankiiski omoottan a samaacho.
43004048	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Atin sammata atin wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso ichoow girmo iargin ma irummeysattaan.”
43004049	Eti sirgaal ka ween la wihi us iyidah, “Eti ween, bal kaale dowwa a khubanni, inankeey geeddi us iumaatan samaay.”
43004050	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Nyaam on iro, inankaah a samaataa.” Et wihi Yeesso iyidah rummeeste, irte.
43004051	Jit raahaayi, ilbooyyetiis usu 'hesse, saggi inankiis isamaate icheekte.
43004052	Ulla ilbooyye saha'ddi inam kasoodeefsate worsate. Iche la wihi iche ilaabte, “Chele saha'ddoo kaldaye chirdeereete kuleel kabukkhe.”
43004053	Aabbahiis la chirraakka saggi wahaas saha'ddi chele Yeesso, “Nyaam, inankaah a samaataa,” ikayidah itahe, abte. 'Deerka usu ichoow minkiis tuummamba Yeesso rummeesteen.
43004054	Wahaas a wihi lammaatteete miigti Waakh tuso, Yeesso inkoo us boroofenhi Ya'huudiya kayimiyye us boroofenhi Gaalilaaya soogele yeele.
43005001	Saahka, daawtoo Ya'huude jirta, Yeesso ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ikore.
43005002	Ilkerengeetti Yeerusaleem ka, meessi, “Aritti iiyyaat,” layadeeh hagga ka, ge'dintoo gaayim chan khabto a jirta. Afi Ibiraaniya ka magahiche, “Bessaa'da,” iche layadeeh.
43005003	'Doo'di buurenye khakkhannane, gaasoo indo laaye ichoow ki luhlo laa ichoow ki ma'dayyee iche ge'dintaas hagga jijjiifa.
43005005	Makhaabaloo geeddi gu'h tomon seyyah ichoow siyyeet ba khannaneet la intaas a kajire.
43005006	Chirri Yeesso usuhi intaas jiifo arge, saggi us gu'hassi ittaawe ikhannaneet garte ka wihi us worsate, “Atihi samaatti a 'doonta?”
43005007	Eti khannan wihi us ilaabe, “Eti ween, et chirri bicche loonkorooriye, ge'dim goya ikalug'do mele. Chirra an ge'dim kadih adeeh, etoo addan orteey a kadihe.”
43005008	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Tolosso, ilaalaah okhso, soho.”
43005009	Chirraas on et samaate, ilaaliis okhsate, sohte. Ibeenka Yeesso waha yeele la a Seeri Lanaso.
43005010	'Deerka 'doo'di wewweene Ya'huud wihi us etaas lasamaache iyidah, “Maanta a Seeri Lanaso, amurre ilaalaahki at si'ddo a 'dii'ddantahe.”
43005011	I'daasenyi wihi us ilaabe, “Eti isamaache mehe iyidah ya, ‘Ilaalaah okhso, soho.’ ”
43005012	'Deerka wihi iche worsatte, “Eta, ‘Ilaalaah okhso, soho,’ kiidah, a ayyo?”
43005013	Eti lasamaache la, eti us yahe ma garti. A mehe ururi buurenye intaas kajire, Yeesso la urur goya tabe.
43005014	Yeesso saahka etaas minki Waakhe buure ka 'hele, wihi us iyidah, “At kola a samaatte. Uus 'dee wohoo addane suuje kisoobahine, tabe uskeel kanokho.”
43005015	Makhaabal irte, 'doo'di Ya'huude wewween saggi eti goorat samaache Yeesso iyahe icheeke.
43005016	'Deerka jeenteti Yeesso waha Seeri Lanaso ihaaggichuu, weynaanti Ya'huud Yeesso sina omhisse.
43005017	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Aabbaheey kol dakkhan hil a haaggicha, annaka i'diis u hile haaggicha.”
43005018	Jeentetaas u la weynaanti Ya'huud sagag tuumman ka weyti Yeesso ogoos yowatte. Us amurreti Seeri Lanaso kalday ma jebinne, i'daasenyi Waakh a Aabbahaaya essa, Waakh ekkatiis iskayeela.
43005019	Yeesso wihi us jaldaabti Ya'huud ilaabe, “Rume atin icheeka, Weeli Waakh walah us keley yeelo mele. Wihi us argo Aabbahiis yeelo on yeela. I'di tahe wihi Aabbahiis yeelo on Weeliis laka yeela.
43005020	I'di tahe Aabbaheen Weeliis a 'doona, wihi noole us awtiis u yeelo, a tusa. Wihi noole waha kussan a tusa, 'dee atin la kagirmeysattaan.
43005021	Saggi Aabbahiis 'doo'di tuume isookahcho jiro isiicho, saggaase Weeliis laka, eti us 'doono jiro isiicha.
43005022	Toro Aabbaheey etoo kalday laka ma hukkumo, i'daasenyi Weeliissa antohi us 'doo'd kahukkumo siiche.
43005023	'Dee enenyet tuumman saggi us Aabbahiis iinkaanyito, Weeliis laka iinkaanyita. Eti tuummane Weeli Waakh iinkaanyitin la, Aabbahiiski usu sooerge laka ma inkaanyito.
43005024	“Rume atin icheeka, eti tuummane yeedeey daage toro eti ani isooerge rummeeste, jiroti jirtuu imassan a 'hele toro la ma lahukkumo, omoot a 'dallaabsate jiroti jirtuu imassan 'hele.
43005025	Rume atin icheeka, ibeen a yateehe kola la a yitah, ibeenki 'doo'di tuume hooyi Weeli Waakh daago. Eti tuummane daage la, jiroti jirtuu imassanne 'hela.
43005026	I'di tahe saggi Aabbaheey enenyet jiro isiicho, iche Weeliis laka enenyet jiro isiicha.
43005027	Toro Aabbaheey usu antohi us 'doo'd kahukkumo laka a siiche, i'di tahe us a Ínam Aadamee.
43005028	“Waha akagirmeysanna, i'di tahe ibeen a yamiit ki 'doo'di tuume tuumman hawwaalo goyaka hooyeey daago,
43005029	omoot lakasookahcho. 'Doo'di tuummane wihi haaggan yeele, omoot a kasookaha, jiro 'hela. Ki suujoon yeele la, omoot a kasookaha, lahukkuma.”
43005030	Awteey u walah an yeelo mele, i'daasenyi saggi an Aabbaheey ikadaago iche enenyet jiti fissan ka ihukkuma, a mehe an ma iskahamaadicho i'daasenyi ki isooergate kahamaadicha.
43005031	“Chirri ani on garteey laabo, garteey ti rummaat mee gon.
43005032	I'daasenyi etoo addane wihi ani imiinsan cheeko a jira. Wihi us atin idowo ani imiinsan runticho a garda.
43005033	“Atin Yoohana enenyet a iergatteene, ulla runti ani imiinsan tuumman atin icheeke.
43005034	Toro la yeedi weeli enenyete eti an ahe soocheeko, ani ka a walahba. I'daasenyi waha a atin isoocheeka 'dee Waakh atin riba.
43005035	Yoohana a i'di taahi bolkho, banay 'doo'd tuso. Atin la geeddoor yeedi us atin idowo atin kahamaadicho a 'doonteen. Yeeda us atin idowo la, a i'di banay.
43005036	“Wohoo addane woreey cheeko, Yoohana laka kussan a jiraan. A mehe hili Aabbaheey dahan isoogesse an massicho an haaggicho saggi Aabbaheey isooerge, iche tusa.
43005037	Aabbaheeyki ani isooerge laka, wihi tuummane ani imiinsan a cheeke. Atin injire hooyiis ma daagine, ommolla injire fooliis ma argine,
43005038	ommos yeediis goytiin ma fiddiyo, a mehe atin eti us sooerge ma rummeysan.
43005039	Atin Chiirnaanneti Waakh a kamalattaan, kol atin jiroti jirtuu imassan ka'hessaane koogtahiinee. Chiirnaannetaas Waakh laka, woraaya kaayyeeda.
43005040	I'daasenyi atin, atinhi ani itamiitiine 'dee jiroti rummaat jirtaan a 'dii'ddeen.
43005041	“An weeli enenyet koolo ma kayowdi.
43005042	I'daasenyi an rumanka a atin garda, saggi atin rumanka Waakh i'doonin a garda.
43005043	Ani anto Aabbahaaya kiimiyye atin la ma ikhaatan, i'daasenyi chirri etoo addan yimiyye antohiissa on kayeyyeedo, atin etaas a khaatattaan.
43005044	Atin goytiinna on ka koolo iskayowattaane, i'daasenyi Waakkhi usu kalday on Waakh yahe, koolo ma kayowattaan. Saggoh ani irummeysattaan?”
43005045	I'daasenyi kol an Aabbaheey ortiis ka uskeeli atin yeesseen cheeko akoogeynana. Eti atin cheekti, a Muusahi atin khajjeel kakhabtaan.
43005046	Chirri atin yeed Muusa rummeysatteen, ani laka kootte a irummeysattaan. A mehe Muusa wihi ani imiinsan on chiire.
43005047	I'daasenyi wihi us chiire ma rummeysan gone, sag atin wihi an atin isoocheeko irummeysattaan mele gon.
43006001	Waha 'dubicho ka, Yeesso abattitiis khabaayi Beyti Buurenye Gaalilaaya, magahichekoo addan Beyti Buurenye Tibeeriya layadeeh, aficheki 'diri imaahe.
43006002	Ururoo buure la Yeesso raahe, wahanyeyyohi ittaawenye miigti Waakh tuso us haaggicho us 'doo'di khakkhannan samaache, iche argeen.
43006003	Yeesso la abattitiis khabaayi haloo kore, orronte.
43006004	Ibeenki Daawti Ya'huude Baasakka lagelo la a soodowwaate.
43006005	Chirri Yeesso serey yeye ururi buurenye isoosohti arge ka, wihi us Fiilif iyidah, “Intoh gololi inno 'doo'da tuumman kagoollinno kasooganna?”
43006006	Yeesso jeenteti us etaas ikajo on waha iworsate, a mehe wihi us sooyeelo orey on garte.
43006007	Fiilif wihi us Yeesso ilaabe, “Gololi 'doo'da ebba wohoor on yaham, chilimmeti eti orrah kud lamma hil haaggiche laguto, iche 'doona!”
43006008	Andereeyahi ullaka abatti Yeesseenye, Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh leedesse, sooyeede wihi us yidah,
43006009	“Inankoo makaate chan 'dargaayye lakahaaggiche, ichoow bahag lamma rurrucchul khabo kalla. I'daasenyi koloo kalday laka 'doo'da ittaawe ma yaakhaan.”
43006010	Yeesso la wihi us yidah, “'Doo'd orrommicha.” Intaas la hoosi buurenye khabte. Mejeli orronte la a geeddi alif chan.
43006011	Yeesso 'deerka makaateyyo khaate, Waakh kala'd ilaabe, 'doo'di intaas fiddiyo geeddi icho 'doonaan gise. Bahag laka i'daas on yeele.
43006012	Chirri icho tuumman dargeen ka, Yeesso wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Gololi laajjebche lasoowaache soosuuna, uus inno wohoo rucchul laka baabiinne.”
43006013	'Deerka abatti enjel tomon ichoow lamma makaateyyohi chanenye 'dargaayye lakahaaggiche lasoowaache buuhaan soosuunte.
43006014	Inkoo 'doo'd wahanyeyyoha miigti Waakh tuso Yeesso yeele arge ka, 'doo'd wihi us yidah, “Rumanka, eti goorat Muusa cheeke, ‘Etoo Waákh íyeyyeedo 'dee berri harrata a yamiit,’ yidah a kan.”
43006015	Yeesso la saggi icho miig ka ikhabtaane, icho karnat ikayeelin i'doonaan abte, keley toro haloo inokhte.
43006016	Chirri il gelebnowe ka, abattitiis beyti Gaalilaaya ikhubatte.
43006017	Intaas ka kooban goya gesse bey aficheki 'diri imaahte, ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hume isohtaanee. Sohtaani, il ibeennowe. Yeesso la uliba abatti ma isoonokhan.
43006018	Hafaroo miige sookahe, bicche uskulaateen.
43006019	Chirri iche geeddi kiilomitta chan ommos lih illeh kooban woyte ka, Yeessohi bicche sarcho kasoosohti kooban isoodowwaate agarte, weyti nahte.
43006020	I'daasenyi wihi us iyidah, “A ani, roorro akhabina!”
43006021	Abatti la ichehi Yeesso kooban korisso 'doonte. Kooban la chirraas on inti icho isohtaan eleeleen.
43006022	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka, ururi bey aficheki 'diri kajire, saggi chele koobanhoo kalday on intaas ikajireen kase. Toro saggi Yeesso abattitiis kooban ileekorine, i'daasenyi abatti kalday on iiratte laka kaseen.
43006023	Koobanohoo anki ilkerengeetti Tibeeriya kayimiy la yimaateene, inti chele inkoo Kamur Waakh kala'd ilaabe urur fiddiye makaate kayuhum yimaateen.
43006024	Inkoo urur saggi Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba intaas ikajirin kaseen ka, koobano geleene, ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hum irteen, Yeesso yowtaanee.
43006025	Inkoo 'doo'd bey aficheki 'diri ka Yeesso 'hele ka, wihi icho usu worsateen, “Eti ween, at chirroh inta timiy?”
43006026	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rume atin icheeka, atin jeenteti an wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso iyeele mee ani iyowattaan. I'daasenyi jeenteti atin makaate itumheene atin idaragteene ani iyowattaan.
43006027	Gololi dowwa on kheerowo hol iidowina, i'daasenyi gololi ikheerowine 'doo'di yuhum jirtuu tuumman jiro, Ínam Aadam atin siicho hol idowa. I'di tahe Waakkhi Aabbaheene saggi us usu i'doono on igooche.”
43006028	'Doo'd la wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Mehe yeella 'dee Waakh kahamaadinna?”
43006029	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Wihi Waakh atin ka'doono, a atinhi eti us sooerge rummeysattaan.”
43006030	Icho la wihi icho worsateen, “Mehe 'deerka miigti Waakh tusa yeessa 'dee kirummeysanna? Mehe yeessa?
43006031	Aacchinyeteenyo goorat archiiy gololoo manna layadeehe hidaad ka tuhum. I'di liichiiruu, ‘Gololi serey kayimiyye siiche kagolossateen.’ ”
43006032	Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Rume atin icheeka, eti gololi goobi Waakh kayimiy atin siiche Muusa mee. I'daasenyi Aabbahaaya gololi rummaate serey kayamiit atin siicha.
43006033	A mehe gololi Waakh 'doo'd siicho a eti goobi Waakh kayamiite, weeli enenyete harrata jiroti jirtuu imassan siicho.”
43006034	Iche la wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Eti weenoow, golola maan dakkhan nah sii gi'de.”
43006035	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Ani a gololi rummaate jiro lakeelo. Eti tuummane ani iyamiite, ani irummeesti la, a i'doo us jirtuu iankayine ommos jirtuu isubgaan.
43006036	I'daasenyi saggi an orey atin ikiidah u, ‘Atin iagarteene toro la ma irummeysan.’
43006037	“Eti tuummane Aabbaheey dahanteey soogesso ani iyamiit. Anna eti tuummane ani iyimiy jirtuu ma riho.
43006038	I'di tahe an goobi Waakhe kiimiyye, wihi an 'doono menye, i'daasenyi wihi Aabbaheeyki isooerge 'doono, iche yeela.
43006039	Eti isooerge la wihi us 'doono a mehe ya, a anihi 'doo'di us isiiche koo kalday laka ibaabiine, i'daasenyi an ibeenki 'da'ddaboot ka, icho tuumman omoot kasookahcho.
43006040	I'di tahe wihi Aabbaheey 'doono a mehe ya, a usuhi eti ani iarge toro irummeeste tuumman jiroti jirtuu imassan 'helo. Anna ibeenki 'da'ddaboot icho tuumman omoot a kasookahcha.”
43006041	Jeenteti Yeesso, “An a gololi goobi Waakh kayimiy,” iyidah u, 'doo'di Ya'huud nyunnyuwe.
43006042	Wihi icho yidaaheen, “Eta Yeessohi ínam Yuussufe menya? Aabbahiis ichoow abartiis inno ma garanni? Saggoh toolla goobi Waakhe kiimiy iessa?”
43006043	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Wihi an atin iidah akaannyuwina.
43006044	Et ani iyamiit mele, sammata Aabbaheeyki ani isooerge ikakeenin. Anna etaas ibeenki 'da'ddaboot omoot a kasookahcha.
43006045	Khadaaboo eti Waákh íyeyyeedo wihi kachiiran, ‘Weeli enenyet tuumman Waakhe walah abchá.’ Eti tuummane wihi Aabbaheey essi daago toro la wohoo kaabti, ani iyamiit.
43006046	Anihi Waakh kiimiy kalday on menye, et addane Aabbaheey arge mele. Ani kalday on Aabbaheey arge.
43006047	“Rume atin icheeka, eti tuummane ani irummeesti, jiroti jirtuu imassan a khaba.
43006048	Ani la a gololi rummaate jiro lakeelo.
43006049	Aacchinyetiin goorat archiiy hidaad ka gololoo manna layadeehe tuhuyye, toro la a tuunte.
43006050	I'daasenyi gololi goobi Waakh kayamiit, i'di manna mee. Eti tuummane golola goobi Waakh kayamiit yuhum la ma yamuut.
43006051	Ani a gololi rummaate jiro lakeelo goobi Waakh kayamiit. Eti tuummane golola yuhum, jirtuu tuumman a jira. Gololi an eta siicho a sarteeyti an soobahcho, 'dee 'doo'di harrata jiro ka'helo.”
43006052	'Deerka 'doo'daas Ya'huud yeedaas Yeesso ka weyti holloweene, isleeiriireen. Wihi iche isworsatte, “Eta saggoh sartiis inno isiicha inaham?”
43006053	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Rume atin icheeka, sammata atin ínam Aadam sartiis iumhane toro la diiggiis idamin, jiroti rummaat ma khabtaan.
43006054	Eti tuummane sarteey yahame diiggeey la damo, etaas jiroti jirtuu imassan a khaba. Anna eta ibeenki 'da'ddaboot omoot a kasookahcha.
43006055	A mehe sarteey a gololi rummaate, diiggeey la chirri ladame, rumanka rubey nolole ikeena.
43006056	Eti tuummane sarteey yahame diiggeey la damo, goytaaya fiddiya, anna goytiissa fiddiya.
43006057	Aabbaheeyki jiro lakeelo ani isooergate jiro a isiiche. Saggaas u la, eti tuummane sarteey yaham ani laka usú jiro a siicha.
43006058	Maantaka gololi goobi Waakh kayimiy a kane, golola la i'di gololi goorat aacchinyetiin tuhuyye saahka tuunte mee. I'daasenyi eti golola yuhum jirtuu tuumman a jira.”
43006059	Yeesso chirra us waha essi, a chirri us ilkerengeetti Kafarnaa'hum ka, minki weysiite Ya'huud ka enenyet walah abcho.
43006060	'Doo'di ittaawenye Yeesso raaho waha daage wihi us yidah, “Yeeda weyti miigyahe. Ayyo nabah isuda?”
43006061	Yeesso saggi 'doo'di usu raaho waha ka inyunnyuuwo kase, wihi us icho iyidah, “Ahollowina.
43006062	Eemba Ínam Aadam usuhi inti goorat us kijire ikoro a agarteen?
43006063	Rubeyti Waakhe enenyet jiro siissa. Weeli enenyet, enenyet jiro ma siicho. Yeedi an atin icheeke la Rubeyti Waakhe kayamiite, toro la enenyet jiro siicha.
43006064	I'daasenyi gaasiinkoo uliba ma irummeesti.” A mehe Yeesso uus uumaccho ka 'doo'di usu irummeysan ichoow eti 'dub soogoocho a garta.
43006065	Yeesso toro yeed orey iwoye wihi us yidah, “Jeentetaase an mehe atin iidah ya, et ani iyamiit mele sammata Aabbaheey ani isiin.”
43006066	Uus chirraas la, 'doo'di ittaawenye Yeesso raaho Yeesso adah kakhabte, ma raahin.
43006067	Yeesso abattitiisti tomon ichoow lammee wihi us worsate, “Atin laka atinhi adah ikakhabattaane 'doontaan?”
43006068	Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh wihi us ilaabe, “Kamur ayyo addane iiranna? Ati kaldaye yeedi jiroti jirtuu imassan lakeelo khabta.
43006069	Toolla la nah saggi at Ki Munyeenye Waakh kayimiy itahe a rummeysanna toro la a garanna.”
43006070	Yeesso 'deerka wihi us ilaabe, “Ani menya atinha tomon ichoow lammee atin soobahsade? I'daasenyi goytiin ka, etoo a ki Seytaan!”
43006071	Eti us woriis kaayyeedo la a Yuuda Iskaariyoot. Yuuda la a ínam Siimon Iskaariyoot. I'di tahe Yuuda, chirri us abatti Yeessoti tomon ichoow lammee goya kajiro laka, usu berri Yeesso 'dub goocha.
43007001	'Da'ddaboka, Yeesso boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ka, kolba ilkerengeettoo irte. Jeenteti weynaanti Ya'huud ogoos iyowattuu, boroofenhi Ya'huudiya ma iran.
43007002	I'daasenyi maanti yaafohi Ya'huud Daawti Gaayimo Liigelo gelaan a soodowwaatte.
43007003	Walaalinye Yeesso wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Inta katabe boroofenhi Ya'huudiya iro, 'dee abattitaah laka wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane at yeesso a agarto.
43007004	Eti rumanka magah 'doono, wihi us yeelo ma dagcho. Maantaka at wahanyeyyoha a haaggissa gone, tab gi'de enenyet tuumman a kaargo.”
43007005	Walaalinyetiis jeenteti iche usu irummeysanne i'daas itidah.
43007006	Maantaka Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “Ibeenki an irdi uliba a ankhanyahe. Atin la a geeddi atin ibeenki atin 'doontaan on irattaan. A mehe atin ibeen atin leesuuje mele.
43007007	'Doo'di wahanyeyyohi harratane sussuuje raaho walah us atin ka'dii'do mele, i'daasenyi ani a i'dii'da. Wihi us ika'dii'do la, a jeenteti jiti icho kajiraane an cheeko a suuj ikadowo.
43007008	Atin nyaama ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem irda, daawtaas gela. An daawtaas ma irdi. I'di tahe ibeenkeey uliba a ankhanyahe.”
43007009	Inkoo us wahaas yidah ka, boroofenhi Gaalilaaya geeddoor fiddiye.
43007010	Inkoo walaalinyetiis daawtaas iratte ka, Yeesso laka irte. I'daasenyi 'dóo'd ma istusine, dagsi on ka irte.
43007011	Weynaanti Ya'huud la Yeesso daawtaas goyaka yowatte, 'doo'd, “Yeesso mehe agarteen?” idowte.
43007012	Urur goyaka nyunnyuutoti usu miinsan kahte. 'Doo'd gaasoo mehe essa ya, “Us a eti haaggan.” Gaasoo la mehe laabeen ya, “Mele, us enenyete ekkeesta.”
43007013	I'daasenyi etoo kaldaye issoobahcho, runtiis kayeyyeedo ma jiro. I'di tahe 'doo'd tuumman weynaanti Ya'huude karoora.
43007014	Inkoo daaw ukkuriche leeleele ka, Yeesso minki Waakhe buure gele, 'doo'd Yeedi Waakh abinnaan sookhabte.
43007015	Weynaanti Ya'huud, chi'che saggi us 'doo'd walah iabcho daagte ka, weyti girmeysatte, wihi iche worsatte, “Eta injire sukkuul iiran, intoh kharata geeddee ka'hele?”
43007016	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Waha an 'doo'd abcho, yeedeey on menye, a yeedi eti isooergate kayimiy.
43007017	Eti tuummane wihi Waakh 'doono yeelin 'doono, usú waha an atin abcho Waakh kayimaateen ommos usú yeedeey on tahe a abta.
43007018	Eti wihi awtiissa on 'doo'd abcho, magahe isiyowta. I'daasenyi eti magahi eti sooergate koolo i'doono, a eti rummaate, walah khollokkhane usu miinsan mele.
43007019	Muusa amurre ma atin siinna? I'daasenyi etiin amurretaas raaho mele. A i'doh ani ogoos imarantaan?”
43007020	Urur chirraakka wihi us Yeesso ilaabe, “Ati ginna kidakhatta. Ayyo ogoos kimarma?”
43007021	Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Wohoo kaldaye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane yeele, atin tuumman la girmeysatteen.
43007022	Muusa goorat hugunki atin yeeletiin kakhandiitaan a atin siiche. Rumanka hugunka Muusa ma kiimaatan, i'daasenyi aacchinyetiinna kasoouummame. Jeentetaase yeeletiin Seeri Lanaso laka ikhandiitaan.
43007023	Chirri yeele Seeri Lanaso lakhandiyo, 'dee amurre Muusa liijebin, a i'dohe jeenteti an Seeri Lanaso enenyet sartiis tuumman isamaachuu ihollowtaan?
43007024	Taba uurassiin goyaka walah wihi atin kaagartaan kalday ka uskeel iigoonna, jiti fissan ikagoocha.”
43007025	'Doo'doo ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem wihi us yidah, “Us eta, eti weynaane ogoos maranto menya?
43007026	Ulla kalla 'dow kayeyyeeda, weynaanti Ya'huud la walah iche itadeeh mele. Sarka saggi rumanka us Ki Lasubhe iyahe garatta?
43007027	I'daasenyi eta inti us kayimiy a garanna. Ki Lasubhe la maanti us yamiit, et inti us kayamiit garti mele.”
43007028	Yeesso minki Waakhe buure ka 'doo'd walah abche, riire, wihi us yidah, “Atin rumanka eti an ahe ichoow inti an kiimiy a garattaan on a? An ma issooerganne, i'daasenyi ki isooergate a ki rum leh. Atin la usu ma garattaan.
43007029	I'daasenyi an usu a garda, i'di tahe an usu kiimiyye, usu la isooergate.”
43007030	Waha ka 'doo'd Yeesso khaban leheete, i'daasenyi et usu khabte mele. I'di tahe ibeenki liichiire lakhabti, uliba a ankhanyahe.
43007031	I'daasenyi urur goyaka 'doo'di ittaawe Yeesso rummeeste, wihi icho yidaaheen, “Ki Lasubhe maanti us yamiit, wahanyeyyohi ittaawenye miigti Waakh tuso eta yeele kussan a yeela?”
43007032	Farissaayo ururi woriis kanyunnyuwo daagte. 'Deerka kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Farissaayo ba, iskartoo Yeesso khabatti ergeen.
43007033	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “An geeddoor on atin leejira, 'dee yomboka eti isooergate inokhda.
43007034	Atin a iyowattaane, i'daasenyi ma i'hessaan. I'di tahe inti an kajiro ma tamiitiin.”
43007035	Weynaanti Ya'huud isinokhatte wihi iche isworsatte, “Inta us irti, inno usu ika'helin a intoh? Inti 'doo'deen kijiro yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan goya kataasanyahe iche irta yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan wori Waakh abcha?
43007036	Yeeda us, ‘Atin a iyowattaane, ma i'hessaane toro inti an kajiro la ma tamiitiin,’ essi a mehe?”
43007037	Ibeenki weyti khummane 'da'ddaboote daawe massatti ka, Yeesso tolossate riire, wihi us yidah, “Eti tuummane sugub khabo, ani a iyimaate, amba sugub bahchaa.
43007038	I'di Chiirnaanneti Waakh tadeeh u, ‘Eti tuummane ani irummeeste, a i'doo indohi biccheete 'dulo, jiroti jirtuu imassan lakeelo, uuriis kasoobahaan.’”
43007039	Yeesso yeedaas ka la, wihi us woriis kayeyyeedo, a Rubeyti Munyeenye, 'doo'di usu rummeeste soo'helo. Geeddaka uliba Waakh 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste Rubeyta Munyee ma siin. A mehe Yeesso geeddaakka goobi Waakh ka ma laweynaan.
43007040	Urur goyaka 'doo'd gaasoo yeeda daage wihi us yidah, “Eta rumanka, a eti Waákh íyeyyeedo goorat Waakh ayyiche, Waakh, ‘A sooerga,’ yidah.”
43007041	Gaasoo la mehe essaan ya, “Usu a Ki Lasubhe.” I'daasenyi gaasoo mehe worsateen ya, “Ki Lasubhe saggoh boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ikayamiit?
43007042	Chiirnaanneti Waakh, Ki Lasubhe hiiy karnati Dawuud layadeeh ichoow ilkerengeetti Be'deleheeme Dawuud yiille kayamiit ma tadeeh a?”
43007043	Jeente Yeessuu, 'doo'd seley goggowe.
43007044	Gaasoo ichehi khabatti 'doonta, i'daasenyi et khabti mele.
43007045	Chirri iskare nokhatte ka, Farissaayo ichoow kuhaaniyyohi wewween ba wihi icho iskar worsateen, “A i'doh Yeesso isookhaatina?”
43007046	Iskare la wihi iche tidah, “Et injire saggi eta iyeyyeedo nah daagne mele.”
43007047	Farissaayo toro wihi iche iskar itidah, “Atin laka a atin baabiiche?
43007048	Etoo weene ommos Farissaayeenye usú rummeeste a agarteen?
43007049	Mele! I'daasenyi urura amurre Muusa wihichekoo rucchul laka igaran a falanyahe.”
43007050	Etoo Farissaayeenye goycho kajiro Nikodeemo layadeehe goorat 'hor Yeesso iirte la wihi us icho worsate,
43007051	“Amurreteen enenyet geeddi wihi us yeelo liikadaagine toro liikagaran on uskeel igoossa?”
43007052	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Ati laka boroofenhi Gaalilaaya katimiy? Bal Chiirnaanneti Waakh goya tabe, 'dee saggi 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo koo kalday laka injire boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ikiimaatan abo.”
43007053	Ebba 'deerka goobiis irte.
43008001	Uu' tol massate, Yeesso Hali Geeyohi Oolif irte.
43008002	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho baryo ka, toro Yeesso minki Waakhe buure isoonokhte. 'Doo'd tuumman la kasoourure, ulla orronte, 'doo'd walah abche.
43008003	Tagaammeti amurre ichoow Farissaayo ba makhaabassoo ichehi makhaabaloo kiche ieheynan leeu'durto lakhabte sookhaateene, enenyet ortiis keeneen.
43008004	Wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Eti ween, makhaabassa ichehi makhaabaloo kiche ieheynan leeu'durto iche lakhabte.
43008005	Amurre Muusa ka la, oboorrihi i'daase dagahe lakaseya layagiis. At la mehe tadeeh?”
43008006	Icho la jeenteti icho wahaas iworsateen, Yeesso angey gelin 'doonaane 'dee jitoo icho usu kacheektaan khabaan. I'daasenyi Yeesso gulguubsate farriis ka il chirchiire.
43008007	Geedda icho toollaane yeedaas wowworsataan, Yeesso fit tolossate, wihi us iyidah, “Bal etiinki uskeel laa, kolooraat makhaabal dagah a kaseyo.”
43008008	Toro gulguubsate il chirchiire.
43008009	Chirri icho waha daageen ka, icho tuumman seley tabeene, tattakkay ka irteen. Kolooraat la araarrinye iratte, ichoowka Yeesso ichoow makhaabál kalday soo'hadeen.
43008010	Yeesso fit tolossate, wihi us makhaabál worsate, “Weela, 'doo'di kootte kicheekti meeke? Et uskeel kigoocho mele?”
43008011	Makhaabale la wihi iche ilaabte, “Eti weenoow ebba.” Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Annaka uskeel ma kigoocho gon. Tabe, jirotaahti ha'daabeet 'dii.”
43008012	Yeesso toro 'doo'd leeyyeede wihi us iyidah, “An a banayhi harra. Eti tuummane isooraaho, jirtuu mug'di goya ma kaassohti, i'daasenyi banayhi jiro lakeelo siicha.”
43008013	Farissaayo la wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “At toolla awtaahha on kaayyeedda, gartaah rum mee.”
43008014	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri an awteey kaayyeedo laka, wihi an eldi a rum. I'di tahe inti an kiimiy a garda, toro la inti an isohdi a garda. I'daasenyi atin inti an kiimiy ma garattaane, ommos inti an isohdi ma garattaan.
43008015	Atin jiti weeli enenyete walah kagoossaan, ani la et an uskeel igoocho mele.
43008016	I'daasenyi chi' kootte incheenka an 'doo'd hukkumo, jiti an 'doo'd kahukkumo a ki rummaat. A mehe an waha keley ma yeelo, Aabbaheeyki isooerge a ileejira.
43008017	Amurretiin goyaka wihi chiiran, ‘Chirri et lamma garti iche laabto too kalday tahe, aytaas a rum.’
43008018	An rumanka awtaaya kaayyeeda, toro la Aabbaheeyki ani isooerge laka garteey a laaba.”
43008019	'Deerka wihi icho Yeesso worsateen, “Aabbahaah meeke?” Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Atin ani ma igarattaane ommos Aabbaheey laka ma garattaan. Chirri kootte atin ani igarattaan, Aabbaheey laka a garattaan gon.”
43008020	Yeesso inti minki Waakhe buure ka saanduukhi sadakha lakachibo yaal, iche 'doo'd walah kaabche, toro wahaas tuumman keesse. Et usú khabte la mele, a mehe ibeenkiis uliba a ankhanyahee.
43008021	Yeesso toro wihi us icho iyidah, “An a irda, atin la a iyowattaan. I'daasenyi inti an irdi ma tamiitiin. Uskeeliin goya katuuntaan.”
43008022	Jeenteti waha u, ewweenki Ya'huud wihi us isworsate, “A isyagiis? Jeentetaase ‘Inti an irdi, ma tamiitiin,’ iessa?”
43008023	I'daasenyi Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “Atin a ki ilane, anna a ki saraat. Atin a ki harratane, anna ki harrata mee.
43008024	Jeentaase uskeeliin goya katuuntaan atin ikiidah. Chirri atin eti an ahe an atin isoocheeke irummeysan, uskeeliin goya katuuntaan.”
43008025	Iche la wihi iche Yeesso worsatte, “At a ayyo?” Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “An a eti an uus uumaccho ka an atin isoocheeke on.
43008026	Wihi buurenye atin miinsane an adeehe toro atin kahukkumo a jiraan. I'daasenyi eti isooerge a ki rum leh. Anna wihi an usu kadaage on 'doo'di harrata icheeka.”
43008027	Icho la saggi Yeesso wor Aabbahiis ikayeyyeedo ma aban.
43008028	'Deerka wihi us iyidah, “Maanti atin Ínam Aadam massalaaba ka serey geesseen, saggi an etaas iahe, a abattaan. Toro la saggi an wohoo rucchul laka miigteey ka iyeeline, i'daasenyi an wihi Aabbaheey iabche on icheeko a abattaan.
43008029	Ki isooerge la ma ikatabine, a ileejira, i'di tahe an kol tuumman wihi usu kahamaadicho on yeela.”
43008030	'Doo'di buurenye yeeda Yeesso essi daage, Yeesso rummeeste.
43008031	Yeesso wihi us 'doo'di Ya'huude usu rummeeste iyidah, “Chirri atin wori an atin abche khucchissaan, atin rumanka a abattitaaya.
43008032	Runti Waakh a abattaane, runti Waakh la a atin furta.”
43008033	Icho la wihi icho usu ilaabeen, “Nah a nyaakhut nyaakhut Aburaaham, toro et nah injire ifalle mele. Toollaka chirri at, ‘Runti Waakh a atin furta,’ nah idowto, mehe tussa?”
43008034	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rume atin icheeka, eti tuummane uskeel yeelo, a i'doo us bow'dati uskeelaas yitah.
43008035	Bow'da min goyaka inti tichee ma khabto, i'daasenyi inam jirtuu tuumman a ki minkaas on.
43008036	'Deerka chirri Weeli Waakh kifure rumanka a furantahe.
43008037	Saggi atin nyaakhut nyaakhut Aburaaham itahiin a garda. I'daasenyi ogoose imarantaan, i'di tahe wihi an atin abcho ma rummeysattaan.
43008038	Wihi an inti Aabbaheey kajiro ka an arge a atin icheeke. Atin la wihi atin aabbahiin kadaagteen iche yeessaan.”
43008039	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Aburaaham a aabbahaanya.” Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri atin rumanka nyaakhut nyaakhut Aburaaham tahiin, wihi us yeele atin laka a yeessaan.
43008040	Atin la anihi wihi rummaate tuummane an Waakh kadaage atin isoocheeke, iche ogoos imarantaan. Aburaaham injire wihi i'daase ma yeelin.
43008041	Wahanyeyyohi aabbahiin yeele on atin laka yeessaan.” Icho la wihi icho ilaabeen, “Nah i'di nyaakhuti eysing'alaje mee. Aabbahi kaldaye nah khabno a Waakh rubeytiissa.”
43008042	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Chirri kootte Waakh rumanka Aabbahiin yahe, ani a i'doontaan. I'di tahe an Waakhe kiimiyye, toolla la an intane kajira. An awteey u ma imaatane, i'daasenyi usu isooerge.
43008043	Kamalda bal, atin a i'doh wihi an atin idowo matah atin igelin? A jeenteti atin wori an atin idowo atin aban iubaa'dan.
43008044	Atin a nyaakhuti Seytaanki ooyohiine. Wihi us imoono tuumman atin laka yeeline 'doontaan. Uus uumaccho ka us eti 'doo'd bakkicho on eheet. Ulla toro rum a 'dii'da, i'di tahe us injire wihi rummaat ma cheekin. Chirra us yeedi beenaat cheeko la, wahaas eti rumanka us yahe tusaan. Us a eti been lehe, toro la a ooyohi 'doo'di been goocho.
43008045	I'daasenyi an ayti rummaate atin icheeka, jeentetaase ani irummeysawwaayteen.
43008046	Ayyo goytiin ka saggi an rumanka uskeel iyeele tusa? Chirri an rum cheeko a i'doh ani irummeysanna?
43008047	Eti Waakh kayimiy, Yeedi Waakh a dagansata. Atin la Waakh ma kiimaatan gone, jeentetaase ani nabah ikasudiwwaayteen.”
43008048	'Doo'di Ya'huud wihi us Yeesso ilaabe, “Chirri nah, ‘At a yaafohi bi'direnye Saamariya toro la ginna kidakhatta,’ kinidah, nah ma eysiinna?”
43008049	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Ani ginna ma idakhatti. I'daasenyi an Aabbahaaya koolo ikeena, atin la lakhaanyo ikadowtaan.
43008050	An koolo ma isiyowdi, i'daasenyi eti anihi liikoolicho 'doono a jira, ulla a eti jiti rummaat ka enenyet hukkumo.
43008051	Rume atin icheeka, eti tuummane wihi an abcho raaho, jirtuu ma yamuut.”
43008052	Jeenteti waha u, 'doo'di Ya'huud wihi us yidah, “Ya! Toolla saggi rumanka ginna kidakhatti a abanne. Aburaaham a yumuyye, 'doo'di tuummane Waákh íyeyyeedo laka a tuume. I'daasenyi at mehe elatta ya, eti tuummane wihi at abisso raaho jirtuu ma yamuut.
43008053	Aburaahamhi aabbaheenyee a yumuyye, at usu a kaweentahe? 'Doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo laka a tuume, at ayyo iskoogtahe?”
43008054	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri an iskoolicho, koolohaas walah icho ibahaan mele. Eti koolo i'doono a Aabbaheeyki atin a Waakkhiinna elattaan.
43008055	Atin injire usu ma garanne, anna usu a garda. Chirri ani, ‘An usu ma gardi,’ an atin iidah, annaka i'diin u eti been lehe ateeh. I'daasenyi an usu a garda, yeediis la a raaha.
43008056	Aburaahamhi aabbahiine laka, emeetteey weyti kahamaade. Ulla goorat archiiy emeetteey a arge, weyti hamaade.”
43008057	'Doo'di Ya'huud la wihi us Yeesso iyidah “At gu'h tomon chan laka ma eleelinne, toro Aburaaham a agarte?”
43008058	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Rume atin icheeka, geeddi Aburaaham ijirin laka an a jira on.”
43008059	Jeenteti waha u dagah okhsatte, usu saataa. I'daasenyi Yeesso dagte, dagsi ka uranti minki Waakhe buure kabahe.
43009001	Yeesso jit raahaayi, etoo indo laan ladele arge.
43009002	Abatti Yeesso la wihi iche Yeesso worsatte, “Eti ween, eta a i'doh indo laan liidele? Usú uskeel yeele bal 'doo'di dele?”
43009003	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Eta ommos 'doo'di dele mee uskeel yeele. I'daasenyi waha a yitaaheene 'dee jirotiis ka saggi Waakh hil ihaaggicho laarga.
43009004	Geeddi il on maalim yahe, hili Waakkhi isooerge a haagginna. Mug'di la a soogela, ki etoo kalday laka hil ihaaggin.
43009005	Geeddi an harrata on kajiro, an a eti 'doo'di harra banay siicho.”
43009006	Inkoo Yeesso yeeda yidah ka, hanjuf harra katufe, doobbotoo haaggiche, et indo sarche kawelweele.
43009007	Wihi us et iyidah, “Nyaame, ge'dinti Silowaam layadeeh ka fool dikho.” I'da ka mehe leessa ya, “Eti leergate.” 'Deerka et irte, fool dikhte, usuhi il argo soonokhte.
43009008	Ollokkiis ichoow 'doo'di tuummane 'hor usuhi walah daddaaho arge wihi icho worsateen, “Icho eta, eti orran fiddiyo walah daddaaho menya?”
43009009	Gaasoo wihi icho yidaaheen, “Aa, a usu.” Gaasoo wihi icho yidaaheen, “Mele, usu menye, a etoo iyoog on.” I'daasenyi et rubeytiis tirrime, “Aa, a ani!” yidah.
43009010	Icho la ihosseene, “Saggoh 'deerka il iagarte?” idoween.
43009011	Wihi us iyidah, “Eti Yeesso layadeehe doobbotoo haaggiche, indo ikawelweele, ‘Nyaam, ge'dinti Silowaam layadeeh ka fool dikho,’ iyidah. Anna 'deerka irde, fool dikhde, il arge.”
43009012	“Eta intoh kajira?” worsateen. Ulla, “An ma gardi,” iyidah.
43009013	Eti goorat indo laa sookhaateene, Farissaayo ikeeneen.
43009014	Ibeenki Yeesso doobbo haaggiche, eti indo laa samaache la, Seeri Lanaso eheneet.
43009015	Farissaayo toro saggi us il iarge worsatte, ulla wihi us ilaabe, “Et doobbotoo indoheey kawelweele, anna fool dikhde. Toolla la il a arga.”
43009016	Farissaayotoo la wihi iche tidah, “Eti waha yeele Waakh ma kiimaatan, i'di tahe amuri Seeri Lanaso ma raaho.” I'daasenyi gaasoo wihi icho worsateen, “Saggoh eti uskeel leh, wahanyeyyoha miigti Waakh tuso iyeela?” 'Deerka seley goote.
43009017	Farissaayo et toro inokhatte wihi iche itidah, “Et indo a kihaaggiche gone, mehe usu miinsane tadeeh?” Et wihi us ilaabe, “Eta a eti Waákh íyeyyeedo.”
43009018	Weynaanti Ya'huud uliba saggi eta 'hor indo ilaayahe toolla la us il iargo rummeysawwaayte, ichoowka 'doo'di dele waheen.
43009019	Wihi icho worsateen, “Waha a inankiinna? Goorat indo laane desse elattaane, saggoh toolla il iarga?”
43009020	'Doo'di dele wihi us ilaabe, “Saggi us weeleenyo iyahe a garanna, saggi us indo laan idesse laka a garanna.
43009021	I'daasenyi saggi us toolla il iarge ma garanni, ommolla eti indo haaggiche ma garanni. Usu worsada, ullaka a etoo weene, a isiyeyyeedo.”
43009022	'Doo'di dele jeenteti icho waha iyidaaheen, a jeenteti icho weynaanti Ya'huud ikarooraan. I'di tahe weynaane goorat mehe goosse ya, eti tuummane Yeesso a Ki Lasubhe cheeko, minki weysiite Ya'huud a lakabahcha.
43009023	Jeentetaase 'doo'di dele, “Us laka a etoo weene, worsada,” iyidah.
43009024	Koli lammaatteet inokhteene, eti indo laa waheene wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Waakh kooli, eta kisamaache saggi us eti uskeel leh iyahe a garanna.”
43009025	Et wihi us ilaabe, “Uskeel khabyeey ichoow kuus ka ba an ma gardi. Wohoo kalday on garda. An 'hor indo ma khabo, i'daasenyi toolla il a arga.”
43009026	Wihi icho usu worsateen, “I'doh kiyidah? Saggoh indo kihaaggiche?”
43009027	Wihi us ilaabe, “An a atin isoocheeke, atin la ma daagtaan. A i'doh toro daagin i'doontaan? Atin laka sarka atinhi abattitiis tateehiine 'doontaan?”
43009028	Farissaayo et leeabaarrante, wihi iche itidah, “At laka a abattiti etaase, nah la a abatti Muusa!
43009029	Saggi Waakh Muusa ileeyyeede a tissibna, i'daasenyi etaas, inti us kayimiy laka ma garanni.”
43009030	Et la wihi us ilaabe, “Enenne waha a girmo! Atin eta inti us kayimiy ma garattaane, ulla indoheey a ihaaggiche!
43009031	Saggi Waakh 'doo'di uskeel leh nabah ikasudin a garanna. 'Doo'di usú inkaanyito wihi us 'doono yeelo la nabah a isuda.
43009032	Uus goorat harra lasoouume, eti injire eti indo laan desse indo haaggiche ma ladaagin.
43009033	Chirri kootte eta Waakh ikiimaatan, wohoo rucchul laka ma yeelo.”
43009034	Waha ka wihi icho laabeen, “At uskeel goya kadelatte, toro la uskeel goya on kaweynaatte. Saggoh toollaka nah walah nah iabissa?” Khar iseyeen.
43009035	Chirri Yeesso saggi icho et khar ikaseyeen daage ka, irte, etaas yowte, 'hele. Yeesso wihi us et iyidah, “At Ínam Aadam a rummeysatta?”
43009036	Et wihi us iyidah, “Eti ween, chirri at eti us yahe isoocheekte a rummeesda.”
43009037	Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “At toolla usu a agarte. Aniha kileeyyeedo a usu.”
43009038	Et 'deerka wihi us yidah, “Kamur, a kirummeesda.” Et Yeesso wahte.
43009039	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “An harrata a imiyye enenyet hukkuma, 'dee 'doo'di indo laa il arga, ki kol us il argo iskoog la indo waaya.”
43009040	Farissaayotoo intaas kijirte la wihi us essi daagte, wihi iche worsatte, “Nah laka indo laanahe?”
43009041	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri kootte atin indo laatahiin, uskeel atin khabtaan mele. I'daasenyi toolla atin ‘il a agarra,’ elattaan, waha saggi atin uliba uskeel ikajirtaane tusaan.”
43010001	Yeesso wihi us 'doo'd iyidah, “Rume atin icheeka, eti sunki iiyyaat ka arit itabine, i'daasenyi 'dossoo on tabe sum gele, etaas hatto leeyahe, toro la a eti enenyet walah saro.
43010002	Eti arit kagelo a ersinki iiytiissa.
43010003	Eti arit yaakhicho la ersim arite ifaha. Iiye la geeddi ersim iche tuumman magahenyetiche kaawwaho hooyiis a daagta. Ulla toro iiy a tuma, toro iiy ortiche raaha.
43010004	Chirra us iiy tuumman tumo, orcheeda raaha, iiye la 'dubiis raahta, i'di tahe iiye hooyiis a garatta.
43010005	I'daasenyi iiye eti ersinkicho ieheynan ma raahto a kafiridda, i'di tahe hooyiis ma garatti.”
43010006	Yeesso 'doo'd hawweesa icheeke, i'daasenyi 'doo'd wihi hawweesa miinsanyahe ma aban.
43010007	Maantaka Yeesso toro wihi us yidah, “Rume atin icheeka, ani a i'di aritti sunki iiyyaat.
43010008	'Doo'di tuummane orteey yimiy a ki hatto lehe, enenyet walah saro, i'daasenyi iiye icho nabah ma isudin.
43010009	Ani arite, eti tuummane ikasoogelo a lariba. Eta sum a soogela, toro la baha, yaakh yowta.
43010010	Eti walah hato, ogoos ichoow wihi us baabiicho on menye, walah addane us iyamiit mele. An la a imiyye 'dee jiro tuum 'hessaan.
43010011	“Ani a ersinki haaggan. Ersinki haaggan la jeenteti us iiytiis iribo on u, jirotiis a bahcha.
43010012	Eti lakireeste, iiy yaakhime igaranne iiye la tiis ieheynan, chu'us yaay arge, iiy a kataba, firda. Yaaye 'deerka iiy goyaka koo tagiise, iiyti addan la seley baabaata.
43010013	Eti lakireeste iiye tiis mee gone, iiy la aw ma ikhabo gone, a kafirda.
43010014	“An a ersinki haaggan. Iiyteey a garda, iiyteey la a igaratta.
43010015	Saggi Aabbaheey ani igarti, iche ani laka Aabbaheey igarda. Anna jeenteti iiyteey u jiroteey a bahcha.
43010016	'Doo'doo addane i'di iiyteeyenye, woyheey goya ikajirin a jira. Kaas laka a soodowa. Icho laka hooyeey a dagansataane, icho tuumman la i'di woyhoo kaldache ersinkoo kaldach khabo yateehiin.
43010017	Aabbaheey jeenteti us ani i'doono, a jeenteti an jiroteey ibahcho, 'dee toro 'da'ddaboka an omoot ka isookaho.
43010018	Et jiroteey ikabahcho mele, i'daasenyi ani on i'daanu bahcha. Antohi an jiroteey kabahcho a khaba, toro antohi an isikasoolaabo a khaba. Amura Aabbahaaya ka'hele.”
43010019	Yeedaas us yidah ka, 'doo'di Ya'huud toro seley gowe.
43010020	'Doo'd buurtiis mehe essa ya, “Eta ginna dakhatta, a sirgowe. A i'doh idagansattaan?”
43010021	I'daasenyi 'doo'doo addan mehe essa ya, “Waha yeyyeedi eti ginna dakhatti mee. Ginna eti indo laa indo a furta?”
43010022	Maantaas la Daawti Maanti Minki Waakhe Buure Ladikhe lakasoo'helo ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme lakagele. Yeesso laka 'deerka ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem irte. Maantaas la a hayohi il roffo yahe.
43010023	Yeesso la minki Waakhe buure goyaka intoo, Gaayim Soolomon layadeeh iche raaha.
43010024	Weynaantoo Ya'huud Yeesso khaarisse, wihi iche itidah, “Ichoowka maantoh waha nah kadagissa? Cha'at Ki Lasubhe tahe, rum on nah isoocheek.”
43010025	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “An orey on atin isoocheeke, i'daasenyi atin ma irummeysan. Wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane an antohi magah Aabbaheey ka yeelo, eti an ahe cheekaane,
43010026	i'daasenyi atin ma rummeysattaan, a mehe atin 'doo'di i'di iiyteeye mee.
43010027	'Doo'di i'di iiyteeye hooyeey a daaga, anna icho a garda, icho la ani a isooraahaan.
43010028	'Doo'di ani isooraaho la jiroti jirtuu imassanne siicha, icho la jirtuu ma yamuutiin. Et dahanteey ikasaro mele.
43010029	Aabbaheeyki dahanteey soogesse walah tuumman a kaweenyahe, jeentetaas u la, et dahan Aabbaheey kabihin yabuu'd mele.
43010030	Ani ichoow Aabbaheey a koo kalday.”
43010031	Weynaanti Ya'huud toro dagah okhsatte, Yeesso dagah kachibtaa.
43010032	I'daasenyi Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “Anto Aabbaheey ka wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan goytiin ka a yeele. Waha an yeele goyaka, jeenteti kichekoh dagah ka ogoos i'doontaan?”
43010033	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Jeenteti haagga at yeesse mee dagah ikaasaano, i'daasenyi a jeenteti at igafte. I'di tahe at a weeli enenyet one, toro Waakhe iskaayyeessa.”
43010034	Yeesso la wihi us icho ilaabe, “Amurretiin rubeyche ka mehe chiiran ya, ‘Waakh mehe yidah ya, atin a waakkhakh.’
43010035	Saggi atin igarattaan u, Chiirnaanneti Waakh ma luurgiyicho. Chirri 'doo'daas Yeedi Waakh 'hele, ‘waakkhakh’ lakawahe,
43010036	ki Aabbaheey soobahsate kiis kayeesse harrata isooerge la? A i'doh 'deerka cha'an, ‘Ani a Weeli Waakh,’ idah, a gafe ielattaan?
43010037	Chirri an wihi Aabbaheey yeelo iyeelin, iirummeysanna.
43010038	I'daasenyi chirri an wihi Aabbaheey 'doono yeelo toro la atin ani irummeysan laka, wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan rummeesda. I'da ka saggi Aabbaheey goyteey ikijiro anna goytiis ikijiro a abattaan.”
43010039	'Doo'd toro Yeesso khaban leheete, i'daasenyi 'doo'd goya tabe kabahsate.
43010040	Yeesso 'deerka toro nokhte, hawti Yoordan aficheki 'diri goorat Yoohana 'doo'd kabaattissiyo imaahe, intaas fiddiye.
43010041	'Doo'di buure la Yeesso iyimiy. Wihi icho yidaaheen, “Chirri goorat Yoohana wohoo miigti Waakh tuso iyeelin laka, wihi eta miinsane us yidah tuumman a rum.”
43010042	'Doo'di buure la intaakka Yeesso rummeeste.
43011001	Maantooka etoo Laassaro layadeehe ilkerengeetti Be'daaniya yaal khannate. Albehi leeddesse too Maariya tahe too la Maarta tahe laka ilkerengeettaas Be'daaniya yaalliin.
43011002	Maariyata la a ti 'dee Kamur miricchi luhlo kasubahto, tintiche la kahiyyaayto. Maariyatane walaalicheki Laassaro layadeeh khannate.
43011003	Albeha isleedesse, Yeesso farniin i'diiche, “Kamur, aalaahki at weyti 'doonto a khannanyahe,” iyidah.
43011004	Chirri us waha daage ka, Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Khannaata omoot ma kamassati. Khannaata a yateehe 'dee Waakh laweynaacha, 'dee khannaata ka Weeli Waakh laweynaacha.”
43011005	Yeesso la Maarta ichoow walaassicheti Maariya layadeeh ichoow walaalichoki Laassaro layadeeh ba a 'doona.
43011006	I'daasenyi inkoo us farniinkaas 'hele, us saggi Laassaro ikhannanyahe daage laka, Yeesso intaas us kajire ibeen lamma addane fiddiye.
43011007	'Deerka wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Kaha, boroofenhi Ya'huudiya a inokhanni.”
43011008	I'daasenyi abatti wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Eti ween, ibeenneta dow on menya weynaanti Ya'huud dagah kaachibin leheete, kiigaasan leheet? Atihi toro intaas inokhatti 'doonta?”
43011009	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Orrahti maantoo kaldach saha'd tomon ichoow lamma ma khabto? Eti maalim sohti, ma tarraantarrati, i'di tahe etaas eti harrata banay siicho, iche arga.
43011010	Chirri us ibeen sohti a tarraantarrata, a mehe banay ma khabo.”
43011011	Yeesso inkoo us waha yidah ka, wihi us toro iyidah, “Aaleenki Laassaro layadeeh a ur'de, i'daasenyi an irda neybaacha.”
43011012	Abattitiis wihi iche ilaabte, “Kamur, chirri us ur'do 'dee a deefsata on gon.”
43011013	Yeesso la saggi rumanka Laassaro iyumuyye kaayyeeda, i'daasenyi abatti kol us wori ur'dumme on kayeyyeedo koogtahe.
43011014	Yeesso 'deerka abatti ma kaaddaginne, “Laassaro a yumuy,” iyidah.
43011015	“Toro la jeentetiin u, an a hamaada chirri maanti us yumuy an intaas ikajirin. Waha tuumman atine indigir atin ikhabaane, 'dee ani irummeysattaan. I'daasenyi kaaleya usu iiranni.”
43011016	Toomashi Man'daan layadeeh, wihi us abattiti addan iyidah, “Inno tuumman eti ween raahno, 'dee inno tuumman a leetuunno.”
43011017	Chirri Yeesso ilkerengeetti Be'daaniya soogele ka, saggi Laassaro ibeen affar kutte liihawwaale abte.
43011018	Ilkerengeetti Be'daaniya la geeddi kiilomitta seyyahe ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ileejirta.
43011019	'Doo'di Ya'huude ittaawe la a yimiyye Maarta ichoow Maariya uur khoboocheen, jeenteti omoot walaalichuu.
43011020	Chirri Maarta saggi Yeesso isoosohti daagte ka, bahte or kadowte. I'daasenyi Maariya goob ka'hadde.
43011021	Maarta wihi iche Yeesso itidah, “Kamur, kootte at inta kajirte ka, walaaleey ma yamuut!
43011022	I'daasenyi toolla laka saggi wihi tuummane at Waakh daahte Waakh kiyeelo, a garda.”
43011023	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Walaalaah omoot a kasookaha.”
43011024	Maarta wihi iche ilaabte, “Saggi us ibeenki yomboot omoot ikasookaho a garda.”
43011025	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Ani enenyet omoot kasookahcha, toro jiro siicha. Eti tuummane ani irummeeste, chirri us yumuy laka jiro a 'hela.
43011026	Eti tuummane toolla jiro, ani irummeeste la, jirtuu tuumman ma yamuut. At waha a rummeysatta?”
43011027	Iche la wihi iche itidah, “Aa, Kamur, saggi at Ki Lasubhe itahe, at Weeli Waakhe goorat harrata yamiit itahe, a rummeesda.”
43011028	Inkoo Maarta waha tidah ka, nokhatte, walaassicheti Maariya layadeeh 'dol iwahte wihi iche itidah, “Eti Ween kallaaye, ati laka a kiwaha.”
43011029	Inkoo Maariya waha daagte ka, dowwa kahte Yeesso iiratte.
43011030	Yeesso uliba ilkerengeet ma soogeline i'daasenyi inti kootte Maarta ka'hesse on kajira.
43011031	'Doo'di Ya'huude kootte Maariya leejire, uur khoboocho, chirra iche dowwa bahte ka, leebaheen. A mehe kol iche hawwaal iratti kooyto koogyahiin.
43011032	Maariya inti Yeesso kajire sooeleesse, uus iche Yeesso agarte ka, luhlohiis ka jilbo il kagu'dubte, wihi iche tidah, “Kamur, kootte at inta kajirte ka, walaaleey ma yamuut.”
43011033	Chirri Yeesso ichehi ooyto arge ka, 'doo'di Ya'huude leejiro laka usuhi ooyo arge, rubeye weyti uskulaatte, mal gele.
43011034	Wihi us worsate, “Intoh kahawwaasseen?” Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Kamur, kaale agar.”
43011035	Yeesso ooye.
43011036	'Doo'di Ya'huud la wihi us isiyidah, “Bal geeddi us Laassaro 'doono yeya!”
43011037	I'daasenyi gaasoo mehe yidaaheen ya, “Eti indo laa goorat indo a haaggichee, a i'doh, Laassaro omoot ikaholin?”
43011038	Yeesso toro weyti rubeye uskulaatte, hawwaassi go'denye daddaabtoo buure af lakorche hagga irte.
43011039	Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Daddaab bahcha.” I'daasenyi Maartati Laassarohi yumuy leedelatte wihi iche tidah, “Kamur, kola a nuuhe, ibeen affar kutte lahawwaalee.”
43011040	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “An kootte cha'at saggi waha iyateehiin rummeysatte weynaanti Waakh a agarta ma kiidaahan a?”
43011041	Daddaab hawwaal afiche lakabahche. Yeesso 'deerka serey yeye, wihi us yidah, “Aabba, jeenteti at ani idaagtuu, kala'de kisoolaaba.
43011042	Saggi at kol dakkhan idaagto a garda, i'daasenyi jeenteti 'doo'dane waha iadeehe, 'dee icho la saggi at ani isooergatte rummeestaan.”
43011043	Inkoo us waha yidah ka weyti riire, “Laassaro, soobah!” yidah.
43011044	Eti yumuy soobahe. Usuhi dahanohiis ichoow luhlohiis ba darfohi eti yumuy lakaayyuubo kaayyubanyahiin soobahe. Fool laka dafare kayuuban. Yeesso la wihi us 'doo'd iyidah, “Furfura, 'dee a irti.”
43011045	'Doo'di Ya'huude ittaawenye, Maariya bariito yimiy, wihi Yeesso yeele arge, Yeesso rummeeste.
43011046	I'daasenyi gaasichokoo Farissaayo inokhteene, wihi Yeesso yeele icheekeen.
43011047	Kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Farissaayo ba Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud tol iwaheen. Wihi icho worsateen, “Mehe yeello? Bal wahanyeyyoha ittaawenye miigti Waakh tuso eta yeelo yeya!
43011048	Chirri inno usu 'diinne us sagga isossohti, 'doo'd tuumman usu a rummeesta. 'Deerka 'doo'di wewweene ili Rooma yamiite, minkeenki Waakhe buure ichoow yaafteen tuummamba baabiichaan.”
43011049	Koo leejire Kayaafa layadeehe ullaka gu'haas ka kuhaanihi weyti weene sooyeede wihi us yidah, “Wohoo rucchul laka ma garattaan!
43011050	Ichehi yaaf tuumman bakkatti ka, usuhi etoo kalday meessi 'doo'd tuumman kayamuut menya deefto?”
43011051	Ulla waha us yidah, wihi usu kasoouummame mee. I'daasenyi jeenteti us gu'haas ka kuhaanihi weyti ween iyahe, iche wori Waakhe saggi Yeesso meessi yaafohi Ya'huud ikayamuut ikaayyeede.
43011052	Toro la Yeesso jeenteti yaaftaas kalday on ma iyamuute, i'daasenyi jeenteti nyaakhuti Waakhe taasane iyamuute, 'dee 'doo'di harra tuumman isikeena, wohoo kalday kayeela.
43011053	Uus maalinkaas la, weynaanti Ya'huud tossatte, jiti iche Yeesso katagiis yowatte.
43011054	Maantaka Yeesso inti yaafohi Ya'huud kaargaan ma kaassahan. Yeesso intaas katabe, abattitiis khabaayi irte, ilkerengeettoo hidaad haggeenye Efireem layadeeh irte, fiddiye.
43011055	Maanti Daawti Ya'huude Baasakka lahaaggicho soodowwaatte ka, 'doo'di ittaawe ilicho kabahe, ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ikore, daawtichoti Isladikho Baasakka orcheenye gelaanee.
43011056	Icho tuumman la Yeesso yowtaan. Chirri icho minki Waakhe buure yimaateen ka, wihi icho isworsateen, “Atin maanta kol us daawta yamiite koogtahiin?”
43011057	I'daasenyi kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Farissaayo amur bahcheene, chi' etoo inti Yeesso kajiro garti, a soocheeko, 'dee a khabteen.
43012001	Geeddi ibeen lihe ankhantahe 'dee daawti Baasakka sootateeh, Yeesso ilkerengeetti Be'daaniya Laassaro yaal yimiy. Laassaro la, a eti goorat Yeesso omoot kasookahche.
43012002	Yeesso intaas ka gololi gelebeet liikarche. Maarta la icho goollisse. Laassaro 'doo'di Yeesso leegolossate a leejire.
43012003	Maariya 'deerka miricchihoo gato miigenye geeyoo naad layadeeh kalday lakahaaggiche geeddi kiilo nyuusichee khaatte, Yeesso luhlo kasubahte, toro tintiche ka luhlohiis hiyyaayte. Uyuuggi miricchihaas min tuumman leekahe.
43012004	I'daasenyi etoo abatti Yeesseenye, Yuuda Iskaariyoot layadeehe, dowwanoha ka Yeesso 'dub soogoocho 'dii'de wihi us yidah,
43012005	“A i'doh miricchiha liiororinne, 'dee chilimme miskiin liisiin? Chilimmeti eti gu'hoo hil haaggiche laguto iche baha.”
43012006	Jeenteti us miskiino uur ikasoonugleeste mee waha iyidah. Jeenteti us i'daas iyidah, a jeenteti us ugarti chilimme ikhuccho, us chilimme ihato.
43012007	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “'Dii! Iche miricchiha ibeenki ani liihawwaalo iche meel igelissee.
43012008	Miskiin kol dakkhan goytiinna kakhabtaane, i'daasenyi ani kol dakkhan ma ikhabtaan.”
43012009	Ururoo buurenye Ya'huud Yeessohi ilkerengeetti Be'daaniya kajiro daage, intaas yimiy. Icho la jeenteti icho Yeesso iargaan kalday menye, Laassarohi Yeésso omoot kasookahche laka argine yimaateen.
43012010	Kuhaaniyyohi wewween 'deerka jiti icho Laassaro laka kayagiisiin yowteen.
43012011	Waha a jeenteti 'doo'di Ya'huude ittaawe jeente Laassaruu icho ikatabo, Yeesso irummeesti.
43012012	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka, ururi buurenye daawti Baasakka yimiy, saggi Yeesso ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem iyamiit daage.
43012013	Seytohi geeyi baar sookhaateene, baheene, Yeesso or kadoween. Chirra icho or kadowaan la a riiraane, “Waakh a lakoolicho!” “Waakh ki magahi Kamur kayamiit a imaale.” “Waakh Karnati Issiraayel a imaale!” iche essaan.
43012014	Yeesso inkuraarruhoo 'hele kore, i'di liichiiruu,
43012015	“'Doo'di ilkerengeetti Saayon yaal, wohoo rucchul laka akaroorina! Yeya karnatiin kalla, inkuraarru fuulaayi soosohtaa.”
43012016	Abattitiis laka kolooraat waha tuumman ma aban. Inkoo Yeesso goobi Waakh ka laweynaache on iche saggi yeedaas lachiire usu imiinsanyahe, toro wahaas laka usu iyeeleen kaseen.
43012017	Ururi goorat maanti Yeesso Laassaro go'ddi lakahawwaale goya kasoowahe omoot kasookahche leejire, wihi yitah tuumman cheeke.
43012018	'Doo'di buure jeenteti Yeesso waha miigti Waakh tuso iyeele us idaage, iche ibahe Yeesso i'hele.
43012019	Farissaayo 'deerka wihi iche isitidah, “Ma agartaan a, wihi inno yeelin leheet ma yeelloo! 'Doo'd tuumman usu raaha!”
43012020	'Doo'di daawti Baasakka ka irte ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka Waakh wahte, 'doo'doo yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan laka goycho a kijire.
43012021	'Doo'daas la Fiilifhi ilkerengeetti Bessaayda boroofenhi Gaalilaaya kajirto kayimiy iirte, wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Eti ween, nahi Yeesso agarro 'doonna.”
43012022	Fiilif la irte Andereeya icheeke, lammache ba iratte Yeesso icheekte.
43012023	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Saha'ddi Ínam Aadam laweynaacho kola a titah.
43012024	Rume atin icheeka, sammata ilinti 'dargaayye il ikadihine, iche koloo iumaatan, ilintoo on kafiddiita, gurnaan iche desso mele. I'daasenyi chi'iche wohoo yumuy titah, gurnaanki buurenye dessa.
43012025	Eti jiroti awtiis 'doono, jiroti rummaat a waaya. Eti harrata ka jirotiis 'dii'do la, jirotiis jiroti jirtuu imassan a ikaaya.
43012026	Eti tuummane falfateey itaahan 'doono, ani isooraaha. Meelbaaw an irdi ka ileejira. Aabbaheey la eti tuummane hileey haaggicho, usú a weynaacha.
43012027	“Toolla rubeyteey a suujowte, mehe idaahe? ‘Aabbahaaw, saha'dda sinayyoot ikarib,’ iche adeeh? Mele! An jeentetane saha'dda isooeleele.
43012028	Aabba, magahaah weynaay!” Hooyoo 'deerka serey ka sooyeede, mehe yidah ya, “Magaheey a weynaache, toro la a inokhda weynaacha.”
43012029	Ururi intaas toolle hooyaas daage gaasoo, “A guuguh,” esse, gaasoo la, “Hertoo Waakhe leeyyeedda,” esse.
43012030	Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Hooya jeenteteey ma isooyeedine, jeentetiinna isooyeede.
43012031	Ibeenki Waakh 'doo'di harrata hukkumo kola a yitah. Waakh toolla karnati harrata a riha.
43012032	I'daasenyi ani maanti massalaaba ka serey liiokkhicho, weeli enenyet tuumman ankaaya keena.”
43012033	I'dane yidahye, omootti us sooyamuut enenyet tusa.
43012034	Urur la wihi us iyidah, “Amurre Muusa ka, Ki Lasubhe jirtuu tuumman a inno leefiddiya iche daagne. Saggoh 'deerka ‘Ínam Aadam serey a liiokkhicha’ itadeeh? ‘Ínam Aadamha,’ a ayyo?”
43012035	Yeesso la wihi us icho iyidah, “Geeddoo rucchul on banay khabtaan. Banay goya kasohda gi'de, geeddi banay jiraane mug'di ikhaatin. Eti mug'di kasohti, inti us isohti ma garti.
43012036	Anihi banay atin ikeeno, geeddi an atin leejiro irummeesda, 'dee atin laka 'doo'di banay goya kasohti ateeha.” Inkoo Yeesso waha yidah ka, 'doo'd katabe, irte dagte.
43012037	Chirri Yeesso wahanyeyyoha miigti Waakh tuso tuumman geedda 'doo'd leejiro us yeele laka, 'doo'd usu ma rummeysan.
43012038	Wahaas la a yitaaheene 'dee wihi eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Isaaya layadeeh ka lachiire labuuhicha, “Kamur, ayyo wori nah cheekne rummeeste? Ayyo miigti Waakh latuse?”
43012039	Jeenteti icho irummeysawwaayeen la, a jeenteti Isaaya intoo addan ka i'da iyidah,
43012040	“Waakh icho indo a tire, uurassicho la dagahnooche, 'deerka indohicho ka il ma argaane, ommos uurassicho ka walah ma abtaan, ommos ani ma isoonokhtaane 'dee ma samaacho.”
43012041	Isaaya jeenteti us waha iyidah, a jeenteti us weynaanti Kamur iarge, toro wori usu miinsan ikayeyyeede.
43012042	Chirraas weynaanti Ya'huud buurche laka usu a rummeysatte. I'daasenyi jeenteti iche Farissaayo ikaroortuu, saggi iche Yeesso ikakhuufte ma cheekin, minki weysiite Ya'huude lakabahcho iche karoortaa.
43012043	I'di tahe koolohi Waakh icho koolicho menye, koolohi weeli enenyet icho koolicho iche 'doonaan.
43012044	Yeesso riire wihi us yidah, “Eti tuummane ani irummeesti, ani kalday ma irummeesti, i'daasenyi ki ani isooerge laka a rummeesta.
43012045	Eti tuummane ani iargo la, ki ani isooerge laka a arga.
43012046	An i'di banayhi harratane iimiyye, 'dee et ani irummeesti mug'di goya fiddiyo mele.
43012047	“Eti yeedeey daago i'daasenyi iraahin an ma hukkumo. I'di tahe an hukkunnaanki an harra hukkumo ma iimaatan, i'daasenyi ribnaanki 'doo'di harra iimiy.
43012048	Eti ani i'dii'do toro yeedeey ikhaatan, wihi hukkumo a jiraan. Yeedaas an idah rubeytiissa ibeenki yomboot etaas sina igoochá.
43012049	A mehe an antoheey ma kaayyeedin. I'daasenyi Aabbaheeyki isooerge iche amur ibahche, wihi an adeeh ichoow saggi an iadeeh isiiche.
43012050	Anna saggi amuriis jiroti jirtuu imassan ikeeno a garda. Toollaka wihi an eldi tuumman a wihi Aabbaheey dah iyidah on.”
43013001	Geeddi ibeenki daawti Baasakka iitaahan, Yeesso saggi ibeenki us harrata katabo, us Aabbahiis iirti kola iyitah garte. Yeesso la ichoowka maanti jirotiisti harrata soomassatti laka, 'doo'diis a 'doone.
43013002	Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba gololi gelebeete yamhiin. Seytaan la Yuuda Iskaariyoothi inam Siimone mali suujenye us Yeesso 'dub kagoocho orey on rubeytiis gesse.
43013003	Yeesso saggi Aabbahiis walah tuumman dahantiis igesse a garta, saggi us Waakh ikayimiyye us toro Waakh ikanokhti a garta.
43013004	'Deerka kombor kasookahe, dafartiisti oroot duumiche, dafarti chirri ladikhte lakahiyyaayti dabar kahiite.
43013005	Wahaas 'dubicho ka, karaayatoo bicche kachibe, abattitiis luhlo dikhe, dafarti kootte us dabar kahiite ka hiyyaaye.
43013006	Chirri us Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh sooeleele ka, Beetero wihi us iyidah, “Kamur, luhlo idikhta?”
43013007	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Wihi an yeelo toolla wihicho ma abatti, i'daasenyi yomboka a abatta.”
43013008	Beetero la wihi us iyidah, “At koloo kalday laka luhlo ma idikhto.” Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri an luhlo kidikhin, at keey mee.”
43013009	Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh wihi us Yeesso ilaabe, “Kamur, 'deerka luhlo kalday iidikhine, i'daasenyi dahano ichoow matah laka idikh gi'de.”
43013010	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Eti kootte sar tuumman dikhte, yomboka luhlo kalday on dikhta. I'di tahe sartiis tuumman chaafo ma khabto. Buurtiin a dikhantahe, i'daasenyi atin tuumman mee dikhan.”
43013011	A mehe us 'hor on eti 'dub goocho garte, jeentetaase, “Atin tuumman mee dikhan,” iyidah.
43013012	Inkoo Yeesso abattitiis luhlo dikhe, us dafartiisti oroot toro gessate ka, inti kootte us 'hor fiddiye koorronte. Wihi us icho iyidah, “Kamalda bal, wihi toolla an atin iyeele wihicho a abatteen?
43013013	Atin ani, ‘Eti ween,’ ichoow, ‘Kamur,’ menya itadeehiin? Aa! A i'daas on gon. An rumanka a eti weene, toro la a Kamur.
43013014	Anihi Kamuriinenye toro la etiinki weene, toolla luhlo a atin dikhe. Taba gi'de atin laka luhlo isdikha.
43013015	An jit a atin tuse, 'dee atin laka wihi an atin iyeele 'doo'di addan iyeessaan.
43013016	Rume atin icheeka, falfá kamuriche kaween mele, ommos eti ergaanee eti ergate ma kaween.
43013017	Toolla 'deerka atin runta garattaan, a hamaadoo geeddohe cha'atin wihi atin lii'doono yeessaan.
43013018	“Wora an kaayyeedo atin tuumman mee atin miinsanyahe. 'Doo'di rumanka an soobahsade a garda. I'daasenyi Chiirnaanneti Waakhe, ‘Eti ileegolossate on toro chiiy iyitah,’ tadeeh a labuuhicha.
43013019	“Waha geeddi icho iitaahane atin isoocheeka, 'dee maanti icho yitaaheen laka, saggi an eti an ahe, an atin isoocheeke iahe rummeysattaan.
43013020	Rume atin icheeka, eti tuummane eti an sooergade khaatti, ani ikhaatta. Eti ani ikhaatti la, eti isooergate khaattta.”
43013021	Inkoo us waha yidah ka, Yeesso weyti uur suujowe, wihi awtiis miinsan abatti icheeke, wihi us yidah, “Rume atin icheeka, etiinkoo 'dub igoocha.”
43013022	Abattitiis isyeyte, etichoki yeedaas miinsanyahe fooliis waayte.
43013023	Abatti goyaka, etoo kachka Yeesso weyti 'doono, Yeessó garabiissa fiddiya.
43013024	Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh etaas abattee far iooge, wihi us iyidah, “Bal eti us woriis kaayyeedo, eti tahe worsada.”
43013025	Etaas abattee Yeesso kasiihsate wihi us worsate, “Kamur etaas a ayyo?”
43013026	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Etaas, a eti toolla an makaatetoor idiibo inkoo an karam kalug'de.” Yeesso 'deerka makaatetoor karam goya kalug'de, Yuuda Iskaariyoothi inam Siimone iooge.
43013027	Uus Yuuda makaate khaate, Seytaan goytiis gele. Yeesso la wihi us Yuuda iyidah, “Nyaam, wihi at sooyeesso dowwa yeel!”
43013028	I'daasenyi 'doo'di addane leegolossati et jeenteti Yeesso waha iyidah garti mele.
43013029	Yuuda gon chilimme khucchaa, abatti gaasoo kol Yeesso Yuuda ergate, wihi icho daaw ka 'doonaan, “Soogat,” iyidahye, ommos us, “Wohoo miskiin sii,” iyidahye koogyahiin.
43013030	Chirraas on Yuuda makaate khaate, dowwa bahe. Il la a ibeen.
43013031	Inkoo Yuuda bahe ka, Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Toolla Ínam Aadam a laweynaache. Ulla saggi Waakh iweenyahe 'doo'd a tusa.
43013032	Anna chirri an saggi Waakh iweenyahe 'doo'd tuse, Waakh laka saggi Ínam Aadam iweenyahe 'doo'de tusa, toro la dowwa tusa.
43013033	“Nyaakhutaaw, an kola geeddoo rucchul on atin leefiddiya. Atin a iyowattaane, i'daasenyi i'di goorat an yaafohi Ya'huud iidah u, inti an irdi emeet ma tabuu'diin.
43013034	“Amuroo husube atin siicha. Taba is'doona. Saggi an atin i'doone, atin laka saggaas isi'doona.
43013035	Cha'atin is'doontaan, 'doo'd tuumman saggi atin abattiteey itahiin a abta.”
43013036	Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Kamur, at intoh iratta?” Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Toolla inti an irdi ma ileeiratti. I'daasenyi 'dee yomboka a ileeiratta.”
43013037	Beetero la wihi us worsate, “Kamur, an a i'doh toolla kiraahin? An a geeddi an jiroteey laka soobahcho jeentetaah u.”
43013038	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “At rumanka jeenteteey u jirotaah a soobihissa? Rume kisoocheeka, geeddi lukki iriirin, at kol seyyahe ma igaratti tadeeh.”
43014001	Yeesso toro wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Amalalina, Waakh kakhuufa, ani laka ikakhuufa.
43014002	Min Aabbaheey goonanneti ittaawenye khaba. Anna a irda, meel atin iyeela. Chirri kootte waha i'daas ieheynan, ma atin isoocheeko.
43014003	Chirri an irde meel atin iyeele la, a soonokhda, meesseey atin geecha, 'dee inti an kajiro, atin laka kajirtaan.
43014004	Jiti inti an isohdi irti a garattaan.”
43014005	Toomas la wihi us iyidah, “Kamur, inti at isohatti nah ma garanni, saggoh jiti intaas isohti iabanna?”
43014006	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “An a jit, an a rum, an a jiro. Eti ani ileeyimiy on menye, et Aabbaheey iyamiit mele.
43014007	Cha'atin rumanka igaratteen, Aabbaheey laka a garattaan. Uus toolla kakhabatti atin usu a abatteene, toro la a agarteen.”
43014008	Fiilif la wihi us iyidah, “Kamur, bal Aabbahaah nah tus, nah walah addane nah 'doonno mele.”
43014009	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Fiilif, geeddi deere atin tuumman atin leejire, toro ichoow uliba at ma iaban ba? Eti tuummane ani iarge, Aabbaheey a arge. A i'dohe toro, ‘Aabbahaah nah tus,’ ielatta?
43014010	Fiilif, at saggi an Aabbaheey goytiis ifiddiyo, ulla goyteey ifiddiyo ma rummeysatti? Yeeda an eldi ani ma ikiimaatane, Aabbaheeyki goyteey fiddiyo iche waha tuumman yeela.
43014011	Chirra ani, ‘An Aabbaheey goytiissa fiddiya, ulla goytaaya fiddiya,’ atin iidah, irummeesda gi'de. Chirri atin irummeysan, wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane an yeelo ka rummeesda gi'de.
43014012	Rume atin icheeka, eti tuummane ani irummeesti, wihi an yeelo a yeela. Wihi waha kussan laka a yeela, i'di tahe an Aabbahaaya inokhda.
43014013	Anna walahbaaw atin jeenteti atin keey itahiin u daahteen a atin iyeela, 'dee Weeli Waakh Aabbahiis weynaacha.
43014014	Walahbaaw tahe ka, jeenteti atin keey itahiin idaaha anna a atin iyeelaa.
43014015	“Chirri atin i'doontaan, amuri an atin siiche a raahtaan.
43014016	Anna Aabbaheey a daaha, ulla 'Dooggargaartotoo addane jirtuu tuumman atin leejirto atin isooerga.
43014017	Waha a Rubeyti Munyeenye rum leh. 'Doo'di harrata la Rubeyti Munyee ma khaatti. I'di tahe icho Rubeyta Munyee ma argaane, ommos ma gartaan. I'daasenyi atin a garattaan, a mehe Rubeyti Munyee toolla a atin leefiddiita, toro berri goytiinna kijirta.
43014018	Saggi nyaakhuti 'doo'di dele katuume ma atin ikatabo, a atin isoonokhda.
43014019	Geeddoo rucchul ka kola 'doo'di harrata toro ma iargo, i'daasenyi atin a iagartaan. Toro jeenteti an ijiruu, atin laka 'dee jiro a 'hessaan.
43014020	Maantaas saggi ani ichoow Aabbaheey wohoo kalday inahe, atin ichoow ani wohoo kalday inahe, toro la ani ichoow atin wohoo kalday inahe a kassaan.
43014021	Eti i'doono, a ki amurreteey khabti, toro raaho. Eti i'doono la, Aabbaheey laka usú a 'doona, ani laka usu a 'doona, toro la eti an ahe la a tusa.”
43014022	Yuuda 'deerka, kan Yuudahi inam Iskaariyoote menye, wihi us yidah, “Kamur, at a i'doh dowwanoha ka nah isitussa, 'doo'di harrata la isitusiwwaayta?”
43014023	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “Eti tuummane i'doono, wihi an abcho a raaha. Aabbaheey usu a 'doona. Aabbaheey ichoow ani usu a inamiite fureenyo goytiis kayeelanna.
43014024	Eti tuummane ani i'doonin, wihi an abche laka ma raaho. Wihi atin daagteen la weheey menye, Aabbaheeyki isooerge iche kayimaateen.
43014025	“Waha tuumman geeddi an atin leefiddiyo iche atin isoocheeke.
43014026	I'daasenyi Rubeyti Munyeenye 'Dooggargaarto layadeehe, Aabbaheey meesseey ka sooergo, walah tuummane atin abissa, toro la wihi tuummane an atin isoocheeke, atin kasoo'helissa.
43014027	Nebeye atin ikataba. Nebeytaaya atin siicha. Saggi 'doo'di harrata nebey 'doo'd isiicho mee an nebey atin isiicho. Amalalina toro la roorro akhabina.
43014028	“Anihi, ‘A irda toro a atin isoonokhda,’ eldi a daagteen. Chirri atin i'doonteen, jeenteti an Aabbaheey ikiirduu, a hamaaddaan. A mehe Aabbaheey ani a ikaweenyahe.
43014029	Waha tuumman la geeddi icho iitaahane atin icheeke, 'dee 'deerka maanti icho yateehiin rummeysattaan.
43014030	Geeddi deer ma atin leeyyeedo, a mehe karnati harrata a soosohtaa. Us miig ma ikakhabo,
43014031	i'daasenyi 'doo'di harrata saggi an Aabbaheey i'doono an amur Aabbaheey iraaho a abta. “Kaaleya inta a katabno.”
43015001	Yeesso toro wihi us yidah, “An a i'di geeyi sabiibe rummaate, Aabbaheey la a eti gos hil kahaaggicho.
43015002	Aabbaheey la eti tuummane i'di liikhimeet u ani ikatoollo gurnaan idelin, a goocha. Eti tuummane i'di liikhimeet u gurnaan delo la, Aabbaheey mujjume yeela, 'dee gurnaanki buure bahcha.
43015003	Atin la 'hor on wihi an atin abche ka, atin mujjummooche.
43015004	Goyteey fiddiya, anna goytiin a fiddiyo. Liikhime keley gurnaan iche bihisso mele. Chirri iche gurnaan bihisso, a chirri iche geeyi sabiib katolosso on. Atin laka i'daasu, chirri atin goyteey ifiddiyin, walah atin 'duu'ddaan mele.
43015005	“An a i'di geeyi sabiibe, atin la a i'di liikhimohaaya. Eti tuummane goyteey fiddiyo, anna goytiis fiddiyo, gurnaanki buurenye dela. Laanteey walah atin 'duu'ddaan mele.
43015006	Eti tuummane goyteey ifiddiyin, i'di liikhimeet u a laroga, angaga. Liikhimohi i'daase a lasoosuuna, 'dab lakalug'da, laguba.
43015007	Chirri atin goyteey fiddiitaane, yeedeey la goytiin fiddiyo, wihi atin 'doontaan tuumman Aabbaheey a daahtaane, ulla atin siicha.
