43015008	Chirri atin gurnaanki buure bihissaan, saggi atin abattiteey itahiine tussaan. I'da ka la, Aabbaheey a laweynaacha.
43015009	“Saggi Aabbaheey ani i'doono, iche ani laka atin i'doona. Goyteey fiddiya, 'dee ani a atin 'doono gi'de.
43015010	Cha'atin amurreteey raahtaan 'doonintaaya kafiddiitaan, saggi an amurre Aabbaheey iraahe an 'doonintiis ikafiddiyuu.
43015011	“Waha la a atin isoocheeke, 'dee atin laka hamaadi an khabo khabtaane, toro la hamaadiin walah kaankhati mele.
43015012	“Amuri an atin siicho kalla, saggi an atin i'doonuu, taba atin laka is'doona.
43015013	Wihi 'dooninti enenyet aalassiis weyti 'doono tuso kallaayo, a ti us jirotiis jeentetichuu isoobahcho.
43015014	Atin a aalassaaya chirri atin amureey raahtaan.
43015015	“Kola ilbooyye ma atin adeeh, i'di tahe ilbooyye wihi kamuriche haaggicho ma garatti. Aalassaaya atin adeeh. I'di tahe wihi tuummane an Aabbaheey kadaage, a atin isoocheeke.
43015016	Atin ani ma isoobahsan, i'daasenyi ani atin soobahsade, toro hiloo atin korche, 'dee gurnaan bihissaan, gurnaanki fiddiyo bihissaan. 'Deerka jeenteti atin keey itahiin u, Aabbaheey wihi tuummane atin daahtaan, a atin siicha.
43015017	Amurreteey taacheyye, taba gi'de is'doona.
43015018	“Chirri 'doo'di wahanyeyyohi harratane sussuuje raaho atin 'dii'de, saggi icho kolooraat ani i'dii'deen abda.
43015019	Chirri kootte atin i'di 'doo'da harrata tahiin, 'doo'daas a atin 'doona, i'di 'doo'dichuu. Atin 'doo'di harrata menye, i'daasenyi an a atin soobahsade. Jeentetaase 'doo'di harrata atin i'dii'da.
43015020	Wihi an atin iidah kasoo'hela, ‘Falfá kamuriche kaween mele.’ Chirri 'doo'di harrata ani sina iomhicho, atin laka sina a atin omhichaan. Chirri icho wihi an abche raaheen la, wihiin laka a raahaan.
43015021	Waha tuumman la jeenteti atin keey itahiin u, a atin layeela. I'di tahe icho eti ani isooergate ma gartaan.
43015022	“Chirri goorat an iimaatane an icho ileeyyeedin, uskeel lakacheekti mele gon. I'daasenyi toolla uskeelicho ka walah icho laabaan mele.
43015023	Eti tuummane ani inibhaate, Aabbaheéy laka a nibhaate.
43015024	Chirri kootte an goycho ka wihi injire liiyeelin iyeelin, uskeel ma khabaan. I'daasenyi toolla wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane an yeele a argeene, toro Aabbaheey ichoow ani ba a nah nibhaateen.
43015025	I'daasenyi waha toolla a yateehiine, wihi Amurreticho lakachiire labuuhicha, ‘Walah an yeele icho ika'dii'daan mele.’
43015026	“Maanti Rubeyti Munyeenye 'Dooggargaarto layadeehe Aabbaheey katamiit an atin isooergo, Rubeyta Munyeenye rum lehe Aabbaheey katamiit, a atin itamiite, wori ani imiinsan atin icheekta.
43015027	Atin laka woraaya cheektaan. A mehe uu' goorat maanti an hila sookhabde, a ileejirteen.
43016001	“Wahanyeyyoha a atin isoocheeke, uus atin kakhuufnaanki atin ikakhuuftaan ka soodihin.
43016002	Minassi weysiite Ya'huud ka a atin lariha. Ibeen la a yamiit, ki eti atin yagiis tuumman, kol us wihi us yeelo ka Waakh gargaaro koogyahe.
43016003	'Doo'd la waha tuumman a atin yeela, i'di tahe icho Aabbaheey ma gartaane, ani laka ma igartaan.
43016004	Waha la a atin isoocheeka, 'dee chirri maanti icho waha yeelaan yitah ka, wihi an atin iidah kasoo'hessaan. “Waha maanti kolooraate atin abattiteey titaaheen ma atin isoocheekin. I'di tahe an a atin leejiree.
43016005	An kola 'dee eti goorat isooerge inokhda. Etiinkoo kaldaye inti an isohdi worsati la ma jiro.
43016006	Toolla an waha atin isoocheeke la, a bolokhtaan.
43016007	I'daasenyi rume atin icheeka, katabnaanki an atin katabo, a iroonotiinna. I'di tahe chirri an iiran, Rubeyti Munyeenye, 'Dooggargaarto layadeeh, ma atin itamiit. I'daasenyi chirri an irde a atin isooerga.
43016008	Maanti 'Dooggargaartota timiy la, 'doo'di wahanyeyyohi harratane sussuuje raaho saggi malicho baabul iyahe a tussa. Mali icho khabaane fissanoonki Waakh miinsan a baabul. Toro la wihi saggi Waakh 'doo'di harrata 'dee ihukkumo miinsan a baabul.
43016009	Mali icho khabaane uskeel miinsan a baabul, i'di tahe icho ani ma irummeysan.
43016010	Mali icho khabaane fissanoonki Waakh miinsan a baabul, i'di tahe an Aabbahaaya iirda, atin la toro ma iagartaan.
43016011	Mali icho khabaane saggi Waakh 'doo'di harrata 'dee ihukkumo miinsan a baabul, i'di tahe Waakh orey on karnati harrata uskeel igooche.
43016012	“Wihi buurenye an atin isoocheeko a jiraane, i'daasenyi toolla a atin kahulees.
43016013	I'daasenyi maanti Rubeyti Munyeenye rum leh atin itimiy, runti tuummane Waakh katimiy a atin tussa. Rubeyti Munyee la awtiche ma kayeyyeeddo. Wihi iche daagte, ichoow wihi 'dee berri sooyateeh, iche atin isoocheekta.
43016014	Rubeyti Munyee saggane ani iweynaassa, wihi an adeehe sookhaatta, atin isoocheekta.
43016015	Wihi tuummane Aabbaheey khabo, a wahaaya, jeentetaase, Rubeyti Munyee wihi an adeehe sookhaatta, atin isoocheekta atin ikadowa.”
43016016	Yeesso wihi us abattitiis iyidah, “Geeddoor rucchul goyaka ma iagartaane, 'dee yomboka la toro a iagartaan,”
43016017	Abattitiis gaasoo wihi iche isitidah, “Yeesso chirri us, ‘Geeddoor rucchul ka ma iagartaane 'dee yomboka la a iagartaan,’ inno idowo, mehe essa? Toro chirri us, ‘Aabbahaaya iirda,’ inno idowo, mehe essa?
43016018	Waha us, ‘Geeddoor rucchul,’ essi ma garanni. I'da ka mehe essa? Wihi us essi ma garanni.”
43016019	Yeesso saggi iche aytaas worsan i'doonto abte, 'deerka wihi us iyidah, “Atin wihi an, ‘Geeddoor rucchul ka ma igartaane, 'dee yomboka la a iagartaan,’ kiidah, iche isworsattaan?
43016020	Rume atin icheeka, atin a ooytaane, uuwwissaane, i'daasenyi 'doo'di wahanyeyyohi harratane sussuuje raaho a hamaada. Atin a bolokhtaane, i'daasenyi bolokkhiin a luurgiyicha hamaad lakayeela.
43016021	Makhaabassi weel desso a bolokhta a mehe ibeenkiche a yitahyee. I'daasenyi uus weel dessi, sinatiche dabta, hamaadda, jeenteti weeloo harrata ka idessuu.
43016022	Atin ka laka i'daas on tateeh. Toolla a bolokhtaane, i'daasenyi toro a atin arga, atin la weyti hamaaddaane, et hamaadiin atin kakhaato la mele.
43016023	Maantaas walah atin iworsattaan mele. Rume atin icheeka, walahbaaw jeenteti atin keey itahiin u daahteen Aabbaheey a atin siicha.
43016024	Atin ichoowka uliba walah atin jeenteti atin keey itahiin u daahteen mele. Waakh wihi atin 'doontaan daaha a 'hessaane, 'dee hamaadiin la ki buuho iche yateeh.
43016025	“Wihi tuummane an atin isoocheeke, jiti mammaheete atin ikasoocheeke. I'daasenyi ibeen a yateeh, ki an mammah ikayeyyeedine, an wihi Aabbaheey miinsan jiti atin kaabattaan ka an atin isoocheeko.
43016026	Maantaas jeenteti atin keey itahiin u, Aabbaheey walah a daahtaan. Anna 'deerka meessiin ka Aabbaheey walah a atin isoodaaha mee eldi.
43016027	Jeenteti atin ani i'doontaane toro saggi an Waakh ikiimiy irummeysatteen u Aabbaheey a atin 'doona.
43016028	An Aabbahaaya kiimiyye, harrata imiy, toro la harrata a kataba, Aabbaheey inokhda.”
43016029	Abatti Yeesso 'deerka wihi iche tidah, “Toolla mujjume yeyyeedda, mammaho ma kaayyeeddo, wihi tahe on nah siisatta.
43016030	Toolla saggi at walah tuumman igaratti a agarra. At mali weeli enenyet geeddi us walah isooidaahan laka a garatta. Jeentetaas u, saggi at Waakh ikatimiy a rummeysanna.”
43016031	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Kola a irummeysatteen?
43016032	I'daasenyi maane a tamiite kola la a titah, ti atin tuumman seley baabaataane, ebba goobiis irti. Keleye ikatabtaane, i'daasenyi an keley mee, i'di tahe Aabbaheey a ileejira.
43016033	Waha la a atin icheeke, 'dee ani ka nebey 'hessaan. 'Doo'di harrata goyaka sina a atin taham. I'daasenyi roorro akhabina, an harrata a soorichee.”
43017001	Inkoo Yeesso waha yidah ka, serey yeye, Waakh wahte, wihi us yidah, “Aabba, ibeen a yitah. Weelaah weynaay, 'dee Weelaah a kiweynaacho.
43017002	I'di tahe at usu antohi us 'doo'di harra tuumman kaanti a isiisse. Ulla 'dee 'doo'di at kiis kayeesse tuumman, jiroti jirtuu imassan siicha.
43017003	Enenyet la chu'us atihi kaldaye rumanka Waakhe kigarti, toro la Yeesso Kiriistohi at sooergatte garti, wahaas a jiroti jirtuu imassan.
43017004	Hili goorat at dahanoheey soogelisse an massiche ka, harrata ka an a kiweynaache.
43017005	Maantaka Aabbahaaw, weynaanti an geeddi at harra isoouumin kileekhabe ortaah ka iweynaay.
43017006	“'Doo'di at harrata ka soobahsatte at isiisse, eti at tahe a abche. 'Doo'da kaahha eheete, at la ani isiisse. Icho la yeedaah a raaheen.
43017007	Icho la toolla saggi wihi tuummane at isiisse ati ikaayimaateen a gartaan.
43017008	Wori at isiisse iche anna icho siiche, icho la rummeesteen. Icho la saggi an rumanka ati ikaaimiy a gartaane, toro saggi at ani isooeregte laka a rummeestaan.
43017009	“Icho a iweesda. 'Doo'di harra tuumman ma iweesdi, i'daasenyi 'doo'di at isiisse iweesda. I'di tahe icho a wahaahha.
43017010	'Doo'di tuummane an khabo a kaahha, 'doo'di tuummane at khabto la a kaaya. Icho ka la ani a liiweynaache.
43017011	An kola harra ma kasoojiro, i'daasenyi icho uliba harra kajiraan. Aabbaheeyki munyee, miigti magahaahki at isiisse ka, magahaas ka bariiso, 'dee i'di ani ichoow ati ba wohoo kalday inahuu, icho tuumman wohoo kalday a yitaaheen.
43017012	Geeddi goorat an icho leejire, magahaas at isiisse ka, a toorribe bariisde. Ki goorat baabaa liigooche on menye, kichekoo kalday laka ma baabiin, 'dee wihi Chiirnaanneti Waakh ka lachiire labuuhicha.
43017013	“Anna inti at kajirto amiit. I'daasenyi waha geeddi an harrata kajiro adeehe, 'dee saggi an ihamaado, icho laka hamaad rubeyohicho goya buuhicha.
43017014	An woraah a siiche, 'doo'di wahanyeyyohi harratane sussuuje raaho la icho a 'dii'de. I'di tahe icho ki harrata mee, i'di an laka ki harrata ieheynan u.
43017015	Weysiheey ka wihi an kidaaho, atihi icho harrata kabihisso menye, i'daasenyi a atihi Seytaanki uskeel leh kaholisso.
43017016	I'di an laka 'doo'di harrata kichokoo ieheynan u, icho laka ki harrata mee.
43017017	“Runtaah ka icho munya kayeel. Yeedaah a ki rummaat.
43017018	Saggi goorat at ani 'doo'di harrata isooergatte, iche an laka icho 'doo'di harrata iergade.
43017019	Jeentetichuu la, an a ismunyaacha, 'dee icho laka, rumanka lamunyaacha.
43017020	“Icho kalday ma iweesdi, 'doo'di wori icho cheekaan ka ani irummeesti laka a iweesda.
43017021	Aabba, a iweesda, 'dee icho tuumman wohoo kalday yateehiin, saggi ati ichoow ani wohoo kalday inahe, toro la ani ichoow ati wohoo kalday inahuu. Aabba, a iweesda 'dee icho ichoow inno ba wohoo kalday nateehe 'dee 'doo'di harrata saggi at ani isooeregte rummeesta.
43017022	Weynaanti at isiisse iche icho siiche, 'dee icho tuumman wohoo kalday yateehiin, i'di toolla ati ichoow ani ba wohoo kalday inahuu.
43017023	Ani ichoow icho ba a wohoo kaldaye, ati ichoow ani ba la a wohoo kalday. Icho ba tuum wohoo kalday yateehiine, 'dee 'doo'di harrata saggi at ani isooeregte abta, toro la enenyet waha abta, geeddi at i'doonto, geeddaase icho laka 'doonta.
43017024	“Aabbahaaw, at icho ani a isiisse. An la ichohi inti an kajiro icho laka kajiraane, 'deeka weynaanti ati isiisse argaan iche 'doona. Weynaantaas la a ti at isiisse jeenteti at ani geeddi harra liisoouumin laka i'doontuu.
43017025	“Aabbaheeyki fissan, chirri 'doo'di harrata kigaran laka, an a kigarda, 'doo'da la saggi at ani isooeregte a garta.
43017026	Eti at tahe icho a ibabbakkaahiche, toro la oreye isohda weyti eti at tahe ibabbakkaahicha, 'dee 'dooninti at ani ikhabto goycho a kijirto, ani la goycho a kijiro.”
43018001	Inkoo Yeesso weysi massiche ka, abattitiis khabaayi irte, Ankhari Keediroon maaheen. Intaas la gosoo a kajire. Usu ichoow abattitiis ba gosaas goya geleen.
43018002	Eti Yeessó 'dub goocho Yuuda layadeeh la meel a garta. I'di tahe Yeesso ichoow abattitiis ba, geeddi buurenye intaas iska'heleen.
43018003	Yuuda 'deerka iskartoo Rooma ichoow rabittoo minki Waakhe buure yuubisso soowoyaayi yimiyye, gos goya soogele. Kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Farissaayo 'doo'daas sooergaté. 'Doo'd la bir ichoow oorassoo khoro bolkho ichoow taa laka a khabe.
43018004	Yeesso wihi tuummane usu rubeytiis iyateeh a garta gone, orcho yimiyye wihi us worsate, “Ayyo yowattaan?”
43018005	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Yeessohi ilkerengeetti Naasarete yowanna.” Ulla wihi us ilaabe, “A ani gon.” Yuudahi Yeessó 'dub goocho la icho a leetoolla.
43018006	Chirri Yeesso, “A ani gon!” yidah ka, iche tuummamba yombo inokhatte, kufte.
43018007	Yeesso toro inokhte, worsate, “Ayyo yowattaan?” Iche la wihi iche ilaabte “Yeessohi ilkerengeetti Naasarete yowanna.”
43018008	Yeesso la wihi us ilaabe, “A atin isoocheeke, a ani rubeytaaya. Chirri atin ani iyowattaan, reera addan 'diicha a irti.”
43018009	Waha la a yadeehe, 'dee wihi us 'hor yidah buuhicha. Wihi us 'hor yidah la a mehe ya, “Aabbahaaw 'doo'di at dahanteey soogelisse koo kalday laka ma ikabaabiin.”
43018010	Siimonhi Beetero layadeehe birlab khabe la, birlabiis soo'hiire, falfati kuhaanihi weyti ween gu'dde, nabahti miigeet ng'ure. Falfata la Maalkus iche layadeeh.
43018011	Yeesso la wihi us Beetero iyidah, “Birlabaah min ilaab! Kol sinati Aabbaheey isoogooche ani ikawaarine koogtahe?”
43018012	'Deerka koobbinti iskarti Rooma eti iskartaas itoollo khabtaayi ichoow weynaanti Ya'huud Yeesso khabteen. Hidhideene,
43018013	koloo etoo magahiis Aanas layadeeh ikeeneen. Aanas la a seyyoh Kayaafahi gu'haas ka kuhaanihi weyti ween eheet.
43018014	Kayaafa la usú goorat ewweenki Ya'huud waaniche, “A haaggantahe chirri etoo kalday meessi 'doo'd tuumman kayamuut,” idowe.
43018015	Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh ichoow etoo addane ullaka abatti Yeessee, Yeesso raaheen. Kuhaanihi weyti ween la eta addane abatti Yeessee a garta. Etaas abattee Yeesso raahe ichoowka uranti kuhaanihi weyti ween leegele.
43018016	I'daasenyi Beetero arit khariche tolossate. Eta addane abatti Yeesseenye kuhaanihi weyti ween garti yombo inokhte, inantoo ilbooyenye arit yuubisso leeyeede, Beetero uram goya soogesse.
43018017	Inanti arit yuubisso la wihi iche Beetero worsatte, “Ati abattiti etaas kichekoo mee menya?” Wihi us ilaabe, “Ani abattitiis mee.”
43018018	Il a roffo gone, ilbooyye ichoow iskare ba 'hor on 'dab bolkhicheene, kasookhaarteene dahambooteen. Beetero laka irte iskar leetoolossate, 'dabe dahambootaa.
43018019	Chirraakka kuhaanihi weyti ween Yeesso wori abattitiis miinsan ichoow wihi us 'doo'd abcho wowworsate.
43018020	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “An 'doo'd tuumman 'dowe kaleeyyeede. Kol tuumman minassi weysiite Ya'huud ichoow minki Waakhe buurenye 'doo'di Ya'huud iska'helo ka laka 'doo'd wori Waakh a abche. Walah an dagsi ka idah mele.
43018021	Toollaka, a i'dohe iwowworsatta? 'Doo'di idaage ma worsatti? Icho la rumanka wihi an idah a gartaanee.”
43018022	Uus Yeesso waha yidah ka, etoo ullaka iskarti intaas tolossee, Yeesso fodoor gu'dde, wihi us iyidah “Ya! Wahaas a saggoh at kuhaanihi weyti ween yeed ikalaabto?”
43018023	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri an wohoo suuje idah, 'doo'd tuumman icheek. I'daasenyi chirri wihi an idah rum yahiin a i'doh igu'dubte?”
43018024	Yeesso dahano hidanyahaani, Aanas wihi us yidah, “Khaata, Kayaafahi kuhaanihi weyti weene igeecha.”
43018025	Chirra Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh intaas toollo 'dab dahammooti ka, 'doo'doo wihi us worsate, “At laka abattiti etaas kichekoo mee menya?” Ulla 'dii'de, wihi us yidah, “Mele, ani abattitiis mee.”
43018026	Etoo kuhaanihi weyti ween falfatiisenye eti kootte Beetero nabah ng'ure kichee, wihi us iyidah, “An atihi usú gos goyaka leejirto ma kiargin a?”
43018027	Beetero toro yeedaas 'dii'de, chirraas on lukki riire.
43018028	Baryo ka ewweenki Ya'huud Yeesso min Kayaafa kakhaate, minki buurenye gaafanahi Roomee geeche. Ewweenki Ya'huud la minki etaas goya ma gelin, i'di tahe ichohi geeddi icho gololi daawti Baasakka iumhan isbi'dirroocho ma 'doonaan.
43018029	Bilaato 'deerka khar ka isoobahe, “Eta mehe kacheekattaan?” worsate.
43018030	Icho la wihi icho soolaabeen, “Chirri kootte us wohoo suuje iyeelin nah usu inta ma keenno.”
43018031	Bilaato la wihi us iyidah, “Atin rubeytiin khaata, amurretiin ka hukkuma.” Weynaanti Ya'huud la 'dii'dde wihi iche tidah, “Nah antohi nah etoo kalday laka omoot ikagoonno ma khabno.”
43018032	Waha a yitaaheene, 'dee wihi goorat Yeesso yidahye saggi us isooyamuut miinsan labuuhicha.
43018033	Bilaato 'deerka minki buurenye gaafana goya inokhte, Yeesso wahe wihi us worsate, “Karnati Ya'huud a ati?”
43018034	Yeesso la wihi us worsate, “Yeeda ati kaayimiy, bal 'doo'doo addane eti an ahe kisoocheeke?”
43018035	Bilaato wihi us ilaabe, “Kol an Ya'huud ahe koogtahe? Yaaftaah ichoow kuhaaniyyohaahki wewweene dahanteey kisoogesse. At mehe yeesse?”
43018036	Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “Dakheey ki harrata mee. Chirri kootte iche i'daase tahe, abattiteey diho gessa jiti ewweenki Ya'huud ikakhaban yowatta. I'daasenyi toolla antohi an walah kadakhdi intoo addane kayamiitiin.”
43018037	Bilaato wihi us iyidah, “At 'deerka a karnat!” Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Aa, at a eysiisse, cha'at an a karnat tidah! Rumanka ani jeentetaase liidele, toro jeentetaase harrata iimiyye, 'dee rum cheeka. Eti tuummane rum 'doono, a idagansata.”
43018038	Bilaato la wihi us worsate, “Yeedi rummaat a mehe?” Bilaato toro 'doo'di Ya'huud ibahe wihi us iyidah, “An eta walah lakacheekti an argo mele.
43018039	I'daasenyi a hugunkiinna cha'an daawti Baasakka ka etoo hidan atin isoofuro. Anihi ‘Karnati Ya'huud’ soofuro a 'doontaan?”
43018040	Icho la riireene, “Mele, usu mee! Barraba nah sii!” yidaaheen. Barraba la goorat 'doo'doo sirgaal 'dii'do goya kijire.
43019001	Bilaato 'deerka, “Yeesso a lakhaato, laajja ka a lajaho,” yidah.
43019002	Iskare la 'duuboo kudaheet iskayuubte matah Yeesso korisse, dafartoo muggee laka i'di karnat u gelisse.
43019003	Iskare isoononnokhatte, “Karnati Ya'huudoow, jiroti deer 'hel,” idoddowte, toro la fodoorre jajjahte.
43019004	Bilaato toro koloo addan urur isoobahe, wihi us iyidah, “Yeya, kharane isoobahcha atin ikeena, 'dee saggi wohoo rucchule lakahukkumo an ikaargin agartaan.”
43019005	Chirri Yeesso 'duubi kudaheet ichoow dafarti muggee khabaayi khar isoobahe ka, Bilaato wihi us 'doo'd iyidah, “Et kalla!”
43019006	Uus kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow iskarti minki Waakhe buure yaakhisso Yeesso agarte ka, riirte, “Massalaaba kakaah! Massalaaba kakaah!” tidah. I'daasenyi Bilaato wihi us ilaabe, “Atin khaata massalaaba kakaaha. Ani ka walah lakacheekti an argo mele.”
43019007	Weynaanti Ya'huud tirriinsatte wihi iche tidah, “Nah amuri eti i'dee a layigaase yadeeh a khabna. A mehe us, ‘Aní Weeli Waakhe,’ iche essa.”
43019008	Chirri Bilaato saggi Yeesso Weeli Waakh isikawahe daage ka, geeddi kootteet 'dirihiis roorro gesse.
43019009	Minki buurenye gaafana goya inokhte, Yeesso, “Intoh katimiy?” worsate. I'daasenyi Yeesso walah us laabe mele.
43019010	Bilaato la wihi us Yeesso iyidah, “At ani ma ileeyyeeddo? Saggi an antohi an kaafuro ikhabo ommos antohi an massalaaba kaakaaho ikhabo ma kasso?”
43019011	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Waakh on anto kisiiche menye, at anto at ikakhabto mele. Maantaka eti dahanohaah igesse, uskeeli us khabo kaah laka a kuta.”
43019012	Chirri Bilaato waha daage ka, jiti us Yeesso kafuro yowte. I'daasenyi weynaanti Ya'huud riirte wihi iche tidah, “Chirri at eta soofurte, at aali karnati ili Rooma mee! Eti tuummane karnat iskawaho karnati ili Rooma tirrima.”
43019013	Chirri Bilaato yeeda daage ka, Yeesso khaate, khar ibahche, inti 'doo'd lakahukkumo, “Orotti dagaheet,” layadeeh keene. Magaha afi Ibiraaniya ka la Gabaa'da layadeeh.
43019014	Saha'd tomon ichoow lammati chirdeereet, Ibeenki Latannabti daawti Baasakka orchee, Bilaato wihi us 'doo'di Ya'huud iyidah, “Karnatiin kalla!”
43019015	I'daasenyi riireene, “Agiis, agiis! Massalaaba kakaah,” yidaaheen. Bilaato toro wihi us worsate, “Anihi karnatiin massalaaba kakaaho 'doontaan?” Kuhaaniyyohi wewween wihi icho ilaabeen, “Kaaysar on menye, karnat addane nah khabno mele.”
43019016	'Da'ddaboka Bilaato Yeesso dahanohicho gesse, 'dee massalaaba a kakaaheen. Iskare 'deerka Yeesso khaatte.
43019017	Yeesso massalaabatiis si'daayi bahe. Meessoo Meessi Lafohi Matahe Enenyet layadeeh irte. Meessa la afi Ibiraaniya ka a Golgoo'da.
43019018	Inta ka massalaaba kakaaheen. Reeroo lammee laka Yeesso leekaaheen. Kooba Yeesso ankiiskoo lakakaahe, Yeesso la dahcho lakakaahe.
43019019	Bilaato la amuri baawatoo lachiiro, massalaaba Yeesso sarche lakaloo'dicho bahche. Wihi lakachiire la a mehe ya,
43019020	'Doo'di ittaawenye Ya'huud la chiirnaannetaas soome, i'di tahe meessi Yeesso massalaaba lakakaahe, ilkerengeet ma kadeer. Wihi baawa kachiiran la afi Ibiraaniya ichoow afi 'Deylaan ichoow afi Giriige lakachiire.
43019021	Kuhaaniyyohi wewween la wihi icho Bilaato iyidaaheen, “ ‘Karnati Ya'huud’ akachiirine, i'daasenyi eta, ‘An a karnati Ya'huud,’ iche isyadeeh, kachiir.”
43019022	Bilaato wihi us ilaabe, “Wihi an chiire, koloo kalday laka ma luurgiyicho.”
43019023	Inkoo iskare Yeesso massalaaba kakaahte ka, gaaddiisti saraat et affar ka gisante. Dafartiisti goyaatteet la a dafartoo kaldache ma tolan la.
43019024	Iskare wihi iche isitidah, “Uus inno khakkharadinne, kaaleya kura a igu'dubno, eti khaatti a agarro!” Waha la a yitaaheene, 'dee Chiirnaanneti Waakhe i'da tadeeh labuuhicha, “Darfoheey a gismeene, toro la dafarteeyti goyaatteet kura igu'ddeen.” Wihi iskare yeesse 'deerka a wahaas.
43019025	'Doo'di massalaaba Yeesso hagga toolle a abartiis ichoow iingotiis ichoow Maariyati makhaabál Kiiliyoobaase ichoow Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala.
43019026	Yeesso abartiis ichoow eti us abattitiis goyaka weyti 'doono ichohi intaas toollo arge. Yeesso wihi us abartiis iyidah, “Abartaay, eta inankaah kayeelo.”
43019027	Etaas abattitiise la wihi us iyidah, “Eta, makhaabassa abartaah kayeelo.” Uus maalinkaas la, eta abattee Maariya khaate goobiis geeche.
43019028	Yeesso chirraakka saggi wihi goorat yateeh tuumman iyitaaheen garte. Ulla saggi us wihi Chiirnaanneti Waakh tadeeh ibuuhichuu, wihi us yidah, “An a subgaade.”
43019029	'Dirihoo farsoti sabiibe birrakhe kijirto la intaas a kajire. 'Deerka haaruggoo farso goya kalug'deene, haaruggaas kho'doonkoo deer kachuukheene, Yeesso ioogeene, af gesseen.
43019030	Chirri us farsota surrukhe ka Yeesso wihi us yidah, “Walah tuumman a massateen.” Wahaas ka matah soolug'de, rubey gooche.
43019031	Ibeenki Latannabti kola a yitah. Ibeenki kaas sooraaho la, a Seeri Lanaso weyti khumman. Weynaanti Ya'huud la sarti Seeri Lanaso massalaaba kajirto ma 'doonto. Bilaato amuri luhlo lakaajjebcho 'dee sar lasooyagcho daaheen.
43019032	Iskare 'deerka timiyye, 'doo'di kootte Yeesso laleekaahe ki oraat ichoow ki addan ba luhlo jejjebisse.
43019033	I'daasenyi chirri iche Yeesso sooeleesse ka, saggi us iyumuy agarte, luhlohiis ma jejjebin.
43019034	Etoo iskareet toor ka Yeesso waaru 'hune, diig ichoow bicche kasookhubteen.
43019035	Eti waha arge, ayti rummaate cheeke, 'dee atin laka Yeesso rummeysattaan. Wihi us cheeke la beene ma kijirto, ulla saggi us rumanka wihi rummaat icheeko, a garta.
43019036	Waha la a yitaaheene, 'dee wihi Chiirnaanneti Waakh ka lachiire labuuhicha, “Laftiistoo kalday laka ma lajebcho.”
43019037	Toro la i'di chiirnaankoo addan Chiirnaanneti Waakh goyaka yadeeh u, “'Doo'd eti icho toor ka 'huneen a 'dey'doocha.”
43019038	Yomboka etoo Yuussuf layadeehe ilkerengeetti Arima'daaya kayimiy, irte Bilaato sar Yeesso daahe. Yuussuf la dagsi ka abatti Yeesso eheet, jeenteti us weynaanti Ya'huud ikarooruu. Amuri Bilaato siiche ka, yimiyye sar Yeesso khaate.
43019039	Eti leejire la, a Nikodeemohi goorat orey Yeesso ibeen iyimiyye, leeyyeede. Nikodeemo uyuuggetoo geeddi kiilo tomon seyyahe sookhaate. Uyuuggetaas la, miricchihoo ichoow abahti geeyoo miir layadeehe islakachibe.
43019040	Lammache ba sar Yeesso khaatte, uyuugge kachibeene goonanneti darfoot leeyuubte. Waha ichoow hugunki yaafohi Ya'huud ka saggi eti yumuy il liikalaabo a israahaan.
43019041	Inti Yeesso lakakaahe, gosoo a kajire, gosaas goya la go'ddoo lakhute, enenyet injire liikahawwaalin a kajira.
43019042	Waha yaafohi Ya'huud ka a Ibeenki Latannabti gone, go'd la a soodowyahe gone, Yeesso go'ddaas kahawwaaleen.
43020001	Baryoti boorane ibeenki oraate teebataas ka, Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala go'ddi Yeesso lakahawwaale ijedde, saggi daddaab meel afiche liikabahche agarte.
43020002	'Deerka Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh ichoow eti ullaka abatteenye Yeesso weyti 'doono isoonyaante wihi iche itidah, “Kamur go'd goya a lakabahche, inti lagesse la ma garanni.”
43020003	'Deerka Beetero ichoow eti abatteenye addan ba anki go'd tabeen.
43020004	Abatti lammache ba a oriita, i'daasenyi eti addan Beetero kelee luh ka'hele, go'd orey eleele.
43020005	Go'd kagulguubsate, goya yeye, darfo kalday arge, i'daasenyi go'd goya ma gelin.
43020006	'Dubiis ka Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh yimiy. Ulla a yiri'd one go'd goya gele, darfohi meel yaal arge.
43020007	Dafarti Yeesso matah kayuyyuubneet laka ichehi layuyyuube intoo keley taal arge.
43020008	'Da'ddaboka eti abatteenye kootte go'd orey eleele laka goya gele, arge rummeeste.
43020009	Icho uliba Chiirnaanneti Waakh ka saggi Yeesso omoot ikasookaho ma garan.
43020010	Abatti lammache ba 'deerka goobassicho inokhatte.
43020011	I'daasenyi Maariya go'd khariche tolossatte ooyte. Ooytaayi gulguubsatte, go'd goya yeyte.
43020012	Herti Waakhe lammeenye gaaddi daddakhan khabto inti sar Yeesso tiil fiddiito, agarte. Hertaas Waakh la too, inti matah kijire iche fiddiita, too la inti luhlo kajireene fiddiita.
43020013	Herti Waakh wihi iche Maariya worsatte, “Weela a i'doh iooyta?” Maariya la wihi iche tidah, “Sar Kamuraaya lakhaate, inti lagesse la ma gardi!”
43020014	Waha ka urgiite, Yeessohi intaas toollo agarte. I'daasenyi saggi us Yeesso iyahe ma kasin.
43020015	Yeesso la wihi usu iyidah, “Weela a i'doh iooyta? Ayyo yowatta?” Iche la kol eta ki gos hil kahaaggicho yahe koogtahe, wihi iche tidah, “Eti ween, chirri at sartiis khaatte, inti at gelisse isoocheeke, a irdi a sookhaato.”
43020016	Yeesso wihi usu iyidah, “Maariya.” Iche la urgiite, riirte afi Ibiraaniya ka “Rabbooni,” tidah. Ayta chi' lalaabe a eti ween.
43020017	Yeesso chirraakka wihi us iyidah, “Iikhaban, i'di tahe an uliba Aabbaheey ma inokhan. Nyaame, 'doo'di irummeeste iiro, saggi an eti Aabbaheeyenye toro icho laka Aabbahichee ikanokhdi, icheek. Ulla a Waakkhaaya, toro la a Waakkhichooda.”
43020018	Maariyati ilkerengeetti Magdaala wora abatti ileeiratte, “An Kamur a arge!” Toro saggi us wahaas ikiidah abatti icheekte.
43020019	Gelebti ibeenki oraate teebataas ka, abatti kulante. Minkoo goya iskahidde, i'di tahe weynaanti Ya'huude karoortaa. I'daasenyi Yeesso goycho tolossate, “Nebeytiin ma furatti,” iyidah.
43020020	Inkoo us waha yidah ka, dahanohiis ichoow waaru ba tuse. Abatti uus iche Kamur agarte ka, weyti hamaadde.
43020021	Yeesso toro wihi us iyidah, “Nebeytiin ma furatti! Saggi Aabbaheey ani isooerge, iche an laka atin ierga.”
43020022	Wahaas ka neebsi kaafuufe, wihi us yidah, “Rubeyti Munyee 'hela.
43020023	Chirri atin 'doo'd uskeel ikakutteen, Waakh rumanka 'doo'daas uskeel a ikakuta. Chirri atin 'doo'd uskeel ikakutin la, Waakh laka 'doo'daas uskeel ma ikakuto.”
43020024	Toomashi abattiti tomon ichoow lammee kichokoowenye, duddunkiis Man'daan layadeeh chirri Yeesso abatti isoobahe intaas ma kajirin.
43020025	Abattiti addan 'deerka wihi iche Toomas itidah, “Nah Kamur a agarre.” I'daasenyi Toomas wihi us icho iyidah, “Sammata an gumaarreti dahanohiis kajirto an iargine, an farreey inti goorat ussumaar laka'hune an igelinne, dahanteey la inti waaru ka 'hunan an igelin, ma rummeesdi.”
43020026	Inkoo teebatoo toro kutte ka, abatti toro minkoo goyaka kulante. Toomas laka a leejire. Afaf a hidanyahiine, i'daasenyi Yeesso goycho sootolossate, wihi us iyidah, “Nebeytiin ma furatti.”
43020027	'Deerka wihi us Toomas iyidah, “Farraah gumaara geliche, dahanoheey la agar, dahantaah la keene, waaruheey geli. Iikamalaline saggi an omoot ikasookahe rummeyso.”
43020028	Toomas chirraakka, “Ati a Kamuraaya, toro la a Waakkhaaya,” iyidah.
43020029	Yeesso chirraakka wihi us iyidah, “At jeenteti at ani iagarte iche irummeysatte? Waakh 'doo'di ani iargine irummeeste, a imaala.”
43020030	Geedda Yeesso abattitiis leejiro, wihi ittaawenye miigti Waakh tuso buugga goya liikachiirin iche yeele.
43020031	I'daasenyi waha a lachiire, 'dee saggi Yeesso rumanka Ki Lasubhe iyahe, us Weeli Waakh iyahe, rummeysattaan. Kakhuufnaanki atin usu kakhuuftaan ka la jiroti jirtuu imassanne khabtaan.
43021001	Inkoo ibeennetoo kutte ka, Yeesso toro abattitiis Beyti Buurenye Tibeeriya afiche ka isoobahe. Wihi yitah la kallaayo.
43021002	Abatti Yeessoti isleejirte a Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh ichoow Toomashi magahiiski addan Man'dáan layadeeh ichoow Na'daanayelhi boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ka ilkerengeetti Kaana kayimiy ichoow yeele Sebedaayo ichoow abattitoo addane lammee.
43021003	Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh wihi us abattiti addan iyidah, “An a irda, bahag sookhabda.” Abattiti addan la, “Nah laka a kiraahna,” itidah. 'Deerka bahte kooban korte, i'daasenyi ibeenkaas bahag iche khabatte mele.
43021004	Chirra orrahe sookorto ka, Yeesso bey afiche sootolossate, i'daasenyi abatti saggi us Yeesso iyahe ma garan.
43021005	Yeesso chirraakka wihi us abatti iyidah, “Era, walah bahagenye atin khabatteen mele?” Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Walah nah khabanne mele.”
43021006	Ulla wihi us iyidah, “Oroohti atin bahag kakhabattaan, kooban ankichoki miigeet ka bicche goya iseya, bahag a 'hessaanee.” Uus iche i'daas yeesse, bahaggi buure khabatte, ichoowka oroohti iche kooban goya isoojiitto laka agaafatte.
43021007	Eti abatti goyaka Yeesso weyti 'doono la wihi us Beetero iyidah, “Waha a Kamureenna alah.” Chirri Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh saggi wahaas Kamur iyahe daage ka, dafartiisti oroot dabar kahiite. I'di tahe kootte a bahchee. 'Deerka bicche goya kadihe.
43021008	Abattiti addan la oroohti bahag buuho khabtaayi, kooban ka bey afiche timiy. A mehe icho bey afiche ma kadeerneynane, geeddi mitta kudoo on bey afiche ileejireen.
43021009	Chirri iche bey afiche eleesse ka, see'ddi bolokhto bahag fuulo agarte. Makaate laka intaas a kajirte.
43021010	Yeesso wihi us abatti iyidah, “Bahaggi atin sookhabatteen goyaka, gaasoo sookhaata.”
43021011	Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh kooban kore, oroohti bahaggi burbuure buuho soojiite. Bahaggi icho 'heleen a bahag kudoo ichoow tomon chan ichoow bahag seyyah. I'daasenyi chi' bahag burbuur eheet laka, oroohe ma goggowin ba.
43021012	Yeesso wihi us icho iyidah, “Kaaleya golossada.” Abatti goyaka, et, “At a ayyo?” worsati mele. Saggi us Kamur iyahe a garteen.
43021013	Yeesso toro makaate khaate, abatti idiibe, bahag laka toro i'daas on yeele.
43021014	Waha la a koli seyyahnaatteete Yeesso inkoo us omoot kasookahe, abattitiis isoobahe.
43021015	Inkoo icho golossateen ka, Yeesso wihi us Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh iyidah, “Siimon, ínam Yoohana, at geeddi abattita addan i'doonto, 'dirihiche weyti a i'doonta?” Ulla, “Aa, Kamur, ati rubeytaah saggi an ki'doono a garatta,” iyidah. Yeesso la wihi us iyidah, “'Doo'deeyki i'di makhassi iiyyaate goolli gi'de.”
43021016	Yeesso toro koli lammaatteet inokhte, wihi us iyidah, “Siimon, ínam Yoohana, at rumanka a i'doonta?” Wihi us ilaabe, “Aa, Kamur, at saggi an ki'doono a garatta.” Yeesso wihi us iyidah, “'Doo'deeyki i'di iiyteeye yaakhi gi'de.”
43021017	Koli seyyahnaatteet Yeesso toro inokhte, wihi us iyidah, “Siimon, ínam Yoohana, at rumanka a i'doonta?” Beetero jeenteti Yeesso kol seyyah, “At a i'doonta?” iworsatuu, fool ribowe, wihi us iyidah, “Kamur, at walah dakkhan a garatta. Saggi an ki'doono la a garatta!” Yeesso wihi us iyidah “Tab gi'de, 'doo'deeyki i'di iiyteeye goolli.”
43021018	Yeesso toro wihi us iyidah, “Rume kisoocheeka, maanti goorat at nugussahe, a sookahta, darfo gessatta, meessi at iran 'doonto tuumman iratta. I'daasenyi maanti at araarrowte, dahanohaah a oogta, etoo addan la gaad kigessa, inti at iran i'doonin kigeecha.”
43021019	Yeeda Yeesso yidah mehe tusa ya, omootti Beetero yamuute, 'dee omoottiis ka Waakh laweynaacho. 'Deerka Yeesso wihi us Beetero iyidah, “Kaale, abattiteey ateeh.”
43021020	Beetero urgiye, etoo ullaka abatteenye 'dubicho sooraaho arge. Eta a ki goorat Yeesso weyti 'doono, maanti goorat Yeesso gololi 'da'ddaboot abatti leeyuhum, Yeesso garabiis fiddiye, Yeesso kasiihsate, “Kamur, eti 'dub kigoocho a ayyo?” worsate.
43021021	Beetero chirri us arge ka, wihi us Yeesso worsate, “Kamur, eta la mehe layeela?”
43021022	Yeesso wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri an usuhi ichoowka maanti an soonokhdi jiro 'doono, wahaas ati walah icho kiyahiin mele. At kaale abattiteey ateeh!”
43021023	Jeentetaas u woraas leessi 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste goya kataa'he. Wihi icho esseen a mehe ya, “Eta abattee ma yamuut.” I'daasenyi Yeesso ma yamuut ma idaahane, wihi us yidah a mehe ya, “Chirri an usuhi ichoowka maanti an soonokhdi jiro 'doono, wahaas ati walah icho kiyahiin mele.”
43021024	Eti abatteenye waha runticho garti, cheeko, toro la chiire, a kan. Saggi wihi us yidah rum iyahiin la a garanna.
43021025	Yeesso wohoo addane ittaawe laka a yeele. Chirri kootte wahaas tuumman lachiire, imurchoteey ka, harra tuumman laka, buuggassi wahaas tuumman lakachiire, meel iche gelisso mele.
44001001	'Deyoofilohaaya, khadaabeeyki oraat ka, an wihi noole Yeesso yeele ichoow wihi us enenyet abche,
44001002	ichoowka ibeenki goobi Waakh lageeche, iche kisoochiire. Geeddi serey liigeen, Rubeyti Munyee ka 'doo'di us soobahsate us ergaanotiis kayeesse, amurre ibahche.
44001003	Inkoo sina lakawaariche us reera a isoobahe, jitassi ittaawe ka saggi us rumanka ijiro tuse. Geeddi ibeen tomon affar icho a isoobahe, wori dakhi Waakh miinsan kaleeyyeede.
44001004	Maantoo leegolossataayi amurane ibahche, “Ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem akabihina, i'daasenyi siinti goorat Aabbaheey atin iayyiche, an woriche kaayyeedo atin daagteen suga.
44001005	A mehe Yoohana enenyet bicche kabaattissiye, i'daasenyi maanassa, Rubeyti Munyee ka a atin labaattissiya.”
44001006	Saahka maanti icho kulmeen ka wihi icho usu worsateen, “Kamur, antohi yaafohi Issiraayel harraticho kaantaan maanassa on toro ilaabta?”
44001007	Yeesso la icho mehe iyidah ya, “Aabbaheey antohiissa on ka maan ichoow chirri walah dakkhan yateehiin gooche. Atin mee maanti icho yateehiin abattaan.
44001008	I'daasenyi maanti Rubeyti Munyee atin isooyagte, miig a 'hessaane, atin la weheeyki atin garattaan cheektaan. Ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka ichoow boroofenneti Ya'huudiya ichoow ti Saamariya ka ichoow harra tuumman ka cheektaan.”
44001009	Inkoo us yeedaas yidah ka, iche 'dey'doossaayi, Yeesso serey liikorche, mirisoo la icho kadagche.
44001010	Geedda us serey irti, sereye 'dey'doochaan. Chirraas on reeroo lammeenye darfohoo daddakhan khabo garabicho sootolossate.
44001011	“Era atinha boroofenhi Gaalilaaya!” yidah, “A i'doh itolossaane serey i'dey'doossaan? Yeessoha atin lakakhaate serey lageeche, saggaas atin iagartaane us serey iirti on isoonokhta.”
44001012	Ergaano 'deerka Hali Geeyohi Oolif kakhubatte, ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem inokhatte. Halaas la Yeerusaleem ka a geeddi kiilomittatoo kalday.
44001013	Chi'icho sooeleeleen ka, inti minki saraate iche maanassaas fiddiito ikorte. Ichehi intaas fiddiito a Beetero ichoow Yoohana ichoow Yaakoobo ichoow Andereeya ichoow Fiilif ichoow Toomas ichoow Bar'dolomaayo ichoow Mattaayo ichoow inam Alfaayoki Yaakoobo layadeeh ichoow Siimonhi Yaaftiis'doone layadeeh ichoow inam Yaakooboki Yuuda layadeeh.
44001014	Ichohaas tuumman, ichoow oboorrihoo addan ichoow Maariyati abar Yeessee, ichoow walaalinye Yeesso ba kol tuumman a sooururaane Waakh isleewahtaan.
44001015	Inkoo ibeennetoo kutte ka, 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste soourure. Icho tuumman la a geeddi et kudoo ichoow tomon lamma. Beetero la kahe yeede,
44001016	wihi us yidah, “'Doo'd Kiriistokaaw, wihi massan Chiirnaanneti Waakhe Rubeyti Munyee Dawuud afiis leekeente, Yuudahi 'doo'di Yeesso khabti soowoye miinsan a labuuhicha.
44001017	Us a keenyokoowe hila Waakh a nah kaleejire.”
44001018	Yuuda kala'ddi us jiti khollokkhan ka'hele ka gosoo soogatte. Gosaas goya on ka soodihe, uur desme, mindakharo tuumman sookhubteen.
44001019	Enenyeti ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem kijiro tuumman daage, gosaas magah ibahcheene aficho ka Akeldaama yidaaheen. I'daakka la mehe leessa ya, “Gosi Diig.”
44001020	Beetero wihi us yidah, “A mehe buuggi Sabuur ka wihi chiiran, “ ‘Goobiis ba a baabo, uus etoo kalday laka jirin.’ Wihi addane chiiran, “ ‘Etoo addan ba meessiisti weynaaneet gela.’
44001021	Maantaka wihi massan, etoo geeddi Kamureenki Yeessee nah leefiddiye tuumman nah leejire soobihinno.
44001022	Eti uus maanti Yoohana enenyet baattissiyo sookhabte ichoowka maanti Yeesso nah lakakhaate serey lageeche nah leejire a eheetti. A mehe a nah isookhaya 'dee garti saggi Yeesso omoot liikasookahche nah leecheeka.”
44001023	'Deerka et lamma magahenye waheen. Yuussufhi Barsabba layadeehe magahiiskoo Yaasto layadeeh ichoow Mattiyas.
44001024	'Deerka Waakh wahteen, “Kamur, ati uurassi enenyet tuumman a garatta. Maantaka 'doo'da lammatiis ki at soobahsatte,
44001025	'dee hila Waakhe ergaano gelo nah tus. Waha la a meessi Yuuda kabahe, ulla inti imasse irtee.”
44001026	'Deerka magah lammataas ka kura gu'ddeen. Eti 'hele a Mattiyase, 'deerka ergaanoti tomon ichoow koowe ikhaye.
44002001	Ibeenki daawti Beentekos soomarte ka, 'doo'd Kiriisto tuumman intoo kalday kasoourure.
44002002	Koloo kalday on riiriitoo i'di hafari buure iyeedo goobi Waakh kayimiyye, minki kootte icho goya fiddiyaan tuumman buuhiche.
44002003	Wohoo i'di 'dabi bolkhee argeen. Wahaas la seley goggoweene, yimaateene, eti intaas kijire tuumman koorronteen.
44002004	Icho tuumman Rubeyti Munyee buuhisse, saggi Rubeyti Munyee igargaartuu la afi icho idaagin kaayyeedin sookhabteen.
44002005	'Doo'di Ya'huude Waákh karooro ilal tuumman kayimiy la, ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem a kajira.
44002006	Chirri icho hooyaas daageen ka urureen. Jeenteti ebba 'doo'd Kiriistoki aficho kaayyeedo idaaguu girmeesteen.
44002007	Weyti girmeesteene wihi icho isworsateen, “'Doo'da tuummane yeyyeedo 'doo'di boroofenhi Gaalilaaya menya?
44002008	'Deerka saggoh eteenyo ba saggi icho afi ilassi nah kadelanne ikaayyeedaan idaagna?
44002009	Bal yaafohi inno nahe yeya, yaafti Baa'diya ichoow ti Meediya ichoow ti Eelam ichoow ti ili Messabotaamiya ichoow ti ili Ya'huudiya ichoow ti ili Kabadookiya ichoow ti ili Boontus ichoow ti boroofenhi Aassiya,
44002010	ichoow ti Furiijiya ichoow ti Bambiiliya ichoow ti Miissiri ichoow yaafti ili Kureene haggeenye Liibiya layadeeh ichoow martiti ilkerengeetohi Rooma katimiy. Martitaas gaasoo
44002011	a 'doo'di Ya'huud ichoow ki wihi Ya'huud wahti iurgiye. Gaaseenyokoo laka Kireete ichoow ili Araabo kayimiy. I'daasenyi nah ichohi girmohi Waakh yeele afeenyo ka cheeko a daagna!”
44002012	Iche tuumman girmeysatte il fooliis waayte, “Iche waha a mehe?” isworsatte.
44002013	I'daasenyi enenyet gaasiiskoo a kachaarta, “'Doo'da farsoti sabiibe buurenye khaatte!” iche essa.
44002014	'Deerka Beetero ergaanoti addane tomon ichoow koowe khabaayi tolossate riire, wihi us urur iyidah, “Yaafteeyti Ya'huud, ichoow atinhi ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem taalliin tuumman, alleya waha a atin idowdowo. Wihi an eldi mujjum nabah isuda.
44002015	'Doo'da farso mee khaatte, i'di maanta atin ielattaan u, a mehe il toolla a saha'd seyyahti chirdeereet on.
44002016	I'daas menye, waha atin agarteen a wihi goorat eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Yoowel layadeeh cheeke,
44002017	“ ‘Ibeenneti 'da'ddaboot, iche Waakh essa, Rubeyteey weeli enenyet tuumman a kakhuba. Yeeletiin ichoow albehiin wori Waakh a kaayyeedaan. Mejeliinki nunnugul fooltabcho a arga. Mejeliinki araarrinyee issilloyyo issilloota.
44002018	Falfayyoheey, wihi mejele ichoow wihi deyyah laka maanassaas Rubeyteey a isookhuba, woreey kaayyeedaan.
44002019	Inti saraat ka an girmo yeela, harra ka wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso yeela, diig a khubta, 'dab ichoow uunki buure la harra ka kahaan.
44002020	Geeddi ibeenki Kamure khummane toro girmee iitaahan, orrah a luurgiyicha mug'di tateehe, yeyyah laka gu'duutta koo diige yateeh.
44002021	Eti tuummane, magahi Kamur waho la a lariba.’ ”
44002022	Beetero toro wihi us yidah, “'Doo'di Issiraayeloow, bal yeeda nabah isuda! Waakh Yeessohi Naasaret ka wihi weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan ichoow girmo ichoow wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso a atin tuse. I'daakka Yeesso rumanka antohi Waakh khabo a atin tuse. Atin la wahaas a garattaan.
44002023	Waakh saggi goorat us igooche us 'hor igartuu, Yeesso dahanohiin a soogesse. Atin la gargaari 'doo'di uskeel leh ka usu massalaaba kakaahteene tigaaseen.
44002024	I'daasenyi Waakh usu omoot a kasookahche, bolokkhi omooteet kasoofure, a mehe omoote usu jeyin ma tabuu'd.
44002025	Wihi usu miinsane karnati Dawuud layadeeh yidah, “ ‘An kol dakkhan Kamur ortaaya kaarga. Jeenteti us garabeey itoolluu, walah isesseehicho mele.
44002026	'Deerka an uureey ka weyti hamaada, harrabeey laka weyti Waakh koolicha. Sarteey laka khajjeel a khabta.
44002027	A mehe meessi 'doo'di tuume kijiro goya ma ikatabto, ommos Falfataahti Munyee ma 'diisso ma suusahto.
44002028	Jiti jiro lakeelo a itusse, cha'an ortaah toollo la weyti ikahamaadissa.’
44002029	“Yaafeey, wihi aacchiheenki karnatenye Dawuud layadeeh miinsan roorro laane atin abcha. Dawuud a yumuyye, lahawwaale. Kaassintiis la ichoow uliba intane inno kaleejirta.
44002030	I'daasenyi us eti Waákh íyeyyeedo eheete, ayyinti Waakh usu daato ka igooche 'dee eti hiiyyiise komborti antoot gesso a garte.
44002031	Dawuud wihi berri Waakh yeelo iche arge. Saggi Ki Lasubhe omoot liikasookahcho cheeke. Usu i'di 'doo'di tuumuu meessi 'doo'di tuume kijiro goya ma lakatabine, ommos sartiis ma suusahin.
44002032	Waakh Yeessoha omoot a kasookahche, nah tuumman la gartaas a laabna.
44002033	A laweynaache, Waakh anki dahantiisti miigeet loorrommiche. Waakkhi Aabbahiise Rubeyti Munyeenye us ayyiche ka'hele. Waha buurenye toolla atin agarteene toro la daagteen tuumman la, Rubeyti Munyeenye kayamiitiin.
44002034	A mehe Dawuud goobi Waakh ma ikorine, i'daasenyi wihi us yidah, “ ‘Waakkhi Kamure wihi us Kamureey iyidah, “Dabankeeyki miigeete antoot orrommo,
44002035	ichoowka chiiytaah tuum dahanohaah a soogesso.” ’
44002036	“Maantaka 'doo'di Issiraayel tuumman, waha a abti gi'de! Waakh rumanka Yeessoha atin massalaaba kakaahteen, a soobahsate, Kamur ichoow Ki Lasubhe kayeele!”
44002037	Enenyet uus yeedaas daage, yeed rumanka khaniine, wihi us Beetero ichoow ergaanoti addan worsate, “Yaafeey mehe yeello?”
44002038	Beetero la wihi us ilaabe, “Etiimba uskeeliis a kasoonokhti, antohi magah Yeesso Kiriisto ka a atin labaattissiyo, 'dee Waakh uskeeliin a atin ikakuto. Waakh la 'dee siinti Rubeyti Munyee a atin siicho.
44002039	Ayyintaas atin ichoow nyaakhutiin ichoow enenyeti fogaat ichoow ebbaaw addane Kamuri Waakkheene soowahti iche miinsantahe.”
44002040	Beetero toro enenyet yeedassoo addane ittaawenye i'daase katootooche. Toro hawwaaste wihi us iyidah, “Taba 'doo'di wey'dane uskeel leh iskariba.”
44002041	'Doo'di yeediis khaatte labaattissiye. Maalinkaas 'doo'di ururicho isookhaye, a geeddi et elif seyyah.
44002042	Icho kol tuumman wihi ergaano abisse raaheene toro kulankoo kalday isleekhabeen. Icho ichoow 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste ba isleegolossateene, toro Waakh isleewahteen.
44002043	Ergaano girmo ichoow wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso haaggisse, enenyet tuumman la roorro gesse.
44002044	'Doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste tuumman mujjum isleefiddiye, wihi icho khabeen tuumman laka isleegismeen.
44002045	'Doo'daas hoolahicho ichoow meehichooda ororicheene, ebba geeddi sinatiis tahe u, chilimme lasiiche.
44002046	Orrahti sookorto tuumman, uranti minki Waakhe buurenye isikayamiitiine Waakh wahtaan. Toro goobassicho ka, uuri haaggan ka isleegolossataane, hamaadaane,
44002047	Waakh koolichaan. 'Doo'd tuumman la icho jilhaate. Maan dakkhan la Kamur 'doo'di us ribo a ikasookhaye.
44003001	Maantoo, geeddi saha'd saagaassi maalimeete lakaweesti ka, Beetero ichoow Yoohana minki Waakhe buurenye i'dulaan.
44003002	Etoo uus goorat desse luhlo laa la a jire. Eta maan tuumman a lasoosi'da, aritti minki Waakhe buure ka Aritti Haaggan layadeeh loorrommicha eti gelo tuumman walah daaha.
44003003	Et chirri us Beetero ichoow Yoohanahi minki Waakhe buure gelin leheet arge ka, chilimme daahe.
44003004	Beetero ichoow Yoohana et indo kakhabteen. Beetero la wihi us et iyidah, “Bal nah sooyey!”
44003005	Et la, chi' wohoo lasiicho koogyahe, 'doo'd yeye.
44003006	Beetero 'deerka et iiyeyye, “Walah chilimenye an khabo mele, i'daasenyi wihi an khabo kisiicha. Antohi magah Yeesso Kiriistohi Naasaret ka, kahe soho!”
44003007	Ét dahanti miigeet sookhabte, samacchaar sootololiche, chirraas on et luhlo haagsateene, miigoween.
44003008	Serey isoonyaame, tolossate, sohte. Reér raahe minki Waakhe buure leegele. Geeddaas tuummane us sohti la hamaad ka sereye inyannyaama, Waakh koolicha.
44003009	Enenyet tuumman la usuhi sohti Waakh koolicho arge.
44003010	Chirri icho saggi us eti orran luhlo laaye, minki Waakhe buure ka Aritti Haaggan fiddiyo walah daaho iyahe argeen ka, wihi et kayitah weyti kagirmeesteene roorro gesse.
44003011	Et Beetero ichoow Yoohana kadage. Enenyet tuumman la girmeeste ankaas isooryeene, inti icho toollaane, Oosim Soolomon layadeeh isooryeen.
44003012	Beetero chirri us waha arge ka wihi us 'doo'd iyidah, “Mejeli Issiraayeloow a i'doh waha ikagirmeysattaan? A i'doh i'duu nah iyeytaan? Kol nah miigteenyo on ka ommos nah weyti Waakh kahamaadinno eta samaanne akoogeynana.
44003013	Waakh Aburaaham ichoow Isakh ichoow Yaakoobo ichoow Waakh aacchinyeteenna Yeessohi falfatiise weynaache. Atin la Yeesso dahanohi chiiyeet gelisseene layigis. Chirri Bilaato soofurin gooche laka, atin Bilaato ortiis ka us keenyo menye tidaaheen.
44003014	Atin Eti Munyeenye toro Fissan a 'dii'ddeene, etoo dubunuunu enenyet yigisye atin liisoofuro daahteen.
44003015	Atin ki jiro kasoouummanto a tigaaseene, i'daasenyi Waakh omoot a kasookahche. Nah la gartaas a laabna.
44003016	Kakhuufnaanki nah antohi magah Yeesso kakhuufno ka, eta orran dakkhan atin wihiis garattaane, toolla la agartaan, a lasamaache. Magah Yeesso ichoow kakhuufnaanki usu kayamiit, iche eta tuum samaache, saggi atin tuumman iagartaan u.
44003017	“Toollaka yaafeey saggi atin ichoow weynaantiin garawwaayyo ka wahaas iyeesseen a garda.
44003018	I'daasenyi Waakh saggane wihi us 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo tuumman orey cheeke ka ibuuhiche. Wihi icho orey cheekeen la a Lasubhehiiski sina lakawaaricho.
44003019	Uskeeliin kasoonokhda, Waakh iurgiya, 'dee uskeeliin a lahiyyaayo, 'dee Kamur a atin imaalo,
44003020	'dee Ki Lasubhe us atin isoobahche a atin isooergo, kaas la a Yeesso.
44003021	I'di goorat archiiy Waakh 'doo'diiski munyeenye usú íyeyyeedo ka cheekuu, wihi Waakh gooche, Yeesso goobi Waakhe fiddiya ichoowka ibeenki Waakh walah tuumman husubnaacho yateeh.
44003022	I'di tahe Muusa mehe yidah ya, ‘Kamuri Waakkhiine etoo yaaftiinenye i'deey u Waákh íyeyyeedo a atin isooerga. Atin la taba wihi us atin idowo tuumman nabah isuda.
44003023	Eti tuummane etaas Waákh íyeyyeedo idagansan, 'doo'di Waakhe goya lakabahcha, labaabiicha.’
44003024	“'Doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo tuumman uus Saamuwel kasookhabatte ichoowka ki 'dubiis sooraahe tuumman, wihi maanassa yitah a kaayyeede toro orey on cheeke.
44003025	Atin a yeeleti 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo toro a yeeleti ayyinti Waakh aacchinyetiin igooche mu'dan. Waakh Aburaaham mehe iyidah ya, ‘Hiiyyaah ka, 'doo'di harra tuumman a imaala.’
44003026	Maanti Waakh falfatiis sooerge, kolooraat atine atin isooerge, 'dee ebba jitiiski suuje kasoolaaba. Waakh saggaase atin ikamaale.”
44004001	Beetero ichoow Yoohana enenyet leeyyeedaani, kuhaaniyyo ichoow Sadukaayo ichoow eti iskarti minki Waakhe buure yaakhisso iween, yimaateen.
44004002	Jeenteti ergaano 'doo'd walah iabisso iche saggi Yeesso omoot ikasookahe toro 'doo'di tuume omoot a kasookaha icheektuu icho weyti holloween.
44004003	Beetero ichoow Yoohana khabatte, jeela gelisse, saahta leesugte, il a gelebnowe gone.
44004004	I'daasenyi 'doo'di ittaawenye yeedicho daage, Yeesso rummeeste. Tiri 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste geeddi elif chan yitah.
44004005	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka makhaaballeti Ya'huude wewween ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud ichoow tagaammeti amurre ba ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka tossatte.
44004006	Kuhaanihi weyti weene Aanas layadeeh ichoow Kayaafa ichoow Yoohana ichoow Alekisaanda ichoow minki kuhaaniyyohi weyti wewween dakkhamba leh makhaaballetaas khabaani is'heleen.
44004007	Beetero ichoow Yoohana orcho a lakeeno yidaaheene, 'deerka waha wowworsateen, “Miig eyya ommos antohi magah eyya waha kayeesseen?”
44004008	'Deerka Beeterohi Rubeyti Munyee buuhisse yeed laabe mehe yidah ya, “Makhaaballeti Ya'huude wewweenoow ichoow ewweenki Ya'huudoow,
44004009	wihi maalinka nah lakahukkumo, a haaggi nah uuri 'dabakhe ka eta goorat luhlo laa nah tusne. Ichoow toro saggi liisamaache iche nah laworsata.
44004010	Toollaka atin ichoow 'doo'di Issiraayel tuumman waha abda gi'de! Eta toolla feyyate, miigowe, ortiin toollo, antohi magah Yeesso Kiriistohi Naasarete goorat atin massalaaba kakaahteene atin tigaaseene i'daasenyi Waakh omoot kasookahche iche kasamaate.
44004011	Yeessoha, “ ‘A daakki atinhi minan dissaan 'dii'ddeene, usu tirrinki dagaheet min tiiro yitah.’
44004012	Ribnaanki enenyet et addane laka'helo mele. A mehe magahoo addane Waakh harra tuumman ka inno karibo ma jiro.”
44004013	Chirri icho Yoohana ichoow Beeterohi roorro laan yeyyeedo argeene toro saggi icho 'doo'di walah garti iyahiin kaseen ka weyti girmeesteen. Saggi goorat icho Yeesso ileejireen kaseen.
44004014	I'daasenyi eti lasamaache garabicho toollo a argeen gone, walah icho laabaan mele.
44004015	'Deerka Beetero illeh amur liibahche inti Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud katossatti kabahte, hawwoosse.
44004016	“'Doo'da i'doh nidaahe?” isworsatte. “'Doo'di Yeerusaleem yaal tuumman saggi icho girmohi buurenye miigti Waakh tuso iyeeleen a garta. Inno rubeyteen la sag inno i'dii'dno mele.
44004017	I'daasenyi saggoo 'dee yeeda toro weyti itaa'hin u, 'doo'da tootoonno, ‘Toro maantoo addan magah Yeesso akayeyyeedina,’ inidaahe.”
44004018	'Deerka reér toro min goya iwahte, amur ibihisse uus iche maantoo addan magah Yeesso kaayyeedine ommos yeediis laka enenyet abin.
44004019	I'daasenyi Beetero ichoow Yoohana la wihi icho ilaabeen, “Bal wihi Waakh nah ka'doono isigoocha, nahi aytiin raahno bal nahi ayti Waakh raahno.
44004020	I'di tahe wihi nah agarre ichoow wihi nah daagne leegammadin ma nabuu'd.”
44004021	Jaldaabe weyti yeedi kootteet katirriinsatte tootoosse 'deerka soo'diisse. Sinati icho ergaano igoochaan waayeen, a mehe enenyet tuumman jeenteti wihi yitah u Waakhe koolicha.
44004022	A mehe eta luhlo laaye wihi weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dan ka lasamaache, gu'h tomon affar af khabto, iche khaba.
44004023	Beetero ichoow Yoohana uus lasoo'diiche, 'doo'dichoki addan iirteene wihi kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud kaleeyyeedde 'doo'd icheekte.
44004024	Uus icho daageen ka, icho tuummamba Waakh isleewahteene, wihi icho yidaaheen, “Kamuri Miig Tuumman Leh, ati wihi serey ichoow harra ichoow beyohi burbuure goya kajiro tuumman soouunte!
44004025	Ati Rubeyti Munyee ka af aacchiheenyoki Dawuud layadeehe falfataahe ka a yeedde, “ ‘'Doo'di Waakh igaran a i'doh weyti hol ikhaba? Yaafoha a i'doh 'duul imaalaane toro marah isoonokhtaan?
44004026	Karnatohi harra tuumman 'duul a sookahcheen, weynaane la a tossatte, Waakkhi Kamure ichoow Lasubhehiis 'dii'deen.’
44004027	Rumanka 'Herood ichoow Boontiyo Bilaato ichoow yaafohi Ya'huud ichoow yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan ba ilkerengeetta ka a kulmeene, 'dee saggi icho Yeessohi falfataahenye munyeenye at subahte itirrimaan goocheen.
44004028	Wihi sooyateehe at 'doonintaah ichoow miigtaah ka orey goosse yeeleen.
44004029	Maantaka, Kamuraanyaaw waha 'doo'da nah idowo daage falfayyohaah uur miigooche yeedaah roorro laan a cheekeen.
44004030	Antohi magah Yeessohi falfataahti munyee ka, dahantaah sooge enenyet samaache, wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso ichoow girmo yeel.”
44004031	Inkoo icho weesteen ka, meessi kootte icho kijiraan sesseehte. Rubeyti Munyee la icho tuumman buuhisse, Yeedi Waakh roorro laan cheekeen.
44004032	'Doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste tuumman uuricho ichoow malicho a koo kalday. Et, “Waha a wahaaya, waha weheey mee,” yadeeh mele. I'daasenyi wihicho tuumman a isleegismeen.
44004033	Ergaano miigti buurenye Waakh siiche kaayyeedde, saggi Yeessohi Kamure omoot ikasookahe enenyet icheekte. Waakh la icho tuumman haaggiiski buure kaankube.
44004034	'Doo'daas isleefiddiyo tuumman eticho sina khabe mele. I'di tahe kolba etichoki gos khabo ommos min khabo, a ororicha, chilimme
44004035	ergaano ikeena. Ebba la chilimme geeddi sinatiis tahe lasiicha.
44004036	'Doo'd goytiis ka etoo Yuussuf layadeehe, goob Laaweenye ullaka ili Kuuburo layadeeh kadesse, a jire. Magahi ergaano usu ibihisse la a Barnaba. I'daas ka la mehe leessa ya, eti enenyet uur miigoocho.
44004037	Eta laka gosiis ororiche, chilimme sookhaate, ergaano ikeene.
44005001	Etoo Anaaniya layadeeh makhaabassiisti Saffiira layadeeh khabaayi gosiiskoo ororiche.
44005002	Chilimme gaasoo laabte, i'daasenyi wihi addan ergaano ikeene. Arantiis laka a leeogtahe.
44005003	Beetero la mehe iyidah ya, “Anaaniya, saggoh Seytaan uuraah ibuuhiche, ichoowka Rubeyti Munyee been ikagoosse, chilimmeti gosaah bahe gaasoo ilaabatte?
44005004	Gosaas geeddi at iororin kaahha on menya? Inkoo at ororisse la chilimme dahantaahha on menya kijirte? Mehe mali i'dee kigu'dde? At weeli enenyet ma ekkeysanne, i'daasenyi Waakh rubeytiissa ekkeysatte.”
44005005	Anaaniya chu'us yeedaas daage ka, il gu'dde, yumuy. 'Doo'di yeedaas daage tuumman weyti roorro gesse.
44005006	'Doo'di nunnugul 'deerka yimiyye, sartiis dafar kaayyube, khaate hawwaale.
44005007	Geeddi saha'dohoo seyyahe lafiddiye, arantiis wihi yitah ma garatti soogesse.
44005008	Beetero la wihi us iche worsate, “Chilimmeti atin gosiin gatteen tuumman a tan on a?” Iche la wihi iche tidah, “Aa, iche tuumman a geeddaas on.”
44005009	Beetero wihi us arám iyidah, “Saggoh ati ichoow makhaabalaah isileegoossaane Rubeyti Kamur ikajjaan? 'Doo'di makhaabalaah hawwaale afafe toolla ati laka kikhaata.”
44005010	Chirraas on ortiis ka il gu'dubte tumuy. Reeri nunnugul 'deerka min soogele, saggi iche itumuy arge. Iche laka khaateene makhaabaliche garabiis ka hawwaaleen.
44005011	Urur Kiriisto tuumman ichoow 'doo'di yeedaas daage tuumman, weyti nahtime gesse.
44005012	Ergaano 'doo'd goyaka wahanyeyyohi ittaawenye miigti Waakh tuso ichoow girmo yeesse. 'Doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste tuumman la orran Oosim Soolomone kakulma.
44005013	Chirri enenyet icho weyti inkaanyito laka, et addane goycho leemeet iggo mele.
44005014	Eheetteey laka, enenyeti buurenye Kamur rummeeste, mejel ichoow deyyeho liikasookhaye.
44005015	Jeenteti wihi ergaano haaggissuu, enenyet 'doo'dichoki khakkhannan jitate keene, siriiro ichoow ilaalle kareeche. I'dane yeeleene, 'dee kolossoo chirri Beetero sohti oosintiis 'doo'doo khakkhannan oosimmoosse, samaataan.
44005016	Enenyeti buure ilkerengeetohi Yeerusaleem idow tuumman ka soobahe, 'doo'dichoki khakkhannan ichoow ki ginnayyo dakhtaan sookhaate. Icho tuumman la lasamaache.
44005017	Kuhaanihi weyti ween ichoow 'doo'diiski usú raaho rabitti Sadukaayo kijiro ba jeenteti ergaanuu inaaf gele.
44005018	Ergaano sookhabatte jeelati ilkerengeeteet ka hidde.
44005019	I'daasenyi ibeen ka, hertoo Kamur afafhi jeela furte, ergaano bihisse.
44005020	Wihi iche itidah, “Nyaama, minki Waakhe buure irda, enenyet buuhi wora jiroti husub icheeka.”
44005021	Ergaano la yeedaas liiyidah raahte, baryo ka, minki Waakhe buure gesse i'di liiyidah u enenyet walah abisse. Kuhaanihi weyti ween ichoow 'doo'diis ba Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud tuummamba tol iwaheen, iskar ergeene ergaano jeela ka a lasookhaato yidaaheen.
44005022	I'daasenyi chi' iskare jeela tamiit, ergaano intaas ma kijirto. 'Deerka iratte cheekte mehe tidah ya,
44005023	“Chi' nah jeela iranni, iskarti afaf yaakhisso a tolossa one, min la afaf mujjum on hidanyihiin. I'daasenyi chi' nah furro, nah goya gello, weeli enenyet min goya ma kijiro!”
44005024	Eti iskarti minki Waakhe buure yaakhisso iween ichoow kuhaaniyyohi wewween chi'icho wora daageen ka wihi nool isworsateene, wihi soobaho kamalaleen.
44005025	Chirraas on etoo la yimiyye iiyeyye, “Reeri chele atin jeela gelisseen minki Waakhe buurenye goya kijira, enenyet walah abcha.”
44005026	Eti iskarti minki Waakhe buure yaakhisso iween, iskartoo khabaayi bahe ergaano toro sookhabte. Iskartaas la ergaano ma tottoganne, afi haaggan on ka soobihisse. Wihi iche karoorte la a 'doo'di 'dee dagah kachibo yagiis.
44005027	Ergaano sookhaatte Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud ortiis keente, 'dee kuhaanihi weyti ween ergaano waha a iyidaahe.
44005028	“Nah goorat a katirriinsanne, amur atin ibihinne, uus atin magahi reenkaas ichoow yeediis enenyet abin. I'daasenyi wori Yeesso miinsan ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem tuumman a kataa'hisseene, toro diiggiis nahe nah korin 'doontaan.”
44005029	Beetero ichoow ergaanoti addan la mehe soolaabeen ya, “Wihi massan, nah Waakhe yeediis raahna, enenyet mee yeediis raahno.
44005030	Inkoo atin Yeesso massalaaba kakaahteene atin tigaaseen, Waákh aacchinyeteen, Yeesso rubey a isoolaabe, omoot kasookahe.
44005031	Waakh anki dahantiisti miigeet ka weynaache, Karnat ichoow 'Doorribe kayeele, 'dee yaafohi Ya'huud uskeelicho kasoonokhtaane, Waakh la uskeelicho ikakuta.
44005032	Nah ichoow Rubeyti Munyeenye Waakh eti yeediis raaho tuumman siicho a garti waha tuumman.”
44005033	Jaldaabe la chi'iche wahaas daagte ka, weyti hollowte, ergaano ogoos 'doonte.
44005034	I'daasenyi etoo Farissaayeenye Gamaliyeel layadeehe, enenyet tuumman inkaanyito a jira. Usu a tagaanki amurre. Gamaliyeel Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud goycho ka tolossatte, amur bahche ergaano i'daaru khar a liibahcho.
44005035	'Deerka wihi us jaldaab iyidah, “Mejeli Issiraayeloow, 'doo'da wihi atin sooyeessaan mujjum kamalda.
44005036	Wihi inno orey agarre, Dewuudo a soobahe etoo ween iskayeele. Ullaka geeddi et kud affare raahte. Inkoo usu layigis ka, 'doo'diiskaas ichoow yeediis tuumman ba baabe.
44005037	Kaas 'dubiis ka, maanti enenyet leekkaacho ka Yuudahi boroofenhi Gaalilaaya inno gele. Ullaka 'doo'doo usu raaho sirgaal 'dii'do 'hele. Inkoo usu layigis ka 'doo'diis tuumman seley turraa'he.
44005038	Maantaka yeeda ka a atin waanicha, 'doo'da wohoo rucchul laka ayeelina! 'Diicha a irti! A mehe chirri wihi icho kamassaan ichoow wihi icho yeelaan weeli enenyet on kasoouummameen a baabaan on.
44005039	I'daasenyi chi' yeedicho Waakh kiyimiy, reera koloo kalday laka jeyin ma tabuu'diine, atinhi Waakh rubeytiis 'dii'ddaan on isagartaan.”
44005040	Yeed Gamaliyeel malicho urgiyiche. Ergaano min goya iwaheene, lajahe. 'Deerka amur ibahcheen, uus icho yombuu toro magah Yeesso kaayyeedin. 'Deerka la'diiche.
44005041	Ergaano Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud katabte. Weyti hamaadeen a mehe jeenteti icho koo Yeesso iyahiin u sinati lakawaaricho a mu'danyahiin.
44005042	Maan dakkhan uranti minki Waakhe buure ka ichoow minan ka Wori Haaggane saggi Yeesso rumanka Ki Lasubhe iyahe iche enenyet abisso toro cheekto ma 'diin.
44006001	Saahka maanti tiri abatti Kiriisto kasookhayme ka, 'doo'di Ya'huude afi Giriig daago yaafohi Ya'huude afi Ibiraaniya daago leeiriire. Wihi tahe muunkhoyyohicho gololi maan dakkhan enenyet lagiso ma 'helaan.
44006002	'Deerka ergaanoti tomon ichoow lammee abatti tuumman isiwahte, wihi iche itidah, “Ma haaggan chirri nah Yeedi Waakh cheeknaan 'diinno, 'dee nah golol 'doo'd gisno.
44006003	Walaalinyeey, et teeba goytiin ka magah khabto, Rubeyti Munyee laka rubeyohicho buuhto toro la kharee soobahcha, hila a gelinno.
44006004	Nah la 'dee awteenyuu, weysi ichoow hili Waakhe Yeedi Waakh lacheeko a gello.”
44006005	Urur tuumman wihi ergaano tidah jilhaate. Etoo Isiteefano layadeehe, Rubeyti Munyee buuhisse toro Waakh weyti kakhuufo soobahsateen. Fiilif ichoow Burookoras ichoow Nikaanor ichoow Tiimon ichoow Barmena ichoow eti ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya Nikolaawus layadeehe wihi 'doo'di Ya'huud wahti iurgiye laka soobahsateen.
44006006	'Doo'da ergaano liikeene iche la iweysatte, toro la dahano korisse.
44006007	Yeedi Waakh 'deerka taa'he orey isohte. Tiri abatti Kiriisto ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka weyti kakhayme, kuhaaniyyohi ittaawe laka Wori Haaggan kakhuufeen.
44006008	Isiteefano weyti haaggi Waakhe buure ichoow miige buuhicheen. Ulla girmohi buure ichoow wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso 'doo'di Ya'huud goyaka haaggiche.
44006009	I'daasenyi 'doo'doo Isiteefano iriir leegele. 'Doo'da a ayyo ya, a 'doo'doo minkichoki weysiit, “'Doo'di Lasoofure,” layadeeh ichoow 'doo'di Ya'huude ili Kureene kayimiy ichoow ki Alekisaandariya ichoow ki Kiliikiya ichoow ki Aassiya. 'Doo'da Isiteefano iriir leegele,
44006010	i'daasenyi Isiteefano kharati Rubeyti Munyee siisse ka yeyyeede, eticho yeed ilaabin yabuu'd mele.
44006011	'Deerka dagsi ka 'doo'doo chasteene, icho la wihi icho yidaaheen, “Nah usuhi Muusa ichoow Waákh igafe a daagne.”
44006012	'Deerka 'doo'd ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud ichoow tagaammeti amurre sootukkicheen. Isiteefano khabteene, khaateene Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud igeecheen.
44006013	'Doo'doo garti beenaat cheeko la soobahcheen. Icho la wihi icho cheekeen, “Eta kol dakkhan meessa lagan ichoow amurre Muusa igafa.
44006014	Usuhi, ‘Yeessoha ilkerengeetti Naasaret a yamiite, minka Waakh jejjebcha, hugumme Muusa la urgiyicha,’ essi a daagne.”
44006015	'Doo'di kootte jaldaab goya fiddiye tuumman Isiteefano weyti yeye, usuhi fooliis i'di fooli herti Waakh u ababo arge.
44007001	Kuhaanihi weyti ween la wihi us Isiteefano worsate, “Waha lakaacheekti a rum a?”
44007002	Waha ka wihi us laabe, “Yaafeey idagansada. Waakkhi weynaane tiis tahe, aabbaheenki Aburaaham layadeeh geeddi goorat archiiy us ilkerengeetti weene Haaran igelin, ili Messabotaamiya ka a isoobahe.
44007003	Waakh wihi us Aburaaham iyidah, ‘Ilaah ichoow 'doo'daah kaguure ili an kidowdowo iro.’
44007004	“Aburaaham la ilaas kaguure ili Haaran furte. Inkoo aabbahiis buje ka, Waakh ilaas kaguuriche ila toolla atin taalliin furte.
44007005	Waakh harratoo rucchule us alaassati ma siin, i'daasenyi chirri Aburaaham weel ikhabin laka, harrataas usu ichoow nyaakhut nyaakhutiis alaal ka a igooche.
44007006	Waakh wihi us Aburaaham iyidah, ‘Nyaakhutaah 'dee berri iloo yeelane gela, ilaas ka la gu'h kud affar iche bow'da yateehe weyti la sina lakawaaricha.
44007007	I'daasenyi an ili icho bow'daticho keeheet sina tusa. Yomboka ilaas a kasoobahaane, yamiitiine inta ka ani iwahtaan.’
44007008	'Deerka ayyinti Waakh Aburaaham igooche a ti mejel lakhandiyo. Aburaaham la Isakh dele ibeenki siyyeennaatteet ka khandiye. Isakh la Yaakoobo dele Yaakoobo la yaafoheenki tomon ichoow lammee uume.
44007009	“Aacchinyeteentaas la walaalichoki Yuussuf layadeeh inaafte ili Miissiri iororisse, ilaas ka bow'da yitah. I'daasenyi Waakh Yuussuf a leejire,
44007010	sinayyohiis tuumman karibe. Waakh la Yuussuf khara siiche Faraawohi karnati ili Miissiree jilhaache, 'deerka ili Miissiri ichoow urantiis tuumman iweynaache.
44007011	“Maantooka abaare 'deerka ili Miissiri ichoow ili Kaanaan leekahte, sina buuraatte, aacchinyeteen laka golol waayte.
44007012	Maanti Yaakoobo saggi golol ili Miissiri ikajiro daage ka, yeeletiisti aacchinyeteene kolooraat ili Miissiri ierge.
44007013	Maanti lammaatteete iche toro ili Miissiri imuu'dde ka, Yuussuf walaalinyetiis isicheeke, Faraawo laka Yuussuf goobicho abte.
44007014	Waha 'dubicho ka Yuussuf aabbahiiski Yaakoobo layadeeh ichoow minkicho tuumman ili Miissiri isoowahe. Ichohi sooguure isgoya a et tomon teeba ichoow et chan.
44007015	Yaakoobo 'deerka goobiis tuumman khabaayi ili Miissiri ikhubte. Intaas ka usu ichoow aacchinyeteen yumaateen.
44007016	Sarticho lakhaate inti ilkerengeetti Cheekem layadeeh ka, go'ddi goorat Aburaaham yeele Haamor kasoogatte lakahawwaale.
44007017	“Maanti ibeenki Waakh ayyinti us Aburaaham igooche buuhicho soodowwaate ka, 'doo'deen ili Miissiri ka weyti kakhayme.
44007018	Karnatoo addane Yuussuf ichoow wihiis tuumman igaran la ili Miissiri ka soobahe.
44007019	Ulla aacchinyeteen weyti sina kawaariche, toro ekkeeste, nyaakhutichoki ladele icho khar isoorogaane 'dee tuumo ihosse.
44007020	“Maantaase Muusa desse. Ulla weyti haagganeet. Goobicho ka hay seyyah mujjum lawoywoye.
44007021	Maanti khar liisoobahche ka, inám Faraawo khaatte i'di weelichuu weyneysatte.
44007022	Muusa la kharati 'doo'di Miissiri laabche, etoo harrab ka ichoow walah tuumman ka atah yitah.
44007023	“Maanti us gu'h tomon affar eleele ka, 'doo'diiski Issiraayele us idaahicho gooche.
44007024	Etoo Miissiri koo Issiraayel il itakho arge, 'deerka ki Issiraayel igele, aal gutte ki Miissiri yigis.
44007025	Muusa kol 'doo'diis saggi Waakh usú isooerge, usu icho iribo ikaso koogyahe, i'daasenyi icho ma kasin.
44007026	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka, Muusa reeroo lammeenye Issiraayele isjaho arge, isineybin leheete, ‘Era, atin a walaal, a i'doh isgaameerin i'doontaan?’ iyidah.
44007027	“I'daasenyi eti kootte ki addan gaameero Muusa 'dol itakhe, ‘Ayyo eti nah iween ichoow eti nah hukkumo kaayeele?’ iyidah.
44007028	‘Saggi at chele eti Miissiri itigisye ani laka ogoos i'doonta?’
44007029	Chirri Muusa yeedaas daage ka, ili Miidiya ifirde. Inkoo us intaas geeddoo fiddiye ka ínam lamma dele.
44007030	“Inkoo gu'h tomon affare kutte ka, herti Waakh Muusa hidaaddi Hali Sinnaay ka isoobahte. Saggi iche ikasoobahte la a geeyi 'dab kabolkho toro 'dab iumhan.
44007031	Muusa chirri us waha arge ka wahaas kagirmeeste. Chirra us meel isohti, us mujjum fiiricho ka, hooyi Kamur daage.
44007032	‘Ani a Waakh aacchinyetaahha, a Waakh Aburaaham ichoow Isakh ichoow Yaakoobo.’ Muusa nahtim ka harme intaas yeyin laka karoore.
44007033	“Kamuri Waakhe 'deerka wihi us Muusa iyidah, ‘Kobohaah duumi, a mehe inta at tolosso a harrati lagan.
44007034	Rumanka sinati ili Miissiri ka 'doo'deey lakawaaricho a arge, ooytinticho la a daage. Toolla la a isooyage icho riba. Toollaka kaale ati ili Miissiri toro kiergadaa.’
44007035	“Waha a Muusahi goorat icho 'dii'deene, icho, ‘Ayyo eti nah iween ichoow eti nah hukkumo kaayeele?’ idoween. Herti Waakhe geeyi gubti goyaka isoobahte ka, Waakh rubeytiis usu a ergate eti icho iween ichoow eti icho soofuro kayeele.
44007036	Muusahaase 'doo'd ili Miissiri kasoobahche. Usuhaas on gu'h tomon affar tuummamba girmo ichoow wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso ili Miissiri ka ichoow Beyti Buurenye Guu'ddan ka ichoow hidaad ka haaggiche.
44007037	“Muusaha a ki goorat 'doo'di Issiraayel, ‘Waakh 'dee berri etiinkoo Waákh íyeyyeedo i'deye a atin isooerga,’ iyidah.
44007038	Maanti 'doo'di Issiraayel hidaad ka iskafurte, Muusahaase leejire. Muusahaase Hali Sinnaay ka, Waakh i'di herti Waakh u isoobahe, leeyyeede. Ulla Waakh ichoow aacchinyeteen dahcho kajire. Muusa la Yeedi Waakhe jirtuu tuumman imassan Waakh ka'hele inno laka inno isookucche.
44007039	“I'daasenyi aacchinyeteen Muusa a daagiwwaayte, usu 'dii'dde uurassicho ka ili Miissiri iche inokhatti dowdowte.
44007040	Aacchinyeteen wihi iche Haruun itidah, ‘Iyookkoyyohi waakkhi orteenyo raaho nah ihaaggi. I'di tahe wihi Muusahi goorat ili Miissiri nah kasoobahche kayitah ma garanni.’
44007041	Maantaase iyookkotoo i'di maartoo u haaggicheene, iyookkotaas soorriyo igoorraheen. Wihi icho dahanohicho ka haaggicheen inkaanyiteene kahamaadeen.
44007042	I'daasenyi Waakh icho adah kakhabte 'diiche, yiyyihimo Waakh kayeesseene, wahteen. Waha ichoow wihi buuggoo etoo Waákh íyeyyeedo chiire a israahaan. “ ‘Minki Issiraayeloow, soorriyoyyohi atin gu'h tomon affar hidaad ka goorrahteen, ani igoorrahteen?
44007043	Atin minki waakkhi beenaate Mooleg layadeeh ichoow yiyyihintiinti waakh lakayeessi Reefan layadeeh iche si'ddeen, icho a iyookkoyyohi atin haagsatteene 'dee atin wahattaan. Maantaka an a atin baabiicha ili Baabiloon 'dirihiis atin liibooliya.’
44007044	“Aacchinyeteen goorat hidaad ka eemati saggi Waakh ileejiro tusso iche khabte sissi'datte. Eemataas saggi goorat Waakh Muusa ihaaggi iyidah on liihaaggiche, toro iyookkoti goorat Muusa arge on lakahaaggiche.
44007045	'Da'ddaboka aacchinyeteen eemataas ooyenyeticho kakhaatatte. Maanti iche Yoochuwa raahte, ili iche gelaan eemataas a isitteen. Waakh la orcho raahe yaafohi Waakh igaranne ilaas kajire rihe. Eemataas la ichoowka geeddi karnati Dawuud layadeeh jire tuumman ilaas a kasoo'hadde.
44007046	Waakh la weyti Dawuud a jilhaate. Dawuud la usuhi Waákh Yaakoobo fiddiito iyeelo daahe.
44007047	I'daasenyi Soolomone Waákh min idise.
44007048	“I'daasenyi Waakkhi Weyti Ween minki dahanohi enenyet diseen ma fiddiyo, i'di 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo yadeeh u,
44007049	“ ‘Sereye a komborteeyti buurenye antoote, harra la a komborteeyti rucchule an luhlo korcho. Minki i'dohenye idissaan? iche Kamur essa. Ommos inti an kanaso a intoh?
44007050	Dahanohaaya on menya waha tuumman haaggiche?’
44007051	“Atin a matah miig mehe? Uurassiin ichoow dogtiin a i'di wihi 'doo'di Waakh ikakhuufin. Atin a i'di aacchinyetiinna, kol dakkhan Rubeyti Munyeenye tirrintaan.
44007052	Eti Waákh íyeyyeedo aacchinyetiin sina iomhin a jira? 'Doo'di emeetti Eti Fissan cheeke laka a bakkisseen. Atin la usu 'dub a goosseene toro la dubunuunu tigaaseen.
44007053	'Doo'di goorat herti Waakh ka amurre liikeene a atine, i'daasenyi atin amurretaas ma raahin.”
44007054	Jaldaabe chirri iche waha daagte ka weyti hollowte, ichoowka indo guggu'duutteen.
44007055	I'daasenyi Isiteefanohi chirraas Rubeyti Munyee buuhto, goobi Waakh serey iyeye, Waakkhi ababo arge, Yeessohi Waakh anki dahantiisti miigeet toollo arge.
44007056	Wihi us yidah, “Yeya, goobi Waakhe furane Ínam Aadam usuhi Waakh anki dahantiisti miigeet toollo a arga.”
44007057	Iche la weyti riirte, farro nabho isgelisse. Chi'iche nabho farro isgelisse ka iche tuummamba Isiteefano ioriite,
44007058	khaatte, ilkerengeet khariche ijiitte, dagah ka saate. 'Doo'di gar laabe etoo nugule intaas kajire Saawulo layadeeh darfohichoki oroot tuumman ikatabeen.
44007059	Geedda Isiteefano dagah lakachibo layagiis, usu Waakh on wahta, wihi us essi, “Yeessohi Kamure, rubeyteey a kitimaate.”
44007060	Ulla jilbo il kagu'dde weyti riire, “Kamur! 'Doo'da uskeela aleeraahin” yidah. Uus yeedaas massiche on rubey gooche, yumuy.
44008001	Saawulo laka intaas a kijire, ullaka Isiteefanohi layagiis a ayyiche. Maantaas on urur Kiriistoki ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem kajiro sinati weyti loomhicho lasookhabte. Ergaano on menye, 'doo'd Kiriisto tuumman ilassi Ya'huudiya ichoow ki Saamariya iche liitaa'hiche.
44008002	'Doo'doo Waakh karooro Isiteefano khaate hawwaale, toro weyti kooyeen.
44008003	I'daasenyi Saawulo urur Kiriisto massin 'doona, kolba minkoo gela mejel ichoow deyyeho sookhabta sookhaata jeela gessa, hida.
44008004	'Doo'da taa'he la a irte, Wori Haaggan enenyet tuumman icheeke.
44008005	Fiilif a khubte ilkerengeetti weene ili Saamariya irte wori Ki Lasubhe miinsan intaas ka cheeke.
44008006	Ururi mujjum Fiilif dagansate, wahanyeyyohi ittaawenye miigti Waakh tuso us yeelo arge tuumman la, waha Fiilif essi raahe.
44008007	'Doo'di ittaawenye ginnayyo dakhtaan, riirit ka ginnayyo kabaheene, 'doo'di sare hanjaawte ichoow 'doo'di luhlo laa laka a lasamaache.
44008008	'Deerka ilkerengeettaas tuumman a hamaad kaldach on.
44008009	Etoo Siimon layadeehe ilkerengeettaas ka moreenye, 'doo'di ili Saamariya tuumman weyti girmaache a jira. Ulla a isatahnooche etoo khumman iskayeele.
44008010	'Doo'di ilkerengeeteet tuumman, ki wewween ichoow ki nunnugul laka yeediis a raaha, toro la mehe yadeehiin ya, “Eta a miigti Waakhe miigti buure layadeeh.”
44008011	Wihi icho karaahaan la a jeenteti us goycho ka geeddi deer morotiis ka girmo iyeele.
44008012	I'daasenyi chirri icho Wori Haaggane dakhi Waakh ichoow Yeesso Kiriisto miinsane Fiilif cheeko rummeesteen ka, mejel ichoow deyyeho ba labaattissiye.
44008013	Siimon laka awtiis u Yeesso rummeeste, inkoo labaattissiye ka Fiilif meel tuumman leeirte. Wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso ichoow wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane us arge kagirmeeste.
44008014	Ergaanoti ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem kajirto maanti iche saggi 'doo'di Saamariya kajiro Yeedi Waakh iraaho daagte ka, Beetero ichoow Yoohana Saamariya ieregte.
44008015	Iche la timiyye i'doo 'dee 'doo'daas Rubeyti Munyee i'helo u, 'doo'daas Waakh iwahte, 'doo'd la Rubeyti Munyee 'hele.
44008016	I'di tahe 'doo'daas magah Yeessohi Kamure on lakabaattissiye menye, Rubeyti Munyee uliba ma isooyagin.
44008017	'Deerka Beetero ichoow Yoohana ba dahano korcheene, 'doo'd la Rubeyti Munyee 'hele.
44008018	Siimon la ergaanoti dahan enenyet korisso enenyetaas Rubeyti Munyee 'helo arge, ergaano chilimme a atin siicha iyidahye,
44008019	toro “Ani laka miigtaas isiicha, 'dee eti an dahan korcho tuumman Rubeyti Munyee a 'helo,” iyidah.
44008020	Beetero wihi us ilaabe, “Chilimmetaah a kileebaabaato. Wihi tahe at wihi Waakh kisiicho, kol at chilimme kagatatti, iche koogtahe.
44008021	At hileenyo ka meessoor rucchul laka ma khabto, a mehe uuraah Waakh ortiis ka ma fissanee.
44008022	Uskeela kasoonokho, Kamur waho. Kolossoo 'dee Kamur mala suujenye at uuraah kakhabto ikaakutaayi.
44008023	Wihi at tahe an kaargo, a atihi inaaf lehe, rubeytaah la uskeel kalday on anti.”
44008024	Siimon la wihi us ilaabe “Kamur isoowah uus wihi at itidah iraahinee.”
44008025	Inkoo icho walah tuumman 'doo'd tuseene icho Yeedi Kamur cheekeen ka, ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem inokhteene, goobassi ittaawenye ilkerengeetti Saamariya kijiro ka Wori Haaggan 'doo'd abcheen.
44008026	Hertoo Kamur la wihi iche Fiilif itidah, “Sookahe, gurro tabe, jiti ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem kakhubti ilkerengeetti Gaasa irti isoho.” Waha la a jiti hidaadeet.
44008027	Ulla kahe irte. Jit ka etoo ili Saa'daame sang'ee 'hele, ulla a etoo khummane chilimmeti makhaabassi karnatenye ili Saa'daam dakhatti Kandake layadeeh tuumman khuccho. Ulla ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme irte, Waakh wahte.
44008028	Ulla garruhi fara'de jiitto kafiddiya, iliissa inokhta, chiirnaanneti eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Isaaya layadeeh chiire, iche sooma.
44008029	Rubeyti Munyee la wihi iche Fiilif itidah, “Nyaame, garruhaas fara'de jiitto haggahiis fiddi.”
44008030	Fiilif 'deerka garruhi fara'de jiitto inyaame, et usuhi buuggi eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Isaaya layadeeh chiire soomo daage. Fiilif wihi us worsate, “Waha at soonto a kigelaan?”
44008031	Ulla wihi us ilaabe, “Chirri etoo ikasoodowdowin saggoh igardi?” 'Deerka Fiilif wahe, 'dee garruhi fara'de jiitto a koro garabiis a orronti.
44008032	Eti sang'ee Chiirnaanneti Waakh goyaka wahane soome, “Usu i'di naffi iiyyaate inti lakagoorraho liiwoyuu, toro la i'di heleenki tim lagoggoocho iyeedin u, afiis ma bukkhin.
44008033	Maanti lakhaanyo lakadowe, jiti fissan ka ma lahukkumin. Et nyaakhut nyaakhutiis kaayyeedo mele. A mehe jirotiis harrata ka a lakakhaate.”
44008034	Eti sang'ee wihi us Fiilif worsate, “Bal isoocheek, eti Waákh íyeyyeedo awtiissa kayeyyeeda bal etoo addan?”
44008035	Fiilif 'deerka chiirnaankaas Chiirnaanneti Waakh on kasookhabte, Wori Haaggane Yeesso miinsan icheeke.
44008036	Jit ka 'dulaani bicchehoo 'heleene eti sang'ee la wihi us yidah, “Yey, bicche kallaayo! A i'doh ani liibaattissiyin?”
44008038	Ulla amur bahche garruhi fara'de jiitto a latoollicho. Fiilif ichoow eti sang'ee ba bicche goya iyageene Fiilif la usu baattissiye.
44008039	Chirri icho bicche kasookoreen ka Rubeyti Kamur Fiilif chirraas on khaatte, eti sang'ee la toro Fiilif ma argine, i'daasenyi usu hamaad ka jitiis tabe.
44008040	I'daasenyi Fiilif inkoo us ilkerengeetti Assotos ka issookase ka, ilkerengeeto tuumman dah kagooche, Wori Haaggan cheeke ichoowka Kaaysareya eleele.
44009001	Geeddaas tuumman la Saawulo abattiti Kamur uliba ogoose 'doona. Kuhaanihi weyti ween iirte,
44009002	ulla khaadaabbeti us 'doo'di minassi weysiite ilkerengeetti Damaasko iwewween ileeirti 'dee eti us yahe cheekto daahe. 'Deerka chirri us 'doo'di jit Yeesso raaho 'hele, mejel ommos deyyeho eheetteey ka ba, a sookhabta ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem keena.
44009003	Chirri us ilkerengeetti Damaasko idowwaate ka, koloo kalday on banay serey ka soobaheene ankhadeen.
44009004	Ulla il gu'dde, hooyi, “Saawulo! Saawulo, at a i'doh ani sina iomhissa?” idowo daage.
44009005	Saawulo la wihi us worsate, “Kamur, at a ayyo?” Kamur wihi us ilaabe, “An a Yeessohi at sina omhisso.
44009006	Toollaka kahe ilkerengeet gele 'dee wihi at yeesso a lakicheeko.”
44009007	'Doo'di kootte usu walhicho yeyyeed agaafte. Hooyi yeyyeede a daageene, i'daasenyi et icho argeen mele.
44009008	Saawulo sookahe, i'daasenyi chu'us indo bakkaahicho, walah us argo mele. Etoo 'deerka dahan khabte angaamiche, ilkerengeetti weene Damaasko geeche.
44009009	Maan seyyah tuumman il ma argo, ma golossati, wohoo rucchul laka ma yabhuub.
44009010	Ilkerengeetti Damaasko ka etoo abatti Kiriisteenye Anaaniya layadeeh a jira. Kamur la fooltabcho ka wahe “Anaaniya,” iyidah. Wihi us ilaabe, “Kamur an kalla.”
44009011	Kamur la wihi us iyidah, “Kahe, ilkerengeet ka min Yuudaki jiti, Jiti Fissan layadeeh kajiro iro, etoo ilkerengeetti Taarso Saawulo layadeeh sooworso, i'di tahe usu Waakhe wahtaa.
44009012	Usu fooltabcho ka etoo Anaaniya layadeehe yimiyye usu dahan korche 'dee ulla il iargo a arge.”
44009013	Anaaniya wihi us ilaabe, “Kamur, 'doo'di ittaawe wori eta a isiiche, suujoonki noole us 'doo'di Waakhe ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem kijiro yeele a daage.
44009014	Ulla antohi kuhaaniyyohi wewween siicheene us ebbaaw ati kiwahti us kakhabti leeyimiy.”
44009015	I'daasenyi Kamur wihi us Anaaniya iyidah, “Nyaam iiro, i'di tahe an usu a soobahsade, 'dee ulla yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan ichoow karnatteticho ichoow 'doo'di Issiraayele woreey igeechaa.
44009016	Anna sinati usu latuso jeenteti us keey iyahuu iche tusa.”
44009017	Anaaniya 'deerka irte minki Saawulo kajiro gele. Anaaniya la dahano korche, “Saawulo, walaalaaw, Yeessohi Kamurenye jit ka atihi inta isoosohatti kisoobahe iche isooergate, 'dee il agarta toro Rubeyti Munyee kibuuhissa,” iyidah.
44009018	Chirraas on wohoo khadaabbee indo kasoodiheene, ulla il arge. Tolossate labaattissiye.
44009019	Saawulo la inkoo us golossate ka, miigowe. Ibeennetoo Damaasko ka abatti Kiriisto leejire.
44009020	Dowwa on minassi weysiit irte, saggi Yeesso Weeli Waakh iyahe cheeke.
44009021	'Doo'di usu daage tuumman la weyti girmeeste, “Eta ki goorat ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka 'doo'di magaha waho 'dabbaacho menya? Ulla intane yimiyye 'dee icho hida, khaata kuhaaniyyohi wewween igeecha menya?” worsateen.
44009022	I'daasenyi Saawulo jiti miige ka wori Waakh cheeke. Ulla wahanyeyyohi ittaawe ka saggi Yeesso rumanka Ki Lasubhe iyahe tuse, ichoowka 'doo'di Ya'huude Damaasko yaal malaliche.
44009023	Inkoo ibeennetoo kutte ka, 'doo'di Ya'huud Saawulo ogoos gooche.
44009024	I'daasenyi Saawulo malicho abte. Ibeen ichoow maalim ba artohi ilkerengeeteete toorribaane 'dee usu yagiisiin.
44009025	I'daasenyi ibeen ka 'doo'di usu raaho usu enjeloo buure ka daddaabohi ilkerengeet kamarsan ka 'dohtoo gateene, il isoowoyeen.
44009026	Saawulo chirri us ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem yimiy ka, abatti Kiriisto ikhayin leheet. I'daasenyi iche tuumman usu weyti karoorte. A mehe usuhi rumanka abatti Kiriisto yitah ma rummeysatti.
44009027	I'daasenyi Barnaba usu khaate ergaano Yeesso ikeene. Saggi sulhaassiis ka us Kamur iarge, Kamur usu ileeyyeede ichoow saggi us ilkerengeetti Damaasko ka roorro laan wor Yeesso icheeke laka ergaano icheeke.
44009028	Saawulo 'deerka ergaano wihi tuummane iche ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka yeesse ka leejire. Ulla roorro laan wori Kamur cheeke.
44009029	Ulla 'doo'di Ya'huude afi Giriig daago leeyyeede toro leeiriire, i'daasenyi usu ogoos yowteen.
44009030	Chirri 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste waha abte ka, Saawulo khaateene ilkerengeetti Kaaysareya geecheene, intaas ka ilkerengeetti Taarso iergeen.
44009031	'Deerka urur Kiriistoki ilassi Ya'huudiya ichoow Gaalilaaya ichoow Saamariya kajiro ba geeddoo ka sina laan nebey kafiddiyeen. Rubeyti Munyee la icho miigoosse, toro la uur miigoosse, toro 'doo'd laka kakhayme. Icho tuumman la Kamur karooreen.
44009032	Geedda Beetero ilassaas tabe, us 'doo'di Waakhe ilkerengeetti Ludda yaalle iirte.
44009033	Intaas ka etoo Ayyenneya layadeehe sar tuumman hanjaawte gu'h siyyeet siriir kajiife 'hele.
44009034	Beetero la wihi us Ayyenneya iyidah, “Ayyenneya, Yeesso Kiriisto a kisamaacha, kahe ilaalaah khaat!” Ulla chirraas on sookahe.
