44009035	'Doo'di tuummane ilkerengeetti Ludda ichoow 'dowhi Chaaron kajiro la Ayyenneya arge Kamur kakhuufe.
44009036	Ilkerengeetti Yooba ka makhaabassoo abatti Kiriisteenye Tabiita layadeeh a jirte. Magahiche afi Giriig ka a Dorkas. Afaf lammacho ka chi' lalaabe a Hoól. Iche la kol tuumman 'doo'd wihi haaggane iyeesse, toro la miskiino gargaarte.
44009037	Ibeennetaas ka khannatte, tumuyye, sartiche lamaa'de lakhaate min ka goonanki saraat lagesse.
44009038	Yooba la ilkerengeetti Ludda ma kadeere, 'deerka chirri abatti saggi Beetero ilkerengeetti Ludda ikajiro daagte ka, et lamma ergateene, hawwaasteene, “Bal dowwa nah sooeleel!” iyidaaheen.
44009039	Beetero la icho raahe. Chirri us sooeleele ka, lakhaate goonankaas saraat lageeche. Deyyehoti ittaawenye muunkheyyee la intaase tolossa ooyta. Ubbaarreti derdeer ichoow kabuu'ddeti iche geeddi iche jirte tosse, Beetero tuseen.
44009040	Beetero la icho tuumman khar ibahche, jilbo il kagu'dde Waakh wahte. Makhaabassi bujje iurgiye wihi us iyidah, “Tabiita, sookah!” Iche la indo soobakkaahisse, chi'iche Beetero agarte ka soorrommatte.
44009041	Ulla dahan sookhabte toolliche. 'Deerka muunkheyyo ichoow 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste soowahe, ichehi nool dahanticho gesse.
44009042	Yeedaas Yooba dakkhan kataa'he, 'doo'di ittaawe la Kamur rummeeste.
44009043	Beetero la geeddoo ilkerengeetti Yooba ka min Siimonhi hili uktoot haaggicho fiddiye.
44010001	Ilkerengeetti Kaaysareya ka, etoo Korneeliyo layadeehe koobbintoo iskareete, iskarti 'Deylaan layadeeh itoollo, a jire.
44010002	Usu ichoow minkiis tuumman kol tuumman wihi Waakh kahamaadicho yeeleene, toro la Waakh a karooraan. Us 'doo'di Ya'huude miskiine weyti gargaare, toro kol tuumman Waakhe wahta.
44010003	Maantooka geeddi saha'd saagaassi maalimeet ka, fooltabchotoo arge. Fooltabcho ka wihi us mujjum arge, a herti Waakhe itimiyye, “Korneeliyo,” itidah.
44010004	Korneeliyo iche roorro ka indo katoolliche, wihi us worsate, “A mehe Kamur?” Herti Waakh wihi iche ilaabte, “Waakh weysihaah a daage, wihi at miskiino siisso la a arge, kaasoo'hele.
44010005	Toollaka 'doo'doo ilkerengeetti Yooba ierege, etoo Siimon layadeehe magahiiskoo addan toro Beetero layadeeh a soowaho.
44010006	Usu, Siimonhi ukto kaaho toro haaggicho beyti buure afiche yaal iche leefiddiya.”
44010007	Chirri herti Waakhe kootte leeyyeedde katabte ka, Korneeliyo falfa lamma minkiis kajirto ichoow etoo iskareet soowahe. Et la a ki ullaka weyti Yeedi Waakh khuccho toro la Korneeliyo rubeytiis yaakhicho.
44010008	Wihi yitah tuumman icheeke ilkerengeetti Yooba ierge.
44010009	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho geeddi saha'd lihti maalimeete 'doo'daas ilkerengeetti Yooba isoodowwaate ka, Beetero min sartiisti hafan ikore, Waakh wahte.
44010010	Beetero weyti ankaye, wohoo us yaham 'doone. Golol lakarchaayi fooltabcho arge.
44010011	Sereyti bakkaahte arge, wohoo i'di dafarti buurenye il isoosohti arge. Dafarta la laddad affarcho lasookhuccha il liisoowoya.
44010012	Dafartaas wahanyeyyohi fil tuummane iche goya kajira. Bina ichoow hoola ichoow binahi uur il kajiito ichoow chimbirohi saraate fil tuummanenye kajira.
44010013	Hooyoo la Beetero wihi us iyidah, “Beetero, kah wahanyeyyoha agiise aham.”
44010014	Beetero wihi us ilaabe, “Kamur koloo kalday laka i'daas mee! A mehe an injire wihi bi'dire ommos wihi mi'dab ieheynan ma umhan.”
44010015	Hooyi Waakh koli lammaatteet usu leeyeede wihi us yidah, “Wihi Waakh munyaache wihi bi'dire iikhaatin.”
44010016	Waha kol seyyahe yitaaheene, chirraas on dafar goobi Waakh liilaabe.
44010017	Beetero wihi fooltabchota tahe kamalalaayi, 'doo'di kootte Korneeliyo sooergate, inti min kajiro a abte, arite toolla.
44010018	'Doo'd waheene, usu etoo marteenye Beetero layadeehe magahiis koo addan Siimon layadeeh inta fiddiyo worsateen.
44010019	Beetero wihi fooltabcho tahe kamiyyaantaayi, Rubeyti Munyee wihi iche itidah, “Siimon, reeroo seyyahenye kisooyowte kalla.
44010020	'Deerka kahe, il ikhubo. Icho raahin akaroorin, i'di tahe ani icho sooerge.”
44010021	Beetero il ikhubte wihi us reer iyidah, “Eti atin sooyowatteen a ani. A i'doh itimaateen?”
44010022	Reer wihi us ilaabe, “Etoo Korneeliyo layadeehe koobbintoo iskareet itoollo kanimiy. Ulla a etoo fissane Waákh karooro, yaafti Ya'huud tuumman la weyti inkaanyitto. Hertoo Waakhe munyeenye usu minkiis a kiwaho 'dee wora a daago itidah.”
44010023	Beetero 'deerka 'doo'd min goya iwahe martiiste. Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka Beetero 'doo'd raahe. 'Doo'doo ilkerengeetti Yooba ka Kiriisto rummeeste laka Beetero raahe.
44010024	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka, ilkerengeetti Kaaysareya sooeleeleen. Korneeliyo la icho suge, hiiyyiis ichoow aalassiiski us weyti 'doono minkiis iwahe.
44010025	Chirra Beetero min soogelo ka Korneeliyo Beetero or kasoodowe, inkaanyit ka ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dde.
44010026	I'daasenyi Beetero sookahche, “Sookah, annaka a weeli enenyet one!” iyidah.
44010027	Beetero Korneeliyo leeyyeedaayi min gele. 'Doo'di ittaawe la intaas a kajira.
44010028	Beetero la wihi us 'doo'daas iyidah, “Weyti a garattaane amurreteen eti Ya'huude yaafohi addan kachimmamo ommos minassicho gelo a buusantahe. I'daasenyi Waakh mehe ituse ya, an et an a bi'dir ommos a suuj adeeh mele.
44010029	'Deerka chirri enenyet liisoo'diiche ka, ma jijjiitanne imiy. Anna mehe kiworsada ya, mehe iwahte?”
44010030	Korneeliyo wihi us ilaabe, “Maan affar kutte, anihi saha'd saagaassi maalimeete chirree minkeey goyaka Waakh wahdi iche dog laan on etoo gaaddi dakhane torrogoot khabo orteey sootolossate.
44010031	Wihi us iyidah, ‘Korneeliyo, Waakh weysihaah a daage, toro wihi at miskiino siisso a arge.
44010032	Toolla ilkerengeetti Yooba enenyet ierege, etoo Siimon layadeehe magahoo ka la Beetero layadeeh a soowaheen. Us minki etoo Siimon layadeeh ka a marti. Eta la ukto mujjummoocha, beyti buurenye afiche yaal.’
44010033	Anna 'deerka chirraas on enenyet kisooerge, alla weyti gon haaggisse a timiyyee. Toollaka nah tuumman kalla Waakh ortiis tololla wihi Kamur dah kiyidah dagansanna.”
44010034	Beetero la yeede wihi us yidah, “An kola saggi Waakh rumanka yaafo tuumman ekka iekkaacho a arge.
44010035	I'daasenyi Waakh 'doo'di il tuummane usu karooro wihi fissan yeelo a khaatta.
44010036	Atin farniinki Waakh 'doo'di Issiraayel isooerge a garattaan. Farniinka la Wori Haaggane cheeke, Yeesso Kiriisto ka innohi enenyete ichoow Waakh a isinebeyne. Yeesso Kiriisto la a Kamuri weeli enenyet tuumman.
44010037	Wihi inkoo Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo wori baattissiyo cheeke boroofenhi Gaalilaaya lakasookhabte ichoowka ili Ya'huud tuumman eleele yitah a garattaan.
44010038	Saggi Waakh Yeessohi Naasaret Rubeyti Munyee ichoow miig isiiche a garattaan. Jeenteti Waakh ileejiruu us meel tuummane irte, wihi haaggan yeele, 'doo'di Seytaan sina kawaaricho samaache.
44010039	“Nah la wihi tuummane Yeesso ili 'doo'di Ya'huud ichoow ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka yeele garticho a laabna. Yeesso massalaaba kakaaheene yigaaseen.
44010040	I'daasenyi Waakh ibeenki seyyahnaatteet ka omoot kasookahche, enenyet tuse.
44010041	'Doo'd tuumman mee usú arge, i'daasenyi nahi goorat Waakh nah soobahsate woriis cheekno, usu leegolossanne on inkoo us sookahe agarre.
44010042	Waakh la amure nah ibahche, 'dee Wori Haaggan 'doo'd icheekna, toro saggi us eti Waakh soobahsate 'dee 'doo'di jiro ichoow ki tuume ba ihukkumo iyahe cheekna.
44010043	'Doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo tuumman wihi usu miinsane icho cheekeen, eti Kiriisto rummeeste tuumman, usu ka uskeel a liikakuta.”
44010044	Beetero yeyyeedaayi Rubeyti Munyee 'doo'di dagansati tuumman isooyagte.
44010045	'Doo'di Ya'huude Kiriisto rummeeste Beetero sooraahe la, Rubeyti Munyeenye yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan laka isooyagte weyti kagirmeeste.
44010046	I'di tahe 'doo'di yaafohi addan ichohi afi icho idaagin kaayyeedo toro Waakh saa'do, iche daageen. Beetero 'deerka wihi us yidah,
44010047	“'Doo'da i'di goorat inno Rubeyti Munyee i'helluu, icho laka Rubeyti Munyee a 'heleen. Etoo ichohi bicche ka labaattissiyo a tirta?”
44010048	'Deerka amur ibahche, magah Yeesso Kiriisto ka icho a labaattissiyo. Icho la Beeterohi geeddoo icho leefiddiyo daaheen.
44011001	Ergaano ichoow 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste Ya'huudiya kijiro tuumman saggi yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan laka Yeedi Waakh ikhaatteen daageen.
44011002	'Deerka maanti Beetero ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ikore ka, 'doo'di Ya'huude Kiriisto rummeeste usu leejaakhe.
44011003	Wihi icho iyidaaheen, “At minassi 'doo'di ikhandiyanne iratte icho leegolossatte.”
44011004	Beetero la wihi yitah tuumman idowdowe, wihi us kasookhabte us iyidah,
44011005	“An ilkerengeetti Yooba iche kajire, Waakh wahdaayi, fooltabcho arge. Wohoo i'di dafartoo buurenye goobi Waakh ka laddad affarcho lakhuccho il liisoowoyo garabeey lasooyissil arge.
44011006	Goya yeye, wahanyeyyohi fil tuummane arge. Bina ichoow hoola ichoow binahi uur il kajiito ichoow chimbirohi saraate dafar goya kajira.
44011007	Anna hooyi, ‘Beetero kahe, wahanyeyyoha agiise, aham,’ idowo daage.
44011008	“Wihi an ilaabe, ‘Kamuroow, mele, i'di tahe injire gololi liiumhane ommos bi'dire afeey ma gelin.’
44011009	“Hooy la koli lammaatteet goobi Waakh ka sooyeede wihi us yidah, ‘Wihi Waakh munyaache wihi bi'dire iikhaatin.’
44011010	Waha kol seyyahe yitaaheene, 'deerka toro goobi Waakh liijiite.
44011011	“Chirraas on 'doo'di seyyahenye ilkerengeetti Kaaysareya ka ani liisooergate, minki an fiddiyo kajiro sooeleele.
44011012	Rubeyti Munyee wihi iche ani itidah, ‘'Doo'daas a leejijjiitanne, raah.’ Reera lihenye koo Kiriistee laka ilkerengeetti Yooba ka iraahe ichoowka ilkerengeetti Kaaysareya isleeiranne, nah tuummamba min Korneeliyo isleegelle.
44011013	Ulla saggi herti Waakh minkiis ka isoobahte, ‘'Doo'doo ilkerengeetti Yooba iergo, eti magahiis Siimon layadeehe magahoo ka la Beetero layadeeh a soowaho,’ itidah, nah isoocheeke.
44011014	‘Ulla farniine kikeena, farniinkaas ka ati ichoow minkaah tuumman a atin lariba,’ itidah.
44011015	“Chirri an yeede on Rubeyti Munyee i'di goorat iche inno orey inno ikasooyagtuu icho laka isooyagte.
44011016	Chirraakka wihi goorat Kamur yidah kasoo'hele, ‘Yoohana enenyet bicche kabaattissiye, i'daasenyi atin Rubeyti Munyee ka a atin labaattissiya.’
44011017	'Deerka chirri Waakh siinti Rubeyti Munyeenye us goorat innohi Yeesso Kiriistohi Kamure rummeysanne inno siiche icho laka siiche, anihi Waakh tirrimo a ayyo?”
44011018	Chirri icho waha daageen ka wihi Beetero yeele 'dii'din katabeene Waakh saa'deen. Wihi icho yidaaheen, “Kola 'deerka Waakh yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan laka uskeel a kasoolaabe, 'dee jiro 'helaan.”
44011019	'Doo'd Kiriistoki lataa'hiche jeenteti sinayyohi 'doo'd loomhichuu inkoo Isiteefano layigis geeddi ili Foniikiya ichoow kurti bicche dahcho kajirto Kuuburo layadeeh ichoow ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya irte. 'Doo'di yaafti Ya'huud kalday Wori Haaggan icheekeen.
44011020	I'daasenyi gaasichokoo ili Kuuburo ichoow ilkerengeetti Kureene kayimiyye, ilkereengeetti Antiyookhiya irte, 'doo'di yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan Wori Haaggane Yeessohi Kamure miinsan icheekeen.
44011021	Miigti Kamur icho a leejirte, 'deerka 'doo'di ittaawe wori Kamur rummeeste toro raahe.
44011022	Urur Kiriistoki ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem wora daage, icho la Barnaba ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya iergeen.
44011023	Maanti us intaas sooeleele us saggi icho haaggi Waakhe buurenye icho imunneynan i'heleen arge ka, weyti hamaade, ulla icho uur miigoocha 'dee rumanka uurassicho tuumman ka Kamur raahaan.
44011024	Barnaba la a etoo haaggane, Rubeyti Munyee buuhto toro la Yeesso kakhuufo. 'Doo'di ittaawe la kamur kakhuufe.
44011025	Barnaba 'deerka ilkerengeetti Taarso irte, Saawulo yowte.
44011026	Chirri us Saawulo 'hele ka, sookhaate ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya keene. Barnaba ichoow Saawulo gu'hoo tuumman urur Kiriisto is'heleene, toro la 'doo'di ittaawe wori Waakh mujjum abcheen. Ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya iche abatti kolooraat 'doo'd Kiriisto lakiidah.
44011027	Maanassaas ka 'doo'doo Waákh íyeyyeedo ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem kasookhubte ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya yimiy.
44011028	Kichekoo magahiis Agaabo layadeeh kahe, Rubeyti Munyee ka, saggi abaartoo suuje dowwanoha ka harrati sirgaali Rooma anti tuumman igesso orey on cheeke. Abaartaas la maanti Kilaawudiyo karnat yitahye soomarte.
44011029	Abatti ebba gargaar geeddi us yabuu'd 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste ili Ya'huudiya ibihin gooche.
44011030	Waha yeeleene, Barnaba ichoow Saawulo gargaari lasoobahche idiibeene, ewweenki urur Kiriisto woyo iergeen.
44012001	Geeddassaas on ka karnati 'Herood Agiribba layadeeh urur Kiriisto goyaka 'doo'doo khabte, usuhi sina omhicho 'doonaa.
44012002	Yaakoobohi walaal Yoohanee birlabe lakayigis.
44012003	'Herood la chirri us saggi 'doo'di Ya'huud waha ikahamaado arge ka, Beetero laka sookhabte jeela gesse. Wahaas la maanti Daawti Makaateti Liikhasin iche yitaaheen.
44012004	Inkoo Beetero jeela lagesse, Beetero a lakhaate iskarti toorribto rabit affarenye rabite ba la et affar tahe liigeeche 'dee toorribta. 'Herood la mehe 'doona ya, usuhi Beetero inkoo daawti Baasakka kutte 'doo'd tuumman ortiis ka hukkumo.
44012005	Beetero 'deerka jeela lagesse. I'daasenyi urur Kiriisto jeentetiis u weyti Waakh wahte.
44012006	Ibeenki 'dee saahka 'Herood Beetero soohukkumo ka, Beetero et lamma iskareete dahcho ur'da, biingo lamma lakahide, tooba etoo iskareete lakahide, iskarti lammeenye aritti jeela toorribto la a jirta.
44012007	Koloo kalday on hertoo Kamur soobahte, minki 'doo'd lakahido banay kaababeen. Herti Waakh la Beetero barbar 'daarte, “Dowwa sookah,” itidah. Chirraas on ga'daarreti kootte Beetero dahano kahidan diddihte.
44012008	Herti Waakh la wihi iche Beetero itidah, “Saabaah jurkhiche, kobohaah gesso.” Beetero la i'daas yeele. “Kabuu'daah laka gesso, isooraah,” itidah.
44012009	Beetero la raahe, jeela kaleebahe, i'daasenyi saggi wahaas herti Waakh yeesse rumanka iyitaaheen ma kasine, kol us fooltabcho argo on koogyahe.
44012010	Eti oraate arit yaakhicho ichoow ki lammaatteet kasookuteene aritti ga'daare ilkerengeet liikabaho sooeleeleen. Arite la keley on furnante icho la tabeen. Inkoo icho inti jitat iskachibaan sooeleeleen ka, chirraas on herti Waakh usu katabte.
44012011	Beetero 'deerka neybaate, wihi us yidah, “Toolla rumanka a uba, Kamur hertiistoo a isooerge, hiinaan 'Herood ichoow wihi tuummane ani isooyateehe 'doo'di Ya'huud garti ikaribe.”
44012012	Chirri us iskase ka min Maariya irte. Maariya la a abar Yoohanahi toro magahiiskoo Marko layadeeh. Minkaas la 'doo'di ittaawenye Waakh wahti iche kajira.
44012013	Beetero la yimiyye afafhi kharaat guggu'dde inanti falfeenye Rooda layadeeh itimiyye leeyeedde.
44012014	Chirri iche hooy Beetero garatte ka weyti hamaadde, min ma furin ba nyaante 'doo'd saggi Beetero khar itoollo icheekte.
44012015	'Doo'd la wihi us inám iyidah, “At a sirgo!” Iname la matah miigeysatte, “Mele, a rum,” itidah. Icho la toro, “A hertiisti Waakh,” iyidaaheen.
44012016	I'daasenyi geeddaas tuumman Beetero afaf on soojaha. 'Da'ddaboka afaf fureene, chirri icho Beetero argeen ka weyti girmeesteen.
44012017	Ulla dahan ka gammadicha iyidahye, saggi Kamur jeela ikasoobahche icheeke. “Waha Yaakoobo ichoow 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste icheeka,” iyidahye, bahe intoo addan irte.
44012018	Baryo ka, iskarti Beetero toorribto mal gele, jeenteti wihi Beetero kayitah u.
44012019	Inkoo iskar 'Herood weyti Beetero yowatte waayte ka, 'Herood iskar wowworsate amur bahche iskar omoot igooche. 'Herood 'deerka ili Ya'huudiya kakahe irte ilkerengeetti Kaaysareya geeddoo fiddiye.
44012020	Karnati 'Herood Agiribbahi oraate 'doo'di ilkerengeetti Tiiro ichoow 'doo'di ilkerengeetti Siidon ba weyti kahollowe. Icho la saamo ka irteene sooargeen. Kolooraat la eti uranti karnat iweene Bulaastas layadeeh iche ankicho leekeeneen. Irteene 'Heroodha nebey daaheen, i'di tahe ilicho il 'Heroodhane golol ka'hela.
44012021	Ibeenkoo isliigooche ka 'Herood darfohiiski karnannoon gessate komborti antoot koorronte, 'doo'd itolche.
44012022	Urur la rirriire, “Weeli enenyet mee yeyyeedo, waakkhoo yeyyeeda,” yidaaheen.
44012023	Chirraas on jeenteti 'Herood Waakh ikoolin u, hertoo Kamur usu gu'dubte, ulla deyyah uur yumheene, yumuy.
44012024	I'daasenyi Yeedi Waakh orey on isohte, 'doo'di ittaawe la Yeesso rummeeste.
44012025	Chirri Barnaba ichoow Saawulo hilicho buuhicheen ka, ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem kasoonokhteene, Yoohanahi magahoo Marko layadeeh khaatteene ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya irteen.
44013001	Urur Kiriistoki ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya kijiro 'doo'doo Waákh íyeyyeedo ichoow 'doo'doo Yeedi Waakh 'doo'd abcho goya a kijire. Icho la a Barnaba ichoow Siimiyonhi Nigeer layadeeh ichoow Luukiyohi ili Kureene kayimiy ichoow Manaayenhi gaafanahi 'Herood Antiiba layadeeh weyneeste ichoow Saawulo.
44013002	Geedda icho Kamur wahtaane icho af hiitaan, Rubeyti Munyee wihi iche itidah, “Barnaba ichoow Saawulo ba hili an icho iwahe isoobahcha.”
44013003	'Deerka inkoo icho af hiiteene Waakh wahteen ka, dahano korcheene iweesteene ergeen.
44013004	Lammache ichehi Rubeyti Munyee ergatte, irteene ilkerengeetti Seluukiya ikhubteene, intaas ka kooban geleene kurti bicche dahcho kajirto Kuuburo layadeeh irteen.
44013005	Chirri icho ilkerengeetti Salaamis eleeleen ka, minassi weysiite Ya'huud ka Yeedi Waakh cheekeen. Yoohanahi magahiiskoo Marko layadeeh laka a leejire, gargaare.
44013006	Kurtetaas tuumman dah kagoocheene Wori Haaggan cheekeene ichoowka ilkerengeetti Baabos eleeleen. Intaas ka etoo Ya'huude moreenye eti Waákh íyeyyeedo iskaayyeelo Bar Yeesso layadeeh 'heleen.
44013007	Ulla eti kurtetaas iweene Sergiyo Baawulo layadeehe kharee iche aaliis yahe. Etaas ween Barnaba ichoow Saawulo wahe Yeedi Waakhe kadaagin 'doonaa.
44013008	I'daasenyi Eelimaashi moree icho tirrime. Eta magahiis moro miinsanyahe. Usu etaas ween kakhuufnaanki us Yeesso kakhuufo kalaabine 'doone.
44013009	Saawulohi magahoo ka Baawulo layadeehe Rubeyti Munyee buuhisse Eelimaas indo katoolliche wihi us iyidah,
44013010	“Weeli Seytaan! At a chiiytanki wihi haaggan tuumman 'dii'do. At a eti ekkeysi lehe, toro wihi suuje tuummane rubeytaah buuha. At la kol tuumman jiti Kamure fissane khollokkhissa.
44013011	Toolla la dahanti Kamur a kigu'dubta, indo waayta, geeddoo banayhi orraheet argiwwaayta.” Chirraas on 'duubat ichoow mug'di ba usu indo ankubeene, dahano ka il 'da'ddaarre eti angaamicho yowte.
44013012	Etaas ween chirri us wihi yitah arge ka Kamur rummeeste, a mehe wori Kamur miinsane laabche a kagirmeeste.
44013013	Baawulo ichoow wahalhiis ba kooban ka ilkerengeetti Baabos kakaheene ilkerengeettoo Beerga layadeehe boroofenhi Bambiiliya kajirto irteen. Intaas ka Yoohanahi magahiiskoo Marko layadeeh icho kanokhte ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem inokhte.
44013014	Ilkerengeetti Beerga kakaheene ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya boroofenhi Bisiidiya kijirto irteen. Seeri Lanaso ka minki weysiite Ya'huud geleene orronteen.
44013015	Inkoo Chiirnaanneti Amurre ichoow ti 'Doo'di Waákh Íyeyyeedo lasoome ka, 'doo'di minki weysiit itoollo icho waheene wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Yaafeey, chirri atin yeedoo enenyet uur miigoocho khabtaan, kaaleya cheeka.”
44013016	Baawulo tolossate dahanti miigeet okkhiche leeyeede wihi us yidah, “'Doo'di Issiraayeloow ichoow atinhi yaafti Issiraayel ieheynane Waakh karoortaane inta kajirtaan, idagansada.
44013017	Waakkhi 'doo'di Issiraayel wahti goorat aacchinyeteen a soobahsate. Maanti iche ili Miissiri iche kayeelantahe kajirto ka yaafohi buure kayeele. Waakh la toro miigtiisti buure on ka icho ilaas kasoobahche.
44013018	Waakh geeddi gu'h tomon affar icho hidaad ka a woywoye.
44013019	Yaaf teeba ili Kaanaan kajirte baabiiche, 'doo'diis la ilaas dahal ka siiche.
44013020	Waha tuumman la geeddi gu'h kud affar ichoow gu'h tomon chan iche khaateen. “Waha 'dubicho ka Waakh icho 'doo'di dakhti siiche ichoowka eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Saamuwel layadeeh hiliis gele.
44013021	Saahka yaafti Issiraayel Waakh karnat daahte, Waakh la icho eti Saawulo layadeehe aabbahiis Kiich layadeehe, yaaftiis la Beenjameen tahe, siiche. Ulla gu'h tomon affar ba karnat iyitah.
44013022	Inkoo Waakh Saawulo bahche ka, Dawuud karnati yaafohi Issiraayel kayeele. Wihi Waakh cheeke Dawuud miinsan kallaayo, ‘Inam Yeessehi Dawuud layadeeh a eti wihi uureey 'doono raaho, wihi an usuhi yeelo 'doono tuumman a yeela.’
44013023	“Waakh la hiiy Dawuud ka, i'di goorat us iayyichuu, Yeesso 'Doorribehi yaafohi Issiraayel kayeele.
44013024	Geeddi Yeesso hiliis isookhaban, Yoohanahi Enenyet Baattissiyo iche yaafohi Issiraayel tuumman Yeedi Waakh icheeke, icho uskeeliin kasoonokhda toro a atin labaattissiyo iche idowe.
44013025	Chirra Yoohana hiliis soomassicho ka wihi us yidah, ‘Kamalda bal, atin ayyo ikoogtahiin? An ki atin sugtaan mee. Yeya, eti 'dubeey ka yamiit, an falfihi kobtiissa an jalkhicho ma mu'dan.’
44013026	“Yaafeey, atinhi hiiy Aburaahame ichoow atinhi yaafohi addanenye Waakh karoortaan inno wori saggi Waakh inno iribo a inno liisooerge.
44013027	'Doo'di ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ichoow weynaanticho ba Yeesso eti us rumanka yahe ma kasin. I'daasenyi maanti icho omoot igoocheen, wihi goorat 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo chiire, Seeri Lanaso tuumman lasoomo buuhicheen.
44013028	Chirri icho wihi rumanka Yeesso omoot liikagoocho ikhabin laka, Bilaato Yeessohi layagiise daaheen.
44013029	Inkoo iche wihi goorat Chiirnaanneti Waakhe usu miinsan buuhisse ka, Yeesso massalaaba kasooyegisse khaatte, go'ddoo kahawwaasse.
44013030	I'daasenyi Waakh usu 'doo'di tuume goyaka sookahche.
44013031	Ulla 'doo'di goorat usú boroofenhi Gaalilaaya ka sooraahe ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem leeyimiy geeddi buure a isoobabbahe. Icho la toolla 'doo'deenki Issiraayel gartiis a ilaabaan.
44013032	“Nah Wori Haaggane atin icheekna. Wora la a ki Waakh aacchinyeteen iayyiche,
44013033	innohi nyaakhutichee, Yeessohi us omoot kasookahche ka inno ibuuhiche. I'di aritti lammaatteete buuggi Sabuur ka liichiiruu, “ ‘At a Weelaaya, maalinka an Aabbahaahha itah.’
44013034	Waakh rumanka Yeesso omoot a kasookahche toro jirtuu la ma 'diicho sartiis ma suusahto, i'di Yeedi Waakh liikachiiruu, “ ‘Buuhi munyeenye toro lakakhuufo an Dawuud iayyiche iche atin siicha.’
44013035	'Deerka intoo addan ka mehe chiiran ya, “ ‘Sarti Falfataahti Munyee ma 'diisso ma suusahto.’
44013036	“I'di tahe Dawuud kholotiis ka hili Waakh a kajire, yumuyye, aacchinyetiisti goorat orey bujje ikhaye, lahawwaale, sartiis la suusahte.
44013037	I'daasenyi ki Waakh omoot kasookahche, sartiis ma suusahin.
44013038	“Maantaka yaaftaay wihi an atinhi abattaan 'doono, Yeesso ka, jiti uskeeliin atin liikakuto a atin liicheeke.
44013039	Usu ka eti tuummane usu rummeeste, Waakh eti fissane iekkaacha. I'daasenyi amurre Muusati laraaho ka, Waakh etoo kalday laka eti fissan ma iekkaacho.
44013040	Yuubsada gi'de uus wihi goorat 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo yidah atin kiitaahane.
44013041	‘Yeya, atinha wihi Waakh yidah suujoon kacheektaan. A girmeysattaane tuuntaan. A mehe wihi an ibeenneta atin jirtaan yeelo, chirri etoo atin isoocheeke laka ma rummeysattaan!’ ”
44013042	Chirra Barnaba ichoow Baawulo minki weysiite Ya'huud kabahaan ka, 'doo'd icho wahe 'dee Seeri Lanaso soomaro ka wahanyeyyohoo addan a icheekeen.
44013043	Inkoo 'doo'd minki weysiit kabahe ka, 'doo'di Ya'huude ittaawe ichoow ki wihi 'doo'di Ya'huud wahti rumanka iurgiye Barnaba ichoow Baawulo sooraahe. Baawulo ichoow Barnaba la leeyyeedeene, hawwaasteene, 'dee mujjum haaggi Waakhe buure a raaheen.
44013044	Seeri Lanaso soomaro ka 'doo'di ilkerengeettaas kajiro buurtiis yimiyye Yeedi Kamur dagansate.
44013045	Chirri 'doo'di Ya'huud ururi buure arge ka, inaaf buuhiche, wihi Baawulo essi abaareen.
44013046	I'daasenyi Baawulo ichoow Barnaba wihi icho roorro laan soolaabeen, “Wihi nah laka'doono, a nahi Yeedi Waakh kolooraat atin isoocheekno. Jeenteti atin i'dii'ddeene, saggi atin jiroti armaanjireen ikamalin isikeekkaasseen u la, kola yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynane iiranna.
44013047	A mehe amuri Kamur nah siiche a kan, “ ‘A kisoobahsade, banayhi yaafohi Waakh igaran kaayeele, 'dee Wori Haaggane ribnaan keeno harra tuumman eleelissa.’ ”
44013048	'Doo'di yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan chirri icho yeedaas daageen ka weyti hamaadeene, Yeedi Kamur inkaanyiteen. Eti tuummane Waakh soobahsate 'dee jiroti jirtuu imassan 'helo la Yeesso rummeeste.
44013049	Yeedi Kamur la ilaas tuumman kataa'he.
44013050	I'daasenyi 'doo'doo Ya'huud deyyehoti Waakh karoorto magah khabto ichoow mejeli ilkerengeet ka weynaan leh sootukkicheen. Baawulo ichoow Barnaba sina omhin sookhabteene ichoowka ilicho kariheen.
44013051	Ergaano 'deerka ebeeri luhlohicho fuulo wihi iche 'doo'daas kacheekatti tuso ijahte, 'deerka ilkerengeetti Ikooniyo iratte.
44013052	Abatti la hamaad ichoow Rubeyti Munyee buuhicheen.
44014001	Baawulo ichoow Barnaba ilkerengeetti Ikooniyo ka laka i'di orrankateet u minki weysiite Ya'huude geleen. Intaas ka wori Waakh mujjum cheekeene, ichoowka 'doo'di buurenye yaafohi Ya'huud ichoow ki yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan ba Kamur rummeesteen.
44014002	I'daasenyi 'doo'di yaafohi Ya'huude Kamur rummeysan 'dii'de 'doo'di addane yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan sootukkiche ichoowka 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste iholloween.
44014003	Baawulo ichoow Barnaba 'deerka intaas geeddi deer fiddiyeene, roorro laan Kamur iyeyyeedeen. Kamur la runti wori haaggi Waakhe buurenye inno imunneynane icho cheekeen tuse, 'deerka miig siiche dahanohicho ka wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso ichoow girmo yeeleen.
44014004	'Doo'di ilkerengeeteet la seley gowe, gaasoo ki 'doo'daas Ya'huud yitahye, gaasoo la ki ergaano yitah.
44014005	'Doo'doo yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan ichoow 'doo'doo yaafohi Ya'huude ichoow weynaanticho ba dagsi ka isleetossateene, mali icho 'dee ergaano sina kawaarichaane toro dagah kachibaan goocheen.
44014006	I'daasenyi Baawulo ichoow Barnaba yeedaas kaseene ilkerengeetti Deerbe ichoow ti Luussira distriighi Lukahooniya kajirto ichoow ili tuummane isoodow ifirdeen.
44014007	Intaas ka orey isohteene Wori Haaggan cheekeen.
44014008	Ilkerengeetti Luussira ka etoo luhlo laaye, uus ladele injire isohan a jire.
44014009	Geedda Baawulo yeyyeedo dagansate. Baawulo indo katoolliche, saggi us Waakkhi usu samaacho ikakhuufo arge,
44014010	kariire, “Kahe tolosso,” iyidah. Geeddaas on ka et serey isoonyaame sohannaan sookhabte.
44014011	Urur la chirri us wihi Baawulo yeele arge ka, afichoki Ikooniyo ka riire, “Waakkhassi ittaawe maalinka uummanki enenyete inno ikayimaateen” yidaaheen.
44014012	Barnaba magah ibahcheene, Seewus yidaaheene, Baawulo la usu gon yeyyeede, Hermes yidaaheen.
44014013	Minki waakkhi Seewus layadeeh la ilkerengeet kharicheeda kajira. Kuhaanihi waakkhaas la heerar sookhaate fiikhti lukhum lakorche khabaayi aritti ilkerengeeteet keene. Usu ichoow urur la ergaano soorriyo ibihin 'doonaan.
44014014	I'daasenyi chirri Baawulo ichoow Barnabahi ergaanee wahaas daageen ka, darfohicho 'dii'ddo ka khakkharradicheene, saggi icho wihi 'doo'd yeelo i'dii'ddanyahiin tuseene, oryeene urur goya geleene riireen.
44014015	“Era i'da ayeelina. Nah laka i'diin u a weeli enenyet on. Nah Wori Haaggan on atin icheekna, 'dee waakkhassi ilmarhaatteete atin wahattaan urgiyissaane, Waakkhi jiro wahattaan. Ulla a Waakkhi serey ichoow harra ichoow beyohi burbuure ichoow wihi tuummane goyahicho kajiro soouume.
44014016	Kholoyyohi kute ka Waakh yaafo tuumman a 'diiche, tooba jitiche tabte.
44014017	I'daasenyi Waakh haaggi us yeelo ka saggi us rumanka ijiro enenyet a tuse. Hiri us atin siicho ichoow gurnaanki yeerassicho ka delo ka uuri 'dabakhe a atin tuste. Gololi buure la a atin siiche, rubeyohiin la hamaad buuhiche.”
44014018	Yeedaas tuumman ka laka ergaano nyife 'doo'd soorriyoti kootte us icho igoon leheet kaholisse.
44014019	'Doo'doo Ya'huude ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya ichoow Ikooniyo kayimiy la yimiyye 'doo'd ankicho isoolaabeene, ichoowka Baawulo dagah kachibeen. Kol us yumuyye koogyahiine 'deerka ilkerengeet khariche ijiiteen.
44014020	I'daasenyi inkoo abatti Baawulo kakhaaratte ka, Baawulo sookahe icho raahe ilkerengeet leegele. Saahka usu ichoow Barnaba ba ilkerengeetti Deerbe ikaheen.
44014021	Baawulo ichoow Barnaba la ilkerengeetti Deerbe ka Wori Haaggan cheekeene 'doo'di ittaawe abatti Kiriisto kayeeleen. 'Deerka toro kaheene ilkerengeetti Luussira ichoow ti Ikooniyo ichoow ti Antiyookhiya ili Bisiidiya inokhteen.
44014022	Ilkerengeetohaas ka abatti uur miigoocheene 'dee kakhuufnaanki icho Kiriisto kakhuufaan mujjum khucchaan. Wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Wihi massan, sinayyohi buurenye inno isoobaha dakhi Waakh kagella.”
44014023	Baawulo ichoow Barnaba urur Kiriisto ewweenkoo woyo isoobahcheene, 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste iweynaacheen. Af hiiteene 'doo'daas Kamuri icho kakhuufaan iwaheene, dahantiis gesseen.
44014024	Inkoo icho ili Bisiidiya tabeene ili Bambiiliya irteen,
44014025	intaas ka ilkerengeetti Beerga ka Yeedi Waakh cheekeen. Ilkerengeetti Attaaliya ikhubteen.
44014026	Ilkerengeetti Attaaliya ka kooban geleene ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya ili Siiriya kajirto inokhteen. Intaase hili icho toolla massicheen ka, goorat dahanohi haaggi Waakhe buure lakagesse.
44014027	Inkoo icho ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya geleen ka, urur Kiriisto isiwaheene, wihi Waakh icho ka yeele ichoow saggi Waakh jitoo ifure 'dee yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan laka Waakh ikakhuufaan icheekeen.
44014028	'Deerka geeddi deer intaas ka abatti leejireen.
44015001	'Doo'doo ili Ya'huudiya kasookhubte ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya yimiyye wihi us 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste abche, sammata i'di amurre Muusa atin iabissuu atin liikhandiyin, Waakh ma atin ribo.
44015002	Baawulo ichoow Barnaba jeenteti yeedaas u 'doo'daas leejaakheen. 'Deerka jeentetaas u Baawulo ichoow Barnaba ichoow 'doo'doo addane Kiriisto rummeeste lasoobahche, 'dee ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem irtaane wihi ayta miinsan ka ergaano ichoow ewweenki urur Kiriisto woyo argaan.
44015003	Urur Kiriisto icho ergate. Geedda icho ili Foniikiya ichoow ki Saamariya tabaan, saggi yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan Waakh ikakhuufeen cheekeen. Wora la 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste tuumman weyti kahamaadiche.
44015004	Chirri icho ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem sooeleeleen ka, urur Kiriisto ichoow ergaano ichoow ewweenki urur Kiriisto woyo ba icho martiisteen. Baawulo ichoow Barnaba la wihi Waakh icho ka yeele tuumman icheekeen.
44015005	'Deerka 'doo'doo Kiriisto rummeeste orey rabitti Farissaayo eheet la tolossate wihi us yidah, “Wihi massan, yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan a lakhandiya toro wihi laka'doono a ichohi amurre Muusa raaho.”
44015006	Ergaano ichoow ewweenki urur Kiriisto woyo ba jeenteti aytuu tossateen.
44015007	Inkoo icho geeddi deer hawwoocheen ka, Beetero tolossate, wihi us iyidah, “'Doo'd Kiriistokaaw, atin saggi goorat goytiin ka Waakh isoobahsate, yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan ani Wori Haaggan ikadaagaane 'dee icho Kiriisto irummeestaan a garattaan.
44015008	Waakkhi uurassi enenyet garti Rubeyti Munyeenye us icho siiche ka saggaas us inno laka inno isiichuu saggi us icho ikhaatte a tuse.
44015009	Inno ichoow icho la walah inno yeerarroocho mele, wihi tahe kakhuufnaanki icho Waakh kakhuufeen ka, Waakh uurassicho a dikhe.
44015010	Toollaka a i'doh Waakh kajme igelissaane, huleesi aacchinyeteen ommos inno iubaa'dan, abatti adah ikarartaan?
44015011	Mele! Wihi inno rummeysanni a innohi haaggi buurenye inno imunneynane koo Yeessohi Kamureene ka inno laribe. Icho laka a i'daas on.”
44015012	Chirra Baawulo ichoow Barnaba wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso ichoow girmohi Waakh icho ka yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan iyeele cheekaan ka nabah isudeene, urur tuumman ba rukkuy gooche.
44015013	Chirri icho yeyyeed massicheen ka, Yaakoobo sooyeede, wihi us yidah, “'Doo'd Kiriistokaaw idagansada.
44015014	Siimonhi Beetero layadeeh saggi Waakh kolooraat 'dooninti us yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan i'doono ituse, us gaasichokoo isoobahsate 'doo'diis ikayeesse a inno isoodowdowe.
44015015	Yeedi 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo yidah ichoow kan laka a israahaan. Wihi chiiran,
44015016	“ ‘Waha 'dubicho ka a soonokhda, min Dawuudki jejjebe disa. Raasiis ka toro min disa, toro icho toollicha.
44015017	'Dee 'doo'di addane harra tuumman, ichoow yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynane magaheey khabo Kamur yowtaan, iche Kamuri waha yeelo,’
44015018	goorat archiiy waha 'doo'd idowdowe essa.
44015019	“Maantaka wihi an gooche, uus inno yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynane Waakh iurgiyo 'howloon.
44015020	I'daasenyi khadaab ichiirro 'dee gololi iyookkoyyo ka labi'dirrooche uumhana, toro la 'doo'di isidisan uus isleeur'dine, naffi laluulliche uumhana, diig adamina inidaahe.
44015021	A mehe uus goorat archiiy ilkerengeetohi wewween tuumman ka wihi amurre Muusa miinsan a lacheeke, toro la Seeri Lanaso tuumman ka minki weysiite Ya'huud ka a lasooma.”
44015022	'Deerka ergaano ichoow ewweenki urur Kiriisto woyo ichoow urur Kiriisto tuumman wihi icho goocheen, 'doo'dichokoo soobahchaane, 'dee Baawulo ichoow Barnaba ka'daraane ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya leeirtaan. Et lamma 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste goyaka weynaan leh soobahcheen. 'Doo'daas la a Yuudahi Barsabba layadeeh ichoow Siila.
44015023	Khadaaba leergeen. Khadaab la wahane kachiiran. 'Doo'di khadaaba atin isoochiiro a nahi ergaanee ichoow ewweenki urur Kiriisto woyo i'diin u Kiriisto rummeeste. 'Doo'di nah isoochiirro la a atinhi yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynane Kiriisto rummeysatteene ilkerengeetohi Antiyookhiya ichoow Siiriya ichoow Kiliikiya taalliin. Nebeeheyte!
44015024	Wihi nah daagne, 'doo'doo ki intee a atin iyimiyye yeedicho ka atin malalicheene toro atin kaholloocheen. I'daasenyi nah 'doo'daas amur ma siin.
44015025	Nah la a tossanne 'deerka 'doo'doo farniin keeno atin ieregno nidah. Icho la a aalasseenyoki nah weyti 'doonno, Barnaba ichoow Baawulo issooraahaan.
44015026	Barnaba ichoow Baawulo la jeenteti hil Yeesso Kiriistohi Kamureene u jiroticho adahe gateen.
44015027	Maantaka Yuuda ichoow Siila iche atin isooeregna, icho la waha nah soochiirre atin isoocheekaan.
44015028	Waha on menye, nah ichoow Rubeyti Munyee ba uus nah huleesoo addan atin korin iche nidah.
44015029	Gololi iyookkoyyohi waakkhakh lakayeessi liisoorriyooche uumhana, diig adamina, naffi laluulliche uumhana, 'doo'di isidisan uus isleeur'din. Chirri atin waha tuumman iskaholisseen wihi haaggane yeesseen. A Waakh atin bariisti.
44015030	'Doo'di leergate irte, ichoowka ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya ka urur Kiriisto tuumman ururiche, khadaab idiibe.
44015031	Chirri 'doo'd khadaab soome ka weyti hamaadeen, jeenteti us uur imiigooche u.
44015032	Yuuda ichoow Siila la icho rubeycho a 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo, wihi ittaawe 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste icheekeene, uur miigoocheen.
44015033	Inkoo icho geeddoo intaas fiddiyeen ka, 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste icho nebey 'diiche 'doo'di goorat sooergate inokhteen.
44015035	I'daasenyi Baawulo ichoow Barnaba geeddoo ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya fiddiyeen. 'Doo'doo addane ittaawe khabaani Yeedi Kamur cheekeen.
44015036	Inkoo geeddoo lafiddiye ka Baawulo wihi us Barnaba iyidah, “Kaale a nokhanni 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste ilkerengeetohi goorat inno Yeedi Kamur kacheekne kijiro tuumman a tabno, saggi icho ijiraan a sooagarro.”
44015037	Barnaba ichohi Yoohanahi magahiiskoo Marko layadeeh khaatti, iche 'doona.
44015038	I'daasenyi Baawulo Marko weyti 'dii'de. A mehe us icho ili Bambiiliya ka a katabe, icho hil ma kaleejirin.
44015039	Lammache ba weyti isleeiriirte seley bahte. Barnaba Yoohanahi Marko layadeeh khaatte, anki kurti bicche dahcho kajirto Kuuburo layadeeh kooban igele.
44015040	I'daasenyi Baawulo Siila soobahsate kahe. 'Doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste icho Waakh iwahe, dahanohi haaggi Kamure buure gesseen.
44015041	Siiriya ichoow Kiliikiya tabe ururre Kiriisto uur miigooche.
44016001	Baawulo ichoow Siila koloo ilkerengeetti Deerbe tabeene, saahka ilkerengeetti Luussira irteen. Etoo abatti Kiriisteenye Timooti layadeehe abartiis Kiriisto rummeysatte la intaas a kajire. Abartiis a inanti Ya'huude, i'daasenyi aabbahiis a yaaftoo Ya'huud ieheynan.
44016002	'Doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste ilkerengeetti Luussira kajiro ichoow ki ilkerengeetti Ikooniyo kajiro la weyti haag Timooti cheeke.
44016003	Baawulo usuhi Timooti khaatti leeirti 'doona, 'deerka khandiye. Waha a jeenteti 'doo'di Ya'huude intaas kajiro saggi aabba Timooti yaaftoo Ya'huud ieheynan iyahe toro us ikhandiineynan igarti.
44016004	Geedda icho kolba ilkerengeettoo irtaan la, ayti goorat ergaano ichoow ewweenki urur Kiriisto woyo ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka goocheen iche 'doo'd Kiriisto icheekaane 'dee a raaheen.
44016005	'Deerka ururre Kiriisto kakhuufnaanki icho Kiriisto kakhuufaan ka uur lamiigooche toro il baryo 'doo'di Kamur kakhuufo kasookhayme.
44016006	Jeenteti Rubeyti Munyee ichohi boroofenhi Aassiya Wori Haaggan kacheeko itirattuu, irteene ili Furiijiya ichoow Galaatiya dah kagoocheen.
44016007	Chirri icho baggati ilkerengeetti Miisiya eleeleen ka, boroofenhi Bi'duuniya gelin leheete i'daasenyi Rubey Yeesso icho tiratte.
44016008	'Deerka ilkerengeetti Miisiya dah kagoocheene ichoowka ilkerengeetti Tuurowa ikhubteen.
44016009	Ibeen ka Baawulo fooltabcho ka etoo ili Makedooniya isootoollo hawwaasti, “Kaale Makedooniya amiite, nah gargaar,” idowo arge.
44016010	Inkoo Baawulo fooltabcho arge ka, chirraas on tannabanne, anki Makedooniya miinsanne. Wihi nah goonne Waakh a nah wahe, 'dee icho Wori Haaggan icheekna.
44016011	Kooban korre ilkerengeetti Tuurowa kakahne, kurti bicche dahcho kajirto Sammo'daraake eleelle, ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka ilkerengeetti bicche aficho kajirto Neyyaboolis layadeeh gelle.
44016012	Intaas ka kahne, ilkerengeetti Fiiliffi gelle. Fiiliffi la a ilkerengeetti oraate ili Makedooniya. Makedooniya la 'doo'di ili Roomeenye anta. Ilkerengeettaas geeddoo fiddiine.
44016013	Seeri Lanaso ka aritti ilkerengeeteet kabahne, hawti 'dusso iranne. Kol nah intaas ka meessi Ya'huud kaweesti 'hello koognahe. Orrommanne, oboorrihi intaas ka urure leeyyeene.
44016014	Deyyehoti nah dagansatte goyaka too a makhaabassoo Liidiya layadeehe, ilkerengeetti weene 'Diyaa'dira katimiyye darfohoo mummuggeyyee ororisso. Iche la Waakhe wahatta, Kamur la uuriche fure, 'dee wihi Baawulo essi iyo'hatta.
44016015	Chirra iche ichoow 'doo'di minkiche kajire tuumman labaattissiye ka, goobiche nah iwahte, “Chirri atin ani eti Kamur rummeeste ikhaattaan, kaaleya minkeey fiddiya,” nah itidah. Iche la nah hawwaassatte.
44016016	Maantooka, nahi inti lakaweesti isohanni, inantoo bow'deenye ginna dakhatti, ginna la miigti iche wihi sooyateeh kacheekto siisso, nah 'hesse. Iche la 'doo'di iche ifasso jeenteti iche wihi sooyateeh icheekto on u, a kamurroosse.
44016017	Riirtaayi nah ichoow Baawulo nah sooraahte, riirte, “'Doo'da a falfayyohi Waakkhi weyti ween! Saggi atin liiribo, iche atin icheekaan,” elatte.
44016018	Iche la ibeenneti ittaawe i'daas yeesse ichoowka Baawulo weyti hollowe, iurgiye, ginna leeyeede wihi us iyidah, “Antohi magah Yeesso Kiriisto ka, amure kibahcha, inanta kasoobah!” Chirraas on ginna inám kabahte.
44016019	Chirri 'doo'di inanti bow'dee leh saggi icho kola khajjeeli icho chilimme ka'helaan ikhabin kase ka, Baawulo ichoow Siila khabteene, khaateene, inti lakoororsati ka, 'doo'di intaas ka 'doo'd hukkumo igeecheen.
44016020	'Doo'di Rooma intaas ka 'doo'd hukkumo igeecheene, “'Doo'da a Ya'huude, toolla la ilkerengeettaanya sina ikeenaan,” iyidaaheen.
44016021	“Icho hugummetoo amurreti sirgaali Rooma buusane nahi Rooma ikhaatanne iraahin iche enenyet abchaan.”
44016022	Urur tuumman la jaakh ka leekahe, 'doo'di wewween la amuri Baawulo illeh darfo lakabahcho lajaho bahche.
44016023	Inkoo icho weyti jaheen ka, jeela ka hideene, eti jeela yaakhicho amur ibahcheene mujjum a latoorribo.
44016024	Eti jeela yaakhicho la, chirri us yeedaas daage ka, khaate, jeela goyaka minki goyaatteet gesse, gurtunki buure luhlo gesse, kahide.
44016025	Geeddi ibeene il ekka seley kagowe ka, Baawulo ichoow Siila Waakh wahteene, geeyohi Waakh laka dowteen. 'Doo'di addane hidan la a dagansata on.
44016026	Koloo kalday on harra weyti sesseehte ichoowka daddaabohi ilaate minassi jeela laka weyti korkokeen. Chirraas on afassi jeela tuumman furnameene, ga'daarreti kootte 'doo'd lakahide la fuffuratte.
44016027	Chirri eti jeela toorribo sookahe, us saggi afaf ifurayyihiin arge ka, kol 'doo'di hihhidan firde koogyahee, birlabiis soo'hiire isigaasan leheet.
44016028	I'daasenyi Baawulo weyti riire, “Iisigaasan, nah tuumman inta on kajirra,” iyidah.
44016029	Eti jeela iween banay a lasookhaato yidahye, soonyaame, usuhi hamar ka seeho Baawulo ichoow Siila orcho ka jilbo il kagu'dde.
44016030	'Deerka Baawulo ichoow Siila khar isoobahche, “Era, mehe yeela 'dee Waakh iriba?” worsate.
44016031	Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Yeessohi Kamure rummeyso, 'dee ati ichoow minkaah tuummamba a atin laribaa.”
44016032	'Deerka usu ichoow eti minkiis kajiro tuumman Yeedi Kamur icheekeen.
44016033	Ibeenkaas goya on eti jeela iween icho khaate, jiissicho dikhe, 'deerka chirraas on usu ichoow minkiis tuummamba labaattissiye.
44016034	Eti jeela iween icho minkiis geeche, gololoo icho yamhiin siiche. Usu ichoow minkiis jeenteti icho Waakh irummeesteen u weyti hamaadeen.
44016035	Saahta chirdeer ka, 'doo'di 'doo'd hukkumo iskarticho ergate, “'Doo'daas soofura,” yidah.
44016036	Eti jeela iween la wihi us Baawulo iyidah, “'Doo'di 'doo'd hukkumo farniin a soo'diiche, ‘Baawulo ichoow Siila a lafuro,’ yidaaheen. Toolla kaha, nebey leeirda.”
44016037	I'daasenyi Baawulo wihi us iskar iyidah, “Chirri 'doo'di Rooma nah liiekkaacho laka, icho 'dow on ka nah jaheene, toro jeela nah geecheen. Toollaka toro dagsi nah kabahchaan? Mele! Icho rubeycho a yimaateene, a nah bahcheen.”
44016038	Iskare la yeeda khaatte, 'doo'di 'doo'd hukkumo igeesse, 'doo'di 'doo'd hukkumo la chirri us saggi 'doo'd ki ili Rooma iyahe daage ka roorro gesse.
44016039	Iyimaateene, “Nah ikakuta,” iyidaaheene, jeela kabahcheene, hawwaasteene 'dee ilkerengeet a kabaheen.
44016040	Inkoo Baawulo ichoow Siila jeela kabaheene, min Liidiya irteen ka 'doo'd Kiriisto 'heleene, uur miigoocheene, 'deerka katabeen.
44017001	Baawulo ichoow Siila orey isohteene, ilkerengeetohi Amfifooli ichoow Aboolloniya dah kagoocheene, ilkerengeetti 'Dessaloonika minki weysiite Ya'huud kajiro geleen.
44017002	Baawulo la i'di orran us yeeluu irte, minki weysiit irte. Intaas ka teeba seyyah issoorahto Seeri Lanaso tuummamba leejire, wihi Chiirnaanneti Waakh tadeeh idowdowe,
44017003	wihi massan, Ki Lasubhe sina lakawaaricha, toro omoot kasookaha. “Yeessoha an atin idowdowo iche Ki Lasubhee,” iyidah.
44017004	'Doo'doo Ya'huud la yeedaas rummeeste, Baawulo ichoow Siila ikhayeen. 'Doo'doo ittaawenye Ya'huud ieheynane Waakh karooro ichoow deyyehoti ittaawenye magah khabto laka Kamur rummeeste.
44017005	I'daasenyi 'doo'di Ya'huud inaaf gele, 'deerka 'doo'doo sussuuje sokko ka soobaayicheene, ururi suuje yitaaheene ilkerengeet tuumman wereericheen. Minki etoo Yaason layadeeh dihte, kol Baawulo ichoow Siila minkaas kijiraane koogyihiine, 'dee reeraas khaatta enenyet igeessa.
44017006	I'daasenyi chirri icho waayeen ka, Yaason ichoow 'doo'doo Kiriisto rummeeste khabteene, il kajiiteene, 'doo'di ilkerengeet iwewween igeecheen. Riireene, “Reera harra tuumman sina a ikeene, toro toolla ilkerengeetteen laka a yimaateen,” yidaaheen.
44017007	“Yaason la icho minkiis ka a martiiste. Icho tuumman la amurreti karnati ili Rooma jebchaane, karnatoo addane Yeesso layadeeh a jira, 'doo'd idowaan.”
44017008	Chirri icho waha daageen ka, urur ichoow weynaanti ilkerengeeteet weyti wereereen.
44017009	'Doo'di wewween la inkoo us Yaason ichoow 'doo'di usu leejire chilimme geeddi kootte laka'doono icho ka'heleen ka 'diicheene, irteen.
44017010	Uus il ibeennowe ka 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste Baawulo ichoow Siila ilkerengeetti Beeroya ierge. Chirri icho Beeroya geleen ka minki weysiite Ya'huud irteen.
44017011	'Doo'di ilkerengeetti Beeroya la i'di 'doo'di 'Dessaloonika menye, a 'doo'doo mujjum dogo khabo, weyti wihi liidowo dagansati, Chiirnaanneti Waakh soomo usu wihi Baawulo illeh idoween rum yahiin yeyo.
44017012	'Doo'di Ya'huude ittaawe Kiriisto rummeeste. Deyyehoti ittaawenye magah khabto yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan ichoow mejeli yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynane ittaawe laka Kiriisto rummeeste.
44017013	Chirri 'doo'di Ya'huude ilkerengeetti 'Dessaloonika kajiro saggi Baawulo ilkerengeetti Beeroya ka Yeedi Waakh icheeko abte ka, yimaateene, 'doo'd ururicheene, Baawulo isootukkicheen.
44017014	'Doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste chirraas on Baawulo khaate, beyti buure afiche eleeliche, i'daasenyi Siila ichoow Timooti Beeroya fiddiyeen.
44017015	'Doo'di kootte Baawulo khaate la, Baawulo raahe ichoowka ilkerengeetti Aa'den eleelicheene intaas ka nokhteen. Baawulo Siila ichoow Timooti amur ibahche 'dee dowwa ilkerengeetti Aa'den ka usu a isookhayeen.
44017016	Baawulo la ilkerengeetti Aa'den ka Siila ichoow Timooti sugaayi, weyti uur suujowe jeenteti ilkerengeettaas iyookkoyyohi waakkhakh lakayeessi ibuuhaan u.
44017017	'Deerka minki weysiite Ya'huud ka, 'doo'di Ya'huud ichoow 'doo'di Ya'huud ieheynane Waakh karooro laka leehawwooche. Maanti addan la sokko ka 'doo'di us 'hele leehawwooche.
44017018	'Doo'doo wihi etoo Eebikur layadeeh 'doo'd abcho raaho ichoow 'doo'doo wihi rabittoo Siitoyig layadeeh enenyet abisso raaho leehawwooche. Gaasichokoo mehe worsateen ya, “Waha immarah yeyyeedo mehe essaan?” Gaasichokoo la mehe essaan ya, “Waakkhassi 'doo'di yeelane woricho cheeka.” Wihi icho i'daas kayidaaheen la a jeenteti Baawulo Wori Haaggane Yeesso miinsan ichoow saggi Yeesso omoot ikasookahe ikayeyyeedo.
44017019	Baawulo khaateene, kurteti Ariyobaag ka jaldaabti tossatti igeecheen. Wihi iche tidah, “Waha husube at 'doo'd abisso iche aban 'doonna.
44017020	Waha at nah icheekto, gaasoo a wihi nah injire idaagin, toollaka nahi wihi icho yahiin abanni iche 'doonna.”
44017021	'Doo'di ilkerengeetti Aa'den kajiro ichoow 'doo'di yeelane intaas fiddiyo tuumman ayti husube us dagansati toro us kahawwoocho on menye, walah addane us haaggicho mele.
44017022	Baawulo 'deerka 'doo'di kootte Ariyobaag ka tossati ortiis tolossate, “Mejeli Aa'den!” yidah. “Saggi atin jitat tuumman ka 'doo'di waakkhassi ittaawe wahti itahiin a arga.
44017023	Wihi tahe, geedda an ilkerengeettiin goya dah kagooche, an wahanyeyyohi atin wahattaan mujjum fiiriche, chalagtoo hoola lakasoorriyoocho waha kachiiranyahiine 'hele, Kaas chirri atin igaran laka atin wahattaan, iche toolla atin isoocheeka.
44017024	“Waakkhi harra ichoow wihi tuummane goya kajiro soouume, a Kamuri serey ichoow harra leh. Ulla minassi weysiite dahanohi weeli enenyet diseen goya ma fiddiyo.
44017025	Ulla i'doo us wohoo 'doonuu, dahanohi weeli enenyet ma liikafalo. A mehe usu rubeytiissa weeli enenyet tuumman jiro ichoow neebsi ichoow walah tuumman siicha.
44017026	Etoo kalday on ka yaafohi harra tuumman soouume 'dee harra tuumman furtaane, toro inti icho furtaan ichoow maanti icho furtaan a gooche.
44017027	Ulla i'daas a yeele 'dee icho laka usu yowtaan, 'dee kolossoo yowtaani kasooyegaan. I'daasenyi Waakh eteen us kadeeryahe mele.
44017028	‘A mehe inno goytiissa kajirra, kasohanna, toro kanoolnahe.’ I'di mammahtiintoo tadeeh u, ‘Inno laka a delootiissa.’
44017029	“Maantaka inno a nyaakhuti Waakh gone, kol Waakh i'di iyookkoyyohi 'dahabyahe ommos i'di lahaageetyahe ommos i'di dagakki layeele yahe ommos i'di iyookkoyyohi layeelo yahe uus inno koogeynan.
44017030	Goorat 'hor Waakh enenyeti aytiis igaran walah us iekkaache mele, i'daasenyi toolla amuri us enenyet tuumman meelbaaw us kijiro ka ibahcho, a ki icho uskeelicho kasoonokhtaan.
44017031	A mehe us ibeenki us enenyet tuumman jiti fissan ka eti us soobahsate ka hukkumo a gooche. Waakh la omoottaas us kasookahche ka enenyet tuumman a irummaache.”
44017032	Chirri icho Baawulohi omootti lakasookaho kaayyeedo daageen ka, gaasoo kachaarteene, i'daasenyi gaasoo “Atihi waha inokhatti kayeyyeeddo iche daagin 'doonna,” iyidaaheen.
44017033	Baawulo geeddaas ka Jaldaab katabe.
44017034	'Doo'doo rucchul la Baawulo raahe Kiriisto rummeeste. Goycho ka, koo a etoo jaldaabti toli Ariyobaagenye Diyoonissa layadeeh ichoow makhaabassoo Daamaris layadeeh ichoow 'doo'doo addan.
44018001	Inkoo waha kuteen ka Baawulo ilkerengeetti Aa'den kabahe ilkerengeetti Koriinto irte.
44018002	Intaas ka etoo Ya'huude Akiila layadeehe ili Boontus kadesse 'hele. Ulla makhaabassiisti Birisiila layadeeh khabaayi, ili 'Deylaane kayimiy, a mehe karnati ilaase Kilaawudiyo layadeeh, iche eti Ya'huude tuumman ilkerengeetti weene Rooma a kabaho yidah. Baawulo icho sooyeyin irte,
44018003	jeenteti us i'dichuu eemayyo itolo khookhaani isikayowtuu la, icho geeddoo leefiddiye toro la hil leehaaggiche.
44018004	Seeri Lanaso tuumman la minki weysiite Ya'huude irte 'doo'di Ya'huud ichoow 'doo'di Ya'huud ieheynan, wori Waakh icheeke anki Waakh isoojiite.
44018005	Maanti Siila ichoow Timooti ili Makedooniya kayimaateen ka, Baawulo Yeedi Waakhe us cheeko kalday miinsate, 'doo'di Ya'huud saggi Yeesso rumanka Ki Lasubhe iyahe icheeke.
44018006	I'daasenyi chirri 'doo'di Ya'huud Baawulo tirrime icho usu leeabaarrameen ka, ebeeri darfohiis ijillaanjilliche saggi icho ikhufeen tuse. Wihi us iyidah, “Chirri atin baabaateen, atin on awtiin u isooya. Ani walah liiworsati mele. Uus toolla kakhabatti, an yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynane iirda.”
44018007	Baawulo 'deerka minki weysiit kabahe, minki etoo Tiitiyo Yaasto layadeehe minkiis minki weysiit khuccho irte. Eta la a etoo weyti Waakh karooro.
44018008	Eti Kiriisbo layadeehe minki weysiite Ya'huud itoollo la, usu ichoow minkiis ba Kamur a rummeesteen. 'Doo'doo ittaawenye ilkerengeetti Koriinto kajiro Baawulo daage la, Kiriisto rummeeste, labaattissiye.
44018009	Ibeenkooka Kamur Baawulo fooltabcho ka leeyyeede wihi us iyidah, “'Doo'da akaroorin, leeyeyyeede, waha at haaggisso la a'diin.
44018010	Wihi tahe an a kileejira. Et wohoo kiyeelo la mele, i'di tahe ilkerengeetta ka 'doo'di ittaawe a kaaya.”
44018011	Ulla goycho gu'hoo ichoow hay lih fiddiye Yeedi Waakh abche.
44018012	Maanti Gaalliyo ili Akhaaya iweynaate ka, 'doo'di Ya'huud tuumman yimiyye Baawulo khabte, kootiin ortiis geecheen.
44018013	Icho la wihi icho yidaaheen, “Eta jitoo amurre buusane 'doo'd Waakh kawahda idowa!”
44018014	Chirri Baawulo yeedin leheet ka, Gaalliyo 'doo'di Ya'huud leeyeede, wihi us iyidah, “Chirri atinhi Ya'huude kootte waha uskeeloo layeele tahe ommos wohoo suuje tahe, a geeddi an nabah atin isudo.
44018015	I'daasenyi waha a iriir ichoow magahenye ichoow yeedassi amurretiinna one, atin on haaggicha. An wahanyeyyohi i'daase ka enenyet hukkumin ma 'doono.”
44018016	Ulla 'deerka kootiin goya 'doo'd kasoobahche.
44018017	Geeddi icho isoobahin, icho tuumman eti minki weysiite Ya'huud itoollo Soosteena layadeeh khabteene, kootiin ortiis ka jaheen. I'daasenyi Gaalliyo wahaas ma ibaalin ba.
44018018	Baawulo ilkerengeetti weene Koriinto ibeennetoo fiddiye. Saahka 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste katabe, Akiila ichoow Birisiila khabaayi kooban ka boroofenhi Siiriya ikahe. Geeddi us kooban igelin, ilkerengeetti Kenkereeya ka matah lahaa'de, a mehe ibeenneti us Waakh idaatte a massatte.
44018019	Chirri icho ilkerengeetti Efeesso yimaateen ka, Baawulo Birisiila ichoow Akiila intaas katabe. Baawulo minki weysiite Ya'huud irte, 'doo'di Ya'huud leehawwooche.
44018020	Chirri icho usuhi geeddoo leefiddiyo daaheen ka, fiddi 'dii'de.
44018021	I'daasenyi chirra us kaho ka, “Chirri Waakh 'doono a atin isoonokhda,” iyidahye, kooban kore ilkerengeetti Efeesso kabahe.
44018022	Chirri us ilkerengeetti Kaaysareya yimiy ka, kooban kasooyege ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem irte urur Kiriisto bariitiche, 'deerka ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya ikhubte.
44018023	Inkoo us geeddoo intaas fiddiye ka, irte ili Galaatiya ichoow ki Furiijiya tabe abatti faajjiye.
44018024	Etoo Ya'huudenye ili Alekisaandariya kadesse Aboollo layadeeh la ilkerengeetti Efeesso yimiy. Ulla a etoo af ka miigenye weyti Chiirnaanneti Waakh laka garti.
44018025	Usu jiti Kamur ka a lawaaniche, uuriis tuumman ka yeyyeede, wori Yeesso miinsan mujjum 'doo'd abche. I'daasenyi baattissiyoti us garti tuumman a baattissiyo Yoohana on.
44018026	Ulla minki weysiite Ya'huud ka 'doo'd roorro laan leeyyeede. Chirri Birisiila ichoow Akiila usu daageen ka, khaateene minkicho ka mujjum jiti Waakh idowdoween.
44018027	Maanti Aboollo ili Akhaaya ikahin 'doone ka, 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste ilkerengeetti Efeesso kijiro usu uur miigooche, abattiti intaas kijirto khadaab ichiireene, 'dee etaas a martiisteen. Maanti us intaas eleele 'doo'di haaggi Waakhe buurenye inno imunneynan ka Kiriisto rummeeste weyti gargaare.
44018028	A mehe us chirri us 'doo'di Ya'huud enenyet tuumman ortiis ka leehawwoocho, af ka a kahataate, Chiirnaanneti Waakh ka, saggi Yeesso rumanka Ki Lasubhe iyahe tuse.
44019001	Aboollo ilkerengeetti Koriinto kajiraayi, Baawulo kahe il dah kagooche ilkerengeetti Efeesso gele, intaas ka abattitoo 'hele.
44019002	Ulla wihi us icho worsate, “Maanti atin Yeesso rummeysatteen Rubeyti Munyee a 'hesseen?” Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Nah Rubeyti Munyeenye jirto laka ma daagin.”
44019003	Baawulo 'deerka wihi us worsate, “Maanti atin labaattissiye, soonnaankeyya raahteen?” Wihi icho ilaabeen, “Soonnaan Yoohana.”
44019004	Baawulo wihi us iyidah, “Wihi baattissiyo Yoohana enenyet tusso, a 'doo'di uskeel kasoonokhte. Yoohana rubeytiis la wihi us 'doo'd iyidah, ‘Ki 'dubeey ka yamiit rummeesda,’ kaas la a Yeesso.”
44019005	Chirri icho waha daageen ka magah Yeessohi Kamure ka labaattissiye.
44019006	Chirri Baawulo icho dahano korche ka, Rubeyti Munyee isooyagte, icho la afassi icho idaagin kaayyeedeene toro wori Waakh kayimiy cheekeen.
44019007	Ichohi labaattissiye la isgoya a geeddi et tomon ichoow lamma.
44019008	Baawulo minki weysiite Ya'huud gele, intaas ka hay seyyah roorro laan icho hawwaaste, wori dakhi Waakh miinsane isoojijjiitaa.
44019009	I'daasenyi 'doo'd gaasiiskoo a ki matah miigenye, yeed rummeysan 'dii'de, toro enenyet tuumman ortiis ka, jiti Kamur wihi noole sussuuje kacheekeen. Baawulo 'deerka icho katabe. Abatti khaatte, maan tuumman min Turannoki buure ka 'doo'd Yeedi Waakh kaleehawwooche.
44019010	Gu'h lamma tuumman ba saggaas on isohte ichoowka 'doo'di boroofenhi Aassiya kajiro tuumman ki Ya'huud ichoow ki Ya'huud ieheynan ba Yeedi Kamur daage.
44019011	Waakh la Baawulo ka, wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane injire liiargin yeele.
44019012	'Deerka dafartoor fool lakahiyyaayti ichoow darfohiiski chaafo kalaabo sartiissa on 'daare laka a lakhaata 'doo'di khakkhannan liigeecha, samaataane ginnayyo laka enenyet goya lakariha.
44019013	'Doo'doo Ya'huud a sossohta 'doo'di ginnayyo dakhtaan ginnayyo kabahchaane, magah Yeessohi Kamurenye lawaho ka ginnayyo bihin leheet. Wihi icho ginnayyo iyadeehiin, “Antohi magah Yeessohi Baawulo woriis cheeko ka amure kibahcha, soobah.”
44019014	Ínam teebati etoo kuhaanihi weene Ya'huude Iskeefa layadeeh leeyahe i'dane yeessa.
44019015	Maantooka ginna wihi iche icho ilaabte, “An Yeesso a garda, Baawulo laka wihiis a garda, i'daasenyi atin a ayyo?”
44019016	Eti kootte ginna dakhatte 'deerka icho tuumman inyaame, icho tuumman kahataate. Icho weyti jahe ichohi murukkheenye toro nabarre diigto minkiis kafirdeen.
44019017	Chirri 'doo'di Ya'huud ichoow ki Ya'huud ieheynane ilkerengeetti Efeesso kajiro tuumman wahaas daage ka, weyti bur'dowe. Magah Yeessohi Kamure la weyti liinkaanyite.
44019018	'Doo'di ittaawenye rummeeste, yimiyye, uskeeli icho yeelaan 'dow ka cheekeen.
44019019	'Doo'doo moroyyee laka khadaabbetichoti yuyyuuban sookhaate 'doo'd tuumman ortiis ka gubeen. Khadaabbeti yuyyuuban la chirri islakachibe gatoticho a chilim alif tomon chan.
44019020	I'daas ka la, 'doo'di buurenye Yeedi Kamur daage, toro raahe.
44019021	Inkoo waha tuumman yitaaheen, Baawulo Rubeyti Munyee woytaayi wihi us gooche, chirri us ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem irti, ili Makedooniya ichoow ki Akhaaya dah kagoocha. Wihi us yidah, “Inkoo an intaas irde, ilkerengeetti weene Rooma laka a sooarga.”
44019022	Baawulo geeddi us ibeennetoo boroofenhi Aassiya fiddiyo reeroo lammeenye kiisenye usu gargaaro ili Makedooniya iergate. Reera a Timooti ichoow Eraasta.
44019023	Chirraase ilkerengeetti Efeesso ka jeenteti yeedi Jiti Kamur miinsan u, sinati buure isoobahte.
44019024	Etoo tumaalenye Demmediroos layadeeh la minki waakkhi deyyahe Arteemis layadeeh lakawahti iche iyookkoyyohoo nunnucchule lahaagtoo dakhan lakahaaggiche ihaaggicha. Bacchaaratiis la 'doo'di hiliis kajiro weyti chilimmeti buure ikeenta.
44019025	'Doo'daas ichoow 'doo'doo addane hilicho i'di kaas yahe wahe. Wihi us iyidah, “Era saggi kamurroonkeen bacchaarata ikayamiit a garattaan.
44019026	Atin la wihi eta Baawulo layadeeh yeelo a agartaane, toro la a isidaagtaan. Us wihi us essi a mehe ya, waakkhassi dahanti enenyet haaggicheen koloo kalday laka Waakh mee. Ilkerengeetti Efeesso ichoow boroofenhi Aassiya buurtiis ka, 'doo'di ittaawe a baabiiche.
44019027	Toollaka wihi soosohti ka bacchaarateenta magah a uskulaata. Wahaas kalday la menye, minki waakkheenki deyyahe weene Arteemis layadeeh laka magah a waaya. Waakkheenki Aassiya ichoow harra tuumman ka lawahti wohoo marahe yateeh.”
44019028	'Doo'di bacchaarti chirri us waha daage ka weyti hollowe, riire, “Arteemisti Efeesso a weentahe!” yidah.
44019029	Chirraas on riirit ilkerengeet tuumman kataa'he. Urur Gaayo ichoow Aristaarkoshi Baawulo walhicho ili Makedooniya ka sooraahe khabte. Leeoryeene, inti lakagir'daamo geecheen.
44019030	Baawulo rubeytiis usuhi urur ortiis irti 'doone, i'daasenyi abatti usu tiratte.
44019031	Weynaanti boroofen gaasoo aalassiise laka Baawulo farniin isoo'diichene hawwaasteen uus minki lakagir'daamo iran.
44019032	Geeddaas ka la meel tuumman a riirit kalday on. 'Doo'doo riirit ka wohoo essa, koo la riirit ka wohoo addane essa. 'Doo'd buurtiis la wihi icho intaas ka isikeene laka ma garti.
44019033	'Doo'di Ya'huud la etoo Alekisaanda layadeeh urur isootakhe, wihi us yayyadeeh la icheeke. Ulla dahan ka 'doo'd leeyeede, wihi jiro icheekin 'doonáa.
44019034	I'daasenyi chi'icho saggi us Ya'huud iyahe kaseen ka, hooyoo kalday ka geeddi saha'd lamma tuumman riireene, “Arteemisti ilkerengeetti Efeesso a weentahe,” esseen.
44019035	Eti ilkerengeet ka khadaabbe chiiro urur yaasiche, wihi us yidah, “'Doo'di Efeesso, 'doo'di harra tuumman saggi ilkerengeetti Efeesso minki weysiite Arteemisti ween ichoow dagahti lagane serey kasoodihte iyaakhisso ma garti?
44019036	Maantaka et runta 'dii'do mele gone, wihi lakaa'doono a atihi gammadisso, wohoo 'dalammoon la iyeelin.
44019037	'Doo'da atin inta keenteen minassi weysiit ma hatine ommos waakkheenki deyyah ma igafin.
44019038	Chirri Demmediroos ichoow tumaassi addan etoo wohoo kakhabto la, kootiin a jira. Weynaanti sirgaal laka a jirta, a irteene eti icho wohoo iskakhabaan a cheekti.
44019039	Chirri atin wohoo addan keenin 'doontaan la, toli amurre 'doonto labahcha yeedaas lamassicha.
44019040	Saggi walah ijiraan u, maalinka a geeddi inno lakhabti jeenteti ururi il baabuluu. 'Deerka riirita ka walah inno laabno mele, jeente il liibaabulo mele gon.”
44019041	Inkoo us waha yidah ka urur seley kahche.
44020001	Chirri kowdo goote ka, Baawulo abatti soowahe, inkoo us icho uur miigooche ka, “A Waakh atin bariisti,” iyidahye, ili Makedooniya ikahe.
44020002	Ulla ilaas tuumman dah kagooche, 'doo'd Kiriisto wori ittaawe ka uur miigooche, 'da'ddaboka ili 'Hellas gele,
44020003	ilkerengeetti weene Koriinto hay seyyah fiddiye. Ulla kooban ka ili Siiriya ikahin leheet. I'daasenyi jeenteti 'doo'di Ya'huud mal igooche 'dee khaban i'doonuu, saggi us ili Makedooniya itabo us inokhti gooche.
44020004	'Doo'di usu walhiche a inam Birroki ili Beeroya, Soobarro layadeeh ichoow Aristaarkos ichoow Sekundohi ilkerengeetti 'Dessaloonika ichoow Gaayohi ili Deerbe. 'Doo'di ili Aassiya Baawulo walhiche la a Tuuchiko ichoow Turofiimo. Timooti laka Baawulo a walhiche.
44020005	Icho la kooban ka orey isohteene, ilkerengeetti Tuurowa ka nah sugeen.
44020006	Nah la inkoo Daawti Makaateti Liikhasin kutte ka kooban ka ilkerengeetti Fiiliffi kakahne. Ibeen chan sohanne 'doo'd ilkerengeetti Tuurowa ka toro ikhayne. Teebatoo intaas fiddiine.
44020007	Ibeenki oraate teebataas ka isinimiy, 'dee gololi Kamure isleenahame, toro omoot Yeesso kasoo'hellaa. Baawulo 'doo'd Yeedi Waakh icheeke ichoowka ibeen ekka seley kagowe, i'di tahe usuhi ibeenki kaas sooraaho kaho 'doonaa.
44020008	Goonankaas saraate islaka'helo ka taassi ittaawenye jira.
44020009	Geedda Baawulo yeyyeedo la etoo nugule Ewuutukos layadeehe 'dohti min kafiddiyo ur'dumme khaatte. Chirra ur'dumme khaatte ka, minki seyyahnaatteete saraat kasoodihe ichoowka il gu'dde. Chirri icho sookkhichaan, a yumuy.
44020010	Baawulo la il ikhubte et isi'diiche, dahano kayuubte, “Anahina, et a noolyahee,” yidah.
44020011	Baawulo 'deerka toro minki saraat ikore, makaate isleeyumheen. Inkoo us icho leeyyeede ichoowka orrahe sookorte ka, katabe.
44020012	'Doo'd eta nugul usuhi nool khaate goob geecheen. Icho la weyti uur lakhobooche.
44020013	Intaas ka Baawulo katabne, kooban gelle, orey isohanne ichoowka ilkerengeetti 'dee Baawulo kooban kagelo Assos layadeeh i'dulle. Usu i'daas gooche, i'di tahe usu luhlo kasohta, il dah kagoocha ichoowka 'dee Assos ka is'hella.
44020014	Chirri us ilkerengeetti Assos ka nah 'hele ka, kooban gelle, ilkerengeetti Miituleene ikahne.
44020015	Intaas ka kahne kurti Kiiyos layadeehe bey goya kijirto kakunne, ibeenki lammaatteet ka kurti Saamos layadeehe bey goya kajirto iranne. Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka ilkerengeetti Mileeto sooeleelle.
44020016	Baawulo la usuhi kooban ka ilkerengeetti Efeesso ikuto iche gooche. Usuhi ibeennetoo boroofenhi Aassiya fiddiyo ma 'doonin. A mehe usuhi dowwa ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem chirri iche tateeh ibeenki daawti Beentekos ka eleelo 'doona.
44020017	Baawulo la ilkerengeetti Mileeto ka ewweenki urur Kiriistoki ilkerengeetti Efeesso woyo farniin i'diiche, 'dee or a kasoodoween.
44020018	Chirri icho sooeleeleen ka wihi us iyidah, “Atin rubeytiin saggi an uus maanti kolooraat an boroofenhi Aassiya soogele an atin ileejire a garattaan.
44020019	Makhaaballeti Ya'huud kajmeti suujenye igelisse, eheetteey laka, an a isnuglaache toro oytim ka Kamur ihile.
44020020	Maanti an 'dow ka ichoow minassiin ka Yeedi Waakh atin icheeke, wihi indigir atin ikhabo tuumman uureey tuumman ka a atin abche. I'daasenyi saggi an kolba minkoo igele an Yeedi Waakh atin iabche a garattaan.
44020021	Wihi an 'doo'di Ya'huud ichoow ki Ya'huud ieheynan icheeke a ichohi uskeel kasoonokhti 'dee Waakh urgiyicho toro Yeessohi Kamureene kakhuufo.
44020022	“Toolla la Rubeyti Munyee iche ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem iwoyta, wihi intaas ka iyateeh la ma gardi.
44020023	Wihi kaldaye an gardi, Rubeyti Munyee a itootoossa, ilkerengeetti ween tuumman ka sina ichoow hiinaan a isugaan.
44020024	I'daasenyi jiroteey walah iche ileetahe mele. Wihi ileekhumman, a anihi weyti hol dowo, hili Waakhe Yeessohi Kamure dahanoheey soogesse massicho. Hila la a Wori Haaggane an haaggi Waakhe buurenye inno imunneynan enenyet icheeko.
44020025	“Wihi an gardi, atinhi an goytiin kasohde, wori dakhi Waakh miinsan atin icheeke, etiin toro yombuu iargo mele.
44020026	Maantaka wihi an atin icheeko, chirri etiinkoo jit buje, ani ma liiworsati.
44020027	I'di tahe wohoo kaldaye Waakh atinhi abattaan 'doono an mujjum atin ikasoocheekin ma jiraan.
44020028	Rubeyti Munyee i'di ersimohi hoolaate atin kayeesse. Hoolaha la a 'doo'di Waakh. Maantaka isyaakhicha toro la hoolahi Rubeyti Munyee dahantiin gelisse tuumman yaakhicha. Ururi Waakhe goorat Yeesso diiggiis ka Waakh igate, yaakhicha toro toorriba gi'de.
44020029	A garda, chirri an atin katabe, 'doo'di yeedi beenaat 'doo'd abcho i'di yaayti weyti oore u goytiinna soogela, woy bakkicha.
44020030	Berri goytiin ka laka 'doo'doo wihi rummaat urgiyicho 'dee abatti ankicho ijiito a soobaha.
44020031	'Doo'di i'daase yuubsada. Toollaka saggi an gu'h seyyah tuumman bolokh ka an ebba ibeen ichoow maalim ba iwaaniche kasoo'hela.
44020032	“Toollaka dahanti Waakh ichoow wori haaggiiski buure miinsane atin gessa. Waakh wora ka atin miigoon a yabuu'de, toro la wihi atin mu'dan 'doo'di Waakh munyaache tuumman a lee'hessaan.
44020033	An chilimme ichoow 'dahab ichoow gaaddi etoo addan ma maanjeeran.
44020034	Saggi an dahanoheey on ka isiwoywoye, toro an dahanoheey on ka 'doo'di an khabe laka iwoywoye, a garattaan.
44020035	Walah tuumman ka saggi inno hol idowno inno 'doo'di 'da'ddaran igargaarro a atin tuse. Anna wihi goorat Yeessohi Kamure yidah iche kasoo'hele. Kamur mehe yidah ya, ‘Eti walah diibo weyti hamaad khaba ki khaatti ka.’ ”
44020036	Chirri Baawulo yeyyeed massiche ka, icho tuumman khabaayi jilbo il kagu'dde Waakh wahte.
44020037	Chirra icho usu sorboobtaane icho dongataan ka, icho tuumman ooyeen.
44020038	Wihi weyti icho kooyiche, a chirri us, “Toro yombuu fooleey ma agartaan,” iyidah. 'Deerka raaheene, kooban eleelicheen.
44021001	Inkoo nah icho kagoone ka, beyti buure kadihne anki kurti bicche dahcho kajirto Koos layadeeh miinsanne. Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka kurti bicche dahcho kajirto Roodo layadeeh gelle, saahka ilkerengeetti Baatara nimiy.
44021002	Intaas ka koobanhi boroofenhi Foniikiya isohti 'helle, korre iranne.
44021003	Chirri nah kurti bicche dahcho kajirto Kuuburo layadeeh agarre ka, anki gurro tabne, ili Siiriya isohannaa. Inti ilkerengeetti Tiiro layadeeh ka iranne, bicche aficho tolossanne, koobane intaas ka meeh yagchaa.
44021004	Intaas ka abatti 'helle, teebatoo leefiddiine. Icho la miigti Rubeyti Munyee ka Baawulo hawwaasteen uus ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem iran.
44021005	I'daasenyi maanti ibeenkeenyo massate ka kahne, orey isohanne. 'Doo'd tuumman la deyyehoticho ichoow nyaakhut khabaayi nah sooraahe, ilkerengeet nah kaleebahe. Bicche aficho ka nah tuumman icho khabnaayi jilbo il kagu'dubne, Waakh wahanne.
44021006	Inkoo nah bariito iskakhaatanne ka, nah kooban gelle, icho la goobassicho inokhteen.
44021007	Inkoo nah ilkerengeetti Tiiro kakahne ka, sohanne ichoowka ilkerengeetti Tollemayo gelle. Intaas ka 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste bariitinne ibeenkoo leefiddiine.
44021008	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka, kahne ilkerengeetti Kaaysareya iranne, kooban kasooyegne. Intaas ka minki eti Wori Haaggan taa'hicho Fiilif layadeeh fiddiine. Fiilif la a etoo 'doo'di goorat teebeenye Yeerusaleem ka lasoobahsate golol 'doo'd gise.
44021009	Ulla inám affar idisneynane wori Waakh kaayyeeddo iche khaba.
44021010	Inkoo nah ibeennetoo intaas fiddiine ka, eti Waákh íyeyyeedo Agaabo layadeeh ili Ya'huudiya kayimiyye intaas yimiy.
44021011	Ulla nah iyimiyye, saab Baawuloki dabar khaate, luhlohiis ichoow dahanohiis iskahide, wihi us yidah, “Rubeyti Munyee wahane elatta. ‘Eti saaba leh saggane ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka 'doo'di Ya'huud ihida, dahanohi 'doo'di Waakh igaran igessa.’ ”
44021012	Chirri nah yeeda daagne ka nah ichoow 'doo'di addan ba Baawulo hawwaassanne uus ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem iran.
44021013	Baawulo wihi us ilaabe, “A i'doh i'duu iooytaane uur iuskulaassaan? An hiinaanki liihido kalday menye, anihi ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka jeente Yeessohi Kamure amuut laka ma 'dii'do!”
44021014	Chirri saggi nah usu isoolaabno waayne ka, “Wihi Kamur 'doono a yitaaheen,” nidahye, 'diinne.
44021015	Inkoo nah geeddoo intaas fiddiine ka tannabanne, ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ikahne.
44021016	Abattitoo ilkerengeetti Kaaysareya ka nah raahte, eti 'dee nah minkiis fiddiino Muunason layadeeh goobiis nah geesse. Ulla a etoo ili Kuuburo kayimiyye, abattiti oraat kichokoowe.
44021017	Inkoo nah ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem soogelle ka, 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste hamaad ka nah martiiste.
44021018	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka, Baawulo ichoow nah tuumman iranne, Yaakoobo sooagarre, ewweenki urur Kiriisto woyo tuumman la intaas a kajire.
44021019	Baawulo la icho bariitiche toro wihi tuummane Waakh yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan hiliis ka iyeele 'doo'd tuum idowdowe.
44021020	Inkoo icho waha daageen ka, Waakh saa'deen. 'Deerka wihi icho Baawulo iyidaaheen, “Baawulohaanyaaw, yaafteenti Ya'huude Yeesso rummeysatte saggi iche aliffe igoosso yey. Icho tuumman la weyti amurre Muusa isibahcheen.
44021021	'Doo'da wihi at 'doo'di Ya'huude yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan goya yaal tuumman abisso 'dee icho amurre Muusa 'diichaane, nyaakhuticho laka ikhandiyine, hugummeti Ya'huud iraahin a liicheeke.
44021022	Mehe yeello? Rumanka saggi at itimiy a daagaan on.
44021023	'Deerka wihi nah kidowno yeel. Inta ka et affar daatatte a khabna.
44021024	Reeraas khaat gi'de, ati rubeytaah laka daawti dikhaaleet leegele, wihi icho daawtaas kageleen igute, 'dee matahenyeticho a haatteen. I'daakka enenyet tuumman saggi waha liidowo ati kimiinsan tuumman been iyahiin a abta. I'daasenyi saggi at amurre Muusa mujjum iraahto a laarga.
44021025	'Doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan la orey khadaab a ichiirre wihi nah goonne icheekne, 'dee gololi iyookkoyyohi waakkhakh lakayeessi liisoorriyooche ichoow jidi naffi laluulliche ichoow diig ichoow soho'ddarri a kanokhteen.”
44021026	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka Baawulo reeraas khaate daawti dikhaaleet isleegeleen. 'Deerka minki Waakhe buure gele, ibeenki daawti dikhaaleet massatti, toro eticho ba soorriyo liibahcho iche kuhaani icheekaa.
44021027	Geeddi ibeen teeba kasoomassatti ka, 'doo'doo Ya'huude boroofenhi Aassiya kayimiy Baawulo minki Waakhe buure goyaka arge. Urur tuumman sootukkicheene Baawulo khabteene,
44021028	riireene, “Mejeli Issiraayeloow, nah gargaara! Eta a ki enenyet tuumman harra tuumman ka wihi suujenye us abcho ka 'doo'deenki Issiraayel ichoow amurreteen ichoow minka Waakh miinsan kayeyyeedo. Waha kalday on menye, 'doo'di Ya'huud ieheynan iche minki Waakhe buure soogesse, meessa lagan bi'dirrooche,” yidaaheen.
44021029	Wihi icho i'daas kayidaaheen la a jeenteti icho Turofiimohi Ya'huud ieheynane ilkerengeetti Efeesso kayimiyye ilkerengeet goyaka Baawulo rarraaho iargeen. Kol Baawulo usu sookhaate uranti minki Waakhe buure keene koogyahiin.
44021030	Ilkerengeet tuumman wereerte, 'doo'd tuumman la meel tuumman ka isleesoorye. Baawulo khabteene, minki Waakhe buure khariis ijiiteen. Chirraas on arto lahide.
44021031	Chirra urur Baawulo ogoos 'doono ka, eti iskarti Rooma tuumman itoollo saggi ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem tuumman kowdo kalday ititah daage.
44021032	Ulla chirraas on nyaame iskartoo wewween ichoow iskartoo addan khaatte urur ikhubteen. Chirri 'doo'd eti iskar tuumman itoollo ichoow iskartiis arge ka, Baawulohi kootte icho jahaan 'diicheen.
44021033	Eti iskar tuumman itoollo irte Baawulo khabte, amuri biingo lamma lakahido bahche. 'Deerka eti us yahe ichoow wihi us yeele 'doo'd worsate.
44021034	Urur goyaka 'doo'd gaasoo riirit ka wohoo essa, koo la riirit ka wohoo addane essa. Eti iskar tuumman itoollo jeenteti kowduu sag us rum iabti mele. Amuri Baawulo lakhaato uranti iskareet lakageecho bahche.
44021035	Chirri Baawulo faaneyyohi min lakakoro sooeleele ka, iskare jeenteti urur weyti iuskulaatuu, usu si'dde.
44021036	Icho tuumman la 'dubiis leeyimaateene, riireene, “Agiisa, agiisa,” esseen.
44021037	Chirra icho Baawulo minki iskare fiddiito gelin leheet ka, Baawulo yeede, eti iskar tuumman itoollo, “Wohoo ma kisoocheeko?” worsate. Wihi us ilaabe, “At afi Giriig a daagta?
44021038	At eti ili Miissiri goorat iskarti elif affarenye bir khabto sookahche hidaad leekeene menya?”
44021039	Baawulo wihi us ilaabe, “An a Ya'huude, ilkerengeetti Taarso ili Kiliikiya kijirto liikadele. An a eti ilkerengeetti weyti khumman. A kihawwaasdee, alley bal 'doo'd a leeyyeedo.”
44021040	Chirri us amuri eti iskar tuumman itoollo 'hele ka, Baawulo faaneyyo katolossate dahan ka urur leeyeede. Chirri icho tuumman gammadicheen ka Baawulo afichoki Ibiraaniya ka 'doo'd leeyeede.
44022001	Baawulo wihi us yidah, “Yaaftaay ichoow ooyenyeey, bal geedda an ortiin ka isiyeyyeedo idagansada.”
44022002	Icho chirri icho usuhi afi Ibiraaniya icho kaleeyyeedo daageen ka, rukkuy goocheen. Baawulo 'deerka wihi us yidah,
44022003	“An a Ya'huude, ilkerengeetti Taarso ili Kiliikiya kijirto liikadele, i'daasenyi ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme kaweynaade. Ani amurre aacchinyeteen weyti liiabche, eti iabche la a Gamaliyeel. An laka i'da maanta atinhuu, Waakkheen a isibahche.
44022004	Jeentetaas u 'doo'di goorat jita Yeesso enenyet abche raaho sina omhiche, ogoos laka 'doone. Mejel ichoow deyyeho a sookhabde jeela gesse.
44022005	Kuhaanihi weyti ween ichoow Jaldaab tuumman saggi wihi an eldi rum iyahiin a cheekaan. An icho khadaabi icho 'doo'dichoki Ya'huude ilkerengeetti Damaasko kajiro ichiireene kakhaadde, intaas irde 'dee 'doo'daas sookhabda, ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem keena, sina loomhicha.
44022006	“Chirra an ilkerengeetti Damaasko isoodowwaade ka, doglaan on geeddi maalimeet ka banayhi weyti ababo serey kasoobaheene 'dolloheey gu'ddeen.
44022007	Anna il gu'dde, chirraas ka hooyoo, ‘Saawulo, Saawulo! A i'doh ani sina iomhissa?’ idowo daage.
44022008	“Wihi an worsade, ‘Kamur at a ayyo?’ “Wihi us isoolaabe, ‘An a Yeessohi Naasarete at sina omhisso.’
44022009	'Doo'di iwalhiche banay a arge, i'daasenyi hooyi eti ileeyyeedo ma aban.
44022010	“Anna wihi an worsade, ‘Kamur mehe yeelo?’ “Kamur la wihi us iyidah, ‘Kahe, ilkerengeetti Damaasko iro, 'dee intaas ka wihi Waakh kiabbire at yeesso a lakisoocheeko.’
44022011	Jeenteti banayhi ababo indo itireen u, wahalheey iangaamicheene ilkerengeetti Damaasko igeecheen.
44022012	“Etoo Anaaniya layadeeh ani iargin yimiy. Us weyti Waákh karoora toro amurre Muusa mujjum raaha, 'doo'di Ya'huude Damaasko kajiro tuumman la weyti usu inkaanyita.
44022013	Ulla iyimiyye haggeey sootolossate, ‘Saawulohaaw, il agar!’ iyidah. An chirraas on il arge, usu laka arge.
44022014	“'Deerka wihi us yidah, ‘Waákh aacchinyeteen a kisoobahsate, 'dee mali us kikhabo abatta, toro la Eti Fissan agarta, toro usuhi hooyiis ka kileeyyeedo daagta.
44022015	At gartiis a laabta toro wihi tuummane at agarte toro daagte yaafo tuumman icheekta.
44022016	Toollaka mehe sugta? Tolosso a kibaattissiyo, uskeelaah a lakaadikho geeddi at magahi Kamur wahto.’
44022017	“Maanti an ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem inokhde, minki Waakhe buure goyaka Waakh wahdaayi fooltabcho itimiy.
44022018	Fooltabcho ka Kamur arge, ulla iiyeyye, ‘Arari! Dowwa ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem katab, i'di tahe 'doo'd inta ka weheeyki at icheekto ma dagansati.’
44022019	“Wihi an ilaabe, ‘Kamur, 'doo'da saggi goorat an kolba minkoo weysiite Ya'huud iirde, 'dee 'doo'di kirummeesti jeela igesso toro ijaho, a garta.
44022020	Maanti Isiteefano jeenteti us woraah icheeko liiyigis, ani rubeyteey intaas a kajire, ogoossiis ayyiche, darfohi 'doo'di usú yigis yaakhiche.’
44022021	“Kamur la wihi us ani iyidah, ‘Nyaam, ani yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynane fogaate kiergada.’ ”
44022022	'Doo'd Baawulo dagansate ichoowka yeedaas yaafohi Ya'huud ieheynan miinsan yidah. 'Deerka enenyet weyti riire, “Eta harrata kabahcha! Agiisa, jiro ma iroone!” yidaaheen.
44022023	Geedda icho rirriiraan la, kabuu'ddeticho a jillaanjillichaane, ebeer serey ikahchaan.
44022024	Eti iskar tuumman itoollo amur bahche 'dee Baawulo a lakhaato, minki iskare fiddiito goya a lageecho, laajja ka a ladoocho, walah a laworsati, 'dee riirita geeddeenye 'doo'da Ya'huud usu kariiro wihiis a laabti.
44022025	Chirri icho hidhideene, icho laajja ka doon leheet ka, Baawulo wihi us eti koobbintoo iskareet itoollo intaas toollo iyidah, “Eti ili Rooma liiekkaacho geeddi kootiin ka usu uskeel yeele liikagoon laajja ka ladoocho ichoow amurre a israahaan?”
44022026	Chirri eti koobbintoo iskareet itoollo yeedaas daage ka, nyaame, eti iskar tuumman itoollo wihi us worsate, “Waha a mehe at yeesso? Etaas a eti ili Rooma.”
44022027	Eti iskar tuumman itoollo la Baawulo iyimiyye, “Rum isoocheek, at a eti ili Rooma liiekkaache?” worsate. Wihi us ilaabe, “Aa.”
44022028	Eti iskar tuumman itoollo la wihi us yidah, “An chilimmeti buurenye sirgaal igute, eti ilaas itah.” Baawulo wihi us ilaabe, “Ani delmaattaaya eti ilaas ikayeesse.”
44022029	'Doo'di kootte Baawulo walah worsan leheet chirraas on Baawulo kasoofurfurte. Eti iskar tuumman itoollo laka weyti nahe. I'di tahe Baawulohi eti ili Roomeenye us biingoyyo gesse ka amurreti ili Rooma a jebche.
44022030	Eti iskar tuumman itoollo wihi rumanka 'doo'di Ya'huud Baawulo kacheekti iche aban 'doona, ibeenki kaas sooraaho ka Baawulo fure, amur bahche kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud tuumman ba tol iwahe. 'Deerka Baawulo sookhaate, orcho toolliche.
44023001	Baawulo la Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud indo katoolliche, yeye, “Yaaftaay, an ichoowka maalinka rubeyteeyti suujoon ikacheekan ka, hileey a buuhiche Waakh ortiis ka,” iyidah.
44023002	Kuhaanihi weyti weene Anaaniya layadeeh la 'doo'di Baawulo garabiis toollo, amur ibahche af a lagu'ddo.
44023003	Baawulo 'deerka wihi us iyidah, “Waakh a kigu'dda, atiha etoo haaggan iskayeesso! At intaase kafiddiita amurre Muusa ka ihukkunta, i'daasenyi ati rubeytaah amurre Muusa jebissa cha'at amuri liikagu'ddo bihisso.”
44023004	'Doo'di kootte Baawulo garabiis toolle la wihi us Baawulo iyidah, “Ati kuhaanihi weyti weene Waakhe abaarta!”
44023005	Baawulo wihi us ilaabe, “Yaaftaay, an saggi us kuhaanihi weyti ween iyahe ma kasin, a mehe wihi chiiran, ‘Eti 'doo'daah iween wihi suuje iidaahan.’ ”
44023006	Baawulo 'deerka saggi gaasichekoo Farissaayo itahe, gaasichekoo la Sadukaayo itahe garte Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud goyaka riire, “Yaaftaay an a Farissaayo, a weeli Farissaayo. Wihi inta ka liikahukkumo a jeenteti an 'doo'di tuume berri sookaho ikhajjeelo,” yidah.
44023007	Uus i'daas yidah ka, 'doo'di Farissaayo ichoow ki Sadukaayo isleeiriire, 'deerka seley lagowe.
44023008	I'di tahe Sadukaayo mehe tadeeh ya, omoot ka ma lasookaho, herti Waakh la ma jirto, wahanyeyyohi Waakhe jiro khabo liiargin laka ma jiraan. I'daasenyi Farissaayo saggi wahaas tuumman ijiraan a cheekta.
44023009	Riirit weyti buuraate ichoowka tagaammetoo amurre Muusa Farissaayee kahte, “Eta suujoon nah kaagarro mele,” tidah. “Eemba hertoo Waakhe leeyeedde, ommos wahanyeyyohoo Waakhe jiro khabo liiargine usu leeyeedde?”
44023010	Iriire weyti uskulaatte ichoowka eti iskar tuumman itoollo ichohi Baawulo seley goocho karoore. Amur bahche iskartiis ergate a iratti Baawulo 'doo'd a soosarto, a sookhaatto uranti iskareet a keento.
44023011	Saahka ibeen Kamur Baawulo hagga tolossate wihi us yidah, “Wohoo rucchul laka akaroorin! Saggi at ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleem ka garteey iyeedde saggaas on ilkerengeetti Rooma ka laka garteey iyeedda.”
44023012	Ibeenki kaas sooraaho chirdeer ka 'doo'doo Ya'huud is'hele saggi icho Baawulo iyagiisiin kamasseen. Daatteene, sammata icho Baawulo iigaasan ma golossataane ommos bicche laka ma yabhuubiin.
44023013	'Doo'di waha isleegooche tomon affar laka a kuta.
44023014	Irteene, kuhaaniyyohi wewween ichoow ewweenki Ya'huud ba iirteene, “Nah a isleedaatanne, sammata nah Baawulo iigaasan ma golossanni,” iyidaaheen.
44023015	“Toollaka atin ichoow Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud ba eti iskar tuumman itoollo farniin i'diicha, Baawulo a sookhaato. I'di 'doo'doo runti wohoo kaabti iskayeela. Nah la a tannabanne usu nagiis geeddi us inta isooeleelin.”
44023016	I'daasenyi Baawulo eysinkiis waha daage, irte, Baawulo minki latoorribo ka icheeke.
44023017	Baawulo la etoo koobbintoo iskareet itoollo wahe, “Eta nugul wohoo us eti iskar tuumman itoollo icheekti khaba, khaate igeey,” iyidah.
44023018	Et la ínam khaate eti iskar tuumman itoollo igeeche. Etoo koobbintoo iskareet itoollo wihi us yidah, “Eti hidane Baawulo layadeehe eta nugul khaate ati igeey iyidah. A mehe wohoo us kisoocheekti, iche khaba.”
44023019	Eti iskar tuumman itoollo eti nugul dahan khabte khaate, 'dol geeche, “Mehe isoocheekin 'doonta?” worsate.
44023020	Ulla wihi us yidah, “'Doo'di Ya'huud mehe iskadaage ya, atihi saahta Baawulo Jaldaabti Weene Ya'huud orche keento. Iche la i'di 'doo'doo runtoo usu kayowti, iche iskayeessa.
44023021	Alla icho adagansan, i'di tahe 'doo'di dagti usú jit ka sugo tomon affar laka a kuta. Icho la a daatteene, sammata icho usu iigaasan ma golossataane ommos bicche laka ma yabhuubiin. Icho la toolla yeedicho a massicheene ati on ayye kaasugaan.”
44023022	Eti iskar tuumman itoollo eti nugul 'diiche toro leefarme wihi us iyidah, “Saggi at waha ikasoocheekte, etoo kalday laka iicheekin.”
