54004010	Jeentetuu la weyti hol downa, tirriinsanna, jeenteti inno Waakkhi jiro khajjeel ikakhabnuu. Waakkha la a 'Doorribehi enenyet tuummane, kach ka la 'doo'di usu rummeeste.
54004011	Wahanyeyyoha la 'doo'd abiche toro amurre a raaheen.
54004012	Uus etoo kalday laka jeenteti at inugussahuu ki'darraawin. I'daasenyi yeedi afaah kasoobaho ka ichoow jiroti at jirto ka ichoow 'dooninti at enenyet 'doonto ka ichoow kakhuufnaanki at Kiriisto kakhuufto ka ichoow jiroti el ikhabine at jirto ka, 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste iyookko iateeh.
54004013	Ichoowka an amiit, geeddi at tabuu'd hol dowe, Chiirnaanneti Waakh 'doo'd Kiriisto isoome, uur miigooche toro la wori Waakh abi.
54004014	Siintaahti maanti ewweenki urur Kiriisto woyo dahano kikorche wori Waakhe lakaayyeedo at ka'hesse akadabin.
54004015	Geeddi at tabuu'd wahanyeyyoha an kiidah raahe, tuum isisoobihiche, 'dee 'doo'd tuumman saggi at orey ikasohatti a argo.
54004016	Kol dakkhan jirotaah ichoow wihi at 'doo'd abisso yaakhiche, weyti la goya yey. Cha'at waha yeesso, a isribta 'doo'di kidagansati laka ribta.
54005001	Makhaabali kaaween aleejaakhine, i'daasenyi i'di aabbahaah u uur miigooy. Mejeli nunnugul i'di walaalinyetaah iwoywoy.
54005002	Deyyehoti kaawewween i'di abartaah iwoywoye, deyyehoti nunnugul la i'di albehi kileeddesse iwoywoy. Waha la mali haaggane eloo rucchul laka ikhabin kayeel.
54005003	Muunkhoyyohi walah ikhabin mujjum inkaanyite wihi icho laayahin sii.
54005004	I'daasenyi chi' muunkhotoo nyaakhut khabto ommos hamalo khabto, nyaakhutaas ommos hamalohichekaas koloo goobicho a woywoyeene saggi icho mujjum Waakh iraahaan a abteen. 'Deerka jeenteti icho isooweynaacheen u a guteen. A mehe waha weyti Waakh kahamaadichaan.
54005005	Muunkhoti rumanka walah ikhabine, eti yeyo laa, eti iche khajjeel kakhabto a Waakh kaldach on. Iche la ibeen ichoow maalim ba Waakhe wahatta gargaar daahta.
54005006	I'daasenyi muunkhoti wihi kahamaadicho on yeesso, chi'iche noossahe laka, a i'doo iche tumuy on.
54005007	'Doo'd amurreta ibihi uus 'dee etoo kalday laka eloo rucchul lakacheekanne.
54005008	Eti tuummane goobicho iwoywoyine kach ka la minkicho iwoywoyin, wihi inno kakhuufno a 'dii'de. Eta eti Kiriisto irummeysan laka tabar a dowe.
54005009	Muunkhoti magahiche 'doo'di lagargaaro goya lakachiiro a ti gu'h tomon lih 'dirihiche khabto, goorat makhaabaloo kalday on khabte,
54005010	toro la a ti jeenteti iche haag iyeessuu enenyet tuumman inkaanyito. Haaggiche a 'dow on. A ti nyaakhuutiche jiti haaggan kasooweynaasse, a ti goobiche ka 'doo'd martiisatte, a ti 'doo'di Waakh i'di ilbooy u luhlo dikhte, a ti 'doo'di sina khabe gargaarte. A ti hili haaggan tuumman isisoobihisse.
54005011	I'daasenyi muunkhoyyohi nunnugul achiirin. A mehe 'dee yomboka kolossoo ildeerroti sarticho a geeddi iche anatti icho hil Kiriistoki goorat icho isisoobahcheen 'diichaane, mindischo gelin 'doonaan.
54005012	I'da ka la jeenteti icho ayyinti icho 'hor Waakh iayyicheen ijebcheen u sina isigoochaan.
54005013	Toro la a ollommowaane, kolba minkoo gelaan. Ollom kalday la menye, enenyet hantaane, yeedassi wihicho ieheynan kaaddihaane, wohoo kootte ikamalin essaan.
54005014	Maantaka wihi an 'doono muunkhoyyohi nunnugul toro a ladiso nyaakhut a deleene, goobassicho a woywoyeen. I'da ka chiiytankeen jit us inno kahanti mele.
54005015	A mehe gaasichokoo orey on jit bujeene, Seytaan raaheen.
54005016	I'daasenyi chirri makhaabassoo Yeesso rummeysatte jirto iche la minkiche ka muunkhoyyohoo khabto, iche muunkhoyyohaas woywoyta uus 'dee urur Kiriisto huleesa lakorinne. I'da ka urur Kiriisto muunkhoyyohi eti gargaaro laa kalday on woywoya.
54005017	Ewweenki urur Kiriisto woyo urur mujjum dakhti a imasse chi' liinkaanyito kala'd laguto, kach ka la ewweenki Yeedi Waakh cheeko enenyet walah abcho wahaas a liiyeelo.
54005018	A mehe Chiirnaanneti Waakh mehe tadeeh ya, “Heer geeddi us gurnaan yabti 'dargaayye ichoow chaafo ba seley saaho af a hidine, usuhi 'dargaayye yaham atiran.” A mehe Chiirnaanneti Waakh mehe tadeeh ya “Eti hil haaggicho wihiis a laguto.”
54005019	Wihi etoo ewweenki urur Kiriisto woyo lakacheekti nabah iisudin sammata et lamma ommos et seyyahe gartaas ilaabin.
54005020	Weynaanti uskeel yeesso urur Kiriisto ortiis ka a laleejaakho, 'dee 'doo'di addan uskeeli us yeelo a karooro.
54005021	Waakh ichoow Yeesso Kiriisto ichoow herti Waakhe lasoobahsate orche ka amurane kibahcha, tabe waansiha khucchiche, enenyet ekka kawaaniche, wihi at yeesso ka la enenyet asassaahin.
54005022	Etoo dowwa on dahan akorinne weynaanti urur Kiriisto woyto akayeelin. I'daas ka uskeelicho ma leegisanto. Ati rubeytaah la mi'dab iskayeel.
54005023	I'daasenyi jeenteti uur kibolkho toro at geeddi buure ichocchoorsattuu, bicche kalday uubhaabane, farsotoor sabiib abhuub.
54005024	Uskeeli 'doo'd gaasoo yeelo i'daanu laarga, enenyet tuumman la saggi icho liihukkumo a garta. Uskeeli 'doo'd gaasoo la 'dubichooda on sooraaha.
54005025	Saggaas u la haaggi enenyet yeelo i'daanu laarga. I'daasenyi chirri haaggi icho yeelaan liiargin laka, ma dagti.
54006001	Eti tuummane huleesi bow'da si'do Yeesso rummeeste, kamuriis rumanka a inkaanyito, uus 'dee Waakh ichoow woriiski enenyet laabcho liigafine.
54006002	Bow'dayyohi kamurreticho Kiriisto rummeysatti, iiche kamurreticho 'darraawin jeenteti icho dakkhan Kiriisto irummeesteen u. Orey a raaheene a ihileen, a mehe 'doo'di hilicho ka indigir 'helo, a ki Kiriisto rummeeste toro la icho 'doonaan. Wahanyeyyoha enenyet abiche, enenyet faajjiye a raaho.
54006003	Chirri 'doo'doo wihi us enenyet abcho wihi beenaat yahiine, toro wor Yeesso Kiriistohi Kamureene buusanyahiine, toro la saggi kootte 'doo'd Kiriisto Waakh ikajiro tirrimo,
54006004	weyti serey isgeechaane, walah icho gartaan la mele. Malassi suujenye khabaane, wihi ilmarhaatteet on wowworsataane, walah rumenye icho laabaan la mele. Icho la yeedassi jaakh keeno on kahawwoochaan. Waha la kal'darri ichoow hol ichoow me'de'ddeel ichoow imurchoti suuje
54006005	ichoow iriirti kol dakkhan islaleeiriiro keenaan. Malassicho a lakheerooche, rum tuumman a lasare. Icho jiroti Waakh liijiro jitoo lakakamurrowo koogyahiin.
54006006	I'daasenyi jiroti Waakh liijiro a indigirti buure chirri at wihi at khabto kadaragto.
54006007	A mehe walah inno harrata keenne mele, toro la walah inno harrata ka khaatin nabuu'd mele.
54006008	I'daasenyi chi'inno golol ichoow gaad khabno geeddaas a kadaragna.
54006009	'Doo'di kamurrowin 'doono, kajmeti uskeel kalugu'ddo ichoow angey ichoow wahanyeyyohi 'dalame liimoono ichoow suujoone kadihaan. Waha la icho a jiitaane ichoowka suujaachaane bar tiraan.
54006010	A mehe 'dooninti chilim weyti la'doono iche suujoon tuumman dessa. 'Doo'd gaasoo chilim rirrihaayi ichoowka wori Kiriisto miinsane goorat icho kakhuufaan kabaabeene toro la oytinti buure laka isikeeneen.
54006011	I'daasenyi at a eti hili Waakh haaggicho. Maantaka uskeelaas tuumman kafirid. Hol dowe jiroti fissan yowo, jiroti Waakh kahamaado jire, Waakh kakhuufe, 'doo'di addan 'doone, garrahso toro samacchaar ateeh.
54006012	Jiroti inno Kiriisto kakhuufne ka dihoti haaggan gel. Jiroti jirtuu imassanne maanti lakiwahe at wihi haaggan 'doo'di ittaawe ortiis ka cheekatte icho la gartiche laabaan jurkhi.
54006013	Waakkhi walah dakkhan jiro siicho ortiis ka ichoow Yeesso Kiriistohi goorat Boontiyo Bilaato ortiis ka runtiis cheeke, orcho ka amurane kibahcha.
54006014	Raahnaanki at wihi Wori Haaggan kaa'doono at raahto ka, eloo rucchul laka akhabine, ichoowka Yeesso Kiriistohi Kamureene a soonokhti.
54006015	Waakh ibeenki goorat us gooche Kiriisto enenyet a tusa. Waha a Waakkhi weeli enenyet tuumman saa'do, enenyet tuumman dakhti, a Karnati karnato kussan, a Kamuri kamurre kussan.
54006016	Usu kalday on iumaatane banayhi weyti ababo liikadowwaan goya fiddiya. Et injire arge mele et sooargo la mele. Jirtuu tuumman la inkaanyit ichoow miigti jirtuu imassan a wihiissa. Aamiin.
54006017	'Doo'di wey'dane kamurree amurreta ibihi. Rannyaat akhabina ommos hoolahi harratane dowwa on kuto khajjeel akakhabina, i'daasenyi Waakkhi wihi inno 'doonno tuumman inno siicho 'dee inno jiroti hamaad khabto jirro kakhuufa.
54006018	Haag on a yeeleene, haaggaas icho yeelaan ka la kamurre a yitaaheen. 'Doo'di uurnugleel ka walah diibo a yitaaheene, wihi icho khabaan la 'doo'd a leegismeen.
54006019	I'da ka jiroti soosohatti ka, i'di tirrinki mujjum min tiiruu, hoolahi rummaat yahay a isigessaane, 'dee jiroti rummaate jirtuu imassan khabaan.
54006020	Timooti, wihi Waakh dahantaah soogesse mujjum yaakhi. 'Doo'di yeedi 'dalame inkaanyitoo rucchul laka Waakh ikakhabin ichoow iriirti ilmarhaatteete icho been ka a garanti rummaat essaan nabah iisudin.
54006021	'Doo'd gaasoo garantaase cheeka, jeentetaas u wori Kiriisto miinsane icho kakhuufaan a kabaabeen. Waakh ba kimaala!
55001001	Eti khadaaba kisoochiiro a ani Baawulohi mali Waakh ka ergaano Yeesso Kiriistee. Waakh la i'dane yeele 'dee jiroti jirtuu imassanne us 'doo'di icho ichoow Yeesso Kiriisto ba wohoo kalday yahiin iayyiche enenyet icheeka.
55001002	Eti an isoochiiro la a ati Timooti. At la a i'di weeleeyki an weyti 'doono. Waakkhi Aabbaheene ichoow Yeesso Kiriistohi Kamureene ba kimaalaane, uur kisoonugleestaane, toro la nebey kaakaalaan.
55001003	An Waakkhi an i'di aacchinyeteey u rubeyti suujoon ikacheekan ka an ifalo kala'd a ilaaba. Maalim ichoow ibeen ba la weysiheey ka ma kaadabo.
55001004	Cha'an saggi maanti inno seley bahne at iooyte kasoo'helo, anihi kaargo 'dee hamaadi buure ibuuhicho 'doona.
55001005	An saggi at kakhuufnaanki rummaate Kiriisto lakakhuufo ikhabto a kasoo'hela, i'di goorat inkookotaahti Looyis layadeeh ichoow abartaahti Yuunis layadeeh ijireen u. Anna a tissiba at laka a i'dichooda.
55001006	Jeentetaas u wihi an kaasoo'helcho kallaayo, tabe siinti Waakhe goytaah kijirto maanti an dahano kikorche at 'hesse weyti ababi.
55001007	A mehe Waakh rubeyti bur'dee ma inno siin, i'daasenyi rubeyti miig ichoow 'doonin ichoow isjeyin lehe inno siiche.
55001008	Maantaka wihi atin garattaane Kamureen miinsan cheekin akuuryaawina. Ommos wihi anihi jeentetiis u jeela kajiro imiinsan cheekin akuuryaawina. I'daasenyi miigti Waakh ka sinati jeenteti inno Wori Haaggan icheeknuu inno taham ileegisma.
55001009	A mehe Waakh rubeytiissa inno ribe toro inno wahe, 'doo'diiski munyee inno kayeele. Waha la jeenteti inno haaggoo iyeelle menye, a wihi goorat usu on gooche, toro la a jeenteti haaggiiski buurenye inno imunneynan on. Haagga Waakh la geeddi harra liisoouumin on innohi inno ichoow Yeesso Kiriisto ba wohoo kalday nahe inno lasiiche.
55001010	I'daasenyi Yeesso Kiriistohi 'Doorribeheene a yimiyye, haagga isoobabbakkaahiche. Ulla miigti omooteet a jejjebche, Wori Haaggane us cheeke ka la jiroti jirtuu imassan wihiche a inno abche.
55001011	Waakh la Wora Haaggan ka hili Yeedi Waakh lacheeko ichoow ki ergaano ichoow ki enenyet Yeedi Waakh laabcho a ikorche.
55001012	Jeentetase toolla ani sina ikawaarta. I'daasenyi ma kalakhaanyeysadi. A mehe eti an rummeesde a garda. Anna waha a tissiba, miigti us wihi an dahantiis gesse us kayaakhicho ichoowka ibeenki 'da'ddaboot yateeh a khaba.
55001013	Kakhuufnaanki at Kiriisto kakhuufto ichoow 'dooninti at 'doo'di addan 'doonto ka, wor Yeesso ki rummaate at ikadaagte mujjum jurkhi, a mehe ati ichoow Yeesso Kiriisto ba a wohoo kalday.
55001014	Miigti Rubeyti Munyeenye goyteen fiddiito kisiisso ka, wihi haaggane dahantaah lasoogesse mujjum yaakhi.
55001015	Saggi at igarattuu, 'doo'di boroofenhi Aassiya kacchiis, Fiigela ichoow Hermagoon khabaani, adah a ikakhabte.
55001016	Kamur ba goob Oneesiferas uur isoonugleesta. A mehe us geeddi buure a ikahamaadiche. Maanti an jeela kijire laka, us uur a imiigooche toro ma ikalakhaanyeysan.
55001017	Rumanka maanti us ilkerengeetti Rooma soogele, meel tuummane iyeye ichoowka i'hele.
55001018	Kamur ba usu gargaara, ibeenki 'da'ddaboot Kamur usu uur isoonugleesta. Geeddi us ilkerengeetti Efeesso ka igargaare rumanka a garatta.
55002001	Maantaka weelaaw, haaggi Waakhe buurenye Yeesso Kiriisto laka'helo ka miig khab.
55002002	Wahanyeyyohi at ikadaagte an 'doo'di ittaawenye garteey laabo ortiis ka idah la, 'doo'di lakakhuufo 'dee 'doo'di addan abin yabuu'd kori.
55002003	At laka i'di eti iskar Yeesso Kiriisteenye haaggan u sinayyohi lakoomhicho ka garrahso.
55002004	Eti iskarenye diho kajiro hilassoo addane ballaaddan ma gelo. Usuhi eti iskareete usu iween kahamaadicho 'doonaa.
55002005	I'daasu la chi' etoo oriisi ka 'doo'di addan iskabahsataan, 'duubi eti oraat 'helo ma 'helo sammata us amurreti oriisi tuumman iraahin.
55002006	Toro la eti gos khabo hol dowo, eti oraate gurnaanki gos yaham a eheetti.
55002007	Wahanyeyyoha an kidowo kamalo. A mehe Kamur wahanyeyyohaas tuumman a kisoobabbakkaahicha abatta.
55002008	Saggi Yeesso Kiriistohi hiiy Dawuude omoot liikasookahche akadabin. Wori Haaggane an cheeko a kaas.
55002009	Jeenteti an icheekuu la sina a ikawaarta, i'di eti wohoo uskul yeeluu a hidanahe. I'daasenyi Yeedi Waakh ma hidan.
55002010	Maantaka jeenteti 'doo'di Waakh soobahsatuu an walah tuumman a igarrahsada, 'dee icho laka ribnaan ichoow weynaanti jirtuu imassanne Yeesso Kiriisto laka'helo 'helaan.
55002011	Yeeda i'da yadeeh a lakakhuufa, Chi'inno usu leenamuut, usu a leejirra.
55002012	Chi'inno garrahsanni, usu walah a leedakhanna. Chi'inno usu 'dii'dne, ullaka a inno 'dii'da.
55002013	Chi'inno usu raahin 'dii'dne, usu uliba a eti lakakhuufo on. A mehe us is'dii'din ma yabuu'd.
55002014	Enenyet wahaas tuumman kasoo'he'hheli. Waakh ortiis ka 'doo'da tootooche iicho yeedad ka isleeiriirin. Iriirti i'dee gargaar iche khabto mele, 'doo'di dagansati la a baabiissa.
55002015	Geeddi at tabuu'd hol dowe eti Waakh kahamaadicho, hili us haaggicho ikuuryaawine, wori rummaat mujjum cheeko ateeh.
55002016	Hawweesseti 'dalame Waakh ikahamaadin buj. A mehe hawweesseti i'dee enenyet on Waakh kaseehichaan.
55002017	Wihi icho enenyet abchaan i'di jiissi bebbeyattuu, a taa'haan. Reeri waha 'doo'd abcho la a Hamenaaya ichoow Fileeta.
55002018	Icho rum a katabeene, 'doo'di tuume orey on omoot kasookahe essaan. Icho la 'doo'd Kiriisto gaasoo kakhuufnaanki icho Kiriisto kakhuufaan a kheeroocheen.
55002019	I'daasenyi ururi rummaate koo Kiriistee i'di tirrinki Waakh u uliba mujjume chuukhanyahe. Wihi kachiiran la kallaayo, “Kamur 'doo'di kiise a garta.” Wihi addane kachiiran a mehe ya, “Eti tuummane an Kamure raaha essi, uskeel a 'diicho.”
55002020	Toro la minki eti kamure ka karmohi fil ittaawenye jira. Gaasoo a wihi 'dahab lakahaaggiche, gaasoo laka a wihi lahaag lakahaaggiche, gaasoo laka a wihi kho'doomme lakahaaggiche, gaasoo laka a wihi doobbo lakahaaggiche. Karmo gaasoo a wihi khummane, icho ibeenki daaweet on hil lakahaaggicha, gaasoo la a wihi ikhummaneynane, icho la kol dakkhan on hil lakahaaggicha.
55002021	'Doo'di uskeeli us yeelo iskadikhe a i'di karmohi khummane, lamunyaache, latannabiche hili haaggan lakahaagsati.
55002022	Tabe suujoonki tuummane eti nugul imoono kafirid. Hol dowe, jiroti fissan yowo, Waakh kakhuufe, 'doo'di addan 'doone, eti nebey dowo ateehe, ururi 'doo'di uuri haaggan ka magahi Kamur waho goya kijir.
55002023	Iriirti 'dalame khara laa goya agelin. A mehe saggi at igarattuu, wahaas jaakh on delaan.
55002024	Eti Kamur ifalo ma jaakho, uure 'dabakhyahe, enenyet walah abin a yabuu'de, toro la garrahsi leeyahe.
55002025	'Doo'di usu tirrimo laka samacchaar on walah abcha, kolossoo Waakh 'doo'daas rubeyohi uskeel kasoonokhti a siicha, runtaas rummeestaane ulla icho woya.
55002026	Toro la matah bakkaaha, angeyi Seytaanki icho hide wihi us 'doono yeelaan kasoobahaan.
55003001	I'daasenyi waha abda, ibeenneti 'da'ddaboot il weyti 'howlowa.
55003002	Ebba awtiissa on 'doona, chilim 'doona, serey isgeecha, eylaja, enenyet me'de'ddeela, 'doo'di dele ma daago, kala'd mele, Waakh ma inkaanyito.
55003003	Toro la 'doonin ma khabo, uskeel ma isikakuto, 'doo'di addan me'de'ddeela, ma isjeycho, binaawa, wihi haaggan aw ma ikhabo.
55003004	Toro la aalassiis 'dub goocha, walah tuumman ka walah ma ibaalaane, weyti serey isgeechaane, wihi harrata Waakh 'dirihiis 'doonaan.
55003005	'Doo'di Waakh tuum raaho iskaayyeela, i'daasenyi miigti Wori Haaggan jiroticho ka a 'dii'daan. 'Doo'di i'dee buj.
55003006	'Doo'da gaasiiskoo goobab goya isgessa, deyyehoti 'da'ddaran booliya. Deyyehota uskeel a 'harche, suujoonki fil ittaawenye liimoono iche icho anta.
55003007	Icho kol dakkhan wori Waakh a laabcha, i'daasenyi jirtuu rum aban ma yabuu'diin.
55003008	'Doo'da i'di goorat Yaanes ichoow Yaameres ba Muusa tirrimeen u runti Waakhe tirrima. Mali kheerenye khabaane, kakhuufnaanki icho Kiriisto kakhuufaan ka la a sookufeen.
55003009	I'daasenyi tirrinnaankichoka foga ma leeleelaan. A mehe i'di goorat Yaanes ichoow Yaameres u, enenyet tuumman i'daanu 'dalankicho arga.
55003010	I'daasenyi at rumanka wihi an 'doo'd abche ichoow dabateey ichoow mali an khabe a raahte. I'deey u Waakh a kakhuufte, samacchaare eheete enenyet tuumman a 'doonte, a garrahsatte,
55003011	sina a lakoomhiche bolokh goya tabte. At sinayyohi ilkerengeetti Antiyookhiya ichoow Ikooniyo ichoow Luussira ka liiomhiche an garrahsade a garatta. I'daasenyi Waakh sinayyohaas tuumman a ikaribe.
55003012	Rumanka la eti tuummane jeenteti usu ichoow Yeesso Kiriisto ba wohoo kalday yahiin u jiroti Waakh 'doono jirin 'doono sina a loomhicha.
55003013	'Doo'di uskeel kaassohti ichoow ki enenyet ekkeesti la weyti suujowaane, 'doo'd ekkeestaane icho la leekkeesta.
55003014	I'daasenyi at orey on isoho, wihi goorat lakaabche at rummeysatti mujjum jurkhi. A mehe 'doo'di at runta kaabatte a garatta,
55003015	toro la saggi uus at weel keeheet Chiirnaanneti munyee lakaabche a garatta. Chiirnaanneta la kikharaan a tabuu'de, 'dee ribnaan kiwoyta. Ribnaanka la kakhuufnaanki Yeesso Kiriisto lakakhuufo iche lakeela.
55003016	Chiirnaanneti Waakh tuumman a ti neebsihi Waakh kasoouummante. Chiirnaanneta enenyet a iroontahe, a mehe enenyet walahe abissa, enenyet uskeeliis icheekta, enenyet khumissa, saggi enenyet jiroti fissan ijiro la abissa.
55003017	I'da ka eti Waakh hili haaggan tuumman tuume haaggin yabuu'de, toro liitannabicha.
55004001	Waakh ichoow Yeesso Kiriistohi Kamureenenye maanti us soonokhti dakhiis chuukho toro 'doo'di tuume ichoow ki jiro ba hukkumo, orcho ka wihi an kiadeeh kallaayo.
55004002	Tab gi'de tannabo Yeedi Waakh kolal dakkhan 'doo'd icheek. 'Doo'd saggi us uskeel iyeele icheeke, leejaakh, toro uur miigooy. Geeddi at waha yeesso la weyti samacchaare, mujjum la enenyet walah abi.
55004003	A mehe ibeen a yamiit ki enenyet wori Waakhe laabcho nabah isudiwwaayo. Wihi icho imoonaan on yeelaan. Jeentetuu la, 'doo'di buurenye wihi beenaat enenyet abcho wihi dogticho 'doonto idowo, iche urursataan.
55004004	Icho la yeedi rummaat adah a kakhabtaane, hawweesseti beenaat nabah isudaan.
55004005	I'daasenyi at tabe walah tuumman ka isjeyiche, sinabaaw kisoobahte ka la garrahso. Hili eti Wori Haaggan taa'hicho haaggiche, hili Waakh kikorche tuumman buuhi.
55004006	I'di tahe ani ka jiroteey a labahcha, i'di sadakhati Waakh liikokkoddichuu. Ibeenki Waakh ikhaato la a yitah.
55004007	Dihoti an kijire mujjume kijire, oriisihi an kijire la a massiche, wori Kiriisto miinsan la mujjume kakhuufe.
55004008	Toolla 'duubi eti enenyet sooricho 'helo a isuga jeenteti an Waakh kalday on ikajiruu. Kamuri fissane enenyet mujjum hukkumo, 'duuba ibeenki us soonokhti a isiicha. Ani kalday 'duuba ma 'helo, i'daasenyi 'doo'di tuummane emeettiis imoono laka a 'hela.
55004009	Geeddi at tabuu'd hol dowe, dowwa isooeleel.
55004010	I'di tahe Deema jeenteti us wahanyeyyohi harrata ikaloo'duu adah a ikakhabte, ilkerengeetti 'Dessaloonika irte. Kireeske la boroofenhi Galaatiya irte, Tiito la boroofenhi Dalmaatiya irte.
55004011	Luuka kaldaye toolla ileejira. Maanti at tamiit Marko sookhaate issooraaha, a mehe us hili Waakh ka gargaari buurenye ikhaba.
55004012	Tuuchiko la ilkerengeetti Efeesso a ierge.
55004013	Maanti at tamiit kabuu'deeyki ilkerengeetti Tuurowa ka an min Kaarbu kasootabe sookhaat. Khadaabbeteeyti layuubo ikeen, kach ka la wihi uktohi hoolaat lakahaaggiche ikeen.
55004014	Eti tumaaleete Alekisaanda layadeeh suujoonki buurenye iyeele. Kamur jeenteti wihi us iyeeluu usu a hukkuma.
55004015	Atin laka etaas yuubsada. A mehe us Yeedi Waakhe inno cheekno weyti tirrime.
55004016	Maanti oraate kootiin ka liihukkume et igargaare mele. Enenyet adah a ikakhabte. Kamur ba waha icho iyeeleen ikakuta.
55004017	I'daasenyi Kamur a ileejire, miig isiiche, 'dee anna farniin tuum cheeka, 'dee yaafohi Waakh igaran tuumman daagaan. Ulla kootiinki Rooma ka omoot a ikaribe.
55004018	Kamur suujoon tuumman a ikariba ichoowka nebey goobiiski saraate us dakhti igeecha. Us ba jirtuu tuummamba lasaa'da. Aamiin.
55004019	Bariitoteey Birisiila ichoow Akiila ichoow min Oneesiferas ba eleeli.
55004020	Eraasta ilkerengeetti Koriinto ka'hade, Turofiimo la jeenteti us ikhannanyahuu ilkerengeetti Mileeto kasootabe.
55004021	Geeddi at tabuu'd hol dowe, geeddi il iroffowin inta sooeleel. Yuubolo ichoow Buunten ichoow Liino ichoow Kilaawudiya ichoow 'doo'di addane tuummane Kiriisto rummeeste a atin soobariitiche.
55004022	Kamur ba rubeyohiin leejira. Waakh ba atin imaala.
56001001	Eti khadaaba kisoochiiro a ani Baawulohi ilbooyi Waakhenye, toro la ergaano Yeesso Kiriistee. Anna a liisoobahche, 'dee 'doo'di Waakh soobahsate gargaara Waakh mujjum kakhuufa, toro la wori rummaate Kiriisto miinsane jiroti Waakh 'doono lajiro icho woya.
56001002	Wora rummaat ichoow kakhuufnaankaas la khajjeeli saggi icho jiroti jirtuu imassanne goorat Waakkhi been igoon geeddi harra liisoouumin iayyiche ikhabaane siicha.
56001003	Ulla ibeenki usu rubeytiis gooche ka woriis inno tuse. Wora Haaggan la a ki Waakkhi 'Doorribeheene amuriis ka dahanteey soogesse, cheek iyidah.
56001004	Eti an khadaab ichiiro la a ati Tiitohi kakhuufnaanki inno Kiriisto kakhuufno ka i'di weeleeye. Waakkhi Aabbaheene ichoow Yeesso Kiriistohi 'Doorribeheene ba kimaalaane nebey kaakaalaan.
56001005	Kireete kaatabe, 'dee hili goorat dabare khumissa, toro la i'di goorat an kiidah u, ilkerengeeto tuumman ka ewweenki urur Kiriisto woyo soobihissa.
56001006	Wihi Waakh gooche, eti urur Kiriisto woyo, a eti wohoo rucchul laka liikacheekan, a makhaabali makhaabassoo kalday on khabo, nyaakhutiis Kiriisto rummeeste, nyaakhutiis uskeeli buurenye i'daanu layeelo ichoow yeeddaagiwwaayyo liikacheekan.
56001007	Toro la eti urur Kiriisto yaakhicho, hili Waakhe dahanohiis lagesse gone, a eti wohoo rucchul laka liikacheekan. A eti rannyaat ikhabine, holholo ieheynane, meleefu ieheynane, enenyet ijahine, jiti baabule ka chilim iyowan.
56001008	Toro la a eti goobiis ka enenyet martiisti, haag on 'doono, samacchaarenye, fissane, munyeenye, isjeycho.
56001009	Toro la a eti wori rummaate lakakhuufo laabche mujjum khuccho, 'dee eti wora ka 'doo'di addan uur miigoon yabuu'de toro 'doo'di wora tirrimo uskeelicho icheekin yabuu'd.
56001010	I'di tahe 'doo'di ittaawenye weynaan iinkaanyitine, worassi indigir laa ka 'doo'd ekkeesti jira. Kach ka la a 'doo'doo Ya'huude Kiriisto rummeesti, 'doo'd Kiriisto a lakhandiyo essi.
56001011	Tabe 'doo'da aficho hid. I'di tahe wahanyeyyoha kootte ikamaline icho enenyet abchaan ka, goobassi kulman wori rummaat a buucheen. Waha la jeenteti icho chilim i'doonaan on iyeelaan.
56001012	Gorsatoo tichee goorat wihi iche tidah a mehe ya “'Doo'di Kireete, a 'doo'di lagarti been leh, a i'di binahi sussuujenye enenyet bakkicho toro la sey'ho lehe 'damaammee.”
56001013	Ayta eta cheeke a rum. Maantaka tabe 'doo'da weyti leejaakhe, 'dee wihi rummaat mujjum a kakhuufeene,
56001014	hawweesseti Ya'huude indigir ikhabin la iicho nabah isudine, amurreti 'doo'di yeedi rummaat 'dii'do la iicho raahin.
56001015	'Doo'di rubeyohicho ka eloo rucchul laka ikhabin, wahanyeyyohi jirota tuumman a leemunya. I'daasenyi 'doo'di bi'direnye Kiriisto irummeysan ka, walah tuumman a bi'dir. A mehe malassicho ichoow rubeyohichoki haag ichoow suujoon seley saaho a lakheerooche.
56001016	'Doo'da Waakh a garanna essa, i'daasenyi jiroti icho jiraan ka Waakh a 'dii'ddanyahiin. Weyti la'dii'ddanyahe, yeed ma daagaane, haaggoo rucchul laka yeelin ma yabuu'diin.
56002001	At la tabe wahanyeyyohi icho ichoow wori Waakhe rummaat ba israahaan 'doo'd abi.
56002002	Makhaaballeti araarrinyee isjeycha, saggoo atin liinkaanyito ifiddiya, 'doo'di samacchaare ateeha idah. Kakhuufnaanki icho Waakh kakhuufaan ichoow 'dooninti icho 'doo'di addan 'doonaan ichoow garrahsihi rumanka icho khabaan abi.
56002003	I'daasu la, deyyehoti araarrinyee laka wihi at itadeeh, jiroticho ka, saggi deyyehoti munyee ijira. Iiche enenyet me'de'ddeeline, farsoti sabiib barin. I'daasenyi wihi haaggan enenyet a abisso,
56002004	'dee deyyehoti nunnugul saggi iche makhaaballeticho ichoow nyaakhuticho i'doonto abin a yubaa'deen.
56002005	Toro la deyyehoti nunnugul saggi iche isijeyisso, iche jiroti mi'dabe ijirto, iche urmohicho mujjum idakhatti, iche wihi haaggan iyeesso, iche makhaaballeticho aficho ikutin abin a yubaa'deen. I'da ka enenyet Yeedi Waakh ma igafo.
56002006	Saggaas on u, tabe mejeli nunnugul laka faajjiye, a isjeycho.
56002007	Ati rubeytaah la wihi tuummane at yeesso ka, iyookkoti haaggane icho raahaan iateeh. Saggi at enenyet walah iabisso ka, eloo rucchul laka atusine, wohoo 'dabakhe iikhaatine,
56002008	toro la worassi fiffissane wohoo suuje lakacheekin liiubaa'dan cheek. I'da ka 'doo'di kitirrimo lakhaanyo khaatatta a mehe walah suujenye icho inno kacheektaan mele.
56002009	Bow'dayyo la mehe itadeeh ya, walah tuumman ka iicho kamurreticho aficho kutine, kamurreticho a kahamaadicheene, iicho yeed ilaabin.
56002010	Toro la bow'dayyo iicho kamurreticho hatin. I'daasenyi 'doo'di tuum lakakhuufo a eheetti. I'da ka walahbaaw icho yeelaan ka, yeedi wori rummaate Waakkhi 'Doorribeheene kayamiit saa'do ikeenaan.
56002011	A mehe haaggi Waakhe buurenye inno imunneynane ribnaan keeno, weeli enenyet tuumman a liisoobabbakkaahiche.
56002012	Haagga la saggi jiroti Waakh ikamalin liijirin ichoow saggi wahanyeyyohi harratane sussuujenye liimoono lii'dii'do iche inno abcha. Toro la harrata ka, 'doo'di isjeycho, fiffissane, jiroti Waakh 'doono jiro, inno abcha.
56002013	I'dane yeella geeddi inno khajjeeli buuhi Waakh keeno sugno. Waha la a maanti Yeesso Kiriistohi Waakhenye 'Doorribeheene weynaantiisti ababto inno liisoobabbakkaahicho.
56002014	Yeesso la jeentetane jirotiis inno isoobahche, 'dee hugun'darri tuumman inno kasoofura, toro la inno dikha 'dee 'doo'di kiisenye haag kalday imoono nateeh.
56002015	Wahanyeyyoha 'doo'd abiche uuricho miigooche, toro la antohi tuum lakisiiche ka leejaakh. Uus etoo kalday laka ki'darraawin.
56003001	Tab 'doo'd Kiriisto kasoo'heliche, 'doo'di anto khabo ichoow karnatohi sirgaal ba a inkaanyiteene wihi lii'doono kol tuumman a raaheene wihi haaggan la a itannabteene a yeeleen.
56003002	Toro la kasoo'heliche iicho enenyet hamanne, nebey a kafiddiyeene, 'doo'di samacchaare a yitaaheene, enenyet ortiis ka a isnuglaacheen.
56003003	I'di tahe inno rubeyteen laka 'hor 'doo'di 'dalammeenye yeed idaagine leekkeeste, bow'dati wahanyeyyohi noole uurasseen imoonaane toro kahamaadicho on eheet. Jiroteen wihi buuhe a suujoon ichoow kal'darri. A inno la'dii'de inno laka 'doo'di addan a 'dii'dne.
56003004	I'daasenyi maanti Waakkhi 'Doorribeheene uuri 'dabakhe inno tuste weeli enenyet 'doonintiis tuste ka,
56003005	inno ribe. Waha la jeenteti inno wohoo fissan iyeelle menye, a jeenteti uurnugleeli Waakh on. Usu Rubeyti Munyeenye jiroteen dikhto, delmaatti husub ichoow jiroti husub inno siisso ka, a inno ribe.
56003006	Waakh la Yeesso Kiriistohi 'Doorribeheene ka, a inno ibuuhiche Rubeyti Munyee tuum inno isookhube.
56003007	Haaggi Waakhe buurenye inno imunneynan ka, 'doo'di fiffissan a inno iekkaache. Waakh waha dakkhane yeele 'dee 'doo'di jiroti jirtuu imassanne inno khajjeello dalho nateeh.
56003008	Yeedassaas an idah a wihi lakakhuufo. Atihi yeedassaas katirriinsatti 'dee 'doo'di Waakh rummeeste kol tuumman haag yeelo iche 'doona. Wahanyeyyoha la enenyet a ihaagganyahiine toro la a iroonyahiin.
56003009	I'daasenyi iriirti 'dalam ichoow magahenyeti aacchinye ichoow jaakh ichoow amurre Muusati islaleeiriiro kaseeh. I'di tahe waha a wihi ilmarhaatteete indigir laa.
56003010	Eti goytiin ka enenyet seley goggoocho, koli oraat ichoow koli lammaatteet tootoocha, chu'us i'daas yeelo sirbi lakigessa idaha. Chirri us uliba sookuto kafirda.
56003011	Taba waha tissiba, eti i'dee a khollokkhanyahe, uskeeliis ka la sina isigoocha Waakh ortiis ka.
56003012	Uus an Arteema ommos Tuuchiko kisooergo, dowwa ilkerengeetti Nikaboolis ka iamiit. I'di tahe 'dee maanti hayohi roffo yitaaheen, ilkerengeettaase anihi fiddiyo gooche.
56003013	Geeddi at tabuu'd hol dowe, Seenahi wakiile ichoow Aboollo gargaare luhlo iyeel.
56003014	Wihi an 'doo'deen ka'doono a ichohi geeddi icho yabuu'diin haag yeelin abtaane, 'dee 'doo'di rumanka gargaar 'doono gargaareene, 'dee iicho jiroti indigir laa jirin.
56003015	'Doo'd Kiriistoki inta ka ileejiro tuumman a atin soobariitiche. 'Doo'di Kiriisto kakhuufo inno 'doono bariiti. Waakh ba atin tuumman atin imaala.
57001001	Khadaaba eti kisoochiiro a ani, Baawulo. Anna jeenteti an wori Yeesso Kiriisto miinsan icheeko iche jeela ikajira. Timootihi ullaka koo Kiriistee a kisoobariitiche. Fiilemonhi weyti aalenyeenye, hil Kiriisto nah kaleejiro,
57001002	ichoow Aafiyati too Kiriistee ichoow eteenyoki Arkiiba layadeehe nah sina isleenaham ichoow urur Kiriistoki kol tuumman minkaah ka Waakh wahti laka a isoochiira.
57001003	Waakkhi Aabbaheene ichoow Yeesso Kiriistohi Kamure ba atin imaalaane nebey atin kakaalaan.
57001004	An kol tuumman Waakkheey kala'd a ilaaba geeddi an weysiheey ka kaasoo'helo.
57001005	I'di tahe saggi at Yeessohi Kamureene ikakhuufto toro la at 'doo'di Waakh tuumman i'doonto, a daaga.
57001006	Wihi an Waakh daaho, a kulanki Kiriistohi inno kakhuufno ka isikhabno gurnaan delo 'dee haaggi tuummane Kiriisto kayamiite inno khabno tuum abatta.
57001007	Et Kiriistokaaw, 'dooninti at 'doo'd Kiriisto 'doonto weyti a ikahamaadisse, toro weyti uur imiigoosse, i'di tahe at 'doo'di Waakh uur a miigoosse.
57001008	Antohi Kiriisto isiiche ka, a geeddi an roorro laan amur kibahcho wihi incheenka at yeesso kicheeko.
57001009	I'daasenyi 'doonin Kiriisto ka, samacchaar on kihawwaasda. Ani a Baawulo kola a araarrowe, toro la jeente Yeesso Kiriisto jeela ikajira,
57001010	a kihawwaasde, bal Oneesmo gargaar. Us kola a i'di weelaaya. I'di tahe an jeela kajiraayi, usu jit Kiriisto abche kola a i'doo an aabbahiis itah.
57001011	'Hor indigir us kikhabo mele, i'daasenyi toolla ati ichoow ani ba weyti indigir inno ikhaba.
57001012	Usuhi an uureey ka weyti 'doono a kisoolaaba.
57001013	Kootte incheenka geedda an jeela kajiro jeenteti an Wori Haaggan icheekuu, usuhi inta ka ileefiddiyo meessaah gelo igargaaro 'doona.
57001014	I'daasenyi sammata at iayyin, anihi wohoo rucchul laka yeelo ma 'doono. I'da ka haaggi at yeesso ma lakihosso a wihi at 'doonto on.
57001015	Kolossoo jeentetane geeddoo rucchul Oneesmo seley ibahteene, 'dee maanti us kisoonokhti jirtuu tuumman usu khabta.
57001016	'Deerka us kola bow'da menye, bow'da a kadeefa, a i'di walaalaahki at weyti 'doonto. An usu weyti 'doona, i'daasenyi 'dooninti at usu 'doonto iche weyti kutta. A mehe saggi weeli enenyet u ichoow Kamur ka us a walaalaahha, usu a 'doonta.
57001017	'Deerka chirri rumanka at ani hil Kiriisto ka i'di wahalhaah ikhaatto, Oneesmo saggi kootte at ani imartiisatti imartiiso.
57001018	Chirri us khufoo kiyeele ommos us mogtoo kaakhabo, ani ikaguto.
57001019	Ani Baawulo, yeeda dahantaaya kachiira. Mogtiis ani kisooguta. I'daasenyi jiroti ati ichoow Kiriisto wohoo kalday tahiin ka saggi at ani mog ikakhabto laka an ma kaayyeedo.
57001020	Toollaka et Kiriistokaaw, inno ichoow Kiriisto a wohoo kalday gone, iroonoteey u wahaas an kaa'doono yeel. I'daakka weyti uur imiigoossa.
57001021	Saggi at wihi an kidaahe iyeesso a tissiba, 'deerka khadaaba a kisoochiira. Saggi at wihi an kidaahe laka 'dirihicho iyeesso a garda.
57001022	Wihi addane an kidaaho kallaayo, minki marti ka inti an baryo ihaaggi. A mehe khajjeeli an khabo a ki Waakh weysihiin daago, us toro ani goytiin isoolaabo.
57001023	Ebaabarahi jeenteti us wor Yeesso Kiriisto 'doo'd ikacheekuu jeela ikaleejiro a kisoobariitiche.
57001024	Toro la Marko ichoow Aristaarko ichoow Deema ichoow Luuka laka a kisoobariiticheen. Icho a 'doo'di hil Kiriisto ikaleejiro.
57001025	Yeesso Kiriistohi Kamure ba rubeyohiin imaala.
58001001	Goorat archiiy, Waakh aacchinyeteen geeddi buure ichoow jitassi ittaawe ka a leeyyeede. Ulla 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo kaleeyyeede.
58001002	I'daasenyi, ibeenneta 'da'ddaboot ka, Waakh Weeliissa inno kaleeyyeede. Weeliiska a ki Waakh soobahsate walah tuumman dalho, toro la a ki Waakh usu ka harra tuumman soouume.
58001003	Weela Waakh la weynaanti Waakkhi ababo tusa, ulla toro a fooli Waakh. Ulla yeediiski miig leh ka wihi tuummane jiro khuccha. Ulla a yumuyye, 'dee usu rubeytiis jiti uskeeli weeli enenyet lakadikho yitah. Inkoo us wahaas yeele ka, goobi Waakh ka Waakkhi Weyti Ween ankiiski miigeet orronte.
58001004	'Deerka Weeli Waakh herti Waakh laka weyti a kaweeyyahe. Magahi Waakh weeliis siiche magahi herti Waakh weyti kussanyahe.
58001005	I'di tahe Waakh hertoh Waakhe injire waha iidah, “At a Weelaaya, maalinka an Aabbahaahha itah.” Ommos Waakh hertoo kaldache Waakh, “An Aabbahiissa ateehe, ulla Weelaaya yateeh,” ma iidaahan.
58001006	Toro la Waakh maanti us teyyankiis harrata isooerge wihi us yidah, “Herti Waakh tuumman usu a wahatti.”
58001007	Waakh la chirri us wori hertiis kaayyeedo, wihi us essi, “Waakh hertiis hafare kayeela, toro falfatiistaas kalabi 'dabe kayeela.”
58001008	I'daasenyi Waakh wihi weeliis miinsane us iyidah, “Okkhoow, kombortaahti antoot jirtuu tuumman ma massatti, at la wussaah ka jiti rummaate 'doo'daah kadakhatta.
58001009	At wihi fissane 'doonta, hugun'darri la 'dii'dda. Jeentetaase anihi Waakkhaahe, subakki geeyi oolife hamaad keeno matah ikaasubhe, wahalhaah goyaka kikucche.”
58001010	Wihi addane Waakh weeliis iyidah, “Kamuroow, uumaccho ka harra tuumman a soouunte, dahanohaah ka la serey soouunte.
58001011	Waha tuumman a massataane, icho dakkhan la i'di dafareet u, a massataan. I'daasenyi, at a soo'hadda.
58001012	I'di kootihi massatte u a isijibbaadda, toro la i'di dafarti raagte u urgiyissa. I'daasenyi at a ki gooraatteet one, ma urgiito, gu'hassaah la ma massataan.”
58001013	Hertoh Waakhe injire Waakh i'da iidah, “Dabankeeyki miigeete antoot orrommo ichoowka chiiytaah tuum dahanohaah a soogesso?”
58001014	Herti Waakh a meheey? Icho a rubeyohi Waakh ergati, 'doo'di ribnaanki Waakh mu'dan ihilo menya?
58002001	Maantaka, jeenteti wihi Waakh yeeluu, runta inno daagne weyti mujjum khabanni gi'de, uus inno inti inno isoohanni bujine.
58002002	A mehe farniinki goorat Waakh herti Waakh fare a larummaache. Eti tuummane iraahine ommos daagiwwaaye la, sina loomhiche.
58002003	Saggoh sina ikabahsanneey, chirri inno ribnaanki weyti haaggane Waakh inno ribo aw ikakhabin? Yeessohi Kamure rubeytiissa kolooraat ribnaanka cheeke, 'doo'di usu daage la, saggi ribnaankaas rum iyahe inno isoocheeke.
58002004	Waakh rubeytiis la ribnaankaas rummaache. Saggi us irummaache la a i'da, wahanyeyyohi miigti Waakh tuso ichoow girmo ichoow wihi ittaawenye weeli enenyet yeelin iubaa'dane yeele, toro la saggi us i'doono on u, siinti Rubeyti Munyee 'doo'd gise.
58002005	Waakh herti Waakh mee antohi jiroti harrati soosohatti, nah woriche kaayyeeno siiche.
58002006	I'daasenyi Chiirnaanneti Waakh goyaka intoo wihi lakachiire a mehe ya, “Okkhoow, weeli enenyet a mehe kasoo'hessa, weeli enenyete khoroseebe a mehe yaakhissa?
58002007	At icho herti Waakh geeddoo nucchul on kasoonuglaasse, a i'doo at 'duub korisse at saggi at iweynaasse toro la liinkaanyito at irummaasse,
58002008	toro la icho eti walah tuumman anti kayeesse.” Wihi yeeda yadeeh, Waakh weeli enenyet eti walah tuumman anti kayeele, walah us kalaabte mele. I'daasenyi toolla weeli enenyet usuhi walah tuumman itoollo ma agarro.
58002009	I'daasenyi wihi inno agarro a Yeessohi Waakh i'daaru herti Waakh kasoonuglaache. I'daasenyi jeenteti sina ikawaarte us iyumuy u, Waakh toolla usu 'duub a korche, weynaache, a liinkaanyita. I'da ka haaggi Waakhe buure ka, Kiriisto meessi weeli enenyet tuummane kayamuut.
58002010	Waakhe walah tuumman soouume, toro la jeentetiissa walah tuumman liihaaggiche. Waakh a eysiiche maanti us Yeesso massalaaba ka sinayyohi lakawaariche ka eti tuume kayeele, 'dee nyaakhuti ittaawe goobi Waakh keena. A mehe Yeesso enenyet jiti ribnaan lakeelo tusa.
58002011	Yeessohi enenyet munyaacho ichoow 'doo'di us munyaacho ba Aabbahicho a koo kaldache, a Waakh. Jeentetaas u Yeesso ma uryaawo chu'us 'doo'da a uuraaya yadeeh.
58002012	Ulla wihi us Waakh iyidah, “An 'doo'di uureeye wihi at yeesse a icheeka, chirri icho kulmaane weestaan la, an a kikoolicha.”
58002013	Wihi addane Yeesso yidah, “Ani Waakhe kakhuufa.” Toro la wihi us essi, “An kalla, nyaakhuti Waakh isiiche leejira.”
58002014	Nyaakhutaas i'daas us yadeeh u, a weeli enenyete sar ichoow diig khabo gone, Yeesso laka uummanki weeli enenyete inno leegisme. I'daas ka omoottiis ka Seytaanki enenyet omoot ikeeno miigtiis tuumman bar a tire,
58002015	toro la 'doo'di jiroticho tuumman i'di falfa eheet jeenteti icho omoot ikarooraan u, fure.
58002016	Rumanka us herti Waakh mee gargaar yimiy. I'daasenyi nyaakhut nyaakhut Aburaahame gargaar yimiy.
58002017	Jeentetaas u sagag tuumman ka i'di 'doo'di uuriisenye yitahye, kuhaanihi weyti weene hili Waakh ka lakakhuufo toro uur nugul yitah. Ulla toro i'dane yeele, 'dee soorriyoti holi Waakh laabto bahcha, 'dee Waakh uskeeli weeli enenyet kakuta.
58002018	A mehe Yeesso rubeytiis kajmeyyohi uskeel kalug'do ka sina a kawaarte gone, 'doo'di kajmeyyohi uskeel kalug'do ka lakajo gargaarin a yabuu'd.
58003001	Maantaka 'doo'd Kiriistoki munyeenye Waakh goobiis iwahe, Yeessohi kakhuufnaanki inno Waakh kakhuufno inno cheekno ka, Waakh ergaano ichoow kuhaanihi weyti ween kayeele kamalda.
58003002	Yeessohi Waakh soobahsate la, wihi Waakh yeel iyidah tuumman ka a eti lakakhuufe, saggi Muusa hiliiski minki Waakh ka eti lakakhuufe ieheet u.
58003003	Yeesso Muusa 'dirihiis koolo a imaleen saggi eti min diso koolo min 'dirihiis ikamaleen u.
58003004	Min ba eti diso a khaba gone, i'daasenyi Waakh usu walah tuumman i'di icho yahiin kayeele.
58003005	Muusa goorat i'di ilbooy u, eti rumanka hili minki Waakh ka lakakhuufe eheete, ulla wihi Waakh berri sooyadeehe cheeke.
58003006	I'daasenyi Kiriisto weeli lakakhuufo hili minki Waakh tuumman itoollo eheet. Chirri inno bur'de ikhabine, khajjeeli inno Kiriisto kakhabno keeylajno la, inno a minkiissa.
58003007	Maantaka, i'di Rubeyti Munyee Chiirnaanneti Waakh goyaka tadeeh u, “Maalinka cha'atin wihi Waakh essi daagtaan,
58003008	matah amiigeysanna i'di aacchinyetiin u. Iche la goorat a idaagiwwaayte. Maanti iche hidaad goya kajirte iche ani ikajje.
58003009	Chirri aacchinyetiin wihi an gu'h tomon affar iyeele agarte laka, usu an rum ahe a ikajje, toro sinayyohi ikajo ikeente.
58003010	Ani la jeentetaase kholotaas ikahollowe, wihi an idah, ‘Uurassicho kol dakkhan baabaa iche kijiraane, jitasseey la ma garan.’
58003011	Ani la holeey ka a daadde wihi an idah, ‘'Doo'da ili an kanascho yombuu tuumman ma gelo.’ ”
58003012	'Doo'd Kiriistokaaw taba gi'de, uus etiinkoo kalday laka matahmiigti Waakh liirummeysanne Waakkhi jiro lakatabo khabin gi'de.
58003013	I'daasenyi geeddi il Maalinka on yahe, maan dakkhan uur ismiigoocha. Uus 'dee etiinkoo kalday laka uskeel ekkeysanne, us Waakh matah imiigeysanne.
58003014	I'di tahe chirri inno geeddi inno jiro khabno inno mujjum tolossanne, inno khajjeeli maanti inno kolooraat Yeesso rummeysanne on khabno, inno tuumman Kiriisto a walhinne.
58003015	I'daasenyi, wihi Yeedi Waakh essi akadabina. “Maalinka, chirri atin wihi Waakh essi daagteen, matah amiigeysanna i'di aacchinyetiin u. Iche la goorat ani a idaagiwwaayte.”
58003016	Kamalda bal 'doo'di wihi Waakh essi daage toro raahiwwaaye a ayyo illeh? Icho 'doo'di tuummane Muusa ili Miissiri kasoobahche menya?
58003017	Toro 'doo'di Waakh rubeytiis gu'h tomon affar ihollowe a ayyo illeh? Icho 'doo'di uskeel yeele, hidaad goyaka tuume menya?
58003018	Toro kamalda bal, 'doo'di Waakh idaatte, “'Doo'da ili an kanascho yombuu tuumman ma gelo,” iyidah a ayyo illeh? 'Doo'di Waakh rubeytiis daagiwwaaye menya?
58003019	Wihi 'deerka inno abanni, 'doo'da Waakh ma kakhuufin gone, ilaas icho kanasin leheet a latirte.
58004001	Waakh uliba laka a inno iayyicha nasmetiis a inno siicha. Maantaka taba a isyaakhinno, uus 'dee eteenkoo kalday laka meessa nasme eleelin waayin gi'de.
58004002	Saggi aacchinyeteen hidaad goyaka Wori Haaggane nasmeti Waakh miinsan idaagtuu, inno laka a daagne. Icho woraas a daageene, i'daasenyi walah us ibahe mele. A mehe chi'icho daageen laka, icho Waakh ma kakhuufin.
58004003	Innohi Waakh rummeysanne kaldache nasmetaas Waakh ayyiche 'hella, a mehe wihi Waakh aacchinyeteenti usu irummeysan miinsane us yidah kallaayo. “Ani la holeey ka a daadde, ‘'Doo'da ili an kanascho, yombuu tuumman ma gelo.’ ” Ulla i'daase yidah chirri us hiliiski us harra soouume meessiisti nasme kijirtaayi us orey on massiche laka.
58004004	A mehe Chiirnaanneti Waakh intoo ka wihi ibeenki teebannaatteet miinsane kachiiran kallaayo, “Ibeenki teebannaatteete uumacchoti harra tuumman ka, Waakh walah Us haaggiche mele, a nase.”
58004005	Ayta nasme la inti kootte oraat ka a lakaayyeede, wihi liidah, “'Doo'da ili an kanascho, yombuu tuumman ma gelo.”
58004006	Uliba laka nasmeti Waakh 'doo'doo usu kakhuufo nascho a jirta. I'daasenyi 'doo'di oraate Wori Haaggane meessaas nasme miinsan daage la meessaas ma gelin. I'di tahe ayti Waakh a daagiwwaayeen.
58004007	Maantaka Waakh toro ibeenkoo addane nasmetiis la'helo yeele, ibeenkaas la Maalinkane layadeeh. Inkoo geeddi deer lafiddiye ka, wihi Waakh Dawuud ka yidahye kootte orey lakahawwooche a mehe ya, “Maalinka, chirri atin wihi Waakh essi daagteen, matah amiigeysanna.”
58004008	A mehe chirri goorat Yoochuwa woynaanki us 'doo'd ili Kaanan iwoyo ka, nasmeti Waakh 'doo'd iayyiche nasche, Waakh toro ibeenkoo addane nasmetiis la'helo ma kaayyeedo gon.
58004009	'Deerka nasmeti khummane 'doo'di Waakh uliba sugto a jirta.
58004010	A mehe eti tuummane nasmetaas khummane Waakh 'doo'd iayyiche naso, ullaka hiliis ka a nasa saggi Waakh hiliiski uumaccho ka inasuu.
58004011	Maantaka, tirriinsanni gi'de, 'dee nasmetaas Waakh a nasno. A mehe eti tuummane ayti Waakh daagiwwaaye i'di goorat yaafohi Issiraayel yeeleen u, ullaka nasmetaas ma naso.
58004012	Wihi Waakh yidah a i'di wihi jiro khabo, miig laka khabo. Afi Yeedi Waakh leeyahiin la afi birlab laka a kutaane, rubey ichoow uur laka seley a goocha, toro la inti hubno ichoow duh kijiraan seley a goocha. Yeedi Waakh wihi suuje ichoow wihi haaggane uureen kijiro a tusa, mali enenyet ichoow wihi enenyet 'doono dagsan laka mujjume fiiricha.
58004013	Wohoo rucchule lasoouume Waakh lakadagcho ma jiraan, Waakh ortiis ka walah tuumman a nyiikhsanyahiin one, i'daanu arga. Waha a Waakkhi berri wihi inno yeelle tuumman inno worsati.
58004014	Maantaka kuhaanihi weyti weene goobi Waakh irte a khabna. Waha la a Yeessohi Weeli Waakhe. Taba gi'de kakhuufnaanki inno Waakh kakhuufno inno cheekanni ka, mujjum a tolossanni.
58004015	Kuhaaniheenka weyti ween la 'dabakkheen tuumman a isoonaha. I'di tahe sagag tuumman ka saggi kajmeti uskeel inno kalugu'ddo inno liikakajo on usu laka liikaje, i'daasenyi uskeeloo rucchul laka ma gelin.
58004016	Maantaka Waakkheenki haaggiiski buure inno tusti roorro laan kombortiisti antoot ortiis iranni gi'de. Intaas ka maambaaw inno gargaar 'doonno, us uure inno isoonugleesta toro haaggiiski buure inno siicha.
58005001	Kuhaanihi weyti ween tuumman 'doo'd goya lakasoobahcha. Hilicho la, a ki icho wihi Waakh miinsan ka, meessi enenyet ka Waakh ifalaane, siimo ichoow soorriyoyyohi uskeel bahcho Waakh ibahchaan.
58005002	Kuhaanihi ween ullaka 'dabakkhi weeli enenyet a khaba gone, 'doo'di jeenteti us jiti mujjume igaran u uskeel gelo, inahin a yabuu'd.
58005003	Ullaka a etoo 'dabakhe gone, jeenteti uskeeliis u ichoow toro uskeeli 'doo'di addan u Waakh soorriyo a ibahcha.
58005004	Et keley on isweynaacho, kuhaanihi weyti ween iskayeelo mele. Eti tuummane kuhaanihi weyti ween yateeh, Waakh kalday on waha, i'di goorat Haruun Waakh iwahuu.
58005005	Kiriisto laka 'deerka ma isweynaanne kuhaanihi weyti ween ma iskayeelin. I'daasenyi Waakhe usu soobahsate wihi us iyidah, “At a Weelaaya, maalinka an Aabbahaahha itah.”
58005006	Chiirnaanneti Waakh goyaka intoo ka Waakh mehe Kiriisto idowa ya, “At jirtuu tuumman a kuhaanihi uumman Melkisedeeke.”
58005007	Maanti Yeesso harrata kijire, us riirit ichoow oytim ka Waakkhi omoot karibo wahte. Jeenteti Us roorro ka Waakh afiis ikutin u, Waakh weysihiis a daage.
58005008	Chirri us rumanka Weeli Waakh yahe laka, sinayyohi lakawaariche wihi Waakh 'doono mujjum a abcheen.
58005009	Inkoo tuum lakayeele ka, eti jirtuu tuumman 'doo'di usú raaho ribo yitah.
58005010	Waakh la wihi us kawahe, a kuhaanihi weyti weene uumman Melkisedeeke.
58005011	Wihi buurenye Yeessohi ullaka i'di Melkisedeek u kuhaanee miinsane an idaahan 'doono, a jiraan. I'daasenyi chirri an atin isoobabbakkaahicho weyti miigyahiin. A mehe walah dowwa ma atin gelaanee.
58005012	Atin geeddi deere 'doo'd Kiriisto eheet. Kootte geeddee ka, atine 'doo'di addan walah abissaan. I'daasenyi, atin laka toolla wihi Yeedi Waakh ka kolooraat lakasooumho, iche eti atin abcho 'doontaan. Wihi Waakh miinsan ka, atin uliba a i'di nyaakhuti gololi miige ohom iubaa'dane, haanu kalday on damo.
58005013	A mehe eti tuummane haanu kalday on damo a weeli nucchule, wihi fissane kootte lii'doono us yeelo ma garti.
58005014	I'daasenyi gololi miige a ki 'doo'di ii'dowe, kol tuumman Yeedi Waakh raaho, wihi haaggan ichoow wihi suuje seley saahnaan isabche.
58006001	Maantaka orey isohanni, kakhuufnaanki inno Kiriisto kakhuufno ka soonnaanneti 'doo'di Kiriisto ka ii'd khabo miinsan, a raahno. Wihi Kiriisto miinsane inno kolooraat abanne i'di maanta sohoti omoot keeno inno kasoonokhanni ichoow saggi inno Waakh ikakhuufno illehe, kakunno gi'de.
58006002	Soonnaanneta addan la a i'di maanta baattissiyo ichoow 'doo'di dahano lakorcho ichoow 'doo'di tuume berri omoot kasookaho ichoow saggi Waakh berri enenyet ihukkumo wihi us goocho jirtuu tuumman iyateehiin illeh kakunno gi'de.
58006003	Afi Waakh ka, i'daase yeella, Kiriisto goyaka ii'downa.
58006004	A mehe 'doo'di maantoo Kiriisto rummeysan katabe soolaabinti lasoolaabo icho uskeelicho kasoonokhtaan ma tateeh. 'Doo'da runti wori Waakh a abte, wihi Waakh 'doo'd siicho la rubey ka a chanchameene, icho ichoow 'doo'di addan la Rubeyti Munyee a islee'heleen.
58006005	Icho rubeyohicho ka chinniti Yeedi Waakh ichoow miigti maanti Waakh enenyet soodakhti a chanchameen.
58006006	Chirri icho Kiriisto kakhuufin 'diicheen, soolaabinti lasoolaabo 'dee icho uskeelicho kasoonokhtaan ma tateeh. I'di tahe icho toro Weeli Waakhe awtichuu massalaaba kakaahaane, toro usu 'dow on ka lakhaanyo kadowaan.
58006007	Iyookkoka Waakh harrati bicchehi hiri 'deyo surrukhto, toro la gurnaanki indigir khabo eti gos leh ibihisso a imaala.
58006008	I'daasenyi harra chi'iche kudah ichoow haraam on bihisso, indigir iche khabto mele gon. Waakh kola harrataas a fala, 'da'ddaboka la jirtuu tuumman 'dab yaham.
58006009	Aalasseenyoki nah weyti 'doonno, chirri nah i'duu atin faajjiino laka, nah wa'dwaa'd ma atin kakhabno. I'di tahe saggi atin jiti deefo ribnaan raaho iraahtaane garanna.
58006010	Waakh wihi imale on yeela. Usu wihi atin yeessaan ma kadabo, ommos 'dooninti atin usu tusatteen ma kadabo. 'Dooninta la mehe lakaarga ya, gargaari atin 'doo'di Waakh gargaarteene, uliba laka atin gargaartaan.
58006011	Wihi nah etiimba i'doonno kallaayo, orey isohda, is'doona ichoowka jiro 'dubiche a eleesso, 'dee wihi atin Kiriisto ka khajjeessaan uba.
58006012	I'da ka la wihi Waakh miinsan ka ma sey'hoottaane, i'daasenyi dabati 'doo'di samacchaar ichoow kakhuufnaanki icho Waakh kakhuufaan ka wihi Waakh ayyiche mu'dane raahtaan.
58006013	Maanti Waakh Aburaaham ayyintiis igooche a daatte. Et usu kaween mele gone, chu'us daatte, magahiissa on wahe.
58006014	Waakh wihi us Aburaaham iyidah, “Rumanka a kimaala, toro la nyaakhutaah a ittaawicha.”
58006015	Aburaaham la geeddi deer garrahsi ka Waakh a kakhuufe, wihi goorat Waakh iayyiche 'da'ddaboka 'hele.
58006016	Eti daatti tuumman magahi etoo kaweene waha, 'dee iriire massatta.
58006017	Waakh 'doo'di wihi us ayyiche dalho saggi us ayta weyti imiigooche toro la us maliis iurgiyin a tusa. Jeentetuu la Waakh wihi us ayyiche ka a daatte.
58006018	Waakh wihi us ayyiche ichoow wihi us daatte ma urgiyaane, been goon ma yabuu'd. Maantaka innohi Waakh inyaanne karibanne uure inno miigoocha, 'dee khajjeeli us inno siiche mujjum khabanna.
58006019	Waha inno khajjeello la, jiroteen ka fiddihi roorro laan lafiddiyo khuuf inno siichaan. Eti inno khajjeel kakhabno a Yeessohi dafarti yobbeenye meel seley goosso tabe, dafartaas 'dirihiche ka meessi goyaat ikute.
58006020	Yeesso la orteenna meessaas inno igele. Ulla jirtuu tuumman uumman Melkisedeek u, kuhaaniheenki weyti weene yitah.
58007001	Eta Melkisedeek layadeeh, karnati ili Saleeme eheneete, toro la kuhaanihi Waakkhi Weyti Weene eheneet. Chirri Aburaaham 'doo'diis khabaayi karnatohi ittaawe ka'higtoote sooriche soonokhte ka, Melkisedeek or kadowe, iweeste.
58007002	Aburaaham la wihi tuummane us diho ka sookhaate meel tomon seley igooche, goonankoo Melkisedeek siiche. Magaha Melkisedeek layadeeh la a mehe ya, “Karnati wihi fissan yeelo.” Jeenteti us karnati Saleem iyahuu, magaha wihi addane us itoollo a mehe ya, “Karnati nebey dowo.”
58007003	Walah Melkisedeek aabbahiis ichoow abartiis ichoow aacchinyetiis laka miinsane lasoocheeke mele. Maanti us desse ichoow maanti us yumuy laka ma lacheekin. Us i'di Weeli Waakh u, jirtuu dakkhan a kuhaani on.
58007004	Bal saggi rumanka Melkisedeek ikhummanyahe kamalda. Aburaahamhi yaafohi Issiraayel uume laka, wihi us diho ka sookhaate, goonankoo Melkisedeeke siiche.
58007005	Amurre Muusa ka nyaakhut nyaakhut Laawi, ki gaasiiskoo kuhaaniyyo yahe, icho laka goonankoo yaafohi Issiraayel a kakhaataan, chirri icho nyaakhut nyaakhut Aburaaham yahiin laka.
58007006	I'daasenyi chirri Melkisedeek hiiy Laawi ikiimaatan laka, goonankoo Aburaaham usu siiche a kakhaatte one, toro iweeste. Aburaaham la a eti ayyinti goorat Waakh gooche 'helo.
58007007	Wihi inno garanni la a mehe ya, eti enenyet iweesti, ichoow ki liiweesti, ki enenyet iweesti ween.
58007008	Kuhaaniyyohi yaaf Laawi kayimiy ka, 'doo'di goonankoo khaato a weeli enenyete berri yamuut. Melkisedeek laka goonankoo a 'hele. I'daasenyi us icho a kussanyahe. I'di tahe Chiirnaanneti Waakh saggi us ijiro a cheekta.
58007009	Maantaka maanti Aburaaham goonankoo Melkisedeek siiche, a i'doo Laawihi hiiyyiis goonankoo khaato laka, Aburaaham ka goonankoo bahche.
58007010	I'di tahe Laawi geeddaas ka ma delan. Toro maanti Melkisedeek Aburaaham 'hele, Laawihi yomboka ladele, sar aacchihiiski Aburaaham layadeehe goya kijire.
58007011	Amurreti Waakh yaafohi Issiraayel siiche, kuhaaniyyohi yaaf Laawi kanoolneet. I'daasenyi kuhaaniyyo hilicho saggi Waakh ika'doono tuum buuhin ma ubaa'dan. Jeentetaas gon kuhaanihi uumman nyaakhut nyaakhut Haruun kayimiy menye, ki uumman Melkisedeeke Waakh i'doona.
58007012	I'di tahe wihi la'doono a mehe ya, maanti kuhaaniyyo luurgiyicho, amurre laka a luurgiyicha.
58007013	Kamureenka Chiirnaanneti Waakh woriis kaayyeeddo la, yaaftoo addane kayimiyye, yaaftaas ka la et injire chalagti hoola lakasoorriyoocho ka hili kuhaani haaggiche mele.
58007014	A mehe enenyet tuumman saggi Kamureen yaaf Yuuda ikayimiy a garta. Muusa la maanti us wori kuhaaniyyoot kaayyeede, yaafta magah laka ma wahin.
58007015	Ayta inno kaayyeene weyti a 'dowaawte, i'di tahe kuhaanihoo addane uumman Melkisedeeke a soobahe.
58007016	Ulla jeenteti us amura usuhi hiiy Laawi kayamiit i'doono ibuuhiche kuhaani ma itaahane, i'daasenyi jeenteti miigtiisti jirotiisti jirtuu imassanne kuhaani iyitah.
58007017	I'di tahe Chiirnaanneti Waakh wihi iche cheekto, “At jirtuu tuumman a kuhaanihi uumman Melkisedeeke.”
58007018	Amurreti oraat a 'darneete toro la gargaar ma khabine, a la'diiche.
58007019	A mehe amurre Muusa walah tuum ma kayeesso. I'daasenyi khajjeeli inno toolla khabno, khajjeeli goorat inno khabne khuuf on kadeefa, Waakhe inno idowwaachaa.
58007020	Inno khajjeela deefo a khabna, toro wihi Waakh daatte laka a jiraan. I'di tahe Waakh maanti goorat kuhaaniyyohi yaaf Laawi lasoobahcho, ma daatan.
58007021	I'daasenyi maanti Yeesso kuhaani yitah, Waakh a daatte, wihi us yidah, “Anihi Kamurenye Waakhe wahane gooche, yombo la ma inokhdi, wohoo addan ma yeelo. At jirtuu tuumman a kuhaani.”
58007022	Jeenteti Waakh idaattuu, Yeesso a jiti ayyinti deefto Waakh gooche lakabuuhicho.
58007023	Wohoo addane ayyinti oraat yeerarroocho a mehe ya, kuhaaniyyohi oraat ittaawe eheneet. I'di tahe kooba a yamuute, chu'us yumuy la, hili Waakh ma haaggicho gone, etoo addan meessiis gela.
58007024	I'daasenyi Yeesso jirtuu tuumman a jira gone, hiliiski kuhaani et liikuccho, meessiis gelo mele.
58007025	Maantaka usu 'doo'di usu leeyamiite Waakh iirti tuum ribin a yabuu'd. I'di tahe usu kol tuummamba a jira, 'dee 'doo'da Waakh a ihawwaasta.
58007026	Yeesso a kuhaaniheenki weyti weene, sagag tuumman ka inno gargaaro. I'di tahe usu a munya, eloo rucchul laka ma khabo, bi'diroo rucchul laka ma khabo. Waakh usu 'doo'di uskeel leh goyaka a soobahche, goobi Waakh ka walah tuumman 'dirihicho weynaache.
58007027	Ulla walah usu i'di kuhaaniyyohi weyti wewweene addan u, kol dakkhan koloo jeenteti uskeeliis u, Waakh soorriyoyyo ikabahcho, 'dee toro jeenteti uskeeli 'doo'di addan u Waakh soorriyoyyo ikabahcho mele. Us koloo kalday on issoobahche soorriyoti liikanokhanne uskeeli enenyet bihisso yitah.
58007028	I'di tahe amurre Muusa mejeli wihi laka'doono ka 'da'ddarane soobihissa, 'dee kuhaaniyyohi weyti wewween yateeh. I'daasenyi inkoo amurre Muusa timiy ka Waakh daato ka ayyinti husub gooche, weeliis soobahche kuhaanihi weyti weene wihi laka'doono tuum buuhicho jirtuu tuumman kayeele.
58008001	Ayti nah elanni talla, rumanka kuhaanihi weyti weene goobi Waakh ka komborti antoote Waakkhi Weyti Ween ankicheki miigeet ka meessi lakiinkaanyito fiddiyo a khabna.
58008002	Ulla hili kuhaanihi weene Meessi Lagan ka Waakh ikahila. Meessa la a eemati rummaate Waakh lakawahti, weeli enenyet menye, Kamuri Waakhe rubeytiis dise.
58008003	Kuhaanihi weyti ween tuumman hiliis a ki us siimo ichoow soorriyoyyo Waakh ibahcho. 'Deerka kuhaaniheenki weyti ween laka a imasse chirri us Waakh wohoo ibahcho.
58008004	Chirri kootte Kiriisto harrata kijiro, kuhaani ma yateeh gon. A mehe kuhaaniyyohi saggi amurre Muusa i'doontuu siimohi Waakh liibahcho bahcho a jiraan.
58008005	Meessi lagane icho hili Waakh kahaaggichaan a oosim ichoow iyookkoti wihi goobi Waakh kajiro. Jeentetane maanti Muusa eemati Waakh lakawahti disin leheet, Waakh itootooche, wihi us iyidah, “Tabe, wihi at haaggisso tuumman ichoow iyookkoti goorat hali Sinnaay sartiis ka an kituse a israaheen.”
58008006	I'daasenyi Yeesso hili ki kuhaaniyyoha weyti kussane lasiiche. A mehe ayyinti husube Waakh gooche us dahgele yahe, ayyinti oraate amurre Muusa keente weyti kussantahe. Waha la a jeenteti iche ayyinti weyti deefto iraahto.
58008007	A mehe chirri kootte ayyintaas oraate Waakh gooche eloo ikhabin ayyintoo addan ma layowti gon.
58008008	I'daasenyi Waakh rubeytiis maanti us i'da yidah, aacchinyeteen uskeele kaarge, “Ibeen a yamiit, iche Kamur essa, ibeenki an ayyintoo husub 'doo'di Issiraayel ichoow 'doo'di Yuuda igoocho.
58008009	Ayyintaas la i'di ti goorat an gooche mee. Maantaas an aacchinyeticho dahane sookhabde 'dee ili Miissiri kasoobahcha. I'di tahe icho ayyinteeytaas ma khucchinne, an la icho adah kakhabde, iche Kamur essa.
58008010	Inkoo ibeennetaas kutte ayyinteeyti husube an 'doo'di Issiraayel igoocho talla, iche Kamur essa. Amurreteey malichooda goya gessa, 'dee kamassaan, uurassicho goya kachiira, 'dee raahaan. An Waakkhichooda ateehe, icho la 'doo'daaya yateehiin.
58008011	Et kola ollokkiis walah abcho, ommos walaaliis, ‘Kamur abo,’ idowo mele. I'di tahe icho tuumman, ki ween ichoow ki nugul ba a igartaanee.
58008012	An la uskeelicho a ikakuta, suujoonkicho la jirtuu toro ma kasoo'helo.”
58008013	Chirri Waakh ayyinti us gooche, “ti husub” yadeeh, waha mehe tusaan ya ti goorat oraat a raagte gon. Taas la geeddoo nucchul on sohatta, massatta.
58009001	Ayyinti oraate Waakh gooche ka wahanyeyyohi la'doono Waakh lakawahti a jireene, toro la meessi lagane harratane Waakh lakawahti a jirte.
58009002	Eemati Waakhe ladise, meel lamma seley liigooche. Goonanki oraat la Meessi Lagan iche layadeeh. Meessa la reenki taa lakorcho ichoow kombortoo ballaaddane makaateyyohi kuhaaniyyo Waakh ibahcheen fuuleen, iche kijirte.
58009003	Dafarti yobbeenye eema seley goosso a jirte, goonanki lammaatteet mehe layadeeh ya, Meessi Weyti Lagan.
58009004	Inta la ga'daari 'dahabe uyuugge lakagubo ichoow saanduukhi ayyinti raagane Waakh gooche 'dahab kaankubanyahe iche kijire. Saanduukha la wihi kijire, a khulaankoo 'dahabe gololoo manna layadeeh kijiro, ichoow wul Haruunti seeb kasoobahe, ichoow dagahtoo lammeenye babballaaddane amurreti ayyinti Waakh gooche kachiirantahe.
58009005	Saanduukh sartiis la walah lamma lasoouume barbarre khabo saggi Waakh intaas ikajiro tusso, iche fuusse. Barbarreticho la inti Waakh enenyet uskeel ikakuto, iche ogoogte. I'daasenyi toolla wahanyeyyoha tuumman kaayyeedin ma nabuu'd.
58009006	Chirri waha dakkhan ka latannabte ka kuhaaniyyo eema goyaka goonanki oraate geleene, kol dakkhan hilichoki Waakh haaggicheen.
58009007	I'daasenyi goonanki goyaatteet kuhaanihi weyti ween kaldaye gele, ulla gu'h ka maantoo kaldaye gele. Ulla diiggi jeenteti uskeeliis ichoow uskeeli 'doo'di addan garawwaayyo ka yeele us bahcho, iche leegele.
58009008	Rubeyti Munyee la waha tuumman ka wihi iche mujjum inno abisso a mehe ya, jiti Meessi Weyti Lagan lakagelo, uliba ma lasoofurin geeddi eemati oraate harrata on tolosso.
58009009	Waha dakkhane ayyinti oraat miinsan wey'da mehe itoollaan ya, siimo ichoow naffi Waakh liisoorriyoocho, rubeyti etane uskeel ikacheekan dikhin ma yabuu'diin.
58009010	Ayyinti oraat wihi iche miinsantahe, a daawohi wihi layaham ichoow wihi ladamo ichoow enenyeti isdikho on. Wahanyeyyoha enenyet laka'doono la sarti kharaat kaldaye miinsanyahiin. Waha la a laraaha one ichoowka Waakh walah tuumman husubnaacha.
58009011	I'daasenyi Kiriisto kuhaanihi weyti weene, wihi haaggane jiroteen ka inno isoobabbaho a yitah. Ulla eemati goobi Waakhe weyti deefto saggi lii'doono liihaaggiche, iche gele. Eemata la ti enenyet dise menye, ommos ti harrati lasoouume mee.
58009012	Yeesso Kiriisto la koloo kalday on Meessi Weyti Lagan ikute. Ulla maanti us meessaas gele, diiggi waharoot ommos diiggi maaroot ma khaatine, Waakh ma ibihin. I'daasenyi us diiggiissa bahche, jirtuu tuumman inno ribe.
58009013	Ayyinti oraat ka, kuhaani diiggi waharoot ichoow ki heerassi looyyo lasoorriyooche ichoow bombeyi urhaassi looyyo lagube 'doo'di uskeel khabo kiirdifta. Daawohaas sartichooda dikhaane, 'dee bi'dir kabahchaan.
58009014	I'daasenyi Kiriisto miigti Rubeyti Waakhe jirtuu tuumman jirto ka soorriyoti mi'dabenye Waakh isibahcho yitah. Geeddoo meheenye 'deerka diig Kiriisto rubeyoheenki haag ichoow suujoon seley saaho uskeeli inno yeello omoot inno iwoyo kadikha, 'dee Waakkhi jiro ihilla.
58009015	Jeentetuu Kiriisto ayyinti husube Waakh gooche ka dahgele yitah. Omoottiis ka enenyet uskeeli maanti us ayyinti oraat raahe gele a kasoogate kasoofure. Eti tuummane Waakh wahe, ayyinti armaanjireene usu mu'dane Waakh igooche 'hela.
58009016	Maanti etoo yumuy, chirri saggi liidalho islakadaage, walah etoo kalday laka lasiicho mele sammata koloo saggi eti ladalho rumanka iyumuy liitusin.
58009017	A mehe isdaagintaas walah iche tahe mele, geeddi eti isdaagintaas leh on jiro. Hoola maanti etaas yumuy on ladalha.
58009018	Saggaas on u ayyinti oraate Waakh gooche ka laka, diiggi soorriyoyyoot laantiis walah lasookhabte mele.
58009019	Muusa wihi tuummane amurre Muusa goya lakeelo, iche enenyet tuumman icheeke. 'Deerka diiggi maaroot ichoow ki waharoot ba khaate, bicche kakhaye, khadaabi yuubane amurre Muusa kachiirantahe ichoow enenyet ba kiirdifte. Usu wahaas gumotoo tinti iiyyaate gu'duu'dan lakahide, iche kayeele.
58009020	Muusa la wihi us yidah, “Diigga a ki amuri Waakh ayyintiis ka gooche atin raahtaan miigoocho.”
58009021	Saggaas on u Muusa eemati Waakh lakawahti laleegugguuro, ichoow wahanyeyyohi Waakh lakawahti tuumman, diig kiirdifte.
58009022	Rumanka amurre Muusa ka la, walah buurticho diig on dikha. Sammata diig ikhuban la, Waakh enenyet uskeel ma ikakuto.
58009023	Waha inno kayeyyeene a iyookkoti wihi goobi Waakh kijiro gone, saggaase liidikha. I'daasenyi wihi goobi Waakh kijiro wihi dikho, a soorriyoyyohi wihi harrata kussan.
58009024	I'di tahe Kiriisto Meessi Lagane weeli enenyet haaggiche iyookkoti ti rummaate ma gelin. Usu goobi Waakh rubeytiissa gele. Ulla toolla Waakh ortiissa kajira, inno iyeyyeeda.
58009025	Toro la Kiriisto i'di kuhaanihi weyti weene yaafohi Ya'huud ma eheynan. Kuhaaniha gu'h ka, maalinki kaldaye us Meessi Weyti Lagan gelo, diiggi hoolaate leegela. I'daasenyi Kiriisto goobi Waakh saggaas ma igeline, 'dee kolassi ittaawe ma issoorriyoon.
58009026	Chirri kootte us i'daas yeele la, geeddi buurenye sina lakawaaricha, uus goorat harra lasoouume. I'daasenyi toolla inno jiro ibeenneticheti yomboot kijiro la, usu maantoo kalday on yimiyye, soorriyoti jirtuu liikanokhan yitahye, 'dee miigti uskeel jirtuu tuumman labahcha.
58009027	Wihi Waakh gooche a mehe ya, weeli enenyet tuumman ebba koloo on yamuute, 'dee Waakh hukkuma.
58009028	Saggaas on u Kiriisto laka koloo on lasoorriyooche, 'dee uskeeli 'doo'di buure bahcha. Ulla maanti lammaatteete us soonokhti, uskeeli us toro bahcho ma iyamiite, i'daasenyi 'doo'di usu weyti sugo iche yamiite, ribnaan ikeena.
58010001	Amurre Muusa a oosinti wihi haaggane soosohti one, wihi rummaat mee. Amurretaas ka soorriyoyyo a wihi gu'hi soomaro tuumman ka liinonnokhti lahaaggicho. I'daasenyi soorriyoyyoha 'doo'di Waakh kawahti 'doo'di eloo rucchul laka ikhabin ma kayeelaan.
58010002	Chirri soorriyoyyoha 'doo'di Waakh kawahti rumanka uskeelicho kadikhin yabuu'diin, soorriyoyyo tuumman a latoollicha gon. I'di tahe i'da ka 'doo'di Waakh kawahti koloo kalday on jirtuu tuumman ladikha, toro la rubeyohicho suujoonkicho ma kacheektaan.
58010003	I'daasenyi wihi rummaate jiro a mehe ya, soorriyoyyohi gu'hi soomaro tuumman lagelo, enenyet kol tuumman uskeelichooda on kasoo'helchaan.
58010004	I'di tahe diiggi heeraroot ichoow ki waharoot koloo kalday laka uskeel ma bahchaan.
58010005	Maantaka, maanti Kiriisto harrata yimiy, wihi us Waakh iyidah, “At soorriyo ichoow wihi lakisoobahche ma 'doonin, i'daasenyi at ani sar a iyeesse.
58010006	Hoolahi tuum chalag ka lakigube, ommos soorriyoyyohi jeenteti uskeeli enenyet liibahche laka, ma kaahamaadin.
58010007	'Deerka Kiriisto wihi us yidah, ‘Okkhoow, an kalla, wihi imiinsane khadaabi yuuban kachiiran, an a imiyye wihi at 'doonto yeela.’ ”
58010008	Kiriisto 'hor Waakh wihi us iyidah, “At hoolahi lakisoorriyooche ichoow siimohi lakisoobahche ichoow hoolahi tuum chalag ka lakigube, ommos soorriyoyyohi jeenteti uskeeli enenyet liibahche, ma 'doonine ommos ma kahamaadin.” Ulla chirri soorriyoyyoha amurre Muusa 'doonto laka, i'daas on yidah.
58010009	'Deerka wihi us yidah, “Okkhoow, an kallaaye, wihi at 'doonto iche yeela.” Waakh soorriyoyyohi oraate bahcha, too Kiriisto meessicho gessa.
58010010	Waakh i'daas a yeele gone, sar Yeesso Kiriistoti lasoorriyooche ka a inno munyaache. Kiriisto la koloo kalday on jirtuu tuumman issoorriyooche.
58010011	Kuhaaniyyo ebba maan dakkhan chalag ortiis ka hiliissa haaggicha, soorriyoyyohaas koloo kalday laka uskeel ibihin babbahchaan.
58010012	I'daasenyi kuhaaniha koloo kalday on issoobahche, soorriyoti uskeel bihisso, jirtuu tuumman liikanokhan yitahye, Waakh anki dahantiisti miigeet orronte.
58010013	Ulla toolla intaase chiiytiisti tuum Waakh dahanohiis soogesso kasuga.
58010014	A mehe soorriyotaas kaldaye us issoobahche on ka, 'doo'di lamunyaacho 'doo'di jirtuu eloo rucchul laka ikhabine kayeele.
58010015	Rubeyti Munyee laka Yeedi Waakh ka ayta a cheekta, wihi iche kolooraat elatti,
58010016	“Kamur wihi us essi kallaayo, waha a ayyinti husube an berri 'doo'deey igoocho, amurreteey uurassicho goya gessa, toro la malicho goya kachiira.”
58010017	Wihi addane iche kakhayte, “Uskeelicho ichoow hugun'darriticho jirtuu tuumman ma kasoo'helo.”
58010018	Maanti Waakh enenyet uskeel ikakute la, soorriyoyyohi uskeel bahcho kola ma la'doono gon.
58010019	Maantaka 'doo'd Kiriistokaaw, diig Yeesso ka, antohi inno roorro laan goobi Waakh ka Meessi Weyti Lagan kagello a khabna.
58010020	Meessa la jiti husube jiro keeno Kiriisto dafartaas us tabe ka inno ifure, iche kagella. Dafartaas la a sartiissa.
58010021	Kuhaanihi weyti weene minki Waakh itoollo la a khabna gone,
58010022	mali fissan ichoow kakhuufnaanki inno Waakh kakhuufno uurlammaal ikhabin ka, Waakh idowwaanni gi'de. A mehe rubeyoheenki suujoon inno kacheekti diig Kiriisto ka a ladikhe, sarteen la a i'doo bicchehi warraakhe lakadikhe.
58010023	Khajjeeli inno cheekno mujjum khabno gi'de, a mehe Waakkhi waha ayyiche a eti lakakhuufo.
58010024	Saggi inno uur isimiigoonno, 'dee 'doonin isikhabno, haag la isiyeello kamalanni gi'de.
58010025	Uus inno kulanki inno kulanno 'diin, i'di 'doo'doo yeeluu. I'daasenyi tabno uur a ismiigoonno, toro Ibeenki Kamur soonokhti a soodowwaatee gone, weyti i'daas yeello gi'de.
58010026	Chirri inno inkoo inno rum abanne dib on u toro uskeel yeello, soorriyotoo addane uskeel inno kabihisso ma jirto.
58010027	I'daasenyi wihi jiro, a hukkunki Waakh 'doo'd hukkumo soosohti, inno roorro ka sugno, ichoow 'dabi weyti bolkho chiiyti Waakh 'dabbaacho kalday on.
58010028	Goorat eti tuummane amurre Muusa raahin 'dii'de, chirri et lamma ommos et seyyahe gartiis laabte, uur ma liinugleesti, chirraas on layagiis.
58010029	Eheet a, eti Weeli Waakh daddabho la mehe imale? Eti diiggi ayyinti Waakh gooche enenyet munyaacho wohoo bi'dire ikhaato mehe imale? Toro la eti Rubeyti Munyeenye haaggi Waakhe buure inno siisso abaare mehe imale? Sinati eta imasse Waakh igoocho, buur ka geeddoo meheenye kakhayanta?
58010030	A mehe saggi Kamur rubeytiis waha iyidah a garanna, “Ani aal gudda, ani toro mog gudda.” Toro la wihi addane liidah, “Kamure 'doo'diis hukkuma.”
58010031	A roorroti weyti buure chirri Waakkhi rumanka jiro inno khabte.
58010032	Bal saggi atin dowwanohi atin Yeesso Kiriisto rummeysatteen ijirteen kasoo'hela. Sinati buurenye atin tuhuyye, i'daasenyi atin a garrahsatteen one, yombo ma inokhan.
58010033	Kolossoo 'dowhi nyiikhsan on ka atin laleeabaarrama, toro sina atin lakawaaricha. Kolossoo laka 'doo'di addane sina lakawaaricho goya atin lagata.
58010034	I'di tahe 'doo'di jeelayyo kajiro a inahteen. Chirri wihi atin khabtaan tuumman atin lasare laka, atin hamaad on khabteen, jeenteti atin wihi deefo yombuu imassanne Waakh ayyiche ikhabtaan igarattaan u.
58010035	Maantaka jiti atin roorro laan Waakh kakhuuftaan a'diinna. Saggi jeentetaas u kala'ddi buure atin liiguto kasoo'hela.
58010036	Wihi toolla atin laka'doono a garrahsi, 'dee cha'atin wihi Waakh 'doono yeesseen ka, wihi us ayyiche 'hessaan.
58010037	A mehe dowwanoha ka, “Eti yamiit a yamiite ma malmalo la.
58010038	I'daasenyi eteeyki fissan ani ikakhuufa, kakhuufnaankaas ka jira. Eti adah ikakhabti, ma kahamaado.”
58010039	I'daasenyi inno 'doo'di Waakh adah kakhabti labaabiicho goya ma kijirro, 'doo'di Waakh kakhuufo, Waakh ribo goya kijirra.
58011001	'Doo'di Waakh kakhuufo saggi wihi icho ikhajjeelaan isooyateehiine tissibaane, toro la wihi toolla liiargine ubaan.
58011002	I'di tahe kakhuufnaanki 'doo'di goorat archiiy Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche Waakh saggi us icho ikahamaade icheeke.
58011003	Jeenteti inno Waakh ikakhuufno, iche saggi us yeedi afiis on ka us harra isoouume igaranna. Wihi toolla indo lakaargo la, wihi indo liikaargine lakasoouume.
58011004	Aabel kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche soorriyoti too Kaayin kussan Waakh ibahche. Jeenteti kakhuufnaankaas u, Waakh saggi usu eti fissan iyahe cheeke, soorriyotiis la kahamaade. Aabel Waakh a kakhuufe gone, chu'us toolla ijirin laka, usu a i'doo us uliba inno leeyyeedo on.
58011005	Eenog la kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe on ka ma umaatan. Noolyahaayi Waakh rubeytiis goobi Waakh geeche, Eenog lawaaye. I'di tahe geeddi liikhaatin, saggi us eti rumanka Waakh kahamaadicho iyahe iche lacheeke.
58011006	Et Waakh ikakhuufine Waakh kahamaadicho mele. I'di tahe eti Waakh wahan 'doono tuumman, wihi laka'doono a usuhi saggi Waakh rumanka ijiro, toro us 'doo'di usu yowti kala'd iguto, rummeesti.
58011007	Noowa la kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche maanti Waakh tootooche, wihi maalinkaas liiargin icheeke, koobanhi buure dise, goobiis ribe. Kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe ka, 'doo'di harrata uskeel igooche. Toro la Waakh usu eti fissanoonki kakhuufnaanki Waakh lakakhuufo lakeelo mu'dan iekkaache.
58011008	Aburaaham la kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche maanti Waakh iloo berri alaal ka siicho irte. Ulla chirri us ili us isohti igaran laka, ayti Waakh a raahe iliis kaguure.
58011009	Kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche ili Waakh iayyiche ka i'di eti yeelan u ili yeelan ifiddiye. Ulla i'di Isakh ichoow Yaakoobuu eemayyo igele. Icho laka ayyinti Waakh usu igooche a dalhaan.
58011010	Aburaaham la saggaase ifiddiye. Waha la a jeenteti us ilkerengeetti weene daddaabohi ilaat sarche kadisane, jirtuu dakkhan jirto Waakh rubeytiis rerreege toro dise, ikhajjeelo.
58011011	Aburaaham la kakhuufnaanki usu Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche miigti usu araarri goyaka weeloo ka'helo 'hele, chirri us araarrowe Saara la mahante laka. I'di tahe us Waakkhi ayyiche eti lakakhuufo iekkaache.
58011012	Kholoyyohi ittaawe 'deerka makhaabala atteka yumuy iche kayimaateen. Nyaakhuti kholoyyoha ittaaw ka a geeddi yiyyihimohi saraate toro i'di yoohti beyti buure afiche kijirtuu ekkees ma layabuu'd.
58011013	'Doo'da dakkhan la Waakh kakhuufaayi tuume. Icho la wihi Waakh iayyiche ma 'heline, toro la fogaka wihi 'dee berri sooyateeh argeene, kahamaadeen. Saggi icho harrata ka chiiy ichoow 'doo'di yeelan iyahiin 'dow ka a cheekeen.
58011014	'Doo'di i'daas essi, saggi us ili 'dee kiise iyowti, iche tusa.
58011015	Chirri icho ili goorat icho kasootabeen kamasseen la, a geeddi kootte icho inokhtaan.
58011016	I'daasenyi ili weyti deefo imoonaan. Waha la a goobi Waakh. Maantaka Waakh chirri us a Waakkhichooda liidah us ma kuuryaawo, a mehe usu 'doo'da ilkerengeet a idise.
58011017	Aburaaham la kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche maanti Waakh kaje, inankiiski Isakh layadeeh Waakh soorriyo ikabihin leheet. Aburaaham ayyinti Waakh igooche khaatte, inankiiski kaldaye keleyenye us khabe, Waakh isoorriyin leheet.
58011018	Chirri Waakh goorat Aburaaham, “Isakhe nyaakhuti ittaawe ka'hessa,” iyidah laka,
58011019	Aburaaham saggi Waakh Isakh omoot ka isookahcho iche kamasse. Aburaaham ka la a i'doo inankiis omoot ka liisoolaabe.
58011020	Isakh la kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche yeeletiisti lammee Yaakoobo ichoow Essaawo ba wihi berri sooyateeh ikaweeste.
58011021	Yaakoobo la kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche chirra us sooyamuut yeele Yuussuf kooba iweeste. Toro la wussiis katirriinsataayi, Waakh wahte.
58011022	Yuussuf la kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche chirra us sooyamuut saggi yaafohi Issiraayel berri ili Miissiri ikaguuraane, icho ilicho ikanokhtaan cheeke. Amur bahche lafohiis i'di layadeeh icheeke.
58011023	'Doo'di Muusá dele, kakhuufnaanki icho Waakh kakhuufeen on ka iche roorro laan amuri karnat bahche, nyaakhuti lallabe yaafohi Ibiraaniya tuummane labakkicho miinsan raahin 'dii'deen. Muusa uus desse, hay seyyah dakkhan dagcheen. I'di tahe Muusa weeli joon lehe eheet.
58011024	Muusa la kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche maanti us weynaate, usuhi weeli inanti karnati ili Miissiri lakawaho 'dii'de.
58011025	Ulla usuhi jiroti uskeel keeno geeddoo rucchul on lakahamaado fiddiyo ka, usuhi isbahcho, sinati 'doo'di Waakh taham, usu laka taham gooche.
58011026	Usu ka la lakhaanyoti us jeente Kiriisto i'helo leedeefta, kamurroonki us ili Miissiri ka'helo ka. I'di tahe usu kala'ddi buurenye berri Waakh guto, iche rerreege.
58011027	Muusa la kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche ili Miissiri kabahe, holi karnat hollowe la ma karoorin. Ulla i'doo us Waakkhi liiargin iarge u, yombohi us inokhti 'dii'de.
58011028	Ulla kakhuufnaanki us Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche 'doo'd saggi daawti Baasakka liigelo, toro la diig kho'doommeti min afafhiise lakachiiro idowdowe. I'da ka la herti Waakhe omoot teyyano tuumman ikeento, teyyanohi yaafohi Issiraayel ma bakkin.
58011029	Yaafohi Issiraayel la kakhuufnaanki icho Waakh kakhuufeen on ka, iche Beyti Buurenye Guu'ddan seley igoote, harrati kafafsan itabeene, imaaheen. I'daasenyi iskarti 'doo'di Miissiri chirra icho yaafohi Issiraayel raaheen ka, chirraas on bicche khaateen.
58011030	Yaafohi Issiraayel la kakhuufnaanki icho Waakh kakhuufeen on ka, iche maanti icho ibeen teeba ilkerengeetti Yeeriko kamareen, daddaabohi ilkerengeet kamarsan tuumman isoorerreyeen.
58011031	Raahabti malaayee la kakhuufnaanki iche Waakh kakhuufte on ka, iche 'doo'di Waakh daagin 'dii'de liileeigaasawwaaye. I'di tahe iche 'doo'di Issiraayele 'degey irte, nebey ka a martiisatte.
58011032	'Deerka 'doo'doo addane wawwaha, bal mehe addane idaahe? I'di tahe Giidiyon ichoow Baarag ichoow Saamison ichoow Yeeftah ichoow Dawuud ichoow Saamuwel ichoow 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo tuumman, chir an jiroticho kaayyeedo mele.
58011033	Kakhuufnaanki 'doo'da Waakh kakhuufe on ka, iche yaafohi chiiytichee idiheene, isooricheen. Jiti fissan on enenyet kahukkumeene, wihi goorat Waakh iayyiche la 'heleen. Gaasichokoo afi bahassi a 'duu'deene,
58011034	gaasoo laka 'dabi buure jiccheene, gaasoo laka 'doo'di birlabbe ka ogoos marmo kabahsateen. Icho a 'da'ddarneete, i'daasenyi miigoween. Toro la iskarti diho ka mimmiigenye chiiyo firdisso yitaaheen.
58011035	Deyyeho gaasoo 'doo'di hiiyyicheenye tuume omoot lakasookahche, 'heleen. 'Doo'd gaasoo bolokkhi buurenye latuse toro furnaanki lasoofuro 'dii'de, 'dee maanti omoot lakasookahcho ka jirotoo deefto 'helaan.
58011036	Gaasoo laka a lakachaarte, laajjayyo ka lajahe, gaasoo laka biingoyyo lakahide, jeelayyo lakachibe.
58011037	Gaasoo dagah ka labakkiche, gaasoo seley laaggooche, gaasoo la birlabbe ka labakkiche. Gaasoo la uktohi adi gaad kayeesseene, gessateen. Icho la rumanka miskiinki marahe eheneete, sinati buure laka lakawaariche, toro la wihi suuje layeele.
58011038	'Doo'da weyti haagganeete harrata ma imalin. Icho la i'di 'doo'di meel laa u, hidaad ichoow kuro kaassohteene, toro la go'dda'd ichoow lumam igeleen.
58011039	'Doo'da tuumman jeenteti icho Waakh weyti ikakhuufeen u, saggi Waakh icho ikahamaade a lacheeke. I'daasenyi icho wihi Waakh iayyiche, ma 'helin.
58011040	I'di tahe Waakh mali inno iroone gooche. I'daas ka la laanteen Waakh ortiis ka 'doo'di el laa ma yateehiin.
58012001	Maantaka urura buurenye garti saggi icho Waakh ikakhuufaan laabo a inno kamarsanyahe gone, taba, wihi tuummane inno jeycho ichoow uskeeli inno woyo tuumman rogno, toro la oriisihi Waakh orteen gesse ka, a garrahsanni.
58012002	Taba, kol tuumman Yeesso a kamalanni gi'de. Usú orey inno woye, Waakh kakhuufne, toro uliba laka inno woya, Waakh tuum kakhuufna. Ulla jeenteti hamaadi sugo u, lakhaanyoti eti massalaaba lakakaaho taham a igarrahsate. Ulla toolla goobi Waakh ka komborti Waakhe antoot ankicheki miigeete fiddiya.
58012003	Bal saggi us 'doo'di uskeel khabe usu weyti 'dii'ddan us ikagarrahsate kamalda. I'da yeela 'dee akurmina, toro la rubey iiche atin jebin.
58012004	I'di tahe atin uskeeli atin hol leedowtaan ka, uliba ma tirrimine ichoowka geeddi atin lakabakkicho ma eleelin.
58012005	Atin la wihi Waakh i'di nyaakhutiis u atin iyidahye uur atin miigoocho, a kadabteen, “Nyaakhutaaw, sooholinti Kamur atin soohosso nabah isuda, toro la geedda us atin khuncho uus rubeye atin jebin.
58012006	I'di tahe Kamur eti us 'doono tuumman a soohossa, toro la i'di weeliis u, sirbi gessa.”
58012007	Chirri sina atin lakawaaricho, garrahsada on. I'di tahe Waakh sinataas ka a atin soohossa, saggi ooyo weeliis isoohossuu. Weeli ooyo isooholin a jira?
58012008	Rumanka Waakh nyaakhutiis tuumman a soohossa. Chirri us i'di nyaakhutiis u us atin isooholin, wahaas mehe tusaan ya, atin nyaakhutiis mee gone, atin a i'di eysing'alaj.
58012009	Ooyenyeteenti inno desse inno sooholisso, a inkaanyinna gone, geeddoo meheenye sooholinti Aabbaheenki saraat inno soohosso raahna, 'dee jirtuu tuumman jirra?
58012010	Ooyenyeteen geeddoo icho ka imasse, iche inno sooholissa. I'daasenyi sooholinti Waakh inno soohosso, a wihi inno imale, 'dee inno laka munyatiis leegisanno.
58012011	Sooholin enenyet lasoohosso chirraas wohoo lakahamaado lakoogyahe mele, a bolokh on. I'daasenyi yomboka eti tuummane lasoohosse, gurnaanki us delo a wihi fissan ichoow nebey.
58012012	Maantaka, dahanohiinki 'hare ichoow luhlohiinki harmo miigoocha.
58012013	“Luhlohiin jiti fissan iyeela.” 'Dee jirotiin ka ma tarrantarrattaane, ma kuftaane, i'daasenyi a miigowtaan.
58012014	Hol dowa 'dee weeli enenyet tuumman nebey kaleefiddiya, toro la 'doo'di munyee ateeha. I'di tahe eti tuummane munya ieheynan, jirtuu Kamur ma argo.
58012015	Taba aw isikhaba, uus 'dee etiinkoo kalday laka haaggi Waakhe buurenye us atin tuste waayine. Uus etiinkoo kalday laka i'di hiiyyi hadaado khabo soobaho sina keeno, toro enenyet suujaacho itaahan.
58012016	Uus etiinkoo kalday laka soho'ddarri kaassohanne, ommos i'di Essaawohi Waakh inkaanyitiwwaaye itaahan. Ulla jeenteti gololi koloo kalday on ka, antohiiski teyyannoon ororiche.
58012017	Ulla yomboka i'di atin igarattaan u, maanti us weysi aabbahiis 'doone, aabbahiis usu a 'dii'de. Chi' Essaawo weysi iooye laka, sag us maliis iurgiyicho mele.
58012018	Atin la i'di yaafohi Issiraayel mee, a mehe atin hali Sinnaaye la'daaro, 'dab kabolkho, ichoow mug'dihi reebe ichoow rug,
58012019	ichoow hooyi arabi laafuufo ichoow hooyi Waakkhi yeyyeedo ma isoodowwaan. Inkoo 'doo'daas hooyi Waakkhi yeyyeedo daage ka, Waakh hawwaasteene, ichohi toro yeedoo addan daago ma 'doonin.
58012020	Amuri Waakh bahche icho daagin i'doonin la kalla, “Chirri weeli enenyet ommos wohoo nafe laka hala 'daareen, dagah a lakaseyo, a layigaase.”
58012021	Wihi 'doo'd halaas ka arge, weyti bur'doocheene, ichoowka Muusa wihi us yidah, “An weyti roorro khaba ichoowka harma.”
58012022	I'daasenyi atin Hali Saayone isoodowwaatteen. Waha la a ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme goobi Waakh kijirto, a ilkerengeetti Waakkhi jiro. Waha la a inti herti Waakhe eluffe goosso, hamaad ka kulante.
58012023	Toro la urur Kiriistoki i'di teyyanohi Waakhenye isoodowwaatteen. Waha la a 'doo'di magahenyeticho goobi Waakh ka lachiire. Atin la Waakkhi 'doo'd hukkumo ichoow rubeyohi 'doo'di fiffissane el laa lakayeele, iche isoodowwaatteen.
58012024	Toro la Yeessohi dahgeleenye ayyinti husube Waakh gooche keene, iche isoodowwaatteen. Diiggiis a liirdifte, 'dee Waakh enenyet uskeel ikakuta. Diigga i'di diig Aabelki eti aal guto yowti mee.
58012025	Taba gi'de Waakkhi yeeda atin idowo a'dii'dina. A mehe chirri goorat yaafohi Issiraayel Muusahi harrata ka leeyyeede yeediis 'dii'deene iche ibahsawwaaytuu, inno laka sag inno i'daaru laka ibahsanni mele chirri inno eti goobi Waakh kasooyyeedo adah kakhabanne.
58012026	Maantaas goorat hooyi Waakh harra a sesseehiche, i'daasenyi toolla wihi us ayyiche us yidah, “Koloo kalday toro harra kalday on menye, sereyta daayan laka a korkokicha.”
58012027	Yeeda, “Koloo kalday toro,” essi saggi wihi Waakh haaggiche harrata kijiro liikorkokicho, liibahcho, 'dee wihi jirtuu tuumman jiro kaldach on isoo'hadaane tusa.
