66002006	I'daasenyi wohoo an atin kakoolicho a waha, atin wihi 'doo'd Nikolaawo yeelo a 'dii'ddantahiin. Ani laka waha a 'dii'ddanahe.
66002007	Eti dogo khabo wihi Rubeyti Waakh ururre Kiriisto idowto a daago gi'de. Eti tuummane sooricho la, ohonti us gurnaanki geeyi jiro lakeelo bahcho, gosi Waakh goya katoollo kayaham a mu'danyahe.
66002008	“Herti Waakhe keleyenye urur Kiriistoki Simiriina itolosso waha ichiir. Waha a farniinki ki Oreyenye toro la Salaahime, ki yumuyye toro omoot kasookahe.
66002009	Sinati atin loomhicho ichoow miskiinkiin a garda. I'daasenyi atin a kamurre! Saggi 'doo'doo Ya'huud isyadeehe toro la Ya'huud ieheynan suujoonki nool atin ikadowo a garda, i'daasenyi icho a minki weysiite Ya'huude Seytaan dakhti.
66002010	Sinayyohi dowwanoha ka atin lasoomhicho akaroorina. Wihi an atin icheeko, Seytaan gaasiinkoo jeela kachiba a atin kajaa. Sinayyoha la ibeen tomon on atin yamhiin. Chi' omoot atin liigooche laka, ani on ikakhuufa ani la 'duubi jiroti jirtuu imassan a atin siichaa.
66002011	Eti dogo khabo, wihi Rubeyti Waakh ururre Kiriisto idowto a daago gi'de. Eti tuummane sooricho la, omootti lammaatteet i'daaru laka ma gaameerto.
66002012	“Herti Waakhe keleyenye urur Kiriistoki Bergamum itolosso waha ichiir. Waha a farniinki ki birlabi af leh khabo.
66002013	Inti atin fiddiitaan a garda, a inti Seytaan kombortiisti antoot kakhabo. I'daasenyi atin uliba rum ka a ikhucchissaan. Maanti eteeyki lakakhuufo Antiiba layadeeh ilkerengeettiinti ween ka inti Seytaan fiddiyo lakayigis laka, atin saggi atin ikakhuuftaan ma 'dii'din. Usu rum ka garteey a laabe.
66002014	I'daasenyi wahanyeyyohoo rucchul a atin kakhaba. Atin intaas ka 'doo'doo wihi Baalam enenyet abche raaho a khabtaan. Baalam usu Baalak saggi 'doo'di Issiraayel liitarraantarricho abche, 'dee 'doo'di Issiraayel gololi iyookkoyyohi waakkhakh lakayeessi liisoorriyooche yahame toro soho'ddarri liisoojiita.
66002015	I'daasu atin laka 'doo'di wihi Nikolaawo 'doo'd abcho raaho a khabtaan.
66002016	Maantaka uskeel kasoonokhda. Chi'iche i'daas ieheynan, a amiite birlabi afeey kasoobaho ka 'doo'daas diha.
66002017	Eti dogo khabo, wihi Rubeyti Waakh ururre Kiriisto idowto a daago gi'de. Eti tuummane sooricho la, gololoo Waakh kayamiite dagsane manna layadeehe siicha. Toro la daakkoo dakhane magahoo husub kachiiranyahe, eti 'helo kalday on garti, iche siicha.
66002018	“Herti Waakhe keleyenye urur Kiriistoki 'Diyaa'dira itolosso waha ichiir. Waha a farniinki Weeli Waakh kayamiit. Indohiis a i'di 'dabi weyti bolkho, luhlohiis la i'di birtoo boorane lasiguu a bildiikhaan.
66002019	Wihi atin yeessaan ichoow 'dooninti atin is'doontaan ichoow kakhuufnaanki atin Waakh kakhuuftaan ichoow saggi atin isihissaan ichoow garrahsihiin a garda. Toro la saggi atin toolla wihi goorat atin yeesseen rumanka 'dirihicho iyeessaan a garda.
66002020	I'daasenyi wihi an atin kakhabo kallaayo, atin aranta Yeesebel layadeehe eti Waákh íyeyyeedo istadeeh a isisoo'diissaan. Wihi iche abisso ka falfayyoheey jite bujissa, 'dee 'doo'di isidisan isleeur'da toro gololi iyookkoyyohi waakkhakh lakayeessi liisoorriyooche yamhiin.
66002021	An iche geeddi deer a 'diiche 'dee soho'ddarritiche a kasoonokhatti, i'daasenyi ma 'doonto.
66002022	Maantaka an makhaabassa sina omhicha. 'Doo'di uskeeli makhaabassi tiis ieheynan leeur'do iche leegelo la, sammata icho uskeeli icho leeyeelaan ikasoonokhan, sinati buurenye omhicha.
66002023	'Doo'di iche raaho a bakkicha, 'dee urur Kiriisto tuumman saggi an uur ichoow mali weeli enenyet ifiiricho rumanka abta. Ebba wihi us yeelo ichoow wihi an guto a israahaan.
66002024	Atinhi addane ilkerengeetti 'Diyaa'dira kajirtaane, wihi iche enenyet abisso iraahine, toro la wahanyeyyohi dagsane Seytaan iaban, hulees addane an atin korcho mele.
66002025	I'daasenyi wihi atin khucchissaan kalday jurkhicha ichoowka a soonokhdi.
66002026	Eti tuummane sooricho ichoowka 'dubicho eleelo wihi an 'doono yeelo, an antohi us yaafo tuumman kawoyo a siicha,
66002027	saggaas an Aabbaheey anto ika'heluu. ‘Usu icho wussi ga'daar ka a dakhta, i'di 'dirihi laajjebchuu, yaafohaas a jejjebcha.’
66002028	Ani la usu bakkaali baryo laka a siicha.
66002029	Eti dogo khabo, wihi Rubeyti Waakh ururre Kiriisto idowto, a daago gi'de.
66003001	“Herti Waakhe keleyenye urur Kiriistoki Sardi itolosso waha ichiir. Ki rubeyohi Waakhe teebee khuccho toro la bakkaalleti teebee khuccho farniinkiis a kan. Wihi atin yeessaan a garda. 'Doo'd kol atin jiro khabtaane koogyahe, i'daasenyi atin a tuunteen.
66003002	Omoot kasookaha! Geedda marahe atin kasoo'hadde sootamuut miigoocha. I'di tahe wihi an arge, Waakkheey ortiis ka wihi atin yeesseen ma buuhaan.
66003003	Maantaka wihi goorat atin laabche toro atin daagteen kasoo'hela raaha, uskeeliin la kasoonokhda. I'daasenyi cha'atin ineybaan, i'di eti hatto leh u, doglaan on atin soogela, saha'ddi an amiit la ma garattaan.
66003004	I'daasenyi Sardi ka 'doo'doo rucchule uskeel iskasoohosse a khabtaan. 'Doo'da gaaddi daddakhane gessata ileesohta, a mehe waha a wihi icho imale.
66003005	Eti tuummane sooricho la, i'daasu gaaddi dakhane sar lakorcha. Ani magahiis buuggi magahenyeti 'doo'di jiroti jirtuu imassan khabo, kachiiranyahe goya ma kabahcho. Ani Aabbaheey ichoow herti Waakh orcho ka saggi us eteey iyahe a cheeka.
66003006	Eti dogo khabo, wihi Rubeyti Waakh ururre Kiriisto idowto a daago gi'de.
66003007	“Herti Waakhe keleyenye urur Kiriistoki Filadeelfiya itolosso waha ichiir. Waha a farniinki ki munyeenye toro rum leh. A usuhi furoti antoote too karnati Dawuude khuccho. Wihi us furo et hidin yabuu'd mele, wihi us hido la et furin yabuu'd mele.
66003008	Wihi atin haaggisaan tuumman a garda. Yeya ani ortiin ka afaf a atin ifure, etoo kalday laka ma hido. Saggi atin miigtoo rucchul on ikhabtaan a garda, i'daasenyi atin yeedeey a raahteene, toro la magaheey ma 'dii'din.
66003009	Idagansada! 'Doo'di minki weysiite Seytaan dakhti a 'doo'di Ya'huud essi, i'daasenyi 'doo'di Ya'huud ieheynane been goocho a jira. An 'doo'daas a sookhaata, ortiin ka jilbo il kagu'ddaane, toro la saggi an atin i'doono abtaan.
66003010	Atin amureey a raahteene garrahsatteen gone, maanti sinayyohi khar kayamiit 'doo'di harra yaal tuumman isoobahaane 'dee kajaan, an a atin toorriba.
66003011	An dowwa soonokhda. Wihi atin khabtaan jurkhicha, uus etoo kalday laka 'duubiinki kala'deet atin kakhaatine.
66003012	Eti tuummane sooricho la minki buurenye Waakkheey ka tirrinki dagaheete kayeela, ulla jirtuu tuumman intaas ma kakaho. Ani la magah Waakkheey ichoow magah ilkerengeetti weene Waakkhaaya usu kachiira. Ilkerengeettaas la a ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme husube Waakkheey goobiis kasooyagcho. Toro la magaheeyki husub laka usu kachiira.
66003013	Eti dogo khabo wihi Rubeyti Waakh ururre Kiriisto idowto a daago gi'de.
66003014	“Herti Waakhe keleyenye urur Kiriistoki Lawodeechiya itolosso waha ichiir. Ki farniinka sooergo, a ki Aamiin layadeeh. A ki lakakhuufo, garti runti Waakh laabo. A uumacchoti wihi Waakh soouume tuumman.
66003015	Wihi atin yeessaan tuumman a garda. Wihi atin yeessaan ka atin kuleel menye toro la khobo mee. Incheenka atin a khobo ommos a kuleel.
66003016	Maantaka atin a tangiigo, kuleel menye khobo la mee gone, afeey ka a atin sootufa.
66003017	Atin, ‘Nah a kamurre, hoolahi buurenye khabna, walah nah kaankhan mele!’ elattaan. I'daasenyi atin waha ma kasin, atin rumanka a marahtahiine, a 'doo'di liisonaho, a miskiine, a 'doo'di indo laa, a murukh.
66003018	Wihi an atin kawaanicho 'dahabi 'dab ka lagube ki rummaat yitah ikagadda, 'dee kamurrowa. Gaaddi daddakhane atin gessattaan laka ikagadda, 'dee a atin loogoogo lakhaanyoti murukkhiin uus lasoobakkaahin. Ildawahi atin indo kawelweelattaane atin mujjum il agartaan laka ikagadda.
66003019	'Doo'di an 'doono a leejaakha toro sirbi gessa. 'Deerka taba uurassiin tuumman ka ichoow walah tuumman ka tuum uskeel kasoonokhda.
66003020	An kalla! Ani min khariissa toolla, atin waha. Chi' etoo hooyeey daage, min isoogesse, an a soogela, lammateenyo isleegolossanna.
66003021	Eti tuummane sooricho, antohi ullaka komborteeyti antoot ikaleeorronti siicha, saggaas ani laka isooriche komborti antoot Aabbaheey ikaleeorronduu.
66003022	Eti dogo khabo wihi Rubeyti Waakh ururre Kiriisto idowto a daago gi'de.”
66004001	Waha 'dubicho ka toro fooltabchotoo afafhi goobi Waakhe furan arge. Hooyi kootte saggi arabi laafuufo iyeedo an daage toro ileeyeede, wihi us iyidah, “Inta saraat amiite, wihi Waakh gooche inkoo waha kuteen sooyateeh a kituso.”
66004002	Chirraas on Rubeyti Waakh iwoyte, orteey ka wihi jire a kombortoo antoote goobi Waakh ka etoo kafiddiyo.
66004003	Ki intaas fiddiyo la mehe iyoogyahe ya, banayhoo dagahtoo gato miigenye ulhaw ichoow too guu'ddan. Moosi Waakh i'di daakkoo ulhawe weyti bildiikhuu, komborti antoote kamarsanyahe.
66004004	Toro kombortaas antoot komborohoo addane antoote tomon lamma ichoow affarenye, tooba la ewweenkoo kafiddiyo iche kamarsan. Ewweenka la gaaddi daddakhan ichoow 'duubi 'dahab lakahaaggiche iche matahenye kakhaba.
66004005	Kombortaas antoot la ankhad ichoow boroo'd ichoow karkaraho kasoobahe. Kombortaas orche ka la oor teeba 'dab kabolkho jirta. Oorassa la a rubeyohi Waakhe teebee.
66004006	Wihi addane komborta orche kijiro, a wohoo beytoo buurenye kiyoowe gato miige iyooge warraakhe. Ukkur ka, wihi komborti antoot kamarsan a wahanyeyyohoo affarenye lasoouume rubey khabo sar orche ichoow 'dubiche indo buuhaan.
66004007	Wihi oraate lasoouume rubey khabo a i'di bahassi, wihi lammaatteet la a i'di heere, wihi seyyahnaatteet la fooli enenyete khabaane, wihi affarnaatteet la a i'di gabaddi serey katari'd.
66004008	Wahanyeyyoha affarenye lasoouume rubey khabo, kooba barbar lihe khaba. Indo la sar tuumman ichoow barbarre iliche ka laka a kakhabaan. Icho la maalim ichoow ibeen ba koloo kalday laka ma nasaane, Waakh on saa'daane, wihi icho essaan, “Kamuri Waakhenye Miig Tuumman Leh, at a munya, at a munya, at a munya! At a Waakkhi goorat tuumman jire, toolla jiro, jirtuu tuumman la soojiro.”
66004009	Chirbaaw wahanyeyyoha affarenye lasoouume rubey khabo Waakkhi jirtuu tuumman jiro komborti antoot kafiddiyo saa'daane, inkaanyit tusaane, toro la kala'd ilaabaan,
66004010	ewweenki tomon lamma ichoow affare Waakh ortiis ka jilbo il kagu'dda, Waakkhi jirtuu tuumman jiro wahtaan. 'Duubassicho komborti antoot orche yassilliine, wihi icho dowtaan,
66004011	“Kamuraanyaaw ichoow Waakkhaanyaaw, saa'do ichoow inkaanyit ichoow miigti at 'hesso a kimaleen. A mehe ati on walah tuumman soouunte, 'doonintaah ka walah tuumman a soouunte, toro la walah tuumman jiro a khabaan.”
66005001	Wihi kasookhuccho an arge a eti komborti antoot kafiddiyo dahantiisti miigeeet ka khadaaboo yuubane amam lammacho chiirane meel teeba hanja lakadagche khabo.
66005002	Toro hertoo Waakhe miigenye hooyi buure ka riirte arge. Wihi iche tidah, “Ayyo mu'dane hanja bukkhicha, 'dee khadaaba yuuban fura?”
66005003	I'daasenyi et mu'dane serey kijiro ommos harra sarche kijiro ommos harra iliche kajiro khadaaba furin yabuu'de ommos goya laka yeyin yabuu'd mele.
66005004	Jeenteti etoo kaldaye mu'dane khadaaba furo ommos goya yeyo lii'helin u, an weyti ooye.
66005005	'Deerka ewweenkaas kichekoo wihi us ani iyidah, “Ooyin! Yey, ki Bahassihi yaaf Yuuda layadeehe, Hiiy karnati Dawuud layadeehe, walah dakkhan a sooriche. Usu mu'dane hanjayyohaas teebee bukkhicha, khadaabaas furin yabuu'd.”
66005006	'Deerka komborti Waakhe antoot orche ka Heleenki wahanyeyyohi affarenye lasoouume rubey khabo ichoow ewweenki tomon lamma ichoow affare ba khaaricheen arge. Heleenka ki lasoorriyooche iyoogyahe. Ulla gaas teeba ichoow il teeba khaba. Indoha teebee la, a rubeyohi Waakhe teebeenye harra tuumman liierge.
66005007	Ulla yimiyye, khadaabi dahanti miigeete eti komborti antoot kafiddiyo kakhaate.
66005008	Chu'us khaate ka, wahanyeyyohi affarenye lasoouume rubey khabo ichoow ewweenki tomon lamma ichoow affare ba Heleem ortiis ka il gu'ddeen. Kooba la reenkoo 'haab layadeehe chirri geeyo ladowo lagu'ddo ichoow baakhuuli 'dahabe uyuuggi lagubo kajiro iche khaba. Uyuugga la weysihi 'doo'di Waakhe itoolla.
66005009	Icho la geeyoo husub doween, “Ati mu'dane khadaabaas khaatta, hanjayyohaas bukkhissa. I'di tahe goorat a lakisoorriyooche, diiggaah ka la weeli enenyete yaafo tuummane ichoow afaf tuummane ichoow filal tuummane ichoow ilal tuummamba Waakh a igatte.
66005010	At la icho karnato ichoow kuhaaniyyohi usu harra leedakhti toro la Waakkhi Aabbaheene ihilo kayeesse, icho la berri harra a dakhtaan.”
66005011	An la yeye, hooyi herti Waakhe ittaaw ka ekkees liiubaa'dan daage. Herta Waakhe ittaawe la komborti antoot ichoow wihi lasoouume rubey khabo affare ichoow ewweenki tomon lamma ichoow affare khaarisse.
66005012	Herta Waakhe ittaawe la hooyi buure ka wihi iche dowatti, “Heleenki goorat lasoorriyooche, miig ichoow kamurroon ichoow khara ichoow anto ichoow inkaanyit ichoow saa'do 'helin a mu'dayyahe.”
66005013	'Deerka wihi lasoouume serey kajiro ichoow wihi harra sarche kijiro ichoow wihi harra iliche kajiro ichoow wihi beyohi burbuure goya kijiro tuumman la ichohi waha dowti daage, “Waakkheenki komborti antoot kafiddiyo ichoow Heleem ba, a lasaa'do, a liinkaanyito, a laweynaacho, miig ticho a titaahe jirtuu tuummamba.”
66005014	Wahanyeyyohi affarenye lasoouume rubey khabo la, “Aamiin,” yidaaheene, ewweenki tomon lamma ichoow affare la il gu'dde Waakh ichoow Heleem ba wahte.
66006001	Geedda an fiiricho, Heleem hanjati oraate khadaabi yuuban kadagsan bukkhiche. 'Deerka wahanyeyyohi lasoouume rubey khabo affare kichokoo, usuhi hooyi i'di ki guugahe ka, “Kaale!” iyidah daage.
66006002	Ani yeye, orteey ka fara'doo dakhan arge. Eti fara'd fuulo la bihine khuccha, toro 'duubi antoote lasiiche. Ulla i'di eti chiiytiis soorichuu, bahe 'dee chiiytiis sooricha.
66006003	Chirri Heleem hanjati lammaatteet bukkhiche ka, wihi lasoouume rubey khabo, ki lammaatteet usuhi, “Kaale!” iyidah daage.
66006004	'Deerka fara'doo addane guu'ddane i'di 'dabe soobahe. Waakh eti fuulo antohi us nebeyti harra kabaabiicho toro enenyet isbakkicho siiche. Birlaboo buure laka siiche.
66006005	Chirri Heleem hanjati seyyahnaatteet bukkhiche ka, wihi lasoouume rubey khabo, ki seyyahnaatteet usuhi “Kaale,” iyidah daage. An yeye, orteey ka fara'doo daayiti khaalkhee arge. Eti fuulo la rottole dahan kakhuccha.
66006006	Hooyoo i'di ki enenyete la wihi rubey khabo affare dahcho kasooyeede daage, wihi us yidah, “Chilimmeti eti orrahtoo hil haaggiche laguto kiilotoo 'dargaayye on bahta. Kiilo seyyah nyumumma laka chilimmeti eti orrahtoo hil haaggiche laguto on bahta. Subakki geeyi oolif ichoow farsoti sabiib la akheeroon.”
66006007	Chirri Heleem hanjati affarnaatteet bukkhiche ka, an wihi rubey khabo affare, ki affarnaatteet usuhi, “Kaale,” yidah daage.
66006008	An yeye, orteey ka fara'doo ulah dakhan arge. Eti fulo magahiis, Omoot iche layadeehe, 'dubiis la meessi omooteete sooraahta. Waakh antohi icho enenyeti harra kijiro et affar goyaka koo yagiisiin siiche. Antohaas ka la 'doo'di harra kijiro diho ka ichoow nabhayye ka ichoow sugeerre ka ichoow binahi yibaat ka a bakkicha.
66006009	Chirri Heleem hanjati channaatteet bukkhiche ka, koondihi ga'daar iliis ka rubeyohi 'doo'di jeenteti us Yeedi Waakh ichoow runti Yeesso miinsan icheeko liibakkiche arge.
66006010	Hooyi buure ka riireene, wihi icho yidaaheen, “Kamuri Miig Tuumman Leh, at a rume toro a munya. Ichoowka maantoh malmassa 'doo'di harra kijiro hukkunta, 'doo'di goorat diiggeenyo khube aal kagutatta?”
66006011	Kooba 'deerka kabuu'doo dakhan lasiiche, i'daaru nasa ichoowka tiri ilbooyyeti wahalhicheenye toro Kiriisto rummeysatte i'dichuu lasoobakkicho a labuuhicho liidah.
66006012	Ani Heleem usuhi hanjati lihnaatteet bukkhiche 'dey'dooche. Harra weyti sesseehte. Orrahe urgiite i'di sakkaassi kolleyteet u daayatte, yeyyah tuumman urgiye gu'duu'ddi diig bahche.
66006013	Yiyyihimohi serey kijiro la i'di khoonati hafar sesseehiche sookhubatti u, harra kasoodiddiheen.
66006014	Sereyta daayan i'di khadaabi layuubuu jibbaadnante, baabaate. Halal tuumman ichoow kurohi bey goya kijiro laka meessicho lakabahche.
66006015	'Deerka karnatohi harrata ichoow 'doo'di harra anti ichoow 'doo'di iskar iwewween ichoow kamurre ichoow 'doo'di wewween ichoow bow'dayyo tuumman ichoow 'doo'di furan tuumman go'dda'd ichoow daddaabohi halal kijiro iskadagche.
66006016	'Doo'da la halal ichoow daddaabo kariireene wihi icho iyidaaheen, “Nah kasooreya, fooli eti komborti antoot kafiddiyo ichoow holi Heleem nah kadagcha.
66006017	A mehe ibeenki weene Waakh ichoow Heleem enenyet holicho tustaan a yitahye, ayyo 'deerka bahsata?”
66007001	Waha 'dubicho ka, herti Waakhe affarenye harra 'dollohiche affarcho tolosso arge. Herta Waakh la hafarreti affarenye harra iche harrati angagan ichoow beyohi burbuure ichoow wihi geeye kajeyissa.
66007002	Hertoo Waakhe addan ichehi beri kasookorto arge. Iche la reenki 'doo'di Waakkhi jiro lakasunto khabta. Herta Waakh la herti Waakhe affarenye harra 'dollohiche tolosso Waakh antohi iche harra ichoow beyohi burbuure weyti kagaameerto siiche hooyi buure ka kariirte, wihi iche icho itidah,
66007003	“Harra ommos beyohi burbuure ommos geeyo agaameerina, ichoowka falfayyohi Waakh tuumman sumatti Waakh miin a gelinno.”
66007004	Ani la tiri 'doo'di sumat lagesse a daage, a et alif kudoo ichoow alif tomon affar ichoow alif affarenye yaafohi Issiraayel tuumman kayimiy.
66007005	Saggi yaafohi Issiraayel sumat liigesse a i'da. Yaaf Yuuda a et alif tomon ichoow alif lamma, yaaf Ruuben a et alif tomon ichoow alif lamma, yaaf Gaad a et alif tomon ichoow alif lamma,
66007006	yaaf Aacha a et alif tomon ichoow alif lamma, yaaf Naftaali a et alif tomon ichoow alif lamma, yaaf Manaasseh a et alif tomon ichoow alif lamma,
66007007	yaaf Siimiyon a et alif tomon ichoow alif lamma, yaaf Laawi et alif tomon ichoow alif lamma, yaaf Issakhar a et alif tomon ichoow alif lamma,
66007008	yaaf Seebulon a et alif tomon ichoow alif lamma, yaaf Yuussuf a et alif tomon ichoow alif lamma, yaaf Beenjameen la a et alif tomon ichoow alif lamma.
66007009	Waha 'dubicho ka an yeye, orteey ka ururi weyti buurenye ekkees liiubaa'dane ilal tuumman ichoow yaafo tuumman ichoow 'doo'di fil tuummane ichoow afaf tuumman kayimiyye komborti Waakhe antoot ichoow Heleem ortiis ba toollo arge. Icho la kabuu'ddeti daddakhane gessateene toro la seytohi geeyi baare dahanohicho ka khucchaan.
66007010	Icho la hooyi buure ka riireene, wihi icho yidaaheen, “Waakkheenki komborti antoot kafiddiyo ichoow Heleem, ribnaanki inno laribo icho on leh.”
66007011	Herti Waakh tuumman komborti Waakhe antoot ichoow ewweenki tomon lamma ichoow affare ichoow wahanyeyyohi affarenye lasoouume rubey khabo khaaricheene, tolossateen. Komborti Waakhe antoot orche ka il gu'ddeene, Waakh wahteene,
66007012	wihi icho yidaaheen, “Aamiin! Saa'do ichoow weynaan ichoow khara ichoow kala'd ichoow inkaanyit ichoow miig ichoow anto Waakkheenki jirtuu tuumman jiro a mu'danyahe. Aamiin!”
66007013	'Deerka ewweenkaas kichokoo wihi us iworsate, “'Doo'da kabuu'ddeta khabo a ayyo illeh? Toro la intoh kayimaateen?”
66007014	Wihi an ilaabe, “Eti ween, ati a garatta.” Ulla wihi us isoolaabe, “Waha a 'doo'di sinati buure goya kasoobahe, a 'doo'di kabuu'ddeticho diiggi Heleem lakadikhe, ladakhnaache.
66007015	Maantaka, “icho komborti Waakhe antoote ortiis toollaane, maalim ichoow ibeen minkiiski buure ka usu ihilaan. Waakkhi kombor kafiddiyo la eematiis ka icho a ogooga.
66007016	Icho jirtuu toro ma ankayaane, jirtuu toro ma subgaataan. Orrah ommos kuleeli uskul, sarticho ma gubo.
66007017	A mehe Heleenki komborti antoot kafiddiyo ersinkichooda yateehe, ulla issi bicchehi jiro laka'helo icho iwoya. Waakh la ilmohicho tuumman indohicho a kahiyyaaya.”
66008001	Chirri Heleem hanjati teebannaatteet bukkhiche ka, goobi Waakh ka saha'd nyuusiche riirit ladaage mele.
66008002	Ani la herti Waakhe teebeenye Waakh ortiis tolosso arge, icho la arab teeba lasiiche.
66008003	Hertoo Waakhe addane khulaankoo 'dahabe uyuugge lakagubo khabto timiyye, koondihi ga'daare 'dahab hagga tolossatte. Uyuuggeti buurenye lasiiche, iche la uyuuggeta weysiha 'doo'di Waakhe koondihi ga'daare 'dahabe komborti Waakhe antoot ortiis kajirto kakhayta Waakh ibihissa.
66008004	Uunki uyuugge ichoow weysihi 'doo'di Waakh dahanti hertaas Waakh ka Waakh ortiis ka serey isleeirteen.
66008005	'Deerka hertaas Waakh jilho koondihi ga'daar kakhaatte, khulaam buuhisse, harra isaate. Karkaraho ichoow boroo'd ichoow ankhad la soobaheene, toro harra laka sesseehte.
66008006	'Deerka herti Waakhe teebeenye arabti teebee khabto tannabatte arabtichooda afuuftaa.
66008007	Herti Waakhe oraat arabiche afuufte, dagahti baraafo ichoow 'dabi diig kawarsanyahe harra kasookhubteen. Harra goonan seyyah ka goonankoo 'dab massiche. Geeyo goonan seyyah goyaka goonankoo 'dab massiche, hoosi ulhaw tuumman laka 'dab massiche.
66008008	Herti Waakhe lammaatteet arabiche afuufte. Wohoo buurenye 'dab yahame i'di haloo buure la beyti buure goya kadiheen. Beye goonan seyyah goyaka, goonankoo diig yitahye,
66008009	binahi bey goya kijiro rubey khabo goonan seyyah goyaka goonankoo 'debbeeste, koobano goonan seyyah goyaka goonankoo bar latire.
66008010	Herti Waakhe seyyahnaatteet arabiche afuufte, bakkaaloo buurenye 'dab kabolkho la serey kasoodihe hawohi 'dulo ichoow indohi biccheet goya kadihe, goonan seyyah goyaka goonankoo goya kadihe.
66008011	Bakkaala la magahiis Birrakh iche layadeeh. Bicche goonan seyyah goyaka goonankoo birrakhnoweene, 'doo'di ittaawe la bakkate jeenteti bicchehuu.
66008012	Herti Waakhe affarnaatteet arabiche afuufte. Orrah ichoow yeyyah ichoow yiyyihimo goonan seyyah goyaka goonankoo gu'ddeene, jeentetaas u goonan seyyah goyaka goonankichokoo mug'di yitah. Maalim goonan seyyah goyaka goonankoo banay ma khabo, ibeen goonan seyyah goyaka laka goonankoo banay ma khabo.
66008013	An 'dey'doochaayi, gabaddi serey katari'de hooyi buure ka riirto daage. Iche la wihi iche elatti, “Uuwwiy! Uuwwiy! Sinati weeli enenyete harra kijiro isoosohatti eenna a buure, jeenteti hooyi arabi herti Waakhe addane seyyahe dowwanoha ka isooafuuftuu!”
66009001	Herti Waakhe channaatteet arabiche afuufte, anna bakkaaloo sereyta daayan ka harra kasoodihe arge. Waakh la bakkaalaas furoti afafhi ankhari dahane ieleelin siiche.
66009002	Chirri us afafhi ankhari dahane ieleelin fure ka, uunkoo i'di ki 'dabi weyti buurenye labolkicheenye weyti daayan ankhar goya kasoobahe. Uunka ankhara kasoobahe orrah ichoow hafar mug'di kayeele.
66009003	Gubaalle la uunkaas goya kasoobahte, harra isootabte. Waakh gubaalleta miigti i'di ti arraarohi harreenye siiche.
66009004	Geeyi harra ommos hoos laka agaameerina liidah. I'daasenyi eti tuummane sumatti Waakh miin ikakhabin sina kawaaricha iche liidah.
66009005	Miigti icho weeli enenyet kayagiisiin ma lasiinne, i'daasenyi miigti icho hay chan weeli enenyet kabolkhichaane lasiiche. Bolokkhicho a i'di bolokkhi arraar.
66009006	Maanassaas weeli enenyet omoot a yowta i'daasenyi ma yamuut, omoot a imoona i'daasenyi omoote icho a kafiridda.
66009007	Gubaalleta fara'ddi diho liitannabiche iyoogtahe. Matahenyeticho ka wohoo 'duubassi 'dahab iyooge khabaane, toro la foolassicho fooli enenyete iyoogyahiin.
66009008	Tinticho a i'di tinti deyyeho, ilkohicho la a i'di ilkohi bahassi.
66009009	Kachassicho ka wohoo i'di birti lahageetenye kach lagessati iyooge khabaane, hooyi barbarreticho la i'di riiriti garrunyeti ittaawenye fara'de diho ijiitto iyeedda.
66009010	'Dubassicho la a i'di 'dubassi arraare enenyet khaniino, 'dubassicho goyaka la miigti icho enenyet hay chan tuumman bolokh katusaane khabaan.
66009011	Karnaticho la a herti keleyenye ankhari dahane ieleelin anatti. Magahiche la afi Ibiraaniya ka Abadoon, iche layadeeh. Afi Giriig ka la, Abooliyon, iche layadeeh. Magahenyeta a mehe ya Kheeroocha.
66009012	Sinati oraat a kutte, sina lamma addan a sooyomboossa.
66009013	'Deerka herti Waakhe lihnaatteet arabiche afuufte, ani la gaasohi affarenye koondihi ga'daare 'dahab katoollo Waakh ortiis kijirto ka, hooyoo yeedo daage.
66009014	Hooya la herti Waakhe lihnaatteete arab khabto leeyeede, wihi us iyidah, “Herti Waakhe affarenye hawti buurenye 'dusso Yuufereet layadeeh ka hidan soofur.”
66009015	Herta Waakhe affarenye hili iche gu'haas ichoow haytaas ichoow maalinkaas ichoow saha'ddaas gesso liitannabiche la la'diiche, 'dee weeli enenyet goonan seyyah goyaka goonankoo tagiis.
66009016	An tiri iskarti fara'd fuusso a daage, iche la et ekkees yabuu'd mele, a miiliyon kud lamma.
66009017	An fooltabcho ka fará'd ichoow 'doo'di fará'd fuulo arge. 'Doo'd ga'daarretoo gugguu'ddane i'di 'dabe ichoow too daydaayan ichoow too derleyyeenye kach kakhaba. Matahenyeti fara'deet la matahenyeti bahassi iyoogyahiine, 'dab ichoow uum ichoow jimbihilo la afassichooda kasoobahaan.
66009018	Sinayyohaas seyyahcho, 'daba ichoow uunka ichoow jimbihiloha afi fara'de kasoobaheene, 'doo'di harra kijiro goonan seyyah goyaka goonankoo yigaaseen.
66009019	Fara'dda miigticho aficho ichoow 'dubassichooda kijiraan. A mehe 'dubassicho a i'di toofassi matahenyeti enenyet bolokh tusso khabto.
66009020	Weeli enenyete soo'hade sinayyoha ibakkin la uskeelicho ma kasoonokhan ba. Uliba ginnayyo ichoow iyookkoyyohi icho Waakh kayeessaan on wahtaan. Iyookkoyyoha 'dahab ichoow lahaag ichoow birtoo booran ichoow dagahe lakahaaggiche. Iyookkoyyoha la, indo ma khabaane, dogo ma khabaane, ma sohtaan la.
66009021	Toro la 'doo'd ogoossi dubunuunu lagelo ommos moroyyohi liirti ommos 'doo'di isidisanne isleeur'do ommos hatto ma kasoonokhan.
66010001	Toro hertoo addane Waakhe miige ichehi goobi Waakh kasookhubatti arge. Iche la mirisoo dakhane kaankubane matakkiche la moose kamarsan. Fooliche la i'di orraheet u a ababa, luhlohiche la a i'di tirrimmeti 'dabi buure.
66010002	Herta Waakh la khadaaboo rucchule yuubane furane dahan kakhabta. 'Da'ddabicheki miigeet beytoo buure katoollisse, 'da'ddabicheki gurro la harrati angagan katoollisse.
66010003	Iche la hooyi buurenye i'di ki bahassee bihisse. Chi'iche riirte ka, guugah kol teeba yeedeen.
66010004	Chirraas guugah kol teeba yeedeen ani la wahanyeyyohaas chiirin leheet. I'daasenyi hooyi goobi Waakh ka ileeyyeedo daage, “Wihi guugakkaas teebee yidaaheen achiirine dagi,” iyidah.
66010005	'Deerka hertaas Waakhe an arge bey ichoow harrati angagan katolosso dahanticheti miigeet goobi Waakh iokkhisse.
66010006	Magahi Waakkhi jirtuu tuumman jiro, sereyta daayan ichoow harra ichoow bey ichoow wihi tuummane goya kijiro soouume kadaatatte, mehe tidah ya, “Waakh kola wihi goorat us yeelin gooche ka ma malmalo.
66010007	Maanti herti Waakhe teebannaatteet arab sooafuufto, wihi dagsane Waakh isoobabbakkaahin, saggi us 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo falfayyohiise icheeke on u, Waakh a buuhicha.”
66010008	'Deerka hooyi kootte an goobi Waakh ka daage toro ileeyeede, wihi us yidah, “Nyaame, khadaabaas yuubane furane dahanti Hertaas Waakhe bey ichoow harrati angagan katolosso kajiro kakhaat.”
66010009	Anna 'deerka irde, hertaas Waakh khadaabaas rucchule yuuban daahe, iche la wihi iche itidah, “Khadaab khaate, aham. Khadaab af ka i'di malab u a chinni, i'daasenyi uur goyaka birrakhe yateeh.”
66010010	Anna khadaabi rucchule yuuban dahanti herti Waakh kakhaate uhum. Khadaab la af ka i'di malab u a chinni. I'daasenyi inkoo an khorkhiche ka, uur goyaka birrakhnowe.
66010011	'Deerka wihi ani liidah, “Nyaam toro wori Waakhe 'doo'di fil ittaawe ichoow ilassi ittaawe ichoow afassi ittaawe ichoow karnatohi ittaawe miinsan cheek.”
66011001	Wussoo i'di reenkoo walah lakarerreegee liisiiche, wihi liidah, “Nyaame, minki Waakhe buure ichoow koondihi ga'daar rerreege, 'doo'di intaakka Waakh wahti laka ekkaay.
66011002	I'daasenyi uranti minki Waakhe buure khariis tuumman geeddiis arerreegin. I'di tahe ani intaas 'doo'di Waakh igaranne siiche. Icho la hay tomon affar ichoow hay lamma tuumman, ilkerengeetti weene lagan a yabtaan.
66011003	Ani la 'doo'deeyki lammeenye garti runteey laabo miig a siicha, icho la maan alifoo ichoow kud lamma ichoow lih Waákhe íyeyyeedaan. Icho la inga'daa'diyyo gessataan.”
66011004	'Doo'da lammeenye runti Waakh babbakkaahicho a i'di geeyohi lammeenye oolif ichoow reemassi lammeenye taa lakorcho Kamuri harra tuumman dakhti ortiis toollo.
66011005	Chi' etoo icho gaameerin 'doono, 'dab 'doo'da lammatiis afichooda kasoobaha, chiiyticho bakkicha. Eti tuummane icho gaameerin 'doono saggane liiyagiis.
66011006	'Doo'da la miigti icho geedda icho Waakh iyeyyeedaan sereyta daayan kahidaane 'dee hir i'deyin a khabaan. Icho la toro miigti icho bicche diig kayeelaan a khabaane, miigti icho 'doo'di harra sinayyohi yeerare ikeenaan la a khabaan. Waha la maanti icho 'doonaan tuumman a yeelaan.
66011007	Inkoo icho farniinki Waakh cheekeene icho massicheen, binahi keleyenye ankhari dahane ieleelin kasoobaho 'doo'da lammee a diha, sooricha, bakkicha.
66011008	Sarticho la jiti ilkerengeetti weene Yeerusaleeme goorat Kamuricho laka massalaaba lakakaahe iche jiifta. Ilkerengeettaas wihi Waakh miinsan ka ilkerengeetti Soodom ichoow ili Miissiri liiokkanaache.
66011009	Maan seyyah ichoow nyuus 'doo'di fil tuummane ichoow yaafo tuumman ichoow afaf tuumman ichoow ilal tuumman kayimiy la sarti 'doo'dane 'dey'doocha, ichohi il liilaabo 'dii'daan.
66011010	Weeli enenyete harra kijiro tuumman la omootti 'doo'da lammee weyti kahamaada, siimohi icho isiergaan ka sukuuku bahchaan. I'di tahe 'doo'da lammeenye Waákh íyeyyeedo 'doo'di harra kijiro tuumman weyti bolokh ikeene.
66011011	I'daasenyi inkoo ibeenneta seyyah ichoow nyuuse kuteen ka, Waakh 'doo'da lammee neebsihi jiro kaafuufe, icho la sootolossateene, eti tuummane icho arge la weyti nahe.
66011012	'Doo'da lammee 'deerka hooyoo buurenye goobi Waakh ka icho leeyyeedo, “Inta saraat amiita,” idowo daage. Icho la chiiyticho 'dey'doossaayi, mirisoo ka goobi Waakh ikoreen.
66011013	Saha'ddaas on harra weyti sesseehte, ilkerengeettaas ween goonan tomon goyaka goonankoo bar waaye. Harrataas sesseehte ka 'doo'di elif teebee tuume, ki soo'hade la weyti nahe, Waakkhi goobi Waakh ka harra dakhti koolicheen.
66011014	Sinati lammaatteet a kutte, sinati seyyahnaatteet la dowwanoha ka a tamiit.
66011015	Herti Waakhe teebannaatteet arabiche afuufte, hooyassi buure la goobi Waakh ka sooyeedeene, wihi icho yidaaheen, “Dakhi harra, dakh Kamureen ichoow koo Lasubhehiissa yitaaheen. Ulla jirtuu tuummane harra dakhta.”
66011016	Ewweenki tomon lamma ichoow affarenye Waakh ortiis ka komborohichoki antoot kafiddiyo la, jilbo il kagu'dde Waakh wahte,
66011017	wihi us yidah, “Kamuri Waakhenye Miig Tuumman Leh, ki toolla jiro goorat tuumman jire, jeenteti at miigtaahti buure ikhaatte, enenyet dakkhan isookhabattuu kala'de kisoolaabna.
66011018	Yaafohi Waakh igaran a holloweene, holaah la a yimiy. Ibeenki at 'doo'di tuume hukkunto, at 'doo'di falfayyohaahenye kiyeyyeedo, ichoow 'doo'di Waakh ichoow eti tuummane kaarooro, ki ween ichoow ki rucchul ba at kala'd gutto a yitah. Toro la ibeenki at 'doo'di harra ka enenyet bakkicho baabiisso a yitah.”
66011019	'Deerka minki Waakhe buurenye goobi Waakh kijiro lafure, saanduukhi ayyinti Waakh gooche tuso, minki Waakhe buure goya kajiro laarge. Ankhad il gu'ddeene, boroo'd ichoow karkaraho yeedeene, harra sesseehte, dagahti baraafo laka weyti serey kasookhubatte.
66012001	Girmohoo buure sereyta daayan kasoobaheen. Makhaabassoo orrahe kaankubantahe soobahte. Iche la yeyyahe katolossa, 'duubi bakkaal tomon ichoow lamma khabo la matah kakhabta.
66012002	Iche huleese eheete, jeenteti iche ichiissuu bolokh ka ooyte.
66012003	'Deerka girmohoo addan sereyta daayan ka soobaheen. Waha la a khorojebsihoo buurenye guu'ddane, matah teeba ichoow gaas tomon khabo, matah ba la 'duuboo khabo.
66012004	'Dubiis ka, yiyyihimohi saraat goonan seyyah goyaka goonankoo soojiite, harra isookhube. Khorojebsiha weeli makhaabassi kootte soodesso orche tolossate, 'dee weel uus dessi yaham.
66012005	Inankoo desse. Inanka lab la usu dowwanoha ka yaafo tuumman wussi ga'daar kadakhta. Inanka la uus desse on Waakh ichoow kombortiisti antoot liitogte.
66012006	Makhaabale hidaad ka inti goorat Waakh iyeele ifiridde, 'dee herti Waakh ibeen alifoo kud lamma ichoow ibeen tomon lih goollissa.
66012007	Goobi Waakh ka la diho a jirte. Herti Waakhe weene Miikayel layadeeh ichoow herticheti Waakhe addan khorojebsi isjaheen. Khorojebsi ichoow hertiis diho geleen.
66012008	I'daasenyi khorojebsi ichoow hertiis ba lasooriche. Goobi Waakh ka meessicho waayeen.
66012009	Khorojebsiha buure il liisooseye, ulla a ki goorat archiiy jire, magahiis la ki 'doo'd hanti ommos Seytaan iche layadeeh. Usu 'doo'di harra tuummane jit buucha. Ulla hertiis khabaayi harra liisooseye.
66012010	An 'deerka hooyoo buure goobi Waakh ka daage, wihi us yidah, “Toolla ribnaan ichoow miig ichoow dakhi Waakkheen, ichoow anto Lasubhehiis a yimaateen. I'di tahe ki 'doo'deenki Kiriisto rummeeste cheekti, ibeen ichoow maalim ba Waakh ortiis ka cheekti goobi Waakh a lakasooseye.
66012011	'Doo'd Kiriisto diiggi Heleem ka ichoow wori rummaate icho cheekeen ka Seytaan a sooricheen. Toro la chirri icho layagiis laka, icho omoot ma karoorin.
66012012	Maantaka, goobassi Waakh ichoow atinhi kajirtaan ba, weyti hamaada! I'daasenyi atinhi harra ommos bey goya taalliin, sinati atin sugto eenna a buure! I'di tahe Seytaan a atin isookhubte. Ulla holi buurenye khaba, a mehe us saggi ibeennetiis igaabatte a garta.”
66012013	Khorojebsi inkoo us saggi harra liikasoolug'de kase ka, makhaabassi kootte inankoo desse kaloo'de.
66012014	Makhaabál barbarretoo lammeenye gabadeet lasiiche, 'dee serey ka inti hidaad ka liiyeele, gu'h seyyah ichoow hay lih lakagoollicho, khorojebsi la ikasooeleelin inyaanta.
66012015	Khorojebsi 'deerka bicchehi buurenye 'dulo 'dee makhaabál haro af kasoobahche, 'dubiche gate.
66012016	I'daasenyi harra makhaabál gargaarte, aficheki furname ka bicchehaas khorojebsi af kasoobahche khorkhisse.
66012017	Khorojebsi 'deerka makhaabál ihollowe, nyaakhuticheki addan diho kiirte. Waha la a 'doo'di amurreti Waakh raaho, toro la runti Yeesso soobabbakkaahiche kakhuufo.
66013001	Khorojebsi la bey afiche tolossate. Anna binahoo bey goya kasoobaho arge. Binaha matah teeba ichoow gaas tomon iche khabaan. Gaas ba la 'duube fuula. Matah ba la magahoo Waakh igafo kachiiran.
66013002	Binaha an arge kabbile iyoogyahiine, i'daasenyi luhlo a i'di luhlohi binahoo weyti buurenye goffanneti derdeer khabo, af la a i'di afi bahassi. Khorojebsi miigtiis ichoow kombortiis ichoow antohiis binahane siiche.
66013003	Binaha matakkoo ka, jiissi omoot keento khabaane, i'daasenyi jiissa omoot keento a samaatte. 'Doo'di harra kijiro tuumman la girmeeste binaha raahe.
66013004	Jeenteti khorojebsi anto binaha isiichuu, weeli enenyet tuumman khorojebsi wahte. Toro binaha laka wahteene, wihi icho worsateen, “Etoo maanta i'di binahee jiraayi? Ayyo kan diho kiiran yabuu'd?”
66013005	Binahaas afi icho keeylajaane toro icho Waakh ikagafo lasiiche. Binaha la hay tomon affar ichoow hay lamma anto lasiiche.
66013006	Binahaas la geeddi nool Waakhe igafaane toro magahi Waakh ichoow fiddiitoti Waakh ichoow 'doo'di tuummane goobi Waakh kijiro abaara.
66013007	Binahaas la miigti us 'doo'di Waakh kadihaane toro icho kasoorichaan a lasiiche. Binaha la toro antohi us yaafo tuumman ichoow 'doo'di fil tuummane ichoow afaf tuumman ichoow ilal tuumman kadakhti laka lasiiche.
66013008	Weeli enenyete harra kijiro tuumman, ki tuummane magahenyeticho buuggi 'doo'di jiroti jirtuu imassan 'helo geeddi harra liisoouumin liikachiirin binahane wahta. Buugga la eti leh a Heleenki goorat layigis.
66013009	Eti dogo khabo a daago.
66013010	Eti tuummane boolinnaan liigooche a labooliya. Eti tuummane birlab ka omoot liigooche, birlabe lakayagiis. Wihi 'doo'd Kiriisto laka'doono a ichohi garrahsati, Waakh kakhuufo.
66013011	Toro binahoo addane harra goya kasoobahe arge. Binaha i'di heleenkoo u, gaas lamma khabaane, i'daasenyi hooyi i'di ki khorojebseenye kayeede.
66013012	Binahi lammaatteet binahi oraat orcho ka antohiis tuumman walah kadakhte. Binaha lammaatteet la weeli enenyete harra kijiro tuummane ihosse, binahi oraate jiissi omoot keento lasamaache khabe wahtaan.
66013013	Binaha lammaatteet la wihi buurenye miigti buure tuso haaggiche, weeli enenyet tuumman argaayi 'daboo laka serey kakeene, harra isooyagche.
66013014	Binahi lammaatteet jeenteti binahi oraat orcho ka miigti us girmo kayeelo liisiichuu, 'doo'di harra kijiro ekkeeste. Weeli enenyet amur ibahche 'dee iyookkotoo binahi oraate birlab ka lajiisooche uliba jiro lakiinkaanyito a haaggicho.
66013015	Waakh binaha lammaatteet miigti us iyookkota binahi oraat iyoog neebsi kaafuufo us jiro siicho siiche, 'dee iché iyeyyeedin tabuu'de, toro la 'doo'di iyookko wahan 'dii'do labakkicha.
66013016	Ulla weeli enenyet tuumman laka ihosse, ki ween ichoow ki rucchul, ki kamure ichoow ki miskiine, ki bow'dee ichoow ki bow'da ieheynan ba, 'dee dahanohichoki miigeet ka ommos miinassicho ka sumat a lagesso.
66013017	I'da ka et walah gatti ommos walah ororicho mele sammata us sumatta ikhabin. Sumattaas la a magahi binahi oraate, ommos a sumatti ayti magahiis itolosso.
66013018	Ayta khara 'doonta. Chi' etoo khara yahe, ayti sumatti binahaas a ekkaacho. A mehe magahi weeli enenyete itolossa. Sumatti aytiis, a kud lih ichoow tomon lih ichoow lih.
66014001	An 'deerka yeye, Heleem orteey ka Hali Saayone fuula. 'Doo'di alif kudoo, alif tomon affar ichoow alif affare usuhi Heleem leejiro laka arge. Waha a 'doo'di magahi Heleem ichoow magah Aabbahiis ba miinassicho kachiiranyahiin.
66014002	Hooyoo buurenye i'di riiriti hawti 'dusseenye ommos i'di karkaraheenye goobi Waakh kasooyeede daage. Hooya a i'di 'doo'di reemassichoki chi' geeyo ladowo lagu'ddo 'haab layadeeh yeedicho.
66014003	'Doo'da la komborti antoote Waakh ortiis ichoow wahanyeyyohi affarenye lasoouume rubey khabo orticho ka ichoow ewweenki tomon lamma ichoow affare orcho ka geeyoo husub doween. Geeya 'doo'di alif kudoo ichoow alif tomon affar ichoow alif affarenye Waakh harrata ka soogatte on aban yabuu'de, et addane aban yabuu'd mele.
66014004	Waha a 'doo'di isibi'dirroonne deyyeho ileeur'din, a mehe icho mi'dabe iskayeeleen. Icho la Heleem meelbaaw us irti a raahaan. Waakh icho 'doo'di harrata goyaka a soogatte, toro i'di gurnaanki oraat u, Waakh ichoow Heleeme ibahche.
66014005	Icho la injire been ma goonne, wohoo rucchul laka ma lakacheekan.
66014006	'Deerka hertoo Waakhe addane serey katari'd arge. Iche la Wori Haaggane jirtuu imassanne khabte, 'dee weeli enenyete harra kijiro, ilal tuumman ichoow yaafo tuumman ichoow afaf tuumman ichoow fil tuummane icheekta.
66014007	Iche la hooyi buure ka wihi iche tidah, “Taba, Waakh karoora, toro la saa'da! I'di tahe ibeenki Waakh weeli enenyet hukkumo a yitah. Waakkhi serey ichoow harra ichoow bey ichoow indohi biccheet ba soouume, wahda.”
66014008	Hertoo Waakhe lammaatteet 'dubiche leetimiyye wihi iche tidah, “A massatte! Ilkerengeetti Weene Baabiloon bar a waayte. Ilkerengeetta yaafohi harra tuumman farsoti sabiibe soho'ddarriti iche kaassohatte damin a iholisse.”
66014009	Hertoo Waakhe seyyahnaatteet 'dubicho tabte, hooyi buure ka wihi iche tidah, “Eti tuummane binaha ichoow iyookkotiche wahti, sumatti binaha la miin ommos dahan ka 'hele,
66014010	ullaka farsoti sabiibe holi Waakh itolosso soodama. Hola la, farsoti sabiibe miigenye bicchehoo rucchul laka liikakhayine kokkoob lakachibo liiokkanaache. Waakh eta herti Waakhe munyee ichoow Heleem ortiis ka dagahti bolokhto ka weyti bolokh tusa.
66014011	Uunki bolokkha 'doo'da latuse jirtuu tuumman sereye ikaha. 'Doo'di binaha ichoow iyookkotiche wahti ichoow eti tuummane sumatti magahiis 'helo, ibeen ichoow maalim ba nasme ma 'helo.”
66014012	'Doo'di Waakhe amurreti Waakh raaho toro Yeesso kakhuufo ichohi samacchaarenye garrahsati la'doona.
66014013	Hooyoo toro goobi Waakh kayamiit daage, wihi us yidah, “Waha chiir, uus toolla kakhabatti, eti tuummane usu ichoow Kamur wohoo kalday yahiine yamuut a liimaala.” Rubeyti Waakh la wihi iche soolaabte, “Aa, a rum. Hili miigenye icho haaggicheen ka a nasaan. Icho a liimaala a mehe haaggi icho yeelaan 'dubichooda raaha.”
66014014	Ani la yeye orteey ka mirisoo dakhan arge, toro la etoo Ínam Aadam iyoog usuhi mirisaas kafiddiyo arge. Ulla 'duubi 'dahabe matakkiis kakhaba, warhanti gurnaan lakagoocho la dahane kakhuccha.
66014015	Hertoo Waakhe addan 'deerka minki Waakhe buure goya kasoobahte, weyti riirte, eti miris kafiddiyo wihi iche itidah, “Warhantaahti gurnaan lakagoocho khaate, gurnaan soogooy, i'di tahe wihi harra ka lasoosuuno a bissateene, kola la saha'ddi lasoosuuno a titah.”
66014016	Eti miris kafiddiyo warhantiisti gurnaan lakagoocho harra sarche kamoroogiche, harra tuumman i'di gurnaan u soosuune.
66014017	Hertoo Waakhe addan goobi Waakh ka minki Waakhe buure kasoobahte, iche laka warhanti af lehe gurnaan lakagoocho khabte.
66014018	Toro hertoo Waakhe addane antohi 'dab khabto koondihi ga'daar kasoobahte. Hooyi buure ka herti warhanti af lehe gurnaan lakagoocho wihi iche itidah, “Warhantaahti af lehe gurnaan lakagoocho khaate, gurnaanki sabiibe harra kijiro soogur. I'di tahe gurnaanki sabiib a bissaate.”
66014019	Herti Waakh warhanticheti gurnaan lakagoocho harra kamoroogisse, gurnaanki sabiib soogurte, meessi buurenye gurnaanki sabiib lakayabti goya kachibte. Meessa la a i'di sinati Waakh holiis ka 'doo'di uskeel leh omhicho.
66014020	Gurnaanka sabiib la ilkerengeetti ween kharicheeda lakayabte. Diig intaas gurnaan lakayabte ka 'dule, geeddi kiilomitta kud seyyah i'dule. Diig la hoggiis geeddi mittatoo ichoow nyuus iche eheet.
66015001	Goobi Waakh ka toro wohoo buurenye girmeenye miigti Waakh tuso arge. Herti Waakhe teebeenye sinayyohi teebeenye harra yaham sookhaatto arge. Waha a sinayyohi 'da'ddaboot, a mehe sinayyohaas ka holi Waakh a massata.
66015002	Anna wohoo beytoo buurenye kitaab iyooge 'dab lakawarse arge. 'Doo'di goorat binahi oraat ichoow iyookkoti binahane lahaaggiche sooriche toro ayti magahiis itolosso sooriche ichohi beytaas garabiche toollo arge. Reemassi chi' geeyo ladowo lagu'ddo 'haab layadeehe Waakh icho siiche iche khuccheene,
66015003	geey Muusahi falfati Waakhe ichoow geeyi Heleem laka doween, “Kamuri Waakhenye Miig Tuumman Leh, wihi at yeesso geeddoo meheenye haag ichoow girma yahiin! Karnati yaafo tuummanoow, wihi at yeesso a wihi rummaate am at kareeto mele.
66015004	Kamuroow ayyo ikaaroorine, magahaah ikoolin? A mehe ati kalday on munyee. Yaafohi harra tuumman a yamiitiine, toro ati kiwahtaan. I'di tahe wihi fissane at yeesso a soobabbakkaahisse.”
66015005	Anna waha 'dubicho ka yeye, minki Waakhe buure usuhi goobi Waakh ka fahan arge. Minka la a eemati saggi Waakh ileejiro tusso.
66015006	Herti Waakhe teebeenye sinayyohi teebee khabto la minki Waakhe buure goya kasoobahte. Icho la gaaddi daddakhane bibbildiikhto khabaane, saabi dafareete duhiis la ki 'dahab yahe kach kakhabaan.
66015007	Wahanyeyyohi affarenye lasoouume rubey khabo kichekoo herti Waakhe teebee kooba baakhuuli 'dahabe, holi Waakkhi jirtuu tuumman jiro buuho idiibte.
66015008	Minki Waakhe buure la uunki ababnaan ichoow miigti Waakh kayimiy goya buuhiche. Et minki Waakhe buure lii'diicho goya gelo mele, ichoowka sinayyohi teebeenye herti Waakhe teebee keente massataan.
66016001	'Deerka hooyoo buurenye minki Waakhe buure goya kasooyeede herti Waakhe teebee leeyeede daage, wihi us iyidah, “Nyaama, irda, holi Waakhe baakhuulleti teebee kijiro, harra kakhuba!”
66016002	Herti Waakhe oraat la iratte, wihi baakhuliche kijire harra kakhubte. Jiisohoo uskule weyti bolokhe 'doo'di sumatti binaat khabo toro iyookkoti binahaas wahte sar kasoofoofeen.
66016003	Herti Waakhe lammaatteet wihi baakhuuliche kijire beyti buure kakhubte. Bey tuumman i'di diiggi eti yumuy titahye, wihi goya kijiro rubey khabo tuumman la tuumeen.
66016004	Herti Waakhe seyyahnaatteet la wihi baakhuuliche kijire hawohi 'dulo ichoow indohi biccheet kakhubte. Icho la urgiyeene, diig yitaaheen.
66016005	'Deerka herti Waakhe bicche itolosso ichehi waha elatti daage, “Atihi Munyee, ki toolla jiro, goorat tuumman laka jire, at a fissantahe jeenteti sinayyoha at 'doo'di ati kigaran ikagoosse u.
66016006	A mehe icho diiggi 'doo'daah ichoow 'doo'di kiyeyyeedo harra ikhubeene, at la diiggi icho damaane siisse. Waha a wihi rumanka icho imale.”
66016007	Ani la hooyoo koondihi ga'daar ka sooyeede daage, “Aa, Kamuri Waakhenye Miig Tuumman Leh, hukkunka at 'doo'd igoosse a wihi rummaate toro fissan.”
66016008	Herti Waakhe affarnaatteet wihi baakhuuliche kijire orrah kakhubte. Orrah la miigti iche 'dab ka enenyet weyti gubto lasiiche.
66016009	Kuleeli weyti buure enenyet gube, icho la magahi Waakkhi sinayyoha khuccho igafeen. I'daasenyi icho uskeelicho kasoonokhan ichoow Waakkhi icho weynaachaan 'dii'deen.
66016010	Herti Waakhe channaatteet wihi baakhuuliche kijire komborti antoote too binahi oraate kakhubte. Harrati binaha dakhtaan tuumman la mug'di kalday titah. Jeenteti bolokkhi uskul u enenyet harrabbe iskhaniine.
66016011	Toro la jeenteti bolokkhichoki uskul ichoow jiissichuu, Waakkhi goobi Waakh igafeen. I'daasenyi wihi icho yeelaan ma kasoonokhan ba.
66016012	Herti Waakhe lihnaatteet wihi baakhuuliche kajire hawti buurenye 'dusso Yuufereet kakhubte, bicchehiche angageene, 'dee karnatohi beri kayamiit jit iyeessa.
66016013	Ani la 'deerka ginna seyyah rah iyoog arge. Too afi khorojebsi goya kasoobahte, too la afi binahi oraate goya kasoobahte, ti addan la afi eti eti Waákh íyeyyeedo iskaayyeelo goya kasoobahte.
66016014	Icho a rubeyohi ginnayyohi girmo tuso. Ginnayyoha karnatohi harra tuummane iirtaane, 'dee ibeenki weene Waakkhi Miig Tuumman Leh ka diho iururichaan.
66016015	Yeessohi Kamure wihi us essi kallaayo, “Nabah suda! An saggi eti walah hato iamiit. Eti iur'dine, gaaddiis marte, 'dee murukh isohanne, lakhaanyotiis 'dow liikasoobihin a liimaala.”
66016016	Ginnayyoha 'deerka karnatoha meessi afi Ibiraaniya ka Harmageedo layadeeh ka isikeeneen.
66016017	Herti Waakhe teebannaatteet wihi baakhuuliche kijire, hafar kakhubte. Hooyoo buure minki Waakhe buure goyaka komborti antoote Waakhe ka usuhi sooyeedo daage, wihi us yidah, “Walah tuumman a massateen.”
66016018	'Deerka ankhad ichoow boroo'd ichoow karkaraho ba soobaheene, harra la weyti sesseehte. Uu' Waakh harra soouume, injire harra geedda ma sesseehin, a mehe harra saggoo uskule isesseehte.
66016019	Ilkerengeetti weene Baabiloon meel seyyahe ikharradde, ilkerengeetohi yaafohi harra la bar waayeen. Waakh uskeeli 'doo'di ilkerengeetti Baabiloon yeele tuumman ma kadabine, 'doo'di ilkerengeetta farsoti sabiibe kokkoob buuhto holi Waakh itolosso siiche.
66016020	Kurohi bicche goya kijiro tuumman firdeene, halal tuumman la baabeen.
66016021	Dagahti burbuurenye baraafo, kooba geeddi kiilo tomon affare serey ka enenyet kasookhubatte. Enenyet jeenteti sinata weyti buurenye dagahti baraafo keentuu Waakh igafe, a mehe sina weyti suuj eheet.
66017001	Herti Waakhe teebeenye baakhuulle khabto goyaka, too itimiyye wihi iche ani itidah, “Kaale, hukkunki Waakh malaayata weene bicchehi ittaawe kafiddiito igoocho a kituso.
66017002	Karnatohi harrata malaayata soho'ddarri kaleessohteen. Toro la 'doo'di harrata farsoti sabiibe soho'ddarritichee ka meleefu yitah.”
66017003	'Deerka herta Waakh isi'dde, Rubeyti Waakh iwoyte hidaaddoo igeesse. Intaakka makhaabassoo binahoo guu'ddan sarche fuusso arge. Binaha sar tuumman ka magahenyeti Waakh iskeekkaasso kachiirane, toro matah teeba ichoow gaas tomone khabaan.
66017004	Makhaabale gaaddoo muggee ichoow gu'duu'd khabto iche khabta. Sar la 'dahab ichoow dagahtoo gato miige ichoow irtiyyohoo gato miige, iche lakeeykode. Iche la kokkooboo 'dahabe wahanyeyyohi weyti lakhaanyee ichoow duksakki soho'darritiche buuhto iche khucchisse.
66017005	Miintiche la magaha wohoo dagsan itoollo iche kachiiran,
66017006	Anna makhaabassa diiggi 'doo'di Waakh ichoow diiggi 'doo'di gar Yeesso laabo tubhubye ichoowka meleefu titah arge. Uus an iche arge ka weyti girmeesde.
66017007	'Deerka herti Waakh wihi iche ani itidah, “A i'doh igirmeysatta? Wihi dagsane makhaabassa ichoow binahi iche koorromatte matah teeba ichoow gaas tomon khabo miinsan, a kisoobabbakkaahicha.
66017008	Binahaas at agarte goorat a jireene toolla ma jiraane berri la ankhari dahane ieleelin goya kasoobahaane labaabiicha. 'Doo'di harra yaalle, uu' harra lasoouume magahenyeticho buuggi 'doo'di jiroti imassan liikachiirin la, maanti icho binaha argaan, weyti girmeestaan. A mehe binahaas maantoo a jireene, toolla ma jiraane toro berri a yamiitiin.
66017009	“Ayta khara 'doonta. Matahenyeti teebeenye binahaas khabaan, kurohi teebeenye makhaabale kafiddiito itoollaan.
66017010	Matahenyeta teebee toro karnat teeba itoollaan. Karnatoha teebee, chane a tuunte, koo uliba a karnate, ki addan uliba ma imaatan. I'daasenyi maanti us yamiit, geeddoo rucchul on karnat yateeh.
66017011	Binaha goorat jire toolla la ijirin, a karnati siyyeennaatteet. Ullaka karnatohi teebee a kichokoowe, toro la a labaabiicha.
66017012	“Gaasohi tomonenye at agarte, karnatohi tomonenye uliba ilassi icho dakhtaan i'heline itoollaan. I'daasenyi karnatoha antohi icho saha'ddoo kalday binahaas harra leedakhtaan a 'helaan.
66017013	Icho la maloo kaldaye khabaane, antohicho ichoow miigticho binahi oraate siichaan.
66017014	Binaha ichoow karnatoha ba Heleeme diho kiirtaane, i'daasenyi Heleem ichoow 'doo'diis ba icho kahataataan. A mehe us a Kamuri kamurre kussan, toro a Karnati karnato kussan. Toro la 'doo'di usu leejiro a 'doo'di Waakh wahe, Waakh soobahsate toro Waakh a kakhuufaan.”
66017015	Herta Waakh 'deerka wihi iche ani itidah, “Bicchehi kootte at agarte malaaya kafiddiito, 'doo'di yeerare ichoow ururreti ittaawe ichoow yaafohi ittaawe ichoow afassi ittaawenye itoollaan.
66017016	Binaha at agarte ichoow gaasohi tomone la malaaya a nibhaataan. Icho la wihi iche khabto tuumman a kakhaataane, murukh katabaane, jidiche yamhiine, toro la iche 'dab ka gubaan.
66017017	A mehe Waakh karnatoha maliissa uurassicho gesse, 'dee malaas ka wihi us 'doono yeelaan. Karnatoha a isleegoochaane, antohichoki icho yaafo kadakhtaan binahi oraat siichaane, ichoowka yeedassi Waakh labuuhicha.
66017018	Makhaabassi at agarte, ilkerengeetti weene karnatohi harra tuumman dakhtaane itolossa.”
66018001	Waha 'dubicho ka, hertoo Waakhe addan ichehi goobi Waakh kasookhubatti arge. Herta Waakh la antohi buurenye khabta, ababnaanki iche ababto la harra tuumman banaynoocheen.
66018002	Herta Waakh hooyi buure ka riirte, wihi iche tidah, “A massatte! Ilkerengeetti Weene Baabiloon bar a waayte! Furi ginnayyoot ichoow furi meleykayyoote titahye, chimbirohi bi'dirreenye toro weyti la'dii'do kola intaas igela.
66018003	I'di tahe yaafo tuumman, farsoticheti sabiibe soho'ddarriti holi Waakh keento iche dameen. Karnatohi harra tuumman la makhaabassaas soho'ddarri kaleessohteen. 'Doo'di bacchaara harra tuumman la jeenteti soho'ddarriticheeda ikamurrowe.”
66018004	Toro hooyoo goobi Waakh ka sooyeedo daage wihi us yidah, “'Doo'daaw, kaaleya Baabiloon goya kasoobaha, 'dee uskeeli iche kajirto, aleegelina, 'dee sinati Waakh iche kawaaricho la a'helina.
66018005	A mehe uskeeliche a iskore, ichoowka goobi Waakh eleele. Waakh la suujoonki 'doo'di Baabiloon yeele ma kadabin.
66018006	I'di iche atin yeesse, atin laka iche iyeela. Suujoonki iche atin iyeesse, kol lammatiis iche iyeela. Farsoti uskule iche kokkoobiche atin ikawarasse, kol lammatiche ikawarsa.
66018007	Geeddi iche iskoolisse, iche kamurroonki soho'ddarri kijirte, iche geeddaas sina ichoow bolokh tusa. A mehe uuriche ka a eylajja, mehe elatta ya, ‘An saggi makhaabassi karnatenye ijira. An muunkho menye, jirtuu la ma ooyo.’
66018008	Maantaka ibeenkoo kaldach on sinayyohiche iche kahataataane, omoot ichoow oytim ichoow abaár ikeena. Iche 'dabe yaham, a mehe Kamuri Waakhenye ween iche a hukkuma.”
66018009	“Karnatohi harra goorat iche soho'ddarri kaleessohte, kamurronkiche leegisme maanti icho uunki 'dabi ilkerengeettaas yaham argaan a uuwwichaane iche ooyaan.
66018010	Jeenteti icho bolokkhi ilkerengeettaas weyti ikanahaan u, foga tolossataane riiraane wihi icho essaan, “Uuwwiy! Uuwwiy! Ilkerengeetta weenoow, Baabiloonoow, ilkerengeetti miig khabtooy! Saha'ddoo kalday on sinati Waakh kigooche kitimiy!”
66018011	“'Doo'di harra ka bacchaarti la a uuwwicha ilkerengeettane ooya, a mehe et kola meehicho gatti mele.
66018012	Et kola meehichoki 'dahab ichoow ki lahaageet ichoow dagahti bibbildiikhto ichoow irtiyyohi gato miige gatti mele. Et darfohichoki fil ittaawenye gato miigenye i'di maanta wihi daddakhan ichoow wihi muggeyyee ichoow wihi gugguu'ddan kagatti mele. Et kho'doommeti fil ittaawenye gato miige ichoow wahanyeyyohi 'hiir lakahaaggiche fil ittaawe gatti mele. Et meehichoki birtoo booran ichoow ki birtoo daayiti khaalkhee ichoow ki dagahti lasigo lakahaaggiche gatti mele.
66018013	Toro et geeyohi gololle lakachibo 'dee golol haaggicho ichoow miricchinye ichoow subahenyeti hahhaaggane sar lakadowti ichoow uyuuggeti lasaarti kagatti mele. Toro et farsoti sabiib ichoow subakki geeyi oolif ichoow ingangaano ichoow 'dargaayye ichoow looyyo ichoow iiy ichoow fará'd ichoow garrunyeti fara'de jiitto ichoow 'doo'di loororicho kagatti mele.
66018014	“'Doo'di iche bacchaara leehaagsati la wihi us yadeeh, ‘Baabiloonoow, wahanyeyyohi haaggane rubeytaah imoonte tuumman a lakaakhaate. Kamurroonkaah ichoow wihi kibildiikhicho tuumman a lakakhaate, yombuu la toro ma 'hesso!’ ”
66018015	'Doo'di 'hor bacchaara haaggiche, meeha ororiche toro iche kakamurrowe foga tolossata, bolokkhiche weyti kanaha. Icho la a uuwwichaane toro ooyaane,
66018016	riiraane, wihi icho yadeehiin, “ ‘Uuwwiy! Uuwwiy! Ilkerengeetta weenoow, ati gaaddi hahhaaggane daddakhan ichoow ti muggeyyee ichoow ti gugguu'ddan a gessatte, toro 'dahab ichoow dagahti bibbildiikhto ichoow irtiyyohi gato miige a lakeeykode.
66018017	Saha'ddoo kalday goya on ka kamurroonka tuumman bar latire.’ “'Doo'di koobanohi burbuure itoollo ichoow ki koobano kasohti ichoow ki koobano hil kahaaggicho ichoow ki tuummane chilinkicho bacchaarati beyeet kayamiit foga tolossate.
66018018	Maanti icho uunki 'dabi ilkerengeettaas yaham kasoobaho argaan, a riiraane, wihi icho yadeehiin, ‘Injire ilkerengeettoo weene harra ka i'di tane a jirte?’
66018019	Icho la a ooyaane uuwwichaane toro ebeer matah iskachibaane, wihi icho yadeehiin, “ ‘Uuwwiy! Uuwwiy! Ilkerengeetta weenoow, kamurroonkicheeda 'doo'di koobano khabo, bey ka bacchaarti kamurrowe. Saha'ddoo kalday goya on ka walah dakkhan bar latire!
66018020	Atinhi goobi Waakh kajirtaan, taba gi'de ilkerengeetta weyti kahamaada! 'Doo'di Waakh ichoow ergaano ichoow 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo, taba hamaada. Jeenteti wihi iche atin yeessuu, Waakh iche sina a igooche.’ ”
66018021	'Deerka hertoo Waakhe weyti miige daddaabtoo i'di daddaabti buurenye gurnaan lakatumee okkhisse, bey goya isaate, wihi iche tidah, “Miigti buurenye i'dee ka, ilkerengeetti weene Baabiloon a lasoolug'da, yombuu la toro ma la'helo.
66018022	Hooyi reenki 'haab layadeeh ichoow indulle ichoow arab yombuu goytaah lakadaago mele. Tagaammeti fil ittaawe, yombuu toro goytaah ma lakeelo. Hooyi daddaabti buurenye gurnaan lakatumo, jirtuu goytaah ma lakadaago.
66018023	Toro la jirtuu banayhi taa goytaah ma kabolkhaan. Hooyi eti min disti ommos inanti ladiso, jirtuu goytaah ma lakadaago. 'Doo'daahki bacchaara haaggiche ki harra ka lagarti eheet. Morotaah ka yaafo tuumman a leekkeeste.
66018024	Diiggi 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo ichoow diiggi 'doo'di Waakh ichoow 'doo'di harra ka labakkiche tuumman goyticheeda lakeele.”
66019001	Waha 'dubicho ka goobi Waakh ka wihi i'di kowdoti ururi 'doo'di weyti ittaawee daage, wihi us yidah, “Okkhoow, weyti kikoolinna! Ribnaan ichoow weynaan ichoow miig ati leh!
66019002	A mehe hukkunkaahki ittaawe a rume toro a fissanyahe. Ati malaayati weene, 'doo'di harra tuumman soho'ddarri ka uskeel kalugu'dde, sina a igoosse. At la diiggi falfayyohaahki iche bakkisse, aál a kagutatte.”
66019003	'Doo'd toro riire wihi us yidah, “Okkhoow, weyti kikoolinna! Uunki 'dabi ilkerengeeteet jirtuu dakkhan serey on ikaha.”
66019004	Ewweenki tomon lamma ichoow affare ichoow wahanyeyyohi affarenye lasoouume rubey khabo ba jilbo il kagu'ddeene, Waakkhi komborti antoot kafiddiyo wahteene, wihi icho yidaaheen, “Aamiin! Okkhoow, weyti kikoolinna!”
66019005	'Deerka komborti antoot ka hooyoo sooyeede wihi us yidah, “Atinhi ilbooyyetiise tuumman, atinhi usu karoortaan, atinhi rurrucchul ichoow atinhi wewween, taba Waakkheen koolicha.”
66019006	'Deerka toro hooyi i'di ururi 'doo'di buurenye kowdootee daage. Hooya la a i'di bicchehi sookhubti, toro la i'di karkaraho iyeeda. Icho la wihi icho yidaaheen, “Okkhoow weyti kikoolinna! I'di tahe Kamuri Waakhenye Miig Tuumman Leh, usu walah tuummamba anta.
66019007	Weyti hamaano, weynaantiis koolinno! I'di tahe oroosi Heleem a yitah. Inantiisti us disti la a istannabisse.
66019008	Iche la gaaddi hahhaaggane bibbildiikhto chaafotoo rucchul laka ikhabine, iche gessatti a lasiiche.” Gaadda la wihi fissane 'doo'di Waakh yeele itolossa.
66019009	Herti Waakh 'deerka wihi iche ani itidah, “Waha chiir, ‘'Doo'di Waakh imaalo a ki Waakh oroosi Heleem iwahe.’ ” Herti Waakh kakhayte, wihi iche tidah, “Waha a yeedassi rummaate Waakh.”
66019010	An la hertaas Waakh orche ka jilbo il kagu'dde, wahan leheet. I'daasenyi wihi iche itidah “Tabe i'daas ayeelin! Annaka i'di ilbooyyeti wahalhaahenye toro wahalhi 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste runti Yeesso babbakkaahiche raaho u, Waakh on ifala. Waakh kalday on waho! A mehe runti Yeesso soobabbakkaahiche, a miigti farniinki Waakh lakacheeko.”
66019011	Goobi Waakh usuhi fahan arge, fara'doo dakhan arge. Eti fara'da fuulo la magahiis mehe layadeeh ya, Ki Lakakhuufo, Rum Leh. Usu jiti fissane enenyet kahukkuma, toro la diho irta.
66019012	Indohiis la i'di 'dab u a bildiikhaane, matakkiis ka la 'duubassi ittaawenye khaba. Sartiis magahoo kachiirane, i'daasenyi usu on garta, et addane wihi magahaas tahe garti mele.
66019013	Ulla kabuu'di diig lakalug'de khaba, magahiis la a Yeedi Waakh.
66019014	Kiyati ittaawenye goobi Waakhe fara'ddi daddakhan fuusso la 'dubiissa raahta. Kiyata la darfohi hahhaaggane daddakhane chaafo laa iche khabta.
66019015	Afiis la birlabi af lehe us yaafo kabaabiicho kasoobaha. “Ulla wussi ga'daar ka icho a dakhta.” Gurnaanki sabiibe inti gurnaan lakayabti kijiro a yabta. Waha la holi Waakkhi Miig Tuumman Lehe itoollaan.
66019016	Kabuu'diis ichoow togooggiis magahane kachiiran,
66019017	Ani la hertoo Waakhe orrah sarche katolosso arge. Iche la weyti riirte, wihi ra'denye serey kayari'd tuumman wihi iche itidah, “Kaaleya, sukuukuhi Waakhe buure isookulma,
66019018	'dee sarti karnatoot ichoow ti 'doo'di iskar iwewween ichoow ti iskarti mimmiige ichoow ti fara'deet ichoow ti iskarti fará'd fuusso amha. Sarti bow'dayyoot ichoow ti 'doo'di bow'dayyo ieheynan ichoow sarti 'doo'di wewween ichoow ti 'doo'di 'da'ddaran amha.”
66019019	'Deerka binahi oraat ichoow karnatohi tomonenye harrata ichoow kiyaticho ba ichohi sookulme 'dee eti fara'd fuulo ichoow kiyatiis dihoti Harmageedo layadeeh kiirti arge.
66019020	I'daasenyi binaha ichoow eti goorat eti Waákh íyeyyeedo iskaayyeelo binahaas ortiis ka girmohi miig tuso yeele ba islaleekhabte. Girmoha ka la 'doo'di sumatti binahaas 'hele toro la iyookkoti binahaas wahte a leekkeeste. Icho lammacho rubey khabaani, beyti 'dabe i'di lahawti kibirii'd ibolokhto goya liiseye.
66019021	Karnatohicho ichoow kiyaticho tuumman la birlabi eti fara'd fuulo afiis kasoobahe bakkiche. Chimbiro tuumman la sarticho yumheene ichoowka dargeen.
66020001	Ani la hertoo Waakh ichehi goobi Waakh kasookhubatti arge. Iche la furoti ankhari dahane ieleelin ichoow biingotoo miigenye khabta.
66020002	Herta Waakh la khorojebsihi archiiy jire magahiis ki 'doo'd hanti ommos Seytaan layadeeh khabatte, gu'h alifoo hidde.
66020003	Ankhari dahane ieleelin goya isaate, af hidde toro 'duu'dde, 'dee kola yaafohi harra ma ekkeesti ichoowka gu'hassi alifoowe kutaan. Maanti gu'hassaas kuteen, geeddoor toro a lasoofura.
66020004	'Deerka komborohi antoot arge, 'doo'di komboroha kafiddiyo la, antohi icho 'doo'd kahukkumaan a lasiiche. Toro 'doo'di jeenteti us wori rummaate koo Yeessee ichoow Yeedi Waakh icheeko matahenye laaggooche arge. 'Doo'da la a ki binahi oraat ommos iyookkoti binahaas iwahanne toro sumatti binahaas miinassicho ommos dahanohicho ka i'helin. Icho la omoot a lakasookahche, gu'h alifoo Kiriisto harra leedakhtaan.
66020005	Waha a koli oraate Waakh 'doo'd omoot kasookahche. Eheetteey laka, 'doo'di addane tuume omoot ma kasookahine ichoowka gu'hassa alifoowe kuteen.
66020006	'Doo'di Waakh imaalo toro la munyee a ki 'doo'di oraate Waakh omoot kasookahcho goya kijiro. Omootti lammaatteet icho anto ma kakhabto, i'daasenyi Waakh ichoow Kiriisto ortiis ka kuhaaniyyohi hili Waakh haaggicho yateehiin. Icho la gu'h alifoo Kiriisto harra leedakhtaan.
66020007	Inkoo gu'hassa alifoowe kuteen, Seytaan inti goorat us kahidanyahe ka a lasoofura,
66020008	ulla baha yaafohi harra 'dollohiche affarcho kijiro Goog ichoow Magoog layadeeh ekkeesta, 'dee yaafoha diho iururicha. Icho la ittaaw ka a geeddi yoohti beyti buure afiche kijiro.
66020009	'Doo'da la harra kataa'he, furi 'doo'di Waakhe ilkerengeetti weene Waakh weyti 'doono khaaricheen. I'daasenyi 'daboo goobi Waakh on kasookhubte 'doo'da tuumman bar tire.
66020010	Seytaanki 'doo'da ekkeeste la beyti 'dabe i'di lahawti kibirii'd ibolokhto binahi oraat ichoow eti eti Waákh íyeyyeedo iskaayyeelo lakalug'de usu laka goya liiseye. Icho la jirtuu tuumman, maalim ichoow ibeen ba, bolokhe latusa.
66020011	'Deerka kombortoo antoote buurenye dakhane etoo kafiddiyo arge. Harra ichoow sereye ba eta ortiis kafirdeene, i'daasenyi meel icho isi'heleen mele.
66020012	Anna 'doo'di tuume, ki mimmiige ichoow ki 'da'ddaran ba usuhi komborta antoot ortiis toollo arge. Buuggag la laaffure. Buuggoo addane magahenyeti 'doo'di jiroti imassan 'helo kachiiranyahe lafure. 'Doo'di tuume ebba wihi us goorat yeele buuggag goya kachiiran ka lahukkume.
66020013	Beye 'doo'di tuume goyahiche kijire soo'diisse. Omoot ichoow meessi omooteet la 'doo'di tuume goyahicho kijiro soo'diicheene, Waakh la ebba hukkume. Hukkunka ichoow wihi goorat icho yeeleen ba a israahaan.
66020014	Waakh 'deerka omoot ichoow meessi omooteet ba beyti 'dab goya iseye. Beyta 'dab a omootti lammaatteet.
66020015	Chi' etoo magahiis buuggi 'doo'di jiroti jirtuu imassan 'helo goya liika'helin, beyti 'dabe goya liiseye.
66021001	'Deerka sereyti daayane husub ichoow harrati husub arge. I'di tahe harrati oraat ichoow sereyti daayane oraat tuummamba a kuteen. Walah beyenye kola jiro mele.
66021002	Anna Ilkerengeetti Weene Lagane Yeerusaleeme husube goobi Waakh ka sookhubatti arge. Ilkerengeetta a i'di inanti ladiso tannabatte eti disti gaaddi haaggan igessatte.
66021003	Hooyi buurenye komborti antoot kasooyeedo daage, wihi us yidah, “Yeya, Waakh kola weeli enenyet goya furta. Ulla icho a leefiddiya, icho la 'doo'diis yateehiin. Waakh rubeytiis la icho a leejira, ulla Waakkhichooda yateeh.
66021004	Waakh la indohicho ka ilmohicho tuumman a hiyyaaya. Kola omoote ma jirto, enenyet looyo mele, oytime ma jirto, bolokh laka ma jiro. I'di tahe wahanyeyyohi oraat a kuteen.”
66021005	Eti komborti antoot kafiddiyo la mehe yidah ya, “An walah dakkhan a husubnaacha!” 'Deerka wihi us ani iyidah, “Waha chiir, i'di tahe yeedassa a wihi lakakhuufo, toro la a wihi rummaat.”
66021006	Ulla wihi us ani iyidah, “Walah dakkhan a layeele! Ani Uumaccheenye toro ani on 'Da'ddabee. An walah tuumman orcho a jire, walah tuumman 'dubicho laka a jira. Eti subgaate, an i'daanu bicchehi issi jiro kayamiit siicha.
66021007	Eti sooricho wihi tuummane usu mu'dane 'hela, an Waakkhiissa ateehe, ulla weeleey yateeh.
66021008	I'daasenyi 'doo'di bur'deyyee ichoow ki Kiriisto irummeysan ichoow ki wihi bi'dire tuumman yeelo ichoow ki enenyet dubunuunu yagiis ichoow ki soho'ddarri kaassohti ichoow ki tibaato khabo ichoow ki iyookkoyyohi waakkhakh lakayeessi wahti ichoow ki beeno leh tuumman, meessicho a beyti 'dabe i'di lahawti kibirii'd ibolokhto. Waha a omootti lammaatteet.”
66021009	Herti Waakhe teebeenye baakhuulleti teebeenye sinayyohi yomboot buuhaan khabte kichekoo yimiyye ileeyeede wihi us iyidah, “Kaale, nyarnyaar a kituso, iche a makhaabassi Heleem.”
66021010	Herta Waakh la Rubeyti Waakh iwoytaayi haloo weyti deer isi'dde. Iche la Ilkerengeetti Weene Lagane Yeerusaleeme Waakh katamiite goobi Waakh kasookhubatti itusse.
66021011	Banayhi ilkerengeetta ababnaanki Waakh rubeytiis kasooababo kayamiitiin. Ababnaankaas la a i'di daakkoo gato miigenye ulhawe i'di kiyoow u warraakhe.
66021012	Ilkerengeetta la khaari daddaaboote serey ka weyti deere kamarsan. Toro ilkerengeetta arit tomon ichoow lamma khabta, arite ba la hertoo Waakhe tolossa. Arite ba magahoo yaafohi tomon ichoow lammeenye Issiraayele kachiiran.
66021013	Anki miigeet ka arit seyyahe khaba, anki gurro ka la arit seyyahe khaba, beri ka la arit seyyahe khaba, bahay ka la arit seyyahe khaba.
66021014	Khaara daddaaboote ilkerengeetta ween kamarsan, daddaabohoo ilaate tomon ichoow lammee iche kadisanyahe. Daddaabe ba la magahi ergaanoti Heleeme tomon ichoow lammee, iche kachiiran.
66021015	Herta Waakhe ileeyyeeddo, wussoo 'dahabe iche ilkerengeet ichoow arto ichoow khaari ilkerengeetta kamarsan tuumman karerreegto iche khabta.
66021016	Ilkerengeetta la 'dollohiche tuumman a ekka. Iche la wussa ilkerengeet karerreegte. Ballaaddihiche a kiilomitta alif lamma ichoow kud lamma, segdeerru ka laka a kiilomitta alif lamma ichoow kud lamma. Deeraantiche ichoow segdeerruhiche ichoow ballaaddihiche a ekka.
66021017	Herta Waakh toro khaari ilkerengeet kamarsan rerreegte, yobbo ka a mitta tomon lih ichoow lih. Herta Waakh la saggi enenyet walah irerreego on irerreegta.
66021018	Khaara ilkerengeetta kamarsan dagahtoo gato miigenye ulhawe lakadise. Ilkerengeet la 'dahabi massane i'di kiyoowhi bildiikheenye kadisan.
66021019	Daddaabohi ilaate khaari ilkerengeetta kamarsan kadisanyahe la dagahti fil tuummanenye toro gato miigenye lakeeykode. Daddaabti ilaate oraat a too ulhawe, ti lammaatteet la a too daayane, ti seyyahnaatteet la a too duh ittaawenye, ti affarnaatteet laka a too ulhawe,
66021020	ti channaatteet a too barlayenye, ti lihnaatteet a too guu'ddane, ti teebannaatteet a too derle ichoow ulah iskawarsanyahiine, ti siyyeennaatteet a too iche laka ulhawe, ti saagaalnaatteet a too iche laka duh ittaawenye, ti tomonnaatteet a too iche laka ulhawe, ti tomon ichoow koownaatteet a too iche laka guu'ddane, ti tomon ichoow lammaatteet a too muggee.
66021021	Artohi tomon ichoow lammee tooba daakkoo weyti gato miigenye lakahaaggiche. Jiti ilkerengeetta ween dah kagoocho la a 'dahabi massane i'di kiyoowhi bildiikhee.
66021022	Ilkerengeet goyaka minki Waakhe buure ma argin, i'di tahe Kamuri Waakhenye Miig Tuumman Leh ichoow Heleeme minki Waakhe buurenye ilkerengeetete.
66021023	Ilkerengeete orrah ommos yeyyakki banay siicho ma 'doonto. A mehe ababnaanki Waakhe ilkerengeet banay siicha, Heleem la a taahicheeda.
66021024	Yaafo tuumman la banayhaase goya kaassohtaan. Karnatohi harra tuumman laka kamurroonkicho intane keenaan.
66021025	Artohi ilkerengeetta maalim tuumman ma looto, a mehe intaas ibeen ma tateeh.
66021026	Haaggi nool ichoow kamurroonki yaafo tuumman ilkerengeettane lakeena.
66021027	Walah bi'direnye jirtuu ilkerengeet goya gelo mele. Toro la eti wihi lakhaanyee yeelo ommos eti been goocho goya ma gelo. 'Doo'di gelo, a ki magahenyeticho buuggi Heleeme 'doo'di jiroti jirtuu imassan khabo lakachiire kaldach on.
66022001	'Deerka herti Waakh hawti 'dusso bicchehiche jiro lakeelo, bicchehiche weyti warraakhyahiin itusse. Hawta la komborti antoote Waakh ichoow Heleem leeyahiine katamiit.
66022002	Hawta la jiti buurenye ilkerengeet dah kagoocho, iche tabta. 'Dollohiche lammache la geeyoo jiro lakeelo, gu'h ka gurnaan tomon ichoow lamma delo, hay ka delo, a katoolla. Seebi geeya la yaafo samaacha.
66022003	Falohi Waakh kola ilkerengeet goya ma kijiraan. Komborti antoote Waakh ichoow Heleem leeyahiin ilkerengeet goya kajirta, falfayyohi Waakh la intaase Waakh ikahilaan.
66022004	Icho la Waakh fooliis a argaane, magahi Waakh la miinassichooda lakachiira.
66022005	Ilkerengeetta kola mug'di ma khabto. 'Doo'di goya kajiro la taa ma 'doono ommos banayhi orraheet ma 'doono. I'di tahe Kamuri Waakhe rubeytiissa banayhicho yateeh. 'Doo'da tuumman la jirtuu tuumman i'di karnatoot u walahe dakhta.
66022006	Herta Waakh wihi iche ani itidah, “Yeedassa a wihi lakakhuufo, toro la a wihi rummaat. Kamuri Waakhenye Rubeyti Waakh 'doo'di Waákh íyeyyeedo siicho, ani laka a isooerge, 'dee wihi toolla yateeh ichoow wihi dowannoha ka sooyateeh, falfayyohiis tusa.”
66022007	Yeesso wihi us essi kallaayo, “Nabah suda! An dowwanoha ka a amiit! Ani eti tuummane yeedassi buugga kachiirane eti Waákh íyeyyeedo chiire raaho a imaala.”
66022008	Ani a Yoohana, anna waha tuumman a daage, toro la a arge. Inkoo an waha daage toro arge ka, herti Waakhe waha itusse orche ka jilbo il kagu'dde, wahan leheet!
66022009	I'daasenyi herti Waakh wihi iche ani itidah, “Tabe i'daas ayeelin! Annaka i'di ilbooyyeti wahalhaahenye toro wahalhi 'doo'di Kiriisto rummeeste Waákh íyeyyeedo ichoow ki wihi buugga kachiiran raahuu, a falfa Yeesso on. Waakh on waho!”
66022010	Herti Waakh toro wihi iche itidah, “Jeenteti ibeenki waha yateehiin isoodowwaatuu, yeedassi atihi Waakh iyeyyeeddo buugga kachiirte hanja akadaginne 'dee yeedassa a laargo.
66022011	Eti khuf yeelo, khuf on a yeelo, ki soho'ddarri kijiro la, soho'ddarritaas on a kaassohti, eti wihi fissan yeelo la wihi fissan on a yeelo, ki munyee la orey a isohti munya a yitaahe.”
66022012	Yeesso la toro wihi us yidah, “Nabah suda! An dowwanoha ka guunnaankeey khabaayi a amiit. Gunnaanka an ebba guto ichoow wihi icho goorat yeeleen ba a israahaan.
66022013	Ani Uumaccheenye toro 'Da'ddabee, ani Oreyenye toro la Salaahime, an walah tuumman orcho a jire, toro walah tuumman 'dubicho a jira.”
66022014	'Doo'di Waakh imaalo, a ki kabuu'ddeticho dikho 'dee gurnaanki geeyi jiro laka'helo ohom mu'dane, toro la arto tabo ilkerengeetti ween gelo.
66022015	I'daasenyi 'doo'di ilkerengeetta khariche kijiro, a ki isbi'dirroocho, 'doo'di tibaato khabo ichoow ki soho'ddarri kaassohti ichoow ki enenyet dubunuunu yagiis ichoow ki iyookkoyyohi waakkhakh lakayeessi wahti ichoow ki been 'doono toro kol dakkhan been goocho.
66022016	“Anihi Yeessee herteeytoo a kisooerge, 'dee iche la wahanyeyyoha tuummane rummaat ururreteey icheekta. Ani a Hiiy ichoow weel weel Dawuude toro la a Bakkaali Baryo weyti ababo.”
66022017	Rubeyti Waakh ichoow nyarnyaar ba wihi icho Yeesso idowaan, “Amiit!” Eti tuummane wora daage laka Yeesso, “Amiit!” a iyidaahe gi'de. Eti tuummane sugub khabo a yimaate. Eti tuummane 'doono la, biccheha jiro laka'helo i'daanu enenyet lasiicho a yubhaabe.
66022018	Ani eti tuummane yeedassi buugga eti Waákh íyeyyeedo kijiro nabah isudo a tootoocha. Chi' etoo wohoo kakhayo, Waakh etaas sinayyohi yahame buugga kachiiran a ikakhaya.
66022019	Chi' etoo buugga eti Waákh íyeyyeedo chiire yeedassoo kabahche la, Waakh rubeytiis etaas gisiiski gurnaanki geeyi jiro laka'helo a kakhaata toro ilkerengeetti weene lagan goya gelin a tirta. Wahanyeyyoha tuumman buugga ka a ladowdowe.
66022020	Eti runti wahanyeyyoha cheeko mehe essa ya, “Aa, Dowannoha ka a amiit!” Aamiin. Yeessohi Kamure, dowwa amiit.
66022021	Yeessohi Kamure ba 'doo'di Waakh tuumman imaala. Aamiin.
